40001001	Kisang tin to pasikngin epo a-Yesus Krais tin me mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Dewit men u a-Dewit men me mi khuuknginin tin ta Abraham men kut tumen wala pok ti:
40001002	Abraham khuuk sun Aisak, u Aisak ko khuuk a-Yakop, u a-Yakop ko khuuk a-Yuda hi po ehuro hi kut tumen;
40001003	ma a-Yuda ko khuuk sun a-Peres ngong a-Sara kha toni ngong e-Tamar men, ma a-Peres ko khuuk sun a-Hesron, u a-Hesron ko khuuk a-Ram kut tumen;
40001004	ma a-Ram khuuk sun a-Minadap, u a-Minadap ko khuuk a-Nason, u a-Nason ko khuuk a-Salmon kut tumen;
40001005	ma a-Salmon ko khuuk a-Boas, men tonin e-Rahap, khama a-Boas khuuk sun a-Obed, men tonin e-Rut, u a-Obed khuuk sun a-Yesi,
40001006	u a-Yesi ko khuuk sun a-Dewit tin sinkhaung ta hi Israel men kut tumen. Ma a-Dewit tin sinkhaung men ko khuuk sun a-Solomon, men kho ma tonin men ung ta a-Yuraia.
40001007	Ma a-Solomon ko khuuk sun a-Rehoboam, u a-Rehoboam ko khuuk sun Abia, u Abia ko khuuk sun Asa kut tumen;
40001008	ma Asa ko khuuk sun a-Yehosapat, u a-Yehosapat ko khuuk a-Yoram, u a-Yoram ko khuuk a-Usia,
40001009	u a-Usia ko khuuk sun a-Yotam, u a-Yotam ko khuuk sun Ahas, u Ahas ko khuuk sun a-Hesekaia kut tumen;
40001010	ma a-Hesekaia ko khuuk sun a-Manasa, u a-Manasa ko khuuk sun Amon, u Amon ko khuuk sun a-Yosaia kut tumen.
40001011	A-Yosaia men ko khuuk sun a-Yekonaia hi po ehuro hi minan tin po nolo me espo sun Israel li wo hi maik hi Babilon men.
40001012	Po Israel li ung wo mulusngin Babilon kho, anima a-Yekonaia ko khuuk sun a-Sealtiel, u a-Sealtiel ko khuuk a-Serubabel kut tumen;
40001013	ma a-Serubabel ko khuuk Abiut, u Abiut ko khuuk a-Eliakim, u a-Eliakim ko khuuk Asor kut tumen;
40001014	ma Asor ko khuuk sun a-Sadok, u a-Sadok ko khuuk Akim, u Akim ko khuuk a-Eliut kut tumen;
40001015	ma a-Eliut ko khuuk sun a-Eleasa u a-Eleasa ko khuuk a-Matan, u a-Matan ko khuuk a-Yakop kut tumen.
40001016	A-Yakop men ko khuuk a-Yosep, men titien e-Maria tin ko khuuk a-Yesus kho, po sikian yan Mesaia men.
40001017	Tumen ma po mosop tin ung e khuuk wal hosingin epo Abraham ma me pol epo a-Dewit men men khuuknginin khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (14); ma hosingin epo a-Dewit ma me pol minan tin po nolo me kan kan sun Israel ma po espo sun lik li Babilon men men khuuknginin khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun kut tumen (14); ma hosingin epo po Israel tin li ung wo mulusngin Babilon men ma me pol epo Mesaia tin ko khuukngin men men khuuknginin khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun maksin kut tumen (14).
40001018	Kut ma khuukngin tin ta a-Yesus tin Mesaia men men ko put plo nginan ti: men po soop tonin e-Maria to a-Yosep kho, ma wulong ku sup me klap wal kho som, men po pon ta wut tin kuman po sun hoin epo Emiun Auluungin men.
40001019	Si a-Yosep tin titien men, men wungin tan siik, ma yang min epo wut ku manngin wan to mara po masang to sun wala akomen, tumen ma yang taku mang ta wut li kaunngin engun.
40001020	Takuma yang in e maran ira wungin tin imen kut, ih, tihngin ta yang tin Akono men ta ko plo nginan ta sun mi enun yolngin ta, ma tihngin sakal taku, “Yosep, ngon tin khuuknginin ta a-Dewit men, e in aku e lem epo ngon tin ku wa e-Maria si ung tap men asin, epo po hoin tin wut kuman pon men men me epo Emiun Auluungin kha imen.
40001021	Ma wut ku khuuk Wirun, men ku e sik yang yan a-Yesus, epo yang men kuli palolo po masang to sun wala tin tan men epo lasin ta po.”
40001022	Kut ma wungin tin mosop imen si kut epon men ku wungin si enun ung hut tin yang tin Akono men pok put mi wo pokngin tin imen taku,
40001023	“Wom hul, wut wala wahin ta tin iso pong epo po masang men kuli iso kumaan, ma wut ku khuuk Wirun ta, men ku ko, po sikia yang yan ‘Imanuel,’” men sinsin ti, “Got in to it.”
40001024	Li klet ma a-Yosep phip si, men yang ira wungin tin tihngin ta yang tin Akono men wo ta yang epon men, ma yang wa titien me ung ta yang.
40001025	Ma yang ku nuk to wut som weh li pol minan tin wut khuuk Wirun tin muk men ko. Ma yang sikia sun yan a-Yesus.
40002001	Li klet ma a-Yesus ko khuukngin Betlehem tin ung wo mulusngin Yudia men minan tin a-Herot si sinkhaung men kho kut, ih, men po tin mhi hi ek e api hang sinang e me si men kara me pol Yerusalem.
40002002	Ma po me kines taku, “Yang tin ko khuukngin e sinkhaung ta po Yuda men ani a? Epo pim a ion awheng ta yang hang sinang e me si men, ma pim ku me powut pim ko suul epo yang.”
40002003	A-Herot tin sinkhaung men hul wungin tin imen, men yang miun tuung weh, kuru po mosop tin ung Yerusalem men miu hi tuung to yang kut tumen.
40002004	Ma yang palu po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men kut tumen men me palu wal kut, men yang kines mi po epo Mesaia men ku ko khuukngin ko pit a.
40002005	Ti ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Mi pi Betlehem tin ung wo mulusngin Yudia men, epo wungin tin tumen kha pokngin pan i men men nuk ti,
40002006	‘Si ngon Betlehem tin ung wo mulusngin Yuda men, ngon men ku tun weh lunga po tin mara hi pit wo pi Yuda men akomen. Epo yang ta tin ku maran pit wo po men ku si mi ngon, men ku maran pit wo po masang to sun wala Israel tin sipsip ta ngo men.’”
40002007	Kut ma a-Herot kaun wungin li pol ta po tin mhi hi ek men ku me pon ta yang, ma yang kines mi po tunus epo to pi elini aweh ma awheng tin imen si pit pi mlaeng.
40002008	Ma yang tirih po li Betlehem ma yang wo ta po taku, “Wom lu tohuh kuma wom pon ta yang tin hoin imen weh, ma wom lu pon ta yang kut, khama wom wa wungin kyok mu pok ngo, kumali nga ti powut ngo ko suul epo yang maksin kut tumen.”
40002009	Po hul wungin ta yang tin sinkhaung men kut, anima po yok ma po li, ih, awheng tin po ion i hang sinang e me si men men li muk po weh li pol ma li pit siik po eki mang tin yang tin hoin imen nuk min men.
40002010	Ma po ion awheng tin imen, men po mi hi keh keh hambip takut.
40002011	Ma po li sup mi mang kut, men po ion yang tin hoin imen ngong tonin e-Maria, ma po powut hi ko suul ma po mhi hi yuk ko epo yang. Ma po kaklas mi wunwun tin ta hi e nemokong pit e li li min men, anima po ko espo talungin kara si, po talu yang epon: men gol, u sa sut tin ipek tunus men, u sa mur sut kut tumen.
40002012	Li klet ma Got uluu po mi enun yolngin ta epo po ku kyok li hang a-Herot men asin, ma po yok epo po ku li wo mulusngin tin ta hi men, men po ira soput enginin ta li.
40002013	Po yok ma po li kho kut, ih, tihngin ta yang tin Akono men ta me pon ta a-Yosep mi enun yolngin ta, ma yang wo ta sun taku, “E si, ma e wa yang tin hoin imen ngong tonin, ma myuk mhup lu Isip, ma myuk lu kuk pi tin imen li pol minan tin nga wa wungin kyok ti epo ngon men. Epo a-Herot ku langun epo yang tin hoin imen ku sun wini ko hun.”
40002014	Tumen ma a-Yosep phip si, men yang wa sun hoin tin imen ngong tonin to pi luk, ma wuluk yok ma wuluk li Isip.
40002015	Ma yang li in pi tin imen weh li pol minan tin a-Herot hun men, kumali wungin si enun ung hut tin yang tin Akono men pok put mi wo pokngin men ti, “Wiruk in Isip ma nga yuk yang kyok me pol.”
40002016	Li klet ma a-Herot ion i epo po tin mhi hi ek men wa wungin amui nuk mara yang, men yang min kakhat sun takut. Ma yang ko tirih po nolo kara li lek po hoin masang tin ung Betlehem u woringi pi tin ung tikayung sun Betlehem men kut tumen, tin posan ta hi ponwal men u hi tin posan ta hi kho men kut tumen mosop ko huu, men ira elup tin yang ion i mi wo po tin mhi hi ek men.
40002017	Kut ma minan tin imen men wungin si enun ung hut tin pokngin a-Yeremaia pok put men, men ti,
40002018	“Wut po ta si pit Rama men po hul i, men haungin amusukngin u tinisngin u po mi hi urut hi weh epo won maikngin kut tumen, men e-Resel hau epo husanin, ma wut maran luun epo po ku sakal nuk nuk mi wut asin, epo husanin men kis kis kut.”
40002019	Li klet ma a-Herot hun kut, ha, tihngin ta yang tin Akono men si pol ta a-Yosep mi enun yolngin ta ko li Isip,
40002020	ma yang wo ta sun taku, “E si ma e wa yang tin hoin imen ngong tonin, ma myuk kyok lu wo mulusngin Israel. Epo po tin taku wi yang tin hoin imen ko hun men men huu kho kut.”
40002021	Tumen ma a-Yosep si, ma yang wa sun tin hoin imen ngong tonin, ma ngyuk kyok li wo mulusngin Israel.
40002022	Si yang me hul epo Arkelaus si wa pi ta wiraman a-Herot ma yang si sinkhaung epo pi Yudia, men yang lem epo yang tin ku kyok li pi tin imen. Ma Got wo nut a-Yosep mi enun yolngin ta, tumen ma yang nuu mili sup wo mulusngin Galili.
40002023	Ma yang li ung pi ta po sikian Nasaret, epon ku wungin si enun ung hut tin po pokngin pok put epo yang men ku po sik yan e api Nasaret men.
40003001	Mi elup tin imen ma a-Yon tin ning baptais nginangan men me pok put sakalngin pi tin tahunggu e ta pi Yudia men,
40003002	ma yang sakal taku, “Wom men ku phae mi wom, epo enunu tin api wet pi men kho me in tikayung kut khae!”
40003003	Epo yang tin imen wala sakalngin ta pok putngin epon si mi wo pokngin Aisaia men, men sakal taku, “Wut po ta tin wut pit pit pi tin tahunggu men taku, ‘Wom hihi soput ta yang tin Akono men; wom nemeh soput ta yang moyong si sisiik.’”
40003004	Si a-Yon men moolngin ta yang men po nok i epo kamel yut, u mulu tin nuk put yang men men ningngin epo bulmakau elit kut tumen. Ma endara aiingin ta yang men esis to imep sut tin ta pi misuk men misan.
40003005	Minan tin imen ma po tin ung Yerusalem men u po mosop tin ung e li li wo mulusngin Yudia sup e klet men, u po mosop tin ung e li li tikayung eki Yodan men kut tumen, hi mosop kuk e yok li pol ta a-Yon,
40003006	ma po me pok put lasin ta hi, men po wa baptais hang a-Yon mi eki Yodan.
40003007	Si a-Yon ion po Parisi to sun Sadyusi munuman ku me epo baptais tin ta yang men, men yang ko wo ta po taku, “Wom tin isaling ekle e khuuk wom men, ara weh uluu mi wom epo wom ku whal silang min kakhat sun tin ku iso me men?
40003008	Tumen ma wom men ku ning i ma sa ta wom enun kai wungin tin tunus epo po tin phae mi hi kho men ku ning i men weh,
40003009	si wom men ku kuk aku mi wom phaeng wo engin ma wom sakal ta mi wom taku, ‘Yau a it sin men Abraham ako,’ timen asin. Epo nga pok wom siik epo Got men kakha epon ku ning i ma enah tin imen men ku khekngin si kai khuuknginin tin ta Abraham men maksin kut ako.
40003010	Ma homani kut men eyak ko klet nuk e li li sii sa kho kut. Tumen ma sa mosop tin ku enun tunus som men, men ku hohongin ma whisngin li put ngi yau.
40003011	Irawin, epo ngo men ning baptais ko mi eki epo wom tin phae mi wom men, si yang tin ku iso me ira ngo men, men apalukngin epo ngo, ma ngo men ku tunus kuma nga ko lat sandel tin ung hut khi yang men akomen. Yang tin imen kuli ning baptais epo wom ko mi Emiun Auluungin u yau kut tumen.
40003012	Kaulngin tin ku yang whem mi wit epon men men pit yanga wili yang kho kut, ma yang ku whek nowhang tin yang tut wit yangan men ko yangan tunus weh, ma yang palu wit tin tan men li pit mi mang tin yang halung wit enun li pit min ewin men, si wit elit men ku yang sut sut i epo yau tin ku whus ewin som men.”
40003013	Minan tin imen a-Yesus yok wo mulusngin Galili ma yang ku li hang a-Yon suu eki Yodan kuma yang wa baptais yanga wili sun.
40003014	Takuma a-Yon taku ten ten epo sun, ma yang wo taku, “Auweh, ngo kha ku wa baptais hang ngon men weh ako, si ngon ku mu epo ngo, ah?”
40003015	Takuma a-Yesus sakal wet sun taku, “Homani men ku e mang, si nga wa baptais hang ngon, epo tunus epo tong men ku kai wungin mosop tin sisiik men epo wungin tin tumen engun.” Kut ma a-Yon mang, si a-Yesus wa baptais.
40003016	Ma a-Yesus wa baptais kho kut, men kerek engun ma yang me si mi eki, ha, wet pi min pok pit to mara yang, ma yang ion Got Emiun men ung e me ko ken eking wulus ta men, men me ko ung po yang.
40003017	Ma kerek engun ma wut po ta yuk ili wet pi me ko taku, “Yang tin imen men Wiruk tin mi ngo epon weh men kha imen. Mi ngo tunusngin pit po yang weh.”
40004001	Li klet ma Got Emiun tet a-Yesus li in pi tin tahunggu men kuma emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men ku me karong yang.
40004002	Ma yang suuh min to pi mhangin khum mnal (40) u pi luk khum mnal (40) tumen kho li, anima yang hun elip.
40004003	Li klet ma yang tin karong po nginangan men me pon ta sun ma yang wo ta sun taku, “Taku ngon e Wiru Got weh, khama e wo ta enah tin nuk iyi men ku paphae si beretan.”
40004004	Ti ma yang ko sakal taku, “Sakalngin ta men panngin nuk ti, ‘Beret misan ani ku po tunus wa tunusngin epon men som. Awu. Sakalngin put then then mosop tin me pol mi wo Got men kha ku po wa tunusngin epon weh men.’”
40004005	Li klet ma yang tin hik put wungin nginangan men wa sun li si pi tin nhum e auluungin men, ma yang wa sun li si pit mang auluungin hut tin ung ili awon weh men,
40004006	ma yang wo ta sun taku, “Taku ngon e Wiru Got weh, men ku elup ko. Epo sakalngin ta men panngin nuk ti, ‘Yang ku wo nut tihngin tin tan men kara epo ngon,’ ma ‘tihngin ku pa pa ngon yanga wili hi, epon akuli e ko enah ta wes kip.’”
40004007	A-Yesus ko sakal ta sun taku, “Sakalngin ta kyok men panngin nuk ti, ‘Ngon men ku karong yang tin Akono e Got tap men asin.’”
40004008	Angan ta kyok men yang tin hik put wungin nginangan men wa sun li si po pi emian nomalak ta, ma yang suk mara sun epo enunu tin ung e li li yanga mulusngin men to moolngin tan mosop,
40004009	ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, “Endara tin mosop imen ku nga wai si tap, men taku powut ngon ko suul ma mhip yuk ko epo ngo khama nga wai si tap.”
40004010	Kut ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta sun taku, “Nolongin, e yang! Epo sakalngin ta men panngin nuk ti, ‘Yang tin Akono e Got tap men weh kha ku e uluu i men, ma yang misan kha ku e kum auluungin tan men.’”
40004011	Kut ma yang tin hik put wungin nginangan men mang ta sun si yang li, ha, tihngin kara me kho wo a-Yesus.
40004012	Li klet ma a-Yesus hul epo po kan kan a-Yon li pit mi mang tin po kan kan sun li pit min ewin men kho kut, men yang nuu li Galili.
40004013	Ma yang mang ta pi Nasaret ung, si yang li ung Kaperneam, tin ung suu ehung Galili men, tin ung wo mulusngin Sebulon to sun Naptali men,
40004014	kumali wungin si enun ung hut tin pok putngin in mi wo pokngin Aisaia men men ti,
40004015	“Mulusngin Sebulon u mulusngin Naptali kut tumen, tin ung put soput tin li suu ehung men, tin ung eki Yodan pilin ekora wo mulusngin Galili tin po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ung epon men--
40004016	po masang to sun wala tin ung mi pi tin mi ku men men hi ion esul nhum ta, u po tin ung wo mulusngin tin hunngin enun los po hi men esul ta si ma pal nuk po po kut tumen.”
40004017	Minan tin imen ma li men a-Yesus hosi sakalngin pok put nginan, men yang sakal ti, “Wom men ku phae mi wom weh, epo enunu tin api wet pi men kho me in tikayung kut khae.”
40004018	Ma a-Yesus in e muk muk suu ehung Galili li, men yang maran li kon wulong ngong wiron ponwal nuk, men a-Saimon tin po sikian ta maksin a-Pita men u wiron Andru kut tumen, men ngong nuk e psik nomkal ta li ko mi ehung. Epo wulong men ut nomkal eya ili nginangan.
40004019	Kut ma yang ko wo ta wulong taku, “Mom mu ira ngo, men kuli nga ning i ma mom si ken po tin ut nomkal eya po tunus nginangan men.”
40004020	Ti ma kerek engun ma wulong mang ta nomkal ta ngong ko ung e li li, si wulong li pet kira yang li.
40004021	Ma yang yok pi tin imen ma yang suk po khin tak li pol, men yang maran kyok li kon wulong irit won ponwal maksin, men a-Yemis tin a-Sebedi wirun men ngong wiron a-Yon, men ngong nuk to wirama hi wo naak, ma wuluk nuk e simsimbut nomkal ta ngyuk. Ma yang yuk wulong,
40004022	ma kerek engun ma wulong mang ta naak to wirama hi ung, si wulong li pet kira yang li.
40004023	Ma a-Yesus in e muk muk mili mili yanga pi Galili sup e klet, ma yang kot po mi mang akotngin tin ta hi e ung e li li men, u yang pok put pok putngin tin tunus e epo enunu men, u yang mimlis saihngin maran kiring kiring u won maikngin maran kiring kiring tin lek po men kut tumen.
40004024	Ma wungin tin yang ning i ma yang yan ton men men po hul epon li yanga pi Siria sup e klet. Ma po espo sun mosop tin kuk lengwal to saihngin u won maanngin tumen maran kiring kiring tin lek hi men me epo yang, u po tin emiun lengwal kasum po men, u po tin saihngin lengwal si ta hi ma li tok hi men, u po tin pokoi hi hu hu men kut tumen, ma yang mimlis saihngin ta po.
40004025	Ma po wa ilio angan hambip kara kut me ira yang, men me epo pi Galili, u Dikapolis, u Yerusalem, u Yudia, u eki Yodan pilin ekora kut tumen.
40005001	Ma yang ion po tin wa ilio angan men, men yang li si po pi emian ta, ma yang kho ko ung kut, anima po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men me pol ta yang.
40005002	Ti ma yang won ngam ma yang kot po taku,
40005003	“Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin ion hi tin kalwok pit po emiu hi men, epo enunu tin api wet pi men men ta po.
40005004	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin kuk e mi hi urut hi men, epo Got kuli iso pa nhing mi po.
40005005	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin wungin ta hi amunu men, epo Got kuli iso pakuh po po epo mulusngin mosop.
40005006	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin huu elip u huu eki epo wungin tin siik men tumen, epo po men kuli iso muut muut.
40005007	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin mi hi suk sun nginangan men, epo po men kuli iso wa min sukngin maksin.
40005008	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin mi hi yil men, epo po men kuli iso ion Got.
40005009	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin ning i ma sun ko ung aminis men, epo po men kuli sun sikia hi tin husani Got men.
40005010	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin wa mumhek mingin pit mi wungin tin siik men, epo enunu tin api wet pi men men ta po.
40005011	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po wom minan tin po mimi wom u po mumhek mi wom, u po torok ma po sakal maran kiring kiring lengwal epo wom kut tumen, men sinsin in epo ngo.
40005012	Wom men ku mi wom keh keh ma mi wom tunusngin weh, epo talungin tin kuli emhut wungin ta wom men men nhum nuk ili wet pi, epo wungin tin tumen kha po mumhek mi po pokngin tin kuk kho epo wom men.
40005013	Wom men sauli tin ta pi mulus men, si taku sauli ko manom, men kuli si phiit kyok tua? Awu. Men homani ma ku ning kumang tunus ta kyok akomen, men ku whisngin tek li pol, ma po tunus khi hi sak suu min engun.
40005014	Wom men esul tin ta pi mulus men. Pi nhum ta tin ningngin ung mhi pi ta men men ku ung kaunngin akomen.
40005015	Wa po ku tun esul ta, men ku po wai sup li ung wet endara tin min engun men ta ewin akomen. Awu. Po wai si ung hut khin tin tan men, ma men pal klet po po mosop tin kuk mi mang men.
40005016	Wom men ku mang ta esul tin ta wom men si ngin ngin pit mara po tunus engun ti, kumali po ion wungin tunus tin ta wom men ma po wa Wirama wom tin in ili wet pi men yan si.
40005017	Wom kuk aku wom phaeng taku ngo ku me epo ngo ku mhuk wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men u sakalngin tin ta po pokngin men kut tumen akomen. Epo ngo ku me epo ngo ku mhuk sakalngin tin imen akomen, si nga me epo ngo ku kaini weh.
40005018	Epo nga sakal anuh ta wom ti, epo weh li pol minan tin kuli wet pi u mulus tumen om men, men ku panngin tun ta weh wa panngin tingit tun ta tumen ku kis mi wungin sinsin tin imen akomen, li pol minan tin kuli wungin tin mosop imen ku kho si men.
40005019	Tumen ma ara weh tin ku in akani ma ku me hik put wungin sinsin tin imen tun ta tin in mi sun men u kot po masang to sun wala epo po ku ning i tumen kut tumen, men ku po sikian tun engun epo sun mosop mi enunu tin api wet pi men. Si ara ku in akani ma ning i u kot po epo po ku ning i tumen kut tumen, po tin imen men ku po sikian e nhum mi enunu tin api wet pi men.
40005020	Epo nga wo ta wom ti, epo wungin tin siik e ta wom men men ku si nhum epo sun tin ta po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u tin ta po Parisi men kut tumen ako, wa taku pi engun, men kuli wom lu sup mi enunu tin api wet pi men angan akomen.
40005021	Wom hul kho kut epo sakalngin men ko ta po tin kuk kho men taku, ‘Ngon men ku wi po ta ko hun asin, si taku po ta wi sun ta ko hun, men wungin pit epon ku li sup mi ples walngin tin nhum e kuli iso si men ako.’
40005022	Si nga wo ta wom ti, ara weh min kakhat sun pit wo wiron si wungin sinsin om, men wungin in epon ku li sup mi ples walngin tin nhum e kuli iso si men. Si ara weh ku wo ta wiron taku, ‘Ngon tin mhin ekngin om mhi ngon men,’ men wungin in epon ku li pit to mara kaunsil tin nhum men wet. Si ara weh ku wo taku, ‘Ngon tin leleke men,’ men wungin in epon ku li in put ngi yau tin sindak e ku whus ewin som men kha men.
40005023	Tumen ma taku e wa talungin tap ku me si wo suyung ma ko pit imen tulup hu wungin ta tin wirom ku wai pit po ngon men,
40005024	men ku e mang ta talungin tap ko ung sii suyung, si e lu ning i kuma mom wirom mi mom then to al wet, anima e kyok mu wa talungin tap si ta Got.
40005025	Mip si then to po ta tin wa wungin pit po ngon men kerek engun minan tin mom nes ira so men, epon akuli yang tin nolo ngon men wa ngon sup yanga wili phua tin ples wungin nginangan men, ma phua tin ples wungin nginangan men wa ngon li sup yanga wili sun tin kum wet wili phua men, ma yang tin kum wet wili phua men psik ngon li in mi mang tin po kan kan sun li pit min ewin men.
40005026	Nga sakal anuh tap, epo ngon men ku mu pol mi mang tin imen angan ta som. Awu. Ngon men ku in min weh li pol minan tin kuli e kul naumngin tin pit po ngon men weh li ulu tin tun weh e me sulung weh men men e kul i lu.
40005027	Wom hul kho kut epo sakalngin ko ta po tin kuk kho men taku, ‘Ngon men ku sup si khi po ta asin.’
40005028	Si nga wo ta wom epon taku po ta supa wut wala ta ma maran nes i, men sup si khi wut ta min kho kut ako.
40005029	Ma taku marap tin in ewo wilip tin ato sa men pit pit hut ngon lu ning lasin, men ku e slok i, si e psik i lu. Epon men tunus epo ngon emkusin tingit then ta men ku kis, epon akuli ngon emkusin palamusung kuli psikngin ko in pi tin yau sindak pit epon men.
40005030	U taku wilip tin ato sa men pit pit hut ngon lu ning lasin, men ku e klat put, si e psik i lu. Epon men tunus epo ngon emkusin tingit then ta men ku kis, epon akuli ngon emkusin palamusung kuli psikngin ko in pi tin yau sindak pit epon men.
40005031	Kuru sakalngin men kho ko in ti, ‘Taku po ta ku tere titien li, men ku wa kisang tin epo enanginngin hik put nginan men ta si ta wut.’
40005032	Si ngo men wo ta wom epon taku po masang ta hik put enanginngin ta ngong titien, si sinsin ku epo elwanngin ta som, men ning i ma titien si ken po tin sup si khi sun men ta kha men. Kuru taku po masang ta enangin wut wala tin imen, tin titien hik put enanginngin ta ngong kho men, men ning wungin tin po sup si khi sun men kut tumen ako.
40005033	Si wungin ta maksin men wom hul i kho kut tin ko ta po tin kuk kho men taku, ‘Ngon men ku hik put tung tungngin tin tap men asin, si ngon men ku ira tung tungngin tin tap men weh li epo yang tin Akono men.’
40005034	Si nga wo ta wom epo wom men ku tung tung ta asin; ngon men ku tung tung epo pi wet pi asin, epon men ehus tin Got tin sinkhaung men ung won men;
40005035	wa ngon men ku tung tung epo pi mulus asin, epon men ehus tin yang khin ko pit nhing won men; wa ngon men ku tung tung pi Yerusalem asin, epon men pi tin nhum e ta yang tin Sinkhaung e yan pos weh men kha men;
40005036	wa ngon men ku tung tung mhip asin, epo ngon men ku kakha kuma e ning yut ngon ta si po kal wa po ku tumen akomen.
40005037	Si sakalngin tin wom wo ‘Wai’ men, men wom wo ‘Wai’ kut, u sakalngin tin wom wo ‘Awu’ men, men wom wo ‘Awu’ kut tumen. Si sakalngin tin tun tira e ku me si po sun tin imen men me epo yang tin wungin tan lengwal men kha men.
40005038	Wom hul kho kut epo sakalngin ko in ti, ‘Maran ta men ku emhut maran ta, u ngin ta men ku emhut ngin ta tumen.’
40005039	Si nga wo ta wom ti, taku po ta taku ning i lengwal epo ngon, men ku e mang ma ning i epo ngon engun. Taku po ta wilin hik suu ngon tin ewo wilip ato sa men, men ku e phae suu ngon ta kyok lu tan kut tumen.
40005040	U taku po ta min epon ku ples wungin tap kuma wa moolngin tin e phini nuk wet sun men, men ku e mang si po wa moolngin tin e phini nuk po sun men engun kut tumen.
40005041	U taku po ta tus ngon epo ngon ku lat enda tan li kilomita then ta, men ku e lat i to yang kyok lu kilomita ponwal maksin kyok kut tumen.
40005042	Taku po ta me kines ngon epo endara kara, men ku e wai si tan engun, u taku po ta min epon ku wa naumngin epo ngon, men ku wetpop wai timen asin kut tumen.
40005043	Wom hul kho kut epo sakalngin men ko ta po kho taku, ‘Ngon men ku mip pit wo po tin mom ung then men, si ngon men ku mip lel po tin mom nolo wal men.’
40005044	Si nga sakal ta wom taku, wom men ku mi wom pit wo po tin nolo wom men weh, u wom men ku kines Got epo yang ku wa emhong ko po po tin taku wa ngil ngilngin ko epo wom men, u wom men ku ning i tunus epo po tin mi hi lel wom men, u wom men ku kines Got epo yang ku nhio wo po tin mimi wom ma taku ning i lengwal epo wom men maksin kut tumen,
40005045	kumali wom kuk ken po tin husani Wirama wom tin ung ili wet pi men. Epo yang ning i ma sinang tin tan men me si ma pal po po tin wungin ta hi lengwal men u pal po po tin wungin ta hi tunus men kut tumen to al, u yang tih pi yung me ko epo po tin wungin ta hi siik men u me ko epo po tin wungin ta hi ku siik som men maksin kut tumen to al.
40005046	Epon taku mi wom epo po tin mi hi epo wom men, ela ku wom wai emhut wungin tin imen? Iyi, po tin palu takis ta sun phuan nginangan men men ning i tumen kut ako, wah?
40005047	U taku wom paret yukngin si ta po tin ehuro wom men, men ku wom ning ela e ku tunus epo sun tin po kara maksin ku ning i epo sun men? Iyi, po tin palu takis ta sun phuan nginangan men men ning i tumen kut ako, wah?
40005048	Tumen ma wungin ta wom men ku siik weh, ken Wirama wom tin ung ili wet pi men e wungin tan siik weh men.
40006001	Wom haum tunus, epon akuli wom tet talungin ta wom ko ta po tin kalwok men men ku sinsin si in kuma po kara ion i. Epon taku wom ning i tumen, men ku talungin tin ku wom wai emhut wungin ta wom hang Wiwoli wom tin ung ili wet pi men men ku pi om.
40006002	Tumen ma minan tin akani e ku e tet talungin tap ko ta po tin kalwok men, men ku e so kiyak kho li muk ngon asin, ken po tin wungin ta hi nuk wo eha men ning i mi mang akotngin tin ung e li li mili men u ko pit ko pit ira soput men kut tumen, men sinsin epon ku po tunus wa ya hi si engun. Nga wo anuh ta wom, epo po men wai tin ku emhut wungin ta hi men mosop kho kut.
40006003	Si minan tin akani e ku e tet talungin tap ko ta po tin kalwok men, men ku e pok put wilip tin ato ilio men epo wungin tin wilip tin ato sa men ning i men asin,
40006004	kumali talungin tap tin e tet i ko ta po tin kalwok men men ku in kaunngin. Ma Wiramap tin ion wungin tin in kaunngin men ku ning i emhut sun tin tap men si in pi mlaeng.
40006005	Ma minan tin akani e ku e ning kinesngin men, men ku e ning i ken po tin wungin ta hi nuk wo eha men ning i men asin, epo po men mi hi pit po wungin tin ku po nuk mi mang akotngin tin ung e li li men u soput tin min wal e ung e li li men kut tumen ma po kines, men sinsin in epon ku po tunus ion sun. Nga wo anuh ta wom, epo po men wai tin ku emhut wungin ta hi men mosop kho kut ako.
40006006	Si ngon men minan tin akani e ku e kines men, men ku e lu sup mi lahembengin tin tap men, ma e sambal si, anima e kines lu epo Wiramap tin in pi kaunngin men. Ma Wiramap tin ion wungin tin in pi tin kaunngin men ku ning wungin emhut sun tin tap men si in pi mlaeng.
40006007	Ma minan tin wom kines men, men ku wom iran ma iran engun ken po tin pong epo Got tin irawin men ning i ewin men asin. Epo po phaeng taku wungin tin po sakal i munuman men kha ku got ta hi hul wet po epon men.
40006008	Tumen ma wom men ku ning i ken sun tin po ning i men asin. Epo Wirama wom men ion endara tin wom kalwok epon men kho, men kuli wom iso kines yang.
40006009	Tumen ma wom men ku kines ira wungin tin ti: ‘ngon tin Wirama pim e e in ili wet pi men, yap men ku auluungin weh.
40006010	Enunu tin tap men men ku me. Wungin tin nuk ta mip men men ku ningngin wo mulus ken sun tin ningngin ili wet pi men.
40006011	E wa endara aiingin tin ku kai mi pim to ungunan then then men si ta pim to ungunan tin iyi weh.
40006012	Ma e mang ta naumngin ta pim tin pit po ngon men, ken sun tin pim a mang ta naumngin ta po tin naumngin ta hi pit po pim men.
40006013	Ma e wa pim li sup mi karongngin asin, si e palolo pim wet wili yang tin wungin tan lengwal men. Epo enunu u kakhangin u moolngin kut tumen men tap in kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin.’
40006014	Epon taku wom mang ta wungin tin po kara ning i epo wom e yek ta sun tin siik men li, men ku Wirama wom tin in ili wet pi men mang ta wungin tin wom ning i epo yang e yek ta sun tin siik men li maksin kut tumen.
40006015	Si taku wom ku mang ta wungin tin po kara ning i epo wom e yek ta sun tin siik men li som, men ku Wirama wom mang ta wungin tin wom ning i epo yang e yek ta sun tin siik men li som kut tumen.
40006016	Si minan tin akani e ku wom suuh mi wom men, men ku wom si ken po tin kuk to wungin ta hi nuk wo eha men tin kuk to mara hi tin amusukngin men asin. Epo po men sawak mara hi kuma po kuk to mara po tunus ken po e suuh mi hi men. Nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo po men wai tin ku emhut sun tin po ning i men mosop kho kut ako.
40006017	Si ngon men minan tin e suuh mi ngon men, men ku e yuk nowhong sut ko mhip misan, u e khis marap kut tumen,
40006018	tumen kumali ngon ku in to mara po tunus ken ngon e suuh mi ngon men akomen, si e in to mara Wiramap tin in pi tin kaunngin men. Ma Wiramap tin ion wungin tin in pi kaunngin men men ku ning i emhut sun tin tap men si in pi mlaeng.
40006019	Wom men ku halung po miranngin ta wom wo mulus asin, men pi tin ewup tin tururun men u po koklok si po sun kut tumen ko ma mhuk endara men, u po tin tip tip nginangan men pal mang ma me sup ma tip enda maksin kut tumen.
40006020	Si wom men ku halung po miranngin ta wom ili wet pi weh, men pi tin ewup u po koklok tumen ku kuk epon ma ku mhuk endara som, u po tipngin ku pal mang ma me sup ma tip enda tumen ewin kyok akomen.
40006021	Epo pi tin wom halung po miranngin ta wom li pit epon men, men pi tin imen kha kuli mi wom pit pon men maksin kut tumen ako.
40006022	Esul tin ta po tunus emkus a hi men men mara hi. Tumen ma taku marap tunus, men ku emkus a ngon mosop pi mi mlaeng klet min.
40006023	Si taku marap lengwal, men ku emkus a ngon mosop pi mi ku klet min. Tumen ma taku esul tin in mi ngon men mi ku, men pi mi ku tin imen men nhum weh!
40006024	Po ta men ku kum ta phua ponwal akomen. Epon men kuli min lel phua ta, si min pit wo phua ta, wa ku klap sun ta, si ion sun ta ken i e lengwal engun men. Wom men ku kum ta Got u miranngin tumen to al akomen.
40006025	Tumen ma nga wo ta wom ti, epo wom men ku sila wom khing pit po tunusngin tin ta wom men asin, epon kuli wom ku ii ele wa um ele. Kuru wom men ku sila wom khing pit po emkus a wom asin, epon kuli wom ku phi ele. Iyi, tunusngin men nhum epo endara aiingin u emkus a wom men nhum epo moolngin ako, wah?
40006026	Mara wom si kon emon tin yap yap mili wet pi men, epo emon men ku wha endara wa lok lok endara ma halung pon li pit mi mang ewin som, takuma Wirama wom tin in ili wet pi men men kha in e pa ken li engun men. Iyi, wom men tunus weh epo emon ako, wah?
40006027	Ara weh tin in lunga wom men taku silan khing, men ku wa kaingin then ta ko pit po mhin li si?
40006028	Ma tuni ma sila wom khing pit po moolngin? Wom men ku urut wungin tunus epo mongin tin nuk yanga pi tin yangae men, tin plok si tua men. Mongin tin imen men ku wuh kumang wa ku som e sapupiek kawu ewin akomen,
40006029	takuma nga pok wom siik epo a-Solomon kut tin phi moolngin tan tin pon maran kiring kiring men, men ku mool ken sun tin imen ta akomen kut tumen.
40006030	Wom tin wo phepngin ta wom kiak men, taku Got phi epilil tin nuk yanga pi tin yangae men epo moolngin tin tumen, tin homani ma nuk tunus si to pi kingkauk men whisngin ko mi wunwun tin po sut endara min men, iyi, men kuli yang iso phi wom iso si ko po sun kara kyok ako, wah?
40006031	Tumen ma wom men ku sila wom khing ma wom sakal ti, ‘It ku ii ele?’ wa ‘It ku um ele?’ wa ‘It ku phi ele?’ tumen asin.
40006032	Epo endara tin mosop imen kha po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men tohuh epo po ku pon tan men. Epo Wirama wom tin in ili wet pi men ion wom tin kalwok epo endara tin mosop imen kho ako.
40006033	Si wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku pon ta enunu tin ta Got men u wungin tin siik e ta yang men kut tumen muk wet, men kuli endara tin mosop imen sum sumngin ko po sun ta wom maksin kut tumen ako.
40006034	Tumen ma wom men ku sila wom khing pit po wungin tin ku si to pi kingkauk men asin, epo pi tin kingkauk men men ku tuon silan khing pit pon tin tan weh men. Won maikngin tin ku si mi ungunan then then men men ku kai ungunan tin imen weh ako.
40007001	Wom men ku ples wungin ta po kara asin, epon akuli Got ples wungin ta wom.
40007002	Epo wungin tin wom ples wungin ta po kara epon men, kha kuli Got ples wungin ta wom epon men; u kaingin tin wom kai endara epon men kha kuli endara kaingin kyok me epo wom men maksin kut tumen ako.
40007003	Si tua ma marap nut yomngin tin tun e nuk mara wisum men, si ngon ku marap iis sa tin nhum e nuk marap tuon men som?
40007004	Ma si tua ma ngon ku wo ta wisum ti, ‘E mang si nga klok yomngin tin nuk marap men lu wet,’ tuon, si sa nhum ta nuk marap men?
40007005	Ngon tin wungin tap nuk wo eha men, muk men ku e klok sa tin nhum e nuk marap tuon men kho li wet, ma minan tin imen men ku marap kleng kuma e klok yomngin mara wisum lu kut tumen.
40007006	Wom men ku wa endara tin auluungin men ko ta elwa asin; u wom men ku whis endara tin wom ngel epon nginangan men ko ta kanem asin kut tumen, epon akuli kanem khin sak suu pon, u elwa phae maran ma li sek sek wom kut tumen.
40007007	Wom men ku kines kokyok kokyok, men ku wangin si ta wom; wom men ku langun kokyok kokyok, men ku wom suon; u wom men ku nhong nhong kokyok kokyok, men ku sowon won pit epo wom kut tumen ako.
40007008	Epo po mosop tin kines kokyok kokyok men, men wai ako, u taku po ta langun kokyok kokyok, men ku suon ako, u taku po ta nhong nhong kokyok kokyok, men ku sowon pit epon kut tumen ako.
40007009	Wa ara in lunga wom, men taku wirun kines i epo beret kara, men ku yang ku wa enah si ta sun, wah?
40007010	Wa taku wirun kines i epo ili, men ku yang ku wa tamha si ta sun kut ti, wah?
40007011	Wom tin wungin ta wom lengwal men pon ta wungin tin ku wom wa talungin tin turunus men si ta po tin husani wom men, tumen ma wom men ku ion i epo Wirama wom tin ung ili wet pi men ku iso wa endara tin turunus men si ta po tin kines yang epon men weh ako!
40007012	Tumen ma wungin mosop tin mi wom epo po masang to sun wala ku ning i epo wom men, wungin tin imen kha ku wom ning i epo po maksin kut tumen, epo wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men u sakalngin tin ta po pokngin men kut tumen sinsin kha imen.
40007013	Wom men ku lu sup mi sowon tin won tun men. Epo sowon men won nhum u soput men min nhum tin li epo mumhek mingin men, ma po tin li sup epon men men munuman ako.
40007014	Epo sowon men won tun u soput men khung nginan kut tumen tin li epo tunusngin men, ma po tin pon tan men men kiak kara engun!
40007015	Wom haum tunus epo po pokngin tin torokngin men, tin hi me epo wom ma hi phi moolngin elit tin ta sipsip men, takuma mi po men ken elwa enih tin lases kuk tan men ako.
40007016	Wom men ku hop po to sa ta po tin enun tua men. Iyi, po masang to sun wala ku li phem phem sa wain enun mi ehiak tin ngin si si put sun men, wa po li wa sa pik enun mi wolopon tin min ha men ewin kut tumen, wah? Awu!
40007017	Timen kut kha sa mosop tin tunus men kha enun tunus tin aiingin men, si sa tin lengwal men kha enun lengwal men.
40007018	Sa tunus ta men ku enun lengwal ewin akomen, u sa lengwal ta men ku enun tunus ewin akomen kut tumen.
40007019	Sa mosop tin ku enun tunus som men, men ku hohongin ma whisngin li put ngi yau.
40007020	Tumen ma wom ku hop po to sa ta po tin enunun tua men.
40007021	Po tin sakal ta ngo taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, ngon tin Akono men’ ti, hi mosop ani ku li sup mi enunu tin api wet pi men akomen. Awu. Po ta tin ira sakalngin tin nuk ta mi Yok tin in ili wet pi men misan kha kuli li sup men.
40007022	Po munuman kuli sakal ta ngo mi elup tin imen taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, ngon tin Akono men, pim a pok put sakalngin ken po pokngin men epo yap, u pim a luul to emiun lengwal epo yap, u pim a ning kumang tin apalukngin men munuman epo yap kut tumen ako, wah?’
40007023	Ma minan tin imen men kuli nga pok put sakalngin si in pi mlaeng to mara po siik taku, ‘Ngo ku pon ta wom minan ta kho som! Wom yang epo ngo, wom tin hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men.’
40007024	Tumen ma taku po ta hul sakalngin ta ngo ma iran weh, men ku nga kaini to po ta tin mhin ek men tin ning mang tan si ung po umat men.
40007025	Ma pi yung me ko u eki sut me u pi pus si kut tumen ma sut amhees me karong mang, takuma mang ku long som, epon men sinsin si ung bing po umat.
40007026	Si taku po ta hul sakalngin ta ngo ma ku iran som, men ku in kai po ta tin wungin tan ulil ma ning mang tan si ung po namak men.
40007027	Ma pi yung me ko u eki sut me u pi pus si kut tumen ma sut amhees me karong mang, ma mang long ko, men long ko ninhien hambip weh.”
40007028	A-Yesus suuk sii sakalngin tin mosop imen ma wungin si in ti, men po tin wa ilio angan men teret wo kotngin tin ta yang men,
40007029	epo yang kot po, men yang kot po ken yang e po tin kuk to emhong men ta, si men ku ken po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men hi kot po ewin men akomen.
40008001	Kut ma a-Yesus mang ta pi po emian pit si yang kho me ko, men po tin wa ilio angan men hambip kara pet kira yang.
40008002	Ha, yang ta tin kukhu iini men men me powut ko suul sii khi sun, ma yang sakal taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, taku mip nawaehngin, ngon men kakha epo ngon ku ning i ma po ngo yil ako.”
40008003	Ti ma a-Yesus wilin li kah po sun, ma yang sakal taku, “Mi ngo nawaehngin ako, ngon men ku pop yil.” Ti ma kerek engun ma kukhu om po yang si yang si pon yil.
40008004	Ma a-Yesus wo ta sun taku, “Marap pit tunus epo ngon tuop, epon akuli e lu pok po ta epon, si e siik lu suk mara po tin kum auluungin men ta epo po ngon, ma e talu Got epo endara tin a-Moses wo maran ko klat epon men, kuma wungin tin imen kha ku e pok put wungin si ta po epon men.”
40008005	Kut ma a-Yesus li sup Kaperneam, men yang nolo ta tin maran pit wo po nolo wa ilio khum khum ta (100) men me pol ta sun, ma yang hau nuk sii khi sun
40008006	taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, yang tin kum ta ngo men nuk mang men pokoin hun, ma yang won maan maan takut.”
40008007	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta sun taku, “Ngo ku ti mlis saihngin ta yang.”
40008008	Ti ma yang tin maran pit wo po nolo wa ilio khum khum ta (100) men ko wo taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ngo men ku tunus kuma e mu sup wet mang tin ta ngo men akomen. Si e sakal ta misan, men ku yang tin kum ta ngo men saihngin tan mlis engun.
40008009	Epo ngo maksin kut men in wet wili po phuan tin hi kuk to emhong men, u po nolo men kara maksin kuk wet wili ngo kut tumen. Ma nga sakal ta po ta, ‘E lu,’ men ku po li; u nga sakal ta po enginin ta, ‘E mu,’ men ku po me; u nga sakal ta yang tin kum wo ngo men, ‘E ning i ti,’ men ku yang ning i kut tumen.”
40008010	A-Yesus hul wungin tin imen, men yang teret wo sun, ma yang sakal ta po tin ira yang men taku, “Nga wo anuh ta wom ti, epo ngo ku pon ta wo phepngin tin nhum tumen ta kho in ti som. Awu. U men ku nga pon tan ta mi po Israel som kut tumen!
40008011	Ma nga sakal ta wom ti, epo po munuman kuli me epo pi mara naeng u pi solong sin kut tumen, ma hi ko nuk ewo tili hi baul suyung tin ta kakaomngin men to Abraham, u Aisak, u a-Yakop kut tumen mi enunu tin api wet pi men.
40008012	Si po tin husani enunu men men ku whisngin li pol mi pi mi ku tin kuk woringi pi weh men. Pi tin imen men ku po kuk e hau hambip u po kuk e ii ngi hi kakyat kakyat po al epon kut tumen.”
40008013	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal ta yang tin maran pit wo po nolo wa ilio khum khum ta (100) men taku, “E lu ira soput tin tap men, ma wungin tin wop phep pit won men, tumen kha kuli wungin si tap epon men.”
40008014	Li klet ma a-Yesus kho li sup mang tin ta a-Pita men, men yang ion a-Pita erion men nuk e won maik i to pon tin ngeng ngeng men.
40008015	Ma yang wilin li kah wut wilin, khama wut tin pon ngeng ngeng men mlis wo wut, ma wut si hihi endara aiingin ta po.
40008016	Li klet ma pi ii angan si, men po espo sun munuman tin emiun lengwal kasum hi men me epo yang. Ma yang luul to emiun tin imen mi po li pol pol epo sakalngin ta engun, u po mosop tin kuk lengwal to saihngin ta hi men men yang mlis saihngin ta po li kut tumen,
40008017	kumali sakalngin men ku si enun ung hut tin pokngin Aisaia pok put kho taku, “Yang tuon wa won maikngin maran kiring kiring tin wo it wiak wiak ton men si pon tuon, u saihngin mosop tin lek it men men yang espon si pon ma yang lat i li kut tumen.”
40008018	Kut ma a-Yesus ion po wa ilio angan tin me nuk baul yang men, men yang ko wo ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men epo hi ku yok li sup eki pilin ekora.
40008019	Ma po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men ta me wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin kot pim men, ngo men ku pet kira ngon li pi tin akani e ku e lu epon men.”
40008020	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Elwa enih tin tururun men, men nahu tan pit e li li mi mulus, u emon tin yap yap wet pi men, men mlut tan ung e li li kut tumen, si Wiru Po Tunus men pi tin ku yang mhin ko nuk epon men, men pi om.”
40008021	Si yang enginin ta tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men me sakal ta sun taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, som mang ta ngo, si nga li kil yok wet.”
40008022	Takuma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “E mu ira ngo engun, si e mang ta po tin hu hu men ku tuo hi ku kil hunngin ta hi.”
40008023	Kut ma a-Yesus lup li si wo naak ta, men po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ira yang li.
40008024	Ih, pi pus nhum ta tin tok tok naak men si yanga ehung, tumen ma esap hik hik me hawus naak. Si yang men ko nuk e nhaung.
40008025	Ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men me pon ta yang ma po kon kon yang ma po sakal taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, e palolo pim. Epo it ku huuspit angan!”
40008026	Ti ma yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Wom tin wo phepngin ta wom sakun men, mi wom kauan tumen epo ele?” Kut ma yang si ngeng heek eip to ehung, ma ehung ko ling nuk engun, si ku milip kara kyok akomen.
40008027	Tumen ma po teret wo al ma po sakal taku, “Yang tin ikop men tunia weh ii, ma eip u esap kut tumen hul wet yang?”
40008028	Ma yang kho li pol pilin ekora li sup wo mulusngin tin ta po Gerasa men, men wulong ponwal tin emiun lengwal munuman kasum ngong men, men yok mi uwin tin tanuan e ung e li li pi tin imen me tut yang, men wungin ta ngong amhees weh, tumen ma po ta ku ira soput tin li wo mulusngin tin imen ma li men akomen.
40008029	Ma wulong kerek e ko yuk taku, “Yesus, ngon tin Wiru Got men, ngon taku ning ele epo pim? Iyi, e mu iyi kuma e wa won maanngin si ta pim, si elup tin epo won maanngin men kuli iso si, wah?”
40008030	Si pi iso maran nomalak long li men, men hang yu wa ilio angan hambip kara tin pit e susuo pi tin imen.
40008031	Tumen ma emiun lengwal tin munuman imen hau nuk nuk sii khi yang taku, “Taku ngon ku luul to pim li pol, men ku e mang si pim a li hik sup mi yu tin wa ilio angan men engun.”
40008032	Ti ma yang ko wo ta emiun lengwal tin munuman men taku, “Wom lu!” Ti ma emiun mosop kho li pol kut, khama emiun mosop siik li sup e li li mi yu tin wa ilio angan men, ma kerek engun ma yu tin wa ilio men wangan wut plis ma mhup li ko mara hambai li ko mi ehung ma ko huu mi eki.
40008033	Kut ma po tin mara hi pit wo yu men men mhup, ma po li pol mi pi tin nhum men ma po pok pok sun epo wungin tin mosop imen, kuru po pok epo wungin tin si ta wulong tin emiun lengwal kasum ngong men maksin kut tumen.
40008034	Ha, po mosop tin ung mi pi tin nhum imen li pol kuma po li tut a-Yesus. Ma po me ion yang kut, men po hau nuk sii khi yang epo yang ku mang ta mulusngin tin ta po men ung, si yang li.
40009001	Tumen ma yang khin li ko mi naak, ma yang ko ut put eki li sup pilin ekora, ma yang li pol pi tin tan weh men.
40009002	Ha, po wa yang ta tin pokoin hu hu men me epo sun, men nuk wo ehus ta. Ma a-Yesus ion wo phepngin ta po, men yang ko wo ta sun tin pokoin hu hu men taku, “Wolik, mip pit nhing. Lasin tin tap men mosop klokngin kho li kut.”
40009003	Ih, po kara tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men ko sakal ta mi hi taku, “Yang tin imen men sakal ton mi Got kha men!”
40009004	Ma a-Yesus ion wungin tin nuk mi po men, men yang ko sakal taku, “Tua ma wungin tin lengwal imen nuk mi wom?
40009005	Epo wungin tin ia men awo mlus nginan epo sun, men taku nga sakal taku, ‘Lasin tin tap men mosop klokngin kho li kut,’ wa taku nga sakal taku, ‘E si ma e muk muk lu’ ti?
40009006	Si kuma wom ion i epo Wiru Po Tunus men in to emhong wo mulus epon ku koklok lasin,” ti kut kha yang ko wo ta sun tin pokoin hu hu men taku, “E si wa ehus tap si ma e lu mang tin tap men.”
40009007	Ti ma yang si ma yang li mang tin tan men.
40009008	Po tin wa ilio angan men ion wungin tin imen, men po teret wo al ma po wa Got tin ani wa emhong tin nhum tumen ko ta po tunus men yan si.
40009009	Kut ma a-Yesus yok pi tin imen ma yang osong li, men yang ion sun ta tin po sikian a-Matyu men, men ung mang awal tin hi palu takis ta po phuan min ewin men, ma yang wo ta sun taku, “E mu ira ngo.” Ti ma yang si ma yang li ira sun.
40009010	Kut ma wungin si nuk ti, men yang ko nuk e ii endara mi mang, ha, po tin hi palu takis ta po phuan men to sun tin ya hi to lasin ning nginan men munuman me nuk e ii endara to a-Yesus hi po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men.
40009011	Ma po Parisi ion i, men po ko sakal ta sun tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Tuni ma yang tin kot wom men ii endara to po tin palu takis ta sun phuan men u po tin ning lasin nginangan men kut tumen?”
40009012	Kut si a-Yesus hul sakalngin tin imen, men yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Po tin wo hi nhing men men siin om epon tin ku li ion dokta men, si po tin wo hi maik hi men kha ku li ion dokta men ako.
40009013	Si wom lu pon ta wungin tin imen sinsin wet, ‘Mi ngo epo min sukngin weh, si ngo ku mi ngo epo talungin weh akomen.’ Epo nga me epo ngo ku yuk po tin wungin ta hi siik men som. Awu. Nga me epo ngo ku yuk po tin kuk to lasin men, kuma po phae mi hi.”
40009014	Minan tin imen ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yon men me pol ta yang, ma po sakal taku, “Tua ma pim u po Parisi kut tumen suuh mi pim kokyok kokyok, si po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngon men ku suuh mi hi ewin som?”
40009015	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po taku, “Iyi, po tin nongin a sun ta tin ku enangin homan men men ku mi hi urut hi minan tin yang tin ku enangin homan men iso in to po men, wah? Awu. Takuli ungunan kara ku iso me tin kuli yang tin ku enangin homan men klokngin lunga po li men, ma minan tin imen kha ku po suuh mi hi epon men.
40009016	Po ta men ku wa mulu tingit homan ta si kan kan i sup li nuk po moolngin tin kho men ta ewin akomen. Epo mulu tin tingit homan e po kan kan i sup li nuk po sun men men ku uu sun, ma moolngin tin khas men men ko won nhum weh.
40009017	Kuru po men ku paen wain tin homan men ko mi meme elit tin kho men ewin som kut tumen. Taku po ning i tumen, men ku meme elit kas, ma wain yuk yuk ko, kuru meme elit ko lengwal maksin kut tumen. Si po men ku paen wain tin homan men men ku ko mi meme elit tin homan men weh, men ku ngong likiong pit tunus.”
40009018	A-Yesus iso sakal wungin tin imen si ta po, ih, yang ta tin maran pit wo po men me powut ko suul sii khi sun, ma yang sakal taku, “Eruk men hun homani kho kut, si e mu taku wilip si nuk po wut, men ku wut si tunus kyok ako.”
40009019	Tumen ma a-Yesus si ma yang ira sun li u po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men li to yang kut tumen.
40009020	Ih, wut wala ta tin wuh laisuk tin ilul wut to posan khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kho li, men me wetpo yang ma wilin me kah hut moolngin tin yang phini nuk po sun men.
40009021	Epo wut wo ta min taku, “Taku ngo ku kah po moolngin tin ta yang men engun, men ku nga si tunus kyok ako.”
40009022	Si a-Yesus phae mili ma yang ion wut, men yang sakal taku, “Eruk, mip pit nhing; wo phepngin tap ning i ma e si tunus kyok.” Ti ma minan tin imen siik men wut si tunus kyok.
40009023	Kut ma a-Yesus li sup mi mang tin ta phua men ma yang ion po tin so so laresup men u po wa ilio angan tin si nuk e sosokong hambip men kut tumen,
40009024	men yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom yang, epo wut tin wala hoin imen men ku hun weh akomen, si wut men nuk e nhaung engun.” Ti ma po les wal pit wo yang.
40009025	Si po luul to sun tin wa ilio angan men li pol kut, anima yang li sup ma yang isum po wili wut, ma wut tin hoin imen khek si tunus.
40009026	Ma sakalngin epo wungin tin imen men whal tongin mili yanga pi tin imen sup e klet.
40009027	Kut ma a-Yesus yok pi tin imen ma yang li, men wulong ponwal tin mara ngong ko tip tip men ira yang, ma wulong yuk yuk taku, “Ngon tin Wiru a-Dewit men, ngon men ku mip suk tuk!”
40009028	Ma yang kho li sup mang, men wulong tin mara ngong ko tip tip men me pol ta yang. Ma a-Yesus sakal ta wulong taku, “Iyi, wo mom phep epo ngo ku ning wungin tin iyi?” Ti ma wulong ko sakal wet yang taku, “Wai, ngon tin Akono men.”
40009029	Kut ma yang wilin li kah kah mara wulong, ma yang ko wo taku, “Men ku si ta mom ira wo phepngin tin ta mom men weh.”
40009030	Ti ma wulong mara ngong paplas. Ma a-Yesus maran arre to sakalngin ma yang wo ta wulong taku, “Mom in aku mom ning i ma po ta hul epo sakalngin tin imen asin.”
40009031	Takuma wulong yok kut, men wulong li tep sakalngin tin imen epo yang mili yanga mulusngin tin imen sup e klet.
40009032	Si po po hi ayokngin li pol, ha, po wa yang ta me epo sun, men won korip u emiun lengwal ta kasum i kut tumen.
40009033	Ma emiun lengwal tin imen men luul tongin li pol kut, khama yang tin won korip men si sakal. Tumen ma po tin wa ilio angan men teret wo al, ma po ko sakal taku, “Ih, it ku ion wungin maran kiring ta ti kho epo pi Israel akomen.”
40009034	Si po Parisi sakal taku, “Yang men luul to emiun tin lenglengwal men epo emhong tin ta yang tin maran pit wo emiun tin lenglengwal men kha men.”
40009035	Si a-Yesus in e mili mili mi pi tin nunhum u tururun kut tumen mosop ma yang kot po mi mang akotngin tin ta hi e ung e li li men, u yang pok put pok putngin tin tunus e epo enunu men, u yang mimlis saihngin maran kiring kiring u won maikngin maran kiring tin lek po men li kut tumen.
40009036	Si yang ion po tin wa ilio angan men, men yang min amusukngin to po, epo po men mi hi hunngin u molok kut tumen, ken sipsip wa ilio angan kara tin kalwok epo po ta tin ku maran pit wo li men.
40009037	Minan tin imen yang sakal ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Endara tin mumuru kut men men tang nuk mipi, si po tin ku li kum mipi epon men men kiak engun.
40009038	Tumen ma wom kines yang tin Akono e maran pit wo endara aiingin kaklat nginan men epo yang ku tih po kara li pol tin ku li kaklat endara tin mumuru men mipi tin ta yang men.
40010001	Li klet ma yang yuk po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men tin khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen men kho me epo yang, men yang sum po po epo emhong tin ku po luul to emiun lengwal li pol epon men u po mimlis saihngin maran kiring kiring u won maikngin maran kiring kiring epon kut tumen.
40010002	Epo ya po tin paengin e khum ta u ponwal tumen wala ti: muk men a-Saimon tin po sikian yan ta maksin a-Pita men ngong wiron Andru; a-Yemis tin wiru sun a-Sebedi men ngong wiron a-Yon;
40010003	a-Pilip ngong a-Bartolomyu; a-Tomas ngong a-Matyu tin palu takis ta po phuan nginangan men; a-Yemis tin wiru Alpias men ngong a-Lebias tin yan ta maksin a-Tatias men;
40010004	u a-Saimon tin hi Selot men ngong a-Yudas Iskariot tin mak li wa a-Yesus li sup yanga wili po nolo men kut tumen.
40010005	Po tin khum ta u ponwal tumen kha a-Yesus tirih hi li men, ma yang wo nut po taku, “Wom kuk aku wom lu ira soput tin ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men asin, u wom kuk aku wom lu sup mi enunu tin ta po Samaria men ta asin kut tumen.
40010006	Si wom men ku lu epo sipsip tin khuuk wal Israel e huuspit men weh.
40010007	Ma wom muk muk lu, men ku wom pok put sakalngin taku, ‘Enunu tin api wet pi men men kho me tikayung kut khae.’
40010008	Wom lu mimlis saihngin ta po tin sasaih men, wom ning i ma po tin saihngin tin mut mut po wili hi u po khi hi kut tumen si po hi yil, wom khek po tin huu kho men si turunus, u wom luul to emiun tin lenglengwal men lu pol mi po kut tumen. Timen men wom wai hut emul engun kho kut, tumen ma wom men ku wai si hut emul engun maksin kut tumen.
40010009	Wom men ku pulum po gol wa silwa wa kapa wa tumen si wom non i ko mi eyel tin pit put elik tin wom wat put wom epon men asin.
40010010	Kuru eyel tin ku wom muk muk ton men u moolngin ponwal u sandel u kamtukngin kut tumen men ku wom wai asin kut tumen. Epo po tin kum men men tunus epo po ku wa endara aiingin emhut kumang ta hi ako.
40010011	Ma pi tin akani e nunhum wa tururun e ku wom lu sup epon men men ku wom kines wet epo po ta tin wungin tan tunus men, ma wom lu kuk hang po tin imen li pol minan tin ku wom yok lu pol men.
40010012	Ma wom lu sup mi mang ta, men ku wom wa mi wom si ta po tin khuuk wal e ung mi mang tin imen.
40010013	Ma taku irawin epo po tin khuuk wal mi mang timen wungin ta hi tunus, men ku min wyungin tin ta wom men wom mang tan ko po po kut. Si taku wungin ta po ku tunus som, men ku wom klok min wyungin tin ta wom men kyok me epo wom.
40010014	Ma taku po ta ku wa wom wa hul wet wungin ta wom som, taku wom ku yok mang tin imen lu pol wa wom ku yok pi timen lu pol, men ku wom tung tung nokokwa tin nuk yanga khi wom men ko.
40010015	Nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo ungunan tin kuli wungin ples nginan si men, men ku mumhek mingin tin ku Got ples i ko po po tin ung wo mulusngin Sodom to sun Gomora men men ku min amangngin engun epo sun tin ku yang ples i ko epo pi tin imen.
40010016	Wom hul, nga tih wom lu pol e kai sipsip tin kuk lunga elwa enih men. Tumen ma wom men ku mhi wom ek weh ken tamha men, si wom men ku kuk ailung engun ken emon wulus men engun.
40010017	Si wom men ku haum epo po tunus, epo po ku wa wom lu sup yanga wili kaunsil tin ta hi men kara, u po ku paplai wom mi mang akotngin tin ta hi e ung e li li men kut tumen.
40010018	Po ku iso wa wom li nuk mara po tin phuan men u po tin sinkhaung men kut tumen, men sinsin epo ngo, kumali wom pok put sakalngin si ta po u ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e ung e li li wo mulus men kut tumen.
40010019	Si minan tin kuli po wa wom sup yanga wili po men, men ku sila wom khing pit po sakalngin tin ku wom sakal i tua wa wom sakal epo ele tumen asin. Epon men ku wangin ko ta wom minan tin imen siik tin ku wom sakal epon men.
40010020	Epo wom tuo wom ani ku sakal men som. Awu. Si Emiun tin ta Wiwoli wom men kha sakal si mi wo wom men.
40010021	Ma wiron ta men ku wa wiron ta si kuma po wini ko hun, u wiraman ta men ku wa husanin ta si, u po tin sun khuuk hi men men ku wa po irama hi to eleni hi si, ma po ning i ma po lek sun ko huu.
40010022	Ma po mosop ku mi hi lel wom, men sinsin me epo ya ngo. Si po ta ku wuh i weh li pol mi elup tin li ponsol men, po tin imen kha kuli palolongin men.
40010023	Minan tin akani e ku po ning i lengwal epo wom mi enunu tin iyi, men ku wom mhup kyok lu mi enunu enginin ta. Epo nga wo anuh ta wom, epo wom men ku suuk sii kumang mi enunu tin ta po Israel e ung e li li men kho som, si Wiru Po Tunus men kuli me.
40010024	Po ta tin hul wet kotngin mi wo sun ta men men ku in ili awon epo sun tin kot i men akomen, u po ta tin kum wo phua ta men ku in ili awon epo phua tin tan men akomen kut tumen.
40010025	Po ta tin hul wet kotngin mi wo sun ta men taku si kai sun tin kot i men men tunus kut, u po ta tin kum wo phua ta men, taku si kai phua tin tan men men tunus kut tumen. Taku po sikia phua tin mang tan men a-Belsebap, men ku po sikia hi tin ung e khuuk wal mi mang timen a-Belsebap weh kut tumen ako!
40010026	Tumen ma wom men ku lem pit wo po asin. Epo endara tin pulum pongin pit men ku ta iso pulum pongin kyok pit akomen. Awu. Mosop men kuli iso laslasngin ma si nuk e li li pi mlaeng ako. U endara tin kaunngin men kuli ta iso kaunngin akomen. Awu. Mosop men kuli po iso pon tan ako.
40010027	Sakalngin tin nga pok wom epon mi pi tin mi ku men, men ku wom pok put si mi pi tin mi mlaeng men, u sakalngin tin wom hul i kaskas mi kinga wom men, men ku wom si pok put ili po eki mang tin ung e li li men kut tumen.
40010028	Ma wom men ku lem pit wo po asin, tin ku lek wom emkusin ko huu, si po khuk po engin epo po tin ku lek enu wom ko huu men. Si wom men ku lem pit wo yang tin kakha weh epo yang ku mhuk enu wom u wom emkusin to al tumen li pi tin yau sindak pit epon men.
40010029	Iyi, po tirih emon tururun ponwal men po wa ulu tun ta sup wet ako, wah? Ma emon tin imen ku ta plong ko mulus, men ku enginin epo wungin tin nuk ta mi Wiwoli wom men akomen.
40010030	Epo yut wom kut men Got tiik i mosop kho ako.
40010031	Tumen ma wom men ku lem asin, epo emiu wom men maik epo emon tin tururun e munuman men ako.
40010032	Tumen ma taku po ta pok put wungin epon tin ion ngo men si to mara po tunus, men ku nga pok put wungin epo nga ion po tin imen si to mara Yok tin in ili wet pi men maksin kut tumen.
40010033	Si taku po ta sup sup put ngo to mara po tunus, men ku nga sup sup put to mara Yok tin in ili wet pi men maksin kut tumen.
40010034	Wom kuk aku wom phaeng taku nga me epon ku nga wa wungin aminis ko in wo mulus. Awu. Nga me epo ngo ku wa wungin aminis som, si ngo men me to bainat.
40010035	Epo nga me kuma nga ning i ma yang ta si nolo wiraman, u wut wala ta si nolo tonin, u wut wala ta si nolo erkan kut tumen;
40010036	Ma po tin nolo sun ta men ku po tin hi khuuk wal ta hi weh men.
40010037	Taku po ta min epo wiraman wa tonin weh, si ku min epo ngo weh som, men tunus epon ku in to ngo som. U taku po ta min epo wirun wa erun weh, si ku min epo ngo weh som, men tunus epon ku in to ngo som kut tumen.
40010038	U taku po ta ku lat sa wlong putwal tin tan men ma me ira ngo som, men tunus epon ku in to ngo som kut tumen.
40010039	Taku po ta pon ta tunusngin tan, men kuli klokngin hang i kyok, si taku po ta min alang si tunusngin tan epon ku mut eya ngo, men kuli pon tan kyok.
40010040	Taku po ta wa wom, men wa ngo kha men, ma taku po ta wa ngo, men wa yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men kha men kut tumen ako.
40010041	Taku po ta wa pokngin ta epo pokngin yan, men kuli wa talungin tin ku emhut kumang tin ta pokngin ta men ako. U taku po ta wa sun ta tin wungin tan siik men, men kuli wa talungin tin ku emhut wungin ta po tin wungin ta hi siik men kut tumen ako.
40010042	U taku po ta wa karu tin eki nglik ko min men ta si ta po tin tun engun men ta epo ya po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngo men ta, nga wo anuh ta wom, men ku talungin tin ku emhut wungin tan men klokngin hang i angan akomen.
40011001	A-Yesus suuk sii sakalngin tin yang panen po tin wa kotngin mi wo yang e eip ponwal u ponwal tumen epon men ma wungin si in ti, men yang yok pi tin imen kuma yang li kot po u pok put sakalngin tumen mi pi tin nunhum e ung e li li wo mulusngin Galili men.
40011002	Si a-Yon in mi mang tin po wo hi maik hi min ewin men ma yang hul epo kumang tin ta Mesaia men, men yang ko tih wulong ponwal tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men,
40011003	ma wulong li wo ta a-Yesus taku, “Ngon e yang tin ku iso me men ani imen, wa pim ku iso mara pim pit epo yang enginin ta kyok, wah?”
40011004	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal wet wulong ti, “Mom lu pok a-Yon epo wungin tin mom ion i u mom hul i tumen:
40011005	Po tin mara hi korip men si mara hi plas, u po tin kalwok epon ku muk muk men si muk muk; po tin khi hi to wili hi pon mut mut men si po hi yil u po tin kinga hi tuung men si kinga hi kleng; po tin huu kho men khekngin kyok si turunus u po tin kalwok men hul pok putngin tin tunus men kut tumen.
40011006	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po ta tin ku plong ko to wo phepngin tin tan men akomen, sinsin men epo ngo.”
40011007	Ma wulong po ngong ayokngin li, men a-Yesus hosi sakalngin ta po tin wa ilio angan hambip men epo a-Yon taku: “Kho ma wom lu pol pi tin tahunggu men, men wom ku lu ion ele? Wom taku ion kaas ta tin eip ku ngol ngol i men wah? Awu.
40011008	Si wom taku weh lu ion ele? Yang ta tin phi moolngin tin wia men, wah? Awu. Epo po tin phi moolngin tin wia men kuk mi mang tin ta po tin sinkhaung men ako.
40011009	Si wom lu pol ma wom taku ion ele? Po pokngin ta, wah? Wai, nga pok wom, epo yang men si nhum epo po pokngin ako.
40011010	Epo yang tin imen wala sakalngin panngin nuk epon men men ti: ‘Wom hul, ngo men kuli weh tih po ta tin to wungin ta ngo men kho li muk ngon, men kuli hihi soput tap tin ku li muk ngon men.’
40011011	Nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo lunga po tin khuukngin me epo po wala men, men ku po ta si yan pos epo a-Yon tin ning baptais nginangan men kho akomen. Si po ta tin yan om weh mi enunu tin api wet pi men men si yan pos epo sun ako.
40011012	Ma hosingin epo elup tin ta a-Yon tin ning baptais nginangan men ma me pol homani men, men enunu tin api wet pi men wuh weh wet wungin tin amhees men, ma po tin wungin ta hi amhees men taku nak i amhees engun.
40011013	Epo po pokngin mosop u wungin sinsin kut tumen men kuk e pok put sakalngin me, me pol hang a-Yon.
40011014	Ma taku mi wom epo wom ku wa wungin tin imen, yang men a-Elaiha tin ku iso me men kha men.
40011015	Po ta kingan ung epon ku hul, men ku hul weh!
40011016	Si ngo ku kai po tin khuuk wal homani men to ele? Men ku ken po hoin tin nuk pi tin po nal wal epon men ma po yuk yuk sun tin tita hi men
40011017	taku, ‘Pim a so so lawi ta wom, ma wom ku yik som; u pim a lut amusukngin si wo wom, ma wom ku hahau amusukngin som kut tumen.’
40011018	Epo a-Yon me, men yang ku ii enda wa yang ku um ewin som, ma po sakal taku, ‘Yang men emiun lengwal ta in min kha men.’
40011019	Si Wiru Po Tunus me, men yang ii endara u yang um kut tumen, ma po sakal taku, ‘Wom ion i, yang ta tin ii enda lak u um wain sumsum weh kut tumen wala imen, men nongin a po tin palu takis ta po phuan men u po tin ning lasin nginangan men kut tumen!’ Si mhin ekngin men si in siik to mara po masang to sun wala epo po tin khuuk wal to mhin ekngin men.”
40011020	Minan tin imen yang hosi sakalngin epo yang ku pio pi tin nunhum e yang ning wungin tin maran kiring kiring e nunhum men tin munuman men min men, epon tin po ku phae mi hi som men.
40011021	“Auh, ngon tin Korasin men! Auh, ngon tin Betsaida men! Epon taku wungin maran kiring kiring tin nunhum e ningngin kho mi mom men, men ku ningngin mi pi Taia to sun Saidon kho, men ku kho nginan tin kho men ma po phae mi hi mi moolngin lengwal u ekas tin po sawak mara hi epon men kut tumen ako.
40011022	Si nga wo ta mom ti, epo elup tin ta wungin ples nginan men ku si, men ku wungin tin plesngin epo pi Taia to sun Saidon men, men ku si min amangngin epo sun tin ku plesngin epo mom men engun.
40011023	U ngon tin Kaperneam men, aku, ngon ku wa yap si epo pi wet pi, takuma ngon men ku iso wangin kyok me ko in pi tin ta hunngin men ako. Epon taku wungin maran kiring kiring tin nunhum e ningngin mi ngon kho men ku ningngin mi pi Sodom, men ku pi tin imen iso ung weh me pol homani kut i ako.
40011024	Nga pok ngon, epo elup tin ta wungin ples nginan men ku si, men ku wungin tin ku plesngin epo pi Sodom men, men ku si min amangngin epo sun tin ku plesngin epo ngon men ako.”
40011025	To pi minan tin imen ma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Yok, ngon tin Akono epo pi wet pi u pi mulus kut tumen, nga sam sam ngon, epo e kaun wungin tin mosop imen epo po tin mhi hi ek u po tin mara hi ples sakalngin tunus men kut tumen, si e suk mara po tin hohoin weh men epon.
40011026	Wai, Yok, epon timen wala tunus to marap men.
40011027	Endara mosop men Yok wai si nuk yanga wili ngo kho kut, ma po ta ku hop yang tin Got Wirun men som, si Wiraman misan. Wa po ta ku hop Got tin Wiraman men som, si Wirun misan, u po ta tin Wirun min epo yang ku suk maran epo Wiraman men kut tumen.
40011028	Wom tin wuh weh ma maikngin los wom weh men, wom mosop mu epo ngo, men ku nga wa nhingngin si ta wom.
40011029	Wom wa wut wom mu sup wet kaklung tin ung wut ngo men kuma ung wut tong then ma wom wa maran ekngin mi wo ngo, epo ngo men wungin ta ngo amunu u mi ngo ko li wyu ung kut tumen, ma wom men ku pon ta nhingngin tin ku epo enu wom weh men.
40011030	Epo kaklung tin ta ngo men men awo mlus nginan, u enda tin ngo ku wai si ta wom kuma wom lat i men men malil engun kut tumen ako.”
40012001	To pi minan tin imen ma a-Yesus li to pi Sabat li mipi mili mili tin wit whangin nuk e li li min men. Ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men huu elip, ma po si hosi wit wut hik hik put nginan ma po iini enun.
40012002	Ma po Parisi ion wungin tin imen, men po ko sakal ta yang taku, “Imen, po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngon men men ning wungin tin wungin sinsin uluu it epo it ku ning i to pi Sabat asin men wala imen!”
40012003	Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Iyi, wungin tin a-Dewit ning i minan tin yang hun elip men, yang u po tin hi kuk men kut tumen,
40012004	tin yang li sup mang tin ta Got men ma yang ii beret tin auluungin e hihingin nuk to mara Got men, tin uluungin epo yang ku iini men, u men uluungin epo po tin hi kuk to al men ku iini asin kut tumen, si men ta po tin kum auluungin men misa hi, wungin tin imen men ku wom tiik i kho som, wah?
40012005	Wa sakalngin tin nuk mi wungin sinsin men, tin pi Sabat si, men po tin kum auluungin mi mang auluungin men hik put wungin sinsin tin ta pi Sabat men, si po men wungin om po hi, wungin tin imen men ku wom tiik i kho som kut tumen, wah?
40012006	Si nga wo ta wom epo pi tin iyi, men po ta in, men nhum epo mang auluungin ako.
40012007	Si sakalngin tin ti, “Mi ngo epo min sukngin weh, si ngo ku mi ngo epo talungin weh akomen,” taku wom pon tan sinsin kho, men ku wom wa lasin ko po po tin lasin ta hi om men akomen.
40012008	Epo Wiru Po Tunus men Akono epo pi Sabat maksin kut tumen ako.”
40012009	Kut ma yang yok pi tin imen, men yang osong li ma yang li sup mi mang akotngin tin ta po men.
40012010	Ih, yang ta in, men wilin yangan to sun pon pon ta hun. Ma po kines yang taku, “Iyi, taku po ta mlis saihngin li to pi Sabat, men wungin sinsin sam epon, wah?” Po kines yang tumen epon kumali po wa wungin ko pit po yang.
40012011	Kut ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Iyi, po ta in lunga wom, men sipsip tan then ta ma taku li li plong ko mi nahu to pi Sabat, men ku po tin imen li wilin ko wai me si mi nahu ako, wah?
40012012	Tumen ma po tunus ta men tunus weh epo sipsip ta ako, wah? Tumen ma po ta ku ning wungin tunus epo sun ta to pi Sabat, men ku tunus ako.”
40012013	Li klet ma yang sakal ta sun tin wilin pon toro ngong men taku, “E tus wilip lu pol.” Ti ma yang tus wilin li pol, men yang wilin kyok si tunus kut ken sun tin ta maksin men.
40012014	Si po Parisi li pol ma po sakal lang po ngi al epo yang, epon kumali po pon ta soput ta tin ku po wi yang ko hun epon men.
40012015	Si a-Yesus ion wungin tin imen, men yang mang ta pi tin imen ung, si yang li. Ma po tin wa ilio angan hambip kara men ira yang, ma yang mimlis saihngin ta po mosop li pi om.
40012016	Si yang uluu po epo po ku li pok put yang asin,
40012017	tumen kuma sakalngin men ku si enun ung hut, tin pokngin Aisaia pok put men taku,
40012018	“Yang tin kum ta ngo men, tin wo ngo ung won men, wala imen. Yang men mi ngo epon weh, ma enu ngo min tunusngin pit po yang weh! Ngo ku iso wa emiu ngo ko po yang, ma yang ku pok put wungin tin ples nginan e nuk emin weh men si ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men.
40012019	Yang men ku pio wa wut pit pit wa po ta ku hul wut yang put soput tin nunhum men ewin akomen.
40012020	Kaas ta put pal, men ku yang hik i weh akomen, u mulu tin pit mi esul ma pit e kuin men, men ku yang whus i weh akomen kut tumen, weh li pol minan tin kuli yang li pol to wungin ples nginan khama po tin nolo yang men huuspit mara yang.
40012021	Ma po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men men ku hoo mi hi pit po yang yan weh.”
40012022	Minan tin imen po wa yang ta me epo a-Yesus, men emiun lengwal ta kasum yang, u yang men maran korip, u won korip kut tumen. Ma yang mlis saihngin ta sun tin imen li kut, ti ma yang sakal, u yang ion endara kut tumen.
40012023	Ma po tin wa ilio angan hambip kara men teret ewut wal ma po sakal taku, “Iyi, yang tin imen Wiru a-Dewit wa men?”
40012024	Si po Parisi hul wungin tin imen, men po sakal taku, “Yang ti kop men luul to emiun tin lenglengwal men mi po li pol, men yang ning i epo emhong tin ta a-Belsebul tin maran pit wo emiun lengwal mosop men kha men ako.”
40012025	Takuma a-Yesus pon ta wungin tin nuk mi po men kho, men yang sakal ta po taku, “Enunu mosop tin pok mingin ma tuo hi sewut wal men, men kuli ko amiron nginan engun ako. U enunu mosop u po tin ung e khuuk wal mi mang ta hi then ta men mosop taku ko pok mi al ma hi tuo hi sewut wal, men kuli hi si nuk nhing kyok akomen kut tumen.
40012026	Taku a-Nolongin luul to a-Nolongin tuon, men pok mingin ma yang sewut wal. Taku tumen, men ku enunu tin ta yang men kuli pit nhing kyok tua?
40012027	Ma taku nga luul to emiun tin lenglengwal men epo emhong tin ta a-Belsebul men, si po tin husani wom men luul to emiun tin lengwal men mi po li pol epo emhong tin ta are? Tumen ma po tuo hi kha ku si ples wungin tin ta wom men.
40012028	Si taku nga luul to emiun tin lengwal men mi po li pol epo emhong tin ta Got Emiun men, irawin weh epo enunu tin ta Got men kho me pol epo wom ako.
40012029	Wa tua ma po ta ku li sup mang ta yang apalukngin ta, ma kot endara ta yang? Awu. Muk men ku yang kan kan sun timen kho, khamali yang li kot endara tin pit mi mang ta sun men.
40012030	Po ta ku me hang ngo som, men nolo ngo kha men, u po ta ku palu endara to ngo som, men plak min kut kha men kut tumen.
40012031	Tumen ma nga wo ta wom ti, epo lasin u ton mingin tin maran kiring kiring men mosop kuli Got mang tan epo po tunus li, si ton mingin tin li epo Emiun Auluungin men, men ku Got mang tan epo po tunus li angan akomen.
40012032	Taku po ta sakal aie ewut Wiru Po Tunus, men kuli Got mang ta lasin tan ako, si taku po ta sakal aie ewut Emiun Auluungin, men kuli Got mang ta lasin tan akomen, men ku yang mang tan mi elup tin iyi som, kuru mi elup tin ku iso me sulung men som kut tumen.
40012033	Taku wom ning sa tunus, men ku wom ning i enun tunus kut tumen, wa taku wom ning sa lengwal, men ku wom ning i enun lengwal kut tumen. Epo sa enun kha po hop sa ton men ako.
40012034	Wom tin isaling ekle khuuk wom men, tua ma wom tin wungin ta wom lengwal men ku pok put sakalngin tunus? Epo wungin tin teng pol mi wo po ta men, men sinsin epo wungin tin kol mi po men kha men.
40012035	Yang ta tin wungin tan tunus men men wa wungin tunus mi sun tin yang halung pon min men me pol, u yang ta tin wungin tan lengwal men, men wa wungin lengwal mi sun tin yang halung pon min men me pol kut tumen.
40012036	Si nga wo ta wom epo sakalngin mosop tin sinsin om men, tin po tunus ku sakal i engun men, men ku po iso pok epon sinsin minan tin ku wungin ples nginan tin nhum men tin kuli iso si men.
40012037	Epo sakalngin ta wom kha kuli wom si kuk siik mi wungin ples nginan epon men, u sakalngin ta wom kha kuli wom huuspit mi wungin ples nginan epon men maksin kut tumen.”
40012038	Kut ma po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u po Parisi kut tumen ko sakal wet yang taku, “Ngon tin kot po men, pim taku ion tosukngin ta hang ngon men wet.”
40012039	Ti ma yang sakal wet po taku, “Po tin khuuk wal homani e wungin ta hi lengwal e hi kuk e ning wungin sup si khi al epo Got men, men tohuh epo po ku ion tosukngin ta, ma tosukngin ta men ku wangin si ta po akomen, si tosukngin tin ta pokngin a-Yona men misan kha kuli po ion i men.
40012040	Epo a-Yona nuk to pi mhangin miuk u pi luk miuk tumen mi kuma ili tin nhum men, tumen kut kha kuli Wiru Po Tunus nuk to pi mhangin miuk u pi luk miuk tumen ko li wet mulus emin kut tumen.
40012041	Po masang Niniweh men kuli khek si nuk mi wungin ples nginan to po tin ung e khuuk wal homani men, men ku po wa lasin ko po sun. Epo po men phae mi hi wet sakalngin tin a-Yona pok put men; ma irawin, epo yang ta tin nhum epo sun a-Yona men kha in iyi men ako.
40012042	Wut tin wala lamit e me epo pi esaul men kuli khek si in mi wungin ples nginan to po tin ung e khuuk wal homani men, men ku wut wa lasin ko po po. Epo wut men me porili mulus kuma wut me hul mhin ekngin tin ta a-Solomon men. Ma irawin, epo yang ta tin nhum epo sun a-Solomon men kha in iyi men ako.
40012043	Taku minan ta ma emiun lengwal ta ku me pol mi po ta, men ku yang mili mili yanga pi tin tahunggu epo eki men, men yang taku pon ta pi tin ku yang li nhing epon men ta, takuma pi om.
40012044	Kut ma yang wo taku, ‘Ngo ku kyok li mang tin nga in min ma nga me men.’ Ma yang kyok me pon tan men min engun, u whek mingin kho, u endara mosop men maran pet ewin pit min kyok kut tumen.
40012045	Kut ma yang li wa emiun lengwal khaut ponwal me sup men enginin weh tin wungin ta hi lengwal weh epo sun men kyok me to yang, ma emiun tin mosop imen kyok li sup mi mang tin imen ma pit imen. Ma wungin tin si sulung ta po ta tin tunus imen, men lengwal weh epo sun tin si ta po muk men. Wungin kuli si in tumen epo po tin ung e khuuk wal to wungin ta hi lengwal homani men.”
40012046	Ma yang pit e sakal ta po tin wa ilio angan men, men yang tonin u ehuron kut tumen men me nuk tak li mara so, men po taku me sakal to yang.
40012047	Kut ma po ta sakal ta sun taku, “Imen, tonim u ehurom tumen wala me nuk tak li mara so men, ma po taku me sakal to ngon.”
40012048	Takuma yang wa sakalngin emhut sun ta yang tin pok sun men taku, “Ara inu u ehurok tumen?”
40012049	Ti ma yang suk wilin li wo po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men, ma yang sakal taku, “Inu u ehurok tumen wala nuk iyi!
40012050	Epon taku po ta ira wungin tin nuk ta mi Yok tin in ili wet pi men, men kha worok u elut ngo u inu kut tumen.”
40013001	Li klet ma ungunan tin iyi kut men a-Yesus kho yok mi mang li pol, ma yang li ung suu ehung.
40013002	Ma po wa ilio angan hambip kara me palu wal ewut yang, tumen ma yang li si wo naak ta ma yang ko ung. Si po tin wa ilio angan men men nuk suu ehung.
40013003	Ma yang ko pok put sakalngin munuman si ta po ira wungin emol kara, men yang sakal taku, “Wom hul, yang ta li pol epon ku tep tep wit ihun.
40013004	Ma yang in e tep tep i, men wit ihun kara poplong ko ira soput, ma emon kara me tom tom i ii nginan li.
40013005	Si wit ihun kara poplong ko wo mulus tin pohut kakat men, pi tin imen men mulusngin ha nuk po enah. Ma kerek engun ma wit ihun tin imen klung si, epo mulusngin men ku hik e muut long nuk po enah akomen.
40013006	Li sinang huus me si, men sinang mom pon, epo li imut om, tumen ma li mlus mosop.
40013007	Si wit ihun kara poplong ko mi elik tin ngin si si put sun men, ma elik poplok si lais wut li.
40013008	Si wit ihun kara poplong ko wo mulusngin tin ikil men, ma plok si enunun, men kara enunun khum khum ta (100) si ung e li li mhi sun, u kara men enunun khum ta me sup (60) si ung e li li mhi sun, u kara men enunun khum miuk (30) si ung e li li mhi sun tumen.
40013009	Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul weh!”
40013010	Li klet ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men men me kines yang taku, “Tua ma e ira wungin emol kara ma e kot po epon?”
40013011	Ti ma yang ko sakal wet po taku, “Wom kha Got wai ko ta wom kuma wom pon ta wungin kaunngin tin ta enunu tin api wet pi men ako, si po men ku Got wai ko ta po kho akomen.
40013012	Epon taku po ta in to endara tan kara, men ku endara kara maksin wangin ko po sun tan si, ma endara tan men ku si pu wal weh. Si taku po ta in engun epo endara, men ku endara tin in ton men kuli klokngin epon li kut tumen.
40013013	Wungin sinsin tin imen kha nga sakal ta po ira wungin emol epon men, epo po kuk e mara hi kon i, takuma po ku mara hi iis i akomen, u po kuk e kinga hi hul i, takuma po ku hul i weh akomen, kuru po ku ples i sinsin tunus akomen kut tumen.
40013014	Ma epo po tin imen kha sakalngin tin ta pokngin Aisaia men si enun ung hut epo hi men, put tin sakal taku, ‘Wom ku kuk e hul, men ku wom hul takuma wom ku ples i sinsin tunus akomen, u wom kuk e ion i, men ku wom ion i takuma wom ku mara wom iis i weh akomen kut tumen.
40013015	Epo mi po tin imen men ung e li khang weh. Po kinga hi men si pere weh, u po mara hi muru kut tumen, epon akuli po mara hi kon endara epo po mara hi weh, u po hul sakalngin epo po kinga hi weh, ma po ples sakalngin sinsin epo po mi hi weh, ma po phae, men ku nga mlis saihngin tin ta po men li.’
40013016	Si wom men emhong tin ta Got men ko po mara wom ako, epo mara wom kleng, u men in epo kinga wom, epo kinga wom hul kut tumen.
40013017	Epo nga sakal anuh ta wom ti, epo kho ma po pokngin munuman u po munuman tin wungin ta hi siik men tumen, men mi hi epo po ku ion endara tin wom ion i homani men, si po men ku mara hi nut i weh akomen. U po mi hi epon ku hul wungin tin wom hul i homani men, si po men ku hul i weh kyok kut tumen akomen.
40013018	Tumen ma wom men ku hul sakalngin tin emol epo yang tin tep wit ihun men men sinsin ti:
40013019	Taku po ta hul sakalngin tin epo enunu men ma ku ples i sinsin tunus weh akomen, men kuli yang tin wungin tan lengwal men me klok sakalngin tin tepngin ko mi po men li. Po tin imen wala wa sakalngin tin tepngin ko ira soput men.
40013020	Si wit ihun tin tepngin ko po pi tin pohut kakat men, men los po po ta tin hul sakalngin ma wai kerek engun to min kehngin men.
40013021	Takuma imut men ku yenge min weh akomen, si in put monlo long engun. Ma won maikngin si wa po ning i lengwal epon pit mi sakalngin, men kerek engun ma mang ta wo phepngin tan.
40013022	Si wit ihun tin plong ko mi elik tin ngin si si put sun men, men los po po ta tin hul sakalngin ma silan khingngin tin ta pi mulus men u miranngin tin ek ek min men tumen lais wut, ma ku enun akomen.
40013023	Si wit ihun tin tepngin ko wo mulusngin tin ikil men, men los po po ta tin hul sakalngin ma maran iran sinsin, men enun weh, men kara enunun khum khum ta (100) ung e li li mhi sun, u kara men enunun khum ta me sup (60) ung e li li mhi sun, u kara men enunun khum miuk (30) ung e li li mhi sun kut tumen.”
40013024	Kuru wungin emol ta kyok men yang hihi i in to mara po, men yang sakal taku, “Enunu tin api wet pi men men ken yang ta tin tep wit ihun tin tunus men mipi tin tan men.
40013025	Takuma po tunus li nuk e nhaung, men yang tin nolo sun men me tep wit ihun tin torokngin men ko lunga sun ma yang li.
40013026	Li ma wit ihun klung si enunun, men wit tin torokngin men klung si lunga sun maksin kut tumen.
40013027	Tumen ma po tin kum wo phua tin mipi tan men men me sakal ta yang taku, “Po akono, iyi, e tep wit ihun tin tunus men ko mipi tap kho ako, wah? Taku tua ma wit tin torokngin men klung si lunga sun?”
40013028	Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, ‘Po nolo ta kha me ning i tin imen ako.’ Ti ma po tin kum wo yang men sakal ta yang ti, ‘Tumen ma mip epon men ku pim a li kukhuk i lunga sun si wa tua?’
40013029	Takuma yang ko wo taku, ‘Awu, epon akuli wom lu kukhuk wit tin torokngin men si, men kuli wom lal i tin tunus men si to sun.
40013030	Wom mang, si ngong likiong men ku poplok si to wal li pol minan tin kuli po kaklat i men, ma minan tin po kaklat wit men khama nga sakal ta po tin kaklat wit men taku, “Muk men ku wom pulum po wit tin torokngin men, ma wom kan kan put kuma yau iini, si wit tin tunus men men ku wom pulum pon lu pit mi mang tin ta ngo e enda aiingin halung pongin sup min ma pit men.”’”
40013031	Wungin emol ta maksin men yang hihi i si in to mara po kyok, men yang sakal ti: “Enunu tin api wet pi men men ken mastet ihun men, tin yang ta wai ma tep i ko mipi tin tan men.
40013032	Men irawin weh epo mastet ihun men tururun weh epo sun, takuma men si nhum kut, men si nhum epo sun kara tin aiingin e plok si mipi men, men si sa an, ma emon tin yap yap wet pi men me ning ning mlut pon.”
40013033	Wungin emol ta kyok men yang sakal i si ta po taku, “Enunu tin api wet pi men men ken yiis tin wut wala ta wai ma me phae to plaua tin wut mot mot i hambip angan miuk men, ma ung li pol minan tin plaua mosop iit iit men.”
40013034	Wungin tin mosop imen men a-Yesus sakal i si ta po tin wa ilio angan men ira wungin emol tin imen. Ma yang ku sakal epo wungin emol som, men ku yang sakal ta po ta akomen.
