40013035	Tumen kumali sakalngin men ku si enun ung hut tin pokngin pok put men men taku, “Ngo men ku wo ngo ngam weh khama nga sakal emol; ngo men ku pok put sakalngin tin kaunngin in ewo maran tin mulusngin pho pongin ma me pol homani men.”
40013036	Kut ma a-Yesus ko tih po tin wa ilio angan men li, si yang li sup mi mang. Ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men me pol ta yang ma po sakal taku, “Ngon men ku pok pim weh epo sakalngin emol tin epo wit ihun tin torokngin men tin tepngin ko mipi men.”
40013037	Ti ma yang ko sakal wet po taku, “Yang tin tep wit ihun tin tunus men men Wiru Po Tunus.
40013038	Ma mipi men los po pi mulus, si wit ihun tin tunus men, men los po po tin husani enunu men; si wit ihun tin torokngin men, men los po po tin husani yang tin wungin tan lengwal men,
40013039	si yang tin nolo sun e tep wit ihun tin torokngin men, men los po yang tin hik put wungin pit po po nginangan men, u minan tin po kaklat wit epon men, men los po elup tin ku li pyu pongin men, u po tin kaklat wit ihun men, men los po po tihngin kut tumen.
40013040	Tumen ma po pulum po wit tin torokngin men si po wut i, tin imen kha kuli si minan tin elup tin iyi e ku li pyu pongin men.
40013041	Wiru Po Tunus men kuli tih po tihngin tin tan men li pol, ma po tihngin men ku li pulum po endara mosop mi enunu tin tan men tin ning i ma po plong ko mi lasin epon men, u po mosop tin hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men kut tumen,
40013042	ma po tihngin ku li whis sun tin imen mosop ko li sup put ngi yau tin nhum men. Pi tin imen men ku po kuk e hau hambip u po kuk e ii ngi hi kakyat kakyat po al epon kut tumen.
40013043	Minan tin imen men kuli po tin wungin ta hi siik men kuli hi si ngin ngin ken sinang men mi enunu tin ta Wirama hi men. Po ta kingan ung epon ku hul, men ku hul weh!
40013044	Kyok men enunu tin api wet pi men men ken miranngin ta tin kaunngin nuk mipi ta men, ma yang ta kyok me pon tan ma kaun i kyok. Ma yang min keh hambip takut epon, men ma yang li tirih endara mosop tin tan men, ma yang me kul mipi tin imen.
40013045	Kyok men enunu tin api wet pi men men ken yang tin kum anaum ewin men ta tin taku pon ta eyuk enun tin pon turunus weh men ta,
40013046	ma yang me pon tan ta tin po ngel sun epon weh men, men yang li tirih endara mosop tin tan men, ma yang me kul i tin imen.
40013047	Kyok men enunu tin api wet pi men men ken nomkal ta tin psikngin ko mi ehung, ma ko ut eya ili kara kuk mi sun tin mosop e maran kiring kiring men,
40013048	ma si kol kut, men po hih i me sup sulang. Ma po ko nuk ma po whem ili tin tunus men ko mi aomah, si ili tin lengwal men po whis i tek li.
40013049	Wungin men ku si ti minan tin elup tin iyi e ku li ponsol men. Po tihngin men kuli hi li pol, ma ku hi li whem po tin wungin ta hi lengwal men lunga sun tin wungin ta hi siik men si,
40013050	ma po whis sun ko li sup put ngi yau tin nhum men. Pi tin imen men ku po kuk e hau hambip u po kuk e ii ngi hi kakyat kakyat po al epon kut tumen.”
40013051	Li klet ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po taku, “Iyi, mara wom ira wungin tin mosop iyi sinsin tunus, wah?” Ti ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Wai, ngon tin Akono men.”
40013052	Kut ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Tumen ma po mosop tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan e hi wa kotngin mi wo sun epo enunu tin api wet pi men, men ken phua ta tin mang tan men, tin wa endara kara me pol mi lahembengin tin yang halung po endara tan li pit min men, men endara homan kara u kho kara kut tumen to al.”
40013053	A-Yesus suuk sii sakalngin emol tin mosop imen kut ma wungin si in ti, men yang yok pi tin imen ma yang li.
40013054	Ma yang me in pi tin ta yang siin men kut, men yang in e kot po mi mang akotngin tin ta hi men, tumen ma po teret ewut wal, ma po sakal taku, “Yang tin ikop men wa mhin ekngin u wungin tin maran kiring kiring e nhum imen weh ko pit a?
40013055	Iyi, yang tin ikop men wiru sun tin kum epo mang to endara kara maksin ningngin men kha ikop ako, wah? Epo tonin men po sikia wut yan e-Maria ako, wah? U ehuro yang men kha a-Yemis u a-Yoses u a-Saimon u a-Yudas kut tumen ako, wah?
40013056	U yang ehulut hi mosop kha kuk to it iyi kut tumen ako, wah? Si taku tua ma yang ti kop wa wungin tin mosop imen ko pit ere?”
40013057	Tumen ma po mi hi maan pit mi yang. Ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Pokngin ta men ku yan om ewin akomen, si wo mulusngin tin tan siin weh men u mi po tin hi khuuk wal mang ta hi then men misan kha yan om epon men.”
40013058	Ma yang ku ning wungin maran kiring kiring tin nhum men munuman epo pi tin taku ta yang siin men akomen, sinsin men si in epo po tin ku wo hi phep som men.
40014001	Minan tin imen ma a-Herot tin phuan tin nhum men hul put sakalngin epo a-Yesus,
40014002	ma yang ko wo ta po tin kum tan men taku, “Yang tin imen men a-Yon tin ning baptais nginangan men kha imen ako. Yang men khek kyok si tunus mi po tin huu kho men, wala emhong tin maran kiring kiring imen siin iis in mi yang men.”
40014003	Epo kho ma a-Herot kasum a-Yon ma yang kan kan sun, ma yang wa sun sup li in mi mang tin po phuan kan kan sun li pit min ewin men pit mi e-Herodias tin titie wiron a-Pilip men.
40014004	Epo kho ma a-Yon wo ta a-Herot taku, “Men uluungin epo ngon epo wut tin ku me ung tap men.”
40014005	Ma a-Herot taku wi sun ko hun, takuma yang lem pit wo po tin wa ilio angan men, epo po ion a-Yon ken yang e pokngin ta men.
40014006	Si ungunan tin a-Herot ko khuukngin epon kho men si, ma po ning kakaomngin ta epo yang, men e-Herodias erun me yik to mara po ma a-Herot min tunusngin pit po wut.
40014007	Tumen ma yang wo kuk mara wut ma yang tung tung isasele epo yang ku wa endara si ta wut tin ani tua e ku wut ku min epon weh men.
40014008	Ma tonin sakal ta wut kho, tumen ma wut ko wo ta a-Herot ti, “E wa a-Yon tin ning baptais nginangan men mhin me epo ngo ko pit iyi, men ku ko ung yanga kambuyu ta.”
40014009	Ti ma yang tin sinkhaung men min urut i. Takuma yang tung tung isasele kho, kuru po tin me epo kakaomngin men nuk to yang kut tumen, tumen ma yang wo epo po ku wai si ta wut.
40014010	Tumen ma yang tih po li klat wut a-Yon mi mang tin po phuan kan kan sun li pit min ewin men.
40014011	Ma po wa yang mhin ko ung yanga kambuyu ta me epo wut tin wala men, ma wut wai li epo tonin.
40014012	Li klet ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yon men me wa yang emkusin li, po kil i, anima po li pok a-Yesus.
40014013	Ma a-Yesus hul kut, men yang mang ta pi tin imen ma yang si wo naak ma yang li in ta tuon pi tahunggu ta. Takuma po wa ilio angan hul, men po ko yok mi pi tin nunhum e ung e li li men ma po muk muk li ira yang.
40014014	Ma a-Yesus li pol, men yang ion po tin wa ilio angan men men munuman takut, ma yang min suk po ma yang mlis saihngin ta po tin ta hi e sasaih men.
40014015	Li pi luk angan kut ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men me pol ta yang, ma po sakal taku, “Pi tin iyi men tahunggu, u sinang maran men li ko kut tumen. E tih tih po tin wa ilio angan men lu, kuma po li sup sup pi tin tanuan e ung e li li men ma po kul endara aiingin ta hi weh.”
40014016	Takuma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Men ku tunus epo po ku li som. Tuo wom kha ku wa endara aiingin si po iini men.”
40014017	Ti ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Ko pit iyi men pim a kuk to beret khaut eip u ili ponwal kut tumen misan.”
40014018	Tumen ma yang ko wo ti, “Wom wai mu iyi epo ngo.”
40014019	Kut ma yang wo ta po tin wa ilio angan men epo po ku ko nuk e li li yanga epilil. Kut ma yang wa beret tin khaut eip men u ili tin ponwal men kut tumen, ma yang maran li si wet pi, men yang kines epo Got ku wa emhong ko pon, anima yang tik tik i ma yang kikyu po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men epon. Ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men li kikyu po tin wa ilio angan men epon.
40014020	Tumen ma po mosop ii endara kut, ma po mut mut, ma po si tatamuk kenngin tin plak nginan e iso nuk men ko mi elik airun khum ta u ponwal tumen si kol kol.
40014021	Epo po tin ii endara men men enu hi taku khum khum khum eip (5,000) wa tumen, men masang, si po wala u po hoin kara maksin me sup to sun kut tumen.
40014022	Li klet anima kerek engun ma a-Yesus ko soh po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ma po li si wo naak kuma po kho li muk yang pilin ekora, si kuma yang misan in ma yang tirih po tin wa ilio angan men li.
40014023	Kut ma yang tih po tin wa ilio angan men li kut, men yang li si po pi emian ta tuon kuma yang kines Got. Ma pi ung e ii me kut, men yang misan in ko pit imen.
40014024	Si naak men kho li in tak li ehung emin, men esap kuk e psik psik naak, epo eip men me mara po angan.
40014025	Ma to pi sinang maran tin to pi tin pit e kien kien men ma a-Yesus li epo po, men yang muk muk yanga ehung li.
40014026	Ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ion yang, men po enu hi yang, ma po sakal taku, “Men yuwun ta kha men!” Ma po lem ma po hau wal.
40014027	Si kerek engun ma a-Yesus wo li kamlas po taku, “Mi wom pit nhing, epo tuo ngo khae, ma wom lem asin.”
40014028	Ti ma a-Pita sakal wet yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, taku tuo ngon, men ku e wo ma nga ti epo ngon yanga ehung.”
40014029	Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Yo, e muh.” Ti ma a-Pita kho li ko wo naak, men yang taku muk muk yanga ehung taku li epo a-Yesus.
40014030	Takuma yang ion eip men pit hambip weh, men yang lem, ma yang taku ing ko, men yang hau ti, “Ngon tin Akono men, e palolo ngo.”
40014031	Ti ma kerek engun ma a-Yesus wilin li kasum po wili sun, ma yang sakal ta sun taku, “Ngon tin wo phepngin tap kiak men, tuni ma mip ponwal?”
40014032	Ma wulong kho li si wo naak, men eip put mut.
40014033	Kut ma po tin kuk wo naak men me powut hi ko suul mara yang, ma po sakal taku, “Irawin weh, ngon men Wiru Got.”
40014034	Ma po ut put ehung kho kut, khama po li sup wo mulusngin Genesaret.
40014035	Ma po tin api tin imen hop yang, men po tih sakalngin li yanga pi mosop sup e klet, kut ma po espo sun tin mosop e sasaih men me epo yang,
40014036	ma po hau nuk sii khi yang weh epo po ku kah porili moolngin tin ta yang men engun. Ma po esini kah kah po moolngin ta yang, men mosop weh si turunus.
40015001	Minan tin imen ma po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin plesnginan men u po Parisi kut tumen, tin hi api Yerusalem men, men me epo a-Yesus ma po sakal taku,
40015002	“Tua ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngon men hik put sakalngin tin po akokono tin ta it men pat wal i na wo hi me epo it men? Epo po ku kikhis po wili hi kho som, si po ii beret engun.”
40015003	Ti ma yang ko sakal wet po taku, “Tua ma wom maksin taku hik put wungin sinsin tin ta Got men epo sakalngin tin wom pat wal i na wo wom me men?
40015004	Epo Got wo maran ko klat ti, ‘Ngon men ku wop nuk wet wiramap ngong tonim’; u ‘Taku po ta wo lengwal epo wiraman wa tonin, men ku po wini weh ko hun.’
40015005	Si wom men wo taku, ‘Taku po ta sakal ta wiraman wa tonin taku, “Naumngin ta mom tin ani mom taku wai hang ngo men men wo ngo ung won ta Got kho kut,” ti -
40015006	taku yang wo tumen, men ku yang nhio wo wulong angan ta kyok akomen.’ Ma wungin tin tumen kha wom ning sakalngin sinsin tin ta Got men ko amiron nginan engun epon men, si kuma wom ira wungin sinsin tin tuo wom pat wal i na wo wom me men engun.
40015007	Wom tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men, pokngin Aisaia men nut sakalngin epo wom taku,
40015008	‘Po masang to sun wala tin imen me tikayung ngo epo wo hi, u po wa ya ngo si epo wungin tin po sakal i men, si mi po men in hin epo ngo ako.
40015009	Ma wungin tin ku enun ung hut som men kha po uluu ngo epon men, men po kot sun epo sakalngin, men po ira wungin sinsin tin ta po tunus men engun.’”
40015010	Ti ma a-Yesus yuk po tin wa ilio angan men me epo yang, men yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom hul ma mara wom iran weh:
40015011	Endara tin li sup wo po ta ani ku ning i ma po tin imen in lengwal to mara Got epon men akomen. Si sakalngin tin me pol wo po ta men, tin imen kha ning i ma po in lengwal to mara Got epon men.”
40015012	Kut ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men me sakal ta yang taku, “Iyi, e ion i epo po Parisi hul sakalngin tin imen, men po mi hi ung lengwal?”
40015013	Takuma yang ko wo taku, “Endara mosop tin Yok tin in ili wet pi men ku wha i akomen, men kuli Yok lokngin to sun imut si.
40015014	Wom mang ta po kuk. Po men mara hi mhi ma po li muk sun tin mara hi mhi men. Ma taku po ta tin maran mhi men li muk sun ta tin maran mhi men, men ku wulong likiong li poplong ko mi nahu.”
40015015	Kut ma a-Pita sakal wet yang taku, “E pok pim epo wungin emol tin imen sinsin wet.”
40015016	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo taku, “Iyi, wom e iso kingung mi engin maksin kut ti?
40015017	Iyi, wom men ku iso mara wom ples i tunus som, wah? Epon taku endara ta li sup wo po ta, men li ko mi kuman ma li put pias ton li.
40015018	Si sakalngin tin me pol mi wo po ta men men in pit po ewhat po weh ma me pol. Sakalngin tin imen kha ning i ma po tin imen in lengwal to mara Got epon men.
40015019	Epo wungin tin in mi po ma me pol men men sinsin ti, tulun hungin tin pit po wungin lengwal men, wi po ko hun, sup si khi sun, lulus to sun amen engun, tipngin, pok put torokngin pit po sun, u wungin ton mingin kut tumen.
40015020	Wungin tin mosop imen kha ning i ma po ta in to sokongin to mara Got epon men, si po ta ku khis po wilin kho som, si ii endara engun, tin imen ani ku ning i ma po ta in to sokongin to mara Got epon men akomen.”
40015021	Li klet ma a-Yesus ko alwup pi tin imen ma yang li sup wo mulusngin Taia to sun Saidon.
40015022	Ha, wut wala Kenan ta men yok pi tin tan imen ma me hau si ta yang taku, “Aluuh, ngon tin Akono e Wiru a-Dewit men, mip suk ngo! Eruk men emiun lengwal ta kasum wut, ma mumhek mi wut weh.”
40015023	Takuma yang ku sakal ta wet wut akomen. Ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men me kines yang taku, “E tih wut lu, epo wut wuh haungin ira pim weh.”
40015024	Takuma yang ko wo taku, “Yok tih ngo me epo po kara som. Awu. Men epo po tin khuuk wal Israel e kuk ken sipsip tin huuspit men misan.”
40015025	Kut ma wut tin wala men me powut ko suul mara yang, ma wut sakal taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, som nhio wo ngo!”
40015026	Ti ma yang sakal wet wut taku, “Taku pim a wa beret tin ta po hoin men ko ta elwa tin tururun engun men, men ku tunus akomen.”
40015027	Ti ma wut ko wo taku, “Wai, ngon tin Akono men, takuma elwa tin tururun weh imen men maksin ii endara tin plak ko wet suyung tin ta phua tin ta li men kut tumen ako.”
40015028	Kut ma a-Yesus sakal wet wut taku, “Auweh, ngon tin wala imen, wo phepngin tap men nhum. Men ku weh si epo ngon ken mip epon men.” Ma minan tin min salak imen kha wut tin wala imen erun kyok si tunus epon men.
40015029	Li klet ma a-Yesus mang ta pi tin imen, si yang li yek porili ehung Galili ma yang li si po pi emian ma yang li ko ung po pi tin imen.
40015030	Kut ma po tin wa ilio angan hambip kara men me epo yang, ma po espo sun tin khi hi huu weh men, u po tin mara hi mhi men, u po tin wo hi korip men, u po tin sokongin maran kiring kiring lek hi men u po munuman kara kyok kut tumen. Ma po wa sun ko nuk e li li sii khi a-Yesus, ma yang mimlis saihngin ta po li.
40015031	Tumen ma po tin wa ilio angan men teret wo sun minan tin po ion sun tin wo hi korip men si sakal, u po tin pokoi hi mi kulukluk men si turunus, u po tin khi hi huu weh men si muk muk, u po tin mara hi mhi men si mara hi plas kut tumen. Ma po wa Got tin ta hi Israel men yan si.
40015032	Kut ma a-Yesus yuk po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men me epo yang ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Mi ngo suk po tin wa ilio angan men, epo po kuk to ngo ungunan khaut miuk kho me pol homani, ma po ku ii endara kara akomen. Ma ngo men ku tih po li to elwip ta hi engun akomen, epon akuli po li emuhin a hi wiak wiak ira soput.”
40015033	Ti ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ko sakal ta yang taku, “Kuli it wa endara aiingin pi tin tahunggu iyi ko pit ia weh, si po tin wa ilio angan e munuman weh iyi iini ma po mut mut?”
40015034	Ti ma a-Yesus ko kines po taku, “Si wom kuk to beret khaut esini?” Ti ma po ko wo taku, “Beret khaut ponwal me sup u ili tururun sakun kara kut tumen.”
40015035	Tumen ma yang wo ta po tin wa ilio angan men epo po ku ko nuk ko nuk yanga mulus.
40015036	Ma yang wa beret tin khaut ponwal me sup men u ili kut tumen, ma yang sam sam Got epon kut, anima yang tik tik i ma yang kikyu po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men epon, ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men li kikyu po tin wa ilio angan men epon.
40015037	Tumen ma po mosop ii endara ma po mut mut. Ma po li tatamuk endara misikin tin iso nuk men ko mi elik amurun nunhum khaut ponwal me sup si kol kol.
40015038	Epo po tin ii endara men enu hi khaut khum khum khum mnal (4,000), men masang, si po wala to sun hoin kara me sup to sun kut tumen.
40015039	Kut ma yang tih po tin wailio angan men li, si yang li si wo naak ma yang li in wo mulusngin Maktala .
40016001	Li klet ma po Parisi to sun Sadyusi me karong yang ma po kines yang epo yang ku suk mara po epo tosukngin tin api wet pi men ta.
40016002	Ma yang sakal wet po taku, “Pi luk angan men wom wo taku, ‘Pi men ku nilil, epo pi whoh’;
40016003	u pi kingkauk angan men wom wo taku, ‘Pi punu men ku si, epo pi whoh u pi maran kalwung kut tumen.’ Wom tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men, wom ion i tin ku wom hop pi maran men, si wom khuk pon tin ku wom ion tosukngin tin pok put elup tin wom kuk min homani men.
40016004	Po tin khuuk wal homani e wungin ta hi lengwal e hi kuk e ning wungin sup si khi al epo Got men tohuh epo po ku ion tosukngin ta, ma tosukngin ta men ku wangin si ta po akomen, si tosukngin tin ta pokngin a-Yona men misan.” Ti ma yang mang ta po kuk, si yang li.
40016005	Si po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men kho li pol pilin ekora, men po tulu hi som epo po tin ku wa beret kara men.
40016006	Kut ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po taku, “Wom men ku mara wom si kuk ma wom haum tunus epo yiis tin ta po Parisi to sun Sadyusi men.”
40016007	Ti ma po ko pok wal lunga hi ma po wo taku, “Men epon tin ku it wa beret kara akomen.”
40016008	Si a-Yesus ion wungin tin ta po imen, ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Auh, wom tin wo phepngin ta wom kiak men, tuni ma wom sakal lunga wom epo wom ku wa beret kara mu to wom som?
40016009	Iyi, epo wom men ku iso mara wom ira wungin sinsin tunus som wa tulu wom som epo beret khaut eip tin ta po tin khaut khum khum khum eip men (5,000) u elik amurun tin khaut esini e wom non non i kho men ti, wah?
40016010	U tulu wom som epo beret tin khaut eip u ponwal me sup e ta po tin khum khum khum mnal men (4,000) u elik amurun tin khaut esini e wom non non i kho men ti, wah?
40016011	Tuni ma wom ku mara wom iis i som epo ngo ku sakal ta wom epo beret weh akomen, si nga wo ta wom epo wom men ku haum tunus epo yiis tin ta po Parisi to sun Sadyusi men weh.”
40016012	Kut ma po tulu hi hu kut epo yang ku sakal ta po epo po ku haum epo yiis tin ta beret men akomen, si epo kotngin tin ta po Parisi to sun Sadyusi men.
40016013	Li klet ma a-Yesus li sup wo mulusngin tin ta pi Sisaria Pilipai men, men yang ko kileng po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Po kara ani wo epo ngo tin Wiru Po Tunus men are?”
40016014	Ti ma po ko wo taku, “Po kara wo epo ngon men a-Yon tin ning baptais nginangan men, si po kara wo epo ngon men a-Elaiha, u po kara kyok men wo epo ngon men a-Yeremaia wa po pokngin ta tumen.”
40016015	Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Si tuo wom wo taku ngo men ara weh?”
40016016	Ti ma a-Saimon Pita sakal wet sun taku, “Ngon men Mesaia, tin Wiru Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men kha imen.”
40016017	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet sun taku, “Saimon, ngon tin wiru a-Yona men, emhong tin ta Got men ko po ngon ako, epo po tin to elit hi u kalolwa hi kut tumen ani ku suk marap epo wungin tin imen som, si Yok tin in ili wet pi men kha suk marap epon men.
40016018	Ma ngo ku wo tap maksin epo ngon men a-Pita, ma po enah tin imen kha kuli nga ning palu walngin tin ta ngo men si ung pon men, ma sowon tin ta pi tin ta hunngin men taku men ku apalukngin epon, takuma men kuli huuspit maran kut tumen.
40016019	Ma ngo ku wa endara tin ta enunu tin api wet pi men tin ku e kaklas epon men si tap, ma ela tin ku e kan kan i wo mulus men, men kuli kan kanngin ili wet pi maksin kut tumen, u ela tin ku e plos i wo mulus men, men kuli plosngin ili wet pi maksin kut tumen.”
40016020	Kut ma yang uluu po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men epo po men ku pok po ta epo yang tin Mesaia men asin.
40016021	Minan tin imen ma li men a-Yesus hosi wungin epo yang ku suk mara po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men epo yang men ku weh li Yerusalem, ma yang wuh wungin maran kiring kiring yanga wili po tin akokono men u po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men, u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men kut tumen, ma po wi yang ko hun, ma ungunan miuk mili anima yang khekngin kyok si tunus.
40016022	Kut ma a-Pita ko wa yang li pol woringin, ma yang ko hosin epo yang ku tep sun, ma yang wo taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, wungin tin imen men ku in hin epo ngon. Epo wungin tin imen kuli si tap akomen!”
40016023	Tumen ma yang phae maran ma yang ko wo ta a-Pita taku, “Nolongin, e yang ma e mu lu wetpo ngo. Ngon men taku ning i ma nga plong ko, epo ngon ku tulup hu pit po endara tin ta Got men akomen, si ngon men tulup hu pit po endara tin ta po tunus men engun kha men.”
40016024	Kut ma a-Yesus sakal ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Taku po ta min epon ku me ira ngo, men ku wetpon wai tuon, si lat sa wlong put wal tin tan men si, ma me ira ngo.
40016025	Epon taku po ta min ko wo tunusngin tan tuon, men kuli huuspit ton kyok, si taku po ta min alang si tunusngin tan epon ku mut eya ngo, men kuli pon tan kyok.
40016026	Epon taku po ta espo endara mosop tin ta pi mulus men, si huuspit to enun tan tuon, men kuli endara tin mosop imen men kuli nhio won tuon tua? Wa po tunus ta men kuli wa ela weh ku sup wet enun tan kyok?
40016027	Epo Wiru Po Tunus kuli me mi moolngin tin nhum e ta Wiraman men to po tihngin tin tan men, ma minan tin imen men ku yang wa talungin si ta po mosop tin emhut wungin tin po mosop then then ning ning i weh men.
40016028	Nga wo anuh ta wom ti, epo po kara nuk iyi, men ku ion hunngin kho som, si po ion Wiru Po Tunus men ku me mi enunu tin tan men.
40017001	Li klet ma ungunan ta me sup kho li, anima a-Yesus ko wa a-Pita u a-Yemis u a-Yon tin wiron men, ti, ma yang espo wuluk ma ngyuk li si put pi nomalak ta li kuk ta tuo ngyuk.
40017002	Ma yang pon phae to mara wuluk, ma yang maran men ngin ngin ken sinang men, u moolngin tin ta yang men pon phae ko pon eun weh ken pi tin mha men kut tumen.
40017003	Ha, a-Moses ngong a-Elaiha men si put plo nginan ta wuluk, ma wulong nuk e sakal to a-Yesus.
40017004	Kut ma a-Pita ko sakal ta a-Yesus taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, men tunus epo pyuk tin ku kuk iyi. Taku mip epon, men ku e mang si pyuk a ning ning mang ausel khaut miuk, tap ta, u ta a-Moses ta, u ta a-Elaiha ta tumen.”
40017005	Ma yang iso pit e sakal, men hingis pon engil engil ta ko hawus wuluk. Ma kerek engun ma wut po ta me pol mi hingis ma sakal taku, “Yang tin imen men Wiruk tin mi ngo epon weh men, tin mi ngo tunusngin pit won weh men. Wom men ku hul wet yang weh!”
40017006	Ma wuluk tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men hul wungin tin imen, men wuluk poplong ko mara ngyuk ko wo mulus ma wuluk lem hambip takut.
40017007	Ma a-Yesus me wilin kah po wuluk, ma yang sakal taku, “Myuk si nuk, si myuk lem asin.”
40017008	Ma wuluk mara ngyuk pham si, men ku wuluk mara ngyuk kon po ta maksin som, si a-Yesus misan.
40017009	Ma wuluk me ko po pi, men a-Yesus uluu wuluk taku, “Myuk men ku lu pok po ta epo tosukngin tin mara myuk kon i men asin, si men ku nuk weh li pol minan tin kuli Wiru Po Tunus khek kyok si tunus mi po tin huu kho men.”
40017010	Ti ma wuluk tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ko kines yang taku, “Tumen, si tua ma po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men wo epo a-Elaiha kha ku weh me muk men?”
40017011	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet wuluk taku, “Irawin, epo a-Elaiha kha ku me muk men, ma yang ku nemeh endara mosop kyok si tunus.
40017012	Takuma nga wo ta wom ti, epo a-Elaiha men kho me in kut, ma po kila yang, ma po ning wungin epo yang ta mi hi engun. Tumen kut kha kuli Wiru Po Tunus men tikayung epon ku li wuh wungin yanga wili po maksin kut tumen.”
40017013	Kut ma wuluk mara ngyuk ples wungin kut epo yang sakal ta wuluk los po a-Yon tin ning baptais nginangan men ako.
40017014	Ma wuluk kho me pol ta po tin wa ilio angan men kut, khama yang ta me epo a-Yesus ma yang powut ko suul mara sun, ma yang sakal taku,
40017015	“Ngon tin Akono men, ngon men ku mip suk wiruk, epo yang men in to saihngin lengwal tin si ta yang ma li tok yang men ma yang wuh i weh. Epo yang in e plong ko nuk put ngi yau u mi eki kut tumen kokyok kokyok.
40017016	Tumen ma nga wa yang me epo po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngon men, takuma po men ku kakha kuma po mlis saihngin ta yang li akomen.”
40017017	Kut ma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Auh, wom tin khuuk wal to wo phepngin ta wom om e wungin ta wom ulil men, to pi elini ma ngo ku iso weh in to wom? To pi elini ma ngo ku iso wuh wungin ta wom? Wom wa yang mu epo ngo ko pit iyi.”
40017018	Ti ma a-Yesus ko pio emiun tin lengwal men, ma emiun li pol mi yang. Ma yang tin hoin men si tunus min salak.
40017019	Li klet ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men me pol ta yang pi ta tin po misa hi li kuk epon men ma po sakal taku, “Tunia weh ma pim a khuk po engin tin ku pim a luul to emiun tin iyi ku li pol men?”
40017020	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po taku, “Sinsin men epo wo phepngin ta wom men kiak ako. Epo nga sakal anuh ta wom, taku wo wom phep e kai mastet ihun tin tururun weh men ta, men ku wom sakal ta put pi tin imen taku, ‘E si ko pit iyi ma e lu pit imen,’ men ku teng si ma li ako. Ma wungin ta men ku wom khuk pon akomen.
40017021	Takuma emiun tin tumen ku li pol engun akomen. Awu. Taku wom kines u wom suuh mi wom weh kha kuli emiun li pol men ako.”
40017022	Kut si po iso kuk li li Galili, men a-Yesus sakal ta po taku, “Tikayung ma Wiru Po Tunus men ku po wai sup yanga wili po tunus,
40017023	ma po ku wi yang ko hun, ma ungunan miuk mili khama yang khekngin kyok si tunus.” Tumen ma po mi hi urut i weh.
40017024	Li klet ma po li pol Kaperneam, men po tin palu takis ta mang auluungin men me epo a-Pita ma po sakal taku, “Iyi, yang tin kot wom men ku kul takis tin ta mang auluungin men ewin wa pi engun?”
40017025	Ti ma yang ko wo, “Wai.” Ma yang li pol mang, men a-Yesus haum soput yang, ma a-Yesus sakal taku, “Saimon, e phaeng taku tua? Po tin sinkhaung e ta pi mulus men men wa takis maran kiring kiring hang are, hang po husani hi wa hang po enginin, wah?”
40017026	Ti ma a-Pita ko wo wet sun taku, “Hang po enginin ako.” Ti ma a-Yesus sakal ta yang taku, “Tumen ma po tin husani hi men wo hi pias kut.
40017027	Takuma epon akuli it ning i ma po mi hi maan pit po it, tumen ma e lu mi ehung, ma e psik kanangin tin po as ili epon men lu ko mi ehung, ma e wa ili tin me si muk men, si e pakat won, men ku e pon ta ulu ta. Ma e wai lu si ta po kuma mut eya ngo u mut eya ngon kut tumen.”
40018001	Minan tin imen ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men me epo yang ma po sakal taku, “Ara weh men ku si yan pos epo hi kara mi enunu tin api wet pi men?”
40018002	Kut ma a-Yesus yuk po hoin ta me epo yang, men yang wa sun ko ung emin po,
40018003	ma yang sakal taku, “Nga wo anuh ta wom, epon taku wom ku phae ko ken po hoin men som, men ku wom lu sup mi enunu tin api wet pi men angan akomen.
40018004	Tumen ma taku po ta wa yan ko e ken yang tin hoin iyi, men kuli yan pos epo po mosop mi enunu tin api wet pi men ako.
40018005	Ma taku po ta wa sun hoin ta ken yang tin hoin iyi epo ya ngo, men wa ngo kha men.
40018006	Si taku po ta ning i ma po tin tururun e wo hi phep pit wo ngo iyi men ta plong ko epo lasin, men tunus epo po tin imen taku po wa enah tin po tut wit ihun epon men ta ko kuk wut, ma po mang tan ko mi wiu tin muut men ma um eki ma hun.
40018007	Auh, won maikngin tin nhum men kaeng po tin ung wo mulus men sinsin men epo po tin ning i ma sun plong ko epo lasin men. Epo wungin tin po ning i ma sun plong ko epo lasin men ku weh si ako, takuma won maikngin tin nhum men men ku si po po ta tin lasin si yanga wilin men.
40018008	Taku wilip ta wa khip ta pit pit hut ngon lu ning lasin, men ku e klat put, si e psik i lu. Tunus epon men ku e lu sup mi tunusngin to khip then ta wa wilip then ta tin kis men, si taku e in to wilip ponwal wa khip ponwal, men kuli e psikngin ko in put ngi yau tin sindak men.
40018009	U taku marap ta pit pit hut ngon lu ning lasin, men ku e slok i, si e psik i lu. Tunus epon men ku e lu sup mi tunusngin to marap then ta, si taku e in to marap ponwal, men kuli e psikngin ko in put ngi yau tin ta pi lengwal men.
40018010	Mara wom si kuk, epon akuli wom ion po tin tururun imen ta ken i e lengwal engun men asin, epo nga sakal ta wom epo ili wet pi men tihngin ta po men mara hi kon Yok tin in ili wet pi men maran kokyok kokyok ako.
40018011	Epo Wiru Po Tunus men me epon ku palolo po tin huuspit men ako.
40018012	Wom wo taku tua? Taku yang ta in to sipsip khum khum ta (100), ma sipsip tin imen taku ta li epo min ma kis, men ku yang mang ta sipsip tin khum mnal me sup u mnal me sup tumen (99) kuk, si yang li langun epo li tin li kis men ako, wah?
40018013	Ma taku yang kyok li pon tan, men nga wo anuh ta wom, epo yang men min keh weh epo sipsip tin imen nhum epo sipsip tin khum mnal me sup u mnal me sup (99), ti, tin ku li ta kis akomen.
40018014	Tumen ma Wirama wom tin ung ili wet pi men maran luun epo po ta mi sun tin tururun imen ku ta huuspit asin.
40018015	Ma taku wirom ning lasin ta epo ngon, men ku e lu pok yang epo lasin ta yang tin nuk lunga ngon u yang tumen ta tuo mom wet. Taku yang hul wet ngon, men ku e wa wirom kyok.
40018016	Si taku wirom ku hul wet ngon som, men ku e lu wa wulong ponwal wa wuluk khaut miuk kyok me, kumali epo wulong ponwal wa wuluk khaut miuk tin mara ngyuk pet sakalngin tunus men kha kuli wungin mosop kaek singin si mi wo wuluk men.
40018017	Wa taku yang ku hul wet wungin ta wuluk som, men ku e lu pok palu walngin. Wa taku yang ku hul wet sakalngin ta palu walngin maksin som, men ku mara wom ion yang men in e ken po tin enginin e pong epo Got men ta u ken po tin palu takis ta po phuan nginangan men ta kut tumen.
40018018	Nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo ela tin ku wom kan kan i wo mulus men, men kuli Got kan kan i ili wet pi maksin kut tumen ako; u ela tin ku wom plos i wo mulus men, men kuli Got plos i ili wet pi maksin kut tumen ako.
40018019	Kyok men nga wo ta wom, epon taku wulong ponwal tin ta wom men mi ngong then wo mulus epo wungin tin tun tira e ku wulong kines epon men ta, men ku Yok tin ung ili wet pi men ning i tumen epo wulong maksin kut tumen ako.
40018020	Epo pi tin akani e ku wulong ponwal wa wuluk miuk me palu wal epo ya ngo men, men nga in imen lunga wuluk.”
40018021	Minan tin imen a-Pita me epo yang ma yang sakal taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, taku worok ning lasin ta epo ngo ma nga mang tan, men ku nga ning i angan khaut esini kyok? Men ku nga ning i angan ponwal me sup, wah?”
40018022	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Ma ken nga wo ta ngon epo angan ponwal me sup misan akomen, takuma nga wo epo khum ponwal me sup (70) angan khaut ponwal me sup kyok.
40018023	Tumen ma enunu tin api wet pi men men ken yang sinkhaung ta tin taku ples naumngin ta po tin kum wo yang men.
40018024	Ma yang ko hosi naumngin ples nginan, men po wa yang ta me epo sun tin niklak khum khum khum khum ta (10,000) ta yang tin sinkhaung men pit won men.
40018025	Ma yang khung po engin epo yang ku kul naumngin tin imen, tumen ma phua tin ta yang men wo epo po ku tih yang to titien hi husani hi u endara mosop tin ta yang men kut tumen, kuma naumngin tin imen men ku kulngin.
40018026	Tumen ma yang tin kum wo phua men me powut ko suul sii khi sun, ma yang sakal taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, e wuh i ta ngo li kho wet, si kumali nga iso uspo naumngin mosop si tap.’
40018027	Kut ma yang tin phua tan men min suk sun, ma yang mang ta sun li won pias, u yang mang ta naumngin tin tan men kut tumen.
40018028	Takuma yang tin kum wo sun tin phuan men tak me pol ta sun tin ta ngong e ngong kum then wo sun tin phuan men tin eyuk tan then ta pit wo sun men. Ma yang wilin si ung wut sun, ma yang wo taku, ‘Tuon, e kul naumngin ta ngo tin pit wo ngon men akai!’
40018029	Tumen ma yang tin ngong kum then wo sun tin phuan men plong ko nuk sii khi sun, ma yang sakal taku, ‘E wuh i ta ngo li kho wet, si kumali nga iso uspo naumngin mosop si tap.’
40018030	Takuma yang maran luun, ma yang li psik sun li sup mi mang tin po kan kan sun li pit min ewin men, men ku in timen li pol minan tin kuli yang ples naumngin tan mosop men.
40018031	Kut ma po tin hi kum then wo sun tin phuan men ion wungin tin yang ning i men, men po mi hi urut i weh, ma po me pok sun tin phuan ta hi men epo wungin tin mosop e ningngin men.
40018032	Li klet ma yang tin phuan men yuk sun me pol ta yang, khama yang wo ta sun taku, ‘Ngon tin kum ta ngo e wungin tap lengwal men, nga mang ta naumngin tin nhum e pit po ngon men kho epon tin e hau nuk sii khi ngo men.
40018033	Tunus epo ngon men ku mip suk yang tin mom kum then men ken ngo tin mi ngo suk ngon men, wah?’
40018034	Ma yang tin phuan men yan sal, ma yang wa sun si in yanga wili po tin ku wa won maanngin si ta yang men weh li pol minan tin ku yang ples naumngin tin pit wo yang men mosop.
40018035	Wungin tin tumen kha ku Yok tin ung ili wet pi men ning i epo wom maksin kut tumen, men taku wom then then ku mang ta wungin tin po kara ning i epo wom e yek ta sun tin siik men li epo mi wom weh akomen.”
40019001	A-Yesus suuk sii sakalngin tin mosop imen ma wungin si in ti, men yang li pol wo mulusngin Yudia tin ung eki Yodan pilin ekora men.
40019002	Ma po tin wa ilio angan hambip kara men ira yang, ma yang mimlis saihngin ta po ko pit imen.
40019003	Kuru po Parisi taku karong yang ma po me pon ta yang ma po sakal ta yang taku, “Epo wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men men sam wet wungin epo po ta tin ku tere titien li men sinsin ta ku in tun tira, wah?”
40019004	Ti ma yang sakal wet po taku, “Iyi, sakalngin tin panngin nuk epo yang tin ning po ewo maran men men yang ning po masang u wala kut tumen,
40019005	kuru yang wo taku, ‘Sinsin tin imen kha ku po masang ta mang ta wiraman ngong tonin si li lup to titien, ma wulong si emkusi ngong then men,’ sakalngin tin mosop imen wom ku tiik i kho som, wah?
40019006	Tumen ma wulong ku ponwal kyok akomen. Awu. Wulong men si emkusi ngong then kut. Tumen ma enda tin Got kan kan i to al kut men, men ku po tunus ta plos i kyok asin.”
40019007	Kut ma po sakal ta yang taku, “Taku tua ma a-Moses wo epo po ku wa kisang tin epo enanginngin hik put nginan men ta si ta wut ma tere wut li?”
40019008	Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Sinsin tin epo mi wom tin mi sek sek men kha a-Moses mang ta wom ku hik put enanginngin to titie wom men, takuma tin ewo maran ma me men men ku wungin nuk tumen kho akomen.
40019009	Ma nga wo ta wom ti, taku yang ta hik put enanginngin ta ngong titien, si titien ku ning elwanngin ta som, si yang li enangin wut wala enginin ta kyok, men ning wungin tin po sup si khi wal epon men kha men; u taku yang ta enangin po wala ta tin titien hik put enanginngin ta ngong kho men, men ning wungin tin po sup si khi wal epon men kut tumen kha men.”
40019010	Ti ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men sakal ta yang taku, “Taku wungin nuk tumen lunga yang masang ta ngong titien, men tunus epo po ta ku enangin kyok akomen.”
40019011	Takuma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Po mosop men ku wa wungin tin imen akomen. Awu. Po tin Got wai ko ta hi men misa hi kha ku wai men.
40019012	Epo po kara tin ku enangin ewin akomen men kuk to wungin timen yek mi kuma eleni hi ma ko khuukngin ton kut; si po kara maksin men ku enangin ewin akomen, men po tunus kha ning hi ma hi kuk tumen; si po kara maksin men ku enangin ewin akomen, men po tuo hi ning hi kuk po moran tumen, sinsin epo enunu tin api wet pi men. Taku po ta kakha epon ku wa wungin timen, men ku wai engun.”
40019013	Kut ma po wa po hoin tin turun men me epo yang kuma yang wilin si po hi ma yang kines Got epo po, takuma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men pio po.
40019014	Takuma a-Yesus sakal taku, “Wom mang ta po hoin tin turun men ku me epo ngo engun, si wom uluu po asin. Epo enunu tin api wet pi men men ta po tin tumen.”
40019015	Ma yang wilin si nuk po po kut, anima yang mang ta pi tin imen ma yang li.
40019016	Ha, yang ta me pol ta a-Yesus ma yang sakal ta sun taku, “Ngon tin kot pim e wungin tap tunus men, ngo ku ning wungin tunus ta tunia weh kumali nga wa tunusngin tin sindak men?”
40019017	Tumen ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, “Tunia ma e sikia ngo e tunus? Po ta men ku tunus som, si po then ta misan, men Got ako. Si taku ngon ku lu sup mi tunusngin, men ku e pet kira wungin sinsin put then then weh.”
40019018	Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, “Wungin sinsin put tin ia weh?” Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal ti, “’Ngon men ku wi po ta ko hun asin,’ ‘Ngon men ku ning wungin tin po sup si khi wal men asin,’ ‘Ngon men ku tip enda asin,’ ‘Ngon men ku pok put wungin torokngin pit po po ta asin,’
40019019	‘Ngon men ku wa wiramap ngong tonim ya ngong si,’ u ‘Ngon men ku mip epo po ta tin wom kuk then men ken mip epo ngon tuop men kut tumen.’”
40019020	Ti ma yang tin nerengin men ko sakal ta sun taku, “Wungin tin mosop imen nga iran mosop minan tin nga iso hoin ma me men. Si ela nga iso kalwok epon?”
40019021	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Taku ngon ku in siik weh, men ku e lu, ma e tirih endara mosop tin tap men, ma eyuk tin e wai men men ku e lu kikyu po tin kalwok men epon, khamali miranngin tap pit ili wet pi. Li klet khama e mu ira ngo.”
40019022	Yang tin nerengin men hul wungin tin imen, men yang min urut i ma yang li, epo miranngin ta yang men tang pit.
40019023	Kut ma a-Yesus wo ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Nga wo anuh ta wom ti, epon men khung nginan weh epo po miran ta tin ku li sup mi enunu tin api wet pi men.
40019024	Kuru nga sakal ta wom kyok ti, epo kamel ta ku plek mi sulmu won, men awo mlus nginan epo po miran ta tin ku li sup mi enunu tin ta Got men.”
40019025	Ti ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men hul sakalngin tin imen, men po teret hambip, ma po ko sakal taku, “Timen ma ara ku palolongin weh?”
40019026	Ti ma a-Yesus supa po ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Lunga po tunus men wungin tin imen men khung nginan weh, si hang Got men wungin mosop men awo mlus nginan engun.”
40019027	Kut ma a-Pita ko sakal ta yang taku, “Iis, pim a wetpo pim wa endara mosop si pim a ira ngon. Tumen ma pim kuli wa ele?”
40019028	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po taku, “Nga sakal anuh ta wom ti, epo elup tin kuli endara mosop kyok si turunus ewin min men ma Wiru Po Tunus men kuli ung wo ehus tin tan e to moolngin men kho kut, men kuli wom tin ira ngo men kuli ung e li li wo ehus khaut khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen, ma wom ples wungin ta po tin khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen tin ung e pho po wal then then weh lunga hi Israel men maksin kut tumen ako.
40019029	Ma po mosop tin wetpo hi wa mang wa ehuro hi wa ehulut hi wa po irama hi wa po eleni hi wa titie hi wa husani hi wa mulusngin ta hi tumen, sinsin men epo ya ngo, men kuli hi wa endara khum khum ta (100) si po sun ewi sun tin wetpo hi wai men, u men ku pakuh pongin epo tunusngin tin sindak men maksin kut tumen ako.
40019030	Takuma po munuman tin li muk men kuli kyok me kuk sulung, si po tin kuk sulung men kuli hi kyok li muk.
40020001	Epo enunu tin api wet pi men men ken phua ta tin maran pit wo mulusngin tan men ma yang huus li pol to pi kingkauk angan kuma yang li espo po tin ku li kum mipi wain tin tan men.
40020002	Ma yang min then to po tin ku li kum ta yang men epo po ku wa eyuk khin then then epo ungunan tin imen, li klet anima yang tih po li kum mipi wain tin ta yang men.
40020003	Ma yang kyok li pol to pi tin sinang ngi muru men, men yang ion po kara kyok men nuk engun pi tin po li nal wal epon men,
40020004	ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Wom men ku lu mipi wain maksin kut, ma endara tin siik men kha ku nga wai si ta wom men.’ Ti ma po li.
40020005	Ma yang kyok li pol to pi tin sinang pit bing men u to pi tin yu yu angan men kut tumen, ma yang ning i kai sun tin yang ning i muk men.
40020006	Ma to pi sinang maran tin me sulung epo pi luk angan men ma yang kyok li pol, men yang pon ta po kara men nuk engun, ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Tuni ma wom nuk engun ko pit iyi to pi mhangin tin maran nomalak iyi?’
40020007	Ti ma po ko wo ta yang taku, ‘Epo po ta men ku me wa pim li epo kumang akomen.’ Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, ‘Wom men ku lu mipi wain tin ta ngo men kut tumen, ma endara tin siik men kha kuli wom wai men.’
40020008	Kut ma pi ung e ii angan men phua tin mipi wain tan men sakal ta yang tin maran pit wo endara tin pit mi mang ta yang men taku, ‘E yuk po tin li kum mipi wain men me, ma e kul po, hosingin epo po tin li kum sulung men ung e me epo po tin kho li kum muk men.’
40020009	Ti ma po tin phua li wa hi me kum to pi luk angan men me, men po then then wa eyuk khin then then.
40020010	Li ma po tin li kum muk men me, men po phaeng taku po ku wai nhum epo sun. Takuma po wa eyuk khin then then ken sun tin kara men maksin kut tumen.
40020011	Ma po wa eyuk kut, men po ko sangengngeng pit po yang tin mipi wain tan men,
40020012	ma po sakal taku, ‘Po tin me kum sulung imen men kum to sinang maran then ta misan, ma e ning wungin epo po kai pim tin wuh mi sinang tin ngeng ngeng weh men.’
40020013	Ti ma yang ko sakal wet sun tin ta hi men ta ti, ‘Worok, ngo ku ning ngon lengwal akomen. Iyi, mip then to ngo kho kut epo ngon ku wa eyuk khin then ta ako, wah?
40020014	E wa endara tap ma e lu. Mi ngo epo ngo ku wai si ta yang tin me kum sulung men kai sun tin nga wai si tap men.
40020015	Iyi, men tunus epo endara tin ta ngo weh men men ku nga ning wungin ton to mi ngo weh ako, wah? Wa tua marap nes endara ta po ehuro wom epon tin nga ning wungin tunus epo po men wa tua?’
40020016	Tumen ma po tin me sulung men kuli kyok me muk, si po tin li muk men kuli kyok me sulung. Epo po munuman men Got yuk hi ako, takuma po sakun kara engun kha Got won ung wo hi men.”
40020017	Kut si a-Yesus in e li si Yerusalem, men yang wa po tin khum ta u ponwal tumen me nuk porili soput ma yang wo ta po taku,
40020018	“Wom hul, epo it ku li si Yerusalem, ma Wiru Po Tunus men ku po wai si yanga wili po tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men kut tumen. Ma po ku wo los yang epo yang men ku hun,
40020019	ma po wa yang li sup yanga wili sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kumali po sakal aie ewut yang u po wawlauk yang u po poo poo yang si kuk put sa wlong put wal maksin kut tumen. Li klet ma ungunan tin me miuk angan men anima yang khek kyok si tunus.”
40020020	Minan tin imen ma wut tin khuuk a-Sebedi husanin tin masang ponwal men men me epo yang to husanin masang tin ponwal men, men ngyuk me powut ngyuk ko suul sii khi yang ma wut mhin yuk ko mulus kuma wut kines yang epo sakalngin ta.
40020021	Ma yang sakal ta wut taku, “Mip epo ngon ku wa ele?” Ti ma wut ko wo ta yang taku, “E wo kuma husanik tin masang ponwal iyi men wi ta li ung ewo wilip tin ato sa men u wi ta li ung ewo wilip tin ato ilio men kut tumen mi enunu tin tap men.”
40020022	Takuma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Myuk men ku pon ta endara ta tin tunus e ku myuk kines epon men akomen. Iyi, mom men ku um ko mi karu tin tikayung ma ngo ku um ko min men u mom ku wa baptais tin ngo ku baptais epon men kut tumen, wah?” Ti ma wulong ko wo wet yang taku, “Wai, tuk men ku ning i ako.”
40020023	Tumen ma yang ko wo ta wulong taku, “Irawin, epo mom men ku um ko mi karu tin ku nga um ko min men u mom men ku wa baptais tin ku nga wa baptais epon men kut tumen ako. Si tin ku wi ta ung ewo wili ngo tin ato sa men u wi ta tin ku ung ewo wili ngo tin ato ilio men tumen, men ku ta ngo kuma nga wai si ta mom akomen, si men ku ta po tin ani Yok hihi i ta hi men misa hi.”
40020024	Ma po tin khum ta men hul wungin timen, men po mi hi lengwal takut pit po wulong.
40020025	Si a-Yesus yuk po me epo yang ma yang sakal taku, “Wom men ion i epo po tin mara hi pit wo sun tin ta hi e hi ku khuuk wal Yuda som men men phaeng wo emhong ta hi weh ma po mara hi pit wo sun tin ta hi men, kuru po tin ya hi pos men men tohuh to emhong ta hi weh ma po mara hi pit wo sun tin ta hi men maksin kut tumen ako.
40020026	Takuma wungin men ku nuk tumen lunga wom asin. Awu. Si po ta taku si nhum lunga wom, men ku in ken po ta tin ku kum ta wom men engun.
40020027	U po ta taku li muk epo wom, men ku in ken po ta tin kum wo wom engun men kut tumen.
40020028	Men kai Wiru Po Tunus tin ku me epon ku po kum tan akomen. Awu. Si men me epon ku kum ta po ako, ma yang min alang si tunusngin tan kumali yang kiis li mut eya po tin munuman men.”
40020029	Kut ma po yok Yeriko ma po taku li pol, men po wa ilio angan hambip kara men pet kira yang.
40020030	Ha, wulong ponwal tin mara ngong ko tip tip men men nuk porili soput, men hul epo a-Yesus tin mili men ma wulong wut ngong pit pit taku, “Auweh, ngon tin Akono e Wiru a-Dewit men, ngon men ku mip suk tuk!”
40020031	Ti ma po tin wa ilio angan men uluu wulong epo wulong ku ping wo ngong. Takuma wulong iso wut ngong pit pit hambip weh taku, “Auweh, ngon tin Akono e Wiru a-Dewit men, ngon men ku mip suk tuk!”
40020032	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko ting pit, men yang yuk wulong ma yang wo taku, “Mi mom epo ngo ku ning ele epo mom?”
40020033	Ti ma wulong ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, mi tuk epo tuk ku mara tuk paplas.”
40020034	Tumen ma a-Yesus min suk wulong, ma yang wilin li kah kah mara wulong. Ma kerek engun ma wulong mara ngong paplas, ma wulong si pet kira yang li.
40021001	Li klet ma po li pol tikayung pi Yerusalem kut ma po me pol pi Betpake tin ung sii pi emian Olip men, men a-Yesus tih wulong ponwal tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men li,
40021002	ma yang wo ta wulong ti, “Mom lu sup mi pi tanuan tin ung maran min mom men, ma kerek engun men ku mom pon ta donki ta men kanngin pit, u donki asus ta men kanngin pit to sun kut tumen. Mom plos ngong si mom espo li mu epo ngo.
40021003	Ma taku po ta sakal ta epo mom, men ku mom ko sakal ti, ‘Yang tin Akono men ku ning kumang ta epo li,’ men kuli kerek engun ma yang tih li kyok me.”
40021004	Wungin tin mosop imen men si kuma wungin si enun ung hut sun tin pokngin pok put kho men taku,
40021005	“Wom wo ta po masang to sun wala tin ung po pi Saion men taku, ‘Wom hul, epo yang tin sinkhaung ta wom men men ku me epo wom, men ku me ken po tin ya hi om men, ma si ung wo donki ta, men donki asus ta tin sun khuuk i men.’”
40021006	Tumen ma wulong ponwal tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men li ning i ken sun tin a-Yesus wo ta wulong epon men.
40021007	Ma wulong kho wa donki to sun asus me, men wulong wa moolngin tin ta ngong men si ung wo donki tin ponwal imen, anima po wa yang si ung wo moolngin tin imen.
40021008	Ma po tin wa ilio angan hambip men munuman yas yas moolngin ta hi ko put soput. Si po kara kaklat sa wilin ma hi tep tep i ko put soput kut tumen.
40021009	Kut ma po tin wa ilio angan e kara li muk men u po tin kara e ira yang men kut tumen men nuk e wut hi pit pit taku, “Yang tin Wiru a-Dewit men ku it sam sam i weh! Emhong tin ta Got men ku in epo yang tin me epo yang tin Akono men yan men! Sam samngin men ku li epo yang tin Sinkhaung men!”
40021010	Ma yang kho me sup Yerusalem kut, men po mosop tin ung pi tin imen men mi hi lup si, ma po sakal taku, “Yang tin imen men ara weh?”
40021011	Tumen ma po tin wa ilio angan men ko sakal ti, “Yang tin imen men a-Yesus tin pokngin e me epo pi Nasaret tin ung wo mulusngin Galili men kha men.”
40021012	Kut ma a-Yesus li sup mi mang auluungin ma yang luul to po tin kul kul endara u wa ulu sup wet endara kut tumen mi mang auluungin li pol mara so, kuru yang paphae suyung ta po tin nuk e wa ulu wiewi sun men u ehus ta po tin nuk e wa ulu sup wet emon wulus men kut tumen.
40021013	Ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, ‘Mang tin ta ngo men men ku po sikian mang tin ku po kines ngo min men kha imen,’ takuma wom men ning i ma men si ken uwin ta po tin nak nak endara amhees hang sun men ta engun.’”
40021014	Kut ma po tin mara hi korip men u po tin khi hi lengwal men kut tumen men me pol ta yang mi mang auluungin, ma yang mimlis saihngin ta po li.
40021015	Si po tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men kut tumen ion wungin maran kiring kiring tin yang ning i men u po hoin tin nuk e yuk yuk mi mang auluungin ti, “Yang tin Wiru a-Dewit men ku it sam sam i,” tumen, men po ko ya hi sal,
40021016	ma po sakal ta yang taku, “E hul sakalngin tin po tin hoin men me sakal i men, wah?” Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Wai. Si sakalngin tin panngin nuk ti, ‘Mi wo po tin hoin men u po tin po hi mumlek men kut tumen kha e hihi sam samngin tap epo hi men,’ wungin tin imen men ku wom tiik i angan ta kho som, wah?”
40021017	Li klet ma yang mang ta po nuk si yang li pol wetpo enunu li Betani ma yang li nuk imen.
40021018	Li pi kingkauk ko yang ma yang ku kyok li mi enunu, men yang hun elip.
40021019	Ma yang ion sa pik ta men pit porili soput, ma yang me pit tikayung sa tin imen kut, men ku yang ion endara ta kuk po sun akomen, si sa kiin misan. Ti ma yang ko wo ta sa taku, “Ngon men ku enun kyok asin, ma ngon men ku pit tumen kokyok kokyok li kut.” Kut ma kerek engun ma sa pik tin imen pit e kiin mlus.
40021020	Ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ion wungin tin imen, men po teret won, ma po sakal taku, “Tuni ma sa pik tin ikop mlus kerek tumen?”
40021021	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko sakal wet po taku, “Nga sakal anuh ta wom, epon taku wo wom phep weh si mi wom ponwal asin, men ku wom ning i kai sun tin ningngin epo sa pik men, kuru wom wo ta put pi tin pit men taku, ‘E teng si ma e lu pit tak li mi wiu,’ men ku ningngin ako.
40021022	Ma endara mosop tin khaut esini e ku wom kines Got epon men, taku wo wom phep, men ku wom wai ako.”
40021023	Li klet ma yang kyok li sup mi mang auluungin, men po tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po tin akokono e mara hi pit wo sun men kut tumen me palu wal ewut yang minan tin yang ung e kot po masang to sun wala men, ma po sakal taku, “Emhong tin ia ani e ning wungin tin mosop imen epon men? U ara weh wa emhong tin imen si tap u ti?”
40021024	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal wet po taku, “Wai, si ngo ku kines wom epo wungin ta maksin kut, tin taku wom pok ngo tunus, men kuli nga pok wom kut epo emhong tin nga ning wungin tin mosop imen epon men kut tumen:
40021025	Baptais tin ta a-Yon men, men me ia? Men me wet pi wa me epo po tunus engun?” Ma po mara hi pit mi sakalngin lunga hi tuo hi, ma po sakal taku, “Taku it wo epon men me wet pi, men kuli yang sakal ta it taku, ‘Tunia ma wom ku wo wom nuk wet yang akomen?’
40021026	Si taku it wo epon men me epo po tunus engun,’ men ku it men ku lem pit wo po tin wa ilio angan men, epo po mosop men wo hi nuk wet a-Yon epo yang men pokngin ta ako.”
40021027	Tumen ma po sakal wet a-Yesus taku, “Pim ku pon tan som.” Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, ‘Wai, si ngo kut men ku pok wom epo emhong tin nga ning wungin tin mosop imen epon men akomen kut tumen.
40021028	Si wom wo taku tua? Yang ta men husanin masang khaut ponwal, ma yang me epo sun tin muk men ma yang sakal taku, ‘Wiruk, e lu kum mipi wain tin ta ngo men homani.’
40021029	Ti ma yang sakal wet sun taku, ‘Awu. Ngo ku li som,’ taku li klet men yang phae min ma yang li.
40021030	Li klet ma yang kyok li epo wirun tin ira sun men ma yang sakal ira sun. Ma wirun ko sakal wet sun taku, ‘Wai, ngon tin akono men, ngo ku li,’ takumali yang ku li som.
40021031	Wulong tin imen men ara ta ngong ta tin ira wungin ta wirama ngong min men?” Ti ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Yang tin li muk men.” Ti ma a-Yesus sakal ta po taku, “Nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo po tin palu takis ta po phuan men u po wala tin elwan men kut tumen men ku li sup mi enunu tin ta Got men muk epo wom ako.
40021032	Epo a-Yon men me epo wom ira soput tin siik men, ma wom ku wo wom nuk wet yang som. Si po tin palu takis ta po phuan men u po wala tin elwan men kut tumen kha wo hi nuk wet yang men. Ma wom ion i tin imen, men ku wom kuk sulung li wom phae mi wom wet khama wo wom nuk wet yang akomen.
40021033	Wom men ku hul sakalngin emol ta kyok. Phua ta tin maran pit wo mulusngin ta men men wha mipi wain ta ma yang hihi nolok ta baul eyan, u yang hihi pi won enahan ta pit epon ku po paplot wain sut ko min men, u yang ning suyung nomalak ta ta po tin ku haum eya mipi wain men kut tumen. Ma yang wai si nuk yanga wili po tin ku me kum anaum epon men, si yang ku li wo mulusngin ta tin ung hin men.
40021034	Li klet ma enal tin ku wain enun mumuru epon men kho me tikayung kut, men yang tih po kara tin kum won men li epo po tin mara hi pit wo mipi wain ta yang men, kuma po li wa wain enun tin tan men.
40021035	Ma po tin kum anaum mipi wain men wa po tin kum ta yang men, ma po sop sun ta, u po wi sun ta ko hun, u po whis enah epo yang ta kut tumen.
40021036	Li kyok men yang tih po kara maksin tin kum tan men, men enu hi munuman epo sun tin kho li muk men, ma po ning wungin epo sun tin imen kai sun tin po ning i epo sun tin li muk men.
40021037	Li sulung men yang tih wirun tuon li epo po, ma yang sakal taku, ‘Epo po men kuli wo hi nuk wet wiruk ako.’
40021038	Takuma po tin kum anaum mipi wain men ion yang wirun, men po sakal lunga hi tuo hi taku, ‘Yang tin tuon ikop kha kuli pakuh pongin epo moolngin tin ta wiraman men kha ikop. Tih, wom mu ku it wi yang ko hun engun, ma it kasum moolngin tin ta yang men.’
40021039	Tumen ma po kasum yang ma po psik yang li pol wetpo elam tin ta mipi wain men, ma po wi yang ko hun.
40021040	Tumen ma yang tin akono ta mipi wain men ku me, men ku yang ning i tua epo po tin kum anaum epo mipi wain tin imen?”
40021041	Ti ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Po tin wungin ta hi lengwal imen men ku yang ning i lengwal epo po maksin, ma po men ku huuspit weh, si yang wa mipi wain tin tan men li nuk yanga wili po kara maksin tin ku kum anaum epon kumali wa enda tin mipi wain enun ton men si ta yang to namih tin ku wain enun ton men siik.”
40021042	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal ta po taku, “Iyi, wom men ku tiik sakalngin tin nuk mi Panngin Auluungin men angan ta kho som wah, tin wo taku, ‘Enah tin po tin ning mang men mut i men kha si enah tin ung mang sinsin tin siin emol men. Wungin tin imen men yang tin Akono men kha ning i men, kha it ion i ma it teret won men.’
40021043	Tumen ma nga sakal ta wom ti, epo enunu tin ta Got men men ku klokngin epo wom ma wangin si ta po kara tin khuuk wal ta hi weh men, tin ku sa ta hi enun to endara aiingin tin ta enunu tin ta Got men weh.
40021044	Ma taku po ta plong po enah tin imen, men ku plong ko pal ko tingit tururun, si taku po ta enah tin imen plong ko pon, men ku enah tin imen ko nyung i ma ko ken elku tin pii men.”
40021045	Ti ma po tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po Parisi kut tumen hul wungin emol kara tin yang sakal i men, men po ion i epo yang sakal los po po kha men.
40021046	Ma po taku kasum yang, takuma po lem epo po tin wa ilio angan men, epo po tin wa ilio angan men wo hi nuk wet yang ken yang e pokngin ta men.
40022001	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po kyok ma yang pok put wungin emol kara si ta po taku,
40022002	“Enunu tin api wet pi men men ken yang sinkhaung ta tin hihi wungin epo wirun tin ku enangin men,
40022003	ma yang tih po tin kum ta yang men li pol kuma po li yuk sun tin yang wa myus li pit e li li wo hi kho men ku me. Takuma po men mara hi luun weh epo po tin ku me men.
40022004	Angan ta kyok men yang tih po tin kum ta yang men kara kyok li pol, men yang sakal ta po ti, ‘Wom lu pok po tin nga wa myus li pit e li li wo hi kho men taku, ‘Ih, ani timen epo nga hihi kakaomngin tin ta ngo men kho, ma bulmakau u li ken nginan tin nga pa ken i li nunhum men men nga lek i ko huu kho kut, ma endara mosop men hihingin kho. Yo, wom mu epo kakaomngin tin iyi.’
40022005	Takuma po men ku sila hi khing weh som, ma po ko yok li then then, wi ta li mipi tan, u wi ta li kum anaum tan kut tumen.
40022006	Si po tin kara men kasum sun tin kum ta yang tin sinkhaung men, ma po songhu pit wo sun, ma po lek sun ko huu.
40022007	Ti ma yang tin sinkhaung men hul epo wungin tin imen, men yang min kakhat sun weh. Ma yang ko tih po tin nolo ta yang men li pol, ma po li klot sun tin lek sun ko huu men mosop ko huu, u po sut enunu tin ta sun men kut tumen.
40022008	Kut ma yang ko sakal ta po tin kum tan men taku, ‘Kakaomngin tin epo enanginngin men men hihingin kho kut, takuma po tin nga wa myus li pit e li li wo hi kho men men ku tunus epo hi ku me akomen.
40022009	Tumen ma wom lu ira soput tin nunhum men, ma po tin khaut esini e wom pon ta hi men men ku wom espo hi mu epo kakaomngin tin epo enanginngin men.’
40022010	Tumen ma po tin kum ta yang tin sinkhaung men li pol ira soput tin nunhum men, ma po espo sun mosop tin po li pon ta hi men, tin wungin ta hi lengwal men u tin wungin ta hi tunus men to al me. Tumen ma mang tin po ning kakaomngin min men min kol epo po tin ku me ii kakaomngin men.
40022011	Li klet ma yang tin sinkhaung men me sup epon ku ion po tin me epo kakaomngin men, men yang ion sun ta men ku pi moolngin tin ta enanginngin men akomen.
40022012	Tumen ma yang ko sakal ta sun tin imen taku, “Ngon tin tita tong men, tua ma e mu sup iyi si ngon ku phi moolngin tin epo enanginngin men som?’ Takuma wungin ta yang om.
40022013	Kut ma yang tin sinkhaung men ko wo ta po tin kum ta yang men taku, ‘Wom kan kan yang wilin u khin kut tumen, ma wom wa yang lu, wom psik yang lu pol mi pi mi ku tin kuk woringi pi weh men. Pi tin imen men ku po kuk e hahau hambip u po kuk e ii ngi hi kakyat kakyat po al epon kut tumen.’
40022014	Epo po munuman men Got yuk hi ako, si po sakun kara engun kha Got won ung e li li wo hi men.”
40022015	Li klet ma minan tin imen po Parisi me palu wal kuma po ion mi soput ta tin ku po kan kan yang pit mi sakalngin ta tin e taku yang sakal i lengwal men.
40022016	Tumen ma po tirih sun kara tin hul wet kotngin mi wo hi men to hi kara tin wo hi nuk wet a-Herot men li sakal ta a-Yesus taku, “Ngon tin kot po men, pim a ion i epo ngon men in to wungin irawin, ma e kot po epo soput tin ta Got men to wungin irawin ako. Ma ngon men ku lem pit wo po ta som, aku, taku po tin ya hi pos men wa taku po tin ya hi om men, men e ples sakalngin ta po mosop ira wungin siin then ta misan.
40022017	Tumen ma e pok pim epo e wo taku tua? Iyi, wungin sinsin men sam epo it tin ku kul takis si ta Sisa men wa tua?”
40022018	Takuma a-Yesus ion wungin tin lengwal e nuk mi po men kho, tumen ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Tuni ma wom tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men taku karong ngo?
40022019	Wom suk marango epo ulu ta tin kuli it kul takis si ta Sisa epon men wet.” Tumen ma po wa ulu ta me epo yang.
40022020	Ti ma yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Ara enun u ara yan tin panngin nuk po ulu tin i?”
40022021	Ti ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Men ta Sisa.” Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Tumen ma wom wa endara tin ta Sisa men men ku kyok si ta Sisa weh, si wom wa endara tin ta Got men men ku kyok si ta Got weh.”
40022022	Po hul wungin timen, men po teret won, ma po mang ta yang, si po li li ira soput tin ta hi then then men.
40022023	Ungunan tin yek homani kut ma po Sadyusi tin wo epo khekngin kyok si mi hunngin men men pi engun, men me epo yang ma po kines yang taku,
40022024	“Ngon tin kot po men, a-Moses wo epon taku po ta hun, si husanin pi om, men ku wiron enangin ero sun kyok kumali yang khuuk sun ta wiron.
40022025	Epo wuluk khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen men irit won kha kuk to pim men. Ma yang tin muk men enangin wut wala ta, anima yang hun, si husani ngong pi om, tumen ma yang mang ta titien li ung ta wiron.
40022026	Ma yang tin pet sun men ning i timen kut, men yang tin me miuk angan men men ning i timen maksin kut, weh li pol epo yang tin me ponwal me sup angan men.
40022027	Li klet ma wut tin wala imen men hun kut tumen.
40022028	Tumen ma po tin huu kho men kuli khek kyok si, men e phaeng taku wut tin wala imen ku ung ta ara weh mi wuluk tin eip u ponwal me sup imen? Epo wuluk mosop men enangin wut kho.”
40022029	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal wet po taku, “Auweh, wom men yek ta sakalngin, epo ele, epo wom men ku pon ta Panngin tin Auluungin men u wo phepngin tin ta Got men akomen kut tumen.
40022030	Epo po tin huu kho men kuli khek kyok si, men po masang ku enangin sun wala wa po wala ku sun wai li ung ta po masang ta akomen. Awu. Po mosop men kuli li kuk ken po tihngin tin ta Got e kuk ili wet pi men engun.
40022031	Si wungin tin nuk epo po tin huu kho ma ku khek kyok si men, iyi, sakalngin tin Got sakal i ko ta wom men taku,
40022032	‘Ngo men Got ta Abraham, u ta Aisak, u ta a-Yakop kut tumen’ ti, wungin tin imen men ku wom tiik i kho som, wah? Got men ku Got ta po tin huu kho men akomen. Awu. Yang men Got ta po tin tunus kuk men ako.”
40022033	Timen ma po tin wa ilio angan men hul sakalngin tin imen, men po teret wo kotngin tin ta yang men.
40022034	Kut si po Parisi hul epo yang tin ning i ma sakalngin ta po Sadyusi om men, men po me palu wal then kuma po li epo a-Yesus.
40022035	Kut ma yang ta tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men in lunga po, men yang taku karong a-Yesus ma yang ko kines sun taku,
40022036	“Ngon tin kot po men, wungin sinsin tin akani e nhum epo sun mosop?”
40022037	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta sun taku, “’Ngon men ku mip pit wo yang tin Akono e Got tap men to mip mosop, u to enu ngon mosop, u to tulun hungin tin tap men mosop kut tumen.’
40022038	Wungin tin imen misan kha li muk epo sun u men nhum epo sun tin mosop men kut tumen.
40022039	Si wungin tin me ponwal angan men men ken sun tin imen ako: ‘Ngon men ku mip pit wo po tin mom ung then men ken ngon tin mip pit wo ngon tuop men weh.’
40022040	Wungin tin siin ponwal imen kha wungin sinsin u wungin tin ta po Pokngin men kut tumen mosop si hing won men.”
40022041	Kut si po tin Parisi men me palu wal kut, men a-Yesus kines po taku,
40022042	“Wom hoo mi wom tua epo Mesaia? Yang men wiru are?” Ti ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Yang men Wiru a-Dewit ako.”
40022043	Ti ma yang ko wo wet po taku, “Taku tua ma a-Dewit sakal epo Emiun Auluungin ma yang sikia sun, ‘Ngon tin Akono men’ ti, tin yang sakal taku,
40022044	‘Yang tin Akono men sakal ta sun tin Akono ta ngo men taku, “E ko ung ewo wili ngo tin eronin men, li pol minan tin kuli nga wa po tin nolo ngon men me sup wet khip ken po e ehus ta khip ta men?”’
40022045	Taku a-Dewit sikia sun Akono, taku tua ma yang kyok si a-Dewit wirun?”
40022046	Ti ma po ta men ku kakha epon ku si wa sakalngin ta emhut sun akomen, kuru to pi homan tin i ma li kut men ku po ta li min puplet epon ku kyok me kines yang kyok epo wungin ta akomen.
40023001	Minan tin imen ma a-Yesus sakal ta po tin wa ilio angan men u ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men kut tumen kyok taku,
40023002	“Po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u po Parisi kut tumen men me nuk wo ehus tin ta a-Moses men ako.
40023003	Tumen ma wungin tin tua e ku po wo ta wom epo wom ku kasum i men, men ku wom kasum i ma wom ning i weh, si wom men ku ning i ken po tin ku kasum i som men asin. Epon men po sakal i, takuma po ku ning i weh som.
40023004	Epo po kan kan endara tin mamaik men, men khung nginan weh epon ku po lul i men, ma po wai si nuk e li li uwa sun masang to sun wala. Si po tuo hi men mara hi luluun epo po ku wili hi si pakik i tin nuk uwa sun men epo wili hi pon pon ta akomen .
40023005	Si kumang mosop tin po ning i men men po ning i kuma po tunus mara hi kon i weh ako. Po ning ehak tin ta hi e epo kinesngin men si nunhum u po ning elik tin po yuh yuh i ko hut moolngin tin ta hi men ko nomalaklak weh kut tumen.
40023006	Po mi hi pit pit wo ehus tin ta kakaomngin e ung e li li ili ewo maran men u ehus tin tunus epo sun e ung e li li mi mang akotngin men,
40023007	u po mi hi epo po masang to sun wala ku yuk ta po mi nal walngin, u po tunus tin ku sikia sun, ‘Rabai, Rabai,’ men engun kut tumen.
40023008	Si wom men ku mang ta po ta ku sikia wom ‘Rabai’ asin. Epo po ta men ko in tin kot wom men, men Mesaia ako, si wom mosop men irit won then.
40023009	Wom men ku sikia po ta tin in wo mulus men wirama wom asin. Epo yang then ta misan kha Wirama wom men ako, men yang tin in ili wet pi men.
40023010	U wom men ku mang ta po ta sikia wom ‘Ngon tin kot pim men,’ ti asin. Epo yang then ta misan kha tin ku kot wom men, men Mesaia ako.
40023011	Si po ta taku si nhum lunga wom, men ku ko in ken po ta tin ku kum ta wom men engun.
40023012	Ma taku po ta wa yan si, men kuli Got wa yan ko, si taku po ta wa yan ko, men kuli Got wa yan si.
40023013	Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u wom Parisi kut tumen, tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men, epo wom men sambal si eya enunu tin api wet pi men epo po masang to sun wala. Epo wom tuo wom men ku lu sup akomen, kuru wom ku mang si po tin taku li sup men ku li sup akomen kut tumen.
40023014	Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u wom Parisi kut tumen, epo wom kusamuh po wala tin wawamuh men ma wom wa mok ta po, u wom torok mara po masang to sun wala ma wom huuh kinesngin li maran nomalak weh to mara po kut tumen. Tumen ma wom men ku si mi wungin ples nginan tin nhum men, men kuli wom wa mumhek mingin nhum epo po kara.
40023015	Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u wom Parisi kut tumen, epo wom muk muk wo mulus u yanga wiu kut tumen kuma wom lu phae mi po ta tin ku me ira wo phepngin ta wom men, ma men phae min kut, men wom ning i ma si husani pi tin yau sindak pit epon men ken tuo wom men, ma angan ponwal kyok men lasin tan si nhum epo wom.
40023016	Auh, wom tin taku suk mara po masang to sun wala epo soput e mara wom mhi men, tin sakal taku, ‘Taku po ta tung tung isasele si wo mang auluungin, men awhat engun, si taku po ta tung tung isasele si wo gol tin pit mi mang auluungin men, men naumngin tan pit won epon ku iran weh.’
40023017	Wom tin wungin ta wom ulil u mara wom mhi kut tumen, epo ela nhum weh, gol wa mang auluungin tin ani ning i ma gol si auluungin weh men, wah?
40023018	U wom wo taku, ‘Taku po ta tung tung si wo suyung, men awhat engun, si taku po ta tung tung si wo talungin tin nuk wo suyung men, men naumngin tan pit epon ku iran.’
40023019	Wom tin wungin ta wom ulil u mara wom mhi kut tumen, epo ela nhum weh, talungin wa suyung tin ani ning i ma talungin si auluungin men, wah?
40023020	Tumen ma taku po ta tung tung suyung, men tung tung suyung to endara mosop tin pit won men kut tumen ako.
40023021	U taku po ta tung tung mang auluungin, men tung tung mang auluungin u yang tin ung min men kut tumen ako.
40023022	U taku po ta tung tung pi wet pi, men tung tung ehus tin Got tin sinkhaung men ung won men u yang tin ung won men kut tumen ako.
40023023	Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u wom Parisi kut tumen, tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men! Epo wom talu Got epo endara tin maran kiring kiring e ipek turunus men maran min eip ponwal ta mi sun si, si wetpo wom wa wungin sinsin tin mamaik weh epo sun men, tin wungin ples nginan emin weh men, u min sukngin, u wungin anuh kut tumen. Wungin tin nunhum imen kha ku wom ning i weh men, kuru wungin tin kara e tururun men mosop men ku wom mang tan ning nginan asin kut tumen.
40023024	Wom tin taku lu muk po masang to sun wala e mara wom mhi men, wom tohuh epo wom taku wa sa ko sup wet humuk mi isit si, si kamel ta men wom kuum i lu ko engun.
40023025	Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u wom Parisi kut tumen, tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men! Epo wom men khis khis po karu wetpon u kambuyu wetpon tunus kut tumen, si mi wom men maran nesngin u silan khingngin tin pit wo wom tuo wom weh men tumen men klet mi wom ako.
40023026	Ngon tin Parisi e marap mhi men, ngon men ku khis mi karu u mi kambuyu tunus wet, kumali wetpon men ku pon tunus maksin kut tumen.
40023027	Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u wom Parisi kut tumen, tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men! Epo wom men ken uwin tin tanuan e po pan pon epo elku tin min eun men, ma si pon tunus to mara po tin kuk mara so men ako, si min men kol epo po tin huu men emuhin u endara maran kiring kiring tin lengwal weh men kut tumen.
40023028	Tumen kut kha wom kuk to mara po masang to sun wala ken wom e kuk siik men, si mi wom men wungin amo u wungin tin wom hik put wungin sinsin ngin angan men tumen men kol mi wom weh.
40023029	Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u wom Parisi kut tumen, tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men! Epo wom ning uwin tin tanuan men ta po tin pokngin men u wom pa mool endara tin po tulu hi hu po tin wungin ta hi siik men ton men,
40023030	ma wom wo taku, ‘Taku it kuk mi elup tin ta po inana it men, men ku it ning i then to po tin yuk yuk po pokngin enghik a hi ko men akomen.
40023031	Tumen ma wom men pok put wungin tin wom wa lasin ko po wom tuo wom epon men kha men, epo wom men husani po tin lek po pokngin ko huu men ako.
40023032	Yo, wom men ku ning lasin si po sun tin ta po inana wom men si kol weh!
40023033	Wom tin isalingan e tamha ekle khuuk wom men, tua ma wom ku yek ta ples walngin tin epo wom ku huuspit mi yau tin sindak men?
40023034	Wom hul, sinsin tin imen kha nga tih po pokngin u po tin mhi hi ek men, u po tin mara hi ples wungin sinsin men tumen ti epo wom men, ma po kara men kuli wom lek hi ko huu ma wom poo poo hi si put sa tin wlong put wal men, si hi kara men kuli wom wawlauk hi mi mang akotngin tin ta wom e ung e li li men ma wom mumhek mi po mi enunu ta ma li epo enunu ta,
40023035	kumali po tin wungin ta hi siik men kalol a hi tin yuk yuk ko men lasin mosop men ku ko po wom, hosingin epo Abel tin wungin tan siik men kalolan weh li pol epo kalol a-Sekaraia tin wiru a-Berekaia men, tin wom wini ko hun pi emin mang auluungin u suyung tin po ning talungin won men tumen.
40023036	Nga wo anuh ta wom, epo wungin tin mosop imen kuli si mi elup tin wom khuuk wal min homani men.
40023037	Auh, Yerusalem, Yerusalem, ngon tin lek po pokngin ko huu u e whis enah epo po tin tihngin epo ngon men tumen, angan munuman kho ngo taku palu husanim si then, ken emon nomal wala ta tin palu husanin me sup wet mhit men, takuma mara wom luluun!
40023038	Imen, mang tin ta wom men men Got mang tan nuk lunga wom men min engun.
40023039	Epo nga sakal ta wom ti, epo wom men ku ion ngo kyok som weh li pol minan tin kuli wom wo taku, ‘Emhong tin ta Got men men in epo yang tin me epo yang tin Akono men yan men!’”
40024001	Li klet ma a-Yesus pon ayokngin li pol, men yang mang ta mang auluungin ung, ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men me kuk tikayung yang kuma po suk mara yang epo endara tin ningngin e nuk e li li mi enunu tin baul mang auluungin men.
40024002	Takuma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po taku, “Wom ion endara tin mosop imen kut, wah? Nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo enah ta kuli po mang tan nuk po sun ta kyok akomen. Awu. Mosop men kuli ninhienngin ko ako.”
40024003	Kut ma yang li ko ung po pi emian Olip, men po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men me pol ta yang, ma po misa hi kuk, men po sakal ti, “E pok pim, epo minan tin ia weh kuli wungin tin mosop imen si? U ela ku tosuk to ngon tin kuli me men, u epo elup tin ku li ponsol men kut tumen?”
40024004	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo wet po taku, “Wom men ku haum tunus, epon akuli po ta me ek ek mi wom.
40024005	Epo po munuman kuli me epo ya ngo ako, ma po wo taku, ‘Ngo men Mesaia,’ ma po ek ek mi sun munuman.
40024006	Ma kuli wom hul epo lek walngin kara kuru wom hul put nerik epo lek walngin kara kut tumen. Wom men ku miu wom tuung asin. Epo wungin tin mosop imen kuli weh si ako, si elup tin ku li ponsol men, men kuli iso.
40024007	Epo po kara tin khuuk wal ta hi weh men kuli si sewut sun tin hi khuuk wal ta hi weh men, u po kara tin hi kuk mi enunu then ta men men kuli si sewut sun tin hi kuk mi enunu then men kut tumen. Ma elwip nunhum, u saihngin lengwal tin maran kiring kiring men kut tumen men kuli pawha li yanga pi, u pi kin men ku si si yanga pi kara kut tumen.
40024008	Wo maikngin tin mosop imen men ken wut wala ta tin ku wanhung ma hosi won manngin men.
40024009	Minan tin imen men kuli po wa wom sup mi won maikngin ma po lek wom ko huu, ma po mi hi lel wom epo sinsin tin ya ngo in to wom men.
40024010	Ma minan tin imen men kuli po munuman plong ko to wo phepngin ta hi, ma po wa sun tin ta hi men li sup yanga wili po nolo, ma po mi hi lel wal pit wo wal.
40024011	Ma po pokngin tin torokngin men munuman kuli si ma po ek ek mi sun munuman.
40024012	Ma wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin men kuli si hambip ma ung e si po sun si, tumen ma min epongin ta po munuman men kuli ko wyu ung engun ma nglik.
40024013	Si taku po ta wuh won maikngin weh li pol minan tin kuli elup li ponsol ton men, men kuli palolongin ako.
40024014	Ma pok putngin tunus tin i tin pok epo enunu men kuli pok putngin yanga mulusngin mosop tin po ung e li li epon men, kumali po mosop tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men men ku hul, anima elup tin ku li ponsol men si.
40024015	Tumen ma taku wom ion endara tin hies weh to mara Got e ning i ma pi tahunggu men, tin pokngin a-Daniel pok epon men, ku si pit mi pi tin auluungin men (taku po ta tiik wungin tin iyi, men ku maran ples i sinsin tunus weh),
40024016	kut men ku po tin kuk Yudia men men ku hi mhup li si po pi emian.
40024017	Taku po ta si in eluwi mang ta, men ku kyok ko ma li espo endara ta mi mang tan kyok asin.
40024018	U taku po ta li in mipi tan, men ku kyok me epon ku wa moolngin tan asin kut tumen.
40024019	Auh, po wala tin kuma hi men u po wala tin pa sus husani hi men kut tumen men ku wo hi maik hi weh.
40024020	Kuru wom kines Got epo wom ku mhup, men ku to pi tin nginglikan men wa to pi Sabat tumen asin.
40024021	Epo minan tin imen men kuli won maikngin nhum ta si, men nhum ta tumen ku si kho li li ewo maran tin mulusngin hosingin weh ma me pol homani men som. Awu. Kuru sulung men ku won maikngin nhum ta tumen si angan ta kyok akomen kut tumen.
40024022	Ma taku elup tin imen ku hik putngin ko si maran yis som, men ku po tunus ta men ku palolongin akomen. Takuma Got tulun hu po tin yang won ung wo hi kho men, kha kuli yang hik put elup tin imen ko me maran yis men ako.
40024023	Minan tin imen taku po ta wo ta wom ti, ‘Imen, Mesaia tuon kha iyi,’ wa ‘Mesaia tuon kha imen,’ men ku wo wom nuk wet asin.
40024024	Epo Mesaia tororokngin u pokngin tororokngin kut tumen kara kuli si, ma po ning tosukngin u wungin maran kiring kiring tin ku po teret won men nunhum kara, epon taku po ku ning i, men ku po ek ek mi sun tin Got won ung wo hi men maksin kut tumen.
40024025	Wom hul, nga pok wom kho epo wungin tin kuli iso si men.
40024026	Tumen ma taku po wo ta wom ti, ‘Mara wom lu, yang men li in pi tin tahunggu men,’ men wom lu pol asin, wa taku po wo ti, ‘Mara wom lu, epo yang li in mi lahembengin tin ung emin weh men,’ men ku wo wom nuk wet asin kut tumen.
40024027	Epo pi tin si mlangan tin si mara naeng ma ngin ngin mili ko solong siin men, tumen kut kha kuli Wiru Po Tunus me men.
40024028	Epo pi tin akani e ku emkusin nuk e li li epon men, pi tin imen kha kuli emon tin ii endara emalin ewin men kara li palu wal epon men.
40024029	Won maikngin tin ku si mi elup tin imen ku kho li, khama sinang ku ko ngin mi ku, u namih men ku ngin ngin akomen kut tumen. Ma awheng kuli poplong ili wet pi me ko, u po nolo tin to emhong e kuk e li li ili wet pi men mosop kuli titiok kut tumen.
40024030	Ma minan tin imen kuli tosukngin tin ta Wiru Po Tunus men si in pi mlaeng ili wet pi, ma minan tin imen men po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men kuli hahau amusukngin, ma po ku ion Wiru Po Tunus men ku me wo hingis tin ta wet pi men to kakhangin u moolngin nhum tumen.
40024031	Ma yang kuli tih po tihngin tin tan men men ku me ko to ingutngin ta kiyak nhum ta, ma tihngin ku li palu po tin yang won ung wo hi men porili mulusngin tin hut mnal men me palu wal then, men ku me wet pi hut ta ma mili ko wet pi hut ta.
40024032	Homani wom men ku wa maran ekngin epo wungin emol tin tosuk to sa pik men: minan tin sa pik wilin pon wiak wiak ma kiin poplok si hut, men ku wom ion i epo elup tin ku sinang pit nhing min men ku si angan kut khae.
40024033	Tumen kut minan tin kuli wom ion wungin tin mosop imen, wom men ku ion i epo wungin tin imen men me in tikayung, men me in tikayung mara sowon kut khae.
40024034	Nga sakal anuh ta wom ti, epo po tin khuuk wal mi elup tin imen ku huu angan akomen, men ku wungin tin mosop imen kuli weh si.
40024035	Wet pi to mulus men ku li om ako, si sakalngin tin ta ngo men ku li om angan akomen.
40024036	Si ungunan u sinang maran tin imen men ku po tunus ta pon tan kho akomen. Awu. Epo po tihngin kut men ku pon tan kho akomen kut tumen, si Yok misan.
40024037	Wungin tin maran kiring imen, tin po ning i mi elup tin ta a-Noa men, tuon kha kuli po ning i tumen minan tin kuli Wiru Po Tunus me ton men.
40024038	Epo mi elup tin eki tin num men ku iso si som men, men po kuk e ii endara u po kuk e um kut tumen, u po masang enangin sun wala u po wa sun wala li ung ta po masang kut tumen, weh li pol minan tin a-Noa li sup mi imut men,
40024039	si po pong epo engin weh li pol minan tin eki num si ma me tauluk po mosop li men, men ku wungin in tumen kut minan tin Wiru Po Tunus kuli me min men kut tumen.
40024040	Minan tin imen wulong masang ponwal ku li in mipi, ma wi ta men ku po wai li, si wi ta men ku po mang tan in.
40024041	Wulong wala ponwal men ku li in e tut tut wit pi tin po li tut tut wit epon men, ma wut ta men ku po wai li, si wut ta men ku po mang tan in kut tumen.
40024042	Tumen ma wom men ku haum tunus weh, epo wom ku pon ta sinang maran tin kuli yang tin Akono ta wom men me ton men akomen.
40024043	Si wom men ku ion i ti, epon taku phua tin mang tan men ku pon ta elup tin ku tipngin me ton men, men ku yang haum tunus ma yang ten ten weh epo po tin ku me hik mang ta yang men.
40024044	Tumen ma wom men ku hihi maksin kut tumen, epo Wiru Po Tunus men ku me mi elup ta tin ku wom hoo mi wom pit pon men akomen.
40024045	Kut ma ara kum ta sun, men wungin tan anuh u mhin ek kut tumen? Epo po tin tumen kha phua tin tan men won ung won si maran pit wo po mosop tin kuk mi mang ta yang men, kumali yang wa endara aiingin si ta sun to elup tin phua won ung won men.
40024046	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po ta tin kum ta sun men, tin phua tan ku me, men ku yang pon ta sun tin in e ning i tumen.
40024047	Nga wo anuh ta wom, epo phua men ku won ung wo yang si maran pit wo endara mosop tin ta yang men ako.
40024048	Si taku yang tin kum ta sun men, wungin tan lengwal ma yang wo ta min taku, ‘Phua tin ta ngo men ku me kerek som,’
40024049	ti ma yang hosi wungin epo yang ku lek po tin hi kum ta phua men, u yang ii endara u um tumen to po tin um wain nginangan men kut tumen,
40024050	yang tin imen, tin kum ta phua men, phua tin tan men ku me ungunan ta tin ku yang hoo min pit won men akomen u mi elup ta tin yang pong epon men kut tumen,
40024051	ma phua men ku me mut put yang ko hut ponwal, ma won ung wo pi ta yang ta tin ku yang in to po tin wungin ta hi nuk wo eha men. Pi tin imen men ku po kuk e hahau hambip u po kuk e ii ngi hi kakyat kakyat po al epon kut tumen.
40025001	Minan tin imen men ku enunu tin api wet pi men ku kaingin to po wala wawahin eip ponwal, tin hi espo esul ta hi then then ma po li pol epon ku hi li tut yang tin ku me enangin men.
40025002	Ma wuluk khaut eip men kuk to mhin ekngin, si wuluk khaut eip men kuk to wungin ulil.
40025003	Wuluk tin wungin ta ngyuk ulil men espo esul ta ngyuk, si wuluk ku wa sa olip sut kara to ngyuk akomen,
40025004	si wuluk tin mhi ngyuk ek men men espo sa olip sut ta ngyuk to esul ta ngyuk.
40025005	Takuma yang tin ku me enangin men ku me kerek akomen, tumen ma po haum li nhaungngin poii po ma po nhaung.
40025006	Li pol to pi put elup anima yukngin ta me, ‘Wom hul, yang tin ku enangin men kho me. Wom lu pol kuma wom lu tut yang!’
40025007	Kut ma po wala tin wawahin mosop imen piphip si ma po si hihi mulu ta esul tin ta hi men.
