42009047	Ma a-Yesus ion wungin tin nuk ta mi po men, men yang wa sun hoin ta me ung porili yang,
42009048	ma yang wo ta po taku, “Taku po ta wa yang tin hoin iyi, men wa ngo kha men. Ma taku po ta wa ngo, men wa yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men kut tumen ako. Epo po ta yan om weh lunga wom mosop men kuli yan pos.”
42009049	Si a-Yon ko sakal wet yang taku, “Phua, pim a ion yang ta, men in e luul to emiun lengwal epo yap, ma pim a uluu yang epo yang ku pet it asin.”
42009050	Takuma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Wom uluu yang asin, epo po ta taku ku nolo it som, men tita it ako.”
42009051	Li klet ma elup si tikayung epo Got ku wa yang li si awon, men yang maran iis iis soput epo yang ku li ili Yerusalem.
42009052	Ma yang tih po kara tin ku li to sakalngin muk yang men. Ma po li, men po li sup pi tanuan ta tin ta po Samaria men, kuma po hihi soput yang tin ku me men.
42009053	Takuma po Samaria tin imen ku wa yang akomen, epo yang maran li sak pi Yerusalem epo yang ku muk muk weh li imen.
42009054	Ma a-Yemis ngong a-Yon tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ion wungin tin imen, men wulong ko sakal taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, mip epo tuk ku yuk yau me ko wet pi ma me ko ma uspo po lek nginan, ken sun tin a-Elaiha ning i kho men, wah?”
42009055	Takuma yang phae, men yang pio wulong, ma yang ko wo taku, “Emiun tin pong si wungin si mi mom men ku mom pon tan akomen.
42009056	Epo Wiru Po Tunus men ku me epo yang ku mhuk po tunus ma po enu hi huuspit akomen. Awu. Yang me epo yang ku palolo po weh.” Ti ma po li pi tanuan enginin ta.
42009057	Ma po muk muk ira soput, men wungin ta si nuk ti, men yang ta sakal ta sun taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ngo men ku pet kira ngon li pi tin akani e ku e lu epon men.”
42009058	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Elwa enih tin tururun men, men nahu tan pit e li li mi mulus, u emon tin yap yap wet pi men, men mlut tan ung e li li kut tumen, si Wiru Po Tunus men pi tin ku yang mhin ko nuk epon men, men pi om.”
42009059	Si yang ko wo ta sun enginin ta taku, “E mu pet ngo.” Takuma yang ko wo taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, som mang ta ngo, si nga li kil yok wet.”
42009060	Takuma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “E mang ta po tin huhu men ku kil hunngin ta hi, si ngon men ku lu pok put enunu tin ta Got men.”
42009061	Kuru yang ta maksin men sakal taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ngo ku pet kirap, si e mang ma nga li wa mi ngo si ta po tin kuk mi mang tin ta ngo men wet.”
42009062	Takuma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Taku po ta wilin kasum sa tin po pal pal mulusngin epon men kut, taku maran kek kyok li, men ku tunus epon ku li ning kumang mi enunu tin ta Got men akomen.”
42010001	Sulung epo wungin tin mosop imen ma yang tin Akono men won ung wo po enginin khaut khum eip u khum ponwal me nuk wo sun (70) tumen maksin, ma yang tirih hi ponwal ponwal li li kho li pi tin nunhum u tururun tumen tin tikayung ma yang ku li epon men.
42010002	Kut ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Endara tin mumuru kut men, men tang nuk mipi, si po tin ku li kum epon men men kiak. Tumen ma wom kines yang tin Akono e maran pit wo endara aiingin kaklat nginan men epo yang ku tih po kara li pol tin ku li kaklat endara tin muru men mipi tin tan men.
42010003	Wom lu ira soput ta wom. Wom hul, nga tih wom lu pol ken sipsip asus kara tin kuk lunga elwa enih kara men.
42010004	Si wom men ku kot eyel tin wom nonon ulu ko min men, u elik tin enda aiingin ko min men, u sandel tin ung hut khi wom men tumen asin. Ma wom lu ira soput, men ku wom wa mi wom si ta po ta asin.
42010005	Ma mang tin wom taku lu sup min men, men ku wom sakal lu muk taku, ‘Min wyungin men ku in to wom tin khuuk wal mi mang tin imen.’
42010006	Ma taku po tin in to min wyungin men ta in imen, men ku min wyungin tin ta wom men in epon kut. Wa taku pi engun, men ku kyok ti epo wom.
42010007	Ma wom ting kuk mi mang tin imen, ma wom ii endara u wom um tumen, endara tin tun tira e ku po wai si ta wom men, epo po ta tin ning kumang men, men tunus epon ku wa ulu sup wet ako. Si wom lu mang ta u mang ta ti asin.
42010008	Ma pi tin nhum e ku wom lu sup epon men, taku po wa wom, men ku wom ii enda aiingin tin tua e ku po wai me nuk mi yanga wom men engun.
42010009	Ma wom men ku mlis saihngin ta po tin sasaih imen, ma wom sakal ta po taku, ‘Enunu tin ta Got men kho me tikayung wom kut khae.’
42010010	Si pi nhum ta tin ku wom lu sup min men, taku po ku wa wom som, men wom lu nuk put soput emin pi tin imen, men ku wom sakal taku,
42010011	‘Nokokwa kut tin ta pi tin ta wom men, tin kuk po khi pim men, men pim a tung tung i po khi pim ko, kuma tosukngin ta tin ku pim a wa laulu ko po wom epon men. Takuma wom men ku ion i ti, epo enunu tin ta Got men men kho me in tikayung wom kut ako.’
42010012	Nga sakal ta wom ti, epo ungunan tin nhum e ta wungin ples nginan men kuli si, men ku wungin tin plesngin epo pi Sodom men, men kuli min amangngin epo sun tin imen ako.
42010013	Auh, ngon tin pi Korasin men, auh, ngon tin pi Betsaida men, epo wungin tin to kakhangin men, tin ningngin lunga wom kho men, taku ningngin lunga pi Taia to sun Saidon kho, men ku kho nginan ma po phi moolngin tin lengwal e epo min sukngin men, u po ko ung e li li si wul wul, ma po phae mi hi.
42010014	Si wungin ples nginan men kuli si, men ku wungin tin ku plesngin epo pi Taia to sun Saidon men, men kuli min amangngin epo sun tin ta mom men ako.
42010015	U ngon tin pi Kaperneam men, iyi, ngon e ku wa ngon si in ili wet pi, wah? Takuma ngon men ku weh me ko in pi tin ta hunngin men ako.
42010016	Epon taku po ta hul sakalngin ta wom, men hul sakalngin ta ngo kha men, si taku po ta wetpon wa sakalngin ta wom, men wetpon wa sakalngin ta ngo kut tumen, ma taku po ta wetpon wa sakalngin ta ngo, men wetpon wa sakalngin ta yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men kut tumen ako.”
42010017	Li klet ma po tin khum eip u khum ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen, men kyok me to min kehngin, ma po me sakal taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, epo emiun tin lenglengwal men, tin ek ek mara po men, hul wet pim maksin epo yap kut tumen.”
42010018	Ti ma yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Nga ion a-Nolongin kho, men plong ko wet pi ken pi tin si mlangan men.
42010019	Wom hul, nga wa emhong ko ta wom tin ku khi wom sak sak po isaling tin ekle men, u yakawu kut tumen, epon men, u emhong tin ku wom si nhum ton epo emhong maran kiring kiring tin ta a-Nolongin men kut tumen, ma endara ta ku mumhek mi wom angan ta akomen.
42010020	Takuma wom ku mi wom keh keh, men ku epo emiun tin hul wet wom men ti asin, si mi wom keh keh epo ya wom tin panngin nuk kho ili wet pi men.”
42010021	Minan tin min salak imen kha a-Yesus min keh keh epo Emiun Auluungin, ma yang sakal taku, “Yok, ngon tin Akono epo pi wet pi u mulus kut tumen, nga sam sam ngon epo ngon tin kaun wungin tin mosop imen epo po tin mhi hi ek u mara hi kleng kut tumen, si e suk mara po tin hohoin engun men epon. Wai, Yok, epo wungin tin tumen kha tunus to marap men.”
42010022	Ti ma yang phae maran li hang po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ma yang sakal ti, “Endara mosop men Yok mang tan ko nuk yanga wili ngo kho, ma po ta ku hop yang tin Wirun men som, si Wiraman misan, u po ta ku hop Wiraman som, si Wirun misan, u po ta tin Wirun min epo yang ku suk maran epon men kut tumen.”
42010023	Kut ma yang phae li epo po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ma yang sakal ta po tin hi nuk ta tuo hi men taku, “Emhong tin ta Got men ko po mara wom tin kon endara tin wom ion i homani men.
42010024	Epo nga pok wom epo po pokngin u po sinkhaung tumen munuman taku ion endara tin mara wom kon i homani men, takuma po ku ion i kho akomen, u po taku hul sakalngin tin wom hul i homani men, takuma po ku hul i kho akomen kut tumen.”
42010025	Li klet ma yang ta tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men si pit ma yang karong sun, ma yang wo taku, “Ngon tin kot pim men, ngo ku ning i tua weh kumali nga pakuh po ngin epo tunusngin tin sindak men?”
42010026	Ti ma yang ko sakal ta sun taku, “Sakalngin tin panngin nuk mi wungin sinsin men ani tua? Men e tiik i tua?”
42010027	Tumen ma yang ko sakal taku, “’Ngon men ku mip pit wo yang tin Akono e Got tap men to mip mosop, u to enu ngon mosop, u to kakhangin tap mosop, u to tulun hungin tin tap men mosop tumen, u ngon men ku mip pit wo po tin mom ung then men ken mip pit wo ngon tuop men weh kut tumen.’”
42010028	Ti ma yang ko sakal wet sun taku, “E sakal wet ngo siik. E ning i tin imen, men kuli e tunus in ako.”
42010029	Takuma yang taku in siik to mara sun, tumen ma yang sakal ta a-Yesus taku, “Si po ta tin tuk a in then men men ara weh?”
42010030	Kut ma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Yang ta yok Yerusalem ma li ko Yeriko, ma yang li pol ta po tin tipngin men, ma po kuul kuul moolngin ta yang li, u po ning i ma yang pon memlel tumen kho, anima po muk muk li, si po mang ta yang tin taku hun angan men nuk.
42010031	Kut si yang ta tin kum auluungin men phuk mi engin engun ma me ko ira soput tin imen. Ma yang me ion sun, men yang tak engin epo sun ma yang li.
42010032	Li klet ma yang ta tin hi Liwai khuuk wal men me pol pi tin imen, men wungin si then, ma yang me tuh wo sun, men yang tak engin epo sun ma yang kyok li kut tumen.
42010033	Si yang ta api Samaria muk muk li, men li pol pi tin sun nuk epon men. Ma yang ion sun, men yang min suk sun.
42010034	Tumen ma yang li tikayung sun, men yang yuk yuk nowhong u wain tumen ko mi wo sun tin sal sal men, ma yang wa mulu ma yang kas kas po sun epon. Li klet anima yang wa sun si nuk wo donki tin tan weh men, ma yang wa sun li mang tin po hihi i ta sun nomisang epo po ku me pit min men, ma yang maran pit wo sun.
42010035	Ungunan ta kyok ma yang taku yok, men yang wa ulu ponwal si ta sun tin maran pit wo mang men, ma yang wo ta sun taku, ‘Marap pit wo yang tunus. Ma taku e wa ulu kara si po sun tin ku e nhio wo yang epon men, takuli nga me, khamali nga me wai si emhut sun.’
42010036	Tumen ma e wo taku wuluk tin khaut miuk imen, men ara ngyuk ta ning wungin epo sun tin li pon ta po tipngin men ken yang e ngong in then men?”
42010037	Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Yang tin min suk sun men.” Kut ma a-Yesus sakal ta yang taku, “E lu ning i tumen.”
42010038	Kut si wungin si nuk ti, epo po muk muk ira soput, men yang li sup pi tanuan ta. Ma wut wala ta yan e-Marta men wa yang me sup mi mok tin tan men.
42010039	Ma wut tin imen eron ta in, men yan e-Maria, men ko ung sii khi a-Yesus ma wut ung e hul sakalngin ta yang.
42010040	Si e-Marta men silan khing pit po kumang nomoyong kara, ma wut me pol ta yang, men wut sakal taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ngon ku silap khing epo erok men mang put ngo, si misa ngo tin in e ning kumang men, wah? Tumen ma e wo ta wut epo wut ku me nhio wo ngo.”
42010041	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet wut taku, “Marta, Marta, ngon men silap khing ma e kamus epo wungin munuman kara.
42010042	Si wungin then ta misan kha e kalwok epon men, ma e-Maria kha won ung won tin tan e tunus weh men, men kuli klokngin epo wut akomen.
42011001	Kut si wungin si nuk ti, epo yang in e kines Got pi ta ma yang kines li pi angul kut, men po ta tin in mi sun tin hi hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, e kot pim epo pim tin ku kines Got men, ken a-Yon tin kot po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men.”
42011002	Tumen ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Taku wom ku kines, men ku wom sakal ti, ‘Ngon tin Wirama pim e e in ili wet pi men, yap men ku auluungin weh. Enunu tin tap men men ku me. Wungin tin nuk ta mip men men ku ningngin wo mulus ken sun tin ningngin ili wet pi men.
42011003	E wa endara aiingin tin ku kai mi pim to ungunan then then men si ta pim to ungunan then then.
42011004	E mang ta lasin ta pim, epo pim kut men pim a mang ta naumngin ta po tin naumngin ta hi pit wo pim men kut tumen. Ma e wa pim li sup mi karongngin asin, si e palolo pim wet wili yang tin wungin tan lengwal men.”
42011005	Li klet ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Taku po ta in lunga wom ku tita ngong sun ta ma yang kyok li pol ta sun to pi put elup ma yang sakal ta sun taku, ‘Worok, ngo taku wa naumngin epo beret khaut miuk.
42011006	Epo yang ta tin tita tuk men muk muk me pol ta ngo, ma nga in engun epo endara aiingin kara tin ngo ku wai ko nuk mi yanga yang men.’
42011007	Ti ma yang ku sakal wet sun mi mang taku, ‘E tus ngo asin. Sowon men won ko klet kho, ma husanik pit to ngo wo ehus. Ngo ku khek si kuma nga wa endara si tap akomen.’
42011008	Si nga sakal ta wom ti, aku, wulong tita ngong, takuma sinsin tin imen ani ku yang khek si ma yang li wa endara si ta sun men akomen, si taku yang ku manngin wan som, si yang in e hau pit wo sun kokyok kokyok, men ku yang khek si ma yang wa endara tin sun kalwok epon men mosop si ta sun engun ako.
42011009	Tumen ma nga sakal ta wom taku, wom men ku kines kokyok kokyok, men ku wangin si ta wom; wom men ku langun kokyok kokyok, men ku wom suon; u wom men ku nhong nhong kokyok kokyok, men ku sowon won pit epo wom kut tumen.
42011010	Epo po mosop tin kines kokyok kokyok men, men wai ako; u taku po ta langun kokyok kokyok, men ku suon ako; u taku po ta nhong nhong kokyok kokyok, men ku sowon pit epon kut tumen ako.
42011011	Ara in lunga wom masang tin khuuk sun men, taku wirun kines i epo beret kara, iyi, men ku wiraman wa enah si ta sun, wah? Wa taku yang kines epo ili, iyi, men ku wiewi ili si wa tamha si ta sun, wah?
42011012	Wa taku yang kines epo emon powarin ta, iyi, men ku wa yakawu ta si ta sun, wah? Awu, wungin tin mosop imen men pi om ako.
42011013	Wom tin wungin ta wom lengwal men pon ta wungin tin ku wom wa talungin tin turunus men si ta po tin husani wom men, tumen ma wom men ku ion i epo Wirama wom tin ung ili wet pi men ku iso wa Emiun Auluungin si ta po tin kines yang epon men weh ako!”
42011014	Li klet ma yang in e luul to emiun lengwal mi po ta, men ning i ma po wo hi korip. Tumen ma wungin si nuk ti, epo emiun tin lengwal imen kho li pol kut, men yang tin won korip men sakal. Ma po tin wa ilio angan men teret won.
42011015	Si po kara kuk mi sun men sakal taku, “Emhong tin ta a-Belsebul tin maran pit wo emiun lengwal mosop men kha yang luul to emiun tin lenglengwal men li pol epon men ako.”
42011016	Si po kara taku karong yang, ma po kines yang epo yang ku ning tosukngin ta tin api wet pi men.
42011017	Takuma yang pon ta wungin tin nuk ta mi po men kho, ma yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Enunu mosop tin pok mi engin ma hi sewut wal men, men ku po ta kyok in min som, u po kara tin khuuk wal ta hi weh men, taku hi pok mi engin ma sewut wal, men ku plong ko kut tumen.
42011018	Taku a-Nolongin maksin pok mi engin ma sewut wal, men ku enunu tin tan men pit nhing tua? Epo ele, epo wom wo epo ngo e luul to emiun tin lenglengwal men epo emhong tin ta a-Belsebul men.
42011019	Ma taku ngo e luul to emiun tin lenglengwal men epo emhong tin ta a-Belsebul men, si husani wom, men po luul to emiun lengwal epo emhong tin ta are? Tumen ma po tuo hi kha ku si ples wungin tin ta wom men.
42011020	Si taku nga luul to emiun lengwal epo Got wilin esapin, men irawin epo enunu tin ta Got men kho me ko po wom ako.
42011021	Taku yang apalukngin ta pi moolngin tan mosop tin epo lek walngin men ma yang haum eya mang tin tan nhum men, men miranngin ta yang men ko pit tunus.
42011022	Si taku po tin apalukngin epo sun men ta me sewut sun ma apalukngin hut sun, men ku espo endara mosop tin epo lek walngin e ta sun men tin sun hing won men, ma yang pok min ma yang kikyu po tin ta hi men epon ako.
42011023	Po ta ku tita tuk som, men nolo ngo kha men, u po ta ku palu endara to ngo som, men plak min kha men kut tumen.
42011024	Taku emiun tin min lengwal men ta li pol mi po ta, men ku li mili mili mi pi tin mara sanha men, ma emiun taku pon ta nhingngin kara. Takuma emiun ku pon tan ta som, men ku emiun wo taku, ‘Ngo ku kyok li mang tin nga in min ma nga me men kyok.’
42011025	Ma emiun kyok me kut, men emiun pon ta mang men whek mingin u endara mosop hihingin tunus min kut tumen.
42011026	Kut ma emiun kyok li espo emiun lengwal khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen, tin wungin ta hi lengwal epo sun men, ma emiun mosop kyok li sup mi mang ma hi kuk imen. Ma won maikngin tin si ta po tunus tin imen, men lengwal weh epo sun tin muk men.”
42011027	Kut ma wungin si nuk ti, epo yang in e pok put sakalngin tin imen, men wut wala ta in mi po tin wa ilio angan men wut pit ili awon ma wut sakal taku, “Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po kuma wut tin khuuk ngon men, u men ko po wut susun tin pa sus ngon men kut tumen!”
42011028	Takuma yang sakal taku, “Seh, emhong tin nhum epo sun tin imen men ti, taku po ta hul sakalngin ta Got ma iran weh!”
42011029	Ma po tin wa ilio angan men si posulul pit po yang, men yang hosi sakalngin taku, “Po tin khuuk wal homani iyi men wungin ta hi lengwal weh. Po langun epo tosukngin ta, takuma tosukngin ta ku ko ta po akomen. Awu. Tosukngin then ta misan, men tosukngin tin epo pokngin a-Yona men misan.
42011030	Epo a-Yona men si tosukngin ta epo po Niniweh, tumen kut kha kuli Wiru Po Tunus men si tosukngin ta epo po tin khuuk wal homan tin iyi men kut tumen.
42011031	Wut tin wala lamit e me epo pi esaul men kuli khek si in mi ples walngin tin nhum men to po tin khuuk wal homan tin iyi, men ku wut wa lasin ko po sun. Epo wut me porili mulus kuma wut me hul mhin ekngin tin ta a-Solomon men, iis, epo yang ta tin nhum epo a-Solomon men, men in iyi ako.
42011032	Po masang tin api Niniweh men kuli khek si nuk mi ples walngin tin nhum men to po tin khuuk wal homan tin iyi, men ku po wa lasin ko po sun, epo po phae mi hi wo sakalngin tin a-Yona pok put men, iis, epo yang ta tin nhum epo a-Yona men, men in iyi kut tumen ako.
42011033	Epon taku po ta tun esul ta, men ku wai li ung pi kaunngin ta wa sup li ung wet endara tin min engun men ta ewin akomen. Awu. Men po wai si ung wo khin tin tan men, kumali po tin ku me sup mi mang men ku ion esul.
42011034	Esul tin ta po tunus emkus a hi men men mara hi. Tumen ma taku marap tunus, men ku emkusi ngon mosop pi mi mlaeng klet min maksin kut tumen. Si taku marap lengwal, men ku emkusi ngon pi mi ku klet min maksin kut tumen.
42011035	Tumen ma tulup hu nuk po engin, epon takuli esul tin in mi ngon men men kuli ta pi mi ku.
42011036	Tumen ma taku emkusi ngon mosop men pi mi mlaeng klet min, si men ku mi ku ta in mi sun akomen, men ku emkusi ngon mosop pi mi mlaeng klet min, ken esul ta tin ngin ngin hambip ma pal nuk po ngon men.”
42011037	Ma yang in e sakal, men yang Parisi ta me kines sun epo yang ku me ii endara to sun. Tumen ma yang li sup mang ma yang ko nuk ewo tilin kuma yang ii endara.
42011038	Ma yang tin Parisi men ion wungin tin imen, men yang teret wo sun tin ku khis pon ira wungin tin ta hi Parisi e hi iran ewin men muk kho epo yang tin ku ii endara aiingin men akomen.
42011039	Kut ma yang tin Akono men sakal ta sun taku, “Epo wom Parisi men ning karia u karu tumen wetpon tunus, si mi wom men min wawai u wungin lengwal tumen kol mi wom weh.
42011040	Wom tin leleke men, iyi, Got tin ning i wetpon men, men ning i min maksin kut tumen ako, wah?
42011041	Si tunus epo wom men ku naa po epo min sukngin tin ku nuk na mi wom men weh. Iis, taku wom ning i tumen, men ku endara mosop si pon yil to mara wom ako.
42011042	Auh, wom tin Parisi men, epo wom wa sa kiin tin ipek turunus men u endara tururun tin maran kiring kiring e plok si mipi ta wom ma wom hyum po endara aiingin epon men min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men si ta Got, si wom yek ta wungin tin ku wom ples sakalngin emin weh men u min epongin tin ta Got men kut tumen. Wungin tin tururun imen men tunus epo wom ku ning i ako, si wom ku mang ta wungin tin nunhum imen li tek nuk asin.
42011043	Auh, wom tin Parisi men, epo mi wom pit pit epo ehus tin turunus weh e ung e li li mi mang akotngin tin ta wom men, u po tunus tin ku wa mi hi si ta wom mi pi tin po nal wal epon men kut tumen.
42011044	Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u wom Parisi kut tumen, wom tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men, epo wom kuk ken nahu tin po kil sun ko min men ta, tin ku po mara hi kon i som, si po muk muk won engun ma po pong epon men.”
42011045	Kut ma yang ta tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men sakal wet sun taku, “Ngon tin kot pim men, e sakal i tin imen, men e ton mi pim maksin kha men.”
42011046	Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men, epo wom men wa endara tin mamaik men ko po po tunus tin khung nginan epo po ku lat i men, si wom tuo wom men ku kah po endara tin mamaik imen epo wili wom pon pon ta akomen.
42011047	Auh, epo wom ning uwin tin tanuan e ta po pokngin men, epo po inana wom tuo hi kha lek sun ko huu men.
42011048	Wungin tin wom ning i imen kha wom pok put wungin epo mi wom tin tunusngin pit wo wungin tin po ning i men ako. Epo irawin epo po men lek sun ko huu, ma wom kha ning uwin tin tanuan e po kil sun ko min kho men.
42011049	Sinsin tin imen kha mhin ekngin tin ta Got men sakal maksin taku, ‘Ngo ku tih po pokngin u po paengin tumen li epo po, ma po kara kuk mi sun tin imen, men kuli po lek sun ko huu u po ning i lengwal epo sun kut tumen,’
42011050	kumali kalolan tin ta po pokngin mosop men, tin yuk yukngin ko ewo maran tin mulusngin pho pongin ma me men, men ku lasin tan ko po po tin khuuk wal homan tin iyi, ma men kuli po kul i,
42011051	hosingin epo Abel kalolan li pol epo a-Sekaraia kalolan, tin po wini ko hun emin suyung tin po ning talungin won men u mang auluungin kut tumen. Wai, nga sakal ta wom, epo wungin tin mosop imen ku lasin tan ko po po tin khuuk wal homan tin iyi, ma men kuli po kul i weh.
42011052	Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men, epo wom klok enda tin po klas epon kuma po li sup epo maran ekngin men li. Wom tuo wom men ku lu sup akomen, kuru po tin taku li sup men, men wom ten ten eya hi kut tumen.”
42011053	Ma yang in e sakal i tin imen si ta po, men po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u po Parisi kut tumen hosi wungin epo po ku ning wungin amhees epo yang, ma po kines mi yang epo wungin munuman,
42011054	ma po kaun kuk e li li mi sun ma po haum epo yang tin ku pok put sakalngin ta tin ku po suo yang ton kuma po wa lasin ko po yang epon men.
42012001	Kut si po wa ilio angan hambip takut tin ku po tiik hi angan akomen kho me palu wal, wungin tin imen kha po khi hi sak po sun kara lunga hi kara men, men ma yang ko hosi sakalngin si ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men muk epo sun taku, “Wom haum tunus epo yiis tin ta po Parisi men, men wungin ta po tin nuk wo eha men kha men.
42012002	Epo endara tin pang pongin nuk homani men, tin kuli lasngin si in pi mlaeng som men, ku ta nuk akomen; u endara tin kaunngin nuk homani men, tin kuli po pong epon men, ku ta nuk akomen kut tumen.
42012003	Tumen ma sakalngin tin akani e wom sakal i mi pi tin mi ku men, men kuli po hul i pi mlaeng; u sakalngin tin wom sakal i ko mi kinga po mi lahembengin tin ung e li li mi mang emin men, men kuli po si pok put ili eluwi mang tin ung e li li men kut tumen.
42012004	Ma nga sakal ta wom tin tita it men, epo po tin lek sun emkusin a hi ko huu men, anima po ku ning wungin ta maksin kyok si po sun tin imen kyok akomen, men ku wom lem pit wo hi asin.
42012005	Si ngo ku suk mara wom epo po ta tin ku wom lem pit won weh men. Men ku wom lem pit wo yang tin ku lek wom ko huu, anima yang in to emhong tin ku yang whis wom kyok ko put ngi yau tin sindak men. Wai, nga wo ta wom, epo wom men ku lem pit wo yang tin imen weh!
42012006	Iyi, po tirih emon tururun khaut eip epo ulu tin turun weh men ponwal ako, wah? Ma emon tin kuk to mara Got imen ku yang tulun som epon ta akomen.
42012007	Epo yut wom tin wala nuk mhi wom men mosop men tiikngin kho ako. Tumen ma wom men ku lem asin. Epo enu wom men tunus weh epo emon tururun munuman kara ako.
42012008	Kuru nga sakal ta wom ti, taku po ta pok put ngo to mara po tunus, po tin imen kha kuli Wiru Po Tunus pok put maksin to mara tihngin tin ta Got men kut tumen.
42012009	Si taku po ta sup sup put ngo to mara po tunus, men ku nga sup sup put maksin to mara tihngin tin ta Got men kut tumen.
42012010	Ma taku po ta pok put sakalngin ewut Wiru Po Tunus, men ku lasin tan klokngin ako. Si taku po ta wa ton mingin ewut Emiun Auluungin, men ku lasin tan klokngin akomen.
42012011	Ma minan tin akani e ku po wa wom lu mang akotngin tin ung e li li men, u epo po tin mara hi pit wo sun men, u epo po tin emhong nuk si wut hi men tumen, men ku sila wom khing epo wom tin ku sakal wet po tua wa epo wungin tin ku wom sakal i men asin.
42012012	Epo Emiun Auluungin men ku kot wom minan tin wala imen siik epo sakalngin tin tunus epo wom ku sakal i men.”
42012013	Kut ma po ta tin in mi sun tin wa ilio angan men sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon tin kot pim men, e wo ta worok epo yang ku pok mi moolngin tin yok pakuh po tuk epon men ma yang wai kara si ta ngo.”
42012014	Takuma yang ko wo ta sun taku, “Tuon, ara won ung wo ngo epo ngo ku ples wungin tap wa nga pok mi enda ta si tap?”
42012015	Ti ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Mara wom si kuk ma wom haum tunus epo maran nesngin, epo tunusngin ta po ta men ku in epo endara nomoyong tin po kasum i men som.”
42012016	Kut ma yang pok put wungin emol ta si ta po, men yang sakal taku, “Mipi ta yang miran ta, men endara aiingin muru ma nuk a salok.
42012017	Ma yang wo ta min taku, ‘Ngo ku ning i tua, epo mang min tin ku nga wa endara aiingin ta ngo li pit min men men pi om.’
42012018	Tumen ma yang ko wo ti, ‘Ngo men ku ning i ti: ngo ku ninhien mang ta ngo tin ung e li li e nga halung po enda aiingin ta ngo li pit min men, ma ngo ku ning i nunhum kara epo sun. Ma mi mang tin imen men ku nga halung po enda aiingin ta ngo u miranngin ta ngo kut tumen mosop li pit e li li min.
42012019	Ma ngo ku wo ta enu ngo ti, “Enu ngo, ngon men endara tap tin turunus men hambip nuk tin ku kai ngon to posan munuman men. E nhing ma e ii endara u e um u mip keh keh engun kut tumen.”’
42012020	Takuma Got ko wo ta yang taku, ‘Ngon tin leleke men, pi luk tin iyi weh men ku nga wo ma enu ngon klokngin hang ngon. Ma minan tin imen men ku endara tin e hihi i imen men kuli ta are?’
42012021	Wungin tin tumen kha ku si epo po ta tin halung po miranngin tan tuon, si men in lengwal to mara Got men.”
42012022	Kut ma yang sakal ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Tumen ma nga wo ta wom ti, epo wom men ku sila wom khing pit po tunusngin tin ta wom men asin, epon kuli wom ku ii ele. Kuru wom men ku sila wom khing pit po emkusin a wom asin, epon kuli wom ku phi ele.
42012023	Tunusngin men nhum epo enda aiingin, u po emkusin na hi men nhum epo moolngin kut tumen ako.
42012024	Tulu wom hu pit po emon khong, epo emon tin imen men ku som e wha u ku som e lok lok endara ewin akomen. Kuru mang emin ta u mang nhum ta tin ku emon halung po enda aiingin tan li pit min men men pi om kut tumen, takuma Got in e pa ken emon engun. Iyi, wom men tunus weh epo emon ako, wah?
42012025	Ara weh tin in lunga wom men taku silan khing, men ku wa kaingin then ta ko pit po mhin li si?
42012026	Taku wom talok mi wungin tin tun weh imen, taku tua ma sila wom khing epo wungin tin kara maksin men?
42012027	Wom men ku urut wungin tunus epo mongin tin plok si tua men. Mongin tin imen men ku wuh kumang wa ku piak kawu tin ku po ning mulu epon men ewin akomen, takuma nga pok wom siik epo a-Solomon kut tin in mi moolngin tan maran kiring kiring men, men ku mool ken sun tin imen ta akomen kut tumen.
42012028	Wom tin wo phepngin ta wom kiak men, taku Got phi epilil epo moolngin tin tumen, tin homani ma nuk tunus yanga pi tin yangae men, si to pi king kauk men whisngin ko mi wunwun tin po sut endara min men, men kuli yang iso phi wom epon maksin kut tumen ako, wah!
42012029	Ma wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku pon ta endara tin ku wom iini wa tin ku wom um i men asin, kuru wom men ku sila wom khing epon asin kut tumen.
42012030	Epo endara tin mosop imen kha po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e hi ung e li li wo mulus men tohuh epo po ku pon tan men, si Wirama wom men ion wom tin kalwok epo endara tin imen kho ako.
42012031	Si wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku pon ta enunu tin ta Got men weh, men kuli endara tin mosop imen sum sumngin ko po sun ta wom maksin kut tumen.
42012032	Wom tin kuk ken sipsip sakun kara engun men, wom men ku lem asin, epo Wirama wom men min nawaehngin weh epon tin ku yang wa enunu si ta wom men.
42012033	Wom men ku tih endara tin wom kuk ton men ma ulu tin wom wai men, men ku mi wom suk po tin kalwok men epon. Wom ning eyel ta tuo wom tin ku wom nonon ulu ko min men, tin ku lengwal ewin som men, men miranngin tin pit ili wet pi e ku kis ewin som men. Pi tin imen men ku po tipngin me tikayung epon u ewup tin tururun men ku ning pi won pit po moolngin tumen ewin akomen.
42012034	Epo pi tin wom halung po miranngin ta wom li pit epon men, men pi tin imen kha kuli mi wom pit pon men maksin kut tumen ako.
42012035	Moolngin tin ta wom e nomalak men, men ku wom mol i si wom sol i ko put wom pipip, u esul tin ta wom men men ku ung e ngin ngin kokyok kokyok li kut tumen.
42012036	Ma wom tuo wom men ku kuk ken po tin kaeng phua ta hi men, tin ku kyok me to pi elini epo po tin enanangin men, kumali yang kyok me ma yang nhong nhong, men ku po klas epo yang kerek engun.
42012037	Emhong tin ta Got men ko po po tin kum wo phua ta men, tin phua ku me, men ku yang me pon ta po tin kuk e haum tunus men. Nga wo anuh ta wom, epo moolngin tin ta phua e nomalak men men ku yang mol i si yang sol i ko put pipip, ma yang wo epo po ku ko nuk ewo tili hi kuma po ii enda aiingin, men ku yang tuon me hang po ma yang kikyu po epo enda aiingin.
42012038	Ma taku yang me mi elup tin me ponwal angan e po haum to pi luk ton men, wa yang ku me mi elup tin me miuk angan e po haum to pi luk ton men, ma yang me pon ta po men kuk e haum tunus tumen, po tin kum wo phua tumen kha emhong tin ta Got men ko po hi men.
42012039	Si wom men ku ion i ti, epon taku phua tin mang tan men ku ion elup put ta tin tipngin ku me epon men, men ku yang haum ma yang maran pit tunus, men ku yang mang ta sun tin ku hik mang ta sun ma li sup min men akomen.
42012040	Tumen ma wom kut men ku hihi wom kho, epo Wiru Po Tunus men ku me, men ku me mi elup put ta tin ku wom hoo mi mi wom epon ku kyok me men akomen.”
42012041	Kut ma a-Pita ko sakal ta sun taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, e sakal emol tin imen, men e sakal i epo misa pim, wa epo po masang to sun wala mosop, wah?”
42012042	Ti ma yang tin Akono men ko sakal taku, “Tumen ma ara in e maran pit wo endara tin ta phua men, tin wungin tan anuh u mhin ek kut tumen, tin phua ku ning i ma maran pit wo po mosop u endara mosop tin pit mi mang ta phua men, kuma yang kikyu po epo endara aiingin ta hi then then to pi tin phua won ung won men siik?
42012043	Emhong tin ta Got men ko po po ta tin kum wo phua ta men, tin phua tan ku me, men ku phua me pon ta yang men in e ning i tumen.
42012044	Nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo phua men ku wa yang tin imen si maran pit wo endara mosop tin ta phua men ako.
42012045	Si taku yang tin kum ta phua men wo ta min taku, ‘Phua tin ta ngo men yak mi engin epo yang tin ku me men,’ ti ma yang hosi wungin epo yang ku lek po masang to sun wala tin kum ta phua men, u yang in e ii endara u yang um u yang um wain hambip li yang tulun som tumen,
42012046	men ku phua tin ta yang tin kum ta phua tin imen me, men ku me mi ungunan ta tin ku yang maran pit epo sun ton men akomen, u mi elup put ta tin yang pong epo engin epon men kut tumen. Ma phua me mut put yang ma yang won ung wo pi ta sun to po tin ku wo hi phep som men.
42012047	Ma yang tin kum wo phua tin imen, tin ion wungin tin phua min epon men, si ku hihi i tunus wa ning i ira wungin tin phua min epon men akomen, men ku wawlaukngin ma pon wluk wluk munuman.
42012048	Si yang tin ku ion wungin tin phua min epon men som, tin ning wungin tin tunus epon tin ku yang wawlaukngin epon men, men ku wawlaukngin ma pon wluk wluk kiak engun. Epon taku po ta wa endara munuman, men kuli wai munuman kyok si emhut sun; u po ta tin sun wa endara munuman si yanga wilin kuma maran pit won ta sun men, po tin imen men ku sun kines i kyok epo endara kara kyok si po sun kut tumen ako.
42012049	Nga me epo ngo ku whis yau ko wo mulus. Auh, mi ngo epo yau tin imen ku tunngin kho.
42012050	Si baptais ta ngo ta men in tin ku nga wai weh men. Auh, nga in e miu ngo tuung weh li pol minan tin kuli baptais tin imen suuk siingin weh men.
42012051	Iyi, wom wo taku nga me kuma nga wa wungin aminis ko in wo mulus? Nga pok wom, men pi om, si nga me epo ngo ku ning i ma po masang to sun wala pok pok mi al ako.
42012052	Epo homani ma li, men ku po khaut eip khuuk wal mi mang ta, men ku pok mi al. Men ku wuluk miuk nolo wulong ponwal, u wulong ponwal nolo wuluk miuk kut tumen.
42012053	Yang ta tin kuk sun men ku nolo wirun, u wirun ku nolo wiraman; wut wala ta tin khuuk sun men ku nolo erun, u erun ku nolo tonin; wut wala ta men ku nolo erkan, u erkan ku nolo sun tin erkan men kut tumen.”
42012054	Kut ma yang sakal kyok ta po tin wa ilio angan men taku, “Taku wom ion hingis ta me si solong sin, kerek engun men ku wom wo taku, ‘Pi yung ku me,’ ma men tumen kut.
42012055	U taku wom ion eip tin me esaul men si, men ku wom wo taku, ‘Pi men ku ngeng ngeng,’ ma men si.
42012056	Wom tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men, wom ion i tin ku wom hop wet pi maran u mulus maran tumen, taku tuni ma wom ku ples elup tin homan iyi tunus akomen?
42012057	Kuru tua ma wom ku ples wungin tin e ku siik weh men lunga wom tuo wom akomen kut tumen?
42012058	Epon taku e lu pol to yang ta tin wa wungin pit po ngon men li epo phua tin maran pit wo wom men ma mom ira soput li, men ku e tohuh weh epo ngon tin ku plosngin epo naumngin tap tin pit wo yang men, epon akuli yang tin wa wungin pit po ngon men nak ngon li epo phua tin ples wungin nginangan men, ma phua tin ples wungin nginangan men wa ngon li sup yanga wili sun tin in to bainat men, ma yang tin in to bainat men psik ngon li sup mi mang tin po kan kan sun li pit min ewin men.
42012059	Nga pok ngon, epo ngon men ku mu pol mi mang tin imen angan ta som. Awu. Ngon men ku in min weh li pol minan tin kuli e kul naumngin tin pit po ngon men weh li ulu tin tun weh e me sulung weh men men e suuk siin kut.
42013001	Kut ma minan tin imen po kara kuk, men me pok yang epo po Galili tin a-Pailat phae kalol a hi to talungin tin ta hi men.
42013002	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Iyi, wom phaeng taku po Galili tin imen men lasin ta hi e ku nhum epo sun tin ta hi Galili kara men ani po wuh wungin tin imen, wah?
42013003	Nga pok wom, men pi om. Si taku wom ku phae mi wom som, men ku wom mosop huuspit kai po tin imen ako.
42013004	U po tin khaut eip miuk u miuk me nuk wo sun (18) e suyung nomalak tin pit mi hi Siloam men plong ko lek hi ko huu men, men wom phaeng taku lasin ta hi men nhum epo sun kara tin hi ung Yerusalem men, wah?
42013005	Nga pok wom, men pi angul. Si taku wom ku phae mi wom som, men ku wom mosop huuspit kai po tin imen ako.”
42013006	Kuru yang sakal emol ta ti, “Yang ta men sa pik tan whangin pit mipi wain tin tan men, ma yang taku me pon ta sa tin imen enun kara, takuma yang ku me pon ta sa enun kara som.
42013007	Kut ma yang sakal ta sun tin maran pit wo mipi wain men taku, ‘Auh, posan miuk kho li ani nga me tuh wo sa pik tin iyi kuma nga me suon enun kara, takuma men pi om. E taini ko engun. Epon men ku pit ma uspo mulusngin tin ikil men engul epo ele?’
42013008	Takuma yang sakal wet sun taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, e mang tan pit to posan tin iyi wet, kuma nga kil pi sup siin u nga wa piukngin ko siin kut tumen.
42013009	Ma taku sa enun, men tunus; wa taku pi engun, men ku posan tin me men men ku e taini ko engun.’”
42013010	Li klet ma yang in e kot po mi mang akotngin tin ta hi men ta to pi Sabat.
42013011	Ih, wut wala ta in, men emiun lengwal ta ning i ma wut wiak wiak to posan khaut eip miuk u miuk me nuk wo sun (18) tumen kho li, epo wut musut plem ma wut ku si pit siik angan akomen.
42013012	Ma a-Yesus ion wut, men yang yuk wut me epo yang ma yang sakal ta wut taku, “Ngon tin wala men, won maikngin tin tap men men klokngin li kut.”
42013013	Ti ma yang wilin si nuk po wut, ma kerek engun ma wut si pit siik, ma wut wa Got yan si.
42013014	Kut si yang tin maran pit wo mang akotngin men sakal wet sun to min kakhat sun, epon tin a-Yesus mlis saihngin to pi Sabat men. Ma yang sakal ta po tin wa ilio angan men taku, “Ungunan tin eip u then ta me sup kha ku po tunus ning kumang epon men. Tumen ma ungunan tin imen kha ku wom mu ma saihngin ta wom mlisngin epon men, si wom kuk aku wom mu to pi tin Sabat men asin.”
42013015	Ti ma yang tin Akono men sakal wet sun taku, “Ngon tin wungin tap nuk wo eha men, iyi, wom then then men poplos bulmakau wa donki tin ta wom then then men mi mang ta wom then then to pi Sabat, ma wom wa li epo eki ewin ako, wah?
42013016	Tumen ma wut tin wala imen, tin hi khuuk wal me epo Abraham men, men a-Nolongin kan kan i to posan eip miuk u miuk me nuk wo sun tumen kho li. Tulu wom hu i wet, men tunus epo wut men ku plosngin epo won maikngin tin kan kan wut men to pi Sabat men ako, wah?”
42013017	Ma yang sakal i tin imen kut, men po tin nolo yang men manngin wa hi. Si po tin wa ilio angan men mi hi keh keh epo wungin tin min tunus weh e ning ningngin yanga wili yang men.
42013018	Kut ma yang sakal taku, “Enunu tin ta Got men e ken ele? U ngo ku kaini to ele tumen?
42013019	Men ken sa mastet ihun ta tin yang ta wai li mipi tan ma yang psik i ko men; ma men plok si ken sa men, ma emon tin yap yap wet pi men me ning mlut kuk e li li po wili sa.”
42013020	Kuru yang wo kyok taku, “Ngo ku kai enunu tin ta Got men to ele?
42013021	Men ken yiis, tin wut wala ta wai me ma kaun i mi plaua kaingin khaut miuk, li ma plaua mosop ung e iit si.”
42013022	Ma yang mili mili mi pi tin nunhum u tururun tumen, ma yang in e kot po, ma yang muk muk ku li Yerusalem.
42013023	Kut ma po ta ko sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, po tin kuli palolongin men ku kiak kara engun, wah?” Ti ma yang ko sakal ta sun ti,
42013024	“Wom men ku tohuh weh epo wom ku lu sup mi sowon tin won tun men, epo nga sakal ta wom ti, epo po munuman taku li sup, takuma po men ku li khuk po engin weh.
42013025	Epo phua tin mang tan men taku si ma sambal si eya mang kho, si wom men ku nuk mara so ma wom nuk e nhong nhong mara sowon, ma wom nuk e sakal taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, ngon tin Akono men, e klas epo pim!’ Ti men kuli yang sakal wet wom taku, ‘Ngo ku pon ta pi tin wom mu epon men som.’
42013026	Minan tin imen men kuli wom hosi sakalngin taku, ‘Pim a ii endara u um tumen to marap, u e kot pim ira soput tin nuk e li li ta pim men kut tumen.’
42013027	Takuma yang kuli sakal taku, ‘Nga pok wom epo ngo ku pon ta pi tin wom mu epon men akomen. Wom yang mara ngo, wom mosop tin ning wungin lengwal nginangan men.’
42013028	Pi tin imen men ku wom kuk e hau hambip u wom kuk e ii ngi wom kakyat kakyat po al epon kut tumen, minan tin wom ion Abraham, u Aisak, u a-Yakop u po pokngin mosop kut tumen, men hi me kuk mi enunu tin ta Got men, si wom tuo wom men ku whisngin li pol wetpo so.
42013029	Ma po men ku me epo pi mara naeng u pi solong sin, u ku me pi nekip sin u pi esaul kut tumen, ma po ko nuk ewo tili hi baul suyung tin ta kakaomngin men mi enunu tin ta Got men.
42013030	Irawin, epo po kara tin li muk men, kuli me sulung, si po kara tin li sulung men kuli li muk.”
42013031	Ungunan tin wala imen ma po Parisi kara me sakal ta yang taku, “E yang pi tin iyi ma e lu, epo a-Herot taku wi ngon ko hun.”
42013032	Ti ma yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Wom lu pok elwa enih tin tun imen ti, ‘E hul, nga luul to emiun lengwal li pol u nga mimlis saihngin ta po homani u to pi king kauk kut tumen, li ma ungunan tin me miuk angan men kha kuli nga suuk sii kumang tin ta ngo men.’
42013033	Takuma ngo men ku muk muk li homani, u to pi kingkauk, u to pi malam kut tumen weh. Epon men khung nginan weh epo pokngin ta tin ku wingin ko hun ma huuspit wetpo pi Yerusalem men.
42013034	Auh, Yerusalem, Yerusalem, ngon tin lek po pokngin ko huu u e tep enah po po tin tihngin li epo ngon men tumen! Angan munuman kho men nga taku palu husanim me kuk to al ken emon nomal wala ta palu husanin me sup wet mhit tin tan men, takuma mara wom luluun.
42013035	Wom hul, mang tin ta wom men, men nga mang tan min engul ung epo wom. Nga wo anuh ta wom, epo ngo men ku ion wom kyok som weh li pol minan tin kuli me ma ku wom sakal taku, ‘Emhong tin ta Got men men ku weh ko po yang tin me epo yang tin Akono men yan men.’”
42014001	Kut si wungin si nuk ti, epo yang li sup mi mang ta sun ta tin hi mara hi pit wo hi Parisi men kuma yang ii beret to pi Sabat, men po kuk e mara hi pit mi wungin ta yang weh.
42014002	Ih, yang ta in to mara sun men elit som hambip.
42014003	Ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u po Parisi kut tumen taku, “Iyi, wungin sinsin men sam wet it tin ku mlis saihngin to pi Sabat men, wah?”
42014004	Takuma po iso homong. Ma yang wa sun me, ma yang mlis saihngin ta sun, anima yang mang ta sun li.
42014005	Kut ma yang sakal wet po taku, “Ara in lunga wom, men in to donki ta wa bulmakau ta tin li plong ko ung mi nahu ta men, men ku kerek li wa li me si mi nahu to pi Sabat wa ku in engun, wah?”
42014006	Takuma po khuk po engin epo po tin ku sakal wet yang pit mi wungin tin imen.
42014007	A-Yesus ion po tin me wo hi ung wo ehus ta po tin ya hi pos men, men yang sakal emol ta epo po tin sun yuk hi me men taku,
42014008	“Taku po ta yuk ngon ku me epo kakaomngin ta tin ta enanginngin men, men ku e lu ung wo ehus tin ung muk men asin, epon akuli yang tin mang tan imen yuk sun ta tin yan pos epo ngon men,
42014009	ma yang tin yuk ngon u sun tin imen me wo tap taku, ‘E si powi yang tin imen si yang ti wa ehus tin tap men,’ ma minan tin imen manngin wa ngon, ma e lu ko ung wo ehus tin ta po tin me sulung weh men.
42014010	Si taku po ta yuk ngon, men ku e lu ung wo ehus tin ta po tin me sulung weh men, si kuma yang tin yuk ngon me men ku me, men ku yang sakal tap ti, ‘Worok, e lu si ili maran min.’ Minan tin imen men ku e si nhum to mara po tin ko nuk ewo tili hi baul suyung to ngon men.
42014011	Epon taku po ta wa yan si awon, men kuli yan wangin ko, si taku po ta wa yan ko, men kuli yan wangin si.”
42014012	Li klet anima yang sakal maksin ta sun tin yuk yang me men taku, “Minan tin akani e ku e ning kakaomngin ta men, taku to pi kingkauk angan wa to pi luk angan wa tumen, men ku e in aku e yuk po tin tita wom men, wa ehuro wom, wa po tin wom khuuk wal men, wa po miran tin wom kuk then men ta asin, epon takuli po yuk ngon kyok, ma po wai si emhut sun tap.
42014013	Si taku e ning kakaomngin ta, men ku e yuk po tin weh kuk engun epo endara men, u po tin sokongin maran kiring kiring lek hi men, u po tin khi hi lengwal men, u po tin mara hi korip men tumen me epo kakaomngin tap.
42014014	Ma emhong tin ta Got men kuli ko po ngon, epo po tin imen ku wa endara si emhut sun tin tap men akomen. Epo ngon men kuli wa endara emhut sun minan tin kuli po tin wungin ta hi siik men khek kyok si tunus men ako.”
42014015	Ti ma po ta in mi sun tin hi nuk ewo tili hi baul suyung men hul sakalngin tin imen, men yang sakal ta sun taku, “Emhong tin ta Got men ko po po ta tin kuli ii beret mi enunu tin ta Got men!”
42014016	Kut ma yang sakal ta sun taku, “Yang ta men ning kakaomngin nhum ta ma yang wa myus li pit wo po munuman tin ku me men,
42014017	ma yang tih sun tin kum tan men to pi luk angan tin po ii endara epon men kuma yang li wo ta po tin yang wa myus li pit wo hi kho men taku, ‘Wom muh, epo endara aiingin mosop men hihingin kho kut.’
42014018	Takuma po mosop sakal then ma po ko hosi sakalngin epo po ku kalele sakalngin. Yang tin muk men sakal ta sun ti, ‘Ngo men kul mulusngin ta, ma ngo ku li ion i. Nga kines ngon, e mang si nga in engun.’
42014019	Si yang ta maksin men sakal ti, ‘Nga kul bulmakau kan kanngin to al ponwal khaut eip, ma ngo ku li tong tong li. Nga kines ngon, e mang si nga in engun.’
42014020	Si yang ta maksin kyok ko sakal taku, ‘Nga enangin wut wala ta, tumen ma ngo ku me akomen.’
42014021	Tumen ma yang tin kum ta sun men me pok phua tin tan men epo sakalngin tin mosop imen. Kut ma phua tin mang tan men yan sal ma yang sakal ta sun tin kum tan men taku, ‘E lu pol nang nang put soput tin nunhum u tururun e ta enunu men ma e espo po tin weh kuk engun epo endara men, u po tin sokongin lengwal maran kiring kiring lek hi men, u po tin khi hi lengwal men, u po tin mara hi korip men, tumen, me iyi.’
42014022	Ti ma yang tin kum ta sun men ko sakal ti, ‘Phua, men ningngin kho ken sun tin e wo epon men, ma pi kara iso pit.’
42014023	Kut ma yang tin phuan men wo ta sun tin kum tan men taku, ‘E lu pol put soput tin nunhum u tururun e nuk woringi pi men ma e heek weh epo po ku weh me sup, kuma mang tin ta ngo men ku kol weh.
42014024	Epo nga sakal ta wom epo po tin yukngin kho men ku ta me tong enda aiingin tin ta ngo men akomen, taku phiit wa manom wa men.’”
42014025	Kut si po wa ilio angan hambip kara li to yang. Ma yang phae i ma yang sakal ta po taku,
42014026	“Taku po ta me hang ngo, si ku wetpon wa wiraman ngong tonin, u titien hi husani hi, u ehuro hi u ehulut hi, wai, u enun tuon kut tumen som, men ku si ken po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngo men ta akomen.
42014027	U taku po ta ku lat sa wlong put wal tan ma me ira ngo som, men ku si ken po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngo men ta akomen kut tumen.
42014028	Epon taku po ta in mi wom taku ning mang nomalak ta, men ku ko ung ma maran pit mi ulu tin epo mang ning nginan men wet, taku ulu tin imen ku kai mang tin imen ning nginan li suuk siingin weh wa men.
42014029	Epon akuli po tin imen hang enah tin ku mang ningngin si won men kho, si po kalwok epo endara tin ku po suuk sii mang epon men, anima po mosop tin ion i tin imen hosi lesngin tin pit wo yang men,
42014030	ma po sakal taku, ‘Yang tin ikop hosi mang tan ning nginan, takuma yang ku kakha weh epo yang ku suuk sii mang akomen.’
42014031	U taku yang sinkhaung ta taku li sewut sun sinkhaung ta ma ngong lek wal, men ku yang ko ung ma yang maran ira kakhangin tan wet, taku yang ku apalukngin hut sun to po nolo tan khaut khum khum khum khum ta (10,000) li sewut sun tin ku me lek wal to yang to po nolo tan khaut khum khum khum khum ponwal (20,000) wa men?
42014032	Wa taku yang ion i epo yang ku kakha som, men ku yang tin sinkhaung ta maksin men iso in hin, men ku yang tih po kara li epo sun ma po kines sun epo sinsin tin ku wulong ung aminis to wal epon men.
42014033	Tumen engun, taku po ta in lunga wom men ku wetpon wa endara mosop tin tan men som, men ku in ken po ta tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngo men akomen.
42014034	Sauli men tunus, si taku sauli ko manom, men ku ningngin si phiit tua kyok?
42014035	Sauli tin tumen men ku tunus epo po ku wai ko mipi wa po ku phae to piukngin tin ta bulmakau e po halung pon men kyok akomen. Awu. Po tunus whis i li engun. Po ta kingan ung epon ku hul, men ku hul weh!”
42015001	Kut ma po mosop tin hi palu takis ta sun phuan men u po tin ya hi to lasin men kut tumen, men me tikayung yang kuma po me hul yang.
42015002	Ma po Parisi to sun tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men katiktik wungin, ma po sakal taku, “Yang tin ikop wa po tin ning lasin nginangan men ma yang ii endara to po.”
42015003	Tumen ma yang sakal emol tin iyi si ta po, men yang sakal taku,
42015004	“Taku po ta in to sipsip khum khum ta (100), u taku yang kis sipsip ta, men ku yang mang ta sipsip tin khaut khum mnal me sup u mnal me sup (99) tumen kuk pi tin tahunggu men, si yang li langun epo sipsip tin kis men li yang suon weh, wah? Wai, men ku yang ning i tumen ako.
42015005	Ma minan tin yang li suo li men, men yang lat li si ung uwan, ma yang min keh keh takut.
42015006	Ma yang kyok li mang tan, men ku yang yuk po tin tita hi u po tin pi ta hi then men tumen me palu wal, ma yang sakal ta po taku, ‘Mi wom keh keh to ngo, epo nga li suo sipsip tin ta ngo e kis men kho kut!’
42015007	Nga sakal ta wom ti, epo min kehngin nhum kai sun tin imen men ku si ili wet pi epo po tin to lasin men ta tin phae min men, men ku nhum epo min kehngin tin ku si epo po tin khaut khum mnal me sup u mnal me sup (99) e wungin ta hi siik men tin kuk epon ku phae mi hi som men.
42015008	U taku wut wala ta men in to ulu eip ponwal, ma taku wut kis ulu then ta men ku wut tun esul, ma wut whek mi mok, ma wut maran pit tunus epo ulu li wut suon weh ako, wah? Iyi, po wala tin ku ning i tumen ewin som men ta in, wah? Awu. Men pi engun.
42015009	Ma minan tin wut suo ulu tin imen, men ku wut yuk po tin tita hi u po tin hi kuk then men tumen me palu wal, men ku wut sakal ta po taku, ‘Mi wom keh keh to ngo, epo nga suo ulu tin nga kis i men kho kut!’
42015010	Nga sakal ta wom ti, epo min kehngin nhum kai sun tin imen, men si mi Got to mara po tihngin tin tan men epo po tin in to lasin men ta tin phae min men.”
42015011	Li klet ma yang sakal taku, “Yang ta in to husanin masang ponwal.
42015012	Ma wirun tin ira sun men wo ta wiraman taku, ‘Yok, e pok mi endara mosop tin tap men ma e pakuh po ngo epon tin wop ung won ta ngo men.’ Tumen ma wiraman pok mi endara mosop tin tan men ma yang wai si si ta wulong.
42015013	Li ma ungunan kara kho li ma wirun tin ira sun men palu endara mosop tin tan men, ma yang muk muk li wo mulusngin ta tin ung hin men, ma pi tin imen yang siwul mi endara tin tan men epo sasayihngin maran kiring kiring.
42015014	Ma yang uspon mosop, men elwip nhum ta si wo mulusngin tin imen, ma yang me in engul weh epo endara mosop.
42015015	Ma minan tin imen yang li in to sun ta tin nopuan e hi khuuk wal wo mulusngin tin imen, ma yang tih sun li wo mulusngin tin tan men kuma yang pa ken kanem tin kuk pi tin imen.
42015016	Ma yang min epo yang taku ii erek elit engun tin kanem kuk e iini men li ko mi kuman kuma yang mut, takuma po ta ku wa endara kara si ta yang kuma yang iini akomen.
42015017	Li klet ma tulun hungin ta yang kyok si, ma yang sakal ti, ‘Auh, po esini tin lengwal engun e hi kum anaum ta yok men, men endara aiingin ta hi kai po weh u kara si po sun weh kut tumen, si ngo men ku hun angan wo elwip kut khae!
42015018	Ngo men ku si ma nga kyok li epo yok, ma nga sakal ta yang taku, ‘Yok, ngo men ning lasin epo yang tin ung ili wet pi men u to marap kut tumen,
42015019	ma homani ma ngo men ku tunus epo ngon ku sikia ngo wirum kyok akomen. Si e mang ma nga si ken po ta tin kum anaum tap men engun.”’
42015020	Tumen ma yang si ma yang li epo wiraman. Si yang iso muk muk me hin, men wiraman maran li kon sun ma yang min suk sun, ma yang sa pukalal sun li kasum wut sun, ma yang tumum wo sun.
42015021	Ma wirun sakal si ta sun taku, ‘Yok, nga ning lasin epo yang tin ung ili wet pi men u to mara ngon kut tumen, ma homani men ku nga tunus kuma e sikia ngo wirum kyok akomen.’
42015022	Takuma wiraman ko wo ta po tin kum ta yang men taku, ‘Wom wa moolngin tin tunus weh men me pol ma wom wai ko po yang, u wom wa moolngin min pil ta ung wili yang eringin, u wom wa sandel me ung hut khi yang kut tumen.
42015023	Ma wom wa bulmakau tin tuleng nuk pi mlaeng men me iyi ma wom wini, ma it men ku iini ma mi it keh keh weh takut.
42015024	Epo wiruk tin iyi men hun kho si homani ma yang kyok si tunus. Yang men kis kho, si homani men it suo yang kyok.’ Ti ma po hosin epo po ku mi hi keh keh.
42015025	Si wirun tin nomuru men in mipi. Ma yang ung e me tikayung mang, men yang hul lutngin u po kara tin yik men kut tumen.
42015026	Tumen ma yang yuk sun ta tin kum ta wiraman men me, yang kines sun epo wungin tin imen sinsin ani tua.
42015027	Ti ma yang ko sakal ta sun taku, ‘Wirom men kho me kut, ma wiramap wi bulmakau tin tuleng men, epon tin yang wa sun kyok me in anga tunusngin men.’
42015028	Takuma yang yansal ma yang ku li sup mi mang akomen. Tumen ma wiraman me pol ma yang paret sakalngin si ta sun.
42015029	Ti ma yang sakal wet wiraman taku, ‘Auh, posan tin munuman kho li men, men nga in e kum tap. Ngo ku hik put sakalngin tap angan ta akomen, takuma ngon ku wa meme nerengin ta si ta ngo kuma nga in e mi ngo keh keh to po tin tita pim men angan ta akomen.
42015030	Si wirum tin imen tin ii endara tin tap men epo po wala elwan kara men me, men ku e kaeng som. Awu. E wi bulmakau tin tuleng men epo yang kerek engun.’
42015031	Ti ma yang sakal ta sun taku, ‘Wiruk, kokyok kokyok men e in to ngo, ma endara mosop tin ta ngo men men tap ako.
42015032	Men tunus epo it ku mi it keh keh ma mi it tunusngin engun, epo wirom tin in ken i e hun kho men men tunus kyok, u yang men kis, li ma it suo yang kyok kut tumen.
42016001	Kuru a-Yesus sakal ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Yang miran ta men in tin sun ta tin maran pit wo endara ta sun men in to yang, ma po kara wa sakalngin me epo yang tin miran men kuma po wa sakalngin ko pit po yang tin maran pit wo endara ta sun men, men po sakal epo yang men in e siwul mi endara tin ta sun tin miran men.
42016002	Tumen ma yang tin miran men yuk sun me, yang ko sakal ta sun taku, ‘Sakalngin tin tua e nga hul i epo ngon ti? Ngon men ku pok put endara mosop tin marap pit won ta ngo men si ta ngo kut khae, epo ngon men ku marap pit wo endara tin ta ngo men kyok akomen.’
42016003	Kut ma yang tin maran pit wo endara ta sun men sakal ta min taku, ‘Auh, ngo ku ning i tua? Epo phua tin ta ngo men ku klok kumang tin marango pit wo endara tan men hang ngo li kut khae. Si ngo men ku kakha kuma nga kil mulusngin akomen, u manngin wa ngo epo ngo tin ku hau amusukngin pit wo po kara epo ulu men kut tumen.
42016004	Ih, nga ion wungin tin ngo ku ning i men kut khae, tumen kuma minan tin kuli phua klok kumang hang ngo tin ku marango pit wo endara tan men li, men ku po masang to sun wala wa ngo li sup mi mang tin ta hi e ung e li li men.’
42016005	Ti ma yang yuk yuk po tin naumngin ta phua pit wo hi men mosop then then kho me epo yang kut, anima yang sakal ta sun tin muk men taku, ‘Naumngin ta phua tin ta ngo men tin pit wo ngon men men esini?’
42016006	Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, ‘Olip sut kaingin khum khum ta (100).’ Tumen ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, ‘E wa kisang tin naumngin tap panngin ko min men, ma e ko ung, ma e pan khum eip (50) misan ko nuk min wiewi sun.’
42016007	Li klet ma yang wo ta sun ta kyok taku, “Si naumngin tin pit po ngon men esini?’ Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, “Wit enun kaingin khum khum ta (100).’ Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, “E wa kisang tin naumngin tap panngin nuk min men, ma e pan khum miuk me sup (80) ko nuk min wiewi sun.’
42016008	Tumen ma phua wangan po yang tin maran pit wo endara tan e wungin tan ku siik som men, epon tin yang ning i e ken po tin mhi hi ek men. Epo husani po tin ta pi mulus men, mhin ekngin ta po tin po kuk ton lunga po tin ta hi e hi khuuk wal mi elup then men, men nhum epo husani po tin ta pi mi mlaeng men ako.
42016009	Ma nga sakal ta wom ti, wom men ku wa miranngin tin ta pi mulus e lengwal men ma wom ning po tin ku si tita wom men epon, kumali miranngin tin imen ko om men kuli po wa wom sup li kuk mi mang tin sindak men kara.
42016010	Taku po ta maran pit wo endara tururun kara to wungin anuh, men ku maran pit wo endara nomoyong to wungin anuh maksin kut tumen ako; u taku po ta maran pit wo endara tururun kara to wungin tin ku siik som men, men ku maran pit wo endara nomoyong to wungin tin ku siik som men maksin kut tumen ako.
42016011	Tumen ma taku wom ku mara wom pit wo miranngin tin ta pi mulus e lengwal men to wungin anuh som, men ku ara weh ku wa miranngin tin irawin men sup yanga wili wom kuma mara wom pit won?
42016012	U taku wom ku mara wom pit wo endara tin ta po enginin kara men to wungin anuh som, ara weh ku wa endara tin ta wom tuon men si ta wom?
42016013	Po ta tin kum wo sun engun men ku kum ta phua ponwal akomen. Epon men kuli min lel phua ta, si min pit wo phua ta, wa ku klap sun ta, si ion sun ta ken i e lengwal engun men. Wom men ku kum ta Got u miranngin tumen to al akomen.”
42016014	Kut si po Parisi tin mi hi pit pit wo ulu men hul wungin tin mosop imen kut tumen, men po hut hi nuu yang ma po sakal lengwal epo yang.
42016015	Ti ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom men ning wom si kuk siik to mara po tunus weh, takuma Got ion wungin tin nuk ta mi wom men ako. Epo endara tin po tunus wai si nhum lunga hi men, men hies to mara Got.
42016016	Wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men u wungin tin ta po pokngin men, tumen, men in me pol minan tin ta a-Yon men. Ma minan tin imen ma me, men enunu tin ta Got men pok putngin si in, ma po mosop tohuh weh epo po ku li sup min.
42016017	Si wet pi to mulus ku om men awo mlus nginan engun, si wungin sinsin panngin tingit tun ta tin ku put mih men men khung nginan weh.
42016018	Po masang mosop tin hik put enanginngin ta ngong titien, si li enangin po wala enginin ta kyok men, men ning wungin tin po sup si khi wal epon men kha men; u taku po masang ta enangin wut wala tin imen, tin titien hik put enanginngin ta ngong kho men, men ning wungin tin po sup si khi wal epon men kut tumen kha men.
42016019	Yang miran ta in, men pi moolngin pon mhee ama u moolngin pon tunus ta nuk wet sun tumen kokyok kokyok, ma ungunan then then men yang in e ii endara tunus tunus weh.
42016020	Si yang ta tin in e hau amusukngin pit wo sun nginangan men in, men po sikian yan a-Lasarus, men po wa yang li nuk mara sowon tin ta sun men to pon tin sal sal klet pon men.
42016021	Ma yang min epo yang ku ii endara tin plak plak ko wet suyung tin ta yang tin miran men kara kuma yang mut. Kuru elwa kara me hom hom po yang tin sal sal men kut tumen.
42016022	Li klet ma yang tin hau pit wo sun men hun, ma yang latngin li yanga wili po tihngin li nuk po engai sun Abraham. Kuru yang tin miran men hun kyok kut tumen, ma po kil yang.
42016023	Ma yang li in e won maan maan weh pi tin ta hunngin men, men yang maran si ma yang maran li kon Abraham tin in hin men, u a-Lasarus tin nuk po engai sun Abraham men kut tumen.
42016024	Kut ma yang sakal taku, ‘Yok Abraham, mip suk ngo, ma e tih a-Lasarus me kuma yang wa wilin pon pon ta ko pit mi eki ma yang ning i ma mamai ngo pon nglik wet. Epo wo ngo maan maan takut put ngi yau tin iyi.’
42016025	Takuma Abraham ko wo taku, ‘Wiruk, tulup hu epo elup tin e tunus in ton wo mulus kho men, men e wa endara turunus tap, si a-Lasarus men wai lengwal. Si homani ma yang won pias, kuru wop maan maan kut tumen.
42016026	Kuru wungin ta maksin men nuk ti, ilwang nhum ta hihingin nuk kut lunga pim u wom kut tumen, tumen ma po tin taku yok ko pit iyi ma ut put ilwang ti epo wom men, men khung nginan epo po, kuru po tin kuk imen ku ut put ilwang me epo pim, men khung nginan epo po kut tumen.’
42016027	Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Yok, tumen ma nga hau nuk sii khi ngon epo ngon ku tih yang li epo po tin pim a khuuk wal e kuk mi mang tin ta yok men.
42016028	Epo ehurok eip iso kuk, ma yang ku li kuma yang pok po epo po men ku haum tunus, epon akuli po maksin me pi tin iyi tin to won maanngin men.’
42016029	Ti ma Abraham ko wo ta sun taku, ‘Po men kuk to wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men u po Pokngin kut tumen. Po men ku hul sun.’
42016030	Ti ma yang ko wo taku, ‘Awu, Yok Abraham, men pi om. Si taku po ta tin khek mi po tin huu kho men li epo po, men ku po phae mi hi ako.’
42016031	Ti ma Abraham ko wo ta sun taku, ‘Taku po ku hul wet a-Moses u po tin Pokngin men tumen som, aku, taku po ta ku khek mi po tin huu kho men, men ku po wo hi nuk wet akomen maksin kut tumen.
42017001	Kut ma yang sakal ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Wungin tin ku ning i ma po plong ko mi lasin men ku weh si, ma po ta ku klet epon akomen. Takuma won maikngin nhum men ku in epo po ta tin wungin tin ku po plong ko mi lasin men si epon men.
42017002	Epo po ku wa enah nhum ta tin po tut wit enun epon men si po kan i ko kuk wut yang, ma po psik yang ko mi wiu, men tunus epo sun tin ku yang ning i ma po tin tururun imen ta ku plong ko epo lasin men.
42017003	Wom men ku haum tunus epo wom tuo wom. Taku wirom ning lasin ta epo ngon, men ku e pio yang. Ma taku yang phae min, men ku e mang ta lasin ta yang.
42017004	Ma taku yang ning lasin epo ngon angan ponwal me sup mi ungunan ta, ma angan ponwal me sup men yang kyok me epo ngon, ma yang sakal taku, ‘Nga phae mi ngo,’ men ku e mang ta lasin ta yang.”
42017005	Kut ma po tin paengin men sakal ta yang tin Akono men taku, “E ning i ma wo phepngin ta pim men ku ko ung po sun si.”
42017006	Tumen ma yang tin Akono men sakal taku, “Taku wo phepngin ta wom ken mastet ihun tun ta, men ku wom wo ta sa tin imen taku, ‘E khuk si to sun imut, ma e lu whangin pit mi wiu,’ ti, men ku sa hul wet wom engun ako.
42017007	Ara in lunga wom, men ku kerek e sakal ta sun tin kum won e in e kil mulus mipi wa maran pit wo sipsip men minan tin yang ku kyok me mipi men ti, ‘E mu ko nuk ewo tilip kuma e nuk e ii endara?’
42017008	Awu. Si men ku sakal ta sun taku, ‘E hihi enda aiingin ta ngo kara si nga iini, ma e wa moolngin tap tin nomalak men si hut sok put ngon kuma e kum ta ngo weh li nga ii endara u nga um kut tumen, anili sulung ma e ii endara u e um tumen,’ men ku po sakal ti ako, wah?
42017009	Iyi, po ta tin sun kum won men ku sam sam sun epo sun tin ning wungin mosop tin po wo ta sun epon men, wah? Awu. Nga wo taku pi engun.
42017010	Wom kut taku wom suuk sii sakalngin mosop tin Got wo ta wom epon men, men ku wom sakal ti, ‘Pim men ken po tin kum wo sun engun e ku wungin ta pim tunus weh som men, epo wungin tin tunus epo pim ku ning i men kha pim a ning i kut men.’”
42017011	Kut ma a-Yesus in e muk muk li Yerusalem, men wungin si nuk ti, epo yang hik put pi Samaria u Galili kut tumen.
42017012	Ma yang li sup pi tanuan ta, men po khaut eip ponwal me tut yang tin khu khu ii hi men, men me nuk hin long epo yang.
42017013	Ma po wut hi pit pit ili awon taku, “Yesus, Phua, mip suk pim!”
42017014	Tumen ma yang ion po, men yang wo ta po taku, “Wom lu suk mara po tin kum auluungin men epo po wom.” Ti ma po yok ma po li, men wungin men si in ti, epo po men si po hi yil kho kut.
42017015	Ma yang then ta in lunga po ion pon tin si yil men, men yang phae ma yang kyok li, ma yang wut pit ma yang wa Got yan si,
42017016	ma yang li plong ko nuk sii khi sun ma yang mhin ko nuk mulus, ma yang sam sam sun. Epo yang men api Samaria.
42017017	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Iyi, po khaut eip ponwal kha si po hi yil yil men ako, wah? Si po tin khaut mnal me sup men ani a?
42017018	Iyi, po ku pon ta sun ta kyok tin ku kyok me sam sam Got men som, si yang tin api enginin men misan, wah?”
42017019	Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun ti, “E khek si ma e lu ira soput tin tap men. Wo phepngin tap weh kha ning i ma e si tunus men.”
42017020	Kut si kinesngin ta me epo yang, men po Parisi kines epo enunu tin ta Got men, men ku si to pi elini weh. Tumen ma yang sakal wet po taku, “Enunu tin ta Got men men ku me to supangin kara akomen.
42017021	Kuru po ku sakal, ‘Mara wom mu iyi,’ wa ‘Mara wom lu imen,’ ti akomen. Iis, epo enunu tin ta Got men men in lunga wom kho ako.”
42017022	Kut ma yang wo ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Elup ta kuli iso me, men ku mi wom epo wom ku ion ungunan tin Wiru Po Tunus ku in lunga wom men ta, takuma wom ku ion i akomen.
42017023	Ma kuli po sakal ta wom taku, ‘Mara wom mu iyi,’ wa ‘Mara wom lu imen.’ Si wom men ku lu ira po asin.
42017024	Epo pi si mlangan tin ngin ngin porili mulusngin ta li pol porili mulusngin palan ta, tumen kut kha kuli Wiru Po Tunus me mi elup tin tan men.
42017025	Si muk men ku yang wuh wungin maran kiring kiring ma po tin khuuk wal wo mulusngin homani men wetpo hi wa yang.
42017026	Ma wungin tin si mi elup tin ta a-Noa men, men kuli wungin in tumen kut mi elup tin ta Wiru Po Tunus men:
42017027	men po ku kuk e ii enda, po um, po enangin sun wala, u po wa sun wala tin wawahin men si ung ta sun masang tumen, weh li pol ungunan tin a-Noa li sup mi imut men, anima eki num si ma lek po mosop ko huu.
42017028	Kuru men ku ken wungin tin si mi elup tin ta a-Lot men: men po kuk e ii endara, po um, po kul endara si ta sun, po tirih endara, po wha enda, u po ning mang kut tumen.
42017029	Si ungunan tin a-Lot li pol wetpo pi Sodom men, men yau u enah tin ngiseng men tumen me ko wet pi ken pi yung men, ma lek po mosop ko huu.
42017030	Tumen kut kha kuli wungin si minan tin kuli Wiru Po Tunus si in pi mlaeng men.
42017031	Minan tin imen po ta ku si ung eluwi mang, si endara tan iso pit mi mang, men ku kyok me ko kuma espon li asin. Kuru po ta ku li in mipi, men ku phae kyok me asin kut tumen.
42017032	Tulu wom hu a-Lot titien.
42017033	Taku po ta tohuh epon ku palolo tunusngin tan tuon men ku huuspit ton kyok, si taku po ta min alang si tunusngin tan men ku in anga tunusngin ton kyok ako.
42017034	Nga pok wom, to pi luk tin imen wulong masang ponwal ku pit wo ehus then ta, ma wi ta ku wangin li, si wi ta ku mang tangin in.
42017035	Wulong wala ponwal men ku nuk e ngyung wit enun to al, ma wut ta ku wangin li, si wut ta men ku mang tangin in.
42017036	Wulong masang ponwal ku li in mipi, ma wi ta men ku wangin li, si wi ta men ku mang tangin in.”
42017037	Ti ma po sakal wet yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, wungin tin imen ku si ko pit ia weh?” Tumen ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Pi tin akani e ku emkusin nuk, pi tin imen kha kuli emon tin ii endara emalin ewin men me palu wal epon men.”
42018001	Kut ma yang sakal emol ta si ta po epo po tunus men ku kines Got sumsum, si po ku mi hi mokongin weh asin,
42018002	ma yang sakal taku, “Yang ta tin ples wungin nginangan men in pi ta, men ku lem pit wo Got wa won nuk wet po tunus ewin akomen.
42018003	Kut si wut wala ta tin wamuh men in pi tin imen. Ma wut me epo yang, ma wut wo ti, ‘Ngon men ku ning wungin emhut sun ta po tin nolo ngo e taku wa wungin pit po ngo men.’
42018004	Ma yang in li put monlo long ma yang min epo yang ku ning i tumen akomen, taku li klet ma yang sakal ta min taku, “Aku, ngo men ku lem pit wo Got som wa ngo ku wo ngo nuk wet po tunus ta som,
42018005	takuma wut tin wala wamuh imen ning i ma mi ngo nuk epo wut, tumen ma ngo ku ples wungin emhut sun ta po tin nolo wut men, epon akuli wut kyok me epo ngo kokyok kokyok, ma mi ngo mokongin.”
42018006	Kut ma yang tin Akono men sakal ti, “Wom hul sakalngin tin yang tin ples wungin nginangan e ku ples wungin emin ewin som men sakal i men weh.
42018007	Tumen ma Got men ku ples wungin emhut sun ta po tin yang won ung wo hi men tin kuk e hau pit wo yang to pi mhangin u to pi luk kut tumen kokyok kokyok ako, wah? Si yang men ku som e min mokongin pit wo po kerek ewin akomen.
42018008	Nga pok wom ti, epo yang men ku ning wungin emhut sun kerek engun ako. Takuma minan tin Wiru Po Tunus kuli iso me men, men irawin epo yang ku me pon ta wo phepngin kara pit wo mulus wa men?”
42018009	Kuru yang pok put wungin emol tin iyi epo po kara tin wo hi nuk wet hi tuo hi ken hi e kuk siik, si po ion sun tin kara men ken hi e kuk lengwal engun men:
42018010	“Wulong ponwal li si mang auluungin kuma wulong kines Got, wi ta men Parisi u wi ta men po tin hi palu takis ta sun phuan men ta tumen.
42018011	Yang tin Parisi men si pit ma yang kines Got los pon tuon taku, ‘Got, nga sam sam ngon epo ngo men ku in ken po kara men som, tin torok ma nak nak endara hang sun kara men, u wungin ta hi ku siik weh som, u po kara tin sup si khi sun men, wa ngo men ku maksin in ken yang tin palu takis ta po phuan imen akomen.
42018012	Ngo men suuh mi ngo epo endara aiingin to ungunan ponwal mi sun tin ponwal me sup men u nga talu Got epo endara mosop tin ta ngo men maran min eip ponwal mi sun tumen kokyok kokyok ako.’
42018013	Si yang tin palu takis ta po phuan men li pit hin, ma yang maran maksin kut men yang min epon ku si ili wet pi som, si yang pit e wilin sup po engain, ma yang sakal ti, ‘Got, mip suk ngo tin in to lasin men!’
42018014	Nga pok wom ti, epo yang tin imen li ko mang tan men in siik to mara Got kho, si yang tin ta kyok men men pi engun. Epo po mosop tin wa hi si pit men men kuli Got wa hi ko, si taku po ta wai ko men kuli Got wai si.”
42018015	Kut ma po wa sun hoin tin tururun men me epo yang kuma yang wilin si nuk e li li po po, takuma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ion wungin tin imen, men po pio sun.
42018016	Si a-Yesus yuk po me epo yang, ma yang sakal taku, “Wom mang, si po hoin tin tururun men ku me epo ngo, si wom uluu po asin. Epo enunu tin ta Got men men ta po tin wungin ta hi tumen.
42018017	Nga sakal anuh ta wom, taku po ta ku wa enunu tin ta Got men ken po hoin ta men som, men ku li sup min angan akomen.”
42018018	Kut si yang miran ta me kines yang taku, “Ngon tin kot pim e wungin tap tunus men, ngo ku ning i tua weh kuma Got pakuh po ngo epo tunusngin tin sindak men?”
42018019	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo ta sun taku, “Tua ma e sikia ngo e tunus? Po ta men ku tunus som, si po then ta misan, men Got misan.
42018020	Ngon men pol ta sakalngin sinsin kho, tin wo ti: ‘E in aku e sup si khi po ta asin, e in aku e wi po ta ko hun asin, e in aku e tip endara asin, e in aku e torok pit wo po ta asin, u ngon men ku wa wiramap ngong tonim ya ngong si kut tumen.’”
42018021	Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Sakalngin tin mosop imen nga iran kokyok kokyok minan tin nga iso hoin li nga si nomuru men.”
42018022	Ma a-Yesus hul sakalngin tin imen, men yang sakal ta sun taku, “Si ngon men iso kalwok epo endara then ta. E tirih endara mosop tin tap men, si e kikyu po tin kuk lengwal weh men epon, kha kuli miranngin tap halung po ngin pit ili wet pi men. Li klet anima e mu pet kira ngo.”
42018023	Yang hul wungin tin imen, men yang min urut i weh, epo miranngin tin ta yang men men hambip.
42018024	Ma a-Yesus ion sun tin min urut i weh men, men yang sakal taku, “Auh, men khung nginan weh epo po tin miranngin ta hi hambip men tin ku li sup mi enunu tin ta Got men!
42018025	Epo kamel ta ku plek mi sulmu won, men awo mlus nginan epo po miran ta tin ku li sup mi enunu tin ta Got men.”
42018026	Ti ma po tin hul sakalngin tin imen sakal taku, “Taku tumen, men ara weh ku palolongin?”
42018027	Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Wungin tin po tunus khuuk pon ning nginan men kha ku Got ning i men ako.”
42018028	Kut ma a-Pita sakal taku, “E ion i, epo pim men mang ta endara mosop tin ta pim men, si kuma pim a ira ngon.”
42018029	Tumen ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Nga wo anuh ta wom, taku po ta mang ta mang, wa wiraman ngong tonin, wa ehuro hi, wa titien, wa husani hi, sinsin in epo enunu tin ta Got men,
42018030	men ku wa endara munuman kara ko po sun mi elup tin homani men, u mi elup tin ku me men men ku wa tunusngin tin sindak men.”
42018031	Li klet ma yang wa po tin khum ta u ponwal tumen li nuk ta tuo hi ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom hul, it men li si Yerusalem, ma wungin mosop tin po pokngin pok put epo Wiru Po Tunus men men ku si pyu pongin weh.
42018032	Epo po ku wa yang sup yanga wili po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, ma po mimi yang, u po wa manngin si po yang, u po kimos tip yang kut tumen.
42018033	Ma po wawlauk yang kut, anili po wi yang ko hun. Li klet ma ungunan tin me miuk angan men khama yang khek kyok si tunus.”
42018034	Takuma po ku mara hi ples wungin tin mosop imen ta ku tunus akomen. Awu. Sakalngin tin imen sinsin men kaun epo po, ma po pong epo sakalngin tin yang sakal i men.
42018035	Kut si yang li pol tikayung pi Yeriko, men wungin ta si nuk ti, epo yang maran mhi ta ung e hau amusukngin pit wo po tingi soput.
42018036	Ma yang hul po wa ilio angan tin muk muk me men, men yang kines po epo wungin sinsin tin po me epon men.
42018037	Tumen ma po pok yang epo a-Yesus tin api Nasaret men kha me men.
42018038	Tumen ma yang wut pit taku, “Yesus, ngon tin Wiru a-Dewit men, mip suk ngo!”
42018039	Kut ma po tin li muk men pio yang ma po wo epo yang ku yuk asin. Takuma yang iso wut pit ili awon weh ira sun tin yang yuk li muk men taku, “Ngon tin Wiru a-Dewit men, mip suk ngo!”
42018040	Tumen ma a-Yesus ting pit, ma yang wo epo po ku wa yang me epo sun. Ma yang kho me in tikayung sun kut, men yang kines sun taku,
42018041	“Mip epo ngo ku ning ela weh epo ngon?” Ti ma yang ko wo, “Ngon tin Akono men, mi ngo epo ngo ku si marango plas.”
42018042	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon men ku marap plas. Wo phepngin tap kha ning i ma marap si tunus men.”
42018043	Ti ma kerek engun ma yang maran plas, ma yang pet kira sun, ma yang wa Got yan si. Ma po masang to sun wala mosop ion wungin tin imen, men po sam sam Got epon kut tumen.
42019001	Li klet ma a-Yesus li sup Yeriko ma yang in e muk muk mi pi li.
42019002	Ih, yang ta in men yan a-Sakias, men wa kumang epon ku maran pit wo po tin hi palu takis ta sun phuan men, ma yang men miran.
42019003	Ma yang taku maran kon a-Yesus kuma yang hop sun, takuma yang khuk po engin, epo po tin wa ilio angan men phae mara yang, epo yang men hut sok weh.
42019004	Tumen ma yang saa li muk sun li si po sa nhum ta kuma yang maran ko kon sun, epo soput ta a-Yesus men li imen li.
42019005	Li klet ma a-Yesus li pol pi tin imen, men yang maran si kon sun, ma yang wo ta sun taku, “Sakias, e pus engin mu ko, epo homani ma ngo ku li nuk mang tin tap men.”
42019006	Tumen ma yang pus engin me ko, ma yang wa sun to min kehngin.
42019007	Si po masang to sun wala ion wungin tin imen, men po katiktik wungin pit wetpo yang taku, “Imen, yang kho li in to sun ta tin ning lasin nginangan men.”
42019008	Li klet ma a-Sakias si pit ma yang sakal ta sun tin Akono men taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, marap mu, nga wa enda tin ta ngo men tingit ta si ta po tin kalwok men kut khae. Ma taku nga klok endara ta hang po ta epo wungin torokngin tin nga wai pit po po men, men ku nga wai emhut sun ta po, kuru nga wai mnal ko ung po sun kut tumen.”
42019009	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta sun taku, “Homani ma wungin tin Got palolo po tunus men men si mi mang tin iyi, epo yang men khuuknginin ta Abraham maksin kut tumen ako.
42019010	Epo Wiru Po Tunus men me epon ku langun epo po tin huuspit men kuma yang palolo po.”
42019011	Kut ma po nuk e hul sakalngin tin imen, men yang sakal emol ta kyok, epo yang li in tikayung Yerusalem u po masang to sun wala men phaeng taku homani kut men ku enunu tin ta Got men si in pi mlaeng.
42019012	Tumen ma yang sakal taku, “Yang akono ta li in wo mulusngin ta tin ung hin men kuma yang li wa enunu tan ta, anili ma yang kyok me.
42019013	Tumen ma yang yuk po tin kum ta yang men khaut eip ponwal me epo yang, ma yang wa eyuk eip ponwal ma yang kana wal po then then epon, ma yang wo ta po taku, ‘Wom men ku kum anaum epon li pol minan tin nga kyok me men.’
42019014	Si po tin nopu men mi hi lel yang. Ma po tih sun kara ira yang li sakal taku, “Mi pim epo yang tin imen ku si maran pit wo pim akomen.”
42019015	Li klet ma yang wa enunu tan kut ma yang kyok me, men wungin si nuk ti, men yang wo epo po tin kum ta yang e yang wa eyuk si ta hi kho men ku yukngin me epo yang, kuma yang ion eyuk tin po then then kum anaum ma po wai si po sun men.
42019016	Kut ma yang tin muk men me, men me sakal taku, ‘Phua, eyuk tap men nga kum anaum epon ma nga wa eyuk eip ponwal si po sun tap.’
42019017	Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, ‘Ngon tin kum ta ngo e wungin tap tunus men, ngon men ning i tunus, epo ngon men marap pit wo endara sakun kara engun to wungin anuh, tumen ma ngon men ku in to emhong tin ku marap pit wo pi nunhum khaut eip ponwal epon men.’
42019018	Li klet ma yang tin me ponwal angan men me, men me sakal taku, ‘Phua, eyuk tap men nga kum anaum epon ma nga wa eyuk eip si po sun tap.’
42019019	Ti ma yang sakal maksin ta sun kyok taku, ‘Ngon men ku marap pit wo pi nunhum khaut eip.’
42019020	Li klet ma yang ta maksin me, men me sakal taku, ‘Phua, eyuk tin tap men wala iyi, men nga wai li nga pang pon epo mulu tingit tun ta.
42019021	Epo nga lem epo ngon, epo wungin tap men ngeng ngeng weh. Ngon men kot endara tap tin ngon ku wai mu kho som men, u ngon men lok lok endara tin ngon ku wha i kho som men kut tumen.’
42019022	Ti ma phua ko wo ta yang taku, ‘Ngon tin kum ta ngo e wungin tap lengwal men, sakalngin tin me pol mi wo ngon tuon men kha ku nga ples wungin tap epon men. E ion i kho epo wungin ta ngo men ngeng ngeng, ma nga kot endara ta ngo tin ngo ku wai me kho som men, u nga lok lok endara tin ngo ku wha i kho som men kut tumen.
42019023	Tua ma ngon ku wa eyuk ta ngo li nuk mi mang ta po tin mara hi pit wo eyuk men som, kuma nga me, men ku nga wai to sun tin ku ko ung po sun men?’
42019024	Ti ma phua sakal ta po tin nuk tikayung men taku, “Wom wa eyuk tin then imen hang yang men, si wom wai si ta yang tin in to eyuk eip ponwal men.’
42019025	Takuma po ko wo ta yang taku, ‘Phua, yang tin imen in to eyuk tan eip ponwal kho kut.’
42019026	Ti ma phua ko wo taku, ‘Nga sakal ta wom ti, epo po mosop tin kuk to endara ta hi kara kho men, men ku endara kara kyok ko po sun li si. Si taku po ta in engun epo endara, men ku endara tin sakun kara e yang iso in ton men, men ku klokngin epon maksin kut tumen.
42019027	Si wom espo po tin nolo ngo men mu iyi, tin mi hi epo ngo ku marango pit wo hi som men, ma wom lek po ko hu hu to mara ngo.’”
42019028	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wungin tin imen kut, anima yang kho li muk po ira soput tin li si Yerusalem men.
42019029	Ma yang muk muk li pol tikayung pi Betpake u pi Betani, tumen, tin nuk sii pi tin po sikian Olip men ma wungin si nuk ti, men yang tih wulong ponwal tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men,
42019030	ma yang sakal ta wulong taku, “Mom lu sup pi tanuan tin ung maran min mom men, ma mom lu sup min kut, men ku mom pon ta donki nerengin ta tin kan kanngin pit e ku po ta ung won kho som men. Mom plos li, si mom wai mu iyi.
42019031	Ma taku po ta kines mom ti, ‘Mom plos li epo ele?’ men ku mom sakal ta po taku, ‘Yang tin Akono men ku ning kumang tan ta epon.’”
42019032	Kut ma wulong tin yang tih ngong li men li ira soput ta ngong, ma wulong li pon ta endara, men nuk siik ira sun tin a-Yesus wo ta wulong epon men.
42019033	Ma wulong in e plos donki tin nerengin men, men yang tin donki tan men ko kines wulong taku, “Mom plos donki tin nerengin imen epo ele?”
42019034	Ti ma wulong ko wo taku, “Yang tin Akono men ku ning kumang tan ta epon.”
42019035	Kut ma wulong wa li li epo a-Yesus. Ma wulong wa moolngin tin wulong phini nuk po sun men si ung wo donki tin nerengin men, ma wulong wa a-Yesus si ung wo li.
42019036	Ma yang ira soput li, men po munuman yas yas moolngin ta hi ko nuk e li li ira soput li.
42019037	Li klet ma yang li pol put soput tin taku li ko put pi Olip men, men po tin wa ilio angan mosop e hi hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men si mi hi keh keh, ma po wut hi pit pit ma po sam sam Got epo wungin maran kiring kiring tin nunhum e po ion i kho men,
42019038	ma po sakal taku, “Emhong tin ta Got men in to yang tin sinkhaung e me epo yang tin Akono men yan men! Wungin aminis men ku si in ili wet pi, u Got men ku yan si nhum ili awon weh kut tumen!”
42019039	Ti ma po Parisi kara tin kuk lunga sun tin wa ilio angan men sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon tin kot po men, e pio po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngon men akai.”
42019040	Ti ma yang sakal wet po taku, “Nga pok wom, taku po tin imen ku ping wo hi, men ku kerek engun ma enah tin nuk e li li men ku si yuk yuk.”
42019041	Ti ma yang li pol tikayung, men yang maran kon pi tin nhum men ma yang hau epon,
42019042	ma yang sakal taku, “Auh, ngon tin Yerusalem men, taku ngon ku ion wungin tin ku ning i ma e ung aminis epon men, iis, taku e ion i mi elup tin tap iyi weh, takuma awu. Tumen ma homani ma wungin tin imen men ku nuk kaunngin epo marap.
42019043	Epo elup men ku iso si, men ku po tin nolo ngon men me pulum po mulusngin ulu ngon, ma po kyok me baul ngon, ma po nghen eya ngon,
42019044	ma po hik hik ngon ko nuk mulus u husanim mosop tin kuk mi ngon men kut tumen; ma po ku mang ta enah ta ku si ung po sun ta akomen, sinsin epo ngon tin ku hop enal tin Got taku me tuh wo ngon epon men akomen.”
42019045	Ti ma yang li sup nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men ma yang ko luul to po tin nuk e kul kul endara u tirih endara, tumen, epon men li,
42019046	ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, ‘Mang tin ta ngo men men ta kinesngin,’ si wom ning i ma si ken ‘pi uwin ta tin po tin nak nak endara hang sun amhees men li kaun min men.’”
42019047	Ti ma yang kot po nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men to ungunan then then. Si po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men, u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men, u po tin li muk epo po masang to sun wala men kut tumen taku wi yang ko hun,
