43006004	Epo kakaomngin tin epo Paska men, tin kakaomngin ta po Yuda men ta, men ku si angan.
43006005	Tumen ma a-Yesus maran pham si ma yang maran kon po masang to sun wala wa ilio angan kara, men kuk e me epo yang, ma yang ko sakal ta a-Pilip taku, “It ku kul beret ko pit ia ku me po tin imen iini?”
43006006	Sakalngin tin imen men taku yang ku karong a-Pilip epon engun, epo yang tuon men ion wungin tin ku yang iso ning i men kho.
43006007	A-Pilip sakal wet yang taku, “Taku it uspo ulu khum khum ponwal epo beret, men ku me kai po tin imen tin ku po then then wai misikin sakun sakun kara men akomen.”
43006008	Yang tin hul wet kotngin mi wo sun men ta maksin yan Andru, men wiron a-Saimon Pita, men me wo ta yang taku,
43006009	“Yang hoin ta in iyi men in to beret bali khaut eip u esma turun ponwal kut tumen, takuma enda tin imen ku kai po tin munuman imen tua?”
43006010	Kut ma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Wom wo ta po masang to sun wala ma po ko nuk e li li mili.” Epo pi tin imen epilil tang nuk epon. Tumen ma po masang ko nuk, ma po enu hi khaut khum khum khum eip (5,000) wa tumen.
43006011	Si a-Yesus wa beret tin imen, ma yang sam sam Got epon kut, anima yang kyu po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men, ma po maksin li kikyu sun tin ko ung e li li yanga epilil men epon. Kuru yang ning i tumen epo esma kut tumen, ma po wai kai mi hi weh.
43006012	Po ii endara li po mut mut kut, anima yang wo ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Wom lu halung po endara misikin tin iso nuk men, kuma endara ta ku ta kis som.”
43006013	Tumen ma po li halung po beret tin eip e balian men misikin tin iso nuk to po tin iini men, ma po nonon i ko mi elik airun khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen si kol kol.
43006014	Tumen ma po ion tosukngin tin a-Yesus ning i kho kut men, men po wo taku, “Yang tin imen tin pokngin e kho ma Got wo epon ku iso me wo mulus men irawin kha imen.”
43006015	Tumen ma a-Yesus ion i epo po taku me nak yang kuma po wa yang si sinkhaung, men yang li silang po, ma yang misan kyok li in put pi ta tuon.
43006016	Li ma pi ii angan si, ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men li ko suu ehung,
43006017	ma po si wo naak tin ta hi men, ma po yok ma po ut put eki epo po taku li Kaperneam. Ma pi luk kut, si a-Yesus ku kho me pol ta po som,
43006018	ma pi pus nhum ta si ma eip ning i ma esap si pit yanga ehung.
43006019	Po sau wo naak li kilomita khaut eip wa ta me sup wa tumen khama po mara hi li kon a-Yesus, men muk muk yanga ehung ku me tikayung naak angan, ma po lem.
43006020	Si yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Tuo ngo kha iyi, ma ku wom lem asin.”
43006021	Tumen ma po mi hi ko li wyu ung epo po ku wa yang me si wo naak, ma yang kho me si kut, khama kerek engun ma naak li pol suu ehung tin po ku li sup epon men.
43006022	Ma li pi king kauk ko yang ma po tin wa ilio angan e iso kuk suu ehung palan ekora men ion i epo naak ta maksin ku ta ung kho som, si then ta misan, ma a-Yesus ku li si wo naak tin imen to po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men som, si po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men misa hi kha li men.
43006023	Si imut enginin kara me Taiberias, men me tikayung pi tin kho ma yang tin Akono men sam sam Got epo beret kho anima po iini men.
43006024	Kut ma po wa ilio angan ion i epo a-Yesus ku in imen som, kuru po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men kis kis kut tumen, tumen ma po si si wo naak kara ma po yok ma po li pol Kaperneam kuma po li langun epo a-Yesus.
43006025	Ma po kho li pon ta yang suu ehung pilin ekora, men po ko wo ta yang taku, “Rabai, e mu iyi to pi elini?”
43006026	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo wom mu langun epo ngo, sinsin men ku epo wom tin ion tosukngin men som, si sinsin men epon tin wom ii beret ma wom mut mut men ako.
43006027	Si wom men ku tohuh epo endara aiingin tin ku kerek e lengwal ewin men asin, si wom men ku tohuh epo endara aiingin tin iso pit e li epo tunusngin tin sindak men weh, tin ku Wiru Po Tunus wai si ta wom men. Epo yang kha Got tin Wiraman men wa tosukngin tin maran ko klat weh men ko ung pon kut men.”
43006028	Tumen ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Pim ku ning i tua kuma pim a ning kumang tin ta Got men?”
43006029	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal wet po taku, “Kumang tin ta Got men wala ti, epo wom men ku wo wom nuk wet yang tin Got tih i me men weh.”
43006030	Tumen ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Taku tumen, men ku e ning tosukngin tin tua, kuma pim a ion i ma wo pim nuk wet ngon? Iyi, ngon e taku tohuh epo kumang tin nuk tua?
43006031	Po inana it men ii mana pi tin tahunggu men, wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, ‘Yang wa beret tin api wet pi men si ta po kuma po iini.’”
43006032	Kut ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo a-Moses ani ku wa beret tin me ko wet pi men si ta wom men som, epo Yok kha wa beret tin irawin weh e me ko wet pi men si ta wom men.
43006033	Epo beret tin ta Got men men yang tin me ko wet pi ma wa tunusngin si ta po tunus tin ung wo mulus men.”
43006034	Tumen ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, som men ku in e wa beret tin imen si ta pim kokyok kokyok li kut.”
43006035	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Tuo ngo kha beret tin epo tunusngin men. Po ta ku me epo ngo, men ku hun elip angan ta kyok akomen, u po ta ku won nuk wet ngo, men ku hun eki angan ta kyok akomen kut tumen.
43006036	Kut wala nga wo ta wom kho men, epo wom men ion ngo kho kut, takuma wom men ku wo wom phep som.
43006037	Po mosop tin Yok wai si ta ngo men kuli me epo ngo, ma po ta ku me epo ngo, men ku nga klet epon weh epon ku li pol mara so angan akomen.
43006038	Epo nga me ko wet pi epo ngo ku ning wungin tin nuk ta mi ngo men som. Awu. Nga me ko epon ku nga ning wungin tin nuk ta mi yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men misan.
43006039	Ma wungin tin nuk ta mi Yok tin tih ngo ma nga me men men nuk ti, epo po mosop tin yang wai si ta ngo men kuli nga pluk po hi ta som, si men kuli nga khek i kyok si to elup tin ku iso me sulung men.
43006040	Ma wungin tin nuk ta mi yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men wala ti, epo po mosop tin mara hi kon Wirun ma wo hi phep pit po yang men kuli wa tunusngin tin sindak men, ma kuli nga khek i kyok si to elup tin ku iso me sulung men.”
43006041	Tumen ma po Yuda ko sakal kas kas munuman lunga hi pit wetpo yang, epon tin yang wo taku, “Ngo men beret tin me ko wet pi men,”
43006042	ma po wo taku, “Iyi, yang timen a-Yesus tin a-Yosep wirun tin it pon ta wiraman ngong tonin kho men kha ikop ako, wah? Taku tuni ma yang wo ti, ‘Epo ngo men me ko wet pi,’ ti?
43006043	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo wet po taku, “Wom men ku sakal kas kas munuman lunga wom asin.
43006044	Po ta ku me epo ngo akomen, si taku Yok tin tih ngo ma nga me men nak i me epo ngo, then kha ku me epo ngo men. Ma kuli nga khek i si to ungunan tin ku me sulung men.
43006045	Sakalngin men panngin nuk mi kisang tin ta po pokngin men taku, ‘Men kuli po mosop hul wet kotngin mi wo Got weh.’ Tumen ma po mosop tin hul ma urut kotngin mi wo Yok men kha me epo ngo men.
43006046	Si ken po ta ku maran kon Yok som, si yang tin me hang Got men then kha maran kon Yok men.
43006047	Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo po ta ku won phep pit po ngo, men wa tunusngin tin sindak men kho kut.
43006048	Ngo men beret tin epo tunusngin men.
43006049	Kho ma po tin inana wom men ii mana pi tin tahunggu men, ma po huu kho li kut.
43006050	Si tin iyi kha beret tin me ko wet pi men, epon taku po ta ku iini, men ku hun som.
43006051	Ngo men beret tin tunusan e me ko wet pi men. Taku po ta ii beret tin iyi kara, men ku tunus in li kut. Ma beret tin ngo ku wai si men, men emali ngo, tin kuli mi ngo alang sin epon ku po tin ung wo mulus men wa tunusngin epon men.”
43006052	Tumen ma po Yuda heek wal lunga hi tuo hi, ma po wo taku, “Yang tin ikop ku wai emalin si ta it kuma it iini ani tua?”
43006053	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po taku, “Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, taku wom ku ii Wiru Po Tunus emalin u wom um yang kalolwan tumen som, men ku wom wa tunusngin ta in mi wom akomen.
43006054	Taku po ta ii emali ngo u um kalolwa ngo kut tumen, men wa tunusngin tin sindak men kho kut, men kuli nga khek i kyok si to ungunan tin me sulung men.
43006055	Epo emali ngo men aiingin weh, u kalolwa ngo men aumngin weh kut tumen.
43006056	Po ta ku ii emali ngo u ku um ngo kalolwan kut tumen, men in mi ngo u nga in min kut tumen.
43006057	Yok tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men tih ngo ma nga me tunus in, men sinsin men in epo Yok, tumen kut taku po ta ii ngo, men kha kuli tunus in, men sinsin epo ngo.
43006058	Beret tin imen wala me ko wet pi men, si ku kai beret tin po tin inana wom men iini ma po huu men som. Taku po ta ii beret tin iyi, men kuli tunus in li kut.”
43006059	Wungin tin imen a-Yesus sakal i mi mang akotngin tin ta hi men, men yang in Kaperneam kha yang kot po epon men.
43006060	Tumen ma po munuman tin urut kotngin mi wo yang men hul sakalngin tin imen, men po sakal taku, “Wungin tin imen men khung nginan weh. Ara weh ku hul wet?”
43006061	Si a-Yesus ion i ta min epo po tin urut kotngin mi wo yang men sakal kas kas munuman pit mi wungin tin imen, ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Iyi, wungin tin imen ning i ma mi wom maan, wah?
43006062	Si taku mara wom kon Wiru Po Tunus tin kyok li si ewin tin yang in epon muk men, men kuli tua?
43006063	Emiun kha wa tunusngin si men. Si emalin men ku ning nhio wongin kara akomen. Sakalngin mosop tin nga sakal i si ta wom men, men emiunan u tunusan kut tumen.
43006064	Si po kara kuk lunga wom, men ku wo hi phep som.” Epo ewo maran ma me, men a-Yesus ion po kho tin ku wo hi phep som men, kuru yang ion sun tin kuli wa yang li sup yanga wili po nolo men kho kut tumen.
43006065	Ma yang sakal taku, “Sinsin tin imen wala nga wo ta wom kho epo po ta ku me epo ngo engun som, si po tin Yok pakuh po hi men misa hi kha ku me epo ngo men.”
43006066	Minan tin imen po munuman tin kuk mi sun tin urut kotngin mi wo yang men li silang yang kyok li pi ta hi then then, ma po ku muk muk to yang kyok akomen.
43006067	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po tin khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen taku, “Iyi, mi wom epo wom ku lu silang ngo kut ti?”
43006068	Tumen ma a-Saimon Pita sakal wet sun taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, kuli pim a li epo ara maksin? Sakalngin tin epo tunusngin tin sindak men ngon kha in ton men.
43006069	Kuru pim a me ion i kut ma wo pim phep epo ngon kha Mesaia men, tin Wiru Got tin in kokyok kokyok li kut men.”
43006070	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Iyi, tuo ngo kha wo ngo ung wo wom tin khum ta u ponwal me sup tumen ako, wah? Takuma po tin ta wom men ta, emiun tin hik put wungin pit wo po nginangan men men in min.”
43006071	Epo yang sakal los po sun a-Yudas Iskariot, tin a-Saimon wirun men, epo yang kha kuli wa a-Yesus li sup yanga wili po nolo men. Epo yang in mi po tin khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen.
43007001	Sulung epo wungin tin mosop imen ma a-Yesus in e mili mili Galili. Epo yang min epo yang ku mili mili wo mulusngin Yudia kyok asin, epo po Yuda tohuh epo po ku wi yang ko hun.
43007002	Kut ma kakaomngin tin ta po Yuda e po kuk e li li mi mok awal men ku si angan.
43007003	Tumen ma yang ehuron ko wo ta yang taku, “E mang ta pi tin ii, si e lu wo mulusngin Yudia, kuma po tin urut kotngin mi wo ngon men ku ion wungin maran kiring kiring tin e in e ning i men maksin kut tumen.
43007004	Epo po ta ku si in pi mlaeng, men ku ning wungin tan ta kaunngin ewin som. Ngon ku ning wungin tin tumen, men ku e si pit pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala mosop weh.”
43007005	Epo yang ehuron men ku wo hi nuk wet yang maksin som kut tumen.
43007006	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Enal tin ta ngo men ku kho si som, si enal tin ta wom men men hihingin sumsum in.
43007007	Po tin ung wo mulus men ku mi hi lel wom som, si po men mi hi lel ngo ako, epo nga pok put sakalngin epo po, epo wungin ta po men lengwal.
43007008	Wom lu si epo kakaomngin, si homani men ngo ku li si epo kakaomngin tin imen som, epo enal tin ta ngo men ku iso si.”
43007009	Yang sakal wungin tin imen si ta po kut, men yang iso in Galili.
43007010	Kut si yang ehuron kho li si epo kakaomngin kut, khama yang li si epo kakaomngin kut tumen, si yang ku li pi mlaeng som, si yang e taku kaun engun li.
43007011	Tumen ma po Yuda kuk e langun epo yang mi kakaomngin, ma po kines wal taku, “Yang tin imen in a?”
43007012	Ma sakalngin kas kas tin pit wetpo yang men munuman si si lunga po masang to sun wala epo yang. Po kara wo taku, “Yang men wungin tan tunus.” Si po kara wo taku, “Awu, ku tumen som, yang men ek ek mi po masang to sun wala engun.”
43007013	Takuma po ta men ku sakal epo yang si in pi mlaeng akomen, epo po lem pit wo sun tin ta hi Yuda men.
43007014	Kut si po hosi kakaomngin kho li ung ho putngin, anima a-Yesus li si nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men ma yang kot po.
43007015	Ma po Yuda teret wo yang, ma po wo taku, “Yang tin ikop wa maran ekngin tan epo Panngin tin Auluungin men me tua? Epo yang men ku urut kotngin mi wo po kara kho akomen.”
43007016	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal wet po taku, “Kotngin tin ta ngo men ku ta ngo weh som. Awu. Men ta yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men.
43007017	Taku po ta min epon ku ning wungin tin nuk ta mi yang men, men ku ion mi kotngin tin imen, taku i e me hang Got wa nga sakal ta tuo ngo engun wa men.
43007018	Po ta sakal hing won tuon, men taku wa yan tuon si pit engun. Si yang tin taku wa ya sun tin tih yang me men yan si men kha wungin tan irawin men, ma wungin tin ku siik som men ku ta nuk mi yang akomen.
43007019	Iyi, a-Moses wa wungin sinsin si ta wom kho ako, wah? Takuma po ta wom ta ku iran som. Taku tua ma wom kuk e tohuh epo wom ku wi ngo ko hun?”
43007020	Ti ma po tin wa ilio angan men sakal wet yang taku, “Ngon men mengengin wa ngon kha men! Ara taku wi ngon ko hun?”
43007021	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal wet po taku, “Nga ning wungin maran kiring ta, ma wom mosop teret won.
43007022	Sinsin tin imen kha a-Moses wa wungin tin wom mut po hoin men si ta wom epon men (nan a-Moses men ani ku wai si ta wom men som, si men me epo po tin yau a wom sin men ako), ma wom mut po hoin to pi Sabat kha ewin men.
43007023	Iyi, taku po mut sun ta to pi Sabat, epon ku wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men ku hik putngin som, taku tuni ma ya wom sal pit wo ngo epon tin nga ning po tunus ta pala musung ta si tunus kyok to pi Sabat men?
43007024	Wom ples wungin epo mara wom engun asin, si wom men ku ples wungin epo wungin tin siik men misan.”
43007025	Tumen ma po tin api Yerusalem men kara ko kileng ti, “Iyi, yang tin po taku wini ko hun men ani men, wah?
43007026	Wom ion i, epo yang in e sakal pi mlaeng, ma po ku sakal kara tun tira epo yang som. Iyi, po tin mara hi pit wo it men ion i epo yang tin imen tuon kha Mesaia kut men wa men?
43007027	Takuma yang timen it pon ta pi tan sinsin ako, si Mesaia ku me, men ku po ta ion pi tan sinsin akomen.”
43007028	Kut ma a-Yesus in e kot po nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men, ma yang wut pit pit taku, “Iis, wom pon ta ngo kut, kuru wom pon ta pi ta ngo sinsin kut tumen ako. Takuma ngo ku me epo mi ngo tuon som. Awu. Yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men kha wungin tan anuh men, men yang tin wom ku hop i som men.
43007029	Si ngo men pon ta yang ako, epo nga me hang yang men, ma yang kha tih ngo ma nga me men.”
43007030	Tumen ma po taku sung wo yang, takuma po ta ku wilin ung po yang som, epo enal tin ta yang men ku kho si som.
43007031	Si po tin wa ilio angan men munuman wo hi nuk wet yang, ma po sakal taku, “Iyi, minan tin Mesaia ku me men, men yang e ku ning tosukngin hambip epo sun tin yang tin ikop ning i men, wah?”
43007032	Kut si po Parisi hul wet po tin wa ilio angan men, tin sakal kas kas munuman epo wungin tin a-Yesus ning i men, ma po Parisi to sun kara tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men tirih sun phuan tin haum eya mang auluungin men ta hi kara taku me kasum yang.
43007033	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo wet po taku, “Ngo ku iso in to wom put monlo long, anima nga kyok li in hang yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men.
43007034	Ma wom ku li langun epo ngo, takuma wom ku pon ta ngo akomen, ma pi tin ku nga li in epon men, men ku wom ku mu kuk epon akomen.”
43007035	Tumen ma po Yuda ko sakal lunga hi tuo hi taku, “Yang tin ikop ku li ere, ma it ku pon ta yang som? Aku yang ku li hang po tin ta it kara e plak li ung e li li lunga po Grik men, ma yang ku in e kot po Grik, wa men?
43007036	Epo sakalngin tin yang sakal i men ti, ‘Wom kuli langun epo ngo, takuma wom ku pon ta ngo som,’ u ‘Pi tin nga li in epon men, men ku wom mu kuk epon som kut tumen,’ men ani sinsin in tua?”
43007037	Kut si to pi ungunan tin ku kakaomngin li om epon men, tin nhum epo sun men, men a-Yesus si pit ma yang wut pit taku, “Taku po ta hun eki, men ku me hang ngo ma um.
43007038	Taku po ta won phep pit po ngo, men ku wungin si epon ira Panngin Auluungin tin wo taku, ‘Min tin nuk emin weh men kha kuli eki nesiling tin tunusan men nuk e sut min me pol men.’”
43007039	Wungin tin imen yang sakal los po Emiun Auluungin, tin po tin ku wo hi phep pit po yang men kuli iso wai men. Epo Emiun Auluungin tin imen ku kho me som, epo a-Yesus ku wa moolngin tan kho akomen.
43007040	Tumen ma po munuman tin kuk mi sun tin wa ilio angan men hul wungin tin imen, men po sakal taku, “Irawin, yang timen men Pokngin tin nhum e it kuk e hoo mi it epon men weh kha imen.”
43007041	Si po kara wo taku, “Yang timen men Mesaia kha men.” Si po kara maksin wo taku, “Ma ken Mesaia e ku me pol Galili. Awu. Men pi om?
43007042	Epo Panngin Auluungin pok epo Mesaia ku si mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Dewit men, ma men ku si Betlehem pi tin a-Dewit in epon kho men ako, wah?”
43007043	Tumen ma po masang to sun wala pok mi al pit mi yang.
43007044	Ma po kara tin kuk mi sun men taku kasum yang, takuma po ta ku wilin ung po yang akomen.
43007045	Tumen ma po phuan tin haum eya mang auluungin men kyok me pol ta po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po Parisi kut tumen, ma po wo ta sun taku, “Wom ku wa yang mu som epo ele?”
43007046	Ti ma po phuan ko wo taku, “Po ta ku sakal ken sun tin yang tin imen sakal i men angan ta kho som.”
43007047	Tumen ma po Parisi ko wo ta sun taku, “Wuh, wungin ta yang ku ek ek mara wom maksin kut ti?
43007048	Iyi, epo po tin mara pim pit wo wom men ta wa po Parisi ta tumen e won nuk wet yang kho, wah?
43007049	Awu! Si po masang to sun wala tin pong epo wungin sinsin men, men ngilngin ko po hi ako.”
43007050	Si a-Nikodimas tin tita hi e kho ma me pol ta a-Yesus to pi luk men ko wo ta po taku,
43007051	“Iyi, wungin ta it sinsin e ku plesngin ta po ta engun, si it ku hul wungin tan muk ma it ion wungin tin ning i men wet, wah?”
43007052	Ti ma po ko sakal wet yang taku, “Iyi, ngon e ku api Galili maksin kut ti? E ion mi sakalngin tin panngin nuk men, kuma e ion i epo pi Galili men ku po pokngin ku ta si epon kho akomen.”
43007053	Kut ma po moyong li li mang ta hi tuo hi then then.
43008001	Si a-Yesus li in po pi emian tin sa olip nuk epon men.
43008002	Li ma to pi huus king kauk men yang kyok li nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men, ma po masang to sun wala mosop me epo yang; ma yang ko ung ma yang kot po.
43008003	Si po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin plesnginan men to sun Parisi kara wa wut wala enangin ta me epo yang, men po li pon tan men in e ning wungin tin sup si khi yang ta men. Ma po wa wut me pit lunga po,
43008004	ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin kot po men, wut tin wala imen, po li pon tan men in e ning wungin lengwal tin sup si khi yang ta men, men po mara hi nuk po wut tin in e ning i tumen weh.
43008005	Epo mi wungin sinsin men a-Moses wo maran ko klat ta it epo po tin tumen ku it wini epo enah ko hun. Si ngon ku wo tua epo wut?”
43008006	Epo wungin tin imen po sakal i taku karong yang, kuma po pon ta wungin sinsin ta tin ku po wa wungin pit po yang epon men. Takuma a-Yesus mosok ko ung ma yang pan yanga mulus epo wilin pon pon ta, ken yang e ku hul akomen.
43008007	Si po iso kuk e kines kines yang kokyok, men yang khek si pit ma yang wo ta po taku, “Po ta wom ta tin lasin om epon men ta in lunga wom, anima wok wut epo enah muk.”
43008008	Ti ma angan ta kyok men yang mosok ko ung, ma yang pan yanga mulus.
43008009	Kut ma po hul wungin tin imen, men mi po tin ples wungin nginangan men tuon tak si wungin lengwal tin ta hi men, ma po mosop phem then then ma po li li, men yang tin hyangan weh e in mi po men li muk, ma po ung e li tumen weh li pol epo yang tin nerengin weh men, li klet ma a-Yesus misan in u wut tin wala men iso pit emin ewin kut tumen.
43008010	Ma a-Yesus khek si pit, men ku yang ion po ta som, si wut tin wala men misan pit, ma yang wo ta wut taku, “Kain, po tin wa wungin pit po ngon men li a? Iyi, po ta tin ku wo los po ngon men pi angun, wah?”
43008011	Ti ma wut ko wo taku, “Ngon tin akono men, po ta ku in som.” Tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo taku, “Ngo kut, ngo men ku wo los po ngon akomen kut tumen. Si e lu, ma homani li kut men ku e ning lasin kyok asin.”
43008012	Kut ma a-Yesus pok put sakalngin si ta po kyok ma yang wo taku, “Ngo men esul tin ta pi mulus men. Taku po ta pet kira ngo, men ku muk muk mi pi mi ku kyok akomen, si men ku in to esul tin epo tunusngin men.”
43008013	Tumen ma po Parisi wo ta yang taku, “Ngon men pok put sakalngin nhio wo ngon tuop. Sakalngin tin tuop pok put men ku pim a wo pim phep pit won ken i e irawin men akomen.”
43008014	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Aku, taku nga pok put sakalngin nhio wo ngo tuo ngo, takuma sakalngin tin nga pok put i men, men irawin weh ako, epo nga pon ta pi tin nga me epon men u pi tin ku nga li epon men kut tumen ako. Si wom men ku pon ta pi tin nga me epon men u pi tin ku nga li epon men tumen akomen.
43008015	Wom men ples wungin ira wungin ta po tunus engun, si ngo men ku ples wungin ta po ta som.
43008016	Si taku nga ples wungin, men nga ples i to wungin irawin ako. Epo misa ngo ani ku ples wungin men som, si Yok tin tih ngo ma nga me men kha tuk a ples wungin to al men.
43008017	Kuru sakalngin men panngin nuk mi wungin sinsin tin ta wom men epon taku wulong ponwal pok put wungin kai wal epo wungin ta, men ku wo wom nuk wet ken i e irawin weh ako.
43008018	Epo tuo ngo kha pok put wungin epo ngo, kuru Yok tin tih ngo ma nga me men pok put wungin epo ngo maksin kut tumen.”
43008019	Tumen ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Wiramap men in akani?” A-Yesus ko wo taku, “Wom ku hop ngo som, wa wom ku hop Yok som kut tumen. Epon taku wom hop ngo, men ku wom hop Yok maksin kut tumen ako.”
43008020	Wungin tin imen a-Yesus in e kot po hut mang auluungin, men yang sakal tikayung wunwun tin po tep eyuk ko min men. Ma po ta ku wilin si ung po yang som, epo enal tin ta yang men ku kho si akomen.
43008021	Tumen ma a-Yesus sakal ta po kyok taku, “Ngo ku li, ma wom ku langun epo ngo, ma wom ku huu to lasin ta wom. Pi tin nga li epon men, men ku wom lu epon akomen.”
43008022	Tumen ma po Yuda sakal lunga hi taku, “Iyi, yang tuon ku wini ko hun, wah? Epo yang wo ti, ‘Pi tin ku nga li epon men, men ku wom mu epon akomen.’”
43008023	Ma yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Wom men api awet, si ngo men api awon; wom men api wo mulus tin iyi, si ngo men ku api wo mulus tin iyi akomen.
43008024	Wala nga wo ta wom kho epo wom ku huu to lasin ta wom men. Epon taku wom ku wo wom phep epo ngo men ku yang tuon som, men ku wom huu to lasin ta wom engun.”
43008025	Tumen ma po wo ta yang taku, “Ngon men are?” Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Ngo tin in e sakal ta wom li li ewo maran ma me men.
43008026	Nga in to wungin munuman tin ngo ku sakal i ma nga ples wungin ta wom epon men, takuma yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men men wungin tan anuh. Ma wungin tin nga hul i mi wo yang men misan kha nga sakal i si ta po tin ung wo mulus men.”
43008027	Takuma po ku ion i epo a-Yesus tin in e sakal ta po epo Wiraman men akomen.
43008028	Tumen ma a-Yesus sakal ta po taku, “Minan tin kuli wom wa Wiru Po Tunus si kuk men, khama wom ion i epo ngo men yang tuon, ma ngo ku ning wungin ta epo tuo ngo akomen. Si wungin tin Yok kot ngo epon men misan kha nga sakal i men.
43008029	Ma yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men men in to ngo. Yok ku mang put ngo ma misa ngo in akomen, epo nga ning wungin tin yang min tunusngin pit pon men kokyok kokyok.”
43008030	Yang in e sakal wungin tin imen, men po munuman wo hi phep pit po yang.
43008031	Tumen ma a-Yesus wo ta po Yuda tin wo hi phep pit po yang men taku, “Taku wom kuk mi wungin tin ta ngo men kokyok kokyok, men wom tin urut kotngin mi wo ngo irawin weh men kha men.
43008032	Ma wom ku ion wungin tin irawin men, men ku wungin tin irawin men ning i ma wo wom pias.”
43008033	Ti ma po sakal wet yang taku, “Pim men Abraham phonginin, ma pim ku kan kanngin wet wili po ta angan ta kho som. Taku tuni ma e wo taku, ‘Wom ku iso si wo wom pias?’”
43008034	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, taku po ta ning lasin, men in ken po ta tin lasin kan kan i ma kum wo lasin tan engun men.
43008035	Ma po ta tin kum wo sun engun men ku in mi mang kokyok kokyok ewin akomen, si wirun kha in kokyok kokyok men.
43008036	Tumen ma taku Wirun ning i ma wo wom pias, men ku wo wom pias irawin weh kut.
43008037	Nga ion i epo wom men Abraham phonginin ako, takuma wom tohuh epo wom ku wi ngo ko hun, epo mi wom tin ku sakalngin ta ngo nuk epon men men pi om.
43008038	Ngo men sakal ira sakalngin tin nga ion i hang Yok men, si wom men ira wungin tin wom ion i hang wirama wom men kha men.”
43008039	Tumen ma po ko sakal wet yang taku, “Abraham kha yau a pim siin men.” Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Taku wom e Abraham phonginin, men ku wom ning wungin tin Abraham ning i men ewin ako.
43008040	Takuma homani ma wom tohuh weh epo wom ku wi ngo ko hun, ngo tin pok wom epo wungin tin irawin e nga hul i mi wo Got weh men. Wungin tin timen men ku Abraham ning i ewin som.
43008041	Wom men kuk e ning wungin tin ta wirama wom men engun.” Tumen ma po ko sakal ta yang taku, “Po tin khuuk pim men ku khuuk pim ira soput som, si pim men wirama pim then ta misan, men Got.”
43008042	A-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Taku irawin epo Got men Wirama wom, men ku mi wom epo ngo ako, epo ngo men in hang Got ma nga me pol. Kuru ngo ku me epo mi ngo engun akomen, si yang kha tih ngo ma nga me men.
43008043	Sinsin tua ma wom ku mara wom ira sakalngin tin nga sakal i men som? Men epon tin wom khuk po engin epo wom tin ku hul sakalngin tin ta ngo men weh.
43008044	Wom men khuukngin ta wirama wom, men emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men. Ma wungin tin wirama wom min epon men kha mi wom epo wom ku ning i men. Epo ewo maran men yang lek po ko huu iso me pol homani kut i, si yang ku pit nhing mi wungin tin irawin men ewin som, epo wungin irawin ta ku in mi yang akomen. Ma minan tin ku yang torok epo wungin ta, men ku yang ning i epo wungin tin nuk mi yang tuon weh men, epo yang men torok nginangan, ma yang men wirama torokngin mosop.
43008045	Si ngo men pok wom epo wungin tin irawin men, sinsin tin imen wala wom ku wo wom nuk wet ngo som men.
43008046	Wom tin imen ara ku tak si lasin ta ngo ta? Ma taku nga pok wom epo wungin tin irawin men, taku tuni ma wom ku wo wom nuk wet ngo som?
43008047	Po ta e ku ta Got, khama hul sakalngin tin ta yang men. Tumen ma wom ku hul sakalngin ta yang som, sinsin epon tin wom ku ta yang som men.”
43008048	Tumen ma po Yuda ko sakal wet yang taku, “Iyi, pim tin wo epo ngon e wom Samaria khuuk wal ma mengengin ta in mi ngon men, men pim a sakal siik ako, wah?”
43008049	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Ngo men ku mengengin ta in mi ngo som. Si nga wa Yok yan si, taku wom kha ton mi ngo men.
43008050	Si ngo men ku tohuh epo ngo ku wa ya ngo si som, si po tin ku tohuh epon ma ples wungin men, men ta in ako.
43008051	Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, epon taku po ta kasum wungin ta ngo, men ku pon ta hunngin angan akomen.”
43008052	Tumen ma po Yuda wo ta yang taku, “Homani ma pim a ion i kut epo ngon men mengengin ta wa ngon ako! Abraham hun kho, kuru po pokngin kut tumen. Takuma e wo taku, ‘Taku po ta kasum wungin ta ngo, men ku ion hunngin angan akomen.’
43008053	Iyi, ngon e taku nhum epo yau a pim sin Abraham tin hun kho men u po pokngin tin huu kho maksin kut tumen, wah? E wo epo ngon e taku ara weh ii?”
43008054	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo taku, “Taku tuo ngo wa ya ngo si, men ku ya ngo amiron nginan engun. Si Yok tin wom wo epon e Got ta wom men kha wa ya ngo si men.
43008055	Takuma wom men ku pon ta yang kho som, si ngo kha pon ta yang men. Ma taku nga sakal epo ngo e ku pon ta yang som, men ku nga torokngin angan ken wom men. Takuma ngo men pon ta yang ma nga kasum wungin ta yang ako.
43008056	Abraham tin yau a wom sin men min keh keh epon ku ion elup tin ta ngo men, ma yang ion i ma yang min keh keh takut.”
43008057	Tumen ma po Yuda ko sakal ta yang taku, “Iyi, ngon men ku posan tap khum eip kho som, takuma e wile ion Abraham, wah?”
43008058	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo Abraham men ku iso khuukngin kho som, si ngo men in ti kut.”
43008059	Tumen ma po ko tamuk enah tin ku si po tup ewut yang epon men, takuma a-Yesus ko kaun ta tuon ma yang yok mi enunu tin baul mang auluungin men ma yang li pol, men yang li lunga po ma yang li, kha yang li yek ta po li men.
43009001	Ma a-Yesus li yek ta po li, men yang maran kon yang maran korip ta, men tonin khuuk i tumen kut.
43009002	Ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men kileng yang taku, “Rabai, ara ning lasin ma yang timen tonin khuuk i ko maran korip tumen, yang tuon wa wiraman ngong tonin?”
43009003	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Awu, men ken yang ani ning lasin men wa wiraman ngong tonin tumen som. Tin imen ku si kuma kumang ta Got si in pi mlaeng epo yang.
43009004	Ngo men ku ning kumang ta yang tin tih ngo me men weh minan tin pi iso mhangin ti kut men, epo pi luk ung e me kut, men ku po ta ku kum kyok akomen.
43009005	Minan tin nga iso in wo mulus men, men ngo men esul ta mulus.”
43009006	Yang wo tumen kut, anima yang kimos ko mi mulus, ma yang wilin ninyel i, ma yang wai si, yang luk mara sun epon.
43009007	Ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, “E lu khis pop mi eki Siloam” (Eki yan timen sinsin taku, “Tihngin kho li” ti). Tumen ma yang li khis pon, ma yang kyok me, men yang maran iis endara.
43009008	Tumen ma po tin hi ung then e kho ma ion yang tin maran korip men sakal taku, “Yang tuon tin kho ma ung ung to kanungin men tuon ani kop, wah?”
43009009	Tumen ma po kara sakal taku, “Wai, yang tuon,” si po kara maksin wo taku, “Awu, yang timen maran kai sun men engun.” Si yang tuon men heek taku, “Eh, ngo tuo ngo kut.”
43009010	Tumen ma po kileng yang taku, “Si marap plas tua?”
43009011	Ti ma yang ko wo wet po taku, “Yang ta tin po sikian a-Yesus men ninyel mulusngin ma yang luk marango epon, ma yang wo ta ngo taku, ‘E lu khis pop mi eki Siloam.’ Tumen ma nga li khis po ngo ma marango iis endara kyok kut.”
43009012	Tumen ma po kines yang taku, “Ma yang la?” Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Aiyih, ngo ku pon ta yang som.”
43009013	Kut ma po wa yang tin kho ma maran korip men li epo po Parisi.
43009014	Kut sini ungunan tin a-Yesus ninyel mulus ma yang ning sun si maran plas men men to pi Sabat.
43009015	Tumen ma po Parisi kileng yang maksin epo tuni ma yang kyok si maran iis endara. Ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Yang wa mulus min lalapat kara ko mara ngo, ma nga li khis po ngo, ma homani ma marango iis endara kut.”
43009016	Tumen ma po Parisi kara ko sakal ta al taku, “Yang tin imen ku me hang Got som, epo yang men hik put wungin sinsin tin ta pi Sabat men ako.” Si po kara ko sakal taku, “Tua ma po ta tin ku ning lasin men ku ning tosukngin tin tumen?” Tumen ma po ko pok mi al.
43009017	Kut ma po kines yang tin kho ma maran korip men kyok taku, “Si ngon men ku sakal tua epo yang tin kho ma ning i ma marap plas men?” Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Yang men pokngin ta.”
43009018	Takuma po Yuda ku wo hi nuk wet yang tin tuon e sakal epo kho ma yang maran korip li ma yang maran plas kyok men akomen, weh li minan tin po yuk yang tin maran plas kut men wiraman ngong tonin me.
43009019	Ma po kileng mi wulong taku, “Yang timen wiru mom tin mom wo epon e mom khuuk i maran korip men ani men, wah? Si tua ma yang kyok si maran iis endara homani?”
43009020	Ti ma wiraman ngong tonin ko sakal wet po taku, “Tuk a ion yang tin iyi men tuk a khuuk i ako, kuru minan tin tonin khuuk yang men tuk a ion yang maran tin korip men kut tumen.
43009021	Takuma tin yang maran iis endara tuni homani men, men ku tuk a pon tan som, wa po tin plas mara yang men ku tuk a pon tan som kut tumen. Si wom kines yang, epo yang men nomuru, ma ku tuon pok put wungin epon.”
43009022	Epo wiraman ngong tonin sakal tumen, epo wulong lem pit wo po Yuda, epo po Yuda hihi wungin kho, epon taku po ta pok put yang e Mesaia, men ku po luul ton mi mang akotngin tin ta hi men li pol ma po uluu i epon tin ku kyok li sup men.
43009023	Epo sinsin tin imen wala wulong sakal taku, “Yang men nomuru kut, ma ku wom kileng yang tuon,” timen.
43009024	Tumen ma po yuk yang tin kho ma maran korip men angan tin me ponwal men me, po wo ta yang taku, “Ngon men ku wa Got yan si awon weh! Epo pim a ion i epo yang tin imen men to lasin ako.”
43009025	Tumen ma yang ko wo taku, “Yang ku ning lasin ewin wa men, ma ku nga pon tan som. Wungin then ta misan kha nga pon tan men, epon tin kho ma marango korip, takuli homani ma marango iis endara kyok.”
43009026	Si po kileng yang maksin taku, “Yang ning ela epo ngon u yang ning i tua ma marap plas tumen?”
43009027	Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Nga pok wom kho, takuma wom ku hul som. Tuni ma wom ku hul i kyok? Iyi, epo wom ku si urut kotngin mi wo yang kut ti?”
43009028	Kut ma po mimi yang taku, “Ngon kha ku urut kotngin mi wo yang men, si pim men ku urut kotngin mi wo a-Moses ako!
43009029	Epo pim a ion i epo Got sakal ta a-Moses kho. Si yang tin imen, men ku pim a ion i tin ku me akandira men som.”
43009030	Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Aii, wungin timen enginin weh, epo wom pong epo yang tin ku me akandira men, men yang tin imen kha me ning i ma marango plas men.
43009031	Epo it ion i epo Got ku hul wet po tin ning lasin men ewin som. Si taku po ta uluu Got ewin ma ira wungin ta yang, men ku yang hul wet ako.
43009032	Ewo maran tin pi mulus si nuk ma me pol homani men, men ku it hul epo po ta ku plas mara sun ta tin khuukngin maran korip men kho ti som.
43009033	Taku yang tin imen ku me hang Got som, men ku yang ning wungin ta akomen.”
43009034	Ti ma po ko sakal wet yang taku, “Iyi, ngon tin tonim khuuk ngon to lasin misan men taku kot pim ani men, wah?” Tumen ma po psik yang li pol.
43009035	Kut ma a-Yesus hul epo po tin psik yang li pol men, ma yang li pon ta sun, men yang wo ta sun taku, “Iyi, wop phep pit wo Got Wirun?”
43009036	Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, po tin imen ani are kuma wo ngo nuk wet?”
43009037	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon men ion yang kut, epo yang tuon wala sakal si tap kut men.”
43009038	Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, wo ngo phep!” Tumen ma yang powut ko suul sii khi sun ma yang uluu sun.
43009039	Tumen ma a-Yesus sakal taku, “Epo wungin plesnginan kha nga me in wo mulus epon men, kumali po tin mara hi mhi men ku mara hi ek, si po tin mara hi ek men ku mara hi mhi.”
43009040	Kut ma po Parisi kara tin kuk to yang men hul wungin tin imen, ma po wo ta yang taku, “Iyi, ma pim men mara pim mhi maksin kut ti?”
43009041	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Taku mara wom mhi, men ku lasin ta wom om. Takuma homani ma wom wo taku, ‘Mara pim kleng.’ Tumen ma lasin ta wom men iso ung kut.”
43010001	Irawin weh nga wo anuh ta wom, epo yang ta e ku li sup mi enunu ta sipsip epo sowon som, si lup si po enunu pi put enginin ta engun, tin imen men tip tip nginangan ta u nak nak endara amhees nginangan ta kut tumen kha men.
43010002	Si yang tin ku li sup sowon men, men kha haum eya sipsip weh men.
43010003	Yang kha sun tin haum mara sowon men klas epon men, ma sipsip hul wut weh. Ma yang sik sik ya sipsip tan yan then then, ma yang muk sipsip li pol.
43010004	Ma yang tet sipsip tin tan weh men mosop li pol kut, anima yang li muk epo sipsip. Ma sipsip pet kira yang, epo sipsip hop wut yang.
43010005	Si po enginin ta tin sipsip kilan men ku sipsip iran akomen, men ku sipsip mhup silang i ako, epo li ku hop wut po tin enginin men weh akomen.”
43010006	Wungin emol tin imen a-Yesus sakal i si ta po, takuma po ku ion mi wungin tin yang sakal i si ta po men akomen.
43010007	Tumen ma a-Yesus wo ta po kyok taku, “Irawin weh nga wo anuh ta wom, epo ngo kha sowon tin ta sipsip men ako.
43010008	Po mosop tin me muk epo ngo kho men men tip tip nginangan u nak nak endara amhees nginangan kut tumen, takuma sipsip ku hul wet po akomen.
43010009	Ngo kha sowon men. Taku po ta me sup epo ngo, men ku palolongin, ma ku in e me sup u in e li pol kut tumen, ma pon ta endara aiingin tunus.
43010010	Si po tin tipngin men ku me epon ku ning wungin enginin ta som, si men me epon ku tip tip sipsip u lek li ko huu u siluk min tumen misan. Si ngo men me epon ku po wa tunusngin, ma tunusngin men ku pu wal mi po weh.
43010011	Ngo men tin haum eya sipsip tunus men. Yang ta tin haum eya sipsip tunus men men tuon min alang si tunusngin tan mut eya sipsip.
43010012	Si yang ta tin kum anaum engun men, tin ku yang tin haum eya sipsip e sipsip tan weh men akomen, men ion elwa enih tin lases kuk tan men tin me men, men ku plu ma sipsip pit, si saa engun. Ma elwa enih me nak nak sipsip amhees engun, ma elwa plak mi sipsip li yanga pi.
43010013	Yang tin kum anaum men saa epon men kum anaum engun ma ku silan khing pit po sipsip weh akomen.
43010014	Ngo kha yang tin haum eya sipsip tunus men. Ma nga hop sipsip ta ngo u sipsip ta ngo hop ngo kut tumen.
43010015	Kai Yok tin hop ngo men, tumen kut kha nga hop Yok, ma mi ngo alang si tunusngin ta ngo ko mut eya sipsip men.
43010016	Ma sipsip ta ngo kara maksin kuk, men ku kuk mi enunu tin iyi som. Sipsip tin imen ku nga espon maksin weh me, ma po ku hul wut ngo. Ma kuli sipsip wailio angan men ku then ta, ma yang then ta maran pit wo li.
43010017	Sinsin tin Yok min epo ngo men wala ti, epo mi ngo alang si tunusngin tin ta ngo men ko nuk kumali nga iso wai kyok si.
43010018	Si po ta men ku klok tunusngin tin ta ngo men hang ngo men akomen. Awu. Men mi ngo alang sin ko nuk epo mi ngo weh. Nga in to emhong tin ku mi ngo alang sin ko nuk men u emhong epon tin ku nga wai kyok si men kut tumen ako. Wungin tin maran ko klat imen nga wai mi wo Yok weh.”
43010019	Tumen ma pok mi ngin ta kyok si nuk lunga po Yuda sinsin in epo sakalngin tin mosop imen.
43010020	Ma po munuman tin kuk lunga hi men wo taku, “Yang timen men emiun lengwal ta in min ma yang men menge an kut. Wom hul wet yang epo ele?”
43010021	Si po kara maksin men wo taku, “Sakalngin timen ku ta po ta tin emiun lengwal kasum i men akomen. Iyi, emiun lengwal ta ku kakha epon ku paplas mara po tin mara hi korip men, wah?”
43010022	Si minan tin imen kakaomngin tin po Yuda tulu hi hu wungin tin kho ma po wo hi ung wo mang auluungin ta Got kyok si auluungin men men si Yerusalem, ma elup tin pi huk hukngin si ton men men kho si kut.
43010023	Ma a-Yesus muk muk nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men wet suyung tin ta a-Solomon men.
43010024	Kut ma po Yuda me palu wal baul yang, ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon ku in e kik wungin mara pim ma mi pim ponwal li pol to pi tua? Epon taku ngon e Mesaia, anima e pok pim si in pi mlaeng engun.”
43010025	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Nga pok wom kho, takuma wom ku wo wom nuk wet som. Si kumang tin nga ning i epo Yok yan men kha pok put ngo men.
43010026	Takuma wom ku wo wom nuk wet som, epo wom men ku pit lunga sipsip tin ta ngo men akomen, kha nga wo ta wom kut men.
43010027	Sipsip mosop tin ta ngo men hul wut ngo, ma nga hop li, u li ira ngo kut tumen.
43010028	Ma nga wa tunusngin tin sindak men si ta po, ma po kuli huuspit angan ta akomen. Kuru po ta ku nak i yanga wili ngo kut tumen akomen.
43010029	Yok tin wa po si ta ngo men, men nhum epo endara mosop. Ma po ta ku kakha epon ku nak po ta kyok yanga wili Yok akomen.
43010030	Ngo u Yok tumen men tuk a then.”
43010031	Tumen ma po Yuda ko espo enah kyok si po taku tup ewut yang epon.
43010032	Kut ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Nga suk mara wom kho epo kumang turunus munuman tin me hang Yok men. Ma wungin tin ani weh e wom ku tup ewut ngo epo enah pit min men?”
43010033	Ti ma po Yuda sakal wet yang taku, “Pim ku tup ewut ngon epo enah pit mi kumang tin tunus imen ta som, si men pit mi ton mingin, epo ngon men po tunus ta engun, takuma e wo ken ngon tuop e Got men.”
43010034	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Iyi, panngin ta nuk mi wungin sinsin tin ta wom men taku, ‘Nga wo ti, “Wom men got an,”’ ti ako, wah?
43010035	Taku Got wo epo po tin wungin ta Got li epo hi men got an, ma Panngin Auluungin ku po ta hik put akomen,
43010036	men tuni ma wom wo epo yang tin Yok won ung won e auluungin ma yang tih i me in wo mulus men, ‘E ton mi Got,’ ti, epo ngo tin sakal taku, ‘Ngo men Got Wirun,’ timen?
43010037	Taku ngo ku ning kumang ta Yok som, men ku wo wom nuk wet ngo asin.
43010038	Si taku nga ning i kut, ma wom ku wo wom nuk wet ngo tuo ngo som, men ku wo wom nuk wet kumang tin mosop imen, kuma wom ion i ma wo wom phep epo Yok men in mi ngo, u nga in mi Yok kut tumen.”
43010039	A-Yesus wo tumen ma po taku sung wo yang kyok, takuma yang pluk yanga wili po ma yang li.
43010040	Ma yang kyok li put eki Yodan pilin ekora, li pi tin muk ma a-Yon li ning baptais epon kho men, ma yang li in pi tin imen.
43010041	Ma po masang to sun wala munuman li epo yang, ma po sakal taku, “A-Yon men ku ning tosukngin maran kiring ta som, takuma wungin mosop tin a-Yon pok put epo yang tin imen men irawin misan.”
43010042	Tumen ma po munuman wo hi phep pit wo a-Yesus pi tin imen.
43011001	Kut sini yang ta saih, men a-Lasarus tin api Betani men, men pi tin ta e-Maria ngong eron e-Marta men.
43011002	E-Maria tin imen wala kho ma yuk yuk nowhong ko po yang tin Akono men ma luk luk po khi yang epon yut men, kha wilut a-Lasarus tin saih men.
43011003	Tumen ma wulong ngong eron tirih wungin li epo a-Yesus, ma wulong sakal taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, e hul, epo yang tin mip epon weh men, men saih.”
43011004	Ma a-Yesus hul wungin tin imen, men yang wo taku, “Saihngin timen ku epo hunngin akomen, si men epon ku po ion moolngin ta Got, kumali po wa Got Wirun yan si epon.”
43011005	Epo a-Yesus min pit wo e-Marta ngong eron u a-Lasarus kut tumen.
43011006	Tumen ma yang hul epo a-Lasarus tin saih men, men yang iso in pi tin yang in epon men ungunan ponwal.
43011007	Wungin tin imen si, li klet anima a-Yesus ko wo ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “It kyok li wo mulusngin Yudia.”
43011008	Ti ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ko wo ta yang taku, “Rabai, po Yuda taku tup ewut ngon epo enah homan kut i, takuma ngon ku kyok lu pi tin imen kyok, wah?”
43011009	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Iyi, sinang maran ta pi mhangin then ta men kum ta u ponwal tumen ako, wah? Ma taku po ta muk muk to pi mhangin, men ku plong ko akomen, epon men ion esul tin ta pi mulus men.
43011010	Si taku po ta muk muk to pi luk, men ku li plong ko engun, epon men ku esul in min akomen.”
43011011	Yang sakal wungin tin mosop imen kut, anima yang wo kyok taku, “Yang tin tita it a-Lasarus men nuk e nhaung engun, ma ngo ku li epo ngo ku kon kon yang si.”
43011012	Tumen ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ko wo taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, taku yang ko nuk e nhaung, men kuli yang si tunus kyok ako.”
43011013	Takuma a-Yesus sakal wungin tin imen los po hunngin ta a-Lasarus, ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men phaeng taku yang e sakal siik epo a-Lasarus e nuk e nhing epo nhaungngin.
43011014	Taku li a-Yesus pok po pi mlaeng taku, “A-Lasarus men hun ako.”
43011015	Takuma sila ngo khing epo wom kha mi ngo keh epo ngo ku in pi tin imen som men, epon kumali wom ku wo wom phep. Epo it men ku li epo yang kut khae.”
43011016	Kut ma a-Tomas, tin po pen yan a-Hukap men, ko wo ta po tin hi hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men taku, “Aku, it li engun kuma it li huu to yang engun.”
43011017	Tumen ma a-Yesus li pol tikayung pi, men yang hul epo sun a-Lasarus men kilngin kho li nuk mi uwin tin tanuan men ungunan mnal kho li.
43011018	Epo pi Betani men ung orot sun Yerusalem, ma men kilomita khaut myuk engun wa tumen li epon,
43011019	ti ma po Yuda munuman kho me kuk hang e-Marta ngong eron e-Maria, epon ku wa wulong ko nhing ewi wilut hi.
43011020	Kut si e-Marta hul epo a-Yesus tin in e me men, khama wut li tut yang ira soput, si e-Maria iso ung mang.
43011021	Tumen ma e-Marta li wo ta a-Yesus taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, taku ngon ku in iyi kho, men ku wilu ngo hun ti som.
43011022	Takuma homani kut tumen men nga ion i epo ngon ku kileng Got epo wungin ta tun tara, men ku Got wai si tap ako.”
43011023	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta wut taku, “Wilut ngon men ku si tunus kyok ako.”
43011024	Ti ma e-Marta ko wo ta yang taku, “Nga ion i epo yang kuli khek kyok si tunus mi kekhekngin tin kuli si to elup tin kuli li ponsol men ako.”
43011025	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta wut taku, “Ngo kha kekhekngin si u tunusngin kut tumen. Po ta ku won phep pit po ngo, aku, men hun, takuma men ku iso si tunus in ako.
43011026	Ma taku po ta tunus in ma won phep pit po ngo, men ku hun angan ta kyok akomen. Iyi, wop nuk wet wungin timen, wah?”
43011027	Ti ma wut ko wo ta yang taku, “Wai, ngon tin Akono men, wo ngo nuk wet ngon tin Mesaia e Got Wirun tin ku me in wo mulus men ako.”
43011028	Kut ma wut wo tumen li klet, anima wut li yuk eron e-Maria ma wut sakal kas kas ko ta sun taku, “Yang tin kot it men kho me kut, ma yang me yuk ngon.”
43011029	Wut hul wungin tin imen, khama wut khek si nang kerek, ma wut li epo yang.
43011030	Epo a-Yesus ku kho me sup pi tin tanuan imen som, si yang iso in pi tin e-Marta li tut yang epon men.
43011031	Tumen ma po Yuda tin kuk to e-Maria mi mang ma wa wut ko nhing men ion e-Maria tin kerek e khek si ma li pol mara so men, ma po ira wut li, epo po sakal taku, “Wut men li tanu epon ku li in e tinis pi tin imen kha men.”
43011032	Kut si e-Maria li pol pi tin a-Yesus me in epon men, ma wut maran kon yang, men wut li plong ko nuk sii khi yang, ma wut sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, taku ngon ku in a ii kho, men ku wilu ngo ku hun ti som.”
43011033	Tumen ma a-Yesus ion wut tin in e tinis men u po Yuda tin ira wut me men nuk e tinis kut tumen, ma yang min in tinisngin ko mi emiun weh, ma yang kamus takut.
43011034	Ma yang wo taku, “Wom wa yang lu nuk a?” Po ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, e mu ion i.”
43011035	A-Yesus tinis.
43011036	Tumen ma po Yuda wo taku, “Wom ion i, epo yang min epo sun timen weh!”
43011037	Si po kara kuk lunga sun men sakal taku, “Iyi, yang tin imen tin paplas mara po tin mara hi korip men, kut ku yang ning i ma yang timen ku hun asin som kut, ti wah?”
43011038	Kut ma a-Yesus min in tinisngin kyok ma yang li pol pi tin tanuan men. Pi tanuan tin imen men uwin an, ma enah nhum ta nghen won.
43011039	Kut ma a-Yesus ko wo taku, “Wom lu sing enah mu lu.” Ti ma e-Marta tin wilut hun men ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, epo homani men yang hies kho kut, epo yang nuk ungunan mnal kho li.”
43011040	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta wut taku, “Iyi, muk ma nga wo tap kho epon taku wop phep, men ku e ion moolngin tin ta Got men ako, wah?”
43011041	Kut ma po li sing enah pi tin yang tin hun men nuk epon men mili. Si a-Yesus maran li si wet pi ma yang sakal taku, “Yok, nga sam sam ngon epo ngon tin hul wet ngo kho kut men.
43011042	Ma nga ion i epo ngon tin hul wet ngo kokyok kokyok men ako, takuma po tin nuk e li li iyi kha nga sakal tumen, kumali po wo hi nuk wet wungin epo ngon kha tih ngo ma nga me men.”
43011043	A-Yesus sakal tumen li klet, anima yang wut pit hambip taku, “Lasarus, e mu pol.”
43011044	Kut ma yang tin hun kho men me pol, men yang me pol to mulu tin epo hunngin e po kas po wili yang u po khi yang tumen epon men, kuru endara tin po kas mara yang epon men nuk kut tumen. tumen ma a-Yesus wo ta po taku, “Wom lu poplos endara po yang, ma wom mang, si yang muk muk li.”
43011045	Tumen ma po Yuda tin me kuk hang e-Maria ma po ion wungin tin a-Yesus ning i men, men po munuman ko wo hi phep pit wo yang.
43011046	Si po kara li pol ta sun Parisi ma po pok sun epo wungin mosop tin a-Yesus ning i men.
43011047	Kut ma po tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men to sun Parisi yuk sun Kaunsil me hi palu wal ma po sakal taku, “It ku ning i tua? Epo yang tin ikop ning tosukngin maran kiring kiring munuman weh.
43011048	Taku it mang, si yang in e ning wungin tin tumen li kut, men ku po mosop wo hi nuk wet yang, ma po Rom ku me wa mulusngin ta it ma po wa sun tin it khuuk wal then men li.”
43011049	Kut si yang ta hi ta yan a-Kaiapas, men tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara to posan tin imen wo ta po taku, “Wom men ku hop wungin ta akomen,
43011050	kuru wom e ku tulu wom hu wungin tin iyi som, epon men tunus epon ku po ta hun mut eya po masang to sun wala mosop, si kumali po mosop tin it khuuk wal men ku huuspit akomen.”
43011051	Epo wungin tin imen men ku yang sakal i epo min tuon akomen. Si yang tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara to posan tin imen kha yang pok put wungin kho epo a-Yesus tin ku hun mut eya po tin hi khuuk wal Yuda men,
43011052	si ku a-Yesus hun mut eya po Yuda misa hi som, si men epon ku yang palu po tin husani Got e kuk e plak mili yanga pi men me kuk then maksin kut tumen .
43011053	Kut ma hosingin minan timen ma li, men po kuk e pok wal eking a-Yesus epo po tin ku wi yang ko hun men.
43011054	Tumen ma a-Yesus ku muk muk lunga po Yuda pi mlaeng kyok akomen, si yang yok pi tin imen li wo mulusngin ta ung tikayung pi tin tahunggu men, ma yang li sup mi enunu ta, po sik yan Epraim, ma yang li in imen to po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men.
43011055	Kut si kakaomngin tin epo Paska e ta po Yuda men ku si angan, ma po munuman yok yok me yanga pi li si Yerusalem muk kho epo kakaomngin, epon ku hi ning hi si po hi yil to mara Got kho wet.
43011056	Tumen ma po kuk e langun epo a-Yesus, ma po si nuk nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men ma po sakal lunga hi tuo hi taku, “Wom phaeng taku tua? Epo yang e ku me epo kakaomngin tin iyi som, wah?”
43011057	Si po tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men to sun Parisi hi wo maran ko klat kho epo po ta ku ion a-Yesus tin in akandira men, men ku po tin imen pok sun, kuma po li kasum yang.
43012001	Kut ma ungunan ta me sup iso ung eya Kakaomngin tin epo Paska men, si a-Yesus li Betani, men pi tin a-Lasarus tin kho ma hun men in epon men, men yang tin a-Yesus khek i mi hunngin kyok si tunus men.
43012002	Kut ma po ning kakaomngin ta epo a-Yesus pi tin imen. Ma e-Marta in e mot mot endara aiingin ta po, si a-Lasarus men tin hi ko nuk e ii endara wo suyung to a-Yesus men ta.
43012003	Li klet ma e-Maria wa nowhong sut ipek tunus kilo misikin ta, men mi yil weh u po ngel epon weh kut tumen, ma wut yuk i ko po khi a-Yesus, ma wut luk luk po khi yang epo wut yut. Ma nowhong sut tin imen ipek klet mi mang.
43012004	Tumen ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ta, men a-Yudas Iskariot tin a-Saimon wirun e kuli wa a-Yesus sup yanga wili po nolo men ko wo taku,
43012005	“Taku wom mang si nowhong timen tihngin, men ku kulngin epo ulu tingit kum kum myuk, ma it ku wai si ta po tin lungunan men awa?”
43012006	Yang tin wo tumen ku yang silan khing pit po po tin lungunan men ani yang wo tumen som. Awu. Yang men tip tip nginangan, ma yang in to wunwun tin eyuk ta hi pit min men, ma yang tip tip ulu tin po wai ko ko mi wunwun men ewin.
43012007	Tumen ma a-Yesus sakal taku, “E mang ta wut engun. Epo wut kapu nowhong tin ipek tunus imen, men wut tulun hu ungunan tin kuli po kil ngo epon men kha wut ning i tumen.
43012008	Epo po tin lungunan men ku kuk lunga wom sumsum, si ngo men ku in lunga wom sumsum akomen.”
43012009	Kut si po Yuda tin wailio angan men hul epo a-Yesus tin me in pi tin imen. tumen ma po me, takuma sinsin tin po me epon men ku epo a-Yesus misan som, si po me epo po ku ion a-Lasarus tin yang khek i mi hunngin kyok si tunus men maksin kut tumen.
43012010	Si po tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men pok wal eking a-Lasarus epo po ku wi yang ko hun kut tumen,
43012011	epo a-Lasarus kha po Yuda munuman mang ta sun, si po li wo hi phep pit wo a-Yesus epon men.
43012012	Kut si ungunan ta maksin mili ma po tin wailio angan e kho me epo kakaomngin men hul epo a-Yesus tin ku me Yerusalem angan men,
43012013	men po espo mariri kiin ma po li tut yang ira soput, ma po yuk yuk hambip taku, “Hosana! ‘Emhong tin ta Got men ku in to yang tin me epo yang tin Akono men yan men,’ men tin Sinkhaung ta po Israel men kha men!”
43012014	Kut si a-Yesus pon ta donki asus ta, ma yang si ung won, men ira sakalngin ta tin panngin nuk kho men men nuk taku,
43012015	“Wom tin api Saion tin eruk an men, wom lem asin. Wom hul, epo yang tin Sinkhaung ta wom men, men si ung wo donki asus ta ma me.”
43012016	Wungin tin imen ku po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men mara hi iran sinsin yek som, si takuli yang sup mi moolngin tan kho kut, anima po tulu hi hu wungin tin imen, tin panngin nuk epo yang men, kuru tin po masang to sun wala ning i epo yang kho men kut tumen.
43012017	Tumen ma po masang to sun wala tin kuk to a-Yesus minan tin yang yuk a-Lasarus mi uwin tin tanuan men me pol ma yang khek sun mi hunngin si tunus men, hi kuk e pok put wungin tin po mara hi nuk pon pi tin imen.
43012018	Sin sin tin imen kha po masang to sun wala li tut yang epon men, epon tin po hul epo yang tin ning tosukngin maran kiring tin imen.
43012019	Tumen ma po Parisi sakal lunga hi tuo hi taku, “Wom ion i, epo it men khuk po engin weh. Mara wom lu, epo po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung wo mulus men lik li pet kira yang kut!”
43012020	Kut sini po Grik kara kuk mi sun tin li si Yerusalem epon ku li uluu Got mi kakaomngin tin imen.
43012021	Tumen ma po Grik tin imen me pol ta a-Pilip tin api Betsaida tin ung wo mulusngin Galili men, ma po kileng yang taku, “Ngon tin akono men, mi pim epo pim ku ion a-Yesus.”
43012022	Tumen ma a-Pilip li pok sun Andru, ma Andru ngong a-Pilip ngong likiong li pok a-Yesus.
43012023	Ma a-Yesus ko wo ta wulong taku, “Elup tin ku Wiru Po Tunus wa moolngin tan epon men kho me kut.
43012024	Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, taku wit ihun ta plong ko nuk mi mulus ma ku hun som, men kuli then in tumen kut. Si taku tin imen hun, men ku plok si ma enun hambip.
43012025	Taku po ta min ko wo tunusngin tan tuon, men kuli huuspit ton kyok. Si taku po ta wetpon wa tunusngin tan wo mulus tin iyi, men ku kasum i epon ku li sup mi tunusngin tin sindak men kyok ako.
43012026	Taku po ta ku kum ta ngo, men ku me pet kira ngo. Ma pi tin nga li in epon men ku po ta tin kum ta ngo men ku li in epon kut tumen. Taku po ta kum ta ngo, men kuli Yok wai yan si.
43012027	Homani ma miu ngo tung, ma ngo ku wo tuni? Iyi, ngo ku wo taku, ‘Yok, e klok ngo mi elup tin iyi,’ ti wah? Awu. Sin sin tin imen kha nga me pol mi elup tin iyi epon men.
43012028	Yok, e wa yap si awon.” A-Yesus wo tumen, anima wut po ta yuk me ko wet pi taku, “Nga wa ya ngo si awon kho kut, ma ngo kuli iso wa ya ngo si angan ta kyok ako.”
43012029	Tumen ma po masang to sun wala tin nuk tikayung men hul wungin tin imen, men po wo epo pi klung kha men. Si po kara maksin wo taku, “Tihngin ta kha sakal ta yang timen.”
43012030	Si a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Yukngin tin imen ku me epon ku nhio wo ngo som, si men me epon ku nhio wo wom kha men.
43012031	Homani men wungin ples nginan tin ta pi mulus men men kho si. Homani men kuli emiun tin maran pit wo mulus men ku luul tongin li pol.
43012032	Ma ngo men taku latngin wo mulusngin si kuk, men ku nga laluk po mosop me epo ngo.”
43012033	Yang sakal wungin tin imen los po hunngin tin tuni e kuli yang hun epon men.
43012034	Tumen ma po masang to sun wala sakal wet yang taku, “Pim a hul mi wungin sinsin epo Mesaia ku in kokyok kokyok li kut. Taku tuni ma e wo epo Wiru Po Tunus ku latngin weh si kuk? Lii, Wiru Po Tunus tin imen men ara weh?”
43012035	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Put monlo long engun ma esul ku in lunga wom. Wom men ku muk muk minan tin esul iso in to wom men, epon akuli pi mi ku hawus wom. Epo po ta ku muk muk mi pi mi ku, men ku pon ta pi tin akandira e ku li epon men akomen.
43012036	Minan tin esul iso in to wom men, men ku wo wom nuk wet, kumali wom si husani pi tin mi mlaeng men.” A-Yesus sakal epo wungin tin mosop imen li klet, anima yang yok silang po, ma yang li kaun in epo po.
43012037	Aku, a-Yesus ning tosukngin maran kiring kiring munuman to mara po, takuma po ku heek e wo hi nuk wet yang akomen,
43012038	ku ma li wungin tin pokngin Aisaia pok put men men ku si enun ung hut, tin yang sakal taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ara won nuk wet sakalngin tin pim a pok put men kho? Kuru ara ion wophepngin ta yang tin Akono men, tin sungin yang si si in pi mlaeng kut tumen?”
43012039	Sinsin tin imen kha po khuk po engin weh epo po tin ku wo hi phep men, epo Aisaia wo kyok taku,
43012040	“Got ning i ma po mara hi mhi u yang ning i ma po mi hi sek sek kut tumen, epon akuli po mara hi iis endara ta ma po ples i sinsin tunus ta mi hi, ma po phae hi kyok, kumali nga mlis saihngin tin ta po men li.”
43012041	Sakalngin tin mosop imen men Aisaia sakal i minan tin yang ion moolngin ta sun kha yang sakal epo sun men.
43012042	Kut si po munuman nuk lunga sun tin mara hi pit wo sun Yuda men wo hi phep pit wo yang, takuma po lem pit wo sun Parisi, tumen ma po ku pok put wophepngin ta hi tin pit wo yang men si in pi mlaeng akomen, epon akuli po Parisi luul to sun mi mang akotngin tin ta hi Yuda men ma po uluu sun tin ku me hi palu wal then men.
43012043	Epo po mi hi epo sam samngin tin me hang po tunus men weh, si po ku mi hi epo sam samngin tin me hang Got men weh akomen.
43012044	Kut ma a-Yesus wut pit ma yang sakal taku, “Taku po ta won phep pit wo ngo, men ku won phep pit wo ngo misan akomen, si men won phep pit wo yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men maksin kut tumen ako.
43012045	Kuru taku po ta ion ngo, men ion yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men kut tumen ako.
43012046	Nga me in wo mulus ken esul ta men, kumali taku po ta won phep pit wo ngo, men ku iso in mi pi tin mi ku men akomen.
43012047	Ma taku po ta hul sakalngin ta ngo ma ku won nuk wet som, men ngo ani ku ples wungin tan men som. Epo nga me epo ngo ku ples wungin ta po tin ung wo mulus men akomen. Awu. Nga me epo ngo ku palolo po engun.
43012048	Taku po ta wetpon wa ngo ma ku wa wungin ta ngo som, men endara tin ku ples wungin tan men men ta in, epo sakalngin tin nga pok put men kha kuli ples wungin tan mi ungunan tin ku elup li ponsol epon men.
43012049	Epo ngo ku sakal ta kho epo mi ngo weh som, si Yok tuon tin tih ngo ma nga me men kha wo nut ngo epo wungin sinsin tin ku nga me sakal i u nga pok put kut tumen.
43012050	Ma nga ion i epo wungin tin yang wo maran ko klat ta ngo epon men men tunusngin tin sindak men. tumen ma wungin tin tua e nga sakal i men, men wungin tin Yok wo ta ngo epon men siik kha nga sakal i tumen kut men.
43013001	Kut si Kakaomngin tin epo Paska men ku kho si som, men a-Yesus ion i epo elup ta yang tin ku yang mang ta mulus si yang kyok li hang Wiraman men si kut khae, ma yang min pit pit wo po tin ta yang e ung wo mulus men kokyok kokyok, men yang iso min pit pit wo po weh li pol to elup tin ku li ponsol men.
43013002	Ma po kuk e ii endara aiingin to pi ii angan kut, men emiun tin hik put wungin pit po po nginangan men wa wungin kho ko nuk mi a-Yudas Iskariot tin a-Saimon wirun men epo yang tin ku wa a-Yesus li sup yanga wili po tin nolo yang men.
43013003	Ma a-Yesus ion i epo Wiraman wa endara mosop sup yanga wili yang kho kut, u yang me hang Got u yang ku kyok li hang Got kut tumen,
43013004	men yang mang ta endara aiingin ung, si yang si kuul moolngin tan tin nomalak men ko, si yang ko wa mulu tin po luk luk po hi epon men ta, si yang wat put epon.
43013005	Kut anima yang pain eki kara ko mi kambuyu ta ma yang ko hosin epo yang ku khis khis po po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men khi hi pon pon, ma yang luk luk po khi po epo mulu tin yang wat put epon men.
43013006	Kut ma yang me epo sun a-Saimon Pita. Ma a-Pita ko sakal ta yang taku, “Iyi, ngon tin Akono men, ngon ku khis po khi ngo kut ti?”
43013007	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal wet yang taku, “Wungin tin nga ning i iyi, men ku e ion min homani som, si kuli e ion i kyok sulung.”
43013008	Ti ma a-Pita ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon men ku khis po khi ngo angan ta asin.” Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet yang taku, “Taku ngo ku khis po khip som, men ku e pok mi endara to ngo kyok akomen.
43013009	Ti ma a-Saimon Pita ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, taku tumen, men ku e khis po khi ngo misan asin, si wili ngo u mhi ngo maksin kut tumen.
43013010	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Taku po ta khis pongin kho, men ku in epon ku khis po khin misan, si pon mosop men si pon yil kho kut. Ma wom men po wom yil kho kut, si men ku wom mosop akomen.”
43013011	Epo yang hop sun tin ku wa yang li sup yanga wili po tin nolo yang men kho, kha sinsin tin yang wo taku, “Wom mosop ani ku po wom yil men som.”
43013012	Tumen ma yang khis khis po khi po li klet, ma yang wa moolngin tan kyok si, ma yang kyok li ko nuk wo suyung, men yang sakal ta po taku, “Iyi, wom ion wungin tin nga ning i epo wom men sinsin, wah?
43013013	Wom men sik i ya ngo e tin kot wom men u Akono tumen, ma wom sakal timen siik, epo ngo men kha in tumen kut men.
43013014	Tumen ma taku ngo tin Akono u kot wom tumen khis khis po khi wom, men ku wom kut men ku khis khis po khi al maksin kut tumen.
43013015	Epo nga ning wungin tin imen tosukngin ta epon ku nuk wom, kumali wom ning wungin ken sun tin homani ma nga ning i epo wom kut tumen.
43013016	Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo po ta tin kum ta phua ta men, men ku nhum epo phua tan akomen. Kuru po ta tin sun tih hi me men men ku nhum epo sun tin tih hi me men akomen kut tumen.
43013017	Homani ma wom ion wungin tin mosop imen, ma taku wom iran, men emhong tin ta Got men ko po wom kha men.
43013018	Si ngo ku sakal epo wom mosop akomen. Epo nga ion wom tin wo ngo ung wo wom ta ngo men. Takuma Panngin Auluungin men ku si enun ung hut tin wo ti, ‘Po ta tin ii beret to ngo men kha khin sinsin si epon ku khin los ngo men.’
43013019	Nga pok wom homani epo wungin tin ku iso si sulung men, kumali minan tin wungin si men kuma wo wom nuk wet ngo epo ngo kha yang tuon men.
43013020	Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, taku po ta wa sun ta tin nga tih i li men, men wa ngo kha men. Ma taku po ta wa ngo, men wa Yok tin tih ngo ma nga me men maksin kut tumen.”
43013021	A-Yesus sakal wungin tin imen li klet, anima yang ko miun tuung, ma yang pok put sakalngin taku, “Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo po ta wom ta men kuli wa ngo sup yanga wili po tin nolo ngo men.”
43013022	Tumen ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men mara hi li ta al, epo po kingung mi engin weh epo yang sakal los po are.
43013023	Si po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men ta men wiak li nuk po ngai a-Yesus, men a-Yesus min epon weh.
43013024	Tumen ma a-Saimon Pita mhin kin ta sun epo yang ku kines sun epo ara tin a-Yesus sakal los pon men.
43013025	Kut ma yang tin imen mhin li kuk po engai a-Yesus, ma yang kines sun taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, e wo epo are?”
43013026	Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Men po ta tin ani nga pamut beret misikin ko mi li sut tin pis pongin men ma nga wai si tan men kha men.” Ti ma yang pamut beret misikin ko mi li sut tin pis pongin men kho kut, anima yang wai si ta a-Yudas Iskariot, tin wiru a-Saimon men.
43013027	Kut ma a-Yudas wa beret tin imen li klet, khama a-Nolongin li sup mi yang. Kut ma a-Yesus wo ta yang taku, “Wungin tin ngon ku ning i men, men ku e kamuwha i kerek engun.”
43013028	Kut si po tin nuk e li li wo suyung men ku ta pon ta wungin sinsin tin a-Yesus sakal ta sun epon men akomen.
43013029	Epo po kara phaeng taku a-Yudas tin maran pit wo wunwun tin to ulu ta hi men ani taku a-Yesus sakal ta yang taku, “E lu kul endara kara tin ku it kalwok epo kakaomngin epon men,” wa yang ku li nanaa po tin lungunan engun men epo endara kara wa tumen.
43013030	Tumen ma yang wa beret tingit ta tin imen kut, anima yang kerek e li pol mara so, men pi luk kut.
43013031	Tumen ma yang kho li pol kut, khama a-Yesus ko wo taku, “Homani ma Wiru Po Tunus men ku yan si, kuru Got yan si epo yang kut tumen.
43013032	Ma taku Got yan si epo yang, men ku Got wa yang yan maksin si, men ku yang wa sun yan si kerek engun.
43013033	Husanik tin hohoin men, ngo ku iso in to wom put monlo long engun. Ma wom ku li iso langun epo ngo. Ma wungin tin nga wo ta po Yuda epon kho men taku, ‘Pi tin ku nga li epon men, men ku wom lu epon akomen,’ tumen kha homani ma nga wo ta wom epon maksin kut tumen.
43013034	Wungin sinsin homan ta men nga wai si ta wom, epon ku mi wom pit wo al weh; ken sun tin mi ngo pit wo wom kho men, kha ku mi wom pit wo al maksin kut tumen.
43013035	Epo wungin tin tumen kha kuli po masang to sun wala mosop hop wom tin e hul wet kotngin mi wo ngo men epon men, epon tin taku mi wom ku pit wo al men.
43013036	Ti ma a-Saimon Pita ko wo ta sun taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ngon ku lu a?” Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet sun taku, “Pi tin ngo ku li epon men ku e ira ngo lu epon homani akomen. Takuma ngon ku iso li pet kira ngo men ku iso sulung ako.
43013037	Ti ma a-Pita ko wo ta sun taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ngo ku pet kira ngon homani som epo ele? Epo nga sang si ngo ku hun mut eya ngon engun ako.”
43013038	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet sun taku, “Iyi, ngon e ku sang si ngon ku hun mut eya ngo, wah? Takuma irawin weh nga sakal anuh tap, epo emon nomal ku iso wum som, si ngon men ku sup sup put ngo angan myuk kho ako.
43014001	Wom men ku miu wom tuung asin. Wo wom phep pit wo Got, men ku wo wom phep pit wo ngo maksin kut tumen.
43014002	Epo mi mang tin ta Yok men men lahembengin munuman pit e li li min. Taku men ku tumen som, men ku nga pok wom epo wungin timen som. Nga li epo ngo ku li hihi pi ta wom ta.
43014003	Ma taku nga li hihi pi ta wom kut, men kuli nga kyok me espo wom sup me lup to ngo, kumali pi tin nga li in epon men, men ku wom kuk epon maksin kut tumen.
43014004	Ma pi tin ngo ku li epon men men wom ion i kho ako, kuru soput tin li epon men wom ion i kho kut tumen.”
43014005	Ti ma a-Tomas ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, pim ku pon ta pi tin ngon ku lu epon men som, ma kuli pim a pon ta soput timen maksin tua?”
43014006	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Tuo ngo kha soput, u sinsin epo wungin irawin u tunusngin kut tumen. Po ta ku li epo Yok, men ku ira soput enginin ta akomen. Awu. Men ku li epo ngo misan.
43014007	Taku wom ku hop ngo kho, men ku wom hop Yok maksin kho kut tumen ako. Ma hosingin homani ma li, men wom hop Yok u mara wom kon yang kho kut tumen.”
43014008	Ti ma a-Pilip ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, e suk mara pim epo Wiramap, kuma kai mi pim.”
43014009	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Iyi, Pilip, ngo tin in lunga wom kho nginan me kut men, takuma ngon men iso pong epo ngo ahi, wah? Po ta tin maran kon ngo kho men, men maran kon Yok kho kut kha men. Taku tuni ma e wo taku, ‘E suk mara pim epo Wiramap,’ ti?
43014010	Iyi, ngon ku wop nuk wet wungin tin nga in mi Yok, u Yok in mi ngo kut tumen som, wah? Sakalngin put then then mosop tin nga sakal i si ta wom men ku nga sakal i ta ngo tuon som. Awu. Yok tin in mi ngo kokyok kokyok men kha ning kumang tin mosop imen.
43014011	Wo wom nuk wet ngo tin in mi Yok u Yok in mi ngo kut tumen weh, wa taku timen pi engun, men ku wo wom nuk wet ngo, sinsin men ku in epo kumang tin tuon imen.
43014012	Irawin weh nga wo anuh ta wom, epon taku po ta won nuk wet ngo, men kumang tin nga in e ning i men, men ku po ning kumang timen maksin kut tumen ako. Kuru men ku ning kumang put nunhum epo sun tin imen kara, sinsin epon tin nga li epo Yok men.
43014013	Ma wom ku kines epo ya ngo epo endara ta, men ku nga ning i tin imen, kumali Yok yan si epo Wirun weh.
43014014	Taku wom kines epo endara ta epo ya ngo, men ku nga ning i ako.
43014015	Taku mi wom pit wo ngo weh, wom men ku ira wungin sinsin mosop tin ta ngo men weh.
43014016	Ma ngo ku kileng Yok, ma kuli Yok wa po Kho Wongin ta maksin ta si ta wom, kuma yang in to wom kokyok kokyok li kut,
43014017	men Emiun tin sinsin epo wungin irawin men, tin po masang to sun wala tin ta pi mulus men khuk po engin weh epon ku wai men, epo po ku ion yang wa pon ta yang tumen akomen. Si wom men pon ta yang ako, epo yang men in to wom kho, ma kuli iso in mi wom.
43014018	Ngo ku mang put wom, si wom kuk kai po tin wiwol men akomen. Si ngo ku iso me epo wom ako.
43014019	Pi kik long anima po tin ung wo mulus men ku mara hi kon ngo kyok akomen, si wom men ku mara wom kon ngo. Ma nga si tunus in, sinsin tin imen kha kuli wom wa tunusngin epon maksin kut tumen.
43014020	Mi elup tin imen kuli wom ion i epo nga in mi Yok, u wom kuk mi ngo, u nga in mi wom kut tumen.
43014021	Taku po ta in to wungin sinsin tin ta ngo men ma iran, timen kha min pit wo ngo weh men. Ma taku po ta min pit wo ngo, men ku Yok min pit won maksin kut tumen, ma ngo ku mi ngo pit won maksin, ma nga sup put ngo tuon si tan.”
43014022	Ti ma a-Yudas tin ku a-Iskariot som men ko wo ta a-Yesus taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ngon ku ning i tua ma e sup put ngon si ta pim, si po tin ung wo mulus men pi om?”
43014023	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet yang taku, “Taku po ta min pit wo ngo, men ku ira wungin tin ta ngo men weh. Ma Yok ku min pit won, ma tuk ku me epon, ma tuk a me ning lahembengin ta tuk in min.
43014024	Si taku po ta ku min pit wo ngo som, men ku ira wungin tin ta ngo men akomen. Ma wungin tin wom hul i homani men, men ku ta ngo akomen, si men ta Yok tin tih ngo ma nga me men.
43014025	Wungin tin mosop imen men nga iso in to wom kha nga sakal i si ta wom men.
43014026	Si yang tin ku me kho wo wom men, men Emiun Auluungin, tin Yok ku tih i me epo ya ngo men, men ku me kot wom epo wungin mosop, ma yang ku tak tulu wom epo sakalngin mosop tin nga sakal i si ta wom kho men.
43014027	Nga mang ta min wyungin weh in to wom, min wyungin tin ta ngo men kha nga wai si ta wom men. Si ku ken i tin ta pi mulus men ani nga wai si ta wom men som. Wom men ku miu wom tuung asin, kuru wom lem asin kut tumen.
43014028	Wom hul ngo tin sakal ta wom kho men taku, “Ngo ku li, si wom kuk, ma ngo ku iso kyok me epo wom,’ ti. Taku wom ku mi wom epo ngo weh, men ku mi wom keh keh epo ngo tin sakal taku, “Ngo ku li epo Yok,’ epo Yok men nhum epo ngo.
43014029	Ma homani ma nga pok wom muk kho epo wungin tin ku iso si men, tumen kumali minan tin ku wungin si kut men, men ku wo wom phep.
43014030	Epo ngo ku luun po sakalngin epo wom li kho akomen, epo emiun tin maran pit wo po tin ung wo mulus men ku me, ma wungin om mi ngo tin ku yang wa lasin ko po ngo epon men.
43014031	Takuma mi ngo epo po masang to sun wala tin ung wo mulus men ku ion i, epo ngo tin mi ngo pit wo Yok men, u Yok tin wa wungin sinsin si ta ngo men, tumen kha li nga ning i tumen. Tih, wom si, it yok pi tin iyi ma it li.
43015001	Ngo men elik tin wain wilin e me pit pit put sun men, tin irawin weh men, u Yok men ken po ta tin maran pit wo mipi wain men kut tumen.
43015002	Elik wilin moyong tin sum sum put ngo e ku enun ewin som men, men Yok klat i li. Si wilin mosop tin enunun men, men Yok yapu i wilin li put yil kumali enun muluk ira sun.
43015003	Wom men si mi wom yil kut, sinsin tin epo sakalngin tin nga sakal ta wom epon kho men.
43015004	Wom men ku kaek mi ngo weh u ngo men ku kaek mi wom weh kut tumen. Elik wilin sangan ta men ku enun ta tuon ewin akomen, si taku wilin kaek put sun kha ku enun men. tumen kut kha wom ku enun ta tuo wom akomen, si taku wom kaek mi ngo misan kha ku wom enun men.
43015005	Ngo kha elik tin wain wilin e me pit pit put sun men, si wom kha elik tin wilin pon pon men. Po ta ku kaek mi ngo, u nga kaek min kut tumen, kha kuli enun hambip men. Epon taku wom ku kaek mi ngo som, men ku wom ning wungin ta akomen.
43015006	Taku po ta ku kaek mi ngo som, men ku klatngin li ken elik wilin ta men, ma muul, ma po me halung pon si po whis i si put ngi yau ma yau iini.
43015007	Taku wom kaek mi ngo, u sakalngin ta ngo kaek mi wom kut tumen, kut men ku wom kines epo wungin ta wom ta tun tara tin mi wom epon men, men ku ningngin ta wom ako.
43015008	Wungin tin ku Yok yan si epon men wala ti, epo wom ku enunun hambip. Wungin tin tumen kha ku wom si ken po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngo weh men.
43015009	Yok tin min pit wo ngo weh men, men kha mi ngo pit wo wom weh kut tumen. Wom men ku kaek mi min epo ngin tin ta ngo men weh.
43015010	Taku wom lang pit wo wungin sinsin tin ta ngo men ma wom iran, men ku wom kaek mi min epo ngin tin ta ngo men, ken sun tin nga lang pit wo wungin sinsin tin ta Yok men ma nga iran, ma nga kaek mi min epo ngin tin ta yang men.
43015011	Wungin tin imen men nga sakal i ta wom, epon ku min kehngin ta ngo men ku kaek mi wom, ma min kehngin ta wom men ku weh si kol weh.
43015012	Wungin sinsin tin ta ngo men wala ti, epo wom men ku mi wom epo al kai ngo tin mi ngo epo wom kho weh me pol homani men.
43015013	Min epo ngin tin nhum weh epo sun tin po kuk ton men wala ti, taku po ta min alang si tunusngin tan mut eya sun tin tita hi men.
43015014	Wom men tin tita it weh men, men taku wom ira wungin tin tua e nga wo maran ko klat ta wom epon men.
43015015	Ngo ku wo epo wom e kum wo ngo maksin akomen, epo po tin kum wo phua ta men ku pon ta wungin tin phua taku ning i men akomen. Si nga wo epo wom men tita it weh, epo wungin tin nga hul i mi wo Yok men, men nga pok put mosop si ta wom kho kut.
43015016	Wom ani ku wo wom ung wo ngo men som, si ngo kha wo ngo ung wo wom men, ma nga hihi wungin epo wom kho epon ku wom lu ma wom enunun, ma wom enunun tin imen ku muluk pit po sun li kut, kumali endara tin tuni e ku wom kines Yok epo ya ngo men, men ku yang wai si ta wom engun.
43015017	Wungin sinsin tin nga wo maran ko klat ta wom epon men wala ti, epo wom men ku mi wom epo al weh.
43015018	Taku po masang to sun wala tin ung wo mulus men mi hi lel wom, men ku tulu wom hu epo ngo tin po mi hi lel ngo muk kho epo wom men.
43015019	Taku wom e ku ta pi mulus, men ku po masang to sun wala tin ta pi mulus men ku mi hi pit wo wom ken hi e tita wom weh men ako. Takuma wom ku ta pi mulus som, si wo ngo ung wo wom epon ku nga klok wom mi po tin ta pi mulus men, tin kha po tin ta pi mulus men mi hi lel wom epon men.
43015020	Tulu wom hu wungin tin nga wo ta wom epon kho men weh, tin taku, ‘Po ta tin kum wo phua ta men ku nhum epo phua tin tan men akomen,’ ti. Taku po ning i lengwal epo ngo kut, men ku po ning i lengwal epo wom maksin kut tumen ako. Si taku po ira sakalngin ta ngo, men ku po ira sakalngin ta wom maksin kut tumen ako.
43015021	Takuma wungin tin mosop imen ku po ning i epo wom, men sinsin epo ya ngo tin phae po wom men, epo po ku hop li tin tih ngo ma nga me men akomen.
43015022	Taku ngo ku me sakal ta po kho som, men ku lasin ta po men pi angul, takuma homani men wungin tin ku po kalele i epo lasin tin ta hi men men pi angul.
43015023	Po ta ku min lel ngo, men min lel Yok maksin kut tumen.
43015024	Taku ngo ku in lunga po som ma nga ning wungin tin nhum iyi e ku po ta ning i ti kho som men, men ku lasin ta po pi angul. Takuma homani men po mara hi kon tuk Yok kho kut, kuru po mi hi lel tuk Yok likiong kho kut tumen.
43015025	Takuma wungin tin imen kho si kut kuma kai sakalngin tin panngin nuk mi wungin sinsin tin ta hi men taku, ‘Po mi hi lel ngo, men sinsin pi om.’
43015026	Si minan tin kuli yang tin ku Kho wo wom men ku me men, men yang tin in hang Yok ma ngo ku tih i me epo wom men, men Emiun tin sinsin epo wungin irawin e me pol mi Yok men, yang kha ku pok put wungin epo ngo men.
43015027	Kuru wom men ku pok put wungin epo ngo maksin kut tumen, epo wom men kuk to ngo li li ewo maran me pol homani ako.
43016001	Sakalngin tin mosop imen nga sakal ta wom epon kho, epon akuli po ning i ma wom plong ko.
43016002	Epon kuli po luul to wom mi mang akotngin tin ung e li li men ma po uluu wom tin ku kyok mu palu wal to po kyok men. Iis, elup ta ku iso me ma po mosop tin taku lek wom ko huu men, men ku phaeng taku hi e ning kumang ta Got tunus ani men.
43016003	Ma wungin tin mosop imen kuli po ning i epo wom, epo po ku hop Yok wa ngo kho akomen.
43016004	Si nga pok wom epo wungin tin mosop imen kho kut, epon ku elup tin ku wungin tin imen si men, men ku tulu wom hu pit po ngo tin pok wom epo wungin tin imen kho men. Ma wungin tin mosop imen ku nga pok wom epon tin ewo maran kho men akomen, epo minan tin imen tuo ngo men iso in to wom.
43016005	Si homani ma ngo ku li in hang yang tin tih ngo ma nga me men, ma wom ta ku kileng ngo taku, “Ngon ku lu ere,’ ti akomen.
43016006	Si ngo tin sakal ta wom epo wungin tin mosop imen, kha min urut i kho si kol mi wom kut men.
43016007	Takuma nga pok wom irawin, epo ngo tin ku li men, men ku kho wo wom ako. Epon taku ngo ku li som, men ku Kho Wongin me epo wom akomen. Si taku nga li, men ku nga tih Kho Wongin me epo wom ako.
43016008	Ma Kho Wongin tin imen ku kho me, men ku yang tak si wungin ta po masang to sun wala tin ung wo mulus men pit mi lasin ta hi, u pit mi wungin tin siik men, u pit mi wungin ples nginan kut tumen.
43016009	Yang ku tak si lasin, epon tin po ku wo hi nuk wet ngo som men,
43016010	u yang ku tak si wungin tin siik men, epon tin nga li in hang Yok, ma wom ku mara wom kon ngo kyok akomen,
43016011	u yang ku tak si wungin ples nginan, epon tin emiun tin maran pit wo po tin ung wo mulus men, men Got ples wungin tan kho epon ku huuspit kut tumen.
43016012	Nga iso in to wungin munuman kara tin ngo taku sakal ta wom epon men, takuma men maik ma ku wom lat i homani akomen.
43016013	Taku li klet ma yang tin Emiun e sinsin epo wungin irawin men kuli kho me, men ku yang wa wom lu sup mi wungin tin irawin men mosop. Epo yang ku sakal ira wungin tan tuon akomen. Awu. Wungin tin tuni e yang hul i men kha kuli yang sakal i men. Ma yang ku pok wom epo wungin tin kuli iso si sulung men.
43016014	Yang men ku wa ya ngo si, epo yang ku isum endara tin ta ngo men, ma yang pok put si ta wom.
43016015	Epo endara mosop tin ta Yok men men ta ngo maksin, timen wala nga wo ta wom epo yang ku isum endara tin ta ngo men ma yang pok put si ta wom men.
43016016	Pi put monlo long, men ku mara wom kon ngo kyok akomen. Si pi put monlo long kyok, men ku mara wom kon ngo, epo nga kyok li epo Yok.”
43016017	Tumen ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men kara sakal lunga hi tuo hi taku, “Wungin tin yang pok it epon taku, ‘Pi put monlo long men ku mara wom kon ngo kyok akomen, si pi put monlo long kyok, men ku mara wom kon ngo,’ u ‘epo nga kyok li epo Yok,’ ti, men ani sinsin in tua?”
43016018	Tumen ma po sakal taku, “Yang tin iyi wo ti, ‘Pi put monlo long,’ ti, ani sinsin tua? It pong epo wungin tin yang sakal epon imen sinsin weh.”
43016019	Si a-Yesus ion i epo po mi hi epo po ku kileng yang, tumen ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Iyi, wom pok wal epo wungin tin nga wo taku, “Pi put monlo long men ku mara wom kon ngo kyok akomen, anili pi put monlo long kyok, men ku mara wom kon ngo,’ timen, wah?
43016020	Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo wom men kuli tirinis u hahau amusukngin weh kut tumen, si po tin ung wo mulus men kuli mi hi keh keh, ma wom men ku mi wom urut i. Taku li klet men ku mi wom tin urut i men, ku phae kyok ko min kehngin.
43016021	Epo wut wala ta ku won maan maan epon ku khuuk sun angan, men ku min urut i, epo enal tan kho si kut. Si wut khuuk sun kho ko kut, khama wut tulun hu won maanngin tin tan men kyok akomen, epo wut min keh epo po tunus ta tin ko khuukngin wo mulus kut men.
43016022	Kut kha homani ma mi wom urut i weh men, taku li nga kyok me ion wom, khama mi wom keh keh, ma po ta ku klok min kehngin tin ta wom imen kyok akomen.
43016023	Ma mi elup tin imen men ku wom kines ngo epo wungin ta akomen. Irawin weh nga sakal anuh ta wom, epon taku wom kines Yok epo endara ta epo ya ngo, men ku Yok wai si ta wom engun ako.
43016024	Kho nginan me pol homani men ku wom kines epo endara ta epo ya ngo ewin akomen. Si homani men ku wom kines, men kuli wom wai, kumali min kehngin tin ta wom men ko kol mi wom weh.
