43016025	Wungin tin nga sakal ta wom epon kho men men ira wungin emol. Taku li klet ku elup ta ku iso si, ma minan tin imen men ku nga sakal ta wom ira wungin emol kyok akomen. Awu. Men ku nga pok wom pi mlaeng epo Yok.
43016026	Mi elup tin imen ku wom kines epo ya ngo, si ngo ku wo ta wom epo ngo ani ku kines Yok epo wom men som,
43016027	epo Yok tuon men min epo wom, epon tin mi wom epo ngo ma wo wom nuk wet ngo tin in hang Got ma nga me pol men.
43016028	Kho men nga in hang Yok ma nga me in wo mulus. Si kyok men kuli nga mang ta mulus, si nga kyok li epo Yok.”
43016029	Tumen ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men sakal taku, “Imen, homani ma e sakal si in pi mlaeng kut, ma ngon ku sakal ira wungin emol ta kyok akomen!
43016030	Homani ma pim a ion i kut epo ngon men pon ta wungin mosop, ma ngon ku hing wo po ta tin ku kines ngon epo wungin ta kyok akomen. Wungin tin imen kha wo pim nuk wet ngon tin in hang Got ma e mu pol men.”
43016031	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Iyi, homani ma wo wom phep kut?
43016032	Wom hul, epo elup ta ku iso si, men kho si kut, ma po ku plak mi wom, ma wom yang wal then then lu lu pi ta wom, si wom mang ta ngo ma misa ngo in. Takuma ngo ku misa ngo in weh akomen, epo Yok men in to ngo ako.
43016033	Wungin tin mosop imen men nga sakal ta wom epon kumali wom tin kuk mi ngo men kha ku wom kuk to min wyungin epon men. Epo wo mulus men ku po wa won maikngin ko po wom. Si mi wom pit nhing, epo ngo men nomka hut wungin tin ta pi mulus men kho kut ako.
43017001	A-Yesus sakal wungin tin mosop imen li klet, anima yang maran li si wet pi, ma yang wo taku, “Yok, enal men si kut khae. E wa Wirum yan si, kuma Wirum wa yap si kut tumen.
43017002	Epo e sum po yang kho kut epo emhong tin ku yang maran pit wo po masang to sun wala mosop epon men, kumali yang wa tunusngin tin sindak men si ta po mosop tin e wai si ta yang men siik.
43017003	Ma tunusngin tin sindak men wala ti, epo po ku ion ngon tin then e Got irawin men, u a-Yesus Krais tin e tih i me men kut tumen.
43017004	Nga wa yap si nhum wo mulus, ma nga suuk sii kumang tin e wai si ta ngo epo ngo ku ning i men mosop kho kut.
43017005	Aluuh, Yok, homani ma e wa ya ngo si nhum hang ngon, to moolngin tin nga in ton hang ngon kho nginan minan tin mulus iso kis men.
43017006	Nga pok put yap si in pi mlaeng si ta po tin e wai si ta ngo mi po tin ung e li li wo mulus men. Po men tap kho, ma e wa po si ta ngo, ma po kasum sakalngin tin tap men iso me kut.
43017007	Homani ma po ion i epo endara mosop tin e wai si ta ngo kho men men me hang ngon misan.
43017008	Epo nga wa sakalngin si ta po tin e wai si ta ngo kho men. Ma po isum i, ma po men ion i, men irawin weh epo ngo men in hang ngon ma nga me pol. Ma po wo hi nuk wet wungin tin tuop tih ngo ma nga me men.
43017009	Nga kines ngon epo po, si ngo ku kines epo po tin ung wo mulus men som, si nga kines ngon epo po tin e wai si ta ngo kho men, epo po men tap.
43017010	Ma po mosop tin ta ngo men men tap, u po mosop tin tap men men ta ngo kut tumen, ma nga wa ya ngo si nhum epo po.
43017011	Ma homani ma ngo ku in wo mulus kyok som, si po tin imen kha iso kuk wo mulus men, si ngo men ti epo ngon. Yok tin Auluungin weh men, e haum eya po tin e wai si ta ngo men epo yap, kumali po si then ken tong men.
43017012	Minan tin nga iso in to po wo mulus men men nga haum eya po epo yap. Po tin e wai si ta ngo men men nga haum eya hi kho, ma po ta hi ta men ku kis akomen, si yang tin then e khuukngin epon ku huuspit men misan kha kis men, epon ku sakalngin tin panngin nuk mi Kisang men ku weh si enun ung hut.
43017013	Si homani ma nga kyok ti epo ngon, ma sakalngin tin imen men nga sakal i wo mulus epon ku po wa min kehngin tin ta ngo men ko kol mi hi tuo hi weh.
43017014	Nga wa sakalngin tap si ta po kho, ma po tin ung wo mulus men mi hi lel sun, epo po men ku ta pi mulus som, kai ngo tin ku ta pi mulus som men kut tumen.
43017015	Nga kines epo ngon ku klok po wo mulus som, si nga kines ngon epo ngon ku haum eya po epo emiun tin wungin tan lengwal men.
43017016	Po men ku ta pi mulus som, ken ngo tin ku ta pi mulus som men kut tumen.
43017017	E ning po si auluungin weh epo wungin tin irawin men. Sakalngin tin tap men kha irawin men.
43017018	Kho ma e tih ngo me in lunga po tin ung wo mulus men, tumen kha nga tih po li kuk lunga sun tin ung wo mulus men maksin kut tumen.
43017019	Ma nga ning ngo tuo ngo si auluungin mut eya po, kumali po men ku si auluungin epo wungin tin irawin men maksin kut tumen.
43017020	Si ngo ku kines ngon mut eya po tin imen misa hi som, si nga kines epo po tin ku iso wo hi phep pit wo ngo epo sakalngin tin ta po men kut tumen,
43017021	ku ma li po mosop si then ken Yok tin in mi ngo men u ngo tin in mi Yok men kut tumen, kumali po men ku kuk then mi tong kut tumen, kuma po tin ung wo mulus men ku wo hi nuk wet wungin tin e tih ngo ma nga me men.
43017022	Ma moolngin tin e wai si ta ngo kho men men nga wai si ta po kut tumen, kumali po si then ken tong tin then men.
43017023	Nga in mi po u e in mi ngo kut tumen, kumali po si tunus weh ma then, kuma po tin ung wo mulus men ku ion i epo ngon kha tih ngo ma nga me men, ma mip pit wo po ken sun tin mip pit wo ngo men.
43017024	Yok, mi ngo epo po tin e wai si ta ngo men ku weh kuk to ngo pi tin nga in epon men, kuma po mara hi kon moolngin tin ta ngo e e wai si ta ngo kho men. Epo ngon men mip epo ngo kho minan tin mulus sinsin ku nuk kho som men.
43017025	Aluuh, Yok, ngon tin wungin tap siik weh men, epo po tin ung wo mulus men ku hop ngon kho som, si nga hop ngon, kuru po tin imen hop ngon kha tih ngo ma nga me men kut tumen.
43017026	Ma nga pok put yap si ta po kho kut, ma ngo ku iso pok put in li kut, kumali min epongin tin mip pit wo ngo epon men ku nuk mi po, u nga in mi po kut tumen.”
43018001	A-Yesus sakal tumen li klet, anima yang li pol to po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men li ut put ilwang Kidron li sup pilin ekora. Pi tin imen men pi mi maulu ta ung tin sa olip kara nuk epon men, ma yang hi po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men hi li sup epon.
43018002	Kut si a-Yudas tin ku wa yang li sup yanga wili po tin nolo yang men pon ta pi tin imen kut tumen. Epo kho ma a-Yesus hi po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men li hi palu wal pi tin imen kokyok kokyok.
43018003	Li klet ma a-Yudas espo po nolo wailio angan kara u po phua kara tin kum wet wili sun tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po Parisi kara kut tumen, men me pi tin imen to esul tururun u nunhum u endara tin po lek wal epon men kara kut tumen.
43018004	Ma a-Yesus ion wungin mosop tin ku si epo yang men, men yang song e mara po li kines po taku, “Wom mu langun epo are?”
43018005	Ti ma po ko wo wet yang taku, “Pim a me langun epo a-Yesus tin api Nasaret men.” Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta po taku, “Tuo ngo kha iyi.” Ma a-Yudas tin ku wa sun li sup yanga wili po tin nolo yang men men hi me nuk kut tumen.
43018006	Minan tin po hul yang wo ta po taku, “Tuo ngo kha iyi,” men po osong li nuk ma po poplong ko nuk wo mulus.
43018007	Tumen ma yang kines po kyok taku, “Wom mu langun epo are?” Ti ma po ko wo taku, “Epo a-Yesus tin api Nasaret men.”
43018008	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo taku, “Nga wo ta wom kho epo tuo ngo kha iyi. tumen ma taku wom mu langun epo ngo, men ku wom mang ta po tin imen li.”
43018009	Yang sakal wungin tin imen epon ku pyu po wungin tin yang sakal i kho men taku, “Po tin e wai si ta ngo men ku ta kis akomen.”
43018010	Kut ma a-Saimon Pita wa bainat ta me, yang slok i mi sun elit, si yang wai si yang sop sun tin kum ta sun tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men ma yang wa li klok kinga sun tin ung ewo wili yang tin ato sa men ko. Yang tin kum wo sun imen yan a-Malkus.
43018011	Tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo ta a-Pita taku, “E wa bainat tap si e wai kyok lu sup mi sun elit. Iyi, karu tin Yok wai si ta ngo men, men ku nga um ko min engun ako, wah?”
43018012	Kut ma po nolo wailio angan tin imen u phua tin ta hi e maran pit wo po men u po phuan tin kum wet wili po Yuda men kut tumen kasum a-Yesus ma po kan kan yang.
43018013	Ma po wa yang li epo Anas muk, epo Anas men wion a-Kaiapas tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men to posan tin imen.
43018014	Epon men a-Kaiapas tin wala kho ma wo nuk po Yuda epo po then ta misan ku weh hun mut eya po masang to sun wala mosop, men ku tunus ako.
43018015	Si a-Saimon Pita ira a-Yesus, kuru yang ta maksin tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men ira sun kut tumen. Epo yang tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus tin imen men yang tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men hop yang, ma yang li to a-Yesus li sup wo nowhang tin ta yang tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men.
43018016	Si a-Pita men iso me pit tak li mara sowon wetpo enunu tin baul nowhang men. tumen ma yang tin ta maksin e hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus e sun tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men hop yang men li pol ma yang wo ta wut tin pit e haum mara sowon men, ma yang wa sun a-Pita me sup.
43018017	Kut ma wut tin haum mara sowon men ko kines a-Pita taku, “Iyi, ngon e po ta tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men kut ti wa pi om?” Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Awu, ngo men in engun.”
43018018	Si po tin kum wo sun men u po phua tin kum wet wili sun men kut tumen men me pong yau ta si pit kho ma hi nuk nuk imen, epo pi huk hukan weh, ma po nuk e wal wal yau imen. Kuru a-Pita men pit to po ma yang wal yau kut tumen.
43018019	Kut ma yang tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men kines mi a-Yesus epo po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men u epo kotngin tin ta yang men kut tumen.
43018020	Tumen ma a-Yesus sakal wet sun taku, “Kokyok kokyok kho men nga sakal si in pi mlaeng si ta po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung wo mulus men. Ma nga kot po mi mang akotngin tin ung e li li men u wo nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men kut tumen, men pi tin po Yuda mosop me palu wal epon ewin men, si ngo ku kaun in pi ta ma nga pok put wungin ta ewin akomen.
43018021	Si e kines ngo epo ele? Si e kines po tin hul wet ngo men epo wungin tin nga sakal ta po epon men. Iis, epo po men ion wungin tin nga sakal i men ako.”
43018022	Yang sakal tumen li klet, men yang phua ta tin kum wet wili sun e me pit tikayung men namlak a-Yesus nuk suun epo wilin yangan, ma yang wo taku, “Tua ma e wo plek wet sun ta yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men epo wungin tin tumen?”
43018023	Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet sun taku, “Taku nga sakal wungin lengwal ta, men ku e pok put si in pi mlaeng, wa taku nga sakal siik, taku tua ma e sit si kili ngo?”
43018024	Kut ma Anas tih a-Yesus to esih po koklong tin po kan kan yang epon kut men li epo a-Kaiapas tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men.
43018025	Si a-Saimon Pita pit e wal yau. tumen ma po kines yang taku, “Iyi, ngon e po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ta ani kop, wa pi engun?” Takuma a-Pita sup sup ma yang ko wo taku, “Awu, ngo men in engun!”
43018026	Ti ma yang ta tin kum wo sun tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men, tin ewo yang tin a-Pita klok kingan ko men, men sakal taku, “Iyi, nga ion ngon tin in to yang mi maulu men kho ako, wah?”
43018027	Kut ma a-Pita ko sup sup kyok kut, khama eking nomal wum siik minan tin imen.
43018028	Kut ma po wa a-Yesus li hang a-Kaiapas li mang tin nhum e ta a-Pailat tin phuan men, ma men pi iso po wum wum. Si po tuo hi men ku li sup som, epo po sila hi khing epon akuli po po hi ko lengwal to mara Got, si kumali po po hi yil kuma po ii kakaomngin tin epo Paska men.
43018029	Li klet ma a-Pailat li pol ta po ma yang sakal taku, ‘Wom wa lasin tin tua ko po yang tin ii?”
43018030	Ti ma po sakal wet yang taku, ‘Taku yang tin imen ku ning wungin lengwal ewin som, men ku pim a wa yang me sup yanga wilip akomen.”
43018031	Tumen ma a-Pailat ko wo ta po taku, “Wom wa yang lu, tuo wom ples wungin ta yang ira wungin sinsin tin ta wom weh men.” Ti ma po Yuda ko wo ta yang taku, “Tin imen uluu nginan epo pim Yuda tin ku wi po ta ko hun men.”
43018032	Wungin tin imen si epon ku kai sakalngin tin a-Yesus sakal i men, tin los po hunngin tin tuni e ku yang hun epon men.
43018033	Kut ma a-Pailat kyok li sup mang tin tan e ta hi phuan men, ma yang yuk a-Yesus me, yang kines sun taku, “Iyi, ngon e tin Sinkhaung ta po Yuda men ani men?”
43018034	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo wet sun taku, “Iyi, ngon tuop ani e sakal i tin imen, wa po enginin kara ani pok ngon epo ngo men, wah?”
43018035	Ti ma a-Pailat ko wo taku, “Iyi, ngo e api Yuda, wah? Epo po tin wom khuuk wal then men to po tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum men kha wa ngon me sup yanga wili ngo men. Epo e ning ela weh?”
43018036	Kut ma a-Yesus ko wo taku, “Enunu tin ta ngo men ku api wo mulus tin iyi som. Epon taku enunu tin ta ngo men ku api wo mulus tin iyi, men ku kho ma po tin kum wet wili ngo men ku kos ma sewut sun, tumen kuma ngo ku wangin sup yanga wili po Yuda akomen. Takuma homani men ku enunu tin ta ngo men ku ta pi wo mulus tin iyi akomen.”
43018037	Tumen ma a-Pailat ko wo ta yang taku, “Ih, tin timen ma ngon men sinkhaung ta irawin, wah?” Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Ngon men sakal siik epo ngo men sinkhaung ta ako. Epo sinsin tin imen kha nga ko khuukngin epon men, u sinsin tin imen kha nga me in wo mulus epon men kut tumen, epon ku nga pok put sakalngin epo wungin tin irawin weh men. Po mosop tin khuuk wal to wungin irawin men kha hul wet wut ngo men.”
43018038	Ti ma a-Pailat ko wo ta yang taku, “Wungin irawin men tua weh?” A-Pailat wo tumen li klet, anima yang kyok li pol ta po Yuda, ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Ngo ku pon ta lasin ta yang ta akomen. Awu. Men pi angul weh.
43018039	Si wungin ta wom ta nuk epo ngo ku mang ta po ta li won pias ti epo wom minan tin wom kakaom epo Paska men. tumen ma mi wom epo ngo ku plos yang tin Sinkhaung ta wom Yuda men ti epo wom, wah?”
43018040	Tumen ma po wut hi pit pit kyok taku, “Awu, yang tin imen asin, si e plos a-Barabas!” Epo a-Barabas men in to wungin tin ku lek po si espo endara ta po nginangan men.
43019001	tumen ma minan tin imen a-Pailat wo ma po wa a-Yesus li po wawlauk yang.
43019002	Ma po nolo mol put elik tin ngin si si put sun men min moolngin ta ken moolngin tin ung mhi po tin sinkhaung men, si po wai ko ung mhi yang, kuru po wa moolngin po kangung nomalak ta, si po sis i ko po yang kut tumen.
43019003	Li klet ma po ko sakal taku, “Pi sinang an tunus epo ngon tin Sinkhaung ta po Yuda men!” Kuru po wili hi nanamlak suu yang kut tumen.
43019004	Li klet ma a-Pailat kyok li pol ma yang sakal ta po masang to sun wala taku, “Wom hul, epo nga pau yang me pol ta wom, kuma wom ion i epo ngo ku pon ta lasin ta yang ta in akomen.”
43019005	Tumen ma a-Yesus me pol mara so, men elik tin ngin si si put sun e po mol i men iso ung mhi yang u moolngin tin pon kangung men iso ung po yang kut tumen. Ma a-Pailat ko wo ta po taku, “Imen, yang tin tunus men kha imen!”
43019006	Tumen ma po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po phua tin kum wet wili sun men kut tumen men mara hi kon yang, men po wut hi pit pit taku, “E poo poo yang si kuk put sa wlong put wal, e po po yang si kuk put sa wlong put wal!” Ti ma a-Pailat ko wo ta po taku, “Tuo wom wa yang ti, wom po po yang si kuk put sa wlong put wal. Epo ngo ku pon ta lasin ta yang ta akomen.”
43019007	Takuma po Yuda sakal wet yang taku, “Wungin sinsin ta pim ta men nuk, ma taku pim a ira wungin sinsin tin imen, men tunus epo yang men ku hun weh, epo yang tuon wai si pit epo yang e taku Wiru Got.”
43019008	A-Pailat hul sakalngin tin imen, men yang iso lem hambip weh,
43019009	ma yang kyok li sup mi mang tin tan men, ma yang kileng a-Yesus taku, “Ngon men api ere weh?” Takuma a-Yesus homong wet yang engun.
43019010	Tumen ma a-Pailat ko wo ta yang taku, “Tuni ma e homong wet ngo? Iyi, ngon e pong epo ngo tin in to emhong epon ku mang ta ngon lu wop pias men u nga in to emhong epon ku poo poo ngon si kuk put sa wlong put wal men kut tumen, wah?”
43019011	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo taku, “Taku emhong ku me ko ili awon ma wangin ko tap som, men ku e kakha epo ngon ku ning wungin ta epo ngo akomen. Epo sinsin tin imen kha po tin wa ngo sup yanga wili ngon men lasin ta hi men nhum epo sun tin tap men.”
43019012	Minan tin imen a-Pailat hosi wungin tin yang taku plos a-Yesus li epon men, takuma po Yuda iso wut hi pit pit taku, “Taku ngon ku mang ta yang tin imen lu, ngon men ku tita mom Sisa kyok akomen. Taku po ta tuon wai si sinkhaung, men sakal ewut Sisa kha men.”
43019013	Kut ma a-Pailat hul sakalngin tin imen, men yang wa a-Yesus me pol mara so ma yang ko ung wo ehus tin po phuan ples wungin ta sun won men pi tin po sik i yan ‘Suyung enah an” men, si ira sakalngin ta hi Hibru men po sik i yan “Gabata.”
43019014	Epo ungunan tin imen men tin po hihi endara epo Kakaomngin tin epo Paska men epon men, ma minan tin imen sinang taku si pit bing angan . Ma a-Pailat wo ta po Yuda taku, “Imen, mara wom kon yang tin Sinkhaung ta wom men wala imen.”
43019015	Takuma po wut hi pit pit taku, “E wa yang lu, e wa yang lu! E po po yang si kuk put sa wlong put wal.” Ti ma a-Pailat ko wo ta po taku, “Iyi, ngo ku wile poo poo yang tin Sinkhaung ta wom men si kuk put sa wlong put wal, wah?” Ti ma po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men ko sakal taku, “Pim men ku po sinkhaung ta pim ta maksin in som, si Sisa misan!”
43019016	Kut ma a-Pailat wa a-Yesus li sup yanga wili po epon ku po wa yang li, po poo poo yang si kuk put sa wlong put wal. tumen ma po wa a-Yesus ma po tet yang li.
43019017	Ma yang lat sa tin ku po po po yang si kuk put men li pol pi ta, men po sik i yan “Pi ta Emuhin,” si ira sakalngin ta hi Hibru, men po sik i yan “Golgota.”
43019018	Ma pi tin imen po poo poo yang si kuk put sa, kuru po poo poo wulong ponwal maksin si kuk tikayung yang kut tumen, wi ta pit porili a-Yesus palan ta u wi ta pit porili a-Yesus palan ta tumen, si a-Yesus pit pi emin.
43019019	Si a-Pailat wo ma po hihi sakalngin pan nginan ma po kara kan kan i nuk ili hut sa wlong put wal mhin. Ma panngin tin imen sakal taku, “A-YESUS TIN API NASARET E SINKHAUNG TA PO YUDA MEN,” ti.
43019020	Tumen ma po Yuda munuman me tiik panngin tin imen, epo pi tin po poo poo a-Yesus si kuk epon men men ung tikayung enunu. Ma po pan wungin ira sakalngin ta hi Hibru, u Latin, u Grik kut tumen.
43019021	Tumen ma po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men me wo ta a-Pailat taku, “E pan i epo ‘Yang men Sinkhaung ta po Yuda’ asin, si e pan i ti, ‘Yang tuon wo ti, “Ngo men Sinkhaung ta po Yuda,”’ ti engun.”
43019022	Takuma a-Pailat ko wo taku, “Wungin tin nga pan i kho nuk kut men kha nga pan i nuk kut men.”
43019023	Ma po nolo poo poo a-Yesus si kuk put sa wlong put wal kho kut, anima po wa moolngin tin a-Yesus phini los po sun men, si po kakhas i ko tingit mnal, kuma po nolo then then kakai wal i, kuru po wa enda tin yang phini nuk wet sun men kut tumen. Epo enda tin imen ku kakawatngin akomen, epon men po nok i then pit hut li yang engun.
43019024	tumen ma po nolo sakal lunga hi tuo hi taku, “Suk men ku khas i asin, si suk kop pit min, epon kuli ara weh ku wai.” Wungin tin imen si epon ku kai Panngin Auluungin tin nuk taku, “Po pok pok mi moolngin tin ta ngo men lunga hi, u po kop satu pit mi endara tin nga phini men kut tumen,” ti. Wungin tin panngin nuk tumen wala po nolo ning wungin tin mosop imen epon men.
43019025	Kut si a-Yesus tonin ngong eron, u e-Maria tin ung ta a-Klopas men, u e-Maria tin api Maktala men kut tumen, hi nuk tikayung sa wlong put wal tin a-Yesus si kuk put men.
43019026	Tumen ma a-Yesus maran kon tonin ngong yang tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus e yang min epon weh men men ngong nuk tikayung sa wlong put wal, men yang ko wo ta tonin taku, “Kain, e ion wirum kha imen!”
43019027	Kut anima yang ko wo ta sun tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men kyok taku, “Tuon, e ion tonim kha imen!” tumen ma minan tin imen siik men yang tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men wa wut li in mang tin tan men kut.
43019028	Kut anima a-Yesus ion i epo wungin mosop men pyu pongin kho kut, men yang wo taku, “Nga hun eki.” Yang wo tumen epon ku Panngin Auluungin tin pok put kho epo yang men ku weh si enun ung hut.
43019029	Si tawil ta ung, men wain tin makalek men kuk min. Ma po wa namumu ta ko pit mi wain tin makalek imen, ma wain kol min kut, anima po wai ko ung hut sa hisop wilin ta, ma po wai li si pol wo yang.
43019030	Tumen ma a-Yesus um wain tin makalek imen kho kut, anima yang wo taku, “Men pyu pongin kut khae.” Ti anima yang mhin yuk ko, ma yang mang ta emiun tan li.
43019031	Epo ungunan tin imen po hihi epo pi Sabat, epo pi Sabat tin imen men nhum epo sun, tumen ma po Yuda mara hi luun epo wuluk emkusin tin ku kuk put sa wlong put wal to pi Sabat men, tumen ma po li kines a-Pailat epo po ku hik hik put khi wuluk kuma wuluk emkusin ku poplosngin ko ma hyokngin li engun.
43019032	Tumen ma po nolo me hik hik put khi yang tin pit muk men, u yang ta maksin tin po po po i li kuk porili a-Yesus men kut tumen.
43019033	Si po me epo a-Yesus ma po ion yang tin hun kut men, men ku po hik put khi yang akomen.
43019034	Si yang nolo ta me nii a-Yesus pit put epo pali ta, ma kerek engun ma yang kalolwan u eki tumen me pol.
43019035	Ma yang tin maran nuk po wungin tin imen kha pok put wungin epon men, ma wungin tin yang pok put imen men anuh ako. Ma yang ion i epo yang pok put wungin anuh ako, kumali wo wom phep maksin kut tumen.
43019036	Epo wungin tin mosop imen, men ku si kuma Panngin Auluungin tin nuk ti, “Yang pokoin men ku ta hik putngin akomen,” men ku si enun ung hut weh.
43019037	Kuru kyok men Panngin Auluungin ta maksin men wo taku, “Ku li po iso mara hi nuk po yang tin po niin kho men.”
43019038	Silung epo wungin tin mosop imen ma a-Yosep tin api Arimataia men, tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus takuma kaun i epon tin lem pit wo po Yuda men, men me kines a-Pailat epo yang ku plos a-Yesus emkusin li. Ma a-Pailat sam wet sun. tumen ma yang li wa a-Yesus emkusin li.
43019039	Kuru a-Nikodimas tin kho ma me pon ta a-Yesus to pi luk men men me kut tumen, men me to nowhong ipek tunus kara tin po phae epo sa mut sut u sa alos sut to al men, men maikngin tan taku kilo kum myuk u eip tumen.
43019040	Tumen ma wulong wa a-Yesus emkusin, si wulong luk luk po yang epo nowhong tin imen, ma wulong kas po yang epo mulu tingit tururun nomalaklak kara, men ira wungin tin po Yuda ning i ma po kil sun emkusin men.
43019041	Kut si pi tin po poo poo yang si kuk put sa wlong put wal epon men men pi mi maulu ta nuk imen, ma mi maulu tin imen pi tanuan tin homan e uwin an men ta pit min, men ku po kil sun ta ko nuk min kho akomen.
43019042	Ma minan tin epo po Yuda ku hihi epo pi Sabat men, kuru pi tanuan tin uwin an men pit tikayung pi tin imen kut tumen, tumen ma wulong wa a-Yesus li nuk mi uwin tin imen.
43020001	Li klet ma ungunan tin si muk epo sun men ma e-Maria tin api Maktala men huus to pi tin iso mi ku men, ma wut li pol mara uwin tin po wa a-Yesus emkusin li nuk min men, ma wut li ion enah, men ku ung mara uwin kyok akomen.
43020002	Tumen ma wut saa li pol ta a-Saimon Pita, u yang ta maksin tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men, tin a-Yesus min epon weh men, ma wut wo ta wulong taku, “Po me lat yang tin Akono men mi uwin li kut, ma pim ku pon ta pi tin po wa yang li nuk epon men akomen.”
43020003	Tumen ma a-Pita yok li pol, kuru yang ta maksin tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men kut tumen, ma wulong taku li mara uwin.
43020004	Tumen ma wulong likiong whal li, takuma yang tin ta maksin e hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men saa silang sun a-Pita, ma yang kho li pol mara uwin muk.
43020005	Ma yang hah ko kuk ma yang tuh li sup mi uwin, men yang maran kon mulu tin tingit tururun nomalaklak e po kas po a-Yesus epon men men ko pit, si yang ku li sup akomen.
43020006	Li klet anima a-Saimon Pita ira sun mak me pol, ma yang me yek li sup mi uwin, ma yang li maran kon mulu tin po suk po a-Yesus epon men, men pit ewin,
43020007	u mulu tin po pang po yang mhin epon men, men ku ko ung to sun tin po suk po yang epon men akomen, si men moolngin hik putngin li ung pi tan tawe.
43020008	Kut anima yang tin ta maksin e hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men, tin kho me pol mara uwin muk men, men mak li sup, ma yang maran kon i ma yang won phep.
43020009	Epo minan tin imen po iso pong epo Panngin Auluungin tin sakal epo yang tin ku khek kyok si tunus mi po tin huu kho men sinsin.
43020010	Li klet anima wulong tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men kyok li pi ta ngong kyok.
43020011	Si e-Maria iso pit e tinis tak li mara uwin. Wut in e tinis, men wut hah ko kuk ma wut tuh li sup mi uwin.
43020012	Ma wut maran kon tihngin ponwal men piphi moolngin pon eun, men nuk ewi a-Yesus emkusin tin nuk men, ma tihngin ta ung mhi yang u ta ung sii khi yang kut tumen.
43020013	Kut ma wulong ko kines wut taku, “Kain, e tinis epo ele?” Ti ma wut ko wo wet wulong taku, “Epo po me lat yang tin Akono ta ngo men li, ma ngo ku ion pi tin po ku wa yang li nuk epon men akomen.”
43020014	Kut ma wut sakal timen li klet, anima wut phae ma wut maran kon a-Yesus tin pit men, takuma wut ku hop yang ken yang e a-Yesus men akomen.
43020015	a-Yesus ko wo ta wut taku, “Kain, e tinis epo ele? E langun epo are?” Wut phaeng taku yang tin maran pit wo pi tin mi maulu an men kha men, ma wut ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin akono men, taku e wa yang lu, anima e pok ngo epo pi tin e wa yang li nuk epon men, kuma nga li lat yang li.”
43020016	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta wut taku, “Maria!” Ti ma wut phae ma wut wo ta yang taku, “Rabonai,” men sinsin taku, “Ngon tin kot ngo men.”
43020017	Ma a-Yesus ko wo ta wut taku, “E kasum ngo asin, epo ngo ku kho li si hang Yok men akomen. Si e lu pon ta po tin ehurok men ma e pok po taku, “Ngo ku li si hang Yok tin Wirama wom u Got ta ngo u Got ta wom men kut tumen.’”
43020018	Kut ma e-Maria tin api Maktala men li pok po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men epo wut tin maran kon a-Yesus kho kut men, kuru wut pok epo yang tin sakal wungin tin imen si ta wut men kut tumen.
43020019	Li klet ma ungunan tin imen kut to pi ii angan, men ungunan tin me muk epo sun men, ma po sambal si kho mang tin po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men me palu wal min men, epo po lem pit wo sun Yuda. Si a-Yesus me pit emin po ma yang ko wo taku, “Min wyungin men ku weh in to wom.”
43020020	Yang wo tumen li klet, anima yang suk mara po epo yang wilin to sun put. Ma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men mara hi kon yang tin Akono men men po mi hi keh keh takut.
43020021	Tumen ma a-Yesus sakal ta po kyok taku, “Min wyungin men ku weh in to wom. Epo Yok tih ngo me, tumen kha ku nga tih wom maksin lu kut tumen.”
43020022	Ma yang wo tumen kut, anima yang phuu emiun li epo po, ma yang wo ta po taku, “Wom wa Emiun Auluungin kut khae.
43020023	Taku wom mang ta lasin ta po ta, men ku lasin tan mang tangin li. Si taku wom kasum lasin ta po ta, men lasin tan iso kasumngin ung.”
43020024	Si a-Tomas tin po pen yan a-Hukap men, tin in mi po tin kum ta u ponwal tumen, men ku in to po minan tin a-Yesus me men akomen.
43020025	Tumen ma po tin kara e hi hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men sakal ta a-Tomas taku, “Pim a ion yang tin Akono men kho kut.” Takuma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Taku ngo ku marango kon yang wilin lup lup ewi sulumu, u nga wa wili ngo weh li sup ewi sulumu, u nga sung wili ngo li sup porili yang weh khama wo ngo phep, wa pi engun, men ku wo ngo phep akomen.”
43020026	Kut ma enal ta kho li, anima po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men kyok li pit mi mang, ma a-Tomas li ung mi po kut tumen. Ma a-Yesus me pol, men po sambal si kho, ma yang ko pit emin po, ma yang wo taku, “Min wyungin men ku weh in to wom!”
43020027	Li klet anima yang ko wo ta a-Tomas taku, “E mu wilip pon pon mu iyi ma marap kon wili ngo, kuru e sung wilip mu sup put ngo kut tumen. Ma mip ponwal asin, si wop phep engun.”
43020028	Ti ma a-Tomas ko wo wet sun taku, “Ngon men Akono ta ngo u Got ta ngo kut tumen.”
43020029	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Tomas, marap kon ngo kho kut kha wop phep men. Si emhong tin ta Got men ko po po tin ku mara hi kon ngo kho som, si wo hi phep kho men.”
43020030	Ma irawin epo a-Yesus ning tosukngin munuman kara maksin to mara po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men, men ku panngin nuk mi kisang tin iyi akomen.
43020031	Si tin panngin nuk iyi, men epon ku wo wom phep epo a-Yesus kha Mesaia tin Got Wirun men, ma wom tin ku wo wom phep men kha ku wom wa tunusngin epo yang yan men.
43021001	Silung epo wungin tin mosop imen anima a-Yesus suk put si plo nginan kyok ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men suu ehung Taiberias. Ma soput tin yang si suk put si pon ta po men wala ti.
43021002	Epo a-Saimon Pita, u a-Tomas tin po pen yan a-Hukap men, u a-Nataniel tin api Kana tin ung wo mulusngin Galili men, u wulong tin a-Sebedi khuuk ngong men, u wulong tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men ponwal maksin kut tumen men hi mosop kuk to al.
43021003	Li klet ma a-Saimon Pita ko wo ta po taku, “Ngo ku li wa nomkal baul ili.” Ti ma po ko wo ta yang taku, “Pim men ku it li kut tumen.” tumen ma po li pol ma kerek engun ma po li si wo naak, takuma to pi luk tin imen po li kuk mara ii.
43021004	Kut li pi plas koyang kut, men a-Yesus ko pit suu ehung, takuma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ku hop a-Yesus ani men akomen.
43021005	Tumen ma a-Yesus sakal ta po taku, “Husanik, iyi, wom wa ili kara, wah?” Ti ma po ko wo wet yang taku, “Awu.”
43021006	Kut ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Wom psik nomkal ko woringi naak ewo wili wom ato sa, kuma wom wa ili kara.” Tumen ma po psik nomkal li ko, kut ma homani ma po khuk po engin epo po ku huuh nomkal to ili me si som, epo ili men iso haunngin kara kut.
43021007	Tumen ma yang tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus e a-Yesus min epon weh men wo ta a-Pita taku, “Yang tin Akono men kha imen!” Kut ma a-Saimon Pita hul epo yang tin Akono men kha imen, men yang pi moolngin tin los po sun men kyok (epo kho ma yang kuul i ko, si kuma yang ning kumang), anima yang lup ko mi ehung.
43021008	Si po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men kara me wo naak (epo pi men ku hin long epo pi po namak akomen, si men maran ken mita khum khum ta engun), ma po huuh nomkal to ili me.
43021009	Kut ma po me sup kut khama po mara hi kon yau ta pit, men ili kara pit wo yau u beret kara pit kut tumen.
43021010	Ma a-Yesus wo ta po taku, “Wom wa ili tin wom wai homani men kara muh.”
43021011	Ti ma a-Saimon Pita lup si wo naak ma yang huuh nomkal me si po namak. Epo ili nunhum misan kol wal takut mi nomkal, ma men ili khaut kum kum ta u kum eip u myuk tumen. Ma ili men munuman tumen, takuma nomkal ku khas akomen.
43021012	Kut ma a-Yesus wo ta po taku, “Wom mu ii enda.” Takuma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men lem ewo hi ma po ta ku kines yang taku, “Ngon are,” ti akomen, epo po ion i epon men yang tin Akono men tuon kha imen.
43021013	Kut ma a-Yesus me wa beret, si yang kikyu po epon, kuru yang ning i tumen epo ili maksin kut tumen.
43021014	Tin imen men angan tin me myuk angan kut kha a-Yesus suk put si plo nginan ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men mi khi yang tin khek kyok si tunus lunga po tin huu kho men.
43021015	Kut ma po ii endara li klet, anima a-Yesus ko wo ta a-Saimon Pita taku, “Saimon, ngon tin wiru a-Yona men, ngon e mip pit wo ngo weh epo po tin kara e mi hi pit wo ngo men, wah?” Ti ma a-Pita ko wo wet yang taku, “Wai, ngon tin Akono men, e ion i epo ngo tin mi ngo pit wo ngon weh men ako.” tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “E pa ken sipsip asus tin ta ngo men.”
43021016	Kut ma a-Yesus kyok ko kines yang angan tin me ponwal angan men taku, “Saimon, ngon tin wiru a-Yona men, ngon e mip pit wo ngo weh, wah?” Ti ma a-Pita ko wo ta yang taku, “Wai, ngon tin Akono men, e ion i epo mi ngo tin pit wo ngon men ako.” Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Marap pit wo sipsip tin ta ngo men.”
43021017	Kut ma a-Yesus kyok ko kines yang angan tin me miuk angan men taku, “Saimon, ngon tin wiru a-Yona men, iyi, ngon e mip pit wo ngo weh, wah?” Ti ma a-Pita miun tuung epo a-Yesus tin kileng yang angan myuk taku, “Ngon e mip pit wo ngo weh,” timen, ma yang ko wo ta a-Yesus taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ngon men marap pem si wungin mosop, ma e ion i epo ngo men mi ngo epo ngon weh ako.” Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “E pa ken sipsip tin ta ngo men.
43021018	Irawin weh nga sakal anuh tap, epo minan tin e iso nerengin men tuop wat put ngon epo mulu tap weh, ma e muk muk lu pi tin mip epo ngon ku lu epon men engun. Si kuli minan tin ku e hyangan men, men ku e tus wilip lu pol, men ku po enginin ta ku wat put ngon epo mulu ma lat ngon li pi tin marap luun epo ngon ku lu epon men.”
43021019	Epo a-Yesus sakal i tin imen los po hunngin tin tuni e ku a-Pita hun ma yang wa Got yan si epon men. Ma yang wo tumen li klet, anima yang ko wo ta sun taku, “E mu ira ngo.”
43021020	Kut ma a-Pita phae mili ma yang maran kon sun tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus men, tin a-Yesus min epon weh men, men ira wulong me, men tin me nuk mi yanga a-Yesus kho minan tin po ii kakaomngin ma kines sun taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ara ku wa ngon sup yanga wili po tin nolo ngon men,” ti.
43021021	Ma a-Pita maran kon sun, men yang ko wo ta a-Yesus taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, si tua epo yang tin ii?”
43021022	Ti ma a-Yesus ko wo ta yang taku, “Taku mi ngo epo yang ku tunus in li pol minan tin ku nga kyok me men, timen e ku wungin tap, wah? Si ngon men ku mu ira ngo engun.”
43021023	Tumen ma wungin ung e pat walngin li lunga po tin ehuro hi men epo yang tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus tin imen ku hun akomen. Takuma a-Yesus ku wo ta yang epo yang men ku hun akomen ti som. Awu. Yang wo taku, “Taku mi ngo epo yang ku tunus in li pol minan tin ku nga kyok me men, timen e ku wungin tap, wah,” ti engun.
43021024	Yang tin hul wet kotngin mi wo a-Yesus imen kut kha pok put wungin tin iyi, kuru yang pan i kut tumen. Ma it ion i epo wungin tin yang pok put imen men anuh ako.
43021025	Kut si a-Yesus ning tosukngin munuman kara maksin kut tumen, ma taku po pan wungin mosop then then epon, men nga phaeng taku mulus tin iyi ku kai kisang tin ku po pan i men akomen.
44001001	Aluuh, Tiopilus, kisang tin in muk kho men, men nga hihi sakalngin epo wungin mosop tin a-Yesus hosin ning nginan u epo po kot nginan men kut tumen,
44001002	weh me pol ungunan tin yang wangin li si men, tin si sulung epo yang tin wo maran ko klat ta po paengin tin yang won ung wo hi kho men epo Emiun Auluungin men.
44001003	Po tin imen kha yang si put plong nginan ta hi sulung epo won maikngin tin yang wuh i men, ma yang suk mara po epo yang tin tunus in men epo tosukngin munuman tin ku kaek si wo phepngin ta po men, men yang in e si put plo nginan ta po kokyok to ungunan khum mnal, ma yang sakal epo wungin kara epo enunu tin ta Got men.
44001004	Ma minan ta ma yang me hi palu wal then, men yang wo maran ko klat ta po epo po ku yok Yerusalem kerek asin, si po ku kaeng epo wungin tin Wiraman wo kuk mara po epon kho men, tin ku si men, ma yang wo taku, “tin wom hul i mi wo ngo kho men.
44001005	Irawin, epo a-Yon men ning baptais ko mi eki, si wom men ungunan ku munuman som, anima wom wa baptais ko mi Emiun Auluungin.”
44001006	Ti ma po me palu wal kut, men po kines yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, minan tin iyi ani ku e nemeh enunu kyok si epo po Israel men, wah?”
44001007	Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Tin imen men ku ta wom kuma mara wom pit mi elup wa wom hung elup ton tin Yok wai mosop ko nuk nhing wet emhong tin tan weh men akomen.
44001008	Takuma wom men ku wa emhong minan tin Emiun Auluungin ku ko po wom kut men, ma wom men ku si po tin pok put wungin epo ngo Yerusalem, u yanga pi Yudia, u Samaria, u weh li pol wo mulusngin tin li ponsol men kut tumen.”
44001009	Yang sakal wungin tin mosop imen li klet, men po nuk e supa, si yang wangin li si, ma hingis ta klet po yang li kis to mara po.
44001010	Si po iso mara hi tuk pit ili wet pi ira yang tin li si men, men wulong masang ponwal piphi moolngin po kal kara ko nuk to po,
44001011	ma wulong ko wo taku, “Wom tin api Galili men, wom nuk e tuh lu si wet pi epo ele? A-Yesus tin tuon imen, tin wangin mi wom kho li si men, kha kuli kyok me kai sun tin wom ion yang li si wet pi men.”
44001012	Kut ma po yok po pi tin po sikian ta sa Olip men, men ung tikayung Yerusalem, men muk mukngin ta pi Sabat ta nuk lunga ngong sun Yerusalem, ma po kyok li.
44001013	Ma po kho li sup mi pi Yerusalem kut, khama po siik li si mi mang lahembengin tin ung po eki sun e po kuk min kho men, men a-Pita u a-Yemis, u a-Yon, u Andru, u a-Pilip, u a-Tomas, u a-Bartolomyu, u a-Matyu, u a-Yemis tin wiru sun Alpias men, u a-Saimon tin hi Selot men, u a-Yudas tin wiru sun a-Yemis men tumen kha hi kuk men.
44001014	Po tin mosop imen kuk e wilayuk to mi hi tin then men epo po tin ku kines u hau si wo Got men tumen to po wala u e-Maria tin a-Yesus tonin men, u a-Yesus ehuron kut tumen.
44001015	Ma mi elup tin imen a-Pita si pit emin po tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men. Epo po tiik sun enu hi tin imen taku khum khum u khum ponwal (120) wa tumen. Ma a-Pita sakal taku,
44001016	“Wom masang tin worok hi men, Panngin Auluungin tin imen ku weh si enun ung hut, tin Emiun Auluungin pok put mi wo a-Dewit epo a-Yudas tin muk po tin li kan kan a-Yesus men.
44001017	Epo yang men pim mosop men tiikngin to al, ma pim a pok mi kumang tin then iyi.
44001018	Epo yang tin imen kul mulusngin ta epo ulu tin yang hik put wungin siik ma po kul yang epon men, ma yang plong in e mhin ko, ma yang kuman pal pit emin, ma yang mulun mosop paiwok li pol.
44001019	Ma wungin tin imen si ung mi kinga po mosop tin ung Yerusalem men, tumen ma mulusngin tin imen po sik i yan ira sakalngin ta hi weh “Akeldama,” men sinsin ti, “Mulusngin ta kalolwan.”
44001020	Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk mi kisang tin to Lutngin men taku, ‘Nowhang tin ta yang men men ku lohi pit, ma po ta ku ung epon kyok asin,’ u ‘kumang ta yang tin yang maran pit wo sun ton men men ku po enginin ta si wai,’ ti, tumen.
44001021	Tumen ma po masang ta it ta tin klap pim kokyok minan tin a-Yesus tin Akono men li sup u me pol lunga it men,
44001022	hosingin epo baptais tin ta a-Yon men li pol minan tin wala yang wangin mi it li si men, kha ku po tin imen ta weh si tin ku pok put wungin tin maran nuk po a-Yesus tin khek kyok si tunus men to it.”
44001023	Tumen ma po suk pit po wulong ponwal, men a-Yosep tin po sikian a-Barsabas tin po pen yan ta maksin a-Yastus men, u a-Matias kut tumen.
44001024	Ma po kines Got taku, “Ngon tin Akono e ion mi po mosop men, e suk mara pim epo wulong tin imen, tin ku wop ung wo ngong ta men,
44001025	kumali yang wa kumang tin ta po paengin iyi tin a-Yudas hik put wungin ma yang mang tan men, si kuma yang weh li pi tan.”
44001026	Kut ma po tok tok enah tin ku pok put wulong tin ara ngong ta tin ku wa kumang tin imen, ma enah tin ta a-Matias men lup si suk pit wo yang. Tumen ma yang men tiikngin to po paengin tin eip ponwal u then ta me nuk wo sun tumen.
44002001	Li klet ma ungunan tin ta Pentikos men kho si kut, men po kho me palu wal to mi hi tin then men pi ta.
44002002	Ma kerek engun ma ingutngin ta uu me ko wet pi ken pi tin pus nhum ta men, ma men ko kol mi mang tin po pit min men sup e klet.
44002003	Ma endara kara maran ken po tunus mamai hi e yauan men si to mara po, ma ko mayang li ung e li li po po then then.
44002004	Ma po mosop men mi hi kol epo Emiun Auluungin, ma po hosi sakalngin ira sakalngin ta po enginin enginin kara ira Emiun Auluungin tin wa sakalngin si ta po tin ku po pok put men.
44002005	Kut si ili Yerusalem men po Yuda kara kuk tin uluu Got men, men api pi mosop tin hi khuuk wal ta hi weh e ko ung e li li wo mulus men.
44002006	Ma ingutngin tin imen si pit, men po wa ilio angan me palu wal ma po mara hi wai li ung po hut hi, epo po mosop me hul wet sun tin kuk e sakal ira sakalngin tin ta hi then then weh men.
44002007	Kut ma po mosop enu hi yang ma po teret wo sun, ma po sakal ta al taku, “Iya, po tin sakal imen mosop api Galili ako, wah?
44002008	Taku tua ma it hul po then then tin kuk e sakal ira sakalngin tin ta it then then weh e it khuuk wal ton men?
44002009	It Patia, u it Midia, u it Elam, u po tin ung wo mulusngin Mesopotemia men, u Yudia, u Kapadosia, u Pontus, u Esia,
44002010	u Prigia, u Pampilia, u Isip, u pi Libia hut kara tin ung tikayung sun Sairini men, u po nomisang tin me Rom men, tin hi Yuda u hi tin phae ira wo phepngin tin ta po Yuda men,
44002011	u it Krit u it Arap kut tumen, kha it me hul po sakal ira sakalngin ta it then then weh epo kumang tin apalukngin e ta Got weh men.”
44002012	Tumen ma po mosop enu hi yang ma po mara hi wai li ung po hut hi, ma po sakal ta al taku, “Wungin tin imen sinsin ani nuk tuni?”
44002013	Si po kara mimi sun, ma po sakal taku, “Po tin imen mi hi kol po wain tin homan men kha imen.”
44002014	Takuma a-Pita si pit to hi tin eip ponwal u ta me sup men, ma yang wut pit, ma yang pok put sakalngin si ta po taku, “Wom tin api Yuda u wom mosop tin ung Yerusalem men kut tumen, wom men ku ion sakalngin tin iyi, ma wom hul wet sakalngin ta ngo weh.
44002015	Epo po tin imen ku um wain hambip ken wom tin hoo mi wom men akomen, epo sinang iso ngin muru homan engun.
44002016	Awu. Wungin tin imen tin pok putngin si mi wo pokngin a-Yoel kho men kha imen, wala ti,
44002017	’Got sakal taku, ”Ma men kuli si mi elup tin pyu pongin men epo ngo ku yuk yuk Emiu ngo ko po po tunus mosop, ma husani wom tin masang u wala tumen ku pok put wungin ken po pokngin men, ma po tin wahin ta wom men ku mara hi plal ma ion enun yolngin, u po tin hyangan ta wom men ku enu hi yol yol kut tumen.
44002018	Ma po masang tin kum wo ngo men u po wala tin kum wo ngo men tumen kuli nga yuk yuk Emiu ngo ko po hi minan tin imen, ma po pok put wungin ken po pokngin men.
44002019	Ma kuli nga ning wungin maran kiring kiring ili wet pi, u tosukngin wo mulus ko li awet, men enghik, u yau, u yau kuin nginan tin luun si klet yanga pi men kut tumen.
44002020	Sinang ku phae li ngin mi ku, u namih ku phae li maran ken enghik men kut tumen, men ku si kho epo elup tin nhum u yan pos e ta yang tin Akono men.
44002021	Ma men kuli si ti, epo po mosop tin hau si wo ya yang tin Akono men kuli palolongin.”’
44002022	Wom masang tin api Israel men, wom men ku hul wungin tin iyi weh! A-Yesus tin api Nasaret men, men yang ta tin Got suk mara wom epon e tunus to wungin maran kiring kiring, u wungin ateret wo nginan, u tosukngin kara kut tumen, tin munuman e Got ning i yanga wili yang lunga wom men, kai sun tin tuo wom ion i kut men.
44002023	Yang tin imen tin kho li sup yanga wili po ira wungin tin Got hihi i ta min ma yang ion i kho men, kha wom poo pon si kuk put sa ma wom wini ko hun yanga wili po tin kuk wetpo wungin sinsin men.
44002024	Yang men Got khek i kyok si, men yang plos sun epo won maanngin tin ta hunngin men kho kut kha men, epon men khung nginan weh epo hunngin tin ku kasum yang men.
44002025	Epo a-Dewit sakal epo yang taku, ’Nga ion yang tin Akono men pit enu mara ngo sumsum. Epo yang men in ewo wili ngo tin eronin men, kuma endara ta ku pa kik ngo akomen.
44002026	Sinsin tin imen kha mi ngo keh keh, ma wo ngo ek ma nga pok put sakalngin to min kehngin weh men. Kuru elit ngo kut men ku ung e nhing to hoo mingin kut tumen.
44002027	Epo ngon men ku mang put enu ngo timen in pi tin ta hunngin men akomen, kuru ngon ku mang ta yang tin Auluunginan tap men emkusin whok pit mi nahu akomen kut tumen.
44002028	Ngon kha suk marango epo soput tin nuk e li li e ta tunusngin men. Ngon ku ning i ma min kehngin ko kol mi ngo minan tin nga in to marap men.’
44002029	Wom masang tin worok hi men, wom mang, si nga sakal ta wom awo pias nginan epo yau a it siin tin a-Dewit men, epo yang hun kuru po kil yang kut tumen, ma pi tanuan tin po tulu hi hu yang ton men pit emin it me pol homani.
44002030	Takuma yang men pokngin ta ma yang ion Got tin tung tung anuh si ta yang kho epo po tin ku pol hut mulu tin ta yang weh men ta kha kuli Got wai si ung wo ehus tin ta hi sinkhaung men,
44002031	ma wungin tin imen yang ion i kho wala yang sakal los po Mesaia tin kuli khek kyok si tunus sulung men, epo Mesaia kha ku Got mang put in pi tin ta hunngin men akomen, kuru Mesaia emkusin kha ku whok pit mi nahu akomen kut tumen.
44002032	A-Yesus tin wala imen kha Got khek i kyok si men, ma tin imen pim mosop a ion i to mara pim weh!
44002033	Tumen ma Got wa yang si in ili awon weh ewo wili sun ato sa, ma yang wa Emiun Auluungin hang Wiraman tin Wiraman wo kuk mara yang epon kho men, khali homani ma yang yuk yuk i, tin wala wom ion i u wom hul i homani men.
44002034	Epo a-Dewit ani ku li si wet pi men akomen, takuma yang tuon wo ti, ‘Yang tin Akono men sakal ta sun tin Akono ta ngo men taku, “E ko ung ewo wili ngo tin ato sa men,
44002035	li pol minan tin kuli nga wa po tin nolo ngon men me sup wet khip ken po e ehus ta khip ta men.”’
44002036	Tumen ma po masang to sun wala tin a-Israel khuuknginin men mosop ku ion i weh, epo Got ning a-Yesus tin wom poo poo i si kuk put sa men, tuon si Akono u Mesaia kut tumen.”
44002037	Ma po hul sakalngin tin imen kut, men tenek mi po weh li pol po po ewhat hi, ma po ko sakal ta a-Pita hi po paengin tin kara men taku, “Wom masang tin ehurok men, pim kuli ning i tua?”
44002038	Ti ma a-Pita ko wo ta po taku, “Wom men ku phae mi wom weh, ma wom mosop then then ku wa baptais epo a-Yesus Krais yan, kuma lasin ta wom klokngin, ma wom wa talungin tin Emiun Auluungin tuon men.
44002039	Epo wo kuk marangin men ta wom, u ta husani wom, u men ta po mosop tin kuk hin men kut tumen, men ta po mosop tin Got tin Akono ta it men ku yuk hi men siik.”
44002040	Ma sakalngin munuman kara kyok kha yang pok put ma yang wo nut po taku, “Wom palolo wom mi po tin khuuk wal homani e wungin ta hi ulil men.”
44002041	Kut ma po tin mi hi nawaehngin epon ku wa sakalngin tin ta yang men ko wa baptais. Ma ungunan tin imen po enu hi khum khum khum miuk (3,000) wa tumen kha sup me lup to sun men.
44002042	Ma po nuk nhing epo po tin ku hul kotngin tin ta po paengin men, u epo po tin ku klap wal to mi hi then men, u epo beret tik tik nginan, u epo po tin ku kines Got men tumen, kokyok kokyok.
44002043	Ma lemngin si mi po mosop, ma wungin teret wo nginan u tosukngin munuman tumen men ung e si si yanga wili po paengin.
44002044	Ma po mosop tin wo hi phep men kuk then, ma endara ta po then then men ta hi mosop,
44002045	ma po kuk e tirih mulusngin ta hi u endara ta hi tumen, ma po kikyu i si ta sun, men po kikyu i si ta sun ira sun then then tin kalwok tuni men.
44002046	Ma ungunan then then men po kuk e palu wal then hut mang auluungin u po kuk e tik tik beret mi mang ta li mang ta kut tumen, ma po kuk e wa endara aiingin ta hi to wal to min kehngin u to mi hi tin yil men kut tumen,
44002047	ma po sam sam Got, ma po masang to sun wala mosop mi hi tunusngin pit po sun. Ma ungunan then then men yang tin Akono men pit e wa po tin kuk e palolongin men sup me lup to palu walngin.
44003001	Kut sini minan ta ma a-Pita ngong a-Yon lahun li si mang auluungin to sinang maran tin po ning kinesngin ton ewin men, men to sinang maran miuk.
44003002	Ma yang ta tin tonin khuuk i yek ko khin hu hu men po lul i, men po kuk e lul lul i ungunan then then li ung mara sowon ta mang auluungin tin po sikian “Maran Tunus” men, kuma yang ung e hau pit wo po tin li sup mang auluungin men epo talungin kara.
44003003	Yang tin imen maran kon a-Pita ngong a-Yon tin taku li sup yanga nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men, ma yang hau epo talungin kara.
44003004	Ma a-Pita maran li tuk pit wo sun, kuru a-Yon tin ngong nuk men kut tumen, ma a-Pita sakal taku, “Marap mu supa tuk.”
44003005	Tumen ma yang maran supa wulong hambip, epo yang hoo min epo yang taku wa endara kara hang wulong.
44003006	Kut ma a-Pita ko sakal taku, “Silwa u gol men nga in engun epon, si endara tin nga in ton men ngo ku wai si tap. Epo ya a-Yesus Krais tin api Nasaret men e khek si pit ma e muk muk lu.”
44003007	Ti ma yang isum po wili sun tin atunus men ma yang khek sun si pit, ma kerek engun ma yang khin pon pon u yang khin siwout pokoin nhing nhing.
44003008	Ma yang lup si pit ma yang muk muk li sup yanga nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men to wulong, ma yang muk muk u yang lup lup tumen, ma yang sam sam Got.
44003009	Ma po masang to sun wala mosop ion yang tin muk muk ma wa Got yan si si men.
44003010	Kut ma po tulu hi hu yang tin kho ma ung ma hau epo talungin mara sowon ta mang auluungin tin Maran Tunus men, ma teret wongin klet mi po ma po enu hi yang wo wungin tin si ta yang men.
44003011	Ma yang tin kho ma khin hu hu si homani ma si tunus men men me kasum a-Pita ngong a-Yon, si po masang to sun wala mosop mhup to wal li sup hang wuluk wet suyung tin po sikian ta a-Solomon men, ma po papham to al takut.
44003012	Ma a-Pita ion wungin tin imen, men yang ko sakal ta po masang to sun wala taku, “Wom masang tin ta it a-Israel men, wom teret wo wungin tin imen epo ele? U tua ma wom supa tuk hambip weh, ken i e kakhangin ta tuk wa wungin ta tuk tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men ani tuk a ning i ma yang tin imen si muk muk men?
44003013	Got tin ta Abraham u ta Aisak u ta a-Yakop tumen, men Got tin ta po inana it men, kha wa moolngin si ta a-Yesus tin kum ta yang men kho kut men, men yang tin wom wai si ma wetpo wom wa yang to mara a-Pailat minan tin yang taku mang ta sun li engun men.
44003014	Takuma wetpo wom wa yang tin Auluungin u wungin tan Siik kut tumen, si wom hau epo yang ta tin lek po ko huu nginangan men ku plosngin ti epo wom.
44003015	Si yang tin li muk to tunusngin tin tan men, men wom wini ko hun, yang kha Got khek i kyok si mi po tin huu kho men, men wungin tin mara pim weh nuk pon men.
44003016	Ma wo phepngin tin pit wo a-Yesus yan men kha yang tin wom ion i u hop i tumen si pit nhing won men. Ma wo phepngin tin me yanga wili a-Yesus men kha wa tunusngin ko klet po yang to mara wom mosop tin nuk imen.
44003017	Ehurok, homani ma nga ion i epo wom pong epo engin kha wom ning wungin tin imen epo a-Yesus, kuru po tin mara hi pit wo wom men pong epo engin kut tumen.
44003018	Takuma sakalngin tin Got pok put kho mi wo po pokngin mosop tin tan men epo Mesaia tin ku won maik i men kha Got ning wungin si enun ung hut epo wungin tin tumen.
44003019	Tumen ma wom men ku phae mi wom weh, ma wom kyok mu epo Got, kuma lasin ta wom mlusngin li, kumali elup tin epo nhingngin men ku weh me hang yang tin Akono men,
44003020	ma yang ku tih Mesaia tin pok putngin si ta wom kho men, men a-Yesus ako,
44003021	men yang tin ku weh ting in ili wet pi li pol mi elup tin kuli endara mosop kyok si turunus ewin men, tin Got sakal epon mi wo po pokngin mosop tin tan e auluungin men, hosingin minan tin mulusngin pho pongin ma me pol homani men.
44003022	Epo a-Moses sakal irawin ta po inana it taku, “Yang tin Akono e Got ta wom men kuli khek Pokngin ta wom ta ken ngo men si mi ehuro wom. Yang kha ku wom hul wet epo wungin mosop tin tuni e ku yang sakal i si ta wom men.
44003023	Ma men kuli si ti, epo po mosop tin ku hul wet Pokngin tin imen som, men kuli mumhek mingin weh, ma klokngin lunga po masang to sun wala li.
44003024	Wai, epo po pokngin mosop hosingin epo a-Samuel ma ung e wiewi al me men, men po mosop tin ani pok put sakalngin men siik, men pok put sakalngin epo elup tin iyi maksin kut tumen.
44003025	Wom men husani po tin pokngin men u wungin siin tin Got kaek i ko nuk lunga yang to po tin inana it men, tin yang sakal ta Abraham taku, ‘Ma khuuknginin tin pol hut mulu tap men ta kha kuli po mosop tin khuuk wal wo mulus men wa emhong tunus epon men.’
44003026	Got khek a-Yesus tin kum tan men kho si kut, anima yang tih sun ti epo wom kha muk men, kuma yang wa emhong tunus ko po wom, tin ku yang ning i ma wetpo wom mosop wa wungin lengwal tin ta wom men.”
44004001	Ma wulong iso nuk e sakal ta po masang to sun wala, men po tin kum auluungin men u phua tin maran pit wo sun tin hi haum eya mang auluungin men, u po Sadyusi kut tumen, hik me ewut wulong,
44004002	epo po ya hi sal takut epo wulong tin kot po masang to sun wala ma wulong pok put epo a-Yesus kha ku po tin huu kho men khekngin kyok si tunus epon men.
44004003	Ma po kasum wulong, ma po kan kan wulong li pit kaeng ungunan ta kyok, epo pi men luk angan kut.
44004004	Kut si po munuman tin hul sakalngin ta wulong men wo hi phep, ma po masang enu hi tiikngin taku si kai khum khum khum eip (5,000).
44004005	Li ma pi king kauk ko yang ma po tin mara hi pit wo sun men, u po tin akokono men, u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men,
44004006	kuru Anas tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men, u a-Kaiapas, u a-Yon, u Aleksanda, u po mosop tin yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara e hi khuuk wal men kut tumen, men hi me palu wal Yerusalem.
44004007	Ma po wa wulong me nuk emin po, anima po kines mi wulong taku, “Epo wo phepngin tin ia, wa epo ya are, ma mom ning wungin tin iyi?”
44004008	Kut ma Emiun Auluungin kol mi a-Pita, ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom tin mara wom pit wo po masang to sun wala men, u wom tin akokono ta po Israel men kut tumen,
44004009	taku wom ku kines mi tuk epo wungin tunus ta tin tuk a ning i epo yang khin kalwok ta, epo soput tin yang si tunus epon men,
44004010	kut men ku wom mosop men ku ion i weh, kuru po mosop tin wom Israel khuuk wal men kut tumen, epo ya Mesaia tin a-Yesus api Nasaret men, tin wom poo poo i si kuk put sa wlong put wal ma Got khek i si mi hunngin men, kha yang tin ikop pit to mara wom iyi tunus epon men.
44004011	Yang tin imen men ‘umat tin wom tin ning mang nginangan men wetpo wom wai, kha si umat tin nhum e kasum mang siin emol men.’
44004012	Ma soput ta kyok tin ku po tunus palolongin epon men ku ta iso in akandira akomen, epo po ku sikia sun enginin ta in emin po tunus wo mulus ani ku it palolongin epon men akomen.
44004013	Kut ma po ion a-Pita ngong a-Yon tin pok put sakalngin awo phepngin men, kuru po mara hi iis i epo wulong ku wa maran ekngin kho som, kuru wulong ku wo ngong po elel akomen kut tumen, ma po teret wo wulong, ma po ion i epo wulong tin kho ma hi a-Yesus hi kuk men.
44004014	Takuma po ion yang tin si tunus kho kut men, men pit to wulong, ma sakalngin tin ku po sakal i ewut wulong men om.
44004015	Kut ma po wo ta wuluk epo wuluk ku li nuk mara so wetpo mang tin Kaunsil palu wal min men, si po pok wal lunga hi,
44004016	ma po sakal taku, “It ku ning i tua epo wuluk tin imen? Irawin, epo tosukngin maran kiring nhum ta men ningngin yanga wili wulong kho, men si nuk pi mlaeng to mara po mosop tin ung Yerusalem men, ma it ku sup sup put angan akomen.
44004017	Takuma it men ku klet epo sakalngin tin ku pat walngin li hin lunga po masang to sun wala men, si it men ku uluu wulong hambip weh, kuma homani li kut men ku wulong sakal ta po ta kyok epo yang tin imen yan kyok asin.”
44004018	Kut ma po yuk wulong kyok me sup, men po wo nut wulong epo wulong ku in aku wulong sakal ta wa wulong kot po epo a-Yesus yan angan ta kyok asin.
44004019	Takuma a-Pita ngong a-Yon ko sakal wet po taku, “Taku tunus to mara Got epo tuk ku hul wet wom weh, si tuk ku hul wet Got weh som, men ku tuo wom ples i.
44004020	Epo tuk men ku homong som, si tuk men ku pok put sakalngin epo endara tin pim a ion i kho u pim a hul i kho kut tumen weh.”
44004021	Tumen ma po ulu wulong hambip epo wungin kara kyok, anima po mang ta wulong li, epo po ku pon ta wungin sinsin ta tin ku po mumhek mi wulong epon men akomen, epo po masang to sun wala mosop wa Got yan si epo tosukngin tin si imen.
44004022	Epo yang tin imen men posan tan khum mnal kho li u kara kyok ko po sun kut tumen, anima wulong ning tosukngin epo yang tin imen, tin yang si tunus epon men.
44004023	Ma po mang ta wulong li, anima wulong siik li hang po tin tita hi men, ma wulong li pok put wungin mosop tin po tin kum auluungin e nunhum men, u po tin akokono men kut tumen wo ta wulong epon men.
44004024	Po hul sakalngin tin imen kut, men po wut hi pit pit li epo Got to min thenngin, ma po sakal ti, “Ngon tin Sinkhaung men, ngon men Got, tin ning wet pi, u mulus, u wiu, u endara mosop tin kuk epon men kut tumen,
44004025	tin kho ma sakal si mi wo a-Dewit tin kum tap men taku, ‘Tuni ma po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men sasayih, u po masang to sun wala mara hi ira wungin tin wungin irawin om min men tumen epo ele?
44004026	Po tin sinkhaung ta pi mulus men khoos ma po me nuk, u po tin mara hi pit wo sun men me palu wal to al ewut yang tin Akono men u Mesaia tin tan men kut tumen.’
44004027	Epon men irawin epo a-Yesus tin Auluungin e kum tap men, tin e wa nowhong ko pon men, men a-Herot u a-Pontius Pailat hi po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, u po masang to sun wala tin api Israel men kut tumen me palu wal ewut yang,
44004028	kumali po ning wungin mosop tin wilip u mip tumen hihi i kho epon ku iso si men.
44004029	Homani ma Ngon tin Akono men ku marap ion wungin tin po taku uluu mi pim epon men, ma e wa wo phepngin si ta pim tin kum tap men, kuma wo phepngin klet mi pim ma pim a pok put wungin tap,
44004030	tin ngon ku tus wilip ma e mlis saihngin u e ning tosukngin maran kiring kiring, u wungin tin ku po teret won men kut tumen kara si ningngin epo a-Yesus yan tin auluungin e kum tap men.”
44004031	Ti ma po ning kinesngin li klet, anima pi tin po me palu wal epon men kin, ma Emiun Auluungin ko kol mi po mosop, ma po ku lem som, si po li pok put sakalngin ta Got to wo phepngin.
44004032	Ma po masang to sun wala tin wa ilio angan e wo hi phep men kuk to mi hi then u enu hi then tumen, ma po ta men ku wo epo endara tin tan men ku tan weh akomen, si endara mosop tin po kuk ton men men ta hi then.
44004033	Ma po paengin kuk e pok put sakalngin epo a-Yesus tin Akono men, tin khek kyok si tunus men, to wo phepngin nhum, ma emhong nhum men nanaangin ko po po mosop.
44004034	Epo po ta ku kalwok in lunga sun akomen. Epo mulusngin mosop u mang mosop tin ta po men, men po ti ti i, ma po wa ulu sup wet endara tin po tirih i men,
44004035	ma po wai me ko pit sii khi sun tin Paengin men, anima po kikyu i si ta sun ira sun then then tin kalwok tuni men.
44004036	Ma a-Yoses tin po paengin pen yan a-Barnabas men (yan timen men sinsin ti, “Yang tin hi khuuk wal pit mina wungin tin po pa nhing sun nginangan men”), men hi Liwai khuuk wal, men ko khuukngin pi Saiprus,
44004037	men in to mulusngin ta, ma yang tirih i ma yang espo ulu me ko nuk sii khi po paengin.
44005001	Si yang ta yan Ananaias ngong titien e-Sapaira men tirih mulusngin ta ngong ta.
44005002	Ma yang kasum ulu tin yang wai epo mulusngin men kara, ma titien ion i tin imen kut tumen, si yang wai kara me, yang wai ko nuk sii khi po paengin.
44005003	Takuma a-Pita sakal taku, “Ananaias, tua ma e mang ta a-Nolongin, ma a-Nolongin suuk sii mip ma e torok to mara Emiun Auluungin ma e kasum ulu tin po kul mulusngin men tap kara ung?
44005004	Minan tin mulusngin ku tihngin kho som men, men iso tap ako, wah? Li ma e wa ulu sup wet kho kut, men ku e ning wungin epon epo mip engun ako, wah? Si tua ma mip wa wungin tin imen ta mip? Ngon men ku torok mara po tunus ta akomen, si ngon men torok mara Got siik.”
44005005	Ma Ananaias hul wet sakalngin tin imen, men yang plong ko ma yang nges si ingut pom. Tumen ma lemngin nhum ta ung mi po mosop tin hul epo wungin tin imen.
44005006	Kut ma po masang nerengin kara khek si nuk ma po suk po yang, si po wa yang li, po kil yang.
44005007	Kut si sinang maran miuk kho li, anima titien me sup, ma wut ku ion wungin tin si imen akomen.
44005008	Li klet anima a-Pita ko wo ta wut taku, “Iyi, e pok ngo epo ulu tin mom tih mulusngin epon men ani iyi kut i?” Ti ma wut ko sakal wet yang ti, “Kha imen kut men.”
44005009	Kut ma a-Pita sakal ta wut taku, “Tua ma mom wo nuk wal ma mom taku karong yang tin Akono men Emiun? Marap lu, epo khi po tin li kil titiem men kho me sup wo sowon, ma po ku lat ngon lu maksin kut tumen.”
44005010	Kut ma kerek engun ma wut plong ko sii khi yang, ma wut nges si ingut pom. Ma po masang tin nenerengin men me sup, men po pon ta wut tin hun men, ma po lat wut li pol, men po kil wut ko pit porili titien.
44005011	Tumen ma lemngin nhum takut ko los po po mosop tin kuk mi palu walngin men u men ko los po po mosop tin hul epo wungin tin imen kut tumen.
44005012	Ma tosukngin u wungin ateret wo nginan tumen munuman ung e si si yanga wili po paengin lunga po masang to sun wala. Ma po mosop tin wo hi phep men ung e klap wal to mi hi then wet suyung tin ta a-Solomon men.
44005013	Si po tin kara e ku wo hi phep som men ku ta min puplet epon ku me lup to po akomen, takuma po masang to sun wala tin ku wo hi phep som men wa sun ya hi si.
44005014	Ma po tin wo hi phep men munuman pit e me sup to sun li si, men me lup to palu walngin tin ta yang tin Akono men, men po masang wa ilio angan u po wala wa ilio angan tumen to al.
44005015	Tumen ma po espo sun tin sasaih men li pol put soput, ma po wa sun ko nuk wo ehus u wo endara tin yasngin wo mulus men kut tumen, kuma a-Pita muk muk mili ma taku sinang pal to yang enun ko nuk po po tin ta hi e sasaih men kara engun.
44005016	Kuru po wa ilio angan tin me pi tanuan tin ung baul sun Yerusalem men lik me palu wal kut tumen, ma po espo sun tin sasaih men u po tin emiun lengwal mumhek mi hi men tumen me, ma po mosop si turunus kyok kut tumen.
44005017	Kut ma yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men si, u po mosop tin hi kuk to al men si kut tumen, men po maran min tin ta po Sadyusi men kha imen, ma po mi hi kol po wungin tin po mi hi heh wet sun men.
44005018	Ma po kakasum sun paengin ma po wa sun li pit mi mang tin ta hi e po ku ples wungin ta sun iso men.
44005019	Takuma to pi luk men tihngin ta yang tin Akono men ta me kaklas sowon tin pit e li li mang tin po kan kan sun li pit min ewin men, ma yang kot po li pol, ma yang wo taku,
44005020	“Wom lu nuk nowhang hut mang auluungin, ma wom sakal ta po masang to sun wala epo wungin mosop tin epo tunusngin tin iyi.”
44005021	Po hul wungin tin imen, men po huus li sup mi mang auluungin ma po kot sun. Kut si yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men u po tin hi kuk to al men kut tumen me yuk sun tin Kaunsil men mosop me palu wal, to po akokono mosop tin hi Israel khuuknginin men, ma po tih wungin li mang tin po kan kan sun Paengin pit min men epo po ku espo sun tin imen me.
44005022	Takuma po phuan tin haum eya mang men li hip epo sun mi mang, ma po kyok me pok pok taku,
44005023	“Irawin, epo pim a li pon ta mang tin sambalngin kakaekngin men, u po tin haum eya mang men pit e li li mara sowon kut tumen, takuma pim a li klas, men ku pim a pon ta po ta mi mang akomen!”
44005024	Ti ma yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men, u yang tin phuan e maran pit wo mang auluungin men, u po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men kut tumen hul sakalngin tin imen, men po mi hi munuman epo wungin tin imen kuli si enun ung hut tua.
44005025	Kut ma po ta me pok sun taku, “Wom ion i, epo po masang tin wom kan kan hi li pit mi mang men, wala kyok mili nuk hut mang auluungin ma po nuk e kot sun masang to sun wala men!”
44005026	Kut ma phua tin maran pit wo po tin haum eya mang auluungin men li to po phuan tin kum wet wili yang men ma po espo sun Paengin min amangngin engun, epo po lem pit wo sun masang to sun wala, epon akuli po tup ewut sun epo enah.
44005027	Ma po espo sun me pol, men po wa sun siik li nuk mara Kaunsil. Ma yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men ko kileng mi po taku,
44005028	“Iyi, pim a pa sup hambip nuk wo wom kho epo wom ku kot po epo yang tin imen yan kyok asin ako, wah? Wom ion i, epo wom suuk sii pi Yerusalem epo kotngin tin ta wom men, ma wom taku wa lasin si po pim epo yang tin imen kalolwan!”
44005029	Takuma a-Pita hi po paengin kara ko sakal wet yang taku, “Pim ku hul wet Got weh, si pim ku hul wet po tunus ta akomen.
44005030	Got tin ta po inana it men khek a-Yesus kyok si, men yang tin wom yuh yang si kuk put sa kha wom wi yang ko hun men.
44005031	Yang kha Got wai si in ili awon ewo wili Got tin ato sa men, kuma yang in ken po tin li muk it u palolo it tumen ta men, kumali Got wa phae mingin u lasin klok nginan tumen ko ta po Israel.
44005032	Ma pim kha pok put sakalngin epo wungin tin mosop imen, kuru Emiun Auluungin kut tumen, men Emiun tin Got wai ko ta po tin hul wet wungin ta a-Yesus men.”
44005033	Po hul wungin tin imen, men po mi hi kakhat sun li pit put sun pokoin, ma po pok wal lunga hi epo po ku lek sun ko huu.
44005034	Kut si yang ta hi Kaunsil Parisi ta, men yan a-Gamaliel, men kot po epo wungin sinsin nginangan kuru po masang to sun wala mosop wo hi nuk wet yang kut tumen, men si pit ma yang wo ta po epo po ku wa sun tin paengin men li kuk mara so put monlo long wet,
44005035	anima yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom masang tin ta it Israel men, mara wom pit mi sakalngin ta wom tunus wet, tin wom taku ning i epo po tin imen.
44005036	Epo ungunan kara kho li men a-Tudas wai si pit, ma yang wo epo yang e akono, ma po wa ilio angan tiik nginan khum khum mnal (400) wa tumen si pet kira yang. Takuma po wi yang ko hun, kuru po mosop tin ira yang men plak wal li yanga pi kut tumen, si pi put ko nuk.
44005037	Silung epo yang timen men a-Yudas tin api Galili men wai si pit mi elup tin po li pipii sun ya hi min men, ma yang wa wa mi po munuman li ira yang. Yang tin imen huuspit kut, kuru po mosop tin ira yang men plak wal kut tumen.
44005038	Si homani ma nga wo ta wom ti, wom men ku kuk hin epo po tin imen, ma wom mang ta po li kuk ta tuo hi. Epon taku hihingin wa kumang tin imen ta po tunus engun, men kuli li hut liit nuk engun ako.
44005039	Si taku Got e sinsin epon, men ku wom khuk po engin weh epo wom tin ku ning i ma wungin tin imen li hut liit nuk engun men. Epon akuli wom pon tan epo wom men lek wal to Got kha imen.”
44005040	Ti ma po phae mi hi. Ma po yuk sun tin paengin men kho me sup, khama po wo ta sun kara ma po wawlauk sun, kuru po wo maran ko klat si ta sun epo po ku li pok put sakalngin epo a-Yesus tin Akono men yan kyok asin kut tumen, khama po mang ta sun li.
44005041	Tumen ma po pol e yok to mara po Kaunsil, men po mi hi keh keh epo Got tin ion po ken po e tunus epo po ku wa manngin pit mi a-Yesus yan men.
44005042	Ma ungunan then then mi mang auluungin kokyok kokyok, kuru mi mang ta li mang ta kut tumen, men ku po nhing epo tin ku kot sun u pok put sakalngin si ta sun tumen epo a-Yesus tin Mesaia men akomen.
44006001	Kut si mi elup tin imen ma po tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men enu hi ung e ko po sun li si, men sangengngengngin ta si mi wo po Yuda tin sakal Grik men li pit wo po Yuda tin sakal ta hi Hibru men, epon tin po wetpo hi wa sun tin ta hi wawamuh men epo endara aiingin kikyu nginan to ungunan tin then then men.
44006002	Kut ma po tin eip ponwal u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen yuk sun tin wa ilio angan e hi ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men me, po sakal ta sun taku, “Taku wetpo pim wa sakalngin ta Got si kuma pim a kum wo suyung epo endara aiingin kikyu nginan, men ku tunus weh akomen.
44006003	Tumen ma, ehurok, mara wom pit mi wom ma wom pon ta wuluk khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen tin ya hi to wungin tunus, u Emiun Auluungin kol mi hi, u to mhin ekngin men kut tumen, tin ku pim a wo pim ung wo hi si mara hi pit wo kumang tin imen.
44006004	Si pim men ku wilayuk epo pim ku kines Got u pim a ning kumang tin epo wungin pok put nginan men kut tumen kokyok kokyok.”
44006005	Ma sakalngin tin imen po tin wa ilio angan men mi hi tunusngin epon, ma po wo hi ung wo a-Stiwen tin wo phepngin u Emiun Auluungin kol min men, u a-Pilip, u a-Prokorus, u a-Nikanot, u a-Timon, u a-Parmenas, u a-Nikolas tin api Antiok e kho ma phae ira wo phepngin tin ta po Yuda men kut tumen,
44006006	men po espo sun li nuk mara po paengin. Ma po kines Got li klet, anima po wili hi si nuk po sun.
44006007	Li klet ma sakalngin ta Got in e saa tongin li yanga pi, ma po tin ira kotngin men enu hi tiik nginan pit e ko po sun li si hambip weh ili Yerusalem, ma po tin kum auluungin men munuman takut pit e hul wet sakalngin tin hi wo hi nuk wet men.
44006008	Ma a-Stiwen, men wo phepngin u emhong tumen kol min ma yang in e ning wungin tin po teret won u tosukngin tumen nunhum kara lunga po masang to sun wala.
44006009	Kut ma po kara si mi sun tin po sikia hi e me mi mang akotngin ta po tin kho ma kum wo sun li homani ma wo hi pias men, men hi api Sairini, u Aleksandria, u po tin me Silisia u Esia men tumen, men si hi a-Stiwen hi heek wal.
44006010	Takuma po ku kakha epo po ku sakal emhut mhin ekngin u Emiun tumen tin yang pok put sakalngin epon men akomen.
44006011	Li klet ma po kaun wungin ma po kul sun masang kara kuma po li sakal taku, “Pim a hul yang sakal lengwal ewut a-Moses u Got kut tumen.”
44006012	Ma po seh po ewhat sun masang to sun wala, u po tin akokono men, u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men kut tumen, ma po li pol ta yang, ma po kasum yang, ma po wa yang li pit to mara Kaunsil tin ta hi men.
44006013	Kuru po wa sun tin torok nginangan men kara me nuk, men sakal taku, “Yang timen ku nhing kara epo yang tin ku sakal lengwal epo pi auluungin tin iyi u wungin sinsin kut tumen akomen.
44006014	Epo pim a hul yang tin sakal epo a-Yesus tin api Nasaret men ku mumhek mi pi tin iyi kuru yang wiewi wungin sinsin tin a-Moses wai hang Got po pat wal i me ko nuk it men kut tumen.”
44006015	Ma po mosop tin hi nuk mi po Kaunsil men mara hi tuk pit wo yang hambip, ma po ion mara yang men ken tihngin maran men.
44007001	Kut ma yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men ko kines sun ti, “Iyi, wungin tin imen, men irawin, wah?”
44007002	Ti ma a-Stiwen ko wo taku, “Wom masang tin worok hi u yok hi men tumen, wom hul. Got tin in mi moolngin men si pol ta yang tin yau a it siin Abraham men minan tin yang in Mesopotemia, li klet anima yang iso li ung Haran men,
44007003	ma Got ko wo ta yang taku, ‘E mang ta mulusngin tap sinsin u po tin wom khuuk wal men, si e lu wo mulusngin ta tin ngo ku iso suk marap epon men.’
44007004	Kut ma yang me pol wo mulusngin tin ta hi Kaldia men, si yang li ung Haran. Ma minan tin wiraman hun men anima Got wa yang kyok ko pit imen li ung wo mulusngin tin homani ma wom ung won men.
44007005	Ma Got ku pakuh po yang to endara ta wo mulusngin tin imen akomen, men Got ku wa mulusngin tingit sakun kara tin ku kai khi yang men si ta yang akomen. Takuma minan tin yang iso in engun epo sun hoin men, men Got wo kuk mara sun epo yang ku iso wa mulusngin tin iyi si ta sun Abraham kuma Abraham maran pit won tan weh, kuru ta po tin khuuknginin ta yang e ku iso ung e papel ko pu wal ewi yang men kut tumen.
44007006	Takuma Got sakal ira wungin ta ti, epo po tin khuuknginin ta yang men kuli li ung wo mulusngin ta po enginin kara, ma po ku wa sun me kum wo sun engun, ma po ning sun lengwal to posan khum khum mnal (400) engun.
44007007	Kuru Got sakal ti, ‘Ma po tin ung e khuuk wal pi tin imen, tin po li kum wo hi engun men, men ku nga iso ples wungin epo po. Si sulung epo wungin tin imen, men ku po Israel me pol ma po kum auluungin ta ngo pi tin iyi.’
44007008	Ma Got wa sakalngin ta ko nuk lunga ngong epo po ku mut wal. Tumen ma Abraham ko khuuk Aisak, ma yang mut sun to ungunan tin eip u miuk me sup tumen. Ma Aisak ko khuuk a-Yakop, anima a-Yakop ko khuuk po tin khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen, tin yau a it siin men.
44007009	Li ma po tin yau a it siin men mi hi heh wet sun pit po a-Yosep, ma po tih yang anaum li ung wo mulusngin Isip. Takuma Got in to yang,
44007010	ma yang palolo sun mi won maikngin mosop tin taku si ta yang men, ma yang wa mhin ekngin ko ta sun ma yang in tunus to mara Parau tin sinkhaung ta po Isip men. Ma Parau wa yang si phuan epo yang ku maran pit wo po Isip u endara mosop tin pit mi mang ta Parau men kut tumen.
44007011	Li klet ma elwip ta si wo mulusngin Isip u wo mulusngin Kenan sup e klet, ma won maikngin nhum ta si, ma po tin yau a it siin men ku pon ta endara aiingin kara tin ku po pa ken li ken nginan ta hi epon men akomen.
44007012	Taku li klet ma a-Yakop hul put wungin epo wit kara pit ko li Isip ma yang tirih po tin yau a it siin men li angan tin muk men.
44007013	Li ma angan tin me ponwal angan men, anima a-Yosep pok put i si ta ehuro hi, anima Parau hop po tin hi a-Yosep hi khuuk wal men.
44007014	Kut ma a-Yosep tih wungin li epo wiraman a-Yakop u po mosop tin hi khuuk wal e khum ponwal me sup u eip me nuk wo sun tumen (75) ku me epo yang.
44007015	Tumen ma a-Yakop li ko Isip, ma yang in li yang hun, yang kuru po tin yau a it siin men kut tumen.
44007016	Ma po espo sun emkusin kyok li Sekem ma po li tum i li sup mi uwin tin kho ma Abraham kul i epo silwa kara hang a-Hamor husanin tin mamasang men, men a-Hamor tin khuuk a-Sekem men kha imen.
44007017	Li klet ma elup tin epo wo kuk marangin men tin Got tung tung Abraham epon men ung e me tikayung, men po masang to sun wala ung e khuuk wal hambip ko li Isip,
44007018	li pol minan tin yang sinkhaung enginin ta si, men ku hop a-Yosep akomen.
44007019	Yang tin imen kaun wungin ko sumut epo po tin khuuk wal ta it men, ma yang ning i lengwal epo po tin yau a it siin men, men yang wo ma po espo sun hoin tin khuukngin homan men li pol mara so, kuma po men ku tunus kuk asin.
44007020	Mi elup tin imen a-Moses ko khuukngin, ma yang men pon tunus to mara Got. Yang tin imen men po mara hi pit won mi mang tin ta wiraman men to namih khaut miuk,
44007021	anima po wa yang li pol mara so, ma Parau erun me wa yang li, ma wut paruk yang ken yang e wiru wut tuon men.
44007022	Ma a-Moses wa mhin ekngin hang po Isip kara epo wungin mosop tin ta po Isip men, ma yang men apalukngin epo sakalngin tin yang sakal i men u wungin tin yang ning i men kut tumen.
44007023	Li klet ma posan ta yang khum mnal li kut, anima yang min wawai epo yang ku li tuh wo po ehuro hi tin ta hi Israel e hi khuuk wal men.
44007024	Li klet ma yang li ion sun ta hi ta tin yang Isip ta in e wa won maikngin tin ku siik som men ko po sun men, ma yang phae ma yang ning wungin emhut sun ta sun, ma yang wi sun tin Isip men ko hun.
44007025	Epo a-Moses phaeng taku po ehuro hi ku ion i epo Got tin taku palolo po yanga wili yang men, takuma po ku ion i som.
44007026	Kut ma pi king kauk ko yang ma a-Moses kyok li plo nginan ta wulong ta hi ponwal tin in e lek wal men, ma yang taku ning i kuma wulong sup me then ma wulong in aminis to wal kyok, ma yang sakal ti, ‘Wulong tin masang men, mom men irit won, taku tua ma mom ning wungin tin ku siik som men lunga mom?’
44007027	Takuma yang tin sinsin epo wungin lengwal men sik sun li, ma yang wo taku, ‘Ara won ung wo ngon ku si akono ma e ples wungin ta pim?
44007028	Iyi, ma ngon taku wi ngo ko hun ken yang tin api Isip e wini kho ko hun to pi toisap men, wah?’
44007029	A-Moses hul wungin tin imen, men yang saa ma yang li ung wo mulusngin Midian, ma yang in ko pit imen li yang khuuk husanin masang ponwal.
44007030	Li ma posan khum mnal kho li kut, anima tihngin ta yang tin Akono men ko pol ta yang mi yau tin si pit e ngin ngin mi wolopon men pi tin tahunggu e nuk sii pi Sainai men.
44007031	Ma a-Moses ion i tin imen, men yang teret won tin yang maran kon i men, ma yang ung e li tikayung kuma yang ion i tunus, men wut yang tin Akono men me epo yang ma sakal ti,
44007032	‘Ngo men Got tin ta po tin yau a wom siin men, tin Got ta Abraham, u Got ta Aisak, u Got ta a-Yakop men kut tumen.’ Ti ma a Moses kwat, ma yang lem epo yang tin ku supan men.
44007033	Kut ma yang tin Akono men ko wo ta yang taku, ‘E kuul sandel tin ung yanga khip men lu, epo pi tin e pit won imen, men mulusngin auluungin ako.
44007034	Irawin epo tuo ngo men ion i kho epo mumhek mingin tin si epo po masang to sun wala tin ta ngo e ung ko li Isip men, ma nga hul po tin yut yut amusukngin men, ma nga me ko epo ngo ku palolo po kut khae. Ma homani e muh, ngo ku tih ngon lu Isip.’
44007035	A-Moses tin po mut i ma po wo ti, ‘Ara won ung wo ngon ku si akono ma e ples wungin ta pim?’ kha tuon Got tih i ku li akono u palolongin tumen si yanga wili tihngin tin ko pol ta yang mi wolopon men.
44007036	Yang tin imen muk po li pol sulung epo yang suk mara po epo wungin ateret wo nginan u tosukngin tumen kara wo mulusngin Isip, u mi wiu tin min mhee men, u pi tin tahunggu to posan khum mnal men kut tumen.
44007037	A-Moses tin tuon imen kha wo ta po tin a-Israel khuuknginin men taku, “Yang tin Akono e Got ta wom men kuli wa po pokngin ta si ta wom ken ngo men mi ehuro wom. Yang kha ku wom hul wet weh men.’
44007038	Yang tin imen kha in mi palu walngin pi tin tahunggu men to tihngin tin sakal ta yang po pi Sainai men, u to po tin yau a it siin men tumen, men yang tin wa sakalngin tin tunusan e me mi wo Got weh men kuma yang wai si ta it men.
44007039	Yang tin imen men po tin yau a it siin men mi hi epo po ku hul wet yang akomen, si po wetpo hi wa yang, ma epo mi po men po phae kyok li Isip,
44007040	ma po sakal ta Aron taku, “E ning got ta pim kara tin ku li muk pim men. Si a-Moses tin espo pim wo mulusngin Isip me pol men, pim a pong epo wungin tin si ta yang men.’
44007041	Ti ma po ning bulmakau asus enun ta mi elup tin imen, ma po ning talungin ta si pit wo suyung epon, ma po mi hi keh keh epo endara tin po ning i epo wili hi weh men engun.
44007042	Kut ma Got wetpon wa po, si yang mang kuma po kum auluungin ta endara tin nomoyong e nuk e li li ili wet pi men engun, wala sakalngin panngin nuk mi kisang tin ta po Pokngin men taku, “Wom tin wom khuuk wal Israel men, ngo ani wom lek li ken nginan ma wom ning talungin epo ngo to posan khum mnal minan tin wom kuk pi tin tahunggu men, wah? Awu.
44007043	Wom iso kuk e lat mang ausel tin ta got Molok men, u awheng tin ta got tin ta wom Repan men, men endara enu ngong tin wom ning i kuma wom uluun men. Men kuli nga espo wom li yek wo pi Babilon.’
44007044	Si mang ausel tin Got pok put wungin tan min men, men ung hang po tin yau a it siin men pi tin tahunggu men, ken Got won ung won ma yang sakal ta a-Moses epo yang ku ning i ira ewi sun enun tin yang ion i kho men.
44007045	Mang ausel tin imen, men po yau a it siin ung e pat wal i yanga wili al ma po wai to a-Yosua li sup wo mulusngin tin po tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men kasum i men, men po tin Got luul to hi to mara po yau a it siin men, ma mang in pi tin imen weh li pol minan tin ta a-Dewit men.
44007046	A-Dewit men pon ta min sukngin in to mara Got, ma yang kines epo yang ku pon ta mang ta tin Got tin ta a-Yakop men ku ung min men.
44007047	Si a-Solomon kha ning mang ta Got men.
44007048	Takuma Got tin Sinkhaung men ku ung mi mang auluungin tin ningngin epo po wili hi men ewin som, wala pokngin tin imen sakal ti,
44007049	‘Wet pi men ehus ta ngo tin ngo tin Sinkhaung men ung won men, u mulus men ehus ta ngo tin khi ngo ko nhing won men tumen. Si wom ku ning mang tin ia kyok ta ngo? Wa mang tin tunia weh kuli nga ti nhing epon weh?’ Yang tin Akono men kha sakal tumen.
44007050	‘Iyi, ngo kha ning endara tin mosop imen epo wili ngo ako, wah?’
44007051	Wom tin pang po wom nginangan u mi wom u kinga wom klet ken po tin ku mut wal ewin som men tumen, wom men nolo Emiun Auluungin sumsum. Wungin tin po yau a wom siin ning i men kha wom ning i kyok imen.
44007052	Iyi, po pokngin tin ia po yau a wom siin ku ning hi lengwal kho men som? Epo po lek sun tin pok put wungin kho epo Sun tin wungin tan Siik men, tin homani ma wom si po tin wa yang sup yanga wili po nolo men, u wom si po tin wi yang ko hun men kut tumen.
44007053	Wom kha wa wungin sinsin yanga wili po tihngin, takuma wom ku iran akomen.”
44007054	Po hul wungin tin imen, men po mi hi kakhat sun li pit put sun pokoin, kuru po ii ngi hi kakiat kakiat po al epo yang kut tumen.
44007055	Takuma Emiun Auluungin kol mi a-Stiwen, ma yang maran weh li tuk pit ili wet pi, ma yang ion moolngin ta Got tin pon engil engil men, u a-Yesus tin pit ewo wili Got tin ato sa men kut tumen,
44007056	ma yang sakal taku, “Imen, marango kon wet pi min pok, si Wiru Po Tunus pit ewo wili Got tin ato sa men!”
44007057	Kut ma po wut hi paplai hambip u po phae mi kinga hi, si po mhup li ewut yang to mi hi tin lup si then men,
44007058	ma po luul to yang li pol wetpo enunu, ma po tup ewut yang epo enah. Si po tin pok put wungin ewut a-Stiwen men kuul moolngin tin po phini nuk po sun men ko pit sii khi yang wahin ta yan a-Sol.
44007059	Ma po iso kuk e tup ewut a-Stiwen epo enah, men yang yuk si wo Got taku, “Yesus tin Akono men, e wa emiu ngo tih.”
