44019022	Tumen ma yang tih wulong ponwal tin kum ta yang men kho li Masedonia, men a-Timoti ngong a-Erastus, si yang tuon iso in put monlo long Esia.
44019023	Si mi elup tin imen men sisne mingin nhum ta si pit mi Soput tin imen.
44019024	Epo yang ta yan a-Demitrius tin ning silwa nginangan men tin ning mang enun tururun tin got wala Artimas enun pit min men, ma yang wa ulu hambip kara si ta po tin kum anaum ta yang men.
44019025	Yang timen yuk po tin kumang ta hi then men to po tin kumang ta hi tikayung wal angan men me palu wal, ma yang sakal taku, “Apo, wom ion i epo it ung tunus epo kumang tin iyi.
44019026	Kuru wom ion i u wom hul i epon ko pit Epesus iyi misan akomen, si yanga pi Esia mosop angan, men a-Pol tin iyi ek ek mi po munuman ma po wetpo hi wa sakalngin, ma yang sakal epo got tin po ning i epo wili hi men men ku got weh akomen.
44019027	Tumen ma ku kumang anaum tin ta it imen misan ani ku plong ko amiron nginan men akomen. Awu. Mang auluungin ta got wala Artimas tin nhum men ku ko amiron nginan to mara po, ma moolngin ta wut tin po Esia mosop u po mosop tin ung wo mulus men uluu wal epon men ku mumhek mingin maksin kut tumen.”
44019028	Ma po hul wet sakalngin tin imen, men po mosop mi hi nenen takut, ma po hau hambip, ma po sakal taku, “Artimas tin ta it Epesus men kha nhum kut men.”
44019029	Tumen ma pi tin nhum imen men ingutngin kuk min koyang, ma po mhup li sup nowhang tin po supa sun tin ning ning kalek to mara sun men to mi hi tin lup si then men, ma po kasum a-Gaius ngong Aristarkus tin api Masedonia e ngyuk a-Pol me then men ma hi li sup.
44019030	Si a-Pol taku li sup mi po masang to sun wala tin wa ilio angan men, men po tin ira kotngin men nghen epo yang tin ku li sup men.
44019031	Kuru po phuan kara tin mara hi pit wo mulusngin Esia men tin tita hi a Pol hi men tih wungin li epo yang ku phuk mi engin li sup mi nowhang tin po ning kalek epon men asin kut tumen.
44019032	Epo po kara hau epo endara kara weh u po kara hau epo endara kara weh tumen, epo po tin me palu wal imen mi hi kuk lilil, ma po munuman kara mi sun men ku ion i sinsin tin po me palu wal epon men akomen.
44019033	Si po pong si Aleksanda mi sun tin wa ilio angan men me pol maran min po, men po Yuda kha ning i tin imen. Ma Aleksanda wilin mili ma yang taku sakal mut eyan li ta po masang to sun wala.
44019034	Takuma po ion i epo yang men Yuda ta kho kut, khama po mosop hau then to sinang maran ponwal angan taku, “Artimas tin ta it Epesus men kha nhum kut men.”
44019035	Si phua tin maran ek e kum ta sun tin mara hi pit wo pi tin nhum imen wut tang po ma po mara hi ain, si yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom masang tin api Epesus men, ara in tin iso pong epo pi Epesus tin nhum men tin haum eya mang auluungin ta got tin wala Artimas e nhum men, u wut enun tin enahan tin plong me ko wet pi hang got Sus men?
44019036	Awu. Po ta men ku ton mi sakalngin tin imen akomen, tumen ma wom men ku ping wo wom, si wom men ku wo phuk mi engin epo endara ta asin.
44019037	Epo wom wa wulong tin masang me iyi, men ku tip tip endara mi mang auluungin nginangan wa wulong ku ton mi got wala tin ta wom men tumen akomen.
44019038	Tumen ma taku a-Demitrius hi po tin hi kum anaum then men kuk to wungin tin ku po wai pit po sun men, men mang tin po ples wungin min men sowon pit u po phuan tin ples wungin nginangan men kuk kut tumen. Pi tin imen kha ku po li ples wungin tin po wai pit po al men epon men.
44019039	Si taku wom kuk to wungin kara kyok, men ku plesngin mi palu walngin tin ira wungin sinsin siik men.
44019040	Epo tikayung ma po ku wa wungin pit po it pit mi wungin tin ulil si homani men, epo wungin sinsin tin ku it pok po tunus epo palu walngin tin si ulil homani men om.”
44019041	Tumen ma yang sakal tin imen li klet, anima yang wo ma po tin me palu wal imen yang wal.
44020001	Sokongin tin nhum imen put mut kut, anima a-Pol yuk po tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men me hang yang, ma yang wa min si ta po kut, anima yang yok ku li Masedonia.
44020002	Ma yang suuk sii pi tin hap ko nuk ko nuk imen ma yang pa nhing po epo sakalngin munuman, li klet ma yang li pol wo mulusngin tin ta po Grik men,
44020003	ma yang in imen to namih khaut miuk. Ma po Yuda pok wal eking yang minan tin yang taku si wo imut ma yang li Siria men, tumen ma yang min wiewi al ma yang kyok li ewin ira soput tin li hik put pi Masedonia men.
44020004	Ma a-Sopater tin api Beria men li to yang li pol Esia, kuru Aristarkus u a-Sekundos tin ta po Tesalonaika men, u a-Gaius tin api Derbe men, u a-Timoti, u a-Tikikus ngong a-Tropimus tin ngong api Esia men kut tumen.
44020005	Po tin imen kho li muk pim ma po kaeng pim ko li Troas.
44020006	Elup tin kakaomngin tin epo beret tin yiis om min men kho li, anima pim a si wo imut Pilipai ma pim a li, ma ungunan khaut eip kho li kut, men pim a li pol ta po Troas, ma pim a kuk pi tin imen to ungunan khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen.
44020007	Ma ungunan tin li muk sun mi enal ta men si ma po tin ira kotngin men me palu wal epo po ku tik tik beret kho kut, men a-Pol maran pit mi sakalngin to po, ma yang hihi wungin ta min kho epo yang ku yok to ungunan tin pit wetpo sun men ma yang li, tumen ma yang nak nak sakalngin li maran nomalak weh li pol to pi put elup.
44020008	Kut si esul munuman ngin ngin mi lahembengin tin miuk ung po eki al e po palu wal min men.
44020009	Ma mara sowon tin eip me sup epon men yang wahin ta yan a-Yutikus ung won, men nhaung li yol akanda. Nhaungngin wi yang weh kut, ma a-Pol iso maran pit mi sakalngin to po li maran nomalak takut, si yang plong ko ili wo suyung tin miuk angan men ma po ko wa yang si hun.
44020010	Si a-Pol saa li ko, ma yang me plong ko sung wo sun, men yang sakal taku, “Miu wom tuung asin, epo yang enun iso in mi yang.”
44020011	Ma yang kyok li si, ma yang tik beret ma yang iini, ma yang sakal maran nomalak weh li pi plas koyang, anima yang yok ma yang li.
44020012	Si po wa yang tin wahin imen maran to tunusngin li, ma po mi hi ko li wyu ung, men ku kiak akomen.
44020013	Si pim a kho li si wo imut ma pim a li Asos, ko pit imen kha pim taku wa a-Pol si wo imut to pim men, epo yang panen pim tumen kho, si yang tuon ku muk muk na khin.
44020014	Ma yang me tut pim Asos kho kut, men pim a wa yang si wo imut to pim ma pim a li pol Mitilini.
44020015	Ma ko pit imen men imut yok to pim ma ungunan ta kyok men pim a li pol tikayung pi Kios. Ma ungunan tin pit wetpo sun men pim a li pol Samos ma pim a kuk Trogilium. Si ungunan ta kyok si anima pim a li pol Miletus.
44020016	Epo a-Pol min wawai kho epo yang ku iso in wo imut li yek ta pi Epesus, timen kuma yang in maran nomalak wo mulusngin Esia asin. Epo yang taku pus engin epon taku men, men ku yang li in Yerusalem to pi ungunan tin ta pi Pentikos men.
44020017	Ko li Miletus yang tih wungin li Epesus ma yang yuk po tin akokono e mara hi pit wo palu walngin men me.
44020018	Ma po me pol ta yang kut, men yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Tuo wom ion wungin ta ngo tin nga in lunga wom ton kokyok kokyok ungunan tin khi ngo kah pi Esia wo maran ma me pol homani men,
44020019	men nga ning kumang ta yang tin Akono men to mi ngo mosop tin nga wa ya ngo ko men u to tinisngin u karongngin munuman tin si ta ngo epo po Yuda tin pok wal eking ngo men kut tumen.
44020020	Ma ngo ku kaun sakalngin ta tin ku nhio wo wom men akomen, si nga pok put mosop si ta wom, ma nga kot wom pi mlaeng weh u ko pit ko pit mi mang kut tumen,
44020021	ma nga pok put wungin si ta po Yuda u si ta po Grik kut tumen epo po ku phae mi hi li epo Got u po ku wo hi phep pit wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen.
44020022	Wom hul, homani ma emiu ngo nak nak mi ngo ku weh li Yerusalem, ma wungin tin ku si ta ngo ko pit imen men ku nga ion i akomen,
44020023	si Emiun Auluungin pok put si in mi pi tin nunhum men then then ma yang sakal ti, epo esih tin po koklong men u won maikngin kara kut tumen men kaeng ngo ako.
44020024	Takuma endara tin mosop imen ku ta kiik ngo li akomen, kuru wo ngo ku nuk wet ngo enun ku tunus weh to mara ngo akomen kut tumen, si kuma nga suuk sii saangin ta ngo to min kehngin, u kumang tin nga wai hang a-Yesus tin Akono men tin ku nga pok put pok putngin tin tunus e epo nanaangin tin ta Got men weh.
44020025	Wom hul, ma homani nga ion i epo wom mosop tin nga mili mili lunga wom kho ma nga pok put enunu tin ta Got men men kuli wom ion marango kyok akomen.
44020026	Tumen ma nga pok put sakalngin to mara wom homani epo po tunus ta ku huuspit, men nga in pi mlaeng mi enghik ta po masang to sun wala mosop.
44020027	Epo kho men ku nga lem ewo ngo epo ngo tin ku pok put sakalngin mosop tin nuk ta mi Got men si ta wom men akomen.
44020028	Tumen ma mara wom pit wo wom weh u sipsip mosop tin Emiun Auluungin won ung wo wom ku si mara wom pit wo hi men, kuma wom ning kumang ta po tin mara hi pit wo sipsip men mi palu walngin ta Got tin yang kul i epo yang enghikan tuon men weh.
44020029	Epo nga ion i ti, mi khi ngo tin ku li kut men, men ku elwa enih kara tin lases kuk tan men men kuli iso me sup lunga wom, ma ku mumhek mi sipsip tin wa ilio angan men.
44020030	Kuru lunga wom tuo wom men ku po kara si ma po pok put sakalngin ulil kara tin ku ek ek mi po tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men li ira po.
44020031	Tumen ma mara wom si kuk ma tulu wom hu epo posan miuk tin kho li men men ku nga nhing epo ngo tin ku wo nut wom mosop mi tinisngin to pi luk u to pi mhangin kut tumen akomen.
44020032	Ehurok, homani ma nga wa wom sup yanga wili Got u sakalngin tin epo nanaangin tin ta yang men, tin ku pa nhing wom si nuk nhing ma pakuh po wom epo moolngin lunga po mosop tin si auluungin men.
44020033	Ngo ku marango nes silwa wa gol wa moolngin ta po ta angan ta kho akomen.
44020034	Wai, tuo wom ion i epo yanga wili ngo tuon kha nga ning endara tin ku nhio wo ngo u po tin kuk to ngo men kut tumen ako.
44020035	Nga suk mara wom epo soput mosop tin ku wom kum i tumen kha ku wom nhio wo po tin kalwok men. U tulu wom hu sakalngin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men tin yang sakal taku, ‘Min kehngin ta po tin wa endara si ta sun men men nhum epo min kehngin ta po tin wa endara hang sun men ako.’”
44020036	A-Pol sakal wungin tin mosop imen li klet, anima yang powut ko suul si yang kines Got to po mosop.
44020037	Ma po mosop tirinis kara kut, ma po plong ko kasum a-Pol wut ma po turumum suu yang,
44020038	epo po mi hi urut i weh epo sakalngin tin yang sakal i epo po ku ion mara yang kyok akomen. Ma po pau yang li wo imut.
44021001	Li klet ma wungin si nuk ti, epo pim a yok silang po ma imut li pol, men pim a saa siik li pol Kos, anima ungunan tin ira sun men pim a li pol Rodes, ma ko pit imen men pim a kyok li pol Patara.
44021002	Ma pim a pon ta imut ta tin taku li Ponisia men, men pim a si won ma pim a li.
44021003	Ma mara pim iis pi Saiprus kut, anima pim a li yek tan ung ewo wili pim tin ekos men, si imut wa pim li Siria, ma pim a li sup Taia; epo ko pit imen kha po taku tal nemokong tin pit wo imut men ko imen.
44021004	Ma pim a ko pon ta po tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men, ma pim a kuk to po ungunan khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen. Ma Emiun Auluungin men pong si po ma po sakal ta a-Pol epo yang men ku li si Yerusalem asin.
44021005	Ma pim a me suuk sii ungunan tin pim a me kuk to po min men, anima pim a yok ma pim a ira soput ta pim li; ma po mosop to titien hi u husani hi tumen pau pim weh li pol wetpo enunu. Ma powut pim ko suul suu wiu ma pim a kines Got.
44021006	Ma pim a wa mi pim si ta al kut, anima pim a si wo imut, si po kyok li mang ta hi.
44021007	Si pim a pyu po muk mukngin ta pim yanga wiu tin pim a yok Taia ma me men, men pim a li pol Tolemais, ma pim a wa mi pim si ta po tin ehuro it men, ma pim a kuk hang po ungunan ta.
44021008	Ma ungunan ta maksin si men pim tin wa ilio pit po a-Pol men yok ma pim a li pol Sisaria, ma pim a li sup mi mang tin ta a-Pilip tin kum epo sakalngin tunus pok put nginan men tin wala in mi po tin eip u ponwal me sup men, ma pim a kuk hang yang.
44021009	Epo yang tin imen in to husanin wala khaut mnal, men ku nuk e li li to po masang kho akomen, men ngyuk pok put wungin kaunngin.
44021010	Ma pim a kuk to ungunan nomoyong kara, anima yang pokngin ta yan Agabus me ko Yudia.
44021011	Ma yang kho me pol ta pim, men yang wa mulu tin a-Pol wat put epon men, ma yang kan kan wilin to sun khin epon, ma yang sakal taku, “Emiun Auluungin sakal ti, ‘Po Yuda tin kuk Yerusalem men ku kan kan yang tin mulu tan iyi ti, ma po ku wa yang sup yanga wili po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men.’”
44021012	Pim a hul sakalngin tin imen, men pim kuru po tin nopuan imen kut tumen, suh mi kinga yang epo yang ku li si Yerusalem asin.
44021013	Kut ma a-Pol ko sakal ti, “Tua ma wom tirinis u wom taku hik put mi ngo? Epo nga hihi kho epo ngo tin ku kan kanngin men, takuma ku tin imen misan som, si epo ngo tin ku hun ili Yerusalem mut eya a-Yesus yan men maksin kut tumen ako.”
44021014	Ma yang ku hul wet pim tin taku phae mi yang men som, ti ma pim a kuk engun, ma pim a sakal taku, “Aku, wungin tin yang tin Akono men min epon men men ku weh si.”
44021015	Ma ungunan tin imen lap kho li, anima pim a hihi endara ta pim ma pim a yok ma pim a li si Yerusalem.
44021016	Kuru po kara api Sisaria tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men li to pim, ma po wa yang ta tin ku pim a li pit ton men, men a-Neson tin api Saiprus men, men yang ta tin ira kotngin kho men.
44021017	Ma pim a li pol Yerusalem, men po tin ehuro it men wa pim to min kehngin.
44021018	Ma ungunan tin ira sun men a-Pol li sup to pim li hang a-Yemis, ma po tin akokono men mosop kuk.
44021019	Ma a-Pol wa min si ta po kut, anima yang pok put ira sun then then tin Got ning i lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo kumang tin yang ning i kho kut men.
44021020	Ma minan tin po hul wungin tin imen po kuk e hihi epo po ku wa yang tin Akono men yan si. Li klet ma po sakal si ta yang taku, “Worok, e ion po Yuda tin wa ilio angan takut tin wo hi phep men, ma po mosop tohuh epo po ku ira wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men weh.
44021021	Takuma po hul wungin mi wo sun epo ngon e kot po Yuda mosop tin kuk lunga sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo po ku wetpo hi wa a-Moses, ma e wo ta po epo po ku mut husani hi wa po ku muk muk ira wungin sinsin tin ta it e it pat wal i me men asin.
44021022	Tumen ma it ku ning ele? Palu walngin men ku palu wal weh ako; epo po hul epo ngon tin kho me in iyi.
44021023	Tumen ma ngon men ku ning wungin tin pim ku wo tap epon men. Wuluk masang khaut mnal kuk hang pim men men wa ngyuk sup wet tung tungngin ta.
44021024	E wa wuluk ma e ning ngon kuma pop yil to wuluk, ma e kul i mut eya wuluk kuma wuluk yeng yeng po ngyuk, kuma po mosop ion i epo wungin tin po hul mi wo sun epo ngon men men lengwal engun, si kuma po ion i epo tuop men muk muk ira soput tin ta wungin sinsin men ma e in siik kut tumen.
44021025	Si po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e wo hi phep men men it pan kisang kho ma it ples po epo po ku ira wungin ta tin tumen asin, si po men ku kuk hin epo endara tin po talu got torokngin enun epon men, u endara tin to enghik men, u li ken nginan tin po ol wut men u elwanngin kut tumen misan.”
44021026	Li klet ma a-Pol wa wuluk tin masang imen, ma ungunan tin ira sun men yang ning wungin tin ku yang si pon yil to mara Got epon men to wuluk kho, anima yang li sup nowhang hut mang auluungin kuma yang pok put ungunan tin elup ta wuluk tin po ngyuk yil ton men ku li hun epon ma talungin ku ningngin epo wuluk then then weh men.
44021027	Ma ungunan khaut eip u ponwal me sup tin imen ku pi om angan, men po Yuda tin api Esia men ion yang tin in nowhang hut mang auluungin men, ma po seh seh mi sun tin wa ilio angan mosop men ma po kasum yang,
44021028	ma po wut hi pit pit taku, “Wom masang tin api Israel men, wom mu nhio wo pim! Yang tin iyi tin kot po masang to sun wala yanga pi ma yang sakal nolongin ewut po masang wala tin ta Got men u wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men u pi tin iyi kut tumen wala iyi; kuru si po wungin tin imen men yang wa po tin Grik men me sup nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men ma po ning i ma pi auluungin tin iyi ko min lengwal ma amiron nginan engun.”
44021029	(Epo kho men po mara hi kon a-Tropimus tin api Epesus men men in to a-Pol mi pi tin nhum imen, ma po phaeng taku a-Pol wa sun kho li sup wo nowhang tin ung hut mang auluungin men.)
44021030	Tumen ma po mosop tin ung pi tin nhum imen mi hi lup si, ma po mhup me to wal, ma po kasum a-Pol, ma po hih yang mi mang auluungin li pol; ma kerek engun ma po sasambal mang auluungin.
44021031	Ma po taku wi a-Pol ko hun angan, men wungin li pol ta phua tin maran pit wo po nolo Rom ilio ta men epo po Yerusalem mosop tin mi hi lup si men.
44021032	Ma kerek engun ma yang tin phuan men espo po elara kara u po tin mara hi pit wo sun men tumen, ma hi mhup li ko hang po. Ma po mara hi kon yang tin phuan men hi po elara tin tumen, men po wo hi anhok wo a-Pol si po ku paplai yang kyok akomen.
44021033	Kut ma yang tin phuan men li tikayung ma yang wa sun, ma yang wo ma po kan kan a-Pol epo esih tin po koklong men khaut ponwal; ma yang kines sun epo yang men are u yang ning ele tumen.
44021034	Ma po kara kuk lunga sun tin wa ilio angan men hau epo endara kara weh u po kara hau epo endara kara weh tumen. Ma phua ku pon tan sinsin irawin ta som epon tin ingutngin pit men, tumen ma yang wo ma po wa a-Pol li sup mi mang tin ta hi elara men.
44021035	Takuma minan tin a-Pol li pol sii engan tin li si mang men men po elara ku lul yang weh, epon tin po wa ilio angan hak nuk po to yang men.
44021036	Epo po masang to sun wala tin wa ilio angan men ira sun to yang ma po hahau ti, “E wa yang lu e wi yang ko hun!”
44021037	Ma po taku wa a-Pol li sup mi mang tin ta hi elara men, men a-Pol sakal si ta phua tin maran pit wo po elara men taku, “Ngo ku sakal tap kara wa pi engun?” Ti ma yang sakal wet sun taku, “Ih, e sakal Grik maksin, wah?
44021038	Tumen ma ngon men ku yang tin Isip e minan ta kho li ma yang seh mi po kara epo hi ku sewut po phuan ma yang muk po tin lek lek sun phuan nginangan khaut khum khum khum mnal (4000) men li pi tin tahunggu men ani men som, wah?”
44021039	Ti ma a-Pol ko wo taku, “Ngo men Yuda ta men api Tasis tin ung wo mulusngin Silisia men, pi tin nga pakuh pongin epo emhong tin tan imen men ku tun ta akomen; ma nga hau nuk sii khi ngon epo ngon ku mang, si nga sakal ta po masang to sun wala kara.”
44021040	Ti ma yang sam wet sun kho kut, anima a-Pol pit put engan ma yang tala po masang to sun wala epo wilin. Ma po homong weh koyang kut, men a-Pol ko sakal ta po ira sakalngin Hibru, ma yang sakal taku,
44022001	”Wom masang tin worok hi u yok hi men tumen, wom hul wet ngo tin ku sakal nuk eya ngo to mara wom homani men.”
44022002	Ma po hul yang tin sakal si ta po ira sakalngin Hibru, men po mosop homong weh koyang. Kut ma yang sakal taku,
44022003	“Ngo men api Yuda ta ako, ma nga khuukngin pi Tasis tin ung wo mulusngin Silisia men, takuma po paruk ngo pi tin nhum iyi sii khi a-Gamaliel, ma nga wa maran ekngin ira sun siik tin ta po inana it men sinsin, ma nga tohuh epo ngo ku ira Got ken wom mosop tin tohuh me homani kut tumen.
44022004	Ngo men ning i lengwal epo po tin ira soput tin iyi weh li hunngin ko epon, kuru nga kan kan po ma nga tet po li sup mi mang tin po kan kan sun li pit min ewin men, men po masang to sun wala to wal.
44022005	Wungin tin imen men ku yang tin kum auluungin ta Got e nhum epo sun kara men kha ku pit wetpo ngo to wungin tin iyi, kuru po akokono tin wa ilio mosop men kut tumen, tin nga wa kisang kara hang hi ku li epo po ehuro it men, ma nga li Damaskus epo ngo ku espo po maksin, aku po li kuk hin imen, men ku nga li kan kan po epo elik tin po koklong men kyok li Yerusalem epon ku wuh won maikngin emhut wungin tin imen.
44022006	Ma wungin si nuk ti, epo nga in e ira soput li pol tikayung pi Damaskus to pi sinang pit bing angan, men kerek engun ma pi mha nhum ta mha me ko wet pi ko hawus ngo ma baul ngo,
44022007	ma nga plong ko mi mulus ma nga hul wut po ta men sakal ta ngo taku, ‘Sol, Sol, tua ma e in e mumhek mi ngo?’
44022008	Ti ma nga ko wo taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men ngon are?’ Ti ma yang sakal ta ngo ti, ‘Ngo men a-Yesus tin api Nasaret men tin e in e mumhek mi ngo men.’
44022009	Ti ma po tin pim a li men ion pi mha tin imen ma lemngin wa po, takuma po ku hul wut yang tin sakal ta ngo men akomen.
44022010	Ti ma nga sakal taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, ngo ku ning i tua?’ Ti ma yang tin Akono men ko wo ta ngo ti, ‘E si ma e lu sup Damaskus, ma ko pit imen men ku po ta pok ngon epo wungin mosop tin hihingin kho epo ngon ku ning i men.’
44022011	Ti ma ngo ku ion pi kyok som epon tin pi mha hambip weh men, tumen ma po tin pim a li to al men yak yak po wili ngo li ma nga li sup Damaskus.
44022012	Ma yang ta yan Ananaias, men lem pit wo Got ira sakalngin tin wungin sinsin wo epon men, ma po Yuda mosop tin ung Damaskus men pok pok wal epo wungin tunus tin yang ning i men,
44022013	men me pol ta ngo; ma yang me pit ma yang sakal ta ngo taku, ‘Worok, Sol, ngon men ku marap ek kyok.’ Ti ma to sinang maran tin imen siik men marango si kon yang.
44022014	Li klet ma Ananaias ko sakal taku, ‘Got tin ta po inana it men won ung wo ngon epo ngon ku pon ta yang min, u marap kon yang tin wungin tan Siik men kut tumen, ma e hul mi wut yang weh.
44022015	Epo ngon men ku si po ta tin pok put wungin ta yang men tin marap kon i u e hul i men kut tumen si ta po masang to sun wala mosop.
44022016	Homani ma e kaeng epo ele? E si wa baptais ma e ning i ma lasin tin tap men ku mlusngin li epo ngon tin ku yuk si wo ya yang tin Akono men.’
44022017	Ti ma wungin si nuk ti, epo nga kyok li Yerusalem ma nga in e kines mi mang auluungin, men tulun hungin ta ngo wiewi al,
44022018	ma nga ion yang men sakal ta ngo taku, ‘E pus engin ma e kerek e lu pol erak Yerusalem, epo po ku hul wet wungin tin e pok put epo ngo men akomen.’
44022019	Ti ma nga ko wo taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, po ion i epo mi mang akotngin mosop men nga kan kan po u nga lek po tin wo hi phep pit wo ngon men tumen ako.
44022020	Ma minan tin po ning i ma a-Stiwen tin hun pit mi ngon men kalolwan yuk yuk ko men men ngo kha maksin pit tikayung ma mi ngo then to po tin wi yang ko hun men, u nga haum eya moolngin ta po kut tumen.’
44022021	Ti ma yang sakal wet ngo taku, ‘E yok ma e lu, epo ngo ku tih ngon lu epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men tin kuk hin men.’”
44022022	Po hul wet yang me pol put sakalngin tin yang sakal epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, khama po wut hi si ma po sakal taku, “Wom wa yang tin wungin tan in tumen yang wo mulusngin, epo yang ku tunus epon ku in akomen!”
44022023	Tumen ma po kuk e wut hi pit pit u po kakak moolngin tin po phini nuk po sun men ko, u po tep nekokwa si wet pi kut tumen,
44022024	men yang tin phuan e maran pit wo po elara Rom men wo epo po ku wa sun me sup mi mang tin ta hi elara men, ma yang wo epo po ku paplai yang ma po kines mi yang tunus, kuma yang pon ta wungin sinsin tin po yuk ase ewut yang epon men.
44022025	Takuma po kuk e kan kan yang to elik bulmakau elitan kara, men a-Pol ko sakal ta yang tin maran pit wo po elara khum khum ta (100) men tin pit tikayung men taku, “Iyi, men wungin sinsin ta wom Rom epo wom ku paplai po ta tin po Rom pakuh pon epo emhong tin ta hi men si wom ku ples wungin tan kho akomen, wah?”
44022026	Ti ma yang tin maran pit wo po elara khum khum ta (100) men hul wungin tin imen, men yang li pok sun tin maran pit wo hi men taku, “Marap pit mi wungin tin e ning i imen, epo yang tin imen men po Rom kha pakuh pon epo emhong tin ta hi men ako.”
44022027	Tumen ma phua tin imen me kines a-Pol taku, “E pok ngo, epo ngon e po Rom pakuh po ngon epo emhong tin ta hi men, wah?” Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Wai.”
44022028	Ti ma phua ko wo taku, “Ulu nhum kha nga kul po Rom tin ku pakuh po ngo epo emhong tin ta hi men.” Takuma a-Pol ko wo taku, “Si ngo men ko khuukngin pit mina po Rom tin pakuh po ngo epo emhong tin ta hi men ako.”
44022029	Tumen ma kerek engun ma po tin taku kines mi yang angan men wo hi anhok wo yang, kuru phua tin maran pit wo hi men lem maksin kut tumen, epon tin yang hul epo sun tin po Rom pakuh pon epo emhong tin ta hi men, u epon tin yang kan kan sun kho men tumen.
44022030	Si ungunan ta kyok yang taku pon tan sinsin tin irawin weh e po Yuda wa wungin pit po yang epon men, tumen ma yang plos elik tin sun kan kanngin epon men li, si yang wo maran ko klat epo po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po Kaunsil tin ta hi men kut tumen mosop men ku me nuk to mara yang, anima po wa a-Pol ko pit to mara po.
44023001	Kut ma a-Pol maran tuk pit wo po Kaunsil ma yang sakal taku, ‘Wom masang tin worok hi men, nga in to mi ngo tin ples wungin om po ngo to mara Got men kha me pol homani kut i.”
44023002	Ti ma Ananaias tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men wo ta po tin nuk tikayung a-Pol men epo po ku psat wo yang,
44023003	anima a-Pol ko sakal ta yang taku, “Got ku wi ngon, ngon tin ken lahembengin ta tin po pan pon po kal wetpon engun men. Epo e ung epo ngon ku ples wungin ta ngo ira wungin sinsin, si e wo epo po ku wi ngo hik put wungin sinsin, wah?”
44023004	Ti ma po tin nuk tikayung men ko sakal taku, “Yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men ani ku e sakal lengwal epon men, wah?”
44023005	Ti ma a Pol ko sakal taku, “Ih, worok hi, nga pong epo yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men ako; epon men sakalngin ta panngin nuk taku, ‘ E in aku e sakal lengwal epo po ta tin maran pit wo po masang wala tin tap men asin.’”
44023006	Si minan tin a-Pol ion i epo po maran min kara men hi Sadyusi u po maran min kara men hi Parisi tumen men yang yuk si awon mi po Kaunsil taku, “Wom masang tin worok hi men, ngo men Parisi ta, wiru yang Parisi ta, ma pit mi hoo mingin tin nuk epo khekngin mi hunngin kyok si tunus men kha po ples wungin ta ngo epon men.”
44023007	Yang sakal wungin tin imen kut, khama heek walngin ta si lunga po Parisi to sun Sadyusi, ma palu walngin tin nhum imen pok mi engin.
44023008	Epo po Sadyusi wo epo khekngin kyok si men pi om, u tihngin u emiun men pi om kut tumen, si po Parisi pok put wo phepngin ta hi epon mosop.
44023009	Tumen ma po wa wungin tumuyup ta al pit pit awon engun, ma po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan tin hi Parisi men si nuk ma po tohuh wo sakalngin ma po sakal taku, “Pim ku pon ta wungin lengwal ta in mi yang tin iyi som; si taku emiun ta wa tihngin ta sakal si ta yang, men kuli?”
44023010	Po nuk e heek wal li heek walngin si nhum weh, men yang tin phuan e maran pit wo po nolo Rom maran min ta men lem epon akuli po nak wal a-Pol li yang put mut, tumen ma yang wo ta po nolo maran min ta epo po ku li ko ma po nak yang amhees lunga sun, ma po wa yang kyok li sup mi mang tin ta hi nolo men.
44023011	Si pi luk tin ira sun men men yang tin Akono men li pit porili sun a-Pol, ma yang sakal taku, “Pol, mip pit nhing, epo marap ten ten to sakalngin ta ngo pok put nginan Yerusalem kho, ma tumen kut kha kuli e iso pok put epo pi Rom maksin kut tumen ako.”
44023012	Li klet ma pi mhangin ko yang kut, anima po Yuda kara ko sakal lang po ngi al ma po tuo hi tung tung mara al, ma po sakal epo po ku ii enda aiingin wa po ku um som weh li po wi a-Pol ko hun, wa taku pi angun, men ku Got ngil ngil po.
44023013	Epo po kara khum mnal (40) u weh li si kha hihi i epo wungin tin imen.
44023014	Ma po li pol ta po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po tin akokono men kut tumen, ma po wo taku, “Pim a wa pim sup mi tung tungngin nhum ta, epo pim ku ii endara som weh li pol minan tin ku pim a wi a-Pol ko hun men weh, wa taku pi om, men ku Got ngil ngil pim.
44023015	Tumen ma homani men wom to po tin Kaunsil men lu sakal wa wa mi phua tin maran pit wo po nolo Rom maran min ta men epo a-Pol ku wangin me ko epo wom to pi kingkauk, ken wom taku mara wom pit mi wungin kara kyok pit mi yang, si pim men ku hihingin nuk kuma pim a wi yang ko hun minan tin yang taku me tikayung men.”
44023016	Takuma a-Pol wiehun tin elut khuuk i men hul put po tin ku kakaun nuk ma wi yang men, men yang li sup mi mang tin ta po nolo men, ma yang li pok sun a-Pol epon.
44023017	Kut ma a-Pol yuk po elara tin hi mara hi pit wo po nolo Rom maran min khum khum ta (100) men ta me, yang sakal taku, “E wa yang tin nerengin imen lu epo phua tin maran pit wo wom men, epo yang in to wungin ta tin ku yang pok sun epon men.”
44023018	Tumen ma yang wa sun ma yang muk sun li epo sun tin phuan men, ma yang sakal taku, “A-Pol tin kan kanngin men yuk ngo li hang i ma yang kines ngo epo ngo ku wa yang tin nerengin iyi me hang ngon. Yang in to sakalngin kara tin ku yang sakal i tap men.”
44023019	Tumen ma phua isum po wili sun ma ngong li woringi pi, ma yang kines sun ta tuon taku, “Wungin tin tua ngon taku pok ngo epon?”
44023020	Ti ma yang ko sakal taku, “Po Yuda mi hi then epo po ku kines ngon epo ngon ku wa a-Pol li ko epo Kaunsil tin ta hi men to pi kingkauk, e ken po taku mara hi pit mi sakalngin tunus weh epo yang.
44023021	Takuma e hul wet po asin, epo po kara khum mnal (40) u weh li si men kekek nuk e kaeng yang, men po tin tuo hi e wa hi sup mi tung tungngin ta epo po ku ii endara wa um tumen som weh li pol minan tin ku po wi a-Pol ko hun men, wa po wo epon taku pi angun, men ku Got ngil ngil po; ma homani men po hihi, ma po kaeng ngon tin ku sakal wungin ta tin ku si kuk mara po epon men.”
44023022	Tumen ma phua mang ta yang tin wahin men li, ma yang wo ta sun taku, “E pok po ta epo ngon tin mu pok ngo epo wungin tin iyi asin.”
44023023	Si yang tih wungin epo wulong ponwal tin mara ngong pit wo po nolo Rom maran min khum khum ta (100) men, ma wulong kho me, yang sakal ti, “Mom hihi po elara khaut khum khum ponwal (200), u po elara tin saa wo hos men khaut khum ponwal me sup (70), u po elara tin kasum pali men khaut khum khum ponwal (200) maksin kut tumen, kuma po li Sisaria to pi luk tin po hoin mon wal ton men,
44023024	kuru mom hihi hos kara tin ku wom wa a-Pol si ung won ma wom pau yang li anga tunusngin li pol ta a-Peliks tin phuan e maran pit wo po men.”
44023025	Kut ma yang pan kisang ta to wungin ti,
44023026	“Ngo a-Klaudias Lisias kha pan kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon tin akonoan weh tin phuan a-Peliks men. Pi mhangin tunus.
44023027	Yang tin imen po Yuda kasum i ma tikayung epo yang ku hun yanga wili po. Takuma nga me to po nolo maran min ta ma nga palolo yang, epon tin nga hul kho epo yang tin iyi men it Rom kha pakuh pon epo emhong tin ta it men.
44023028	Ma nga taku pon tan sinsin tin po wa wungin pit po yang epon men, ma nga wa yang li pit to mara Kaunsil tin ta hi men.
44023029	Ma nga pon tan sinsin epo po wa wungin pit po yang pit mi kinesngin epo wungin sinsin tin ta hi men kara engun, si po ku wa wungin pit po yang ta weh tin ku yang hun wa po kan kan yang epon men akomen.
44023030	Li ma po pok ngo epo po Yuda haum epo yang kuma po wi yang ko hun, men nga tih yang kerek siik ti epo ngon, kuru nga wo nut po tin wa wungin pit po yang men epo po ku pok put sakalngin to marap tin po wai pit po yang men. E weh pit nhing.”
44023031	Tumen ma po elara ira wungin tin phua wo ta po epon men, ma po wa a-Pol ma po wa yang li to pi luk li Antipatris.
44023032	Ungunan tin pit wetpo sun men si ma po mang ta sun elara tin ung wo hos men ma po iso li to yang, si po tin kara men kyok li mang tin ta hi elara men.
44023033	Si po li sup Sisaria kho kut anima po wa kisang si ta yang tin phuan e maran pit wo po men, kuru po wa a-Pol li pit mara yang kut tumen.
44023034	Ma yang tin phuan men tiik kisang kut, anima yang kines sun epo mulusngin tan sinsin. Ma yang ion i epo sun tin api Silisia men,
44023035	men yang wo ti, “Ngo ku hul wet ngon minan tin po tin wa wungin pit po ngon men kho me pol men.” Ti ma yang wo epo po ku mara hi pit wo yang mi mang ta a-Herot tin ta ta hi phuan men.
44024001	Li klet ma ungunan khaut eip kho li, anima Ananaias tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men men me ko Yerusalem to po tin akokono men u yang ta tin won po elel to sakalngin yan a-Tertullus men kut tumen, men me pok yang tin phuan e maran pit wo pi men epo wungin tin po wai pit po a-Pol men.
44024002	Ma po yuk yang kho me, men a-Tertullus hosi sakalngin tin yang wai pit po a-Pol men, ma yang sakal taku, “Peliks, ngon tin akono weh men, epo ngon kha pim a ung aminis weh men u ngon tin e ion mi wungin tin ku iso si men kho men kha pim tin ung wo mulusngin tin iyi ung tunus weh kut tumen.
44024003	Wungin tin imen men pim a wai kokyok kokyok epo tanu mosop to sam samngin misan.
44024004	Takuma ngo ku huuh sakalngin li nomalak ma mip mokongin pit po ngo asin, tumen ma nga kines ngon amusukngin epo ngon ku ning wungin amunu to pim ma e hul sakalngin kiak kara kyok hang pim.
44024005	Epo pim a pon ta yang tin imen men hosi maikngin ning nginan, u yang kha hosi ekwha nuk lunga po Yuda tin ung yanga pi men, u yang kha nhum ta po Nasarin tin hi kuk enginin mi sun to wo phepngin ta hi weh men kut tumen.
44024006	Kuru yang taku ning i maksin ma mang auluungin ta pim ko amiron nginan engun, ma pim a kasum yang, ma pim taku ples wungin ta yang ira wungin sinsin ta pim weh,
44024007	takuma a-Lisias tin maran pit wo po nolo maran min ta men me to wungin amhees ma yang me nak sun yanga wili pim,
44024008	ma yang wo ta po tin wa wungin pit po yang men ku me epo ngon. Ma tuop ku kines mi yang, men ku e ion i epo wungin mosop tin pim a wai pit po yang men men irawin weh ako.”
44024009	Ti ma po Yuda kut men si nhio wo yang tin wa wungin pit po a-Pol men, ma po heek epo wungin tin mosop imen men tuon kut.
44024010	Kut ma yang tin phuan men mhin kin epo a-Pol ku sakal kara, anima a-Pol sakal wet sun taku, “Nga ion i epo to posan munuman men e ples wungin ta po tin ung wo mulusngin tin iyi, tumen ma mi ngo keh takut epo ngo ku sakal emhut sun kara eya ngo,
44024011	epon taku e kines mi pi mulu, men ku e ion i men irawin weh epo ungunan khaut khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen, si ku kara kyok som, kha mut eya ngo epo ngo tin li si Yerusalem epo ngo ku li uluu Got men.
44024012	Ma po ku pon ta ngo in mi mang auluungin ma ngo ku tuk po ta heek wal wa nga seh po ewhat po tin wa ilio angan men akomen, men ku nga ning i maksin mi mang akotngin tin ung e li li men wa mi pi Yerusalem akomen kut tumen.
44024013	Kuru wungin tin po wai pit po ngo homani men ku po nes wungin weh akomen.
44024014	Si tin iyi kha nga pok put si tap men, epo ira Soput tin po wo epon e maran min enginin kara men kha nga ning kumang auluungin tin ta yok hi men, ma wo ngo nuk wet wungin mosop tin panngin nuk mi Wungin Sinsin tin ta a-Moses men u mi po Pokngin kut tumen.
44024015	Ma nga in to hoo mingin ta ngo tin pit wo Got men weh, tin po tuo hi wo hi nuk wet men, epo po tin huu kho men kuli khek kyok si, men po tin wungin ta hi siik men u po tin wungin ta hi ku siik som men tumen mosop men ku kekhek kyok si.
44024016	Wungin tin imen men irawin ako, tumen ma nga tohuh kokyok epo mi ngo ku ples wungin ta mi ngo epo lasin tin ku nga ning i epo Got u po tunus ta tumen men ku om.
44024017	Ma posan munuman kho li ma homani nga kyok me kuma nga tet talungin tin epo min sukngin men u talungin kara kut tumen si ta po tin pim a khuuk wal Yuda men,
44024018	men nga in e ning i tin imen ma po Yuda kara api Esia me pon ta ngo tin po ngo yil to mara Got kho kut hut mang auluungin men, si ngo ku in to po wa ilio angan kara wa ngo ku seh po ewhat po kara akomen.
44024019	Tunus epo po tin imen tuo hi kha ku me nuk marap men kuma po tuo hi ku wa wungin ta pit po ngo, men ku po pok put.
44024020	Wa pi engun, men ku po tin nuk iyi tuo hi pok put endara ta tin po pon tan lengwal in po ngo minan tin nga pit to mara Kaunsil tin ta hi men,
44024021	si sakalngin then ta misan kha nga pit lunga po ma nga yuk i ti, “Khekngin kyok si ta po tin huu kho men kha wom ples wungin ta ngo pit min homani men.’”
44024022	Takuma a-Peliks wa maran ekngin tunus long epo Soput tin imen kho, tumen ma yang hul wungin tin mosop imen, men yang al mi elup li to pi ungunan ta kyok, ma yang sakal taku, “A-Lisias tin maran pit wo po nolo men ku me ko, men ku nga pok put i tin mi ngo wai epo ngo ku ples i ta wom men.”
44024023	Tumen ma yang wo maran ko klat ta sun tin maran pit wo po nolo Rom khum khum ta men epo yang ku maran pit wo a-Pol tunus ma yang ku mang ta sun in e won pias engun mi mang, kuru yang wo ta sun epo yang ku uluu po tin tita hi men ta tin ku me nhio wo yang epo endara ta wa tuh wo yang tumen asin.
44024024	Li klet ma ungunan kara kho li, anima a-Peliks me to titien e-Drusila tin api Yuda men, ma yang yuk a-Pol me, yang hul mi wo sun epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Krais men.
44024025	Ma a-Pol in e maran pit mi sakalngin to sun epo wungin tin siik men, u po tin ku karuk hi tunus men, u wungin ples nginan tin ku iso si men kut tumen, ma a-Peliks lem, ma yang ko wo taku, “E lu in wet, si wo ngo pias kara sulung, men ku nga tih wungin epo ngon kyok.”
44024026	Si minan tin imen a-Peliks hoo min pit wo sun a-Pol taku wa ulu kara si ta sun, kuma yang plos sun li. Tumen ma yang tih wungin epo sun nang nang me ngong sakal.
44024027	Takuma posan ponwal kho li kut, anima a-Porsius Pestus me wiewi a-Peliks; ma a-Peliks taku ning min sukngin ta epo po Yuda kuma po mi hi tunusngin pit po yang, tumen ma yang mang ta a-Pol iso kan kanngin in.
44025001	Kut ma a-Pestus kho me khin kah wo pi tin ku yang maran pit won men, anima ungunan miuk mili ma yang yok Sisaria li si Yerusalem.
44025002	Kut ma yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men u po tin nunhum kara kuk mi sun tin hi Yuda men kut tumen men me pok put wungin tin po wai pit po a-Pol men, ma po hau nuk sii khi a-Pestus,
44025003	ma po kines yang epo min sukngin ta ewut a-Pol, epo yang ku yuk a-Pol me Yerusalem, si kuma po kaun nuk ira so kuma po wi yang ko hun.
44025004	Takuma a-Pestus sakal wet po epo a-Pol men ku po iso mara hi pit won Sisaria, si epo a-Pestus tuon ku iso li Sisaria angan.
44025005	Ma yang sakal taku, “Tumen ma po tin wo wom nuk wet hi lunga wom men misa hi kha ku li ko to ngo ma wa wungin pit po yang tin imen, kuma it ion i epo yang men to lasin ta wa men.”
44025006	Kut ma a-Pestus iso in lunga po to ungunan eip ponwal u kara kut tumen, anima yang kyok li ko Sisaria. Ma enal ta kyok si, men yang li ung wo ehus tin po phuan ples wungin won men, ma yang wo epo a-Pol ku po wai me.
44025007	Ma a-Pol kho me pol, men po Yuda tin me ko Yerusalem men me nuk baul yang, ma po wa wungin munuman tin mamaik men los a-Pol, tin po ku nes wungin epon weh akomen.
44025008	Si a-Pol sakal wet po eyan tuon taku, “Ewut wungin sinsin tin ta po Yuda men, wa ewut mang auluungin, wa ewut Sisa tumen men ku nga ning lasin ta epon akomen.”
44025009	Takuma a-Pestus taku ning min sukngin ta epo po Yuda kuma po mi hi tunusngin pit po yang, tumen ma yang sakal wet a-Pol taku, “Iyi, mip epo ngon ku lu si Yerusalem ma ko pit imen men ku e ples wungin to mara ngo pit mi wungin tin mosop imen, wah?”
44025010	Ti ma a-Pol ko wo taku, “Nga pit mara ehus tin ta Sisa e po ung won ma po ples wungin won men kut, men pi tunus tin wungin ta ngo ku plesngin epon men kha iyi. Ngo ku ning lasin ta epo po Yuda akomen, men tuop ion i tunus maksin kut tumen ako.
44025011	Epon taku nga ning wungin tin ku siik som men ta, wa nga ning wungin ta tin tunus epo ngo ku hun epon men, men ku nga heek epo ngo tin ku hun som men akomen; si taku lasin om mi sakalngin tin po tin iyi wai pit po ngo men, men ku po ta wa ngo sup yanga wili po akomen. Nga hau si wo Sisa.”
44025012	Ti ma a-Pestus sakal to po tin hi nhio wo al to wungin ples nginan men, anima yang ko sakal wet sun taku, “Ngon men hau si wo Sisa kut, ma Sisa kha ku e lu epon men!”
44025013	Kut ma ungunan kara kho li, anima Agripa tin sinkhaung men ngong e-Bernis me pol Sisaria kuma wulong wa mi ngong si ta a-Pestus.
44025014	Ma wulong in imen to ungunan munuman kho, anima a-Pestus las wungin tin po wai pit po a-Pol men si to mara yang tin sinkhaung men, ma yang sakal taku, “Yang ta a-Peliks mang tan kan kanngin in iyi,
44025015	men po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po tin akokono ta po Yuda men kut tumen pok ngo epon minan tin nga li in ili Yerusalem men, ma po kines ngo epo ngo ku wo los po yang epo yang men ku hun.
44025016	Po tin imen nga ko sakal ta po ti, ‘Men ku wungin ta pim Rom epo pim ku wo los po po ta epon ku hun kho epo po tin sun hik put wungin pit won men ku mara ngong sak wal to po tin wa wungin pit pon men, ma pi put iso nuk epo po ku sakal emhut wungin eyan tuon pit mi wungin tin po wai pit pon men akomen.’
44025017	Tumen ma elup tin pit wetpo sun men si, ma po me palu wal kut, men ngo ku iak som, nga li ung wo ehus tin ta wungin ples nginan men ma nga wo epo po ku wa yang me sup.
44025018	Yang tin imen po tin wa wungin pit pon men si nuk, men ku po wa wungin tin pit po yang men men ku ken sun tin nga phaeng won men akomen.
44025019	Awu. Po kuk to kinesngin kara pit mi wo phepngin tin ta hi weh men, u pit mi yang ta tin yan a-Yesus men, tin hun ma a-Pol heek epon tunus in men.
44025020	Ma nga kingung mi engin pit mi kinesngin tin tumen, tumen ma nga kines yang epon taku yang min epon, men ku yang li si Yerusalem ma ko pit imen kha ku wungin plesngin pit mi sakalngin tin imen.
44025021	Takuma a-Pol hau si wo pim epo pim ku iso mara pim pit wo yang li Augustus tuon kha ku pias po wungin ta sun taku wungin e tunus wa lengwal wa men, tumen ma nga wo epo po ku iso mara hi pit wo yang li pol minan tin ku nga tih yang li epo Sisa men.”
44025022	Tumen ma Agripa sakal si ta a-Pestus taku, “Mi ngo epo tuo ngo ku hul wet yang kut tumen.” Ti ma a-Pestus ko wo taku, “To pi king kauk men ku e hul wet yang.”
44025023	Tumen ma pi king kauk ko yang ma Agripa ngong e-Bernis me sup to moolngin tin epo sasayihngin men ma kho li sup mang tin po hul sakalngin min men to po nolo tin nunhum men u to po masang tin ya hi pos e api tin nhum imen kut tumen, anima a-Pestus wo ma po wa a-Pol me sup.
44025024	Kut ma a-Pestus ko sakal taku, “Agripa, ngon tin sinkhaung men, u po masang tin wala it nuk iyi homani kut tumen, wom ion yang tin imen tin po Yuda wa ilio angan mosop tin ung ili Yerusalem kuru ko pit iyi kut tumen hau si wo ngo, ma po hau pit awon epo yang ku tunus epon ku iso in akomen.
44025025	Takuma ngo ku pon ta lasin ta tin ku yang hun epon men akomen, kuru yang tuon yuk si wo Sisa kut tumen, tumen ma mi ngo wai epo ngo ku tih yang li.
44025026	Si ngo ku in to wungin anuh ta tin ku nga pan i li epo yang tin nhum ta ngo men epo sun tin iyi akomen. Tumen ma nga wa yang me pol to mara wom, kuru weh me pit to mara ngon tin sinkhaung Agripa men, kuma sulung epo it tin kines mi yang tunus weh men, anima nga in to sakalngin kara tin ku nga pan i men.
44025027	Epo nga ion i men sinsin om epon tin taku nga tih po ta tin kan kanngin men li, si ngo ku pan wungin kara tin po wai pit pon men akomen.”
44026001	Kut ma Agripa ko sakal ta a-Pol taku, “Pim a mang tap si tuop sakal kara mut eyap.” Tumen ma a-Pol wilin li pol, si yang ko sakal eyan tuon taku,
44026002	“Agripa, ngon tin sinkhaung men, nga ion ngo ken emhong tin ta Got men ko po ngo epo ngo ku sakal homani mut eya ngo to marap epo wungin mosop tin po Yuda wai pit po ngo men,
44026003	men tunus weh epo ngon tin marap ek wungin tunus tin sinsin u tin to kinesngin tumen tin mosop nuk epo po Yuda men. Tumen ma nga hau nuk sii khip epo ngon ku marap ain si e hul wet ngo wet.
44026004	Wungin tin nga in e iran wo mulus minan tin nga iso hoin men, tin nga in e iran wo maran lunga po Yuda tin pim a khuuk wal then ili Yerusalem men, men po Yuda mosop pon tan ako.
44026005	Po ion ngo ewo maran ma me, men taku po mi hi epo po ku pok put, epo kho men ira wo phepngin ta pim Yuda, men pim a pok mi engin ma pim kara kuk ma ira wo phepngin tin ta pim Parisi men, tin siik weh men.
44026006	Ma homani nga pit ma po ples wungin ta ngo pit mi hoo mingin ta ngo tin pit wo wungin tin Got sakal i kuk mara po tin inana pim men,
44026007	tin wala khuukngin ta pim sinsin tin eip ponwal u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kuk e ning kumang auluungin to pi luk u to pi mhangin kokyok kokyok to mi hi tin pit nhing men ma po hoo mi hi epo po ku weh li sup min men. Agripa, ngon tin sinkhaung men, epo hoo mingin tin imen siik kha po Yuda wa wungin pit po ngo epon men.
44026008	Tuni ma mi wom wawai ken i e khung nginan epo Got tin ku khek po tin huu kho men kyok si men?
44026009	Irawin, epo kho ma nga phaeng taku ngo men ku weh ning wungin maran kiring kiring ewut ya a-Yesus tin api Nasaret men.
44026010	Wungin tin imen wala nga ning i kho ili Yerusalem men, ma nga wa emhong mi wo po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men ma nga kan kan po munuman mi sun tin auluungin men mi mang tin po wo hi maik hi min ewin men, kuru minan tin po lekngin ko huu men nga psik sakalngin tin ta ngo men ko ewut po maksin kut tumen.
44026011	Ma nga in e mumhek mi po kokyok kokyok mi mang akotngin mosop tin ung e li li men ma nga taku ning i ma po ton mi a-Yesus engun; ma ya ngo sal pit wo po hambip takut kha nga ira po weh li pol pi tin nunhum kara e ung e li li wetpo mulusngin tin ta pim men ma nga mumhek mi po pi tin imen maksin kut tumen.
44026012	Nga in e ning wungin tin imen ma minan ta ma nga ira soput tin li Damaskus men to emhong tin po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men pakuh po ngo ma po tih ngo ton li men.
44026013	Auweh, ngon tin sinkhaung men, to pi sinang pit bing ma nga ira soput li, men nga ion pi mha ta me ko wet pi, men mha weh epo sinang, men mha ko hawus ngo ma baul ngo u po tin pim a li men maksin kut tumen.
44026014	Ma pim mosop a poplong ko wo mulus kut, men nga hul wut po ta sakal ta ngo ira sakalngin Hibru ti, ‘Sol, Sol, tua ma e in e mumhek mi ngo? Men khung nginan epo ngon tin ku khip pul wo sa tin hut keng keng e ngo taku tus ngon epon men.’
44026015	Ti ma nga ko wo taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, ngon are?’ Ti ma yang ko wo ti, ‘Ngo men a-Yesus, tin wala e in e mumhek mi ngo men.
44026016	Si e khek si pit ewo khip; epo nga si put plo nginan tap epo sinsin tin iyi, kuma wo ngo ung wo ngon tin ku si kum ta ngo ma e lu pok put wungin tin marap nuk pon kho men u sakalngin tin ngo ku iso suk marap epon men kut tumen,
44026017	ma nga palolo ngon mi po masang to sun wala tin Yuda men, u mi po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kut tumen, tin homani ma nga tih ngon lu epo hi men,
44026018	kuma e ning i ma po mara hi plas, ma e phae po mi pi tin mi ku men li mi pi tin mha men, u mi emhong tin ta a-Nolongin men li epo Got, kumali po wa lasin klok nginan u moolngin kut tumen lunga po tin kuk auluungin epo wo phepngin tin pit wo ngo men.’
44026019	Tumen ma, Agripa, ngon tin sinkhaung men, ngo ku wetpo ngo wa enun yolngin tin marango plal ma nga ion i tin me ko wet pi imen akomen.
44026020	Awu. Si nga pok put muk si ta po tin ung Damaskus u ung Yerusalem men kut tumen, kuru wo mulusngin Yudia sup e klet, anima li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, kuma po wetpo hi wa lasin ta hi, si po phae hi li epo Got, ma po ning wungin tin siik to po tin phae mi hi men.
44026021	Sinsin tin imen kha po Yuda kasum ngo mi mang auluungin ma po taku wi ngo ko hun angan men.
44026022	Takuma nga wa nhio wongin hang Got kha nga pit nhing weh me pol homani, ma nga pok put sakalngin si ta po tin ya hi om men u si ta po tin ya hi pos men kut tumen, si ngo ku sakal ira wungin enginin ta som, si ira sun tin po pokngin u a-Moses tumen sakal i epon ku iso si men,
44026023	tin po pok pok epo Mesaia ku wuh wungin weh, u yang kha tin ku khek si muk mi po tin huu kho men, ma yang pok put pi tin mha men si ta po masang to sun wala tin api Yuda men, u si ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kut tumen.”
44026024	Ma a-Pol iso sakal sakalngin tin imen mut eyan, men a-Pestus wut pit pit takut, ma yang sakal taku, “Pol, ngon men mengengin wa ngon! Maran ekngin hambip tin tap men kha ning i ma mengengin si tap men!”
44026025	Takuma yang ko wo taku, “Pestus, ngon tin akono weh men, mengengin ku wa ngo akomen, si nga sakal ira wungin tin irawinan u to mhi ngo tin ek tunus men kut tumen ako.
44026026	Epo yang tin sinkhaung e nga sakal kamlas i ewo maran imen men ion wungin tin mosop imen ako; epo wo ngo phep epo wungin tin imen ku ta kis to mara yang akomen, epo wungin tin mosop imen ku ningngin woringi pi akomen.
44026027	Agripa, ngon tin sinkhaung men, iyi, ngon e wop phep pit wo po pokngin, wah? Epo nga ion i epo ngon men wop phep ako.”
44026028	Ti ma Agripa ko wo ta a-Pol taku, “Tikayung ma ngon ku wa wa mi ngo ma nga si Kristen.”
44026029	Ti ma a Pol ko sakal ta sun ti, “Ngo taku kines Got epon men ku tikayung angan kuru yek homani men ku misap som, si po mosop tin hul wet ngo homani men ku kuk ken ngo men, takuma esih tin nga kan kanngin epon iyi misan men ku wom kan kanngin epon asin.”
44026030	Yang sakal wungin tin mosop imen li klet, anima yang tin sinkhaung men si pit, kuru yang tin phuan men, u e-Bernis, u po tin nuk to sun men kut tumen.
44026031	Ma po osong li nuk ta tuo hi, men po sakal lunga hi ta tuo hi taku, “Yang tin imen ku ning wungin ta tin ku yang hun epon wa yang kan kanngin epon men akomen.”
44026032	Kut ma Agripa sakal ta a-Pestus taku, “Taku yang tin imen ku hau si wo Sisa som, men ku yang plosngin li won pias kho ako.”
44027001	Ma po ples sakalngin epo pim ku wa imut li Itali kut, anima po wa a-Pol hi po kara tin hi kan kanngin pit to al men li sup yanga wili yang ta yan a-Yulius, tin phuan e maran pit wo po nolo Rom khum khum ta (100) tin hi kuk mi ilio tin ta Ogastas tin sinkhaung ta po Rom men.
44027002	Ma pim a si wo imut api Adramitium ta, ma pim a yok ma pim a li, epo pim taku li sup sup pi tin ung e li li suu wiu tin ta sun Esia men; ma Aristarkus tin hi Masedonia e api Tesalonaika men men li to pim.
44027003	Li pi king kauk ko yang anima pim a li sup Saidon. Ma a-Yulius ning i tunus epo a-Pol, ma yang mang ta sun li won pias kuma yang li hang po tin hi tita hi men kuma po mara hi pit wo yang.
44027004	Ma pim a yok ko pit imen li pol malang, men pim a kaun tonu pi Saiprus, epo eip pit ma li song e mara pim.
44027005	Ma pim a saa yanga wiu tin ta pi Silisia to sun Pampilia men, li ma pim a li sup pi Maira, men pi nhum ta tin ung wo mulusngin Lisia men.
44027006	Ko pit imen yang tin phuan men pon ta imut api Aleksandria ta tin taku li Itali men, ma yang wa pim si won.
44027007	Ma imut saa hin hin to ungunan kara kho, anima pim a khuk po engin ma pim a li pol tikayung pi Kunidus, epo eip iso klet epo pim tin ku li men, tumen ma pim a saa tonu pi Krit li pol tikayung pi Salmone.
44027008	Ma pim a khuk po engin li yek ta pi tin imen, anima pim a li pol pi ta po sikian Pi Suu Wiu Maran Tunus, men ung tikayung pi Lasia.
44027009	Li klet ma elup kara mili kut, kuru pim tin taku saa wo imut men men homani ma pim a saa min hunngin kut tumen, epo elup tin po Yuda suuh mi hi to endara aiingin men kho li kut, tumen ma a-Pol wo nuk po,
44027010	ma yang sakal taku, “Apo, nga ion i kho epo saangin tin ta it iyi men kuli mumhekngin si min u nemokong munuman men ku kis kis kut tumen, si men ku nemokong to imut misan akomen. Awu. Si men tunusngin ta it kut tumen.”
44027011	Takuma phua tin maran pit wo po elara men won nuk wet sun tin luum to imut men u yang tin imut tan men kut tumen weh, si yang ku won nuk wet sakalngin tin a-Pol sakal i men weh akomen.
44027012	Ma mi wiu lunga pi tin imen men ku tunus epo pim ku kaun tonu epo pi tin ku puus me epon men akomen, tumen ma po tin munuman kara men wo nuk sun epo pim ku yok wo imut ko pit imen ma pim a li, epon taku tumen, men ku pim a weh li pol Piniks, men mi wiu lunga pi Krit ta tin osong li ung lunga pi esaul u nekip siin u osong li ung lunga pi mara naeng u nekip siin kut tumen, kuma pim a kaeng pi tin puus men pi tin imen.
44027013	Kut ma eip tin me esaul angan men pon ayokngin si, men po phaeng taku po ku whal weh li pi tin po taku li epon men, tumen ma po wa endara tin imut ung sui men si, ma po saa tikayung pi Krit.
44027014	Takuma ku maran nomalak akomen, men eip saa me ko po pi ken pi puus nhum ta, men po sikian Yurokludon.
44027015	Ma eip kasum imut, ma imut ku saa sup mi eip akomen, tumen ma pim a mang si eip wa imut to pim li.
44027016	Ma pim a saa tonu pi po nemutmut ta tin po sikian Klauda men, men pim a khung po engin epo pim tin ku kan kan naak tin tun e haum epon ku nhio wo pim men.
44027017	Ma po wai me si wo imut kut, anima po wa elik nunhum kara ko plek wet imut kuma kasum imut kekek; ma po lem epon takuli po kikin li klang ung po namak tin nuk Sirtus men, tumen ma po poplos ilia ta imut me ko, ma esap paiong wal imut to pim ung e li tumen.
44027018	Ma pi puus iso phae phae pim takut, tumen ma pi king kauk ko yang men po ko hosi nemokong tep tep nginan li ko mi wiu.
44027019	Li ma ungunan tin me miuk angan men ma pim a whis endara tin pit wo imut e imut whal ton men ko mi wiu epo wili pim tuon.
44027020	Li ma sinang u awheng tumen ku si put plo nginan som to ungunan tin munuman me men, kuru pi puus tin lek pim men ku tun akomen kut tumen ma hoo mingin ta pim epo pim tin ku palolongin men ung e mih ko li om kut.
44027021	Ma po oos mi hi epo endara aiingin li kho, anima a-Pol si pit emin po ma yang sakal taku, “Apo, taku wom ku hul wet wungin ta ngo kho, ma wom yok pi Krit asin, men ku wom pon ta mumhek mingin wa wom ku tep endara ta wom li ko akomen.
44027022	Si homani men nga wo nut wom epo wom ku mi wom pit nhing, epo enu wom ku ta kis lunga wom akomen, si imut misan.
44027023	Epo pi luk tin iyi men tihngin ta Got tin nga in wet wilin ma nga kum auluungin tan men ko pit tili ngo,
44027024	ma yang wo taku, ‘Pol, e lem asin; ngon men ku po wa ngon weh lu pit to mara Sisa ako; iis, kuru Got min suk ngon ma yang wa tunusngin ta po mosop tin wom mu then wo imut imen si tap kut tumen ako.’
44027025	Tumen ma wom tin masang men, wom kasum mi wom weh, epo wo ngo nuk wet sakalngin ta Got epon men ku si ken tihngin pok ngo epon men ako.
44027026	Epo it men ku iso saa li klang ung po pi po nemutmut ta.”
44027027	Tumen ma pi luk tin khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen men si, men esap iso pat wal pim si u ko mi wiu tin Atria men, ma pi put elup angan men po tin kum wo imut men wo hi hip i ken po e ung e li tikayung mulusngin ta men.
44027028	Ma po psik kaingin ko mi wiu, ma po pon ta wiu tin muut men mita tan khum mnal (40), ma imut sa osong li kara kyok, anima po psik kaingin kyok ko men po pon ta wiu tin muut men mita tan khum miuk (30).
44027029	Kut ma po lem epon takuli pim a kikin li klang ung po enah, tumen ma po whem anka tin isum imut ung men khaut mnal li ko mi wiu wangari imut, si po kuk e kines got tin ta hi then then men epo pi tin ku plas kerek si men.
44027030	Ma po tin kum wo imut men taku mhup silang imut, ma po hihi naak tin tun men li ko mi wiu, ma po khek emuh epo po taku whem anka tin kasum imut ung men kara ko hut imut,
44027031	men a-Pol sakal si ta phua tin maran pit wo po elara men u po elara kut tumen ti, “Taku po tin imen ku kuk wo imut som, men kuli wom palolongin akomen.”
44027032	Tumen po elara li paplah elik tin po kan kan naak epon men, si po mang ta naak ko ung yanga wiu.
44027033	Ma pi taku plas angan, men a-Pol heek epo po mosop ku ii endara aiingin kara, ma yang wo taku, “Homani men ungunan tin khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen tin wom kaeng ma wom iso kuk engun epo wom ku ii enda aiingin men. Epo wom ku wa endara aiingin kara kho som.
44027034	Tumen ma nga suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku ii endara aiingin kara, epon tin imen men epo wom tin ku iso kuk anga tunusngin men, epo yut wom ta men ku plong ko mhi wom ta akomen.”
44027035	Yang sakal i tin imen li klet, anima yang wa beret ta si, yang sam sam Got epon to mara po mosop, ma yang tik tik i kho, anima yang hosin ii nginan.
44027036	Kut ma po mosop miu hi plo, u po wa endara aiingin ta hi tuo hi kut tumen.
44027037	Epo pim mosop tin kuk wo imut men men enu pim khaut khum khum ponwal, u khum ponwal me sup u ta me sup tumen (276).
44027038	Kut ma po ii endara ko kai mi po kut, anima po taku ning i kuma imut malil ma po whem wit ko mi wiu.
44027039	Li ma pi plas ko yang ma po mara hi ko kila mulusngin tin imen; takuma po mara hi kon wiu susun tin to namak men, men po mi hi wai epon taku tumen, men ku po wa imut li sup po namak tin imen.
44027040	Ma po mang ta anka tin kasum imut ung men nuk mi wiu, si po kara poplos elik tin kasum endara tin po phae saangin ta imut epon men; kuru po yuh ilia si mara eip, ma po taku phae imut li sup suu wiu.
44027041	Takuma imut li sup pi ta tin esap ponwal hik me tut wal epon men, ma po wa imut sup li ung pon, ma imut hut li klang ung kut ma ku wonngin kyok akomen, si imut wangarin men pal palngin epo esap tin hik hik amhees me sup men.
44027042	Ma po nolo mi hi wawai epo po ku lek sun tin kan kanngin men ko huu, epon akuli hi ta suu li sup ma saa.
44027043	Takuma phua tin maran pit wo po nolo men taku palolo a-Pol, tumen ma yang wo hik put wungin tin po taku ning i men, ma yang wo ta po tin anga suungin men epo po ku lup wo imut kho li muk kuma po susuu li sup wo mulusngin,
44027044	si po kara tin anga suungin som men men ku hi mosop kara suu wo plang u kara suu wo endara tin ta imut e pal pal men kut tumen. Ma soput tin imen kha po mosop susuu li anga tunusngin li sup wo mulus men.
44028001	Kut ma po susuu li pol anga tunusngin kut, men po ion pi po nemutmut tin iyi men po sikian Melita.
44028002	Ma po tin nopu men ning wungin tunus takut epo pim. Epo po pong yau ta ma po wa pim mosop to min kehngin, epo pi yung pit u pi huk hukan kut tumen.
44028003	Takuma a-Pol tamuk yau hut engul kara me yang wai si wo sun, men tamha lengwal ta me pol epon tin yau mom i men, ma li tuk yang pit po wilin ma li nget kuk po wili yang.
44028004	Ma po tin nopu men ion tamha tin nget kuk po wili yang men men po sakal ta al taku, “Yang tin imen men tin lek po ko huu nginangan men kha imen, aku, yang anga tunusngin mi wiu, takuma got tin ples wungin nuk emin weh men ku mang ta yang iso tunus in akomen.”
44028005	Takuma a-Pol tembe po wilin ma tamha plong ko put ngi yau, si saihngin lengwal kara ku si ta yang akomen.
44028006	Si po kuk e hoo mi hi epo yang tin ku wilin som wa yang tin ku plong kerek ko hun men wa tumen. Takuma po nuk e kaeng li kho weh ma po ku ion tosukngin ta tin ku si ta yang men akomen, men po ko mi hi wiewi al ma po wo epo yang men got ta kha men.
44028007	Kut si pi kara ung e li li baul mulusngin tin imen men ta phua tin nhum epo sun mosop pi po nemutmut tin imen, men yan a-Publius. Yang tin imen wa pim li kuk mang tin ta yang men ma yang ning wungin tunus epo pim to ungunan miuk.
44028008	Si wungin si epo a-Publius wiraman men nuk e saih wo ehus to won tin ngeng ngeng u paphakngin tin to enghik men kut tumen, ma a-Pol li sup ta sun ma yang kines Got, ma yang wilin lup lup si nuk po sun ma yang ning sun si tunus.
44028009	Li klet ma wungin tin imen ningngin kut, men po mosop tin kara hi ung wo pi po nemutmut tin imen tin sasaih men maksin me ma po si turunus kut tumen.
44028010	Po tin imen kut men wa ya pim si epo wungin maran tin kiring kiring men, ma pim taku yok angan, men po me naa pim epo endara tin pim a kalwok epon men.
44028011	Li klet ma namih khaut miuk kho li, anima pim a si wo imut api Aleksandria ta tin got Sus husanin tin hukap men enu ngong nuk hut imut men, men me kaeng pi tin puus men ko pit pi po nemutmut tin imen.
44028012	Ma pim a li sup Sirakyus, ma pim a kuk imen to ungunan miuk.
44028013	Li klet ma pim a yok imen ma pim a baul pi mili pol Regium. Ma ungunan ta kyok si men eip tin me esaul men pit, ma ungunan ta kyok men pim a li pol pi Puteoli.
44028014	Ko pit imen men pim a li pon ta po tin ehuro it men kara, ma po yuk pim li kuk to po to ungunan eip u ponwal me sup tumen. Wungin tin tumen kha pim a li Rom angan epon men.
44028015	Ma ko pit imen po tin ehuro it men hul put pim, men po me pon ta pim weh li li hang nowhang tin po sikian Appi men u Mang Miuk tin po nomisang me pit min men kut tumen. Ma a-Pol ion po, men yang sam sam Got ma yang min pit nhing.
44028016	Li klet ma pim a li pol Rom kut, men yang tin phuan e maran pit wo po nolo Rom khum khum ta (100) men wa po tin kan kanngin men li sup yanga wili sun phuan tin maran pit wo pi tin po nolo tekel i men, si a-Pol men po mang tan in ta tuon to yang nolo ta tin haum eya yang men.
44028017	Li klet ma wungin si nuk ti, sulung epo ungunan miuk men a-Pol yuk po tin ya hi pos mi sun tin hi Yuda men me palu wal. Tumen ma po me palu wal kut, anima yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom masang tin ehurok men, ngo ku ning wungin ta ewut po tin ta it it khuuk wal men wa ewut wungin sinsin tin po inana it khuuk wal ton men akomen, takuma po kan kan ngo ili Yerusalem li sup yanga wili po Rom.
44028018	Po Rom men kines mi ngo tunus kho kut ma po taku mang ta ngo li engun, epo sinsin tin ku po wi ngo ko hun epon men men om.
44028019	Takuma po Yuda iso sakal hik put wungin ta sun, ma soput ku ta maksin nuk akomen, tumen ma nga yuk si wo Sisa, si ku ken nga in to wungin ta weh tin ngo ku wai pit po po tin it khuuk wal men akomen.
44028020	Epo sinsin tin imen kha nga yuk wom kuma nga ion wom ma nga sakal to wom epon men, epo hoo mingin ta po Israel kha nga kan kanngin epo esih tin po koklong iyi.”
44028021	Ti ma po ko sakal ta yang taku, “Pim ku wa kisang ta me Yudia epo ngon wa po tin ehuro it e me iyi men ku me pok wa sakal tun tira lengwal epo ngon akomen.
44028022	Takuma pim a wo taku tunus epo pim ku hul sakalngin mi wo ngon weh epo wungin tin nuk mip weh men. Epo po kara tin hik put it Yuda to wo phepngin ta hi weh iyi men pim a ion i kho epo po sakal lengwal epo sun mili yanga pi.”
44028023	Ma po hihi ungunan ta yang ta kho, anima po munuman me hang yang mi mang tin yang me in min men, ma yang maran ten ten to sakalngin ma yang ples po epo enunu tin ta Got men sinsin, kuru yang wa wungin mi wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men to sun tin ta po pokngin men ma yang taku phae mi po li pit wo a-Yesus kut tumen, hosingin to pi king kauk angan weh li pol to pi luk angan.
44028024	Ma po kara phae mi hi wet sakalngin tin yang sakal i men, si po kara pang po hi.
44028025	Kut ma po ku mi hi then lunga hi som ma po taku yok, men a-Pol ko sakal ta ti, “Emiun Auluungin pok put siik mi wo Aisaia tin pokngin men si ta po tin inana it men
44028026	tin yang sakal taku, ‘E lu epo po masang to sun wala tin imen ma e sakal taku, “Wom ku hul sakalngin, men ku wom hul i, takuma mara wom ku pem siin akomen, u mara wom kon i, men ku wom ion i, takuma mara wom ku iis i min akomen kut tumen.
44028027	Epo po masang to sun wala tin imen ko mi hi mokongin, u kinga po men ko khung nginan epo po tin ku hul men, u po mara hi men po ning i ko klet, epon takuli po ion i epo po mara hi tuo hi u po hul i epo kinga hi tuo hi, u po mara hi pem siin ta mi hi weh, ma po phae, kumali nga mlis saihngin ta po li.”’
44028028	Tumen ma wom men ku ion i weh epo wungin tin po palolongin epon e me hang Got men men tihngin kho li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, ma po men ku hul wet.”
44028029	Ti ma a-Pol sakal sakalngin tin imen li klet, anima po Yuda yok ma heek walngin nhum ta si lunga po tuo hi.
44028030	Kut ma a-Pol in to posan pala musung ponwal mi mang tin yang in min ma yang in e kul i li men, ma yang wa po tin mosop e me hang yang men,
44028031	ma yang sakal amdal misan ma yang pok put enunu tin ta Got men u yang kot po epo wungin tin pit epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen, men ku po ta uluu yang akomen.
45001001	Ngo a-Pol tin kum wo a-Yesus Krais e Got yuk ngo epo ngo ku si paengin ta ma yang wa ngo li in enginin epo po epo ngo ku si pok put pok putngin tunus tin ta Got men.
45001002	Pok putngin tunus tin imen kha kho ma Got wo kuk mara po epon mi wo po pokngin tin tan men mi Panngin tin Auluungin men,
45001003	men pok put wungin epo Wirun, tin wungin tin nuk porili sun tin epo emkusin men, men yang si mi po tin khuuknginin tin ta a-Dewit men,
45001004	si wungin tin nuk porili sun tin epo emiun tin ta wungin auluungin men, men Got pakuh po Wirun to emhong tin nhum men epo yang tin khek kyok si tunus mi po tin huu kho men.
45001005	Mi wo yang kha pim a wa nanaangin u kumang tin ta po paengin men kut tumen, epon kumali hul wet wungin tin si wo wo phepngin men ku si lunga po mosop tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, epon ku yang yan si nhum epon.
45001006	Po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e a-Yesus Krais yuk hi ku si tan men kha wom kuk lunga hi maksin kut tumen ako.
45001007	Kisang tin iyi ti epo wom mosop tin ung Rom e Got min epo wom weh men, tin yang yuk wom epon ku si tin kuk auluungin tan weh men. Nanaangin men ku weh ko ta wom u min wyungin kut tumen, tin me hang Got tin Wiwoli it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen.
45001008	Muk ma nga sam sam Got tin ta ngo men yanga wili a-Yesus Krais epo wom mosop, epon men wo phepngin tin ta wom men men po pok wal put wo mulus koyang sup e klet.
45001009	Epo Got tin nga kum tan to emiu ngo weh mi pok putngin tin tunus e ta Wirun men tuon ion ngo epo ngo ku nhing som, si nga sikia wom kokyok kokyok mi kinesngin tin ta ngo men.
45001010	Nga kines epon taku soput ta nuk, men ku homani weh kut men ku nga pon ta soput ta tin ira mi Got men, tin ku nga ti epo wom epon men.
45001011	Epo mi ngo epo ngo ku ti ion wom weh, kumali nga tet talungin tin emiunan men kara si ta wom, kumali wom kuk nhing weh.
45001012	Men sakalngin ta ngo sinsin nuk ti, epon kuma nga wa pa nhingngin to wom epo wo phepngin tin ta it then men, tin ta wom men, kuru tin ta ngo men kut tumen.
45001013	Ehurok, mi ngo epo wom ku kuk akuli wom pong epo engin epo angan munuman kho men nga hihi wungin ta mi ngo epo ngo ku ti epo wom (takuma soput ta ngo put ko klet kha me pol homani kut i) kumali kumang ta ngo ku kara si enun ung e li li hut sun lunga wom maksin, ken sun tin si enun lunga po tin kara e hi ku khuuk wal Yuda som men.
45001014	Naumngin ta Got men pit wo ngo epo ngo ku pok put sakalngin ta yang epo po Grik, u epo po tin ku Grik som men, u epo po tin mhi hi ek men, u epo po tin ku mhi hi ek som men kut tumen.
45001015	Tumen ma in epo mi ngo mosop, men mi ngo seh seh ta engin epo ngo tin ku pok put pok putngin tin tunus men si ta wom tin ung Rom men maksin kut tumen.
45001016	Epo ngo ku manngin wa ngo epo pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men akomen, epon men kakhangin ta Got epo palolongin ta po mosop tin wo hi phep men, men ta po Yuda muk, kuru ta po Grik maksin kut tumen.
45001017	Epo wungin siik tin ta Got men men lasngin si in pi mlaeng mi pok putngin tin tunus men, men wungin siik ta tin me epo wo phepngin u li epo wo phepngin tumen misan. Wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Wo phepngin kha ku po tin wungin ta hi siik men tunus kuk epon men.”
45001018	Epo yan salngin tin ta Got men me ko wet pi in pi mlaeng, men emhut wungin tin po ku lem pit wo Got som ma po ning i men, u wungin tin ku siik som men kut tumen, mosop tin ta po tunus men, tin po put hi los wungin tin irawin men epo wungin tin ku siik som men.
45001019	Epo wungin tin ku po ion i epo Got men men in pi mlaeng mi po ako, epo Got suk mara po epon kho.
45001020	Epo ewo maran tin Got pho po endara mosop ma me men, men wungin tin yang in ton e ku mara it kon i akomen, men po mara hi iis i nuk epo endara tin ningngin men, men emhong tin ta yang e sindak in men u yang tin Gotan men kut tumen; tumen ma wungin tin ku po kalele i mut eya hi men men pi om.
45001021	Epo po men hop Got kho ako, takuma po ku wa yang yan si ken yang e Got weh men akomen, kuru po ku sam sam yang akomen kut tumen. Awu. Wungin tin po mara hi iran ta mi hi men ko amiron nginan engun, ma mi po tin wungin ulil kuk mi hi men men ko mi ku.
45001022	Po wo taku po e mhi hi ek, takuma po men si mhi hi ulil,
45001023	ma po wiewi moolngin tin ta Got tin ku som e hun ewin men epo endara enun tin maran ken po tunus tin huu ewin men, u ken emon, u li ken nginan tin khin khaut mnal men, u endara tin hih wo mulus men kut tumen engun.
45001024	Tumen ma Got mang ta po si po ngelek wo wungin tin maran kiring kiring men tin nuk ta mi hi men, ma po sup mi wungin tin min lengwal men, kuma po wa manngin si po po elit hi lunga hi tuo hi engun.
45001025	Po men wiewi wungin tin irawin e ta Got men epo torokngin tin nhum men, si po uluu wal u po kum auluungin tumen ta endara tin pho pongin men engun, si po ku ning i epo yang tin pho po endara mosop men akomen. Yang men ku it mosop sam sam i kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin.
45001026	Sinsin tin imen kha Got mang ta po, si wungin tin imen siwil si mi po tin ku po wa manngin ton men. Epo po wala tin ta hi men maksin kut wiewi wungin tin po khuukngin pit minal men, si po ning wungin tin ku po khuukngin pit minal som men epo al.
45001027	Kuru po masang maksin men ning i tumen kut, ma po mang ta wungin tin ku po ning i siik to sun wala men, si po mi hi siwil si epo al tin masang men, men po masang ning wungin tin to manngin men epo sun tin ta hi masang men, ma po wa wungin si po hi tuo hi emhut wungin ulil tin ta hi men siik.
45001028	Ma po ion Got tin ku iso in mi maran ekngin tin ta hi men ken i e ku tunus akomen, tumen ma Got mang ta po, si tulun hungin tin ta po men men pit wo wungin tin lengwal engun men misan, kuma po ning ning wungin tin ku siik som men.
45001029	Epo po mi hi kol epo wungin tin ku siik som men maran kiring kiring tin klet mi po men, men elwanngin, wungin lengwal, maran nesngin, u min lengwal pit wo sun kut tumen; u po mi hi kol epo wungin tin po mi hi heh wet sun men, u wungin tin po taku lek sun ko huu men, heek walngin, wungin amui, u wungin tin po taku mumhek mi sun men kut tumen; u po men sakal kaskas pit wetpo sun nginangan,
45001030	po hik put wungin pit wo sun nginangan, po kuk e mi hi lel Got, po men to wungin amhees, po kuk e mi hi wa hi si pit, po kuk e wangan po hi, po kuk e mara hi ira wungin lengwal homan kara, po kuk e wetpo hi wa sakalngin tin ta po irama hi to eleni hi men,
45001031	po mara hi ku ples wungin tunus akomen, wungin anuh tin ta po e ku sun wo hi nuk wet men men pi om, min epongin ta po men pi om, tulun somngin ta lasin men pi om, u min sukngin ta po men pi om kut tumen.
45001032	Aku, po men ion wungin ples nginan tin ta Got men tin siik men kho, tin wo epo po tin ira wungin tin tumen, men tunus epon ku huu ako. Takuma po kuk e ning wungin tin imen engun, si ku tin imen misan som. Awu. Po men sam wet sun tin ira wungin tin imen maksin kut tumen.
45002001	Tumen ma, tuon, ngon tin tunus men, ngon tin in tua ma e ples wungin nginangan men, wungin tin ku e kalele i wet Got eya ngon men, men pi om. Epo wungin tin e ples i ta po enginin kara men, men e ples wungin ewut ngon tuop kha men. Epo ngon tin ples wungin men ning wungin tin kai sun tin imen ewin ako.
45002002	Si it ion i epo wungin ples nginan tin ta Got men, men ira wungin irawin ma ko po po tin ning wungin tin tumen ewin men.
45002003	Tuon, ngon tin ples wungin ta po tin ning wungin tin tumen, si tuop men ning i kai sun tin po ning i men ewin kut, iyi, e phaeng taku ngon ku meleng wungin ples nginan tin ta Got men, wah?
45002004	Wa wungin tin yang ning i tunus tunus u yang ning i amang epo ngon, u yang wuh lasin tap li maran nomalak men tumen, tin munuman weh men, men e phaeng taku i e amiron nginan engun, si e pong epo wungin tunus tin ta Got men taku wa ngon li kumali e phae mip, wah?
45002005	Takuma e in e ira mip tin khang men, tin ngon ku phae mip som men kha e halung po mumhek mingin tap tuon tin ku si po ngon mi elup tin ta min kakhat sun e wungin ples nginan tin siik e ta Got men ku si in pi mlaeng epon men.
45002006	Epo Got men “ku wa wungin emhut sun ta po then then ira ewi sun tin po ta ning i men siik weh ako.”
45002007	Po tin pit nhing ma tohuh epo wungin tunus ning nginan kokyok kokyok kuma po wa moolngin u ya hi tin pos men u emkusi hi tin ku whuk som men kut tumen, men ku Got wa tunusngin tin sindak men si ta po.
45002008	Si po tin iso tohuh epo po ku ira mi hi ta hi tuo hi, ma pang po hi epo po tin ku ira wungin tin irawin men, si po ira wungin tin ku siik som men, men ku min kakhat sun u mumhek mingin tumen ko po po.
45002009	Won maikngin u miun tuungngin tumen men ku ko po enu po mosop tin tohuh epo wungin lengwal ning nginan men, men po Yuda muk, anima po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen.
45002010	Si moolngin, u po tin ya hi pos men, u min wyungin tumen ku ko po po mosop tin ning wungin tunus men, men po Yuda muk, anima po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen.
45002011	Epo Got men ku in to wungin tin yang ku ples wungin enginin enginin epo po kara ewin men akomen.
45002012	Epo po tin wungin sinsin om epo hi ma hi ning lasin men, aku, wungin sinsin om epo hi, takuma hi mosop men ku iso huuspit ako, u po tin kuk wet wungin sinsin ma hi ning lasin men, men kuli lasin ta hi plesngin epo wungin sinsin tin tuon imen kut tumen.
45002013	Epo po tin hul wungin sinsin men ani ku si kuk siik to mara Got men akomen. Awu. Po tin ira wungin sinsin weh men kha ku Got wo epo hi e kuk siik to mara yang men.
45002014	Epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, tin wungin sinsin om epo hi men, taku po ira mi hi weh tin po khuukngin pit minal ton men ma po ira wungin tin wungin sinsin wo epon men, aku, po tin imen wungin sinsin om epo hi, takuma po tuo hi kuk ken wungin sinsin ta po tuo hi ta men.
45002015	Po tin imen kumang ta wungin sinsin tin panngin nuk mi po men si in pi mlaeng epo hi. Kuru tulun hungin tin ta po e ples wungin mi po nginangan men men pok put sakalngin to sun maksin, ma wungin tin po mara hi iran men kuk e wa wungin pit po hi tuo hi, wa taku tumen som, men nuk eya po tuo hi kut tumen.
45002016	Wungin tin mosop imen ku si minan tin kuli Got ples wungin tin kaunngin nuk mi po tunus men epo a-Yesus Krais ira pok putngin tin tunus e nga pok put men.
45002017	Irawin, epo po sikia ngon men Yuda ma e hing wo wungin sinsin, u e wangan po ngon hing wo Got,
45002018	u e pon ta yang min, u e ion mi sakalngin tin ku tunus weh men kut tumen, epon tin e hul wet kotngin mi wungin sinsin men.
45002019	Ma wop phep epo ngon tuop kha suk mara po tin mara hi mih men epo soput men, u ngon men esul ta po tin kuk pi mi ku men ta,
45002020	u ngon men po tin kot po tin mhin ekngin ta hi om men ta, u po tin kot sun tin hohoin men ta tumen, epon tin e kasum maran ekngin u wungin tin irawin men, tin mosop e kasumngin mi wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men.
45002021	Tumen ma ngon tin kot po tin enginin kara men, iyi, ngon ku kot ngon tuop som, wah? Ngon tin pok put wungin epo po ku tip endara asin men, iyi, e tip endara maksin kut ti?
45002022	Ngon tin wo ti, “ E sup si khi po asin,” iyi, ngon e sup si khi po maksin kut ti? Ngon tin got tororokngin enun e hies pol hut ngon men, iyi, e tip endara tin pit mi mang auluungin tin tan men maksin kut ti?
45002023	Ngon tin wangan po ngon epo wungin sinsin men, iyi, e wa manngin ko po Got epon tin e hik put wungin sinsin men maksin kut ti?
45002024	Epo “Got yan men ton mingin lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men sinsin epo wom,” wala sakalngin tin panngin nuk epon men.
45002025	Wai, epo ngon tin po mut elit ngon men ku nhio wo ngon tuop ako, tin taku e ira wungin sinsin men. Si taku ngon men po ta tin hik put wungin sinsin men, men po tin mut elit ngon men ko ken ngon e ku po mut elit ngon kho som men.
45002026	Tumen ma taku po ta tin ku mutngin som men ira wungin tin sisiik e wungin sinsin wo maran ko klat epon men, men ku yang tin ku mutngin som men, men ku Got ion i ken i e mutngin men kut ti ako, wah?
45002027	Ma po ta tin ku po mut i elit som men, taku ira wungin sinsin weh, men ku ples wungin tap, aku, e in to wungin sinsin tin panngin nuk men u e mutngin kut tumen, takuma ngon men in pit mina po tin hik put wungin sinsin men ta ako, wah?
45002028	Epo yang ta tin Yuda nuk wo eha wo elit engun men ani ku Yuda weh men akomen, kuru wungin tin po mut hi elit hi men ani ku mutngin weh men akomen kut tumen.
45002029	Awu. Po ta tin Yuda e wungin nuk ta min tin kaunngin men kha Yuda weh men. U mutngin tin irawin weh men, men tin nuk ta mi po ta weh men, tin si mi po epo Emiun Auluungin, si ku epo panngin tingit tin hihingin nuk yanga kisang men akomen. Po tin imen sam samngin tin ku po wai ta hi men, men ku me hang po tunus ta akomen. Awu. Si men ku me hang Got weh.
45003001	Si ela ku po Yuda kuk ton tin po ku ut mara sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ton men? Wa wungin tin po mut wal men ku nhio wo po tua?
45003002	Men wungin munuman maran kiring kiring nuk epon ako! Tin li muk epo sun men men ti, epo wungin tin me pol mi wo Got weh men, men yang wai ko ta po kuma po mara hi pit won ta yang.
45003003	Epon taku po kara ku kasum wo phepngin ta hi som, men kuli tua? Iyi, men ku wungin tin po ku wo hi phep som men ning i ma wungin anuh tin ta Got men kuli si enun ung hut som, wah?
45003004	Awu, tin imen men ku pi om weh! Iis, Got men ku weh in to wungin tan anuh ako, aku, po tunus mosop men torok nginangan. Wala sakalngin tin panngin nuk ti, “Kuma po ion ngon men in siik epo sakalngin tin tap men, u e nhien mi po to sakalngin minan tin po taku ples wungin epo ngon men kut tumen.”
45003005	Si taku wungin tin ta it e ku siik som men ning i ma wungin tin siik e ta Got men si in pi mlaeng epon, men ku it wo tua? Iyi, Got men wungin tan ku siik som tin yang taku ning mumhek mingin epon men, wah? (Nga sakal ira wungin tin ta po tunus men engun).
45003006	Awu, tin imen men pi om weh! Epon taku tumen, men kuli Got ples wungin ta po tin ung wo mulus men tua?
45003007	Epon taku wungin anuh tin ta Got men si nhum epo torokngin tin ta ngo men kuma yang yan si epon, tuni ma wungin iso plesngin epo ngo ken ngo e to lasin men?
45003008	Si tunus epo ngon ku sakal ken po kara tin hik put wungin pit wo pim ma po heek epo pim a sakal taku, “It men ku ning wungin lengwal kuma wungin tunus maksin si epon” ti engun, wah? Po tin imen ku huuspit, men wungin plesngin si siik ako.
45003009	Tumen ma it ku sakal tua? Iyi, it Yuda ani ung tunus weh epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, wah? Awu, wungin tin imen men pi om weh! Epo pim a wa wungin pit po po Yuda u po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men lup lup kho epo po mosop men kuk wet lasin ako.
45003010	Wala sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Po tin kuk siik men ku ta in som. Awu. Men pi pi om weh.
45003011	Po tin mara hi ples wungin tunus men ku ta in akomen, u po tin in e hip epo Got men ku ta in akomen kut tumen.
45003012	Awu. Po mosop men li wetpo hi wa soput tin tunus men kho kut, ma po li kuk amiron nginan to al. Po tin ning wungin tunus men ku ta in akomen. Awu. Pi angun weh.”
45003013	“Po emhong a hi men ken uwin tin po kil sun pit min men ta tin sowon tan won pit engun men; to po mamai hi men po ning ning wungin amo epon”; “isaling sut tin makalek men nuk wet wo po elit hi”;
45003014	“po wo hi men kol epo sakalngin tin ku po wo hi mut put sun men u sakalngin makalek kut tumen.”
45003015	“Saangin ung po khi po epo po ku li lek sun ko huu kuma po kalolwa hi yuk yuk ko;
45003016	mumhek mingin u won maikngin tumen men si mi khi po;
45003017	Ma soput tin ku po ung aminis epon men men ku po pon tan angan ta kho som.
45003018	Lemngin tin pit wo Got men men ku in maran min po akomen. Awu. Men pi om.”
45003019	Epo it ion i epo wungin tin tun tira e wungin sinsin wo epon men, men wo ta po tin kuk wet wungin sinsin men ako, kumali po mosop men ku po ping wo hi, ma po mosop tin ung wo mulus men ku me sup wet wungin ples nginan tin ta Got men misan.
45003020	Tumen ma wungin sinsin tin ku irangin men ani ku po tunus ta si in siik to mara Got epon men akomen, epo wungin sinsin kha it ion lasin ta it epon men ako.
45003021	Kut si homani men wungin siik tin me hang Got men, men si in pi mlaeng kut, men si enginin epo wungin sinsin, men kisang tin to wungin sinsin u ta po pokngin men tumen pok put epon,
45003022	men wungin siik tin ta Got e me epo wo phepngin tin pit wo a-Yesus Krais men ako, tin li epo po mosop u ko po po mosop tin wo hi phep men. Epo po ta ku in enginin epo sun akomen.
45003023	Epo po mosop men ning lasin kho ma po kalwok epo moolngin tin ta Got men,
45003024	ma po si kuk siik to mara Got hut emul engun epo nanaangin tin ta yang men epo lasin kiis nginan tin po wo hi pias epon mi Krais Yesus men.
