45003025	Yang men Got wai si in pi mlaeng kuma yang si talungin ta tin ku Got min suk it ma Got klok lasin ta it epo wo phepngin tin pit wo yang kalolan men, kumali Got wa wungin siik tin tan men si in pi mlaeng, epon tin kho ma Got wuh wet lasin tin ta po men ma yang yek ta lasin tin ning ningngin kho men.
45003026	Kuru Got ning i tumen kuma homani maksin kha ku yang wa wungin siik tin tan men si in pi mlaeng men kut tumen, kuma yang in siik ma yang tet wungin siik ko po po ta tin won phep pit wo a-Yesus men.
45003027	Tumen ma sinsin tin ku po ta wangan pon epon men ani a? Awu. Men pi om. Iyi, men pi om epo wungin sinsin tin ia weh? Iyi, men pi om epo wungin sinsin tin po wuh kumang epon men, wah? Awu, men pi om epo wungin sinsin tin ta wo phepngin men ako.
45003028	Tumen ma mara pim ira wungin ti, epo po tunus ta men ku si in siik to mara Got epo wo phepngin weh, si ku epo wungin sinsin ira nginan akomen.
45003029	Wa tua? Got men ta po Yuda misa hi? Epo yang men Got ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen ako, wah? Wai, yang men Got ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen ako.
45003030	Epo Got men then tin ku tet wungin siik ko epo po tin mut wal ewin men si wo wo phepngin ta hi, u po tin ku mut wal ewin som men si epo wo phepngin ta hi kut tumen.
45003031	Kut ma it tin sakal tumen men wo phepngin kha it ning i ma wungin sinsin ku siin si in iis akomen, wah? Awu, wungin tin imen men pi om weh! Si it kaek si wungin sinsin kha men.
45004001	Kut ma it ku wo epo Abraham tin yau a it sin men men tuon tohuh, men yang pon ta ele?
45004002	Epon taku Abraham e ku Got tet wungin siik ko po yang epo tohuhngin tin ta yang tuon men, men ku yang in ton sinsin tin ku yang wangan pon men ako, takuma men ku to mara Got akomen.
45004003	Epo Panngin tin Auluungin men wo tua? Men wo ti, “Abraham won phep pit wo Got, men Got maran iran ta yang ken i e wungin siik men.”
45004004	Si po ta tin ning kumang men, kulngin tin po wai emhut kumang tin imen men ku po mara hi iran ken i e nanaangin men akomen. Awu. Men ken i e naumngin ta men engun.
45004005	Si taku po ta ku tohuh som, si won phep pit wo yang tin in to wungin tin yang tet wungin siik ko po po tin ku lem pit wo Got ewin som men engun, men wo phepngin tan Got maran iran ken i e wungin siik men.
45004006	Wala a-Dewit maksin sakal epo min kehngin tin nhum e ta po tunus ta tin Got maran ira wungin tan ken i e wungin siik men, epo sinsin men enginin epo tohuhngin tan,
45004007	wala yang sakal ti, “Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin men klokngin li kut men u lasin mosop ta hi men pang pongin kut tumen.
45004008	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tunus ta tin yang tin Akono men ku maran ira wungin tan ken i e ku ning lasin ta men akomen.”
45004009	Tumen ma min kehngin tin nhum imen men ko po po tin mut wal men misa hi, wa men ko po po tin ku mut wal ewin som men maksin kut ti? Epo pim a sakal kho epo wo phepngin kha Got maran iran ta Abraham ken i e wungin siik men.
45004010	Si wungin tin siik imen men Got maran iran ta yang tin ku in tua? Iyi, Got maran iran ta yang minan tin yang mutngin kho, wa yang iso in engun? Men ku minan tin yang mutngin kho men som, si men minan tin yang iso in engun men ako.
45004011	Ma yang wa tosukngin tin epo mut walngin men, men tosukngin tin kaek si wungin siik tin me epo wo phepngin tin yang in ton minan tin yang ku mutngin kho som men, kumali yang si wirama po mosop tin wo hi phep men, aku, taku po ku mut wal som, kumali Got maran ira wungin ta po ken i e wungin siik men maksin kut tumen,
45004012	kuru yang men ku ko wirama po tin mut wal ewin men, men po tin kuk mi sun men tin ku mutngin engun som si po muk muk maksin pit mina wo phepngin tin wirama it Abraham ku mutngin kho som, si yang in ton kho men.
45004013	Epo sakalngin tin Got wo kuk mara Abraham epo yang ku pakuh po sun epo mulus mosop men ku ko ta yang wa po tin khuuknginin ta yang men epo wungin sinsin akomen. Awu. Men ko ta yang epo wungin siik tin me epo wo phepngin men weh.
45004014	Epon taku po tin wo hi nuk wet wungin sinsin men ani ku wa pakuh pongin men, men wo phepngin ko sinsin om ma sakalngin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men ku siin iis akomen.
45004015	Epo wungin sinsin kha pong si yan salngin tin ta Got men siin si in men ako. Epo pi tin ani wungin sinsin om epon men men wungin sinsin hik put nginan men om epon maksin kut tumen.
45004016	Sinsin tin imen kha sakalngin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men me epo po tin wo hi phep men, epon ku si pit mina min sukngin, kumali sakalngin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men ku kaek siingin ta po tin khuuknginin ta Abraham men mosop, si ku ta po tin khuukngin pit mina wungin sinsin men misa hi akomen. Awu. Men ku ta po tin khuukngin pit mina wo phepngin tin ta Abraham men maksin kut tumen. Epo yang men wirama it mosop.
45004017	Wala sakalngin ta panngin nuk ti, “Nga wa ngon si wirama po tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh men men ku munuman.” Yang men wirama it to mara Got tin ani yang won phep pit won men, men Got tin wa tunusngin ko ta po tin huu kho ma sikia endara tin ku kho kuk som men ken i e kho si kuk men.
45004018	Yang men wungin sinsin tin ku yang hoo min epon men men pi om, takuma yang hoo min ma yang won phep engun. Tumen ma yang si wirama po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh men munuman, men ira sakalngin tin Got wo ta yang kho men ti, “Tin tumen kha kuli po tin khuuknginin tap men si munuman epon men.”
45004019	Ma yang ku won wiak epo wo phepngin som, tumen ma yang ku tulun hu pit po emkusin tuon tin ut nung men akomen, aku, posan ta yang khum khum angan kho li, kuru e-Sara kuman tin ut nung kho men, men ku yang tulun hi pit pon akomen kut tumen.
45004020	Yang men ku wo phepngin tan om ma yang min ponwal pit wo wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men akomen. Awu. Yang iso pit nhing to wo phepngin ma yang wa Got yan si,
45004021	ma yang men wo phepngin klet mi yang weh epo wungin tin Got wo kuk mara yang epon men, men Got in to kakhangin maksin tin ku yang pyu pon tumen ako.
45004022	Sinsin tin imen wala “Got maran ira wo phepngin ta yang ken i e wungin siik men.”
45004023	Epo sakalngin tin panngin nuk epo Got ku tet wungin siik ko po yang men, men ku sinsin epon ku nhio wo yang misan akomen.
45004024	Awu. Men epon kuli nhio wo it maksin kut tumen ako, men kuli Got tet wungin siik ko po it, tin taku wo it phep pit wo yang tin khek a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men kyok si tunus mi po tin huu kho men.
45004025	Yang men Got min alang siin si in yanga wili po epon ku hun, men sinsin epo wungin tin it ning i e yek ta sun tin siik men, u Got khek yang kyok si tunus, men sinsin epon ku Got ning it si kuk siik kut tumen.
45005001	Got men ning it si kuk siik kho kut, tumen ma homani ma it ung aminis to Got yanga wili yang tin Akono ta it e a-Yesus Krais men.
45005002	Yang kut kha soput ta it tip nuk epo wo phepngin ma it me sup mi nanaangin tin it nuk nhing min kut iyi men, ma it wangan po hoo mingin ta it tin kuli it wa moolngin tin ta Got men.
45005003	Si ku tin imen misan som. Awu. Si it wangan po won maikngin maksin kut tumen, epo it ion i epo won maikngin men pho po wungin tin ku it pit nhing wet won maikngin men,
45005004	ma wungin tin it pit nhing wet won maikngin men men pho po it tin ya it to wungin tin it pit nhing wet won maikngin nginangan men, ma it tin ya it to wungin tin it pit nhing wet won maikngin nginangan men, men pho po hoo mingin si in mi it.
45005005	Ma hoo mingin men ku wa manngin ko po it akomen, epo min epongin tin ta Got men men yuk yukngin ko mi it epo Emiun Auluungin tin wangin si ta it kho men.
45005006	Epo minan tin kho e it iso kakhangin ta it om men, to pi tin Got won ung won e tunus weh men, kha Krais hun mut eya it tin wungin ta it ku pit mina sun tin ta Got men som men.
45005007	Epon men khung nginan epo it ku pon ta po ta tin ku hun mut eya sun ta tin wungin tan siik men. Aku, taku po ta ku ning wo lalaingin ma hun mut eya sun ta tin wungin tan tunus men wa men.
45005008	Si Got men pok put min epongin tin yang tuon min epo it men si in pi mlaeng, epon tin it iso kuk to lasin men, men Krais hun mut eya it.
45005009	Tumen ma Got ning it si kuk siik epo Krais kalolwan kho kut khali homani ma wungin maran ko klat weh epo it tin kuli Got iso palolo it yanga wili yang epo it tin ku li sup mi mumhek mingin men.
45005010	Epo it tin kuk kho e nolo Got ma minan timen it si mi it then to Got epo hunngin tin ta Wirun men, khali homani ma wungin maran ko klat weh epo it tin si mi it then to Got kho kut men kha kuli Got iso palolo it epo tunusngin tin ta yang men.
45005011	Kuru ku wungin tin imen misan som, si it wangan po Got maksin yanga wili a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin homani ma it wai tin it si mi it then to Got men epon kho kut men.
45005012	Kut ma yang then ta misan kha lasin me sup wo mulus epon men ma hunngin me sup epo lasin tin imen, wala lasin mili ko klet po po tunus mosop men, epon tin po mosop ning lasin kho men.
45005013	Epo kho nginan ma li pol epo wungin sinsin tin ko ta a-Moses men, lasin men kuk wo mulus ako, takuma taku wungin sinsin ta pi om, men ku Got tet lasin ko po po akomen.
45005014	Takuma hunngin si kasum po tunus mosop ken po tin sinkhaung men ta, hosingin epo Adam ma weh li pol epo a-Moses, men kasum po tin ku ning lasin ira ewi sun tin ta Adam men som men maksin kut tumen. Epo Adam men tosukngin ta epo yang tin kuli sulung ma iso me men.
45005015	Si talungin tin it wai hut emul engun men ku ken wungin yek ta sun tin siik men tin Adam ning i men akomen. Epo yang then ta tin ning wungin tin yek ta sun tin siik men ma po munuman huu epon men, kha wungin maran ko klat weh epo nanaangin tin ta Got men u talungin tin me epo nanaangin tin ta yang tin then e a-Yesus Krais men kut tumen, kha ku min sukngin ko pu wal weh epo po tin munuman men, ma hambip kara weh si po sun li si.
45005016	Kuru talungin tin po wai hut emul engun men ku ken wungin tin me epo yang tin then e ning lasin men akomen kut tumen. Epo wungin ples nginan tin me epo lasin then ta men khali wungin si ung hut epo po tin ku huuspit men. Si talungin tin po wai hut emul engun men, tin me sinsin epo po munuman tin ning wungin tin yek ta sun tin siik men, khali wungin si ung hut tin ku po si kuk siik to mara Got epon men.
45005017	Epon taku wungin yek ta sun tin siik men tin yang then ta ning i men khali hunngin si maran pit wo po tin kara men ken po tin sinkhaung men ta epo lasin ta yang tin then imen, men wungin maran ko klat weh epo po tin wa nanaangin tin pu wal weh men u talungin tin epo wungin siik men kut tumen, kha kuli si ken po tin sinkhaung men ma po mara hi pit wo sun to tunusngin yanga wili yang tin then e a-Yesus Krais men.
45005018	Tumen ma wungin yek ta sun tin siik men then ta khali wungin ples nginan si epo po tunus mosop ma po tin ku huuspit men si enun ung hut, tumen kut kha wungin siik then ta khali talungin tin po wai hut emul engun men li epo po tunus mosop ma po tin si kuk siik to mara Got men tin wa po sup mi tunusngin men si enun ung hut men.
45005019	Epo yang then ta tin wetpon wa sakalngin men khali po tin munuman men si kuk to lasin epon kho men, tumen kut kha yang then ta tin hul wet sakalngin men kha ku po tin munuman men si kuk siik epon men kut tumen ako.
45005020	Kuru wungin sinsin me sup epon kumali wungin yek ta sun tin siik men ku si pu wal weh. Takuma pi tin lasin si pu wal epon men, pi tin wala imen kha nanaangin si pu wal weh epon men,
45005021	kumali lasin tin si maran pit wo po ken po tin sinkhaung men ta mi hunngin, tumen kut kha kuli min sukngin si maran pit wo po ken po tin sinkhaung men ta epo wungin tin siik men, ma wa po li sup mi tunusngin tin sindak men yanga wili a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men.
45006001	Kut ma it ku wo tua? Iyi, it ku iso kuk e ning lasin kuma nanaangin tin ta Got men iso si pu wal weh, wah?
45006002	Awu, men pi angul weh! Tua ma it tin huu epo lasin ning nginan kho men ku iso tunus kuk mi lasin ma it iran men?
45006003	Wa wom iso pong epo engin epo it tin wa baptais ko mi Krais Yesus kho men, men it mosop wa baptais ko mi hunngin tin ta yang men kha imen ako, wah?
45006004	Tumen ma it men kilngin to yang epo baptais ko mi hunngin kho, kumali Krais tin khek kyok si tunus mi po tin huu kho men epo moolngin tin ta Wiraman men, tumen kut kha ku it muk muk mi tunusngin homan ta maksin kut tumen.
45006005	Epon taku it lup to yang ko mi hunngin tin kai hunngin tin ta yang men enun, men wungin maran ko klat weh epo it ku iso lup to yang ko mi tunusngin tin kai khekngin kyok si tunus tin ta yang men enun maksin kut tumen ako.
45006006	Epo it ion i ti, epo mi it tin kho men hun put sa wlong putwal to yang kho, kumali lasin emkusin khakhangin tin tan men ku hik putngin, kumali it men ku iso kuk e kum engun wet wili lasin kyok akomen.
45006007	Epo po ta tin hun epo lasin ning nginan kho kut men, men plosngin wet wili lasin kut kha men.
45006008	Epon taku it huu to Krais kho, men ku wo it phep epo it tin kuli iso tunus kuk to yang men maksin kut tumen ako.
45006009	Epo it ion i epo Krais tin khekngin kyok si mi hunngin kho kut men, men ku hun angan ta kyok akomen. Epo hunngin men ku kasum yang kyok akomen.
45006010	Epo hunngin tin yang hun epon kho men, men yang hun ta lasin angan then ta los po sun mosop. Si tunusngin tin yang tunus in ton homani men, men yang tunus in ta Got kokyok kokyok li kut.
45006011	Tumen kut kha ku mara wom ira wungin ken wom e huu irawin weh ta lasin ning nginan kho kut, si wom tunus kuk ta Got mi Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men.
45006012	Tumen ma wom men ku kuk aku wom mang ta lasin tin ku si maran pit wo wom emkusin tin huu ewin men ken po tin sinkhaung men ta, kuma wom hul wet sangelekngin tin tan men kyok asin.
45006013	Kuru wom kuk aku wom wa emkusin a wom tingit then then si ta lasin ken endara tin wungin tin ku siik som men ku ning kumang tan epon men kyok asin kut tumen, si wom wa tuo wom si ta Got ken wom e si tunus mi po tin huu kho men, kuru wom emkusin a wom tingit then then si ta Got ken i e endara tin ku wungin siik ning kumang tan epon men weh.
45006014	Epo lasin men ku maran pit wo wom kyok akomen, epo wom men ku kuk wet wungin sinsin kyok som. Awu. Wom men kuk wet nanaangin ako.
45006015	Kut ma tua? It ku kuk wet wungin sinsin som, si it kuk wet nanaangin, tumen ma it ku ning lasin engun, wah? Awu, men pi angul weh!
45006016	Iyi, wom iso pong epo engin epo po tin ani wom wa wom tuo wom si tan kuma wom hul wet wungin tan ken po tin kum wo sun engun men, po tin wom hul wet wungin tan imen kha wom kum won engun men, tin taku wom kum wo lasin tin hunngin si ung hut men, wa taku wom kum won tin hul wet wungin men tin wungin tin siik men si ung hut men, tumen wah?
45006017	Takuma sam samngin men ku li epo Got, epo kho, aku, wom men tin kum engun wet wili lasin men, taku li klet ma wom hul wet kotngin to mi wom weh, tin hihingin nuk e pim a wa wom li sup wet, kuma maran pit wo wom men.
45006018	Ma wom plosngin epo lasin kho kut khali homani ma wom si po tin kum wet wungin tin siik men.
45006019	Nga sakal ira wungin emol tin ta po tunus men engun, epon tin mi wom iso wiak wiak men. Epo wom tin kho ma wom wa emkusin a wom tingit then then si kum engun wet wungin tin min lengwal men, u wungin tin wom hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men, tin li epo wungin sinsin hik put nginan kara kyok men, tumen kha ku homani ma wom wa emkusin a wom tingit then then si kum wet wungin tin siik men, kumali wom si kuk auluungin weh.
45006020	Epo minan tin kho ma wom kum wet lasin engun men, men wo wom pias epo wungin tin siik men.
45006021	Wungin tin wom ning i kho imen, tin homani ma manngin wa wom epon men, ela ku plok si ma enun epon? Epo wungin tin mosop imen li ponsol epo hunngin misan.
45006022	Kut si wom tin homani ma wom plosngin wet lasin ma wom si po tin kum wet wili Got kho kut men, kha wom si enun to wungin tin wa wom lu epo wom tin ku si auluungin weh men, men weh li ponsol epo tunusngin tin sindak men.
45006023	Epo wungin tin ku emhut lasin men men hunngin ako, si talungin tin Got wai si hut emul engun men men tunusngin tin sindak in mi Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men.
45007001	Si, ehurok, iyi, wom iso pong epo engin, epo nga sakal ta po tin pon ta wungin sinsin men ako, epo wungin sinsin men kasum po tunus ta minan tin yang tunus in weh li pol minan tin yang hun men, wah?
45007002	Epo wut wala ta tin titien in men, wungin sinsin kan kan i to titien minan tin yang iso tunus in men. Si taku wut titien hun, men wut plosngin epo wungin sinsin tin kan kan wut to titien men.
45007003	Tumen ma taku titien iso tunus in, si wut enangin yang enginin ta, men ku po wa wungin tin po sup si khi sun men si po wut. Si taku wut titien hun, men wut plosngin epo wungin sinsin tin imen, kuma wut ku ning wungin tin po sup si khi sun men akomen, aku, taku wut enangin yang homan ta.
45007004	Tumen ma, ehurok, wom kut men huu ta wungin sinsin kho epo Krais emkusin, kumali wom ku enangin yang enginin ta, men yang tin khek mi po tin huu kho men kyok si tunus men, kuma it si ning kumang ta Got ken sa tin muluk men ta.
45007005	Epo minan tin mi it tin kho men iso kasum it men, men mi it tin ngelek wo lasin men, tin wungin sinsin pong sin men, men ning kumang tan mi it emkusin tingit then then, kuma it ning wungin tin ku enun si ung hut tin ku li epo hunngin men.
45007006	Kut si homani men it plosngin wet wili wungin sinsin kho kut, epon tin it huu epon tin kan kan it kho men, kumali it kum ta Got epo wungin homan tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, si ku epo panngin tingit tin kho e hihingin nuk e li li men kyok akomen.
45007007	Kut ma it ku wo tua? Epo wungin sinsin ani lasin men, wah? Awu, men pi angul weh! Epo ngo ku pon ta lasin engun akomen, awu, epo wungin sinsin misan. Epo kho men ku nga pon ta maran nesngin akomen, si wungin sinsin tin wo ti, “Ngon men ku marap nes endara asin,” misan kha nga pon tan men.
45007008	Takuma wungin siin tin maran ko klat men kha soput ta lasin tunus ta nuk ma lasin pong si wungin lengwal maran kiring kiring ma si wa wa mi ngo weh men. Epon taku wungin sinsin kis, lasin men in e ken hunngin men.
45007009	Epon kho minan tin wungin sinsin iso kis epo ngo men, men nga iso tunus in, taku li klet ma wungin sinsin tin maran ko klat men kho me, khama lasin khek si tunus ma nga hun epon kyok.
45007010	Ma wungin sinsin tin maran ko klat men, tin taku wa tunusngin si ta ngo men, takuma nga pon tan, men tuon wa ngo kyok li epo hunngin.
45007011	Epo lasin ira soput tin nuk tunus tan epo wungin sinsin tin maran ko klat men, ma lasin torok mara ngo, ma wungin sinsin tin maran ko klat men kha lasin wi ngo ko hun epon men.
45007012	Kut ma wungin sinsin men auluungin, u wungin sinsin tin maran ko klat men, men auluungin u siik u tunus kut tumen ako.
45007013	Kut ma endara tin tunus men ani si ken hunngin ta ngo men, wah? Awu, men pi om weh! Takuma lasin tin ku si in pi mlaeng weh men, kha lasin ning hunngin mi ngo epo endara tin tunus men, kumali wungin tin maran ko klat men kha ku it ion lasin epon men, men lengwal weh.
45007014	Epo it ion i epo wungin sinsin men emiunan, si ngo men emalinan, men lasin kul ngo ma nga kum wet wilin engun.
45007015	Epo wungin tin nga in e ning i men nga kingung min. Epo wungin tin ngo taku ning i men, men ku nga ning i akomen; si wungin tin mi ngo lel i men, tin imen kha nga ning i men.
45007016	Kut ma taku nga ning wungin tin mi ngo epo ngo ku ning i som men, men mi ngo then to wungin sinsin epon men tunus ako.
45007017	Si homani men ngo ani ku ning i kyok men som. Awu. Lasin tin ung mi ngo men kha ning i men.
45007018	Epo nga ion i epo mi ngo, nga sakal epo mi ngo tin kho men ako, men ku wungin tunus ta in min akomen. Epo nga in to mi ngo tin taku ning i men, takuma tua ma ngo ku ning wungin tin tunus men, men ku nga pon tan akomen.
45007019	Epo wungin tunus tin mi ngo epo ngo ku ning i men, men ku nga ning i akomen. Si wungin lengwal tin mi ngo epo ngo ku ning i som men, timen kha nga ning i men.
45007020	Kut si taku nga ning wungin tin mi ngo epo ngo ku ning i som men, men ngo ani ku ning i kyok som, si lasin tin in mi ngo men kha ning i men.
45007021	Kut ma nga pon ta wungin sinsin ta in ti, ngo tin mi ngo epo ngo ku ning wungin tunus men, men wungin lengwal in tikayung ngo weh.
45007022	Epo mi ngo tunusngin pit po wungin sinsin tin ta Got men to mi ngo tin in mi ngo ahi weh men ako.
45007023	Takuma nga ion wungin sinsin ta kyok tin nuk mi ngo emkusin tingit then then men, men in e sewut wungin sinsin tin nuk mi ngo weh men, ma tet ngo li sup wet wili wungin sinsin tin ta lasin men, tin kan kan ngo men, tin in mi ngo emkusin tingit then then men.
45007024	Auweh, ngo men in amusukngin takut! Ara weh ku palolo ngo wet wili ngo emkusin tin ta hunngin tin i?
45007025	Nga sam sam Got epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men! Kut ma to mi ngo weh, men nga kum ta wungin sinsin tin ta Got men, si to mi ngo tin kho men, men nga kum wet wili wungin sinsin tin ta lasin men engun.
45008001	Tumen ma homani men po tin kuk mi Krais Yesus men ku Got wo los po po kyok epo wungin ta akomen, men po tin ku muk muk ira mi hi tin kho men ewin som, si po ira mi Got Emiun men.
45008002	Epo wungin sinsin tin ta Emiun tin sinsin epo tunusngin tin in mi Krais Yesus men, men plos ngo epo wungin sinsin tin ta lasin u hunngin kut tumen kho kut.
45008003	Epo endara tin wungin sinsin khuk pon men, epon tin won wiak wiak epo mi it tin kho men, timen Got ning i epo yang tin tih Wirun tuon to maran tin kai it tin emalinan e it kuk to lasin men, sinsin men epo lasin ta it, men Got wo los po lasin tin nuk mi it tin kho men kha men,
45008004	kumali wungin siik tin wungin sinsin wo maran ko klat epon men ku si enun ung hut epo it tin ani ku muk muk ira mi it tin kho men som, si it muk muk ira Emiun tin Auluungin men.
45008005	Epo po tin kuk ma ira mi hi tin kho men, men wa mi hi ko pit po wungin tin ta mi hi tin kho men kokyok kokyok, si po tin kuk ma ira Emiun Auluungin men, men wa mi hi ko pit po wungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men kokyok kokyok kut tumen.
45008006	Epo po tin wa mi hi ko pit po wungin tin ta mi hi tin kho men, men hunngin kha men, si po tin wa mi hi ko pit po wungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, men tunusngin u min wyungin kut tumen kha men.
45008007	Epo mi it tin pit po wungin tin ta mi it tin kho men, men nolongin ta Got kha men. Epon men ku wai sup wet wili wungin sinsin tin ta Got men ewin akomen, kuru men khuk po engin weh kut tumen.
45008008	Kut ma po tin kuk ma ira mi hi tin kho men, men khuk po engin weh epon ku ning wungin ta tin ku Got min tunusngin pit po po ton men.
45008009	Kut si wom men mi wom tin kho men ani ku muk wom men akomen, tin taku irawin epo Emiun tin ta Got men in e li li mi wom men. Si taku po ta, Emiun tin ta Krais men ku in min akomen, men ku ta Krais akomen.
45008010	Si taku Krais in mi wom, men wom emkusin men hun kut, men sinsin epo lasin, si emiu wom men tunus in, sinsin men epo wungin tin siik men.
45008011	Si taku Got tin khek a-Yesus mi hunngin men Emiun in mi wom, men ku yang tin khek Krais mi hunngin men wa tunusngin si ta wom emkusin tin hunngin nuk epon men epo yang Emiun tin in mi wom men maksin kut tumen ako.
45008012	Tumen ma, ehurok, naumngin ta it, takuma ku naumngin tin ta mi it tin kho men kuma it kuk ma it iran kyok akomen.
45008013	Epon taku wom kuk ma wom ira mi wom tin kho men, men ku wom huu ako. Si taku Emiun Auluungin kha wom lek wungin tin emkusi wom ning i men ko huu epon men, men ku wom tunus kuk ako.
45008014	Epo po mosop tin Got Emiun li muk hi men, tin imen kha husani Got men siik.
45008015	Epo wom ku wa emiun tin kan kan wom kuma wom lem kyok men akomen. Awu. Wom wa Emiun tin ku Got wo epo husanin ung po wom e ku it yuk “Aba, Yok,” ti epon men ako.
45008016	Emiun tuon pok put wungin to emiu it epo it tin husani Got men,
45008017	ma taku it e husani Got, it men po tin ku wa moolngin men, men moolngin tin ku Got pakuh po it epon men u moolngin tin ku it wai to Krais men kut tumen, taku irawin epo it lat won maikngin to yang, kumali it si wa moolngin to yang maksin kut tumen.
45008018	Epo marango ira wungin ti, epo won maikngin tin ta elup tin homani iyi ku tunus weh kuma it kaini to it tin kuli wa moolngin men, tin ku iso lasngin si in pi mlaeng mi it men akomen.
45008019	Epo endara mosop tin Got pho pon men nuk e hoo min weh epo po tin husani Got e masang men, tin ku iso lasngin si kuk pi mlaeng men.
45008020	Epo kho men Got wa endara tin yang pho pon men li sup wet wungin tin sinsin om min men, si endara tuon ani ku min epon tumen som. Awu. Yang tin wai li sup wet sun to hoo mingin men kha sinsin epon men.
45008021	Epo endara tin Got pho pon men tuon men ku plosngin wet wili wungin tin ku emkusin tan whuk men li sup mi won piasngin tin to moolngin e ta po tin husani Got men maksin kut tumen ako.
45008022	Epo it ion i epo endara mosop tin Got pho pon men, men nuk e yut yut to al to won maikngin ken po wala tin ku wanhung ma won maan maan men, kha me pol homani kut i.
45008023	Ma ku wungin tin imen misan som, si it maksin tin kuk to Emiun Auluungin ken endara tin muru muk po ewun men, tuo it kuk e yut yut mi it tuo it kut tumen, ma it kuk e kaeng to mi it weh epo Got tin ku sikia it e husanin men, tin ku emkusin a it plosngin epo hunngin men.
45008024	Epo it men palolongin kho epo hoo mingin tin imen, takuma hoo mingin tin mara it nuk pon kho kut men, men ku hoo mingin kyok akomen. Epon tuni ma po ta ku iso hoo min epo endara tin maran nuk pon kut men?
45008025	Si taku it hoo mi it epo endara tin mara it ku nuk pon kho som men, men ku it pit nhing wet won maikngin ma it kaeng li maran nomalak epon.
45008026	Kuru Emiun Auluungin kho wo it tin wo it wiak men kut tumen. Epo endara tin ku it kines epon men, tin ku it kines tunus tua epon men, men ku it pon tan akomen, takuma Emiun tuon in emin ma yang ning kinesngin nhio wo it to yut yutngin tin maik e khung nginan epon ku pok putngin men.
45008027	Ma yang tin ion mi po tunus weh men men ion wungin tin nuk mi Emiun Auluungin men, epo Emiun Auluungin in emin ma yang kines nhio wo po tin auluungin men ira mi Got weh.
45008028	Ma it ion i epo wungin mosop men kum to al kuma si tunus epo po tin mi hi pit wo Got men, men po tin wala Got yuk hi ira wungin tin yang hihi ta min epon ku si men.
45008029	Epo po tin Got ion hi kho men, men yang won ung wo hi epo po ku si enu hi ken Wirun weh men, kumali Wirun weh si li muk mi ehuro hi tin munuman men.
45008030	Kuru po tin yang won ung wo hi kho men, timen yang yuk hi kho maksin; u po tin yang yuk hi kho men, timen yang ning hi si kuk siik kho maksin; u po tin yang ning hi si kuk siik kho men, timen yang wa moolngin ko po hi maksin kho kut tumen.
45008031	Kut ma it ku sakal tua epo wungin tin mosop imen? Taku Got ku tita it, men ara weh ku nolo it?
45008032	Yang tin ku min ko wo Wirun tin tan weh men som, si yang min alang si sun sup yanga wili po kuma Wirun hun mut eya it mosop men, ma tua ma yang ku naa it hut emul engun epo endara mosop maksin akomen?
45008033	Ara weh e ku hik put wungin pit po po tin Got won ung wo hi men? Awu. Got tuon kha ning po si kuk siik men.
45008034	Ara weh e ku wo los po it? Awu. Krais tuon kha hun kut men, kuru yang khek kyok si tunus maksin, men yang tin wala si in ewo wili Got tin eronin men, kuru yang in emin ma yang ning kinesngin nhio wo it maksin kut tumen.
45008035	Ara weh e ku pok mi it epo min epongin tin ta Krais men? Iyi, won maikngin wa miun tuungngin wa mumhek mingin wa hun elipngin wa wiwilngin wa lalaingin wa bainat wa tumen ani ku ning i tumen, wah? Awu.
45008036	Wala sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, “Yap tin nuk wo pim men kha po lek pim ko huu to pi mhangin u to pi luk kut tumen kokyok kokyok epon men. Po ion pim ken pim e sipsip tin kuk epon ku lekngin ko huu engun men.”
45008037	Takuma wungin tin mosop imen men it nomka hut weh yanga wili yang tin min pit wo it weh men.
45008038	Epo ngo men wo ngo phep weh kut epo hunngin wa tunusngin, wa tihngin wa emiun tin mara hi pit wo sun men wa emiun tin ahuwesngin men, wa endara tin ta elup tin iyi wa endara tin ta elup tin ku iso me men,
45008039	wa endara tin nuk ili awon men wa endara tin nuk ko li awet men wa endara tin pho pongin kara maksin men kut tumen, ku kakha epon ku pok mi it epo min epongin tin ta Got e in mi Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men akomen.
45009001	Nga sakal irawin mi Krais, si ngo ku torok som, kuru mi ngo tin ples wungin men pok put sakalngin nhio wo ngo mi Emiun Auluungin kut tumen,
45009002	epo nga in to won maikngin nhum u min urutngin sumsum tumen mi ngo.
45009003	Epo ngo taku tuo ngo ku in wet ngil ngilngin tin ta Got men ma nga in engini ngo epo Krais kuma mut eya po tin ehurok e pim a khuuk wal wo mulus men,
45009004	men po Israel tin Got kuh husani Got ung po hi men, u moolngin tin ta Got men, u wungin kara tin Got kakaek siin lunga yang to po men, u wungin sinsin tin ko ta po men, u kumang tin po ning kumang auluungin epon men u wungin kara tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men kut tumen kha ta hi men.
45009005	Kuru po tin yau a hi sin men ta hi, u Mesaia tin in ili awon epo endara mosop e Got tin ku it sam sam i kokyok kokyok li kut men men kha me khuukngin ira wungin pit mina po tunus tin khuuk wal wo mulus men kut tumen. Men irawin.
45009006	Si ku ken sakalngin ta Got e ku put ko nuk engun akomen. Epo po tin khuuknginin ta a-Israel men mosop ani ku ta Israel weh men akomen,
45009007	wa po tin khuuknginin ta Abraham men mosop ani ku Got kuuh husani Abraham epon men akomen kut tumen. Awu. Got wo ta Abraham ti, “Epo Aisak kha ku nga kuuh husanim ko po hi men.”
45009008	Wungin timen sinsin ti, po tin khuukngin epo mi po tunus engun men ani ku Got husanin weh men akomen. Awu. Po tin khuukngin epo wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men kha Got maran iran ken i e Abraham khuuknginin weh men.
45009009	Epo wungin tin Got wo kuk mara Abraham epon men men ti, “Mi elup tin wala iyi mi posan tin ta maksin men kha ku nga kyok me, men ku e-Sara ku khuuk sun masang ta.”
45009010	Si ku wungin tin imen misan som. Awu. E-Rebeka kut men kuman kuk po wulong tin hukap men epo yang then ta men, men Aisak tin wala yau a it siin men.
45009011	Epo wulong tin imen ku khuukngin kho som u wulong ku ning wungin tunus ta wa lengwal ta tumen kho akomen, si epon kumali wungin tin Got nana i ta min kho men ku si nuk nhing weh ira wungin tin yang tuon won ung won men, men ku si epo kumang ta wulong ta som, si men si epo Got tin yuk po men,
45009012	kut kha yang wo ta e-Rebeka taku, “Yang tin khuukngin muk sun men ku kum wo sun tin khuukngin ira sun men.”
45009013	Men ira ewi Panngin Auluungin tin wo taku, “A-Yakop kha mi ngo epon kho men, si a-Isau men nga mut i kho.”
45009014	Kut ma it ku wo tua? Got men in to wungin tin ku siik som men, wah? Awu. Ti men pi angul weh!
45009015	Epo Got wo ta a-Moses taku, “Ngo ku mi ngo suk po tin araling e mi ngo epo ngo ku mi ngo suk hi weh men, u ngo ku mi ngo amusukngin to po tin araling e mi ngo epo ngo ku mi ngo amusukngin to hi weh men kut tumen.”
45009016	Tumen ma mi po ta tin min nawaehngin men, wa po ta tin saangin ung po khin men, ani ku wungin si epon men som. Awu. Got tin min suk po ewin men kha wungin si epon men misan.
45009017	Epo Panngin Auluungin men wo ta Parau taku, “Wungin sinsin tin nga khek ngon si in epon men wala ti, epon kuma nga suk mara po epo wungin ahuwesngin tin ta ngo men epo ngon, ma ya ngo men ku pok putngin yanga pi wo mulus sup e klet weh.”
45009018	Kut ma Got min suk po tin araling e yang min epo yang ku min suk hi men engun, u yang ning mi po ma po mi hi khang tin araling e yang min epo yang ku ning i tumen epo po men engun kut tumen.
45009019	Kut ma nga wo taku ngon ku wo ta ngo ti, “Tuni ma yang iso wilala ewut it epo lasin? Epo ara weh e ku hik put wungin tin yang min wai epo yang ku ning i men?”
45009020	Awu. Si tuon, ngon ara weh e ku pae wungin kyok li ewut Got? Iyi, mulus tin po pang i men ku ko wo ta po tin pang i men, “E pang ngo tumen epo ele,” ti, wah?
45009021	Iyi, po ta tin pang pang mulus nginangan men, men e nhum epo mulus tin yang pang i men, kuma epo mulus tingit ta, men ku yang ning endara ta epo kumang tin tunus men, u endara ta epo kumang tin amiron nginan engun men kut tumen, epo min engun ako, wah?
45009022	Kut si taku Got tin taku ning tosukngin epo min kakhat sun tin tan men, u yang taku wa kakhangin tan si in pi mlaeng men kut tumen, kha yang iso kaeng i ma yang wuh wungin maran nomalak eya endara tin ta min kakhat sun e hihingin kho epon ku mumhek mingin men,
45009023	u yang taku ning tosukngin epo moolngin ta yang tin ko pu wal weh wo endara tin ta min sukngin e yang hihi i kho epon ku wa moolngin men kut tumen,
45009024	men it tin wala yang yuk it mi po Yuda misan som, si mi po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen, men ku yang ning i tumen epo min engun ako, wah?
45009025	Wala yang sakal maksin mi kisang tin ta pokngin a-Hosea men ti, “Ngo ku sikia po tin e ku masang wala ta ngo kho som men, men masang wala tin ta ngo men weh, u wut tin ngo ku mi ngo pit won kho som men, men wut tin mi ngo pit won weh men kut tumen.”
45009026	“Ma kuli wungin si nuk ti, pi tin nga wo ta po taku, ‘Wom men ku masang wala ta ngo som,’ pi tin wala imen kha kuli nga kuuh husani Got tin in kokyok kokyok men ung po po men.”
45009027	Kuru Aisaia wut plai los po po Israel taku, “Aku, taku tiikngin ta po masang to sun wala tin khuuknginin ta a-Israel men si munuman kai namak tin nuk suu wiu men, takuma men kuli kiak sakun kara engun kha kuli palolongin men.
45009028	Epo yang men kuli suuk sii kumang tan ma hik put wungin tan maran ko hut sok epo wungin tin siik men, epo yang tin Akono men kuli pus kumang tan ning nginan si wo mulus.”
45009029	Kuru men ken Aisaia tin sakal kho men ti, “Taku yang tin Akono e maran pit wo po nolo men ku mang ta po tin khuuknginin ta it kiak kara engun men iso kuk som, men ku kho ma it ko ken pi Sodom men, u it ko ken pi Gomora men kut tumen ako.”
45009030	Kut ma it ku wo tua? Men ti, epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, tin kho ma ku tohuh epon ku hi li wa wungin siik som men, men hi li wat wo wungin siik kho kut, men wungin siik tin me epo wo phepngin men.
45009031	Si po Israel tin tohuh epo po ku li wa wungin sinsin tin po taku si kuk siik epon men, men ku hi li wat wo wungin sinsin tin hi taku si kuk siik epon men akomen.
45009032	Epo ele? Epo po taku wai epo wo phepngin akomen, si po taku wai ken i e tohuhngin epo wungin sinsin ira nginan kha ku po wai epon men. Epo po li po plong ko hut enah tin hut si pit ma po plong pon ewin men.
45009033	Wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Wom hul, nga wa enah ta ko ung po pi Saion tin ku po poplong ko hut men, men umat ta tin ku po poplong ko epon men, ma po mosop tin wo hi phep pit wo yang men ku ta manngin wan akomen.”
45010001	Ehurok, wungin tin mi ngo epon ta mi ngo weh men u kinesngin tin nga kines Got mut eya po Israel men kut tumen men wala ti, epon ku po palolongin weh.
45010002	Epo nga pok put wungin nhio wo po epo po men tohuh ta Got ako, takuma po men ku mara hi ek wungin tunus ani po ning i tumen akomen.
45010003	Epo po men pong epo wungin tin siik e ta Got men, ma po tin tohuh epo po ku pit nhing epo wungin siik ta po tuo hi men, kha po ku wa hi sup wet wungin tin siik e ta Got men akomen.
45010004	Epo Krais men mhin tin wungin sinsin tin po taku si kuk siik epon men me ponsol epon men ta po mosop tin wo hi phep men.
45010005	Epo a-Moses pan sakalngin epo wungin siik tin me epo wungin sinsin men men nuk ti, “Yang tin ning wungin tin imen weh kha ku tunus in epon men.”
45010006	Si wungin siik tin me epo wo phepngin men men sakal ti, “Wom men ku sakal ta mi wom taku, ‘Ara weh e ku li si wet pi?’ ti asin” (men los po po tin taku wa Krais me ko wet pi men)
45010007	wa “’Ara weh e ku li ko mi nahu tin siin yup men?’ ti asin” (men los po po tin taku wa Krais kyok me si mi hunngin men).
45010008	Si wungin tin imen men wo tua? Men wo ti, “Sakalngin men nuk tikayung ngon, men nuk wo ngon u mi ngon kut tumen weh,” (men los po sakalngin tin epo wo phepngin men tin pim a pok put men),
45010009	epon taku e pok put a-Yesus tin Akono men na wo ngon ma wop phep in na mi ngon epo Got tin khek yang kyok si mi hunngin men, men ku e palolongin.
45010010	Epo na min kha po ta won phep khali si in siik men, u na won kha po ta pok put wophepngin tan si epon khali palolongin men kut tumen.
45010011	Epo Panngin Auluungin men wo taku, “Po mosop tin wo hi phep pit wo yang men ku ta manngin wan akomen.”
45010012	Epo takonngin ku ta nuk lunga po Yuda u po Grik kyok som, epo yang tin Akono tin then e maran pit wo po mosop men suusuunguh miranngin tan ko epo po mosop tin hau si wo yang men.
45010013	Epo “ara e ku hau si wo yang tin Akono men yan men kuli palolongin.”
45010014	Kut si po ku hau si wo yang tin po ku wo hi phep pit won kho som men tua? U po ku wo hi phep pit wo yang tin po ku hul epon kho som men tua? U taku po ta tin ku pok put wungin men ku pi om, men ku po hul epon tua?
45010015	U taku po ku tihngin li som, men ku po li pok put sakalngin tua? Wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Po tin li pok put pok putngin tin tunus e epo min wyungin men, tin wa pok putngin tunus tin ku po mi hi keh keh pit pon men me men, po khi po men pon lungin takut!”
45010016	Takuma po mosop ku hul wet pok putngin tin tunus imen som. Epo Aisaia wo taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ara weh e ku won nuk wet sakalngin tin pim a pok put kho men?”
45010017	Tumen ma wo phepngin me epo sakalngin tin hulngin in min men, ma sakalngin tin hulngin in min men men me epo sakalngin ta Got.
45010018	Si nga kileng taku, po men hul sakalngin kho ako, wah? Wai, po men hul i ako, “Wut po men li pol yanga pi wo mulus mosop tin nuk kut men, u sakalngin ta po weh li pol woringi mulus mosop kut tumen.”
45010019	Si nga kines ta maksin men ti, po Israel tin ku pon ta wungin kho som men, men pi angul, wah? Wai, men pi angul ako. Muk men a-Moses sakal taku, “Ngo ku seh po ewhat wom epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ma wom gus po. Ngo ku ning i epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e ku mi hi ek wungin tunus som men, ma ya wom sal pit wo po.”
45010020	Kuru Aisaia min puplet weh, wala li yang sakal ti, “Po tin e ku langun epo ngo kho som men men pon ta ngo kho kut. Po tin e ku kines epo ngo kho som men men nga si in pi mlaeng to mara hi kho kut.”
45010021	Si po Israel men yang sakal si ta po taku, “Ungunan ta men li pi luk, men nga in e wili ngo kalulu pi mili eya po masang to sun wala tin ku hul wet wungin som e hi wo phae sun nginangan men.”
45011001	Kut ma nga kines ti, Got e wetpon wa po masang to sun wala tin ta yang men kho, wah? Awu, men pi angul weh! Epo ngo kut ngo men api Israel kut. Ma nga pol hut mulu tin ta Abraham men, men nga si mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Bensamin men.
45011002	Got e ku wetpon wa po masang to sun wala tin ta yang e po iso kis kis si yang won ung wo hi kho men akomen. Iyi, Panngin Auluungin put tin sakal epo a-Elaiha men, tin yang hau si wo Got ewut po Israel taku,
45011003	“Ngon tin Akono men, po lek po pokngin tin tap men ko hu hu, u po ninhien suyung tin tap men kho kut tumen, si misa ngo iso in, ma po taku wi ngo ko hun kut tumen,” tin imen e ku wom pon tan akomen, wah?
45011004	Takuma Got sakal wet yang tua? Men yang wo ti, “Nga mang ta po masang khum khum khum khaut ponwal me sup (7,000) iso ta ngo kuk, men tin ku powut hi ko suul mara a-Baal kho akomen.”
45011005	Tumen kut kha homani ma po parom nginan kara iso kuk kut, tin Got won ung wo hi epo nanaangin tin ta yang men.
45011006	Ma taku epo nanaangin, kut men ku me epo kumang ning nginan kyok som. Epon taku ku tumen som, men nanaangin e ku nanaangin kyok akomen. Si taku men me epo kumang ning nginan, men ku nanaangin kyok akomen. Epon taku ku tumen som, men kumang e ku kumang kyok akomen kut tumen.
45011007	Kut ma tua? Po Israel men ku wa wungin tin po langun epon men akomen. Si po tin Got won ung wo hi men wai kho kut, si po tin kara men ko mara hi mhi.
45011008	Men ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk men in ti, “Got wa po emiu hi tin kuk a nhaung nginan engun men si ta po, u yang wa po mara hi ung kuma po ku ion endara epon akomen, u yang wa po kinga hi ung kuma po ku hul akomen kut tumen, men in tumen kha me pol homani kut i.”
45011009	Kuru a-Dewit sakal taku, “Suyung tin ta po men men ku ko ken esih tin li ken nginan kuuh min men ta u ken nomkal ta u ken endara tin po plong ko epon men ta tumen, kumali men ku si endara tin emhut wungin ta po men ta.
45011010	Ngon men ku ning i ma po mara hi men ku pi mi ku hawus i, kuma po mara hi iis endara akomen, u ngon men ku hik hik put musut po, kuma po men ku si pit nhing kokyok kokyok akomen kut tumen.”
45011011	Kut ma nga kines ti, po Israel tin plong ko kho men, men epon ku po plong ko yek, wah? Awu, men pi angul weh! Si po tin ning wungin tin yek ta sun tin siik men kha wungin tin Got ku palolo po epon men, men ku me epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, kuma wungin tin imen ku seh po ewhat po Israel ma po mi hi heh wet sun tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men.
45011012	Si taku po Israel tin ning wungin yek ta sun tin siik men kha po tin kara e ung wo mulus men wa miranngin hambip epon men, u po Israel tin huuspit men kha po tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men wa miranngin hambip epon men kut tumen, taku po Israel mosop si wo hi phep, kut men wungin maran ko klat weh epo po tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men ku wa miranngin hambip weh, kuru kara si po sun kut tumen ako!
45011013	Epo nga wo ta wom tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men. Epo ngo men paengin ta wom tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men ta, tumen ma nga wangan po kumang tin ta ngo men,
45011014	epon taku soput ta ti wa ta tumen nuk, men ku nga seh po ewhat po Israel tin pim a khuuk wal then wo mulus men, kumali po mi hi heh wet sun tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men, ma nga palolo po tin ta hi men kara mi sun.
45011015	Epon taku Got tin wetpon wa po Israel li kuk men, men soput tin po tin kara e ung wo mulus men si mi hi then to Got epon men, iyi, Got tin kuli wa po kyok me sup men, men ku ken ele, epon men ku ken tunusngin tin po khek kyok si mi hunngin men ako, wah?
45011016	Epon taku beret tin misikin e po talu Got epon muk men e auluungin, kut men ku beret tin enginin kara men auluungin maksin kut tumen ako. U taku sa imut auluungin, kut men ku sa wilin tin imen auluungin maksin kut tumen ako.
45011017	Si taku Got pepsek sa olip wilin kara li, si yang sum sum ngon tin ken sa olip tin tuon plok misuk men ta lunga po Israel, ma to po men e si sa wilin tin sa olip sut ngon tin whal men, ma e si kialwung to sun wilin tin iso pit po sun men,
45011018	men ku e wangan po ngon ewut sa wilin tin iso pit po sun men asin. Si taku e wangan po ngon, men ku tulup hu nuk po engin, epo ngon ani ku isum sa imut men som. Awu. Sa imut kha isum ngon men ako.
45011019	Kut ma nga wo taku ngon ku sakal ti, “Got pepsek sa wilin kara li si kuma yang sum sum ngo ewi sun.”
45011020	Sakalngin timen e nut i. Po men ku wo hi phep som kha Got pepsek po li men, si ngon men pit nhing epo wo phepngin. E wa ngon si pit asin, si ngon men ku lem.
45011021	Epon taku Got ku min ko wo sa wilin tin irawin weh men som, epon men kuli yang ku min ko wo ngon som kut tumen.
45011022	Tumen ma tulup hu nuk po engin epo wungin tin amunu u ngeng ngeng tumen tin ta Got men weh. Po tin plong ko men, men wungin tin ngeng ngeng men ko epo po. Si ngon men wungin amunu ti epo ngon, men taku e iso kaek wo wungin amunu tin ta yang men. Wa taku pi engun, men ku e pepsekngin mak lu kut tumen ako.
45011023	Kuru po kut, taku po ku kaek wo wungin tin po ku wo hi phep som men akomen, kut men ku Got sum sum po kyok li sup put sun ewun kyok ako, epo Got men kakha epon ku sum sum po kyok ako.
45011024	Epo ngon tin Got klat ngon put sa olip tin plok si misuk e khuuk wal pit minal ko ung tumen kut men, si yang hik put wungin tin ta sa olip e sa olip khuuk wal pit mina wal men ma yang sum sum ngon put sa olip tin tunus men, kut men wungin maran ko klat epo yang ku iso sum sum sa olip wilin tin tunus men kyok li pit put sun tin tunus e tan weh men kyok ako, wah?
45011025	Epo ehurok, wungin tin ngo ku mi ngo epon som men, men nuk ti, epo wom men ku kuk akuli wom pong epo wungin kaunngin ta, epon akuli wom wa wom si pit to mara wom tuo wom e ken wom e mhi wom ek men. Wungin kaunngin tin imen wala ti, epo po mara hi mhi men si ta po Israel tin misikin kara men kho, ma men ku kuk weh li pol mi elup tin po tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men, tin ku me sup men, enu hi tiikngin klet kho kut.
45011026	Iis, ma soput tin imen kha kuli po Israel mosop palolongin epon men, wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Yang tin Palolongin men ku me pol po pi Saion, men ku yang phae po tin khuuknginin ta a-Yakop men, ma po wetpo hi wa wungin tin po ku ira wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men som men.
45011027	Ma wungin tin imen men wungin tin ta ngo e ngo ku kaek siin lunga ngo to po men, minan tin nga klok lasin tin ta po men li men.”
45011028	Sakalngin tin nuk porili sun tin pok putngin tunus men, men po kuk ken po tin Got nolo hi men, men sinsin epon ku Got nhio wo wom, si sakalngin tin nuk porili sun epo po tin Got won ung wo hi men, men po kuk ken po tin Got min pit wo hi men, men sinsin pit epo yang tin tulun hu pit po po tin yau a hi sin men ako.
45011029	Epo talungin tin ta Got men u yukngin tin tan men kut tumen, men ku Got phae min epon kyok ewin akomen.
45011030	Epo wom tin kho ma wetpo wom wa sakalngin ta Got, si homani ma wom wa min sukngin epo po tin wetpo hi wa wungin ta yang men,
45011031	tumen kut kha homani ma po tin imen wetpo hi wa sakalngin ta Got, kumali min sukngin tin Got ku min suk wom men kha ku po wa min sukngin epon maksin kut tumen.
45011032	Epo Got klet eya po mosop epo wungin tin po wetpo hi wa sakalngin men, epon kumali yang min suk po mosop kyok.
45011033	Auweh, mhin ekngin tin ta Got men u maran ekngin tin tan men kut tumen, men hambip weh ma muut takut! Wungin ples nginan tin ta yang men men mara it wai li purut takut, u wungin tin ta yang e yang iran ewin men, men ku mara it wai li pem som kut tumen!
45011034	“Epo ara weh e ku ion wungin tin nuk ta mi yang tin Akono men kho? Wa ara weh e ku si kot yang?”
45011035	Wa ara weh e ku wa endara ta si ta yang muk kumali yang wai emhut sun tan?
45011036	Epo Got kha endara mosop sinsin pit epon men, u si nuk yanga wili yang, u li ponsol epo yang kut tumen, men yang tin ku it wa yang yan si ma yang yan pos in kokyok kokyok li kut men. Men irawin.
45012001	Tumen ma, ehurok, nga suh mi kinga wom epo min sukngin tin mosop e ta Got men, epo wom men ku mu nuk to mara Got to wom emkusin tin ku wom wai si ta Got ken i e talungin maran to tunusngin men ta, men ku talungin auluungin ta tin ku Got min saah pit pon men, men kumang tin ta wom e mara wom ira wungin tunus ma wom kum auluungin epon men.
45012002	Si wom kuk aku wom mang ta wungin tin ta pi mulus men tin ku klet po enu wom men asin, si wom men ku mang ta tulun hungin tin ta wom men tin ku phae wom ma wom si homan men, kumali wom ion mi wungin tin nuk ta mi Got men, men tunus u yang min saah pit pon, u men siik weh kut tumen, kuma wom iran.
45012003	Epo nga sakal to nanaangin tin wangin ko ta ngo men si ta po mosop tin kuk lunga wom men then then, epon men ku tuon ion i tuon ken i e nhum epo wungin tin tunus epon ku tuon ion i tuon epon men asin, si men ku tuon ion i tuon to mhin ekngin tin ples wungin tunus men ira ewi wo phepngin tin Got kaini ta po then then weh men.
45012004	Epo it emkusin tin tingit then then kuk mi emkusin then ta, si tingit then then ku ning kumang kai wal som men,
45012005	tumen kut kha it tin munuman men kuk mi emkusin then mi Krais, ma tingit then then men tita wal weh.
45012006	Kut ma it tin wa talungin enginin enginin ira nanaangin tin wangin ko ta it then then weh men, kha it men ku ning kumang epo talungin tin imen weh. Taku po ta wa talungin epon ku pok put wungin kaunngin, men ku pok put ira wo phepngin tin Got kaini ko tan weh men;
45012007	wa taku po ta wa talungin epon ku kum ta sun kara, men ku in e kum ta po epon siik weh; taku po ta wa talungin epon ku kot sun kara, men ku in e kot po epon siik weh;
45012008	taku po ta wa talungin epon ku wo nut sun kara, men ku wo nut po epon siik weh; taku po ta wa talungin epon ku naa sun kara, men ku naa po epon hambip engun; taku po ta wa talungin epon ku maran pit wo sun kara, men ku ning i tumen to min tin seh seh ta engin men; u taku po ta wa talungin epon ku min suk sun kara, men ku min suk po to min kehngin kut tumen.
45012009	Min epongin men ku to wungin amo asin. Wom men ku mut wungin tin lengwal men weh, si wom kasum wungin tin tunus men pip.
45012010	Wom men ku mi wom tunusngin pit po al to min epongin tin ta po tin irit won men weh, men ku wom ut ut mara al epo wom ku wa ya wom si epo al.
45012011	Wom ning lamang epo wom tin ku pus kumang ning nginan men asin, si to emiu wom tin min nawaehngin weh men, men ku wom kum ta yang tin Akono men engun;
45012012	mi wom keh keh to hoo mingin weh, wom pit nhing wet won maikngin weh, u wom wilayuk epo kinesngin sumsum weh kut tumen;
45012013	wom men ku kikyu po tin auluungin men epo endara tin po kalwok epon men, u wom tohuh epo wom ku ira wungin tin ku wom lang pit wo po tin nomisang men tunus men kokyok kokyok kut tumen.
45012014	Wom men ku kines Got epo yang ku wa emhong ko po po tin ning i lengwal epo wom men; ma wom kines tumen, si wom ku kines epo yang ku ngil ngil po asin.
45012015	Mi wom keh keh to po tin mi hi keh keh men, u wom tinis to po tin tinis men kut tumen.
45012016	Wom men ku kuk e mi wom then epo al, si wom wa wom si pit asin, si wom klap po tin wa ya hi ko nginangan men. Wom phaeng wo wom tuo wom ken wom e mhi wom ek men asin.
45012017	Wom ning i lengwal emhut sun ta po ta tin ning i lengwal epo wom men asin, si wom hihi wungin ta mi wom kho epo wom ku ning wungin tin tunus tunus to mara po masang to sun wala mosop men.
45012018	Taku tumen, men ku wungin tin nuk epo wom weh men, men ku wom ung aminis to po masang to sun wala mosop engun.
45012019	Apo, wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, wom kuk aku wom tuo wom ning wungin emhut sun asin, si wom mang ta Got tin ku wa pi tin ku yang mumhek mi po epon men. Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “’Wungin tin emhut sun men men nuk epo ngo, ngo tuo ngo kha ku ning i emhut sun men.’ Yang tin Akono men kha wo tumen.”
45012020	Tumen ma “taku po tin nolo ngon men ta hun elip, men ku e pa ken i; taku hun eki, men ku e wa eki si tan ma um; epo wungin tin imen kha ku e halung po yau tin ngilis men ko pon mhin epon men.”
45012021	Ngon men ku mang ta wungin tin lengwal men tin ku nomka hut ngon men asin, si e nomka hut wungin lengwal to wungin tunus.
45013001	Po mosop men ku wa enu hi sup wet wili po phuan tin wa emhong epon ku po mara hi pit wo sun men. Epo po phuan tin kuk to emhong men tin ku wa emhong hang Got som men ku ta in akomen, ma po phuan tin wa emhong e kuk kut men, Got kha hihi hi kuk tumen.
45013002	Tumen ma taku po ta si nolo po phuan tin kuk to emhong men, men nolo hihingin ta Got kha men, ma po tin nolo sun men kuli wa mumhek mingin ko po hi tuo hi.
45013003	Epo po phuan tin mara hi pit wo sun men ku ning lemngin wo sun tin ning wungin tunus men ewin akomen, si po tin ning wungin lengwal men kha po ning i tumen epo sun ewin men. Iyi, mip epo ngon ku lem to mara po phuan tin kuk to emhong men asin, wah? Taku tumen, men ku e ning wungin tin tunus men, men ku e wa sam samngin hang po tin imen tuo hi.
45013004	Epo phua ta tin in to emhong men, men tin kum ta Got mut eya ngon kuma e ung tunus men kha men. Si taku e ning wungin lengwal, men ku e lem ako, epo phua tin imen ku lat bainat engun akomen. Epo yang men tin kum ta Got men, tin ku ning mumhek mingin emhut sun tin po ta ning wungin lengwal kokyok men kha men.
45013005	Tumen ma wom men ku weh kuk wet wili po phuan, sinsin men epon ku mumhek mingin si po wom misan akomen, si epo mi wom tin ples wungin nginangan men maksin kut tumen.
45013006	Epo sinsin tin imen kha wom kul takis si ta po phuan tin mara hi pit wo wom men. Epo po men tin kum ta Got e po wilayuk kokyok kokyok epo kumang tin wala nuk tumen.
45013007	Tumen kha ku wom men ku kul naumngin si ta po mosop tin naumngin ta hi pit wo wom men weh: takis men ku wom kul i si ta po phuan tin naumngin ta hi pit wo wom men weh; naumngin ta po phuan tin wom kul i epo kumang wa endara wa tumen, men ku wom kul i si ta po phuan tin naumngin ta hi tin imen pit wo wom men siik weh; po tin sun wo epo wom ku lem pit wo hi men, men ku wom lem pit wo hi weh; u po tin sun wo epo wom ku wa ya hi si men, men ku wom wa ya hi si weh kut tumen.
45013008	Wom men ku mang ta naumngin ta wom ta iso pit wo po ta asin, si naumngin tin wom ku mi wom epo al men then kha ku iso in epo wom kokyok kokyok men, epon taku po ta min epo sun ta, men kai wungin sinsin kho kut kha men.
45013009	Epo wungin sinsin tin wo taku, “Ngon men ku sup si khi po ta asin”, “Ngon men ku wi po ta ko hun asin,” “Ngon men ku tip enda asin,” “Ngon men ku pok put wungin torokngin pit po po ta asin,” “Ngon men ku marap nes endara asin,” u taku wungin sinsin kara kyok nuk tumen, men mosop kuk wet sakalngin mhin tin ti, “Ngon men ku mip epo po tin wom ung them men ken sun tin mip epo ngon tuop men.”
45013010	Min epongin men ku ning i lengwal ta epo po tin ung then men ta ewin akomen. Tumen ma min epongin men kai sakalngin tin wungin sinsin sakal epon men.
45013011	Ma wom ning wungin tin imen weh, epo wom ion elup tin i, epo homani ma pi tin ku it phip si epo nhaungngin ta it men kho si kut. Epo homani men pi tin ku it palolongin weh kut epon men, men me tikayung epo sun tin muk ma wo it phep men.
45013012	Pi luk maran nomalak kho li, si pi mhangin me in tikayung kut. Tumen ma it men ku psik moolngin tin ta pi mi ku men li, si it phae po it epo moolngin tin epo lek walngin e ta pi tin mi mlaeng men.
45013013	It men ku muk muk ira wungin tin maanngin om epon men weh, ken it muk muk to pi mhangin men, si kakaomngin tin si ma po lulus to al amen engun min men to wungin tin po um hambip ma po mara hihi hi men, u elwanngin to wungin tin po mang ta mi hi ngelek wo wungin lengwal men, u heek walngin to wungin tin po mi hi heh wet sun men kut tumen, men ku it muk muk min kyok asin.
45013014	Si wom men ku phae po wom epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men, si wom hihi soput ta mi wom tin kho men ta nuk kuma wom ira wungin ta sangelekngin tan asin.
45014001	Po ta tin won wiak to wo phepngin tin tan men, men ku wom wai mu lup to wom, takuma wom men ku heek wal to po pit mi wungin tin nuk awhat lunga wom men asin.
45014002	Epo po ta won phep weh epon men tunus kuma ii endara tin maran kiring men mosop, si po enginin ta tin wo phepngin tan ku pit nhing som men men ku ii khaupngin misan.
45014003	Yang tin ii endara mosop ewin men men ku ion sun tin ku ii endara mosop ewin som men ken i e lengwal engun men asin, u yang tin ku ii endara mosop ewin som men, men ku ples wungin ta sun tin ii endara mosop ewin men asin kut tumen. Epo Got men wa po tin imen kho ako.
45014004	Ngon ara weh e ku ples wungin ta po ta tin kum wo sun enginin ta men? Phua tin ta yang weh men kha yang pit nhing wa yang plong ko epon men. Iis, yang men ku ningngin si pit nhing ako, epo Got men kakha epon ku ning i ma yang iso pit nhing.
45014005	Yang ta ion ungunan ta ken i e nhum epo sun kara men, si yang ta maksin men ion ungunan mosop ken i e kai wal engun men ako. Po mosop then then men ku wo phepngin ta hi maran ko klat klet mi hi then then weh.
45014006	Yang tin won nuk wet ungunan ta men, men tulun hu yang tin Akono men kha yang won nuk wet men; u yang ta maksin tin ku won nuk wet ungunan tin imen som men, men tulun hu yang tin Akono men kha yang ku won nuk wet som men maksin kut tumen. Yang ta tin ku suuh min som men, men tulun hu yang tin Akono men kha yang ku suuh min som men, epo yang sam sam Got epon; u yang ta maksin tin suuh min men, men tulun hu yang tin Akono men kha yang suuh min men, ma yang sam sam Got epon maksin kut tumen.
45014007	Epo po ta it ta ku tunus in ta tuon akomen, u po ta ku hun ta tuon akomen kut tumen.
45014008	Epon taku it tunus kuk, men it tunus kuk ta yang tin Akono men misan; u taku it huu, men it huu ta yang tin Akono men misan kut tumen. Tumen ma taku it tunus kuk wa taku it huu, men it men ta yang tin Akono men misan.
45014009	Epo sinsin tin imen kha Krais hun u yang khek si u yang tunus in kokyok kokyok epon men kut tumen, kumali yang si Akono ta po tin huu kho u tunus kuk tumen mosop.
45014010	Si tuni ma e ples wungin ta wirom? Wa tuni ma e ion wirom ken yang e lengwal engun men? Epo it mosop men kuli li nuk mara ehus tin ta Krais e ku yang ples wungin ta it won men.
45014011	Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, “Yang tin Akono men sakal taku, ‘Nga tung tung si wo ngo tin weh in men epo po powut hi mosop kuli ko suul epo ngo, u po mamai hi mosop kuli pok put ya Got weh si in pi mlaeng kut tumen.’”
45014012	Kut ma it mosop then then kuli pok put wungin ta it then then sinsin si ta Got.
45014013	Tumen ma it men ku ples wungin ta al kyok asin, si it men ku mi it wai ti, epo it men ku wa endara ta ko nuk put soput ta ehuro it ta tin ku yang tut po khin wa yang plong ko epon men asin kut tumen.
45014014	Nga ion i u a-Yesus tin Akono men phae mi ngo ma wo phepngin klet mi ngo weh kut tumen, epo endara ta ku sinsin epon tuon tin pon lengwal men in akomen. Si taku po ta phaeng taku endara ta pon lengwal, to mara po tin imen kha endara tin imen pon lengwal men.
45014015	Si taku wirom min urut i, sinsin men pit mi endara aiingin tin tap men, men ku homani ma e muk muk mi min epongin kyok akomen. E mumhek mi po ta tin Krais hun mut eyan men epo endara aiingin tin tap men asin.
45014016	Tumen ma wungin tunus tin wom ning i men, men ku wom mang ta po ma po sakal epon ken i e lengwal men asin.
45014017	Epo enunu tin ta Got men ku siin kaek wo enda aiingin wa eki wa tumen akomen, si men siin kaek wo wungin siik, u min wyungin, u min kehngin tin in mi Emiun Auluungin men kut tumen misan.
45014018	Epo po ta tin kum ta Krais to wungin tin imen, men Got min saah pit pon u po tunus wangan pon kut tumen.
45014019	Tumen ma wungin tin ku ning i ma it ung aminis to wal epon men kha ku it tohuh epo it ku iran men, kuru wungin tin ku it khek wal si pit nhing epon men kut tumen.
45014020	Ngon men ku mhuk kumang tin ta Got men sinsin epo endara aiingin asin. Irawin, epo endara aiingin mosop men tunus to mara Got epon ku it iini ako. Si taku po ta ii endara ta tin ning i ma sun ta plong ko epon men, men ning lasin kha men.
45014021	Taku e ii endara ta wa e um wain wa e ning wungin enginin ta tin ning i ma wirom tut po khin wa plong ko mi lasin wa won molok to wo phepngin tan epon men, men tunus epo ngon ku ning i tumen kyok asin.
45014022	Iyi, ngon e wop phep? Men ku e in to wo phepngin tap ta tuop to mara Got. Emhong tin ta Got men men ku ko po po ta tin ku wa lasin ko pon tuon som epo wungin tin po tong i ma po ion min kho epon e tunus men.
45014023	Si taku po ta min ponwal ma ii endara, men tuon wo los pon tuon, epon men ku won phep ma ii endara akomen. Epo wungin tin tuni e ku wo phepngin pong sin som men, men lasin kha men.
45015001	Kut ma tunus epo it tin wo phepngin ta it pit nhing men ku wuh wungin tin po tin wo phepngin ta hi ku pit nhing som men sila hi khing epon men, si it men ku ning wungin tin mi it ku tunusngin epon men epo mi it engun asin.
45015002	It mosop then then men ku ning po tin it ung then men mi hi tunusngin, kuma po ung tunus ma po kuk li po khekngin si pit nhing weh.
45015003	Epo Krais kut men ku tuon ning i min tunusngin engun akomen. Awu. Wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Wungin tin po mimi ngon epon men, men kyok me ko po ngo maksin.”
45015004	Epo wungin tin akani e panngin nuk kho men, men panngin epon ku it urut sakalngin epon, kumali Panngin Auluungin tin pa nhing it ma it pit nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak men, kha ku it kuk to hoo mingin epon men.
45015005	Homani men ku Got tin pa nhing it ma it pit nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak men ku wa khakhangin si ta wom tin ku wom kuk to mi wom then epo al pit mina wungin tin ta Krais Yesus men,
45015006	kumali to mi wom then u to wo wom then kut tumen, men ku wom wa Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men yan si.
45015007	Tumen ma wom men ku wa wom sup mu lup to al, ken Krais tin wa it sup me lup to yang men, kumali Got men ku yan weh si.
45015008	Kut si nga wo epo a-Yesus Krais men kho si in ken po tin kum ta sun tin mut mut wal men ta, epon ku mut eya wungin irawin tin ta Got men, kuma yang kaek si wungin tin Got wo kuk mara po tin yau a it sin men epon men,
45015009	kuru epon ku po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ku wa Got yan si epo min sukngin tin ta yang men, wala panngin nuk ti, “Epo sinsin tin imen kha kuli nga pok put si tap lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, u nga lut li epo yap kut tumen.”
45015010	Kuru angan ta kyok men sakal taku, “Wom tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, wom men ku mi wom keh keh to po masang to sun wala tin ta yang men!”
45015011	Kuru angan ta kyok men wo ti, “Wom tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, wom mosop men ku sam sam yang tin Akono men! Wom masang to sun wala tin khuuk wal ta wom weh men, wom mosop men ku wa Got yan weh si.”
45015012	Kuru angan ta kyok men Aisaia wo taku, “A-Yesi himut ta ku iso plok si po kimut sun, men yang tin wala e ku si maran pit wo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men. Yang tin imen kha ku po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men hoo mi hi pit won men.”
45015013	Homani men ku Got tin sinsin epo hoo mingin men wa min kehngin u min wyungin kut tumen, ku ko kol mi wom tin wo wom phep men, kumali hoo mingin men ku pu wal mi wom epo wo phepngin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men weh.
45015014	Kut si, ehurok, tuo ngo men wo phepngin ta ngo men maran ko klat epo wom, epo wom tuo wom men wungin tunus kol mi wom, kuru maran ekngin mosop klet mi wom kut tumen, ma wom e wo wom nhing epo wom tin ku wo nut wal men maksin kut tumen ako.
45015015	Taku ma, ehurok, mi ngo puplet weh ma nga pan kisang to sakalngin put nunhum kara kho ti epo wom epon ku tak tulu wom, men sinsin epo nanaangin tin Got wai ko ta ngo men,
45015016	kumali ngo men ku in ken po tin kum ta a-Yesus Krais men ta li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, ma nga ning kumang ta pok putngin tin tunus e ta Got men ken po tin kum auluungin nginangan men ta, kumali talungin tin nga talu Got epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, men ku Got min saah pit pon, epon tin Emiun Auluungin ning i ma si auluungin men.
45015017	Tumen ma nga in to wungin sinsin kara tin ku nga wangan po ngo mi Krais epo kumang tin nga ning i ta Got men.
45015018	Epo ngo ku mi ngo puplet epo ngo tin ku sakal epo wungin ta tin in mi sun e Krais ku ning i epo ngo som men akomen, si nga sakal epo wungin tin Krais ning i epo ngo weh men, kuma wungin tin nga sakal i u nga ning i kut tumen, kha ku po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men hul wet wungin epon men,
45015019	tin nga ning i to tosukngin u wungin teret wo nginan kut tumen tin nunhum kara e epo kakhangin tin ta Emiun tin ta Got men, tumen ma ko pit Yerusalem ma baul weh mili pol Ilirikum, men nga pyu po pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men pok put nginan mosop kho kut.
45015020	Tumen ma nga tohuh epo mi ngo weh epo ngo ku pok put pok putngin tin tunus men pi tin po ku hul Krais yan epon kho som men, epon akuli nga ning mang si ung po sun sinsin ta po enginin ta.
45015021	Si ngo taku ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk men ti, “Po tin ku sakalngin pok putngin li epo hi kho som men kuli ion i, u po tin ku hul sakalngin kho som men, kuli mara hi ples sakalngin kut tumen.”
45015022	Sinsin tin imen kha endara munuman klet epo ngo tin ku ti hang wom men.
45015023	Si homani men pi tin ku nga ning kumang epon men ku ta maksin ung mi sun tin iyi akomen, kuru ngo tin in e mi ngo hiim hiim wom to posan munuman kho li epo ngo ku ti hang wom men kut tumen,
45015024	kha minan tin akani e ngo ku muk muk ti ma nga li Spen men, men ku nga ti pol ta wom. Epo nga hoo mi ngo epo ngo ku ion wom ira soput tin nga ti epon men, ma nga wa kho wongin tin ku nga iso ira soput li epo pi tin imen hang wom, si taku nga in e mi ngo keh keh to wom muk kara wet.
45015025	Si homani ma nga ira soput ku li Yerusalem, kuma nga nhio wo po tin auluungin men.
45015026	Epon men min tunusngin ta po Masedonia to sun Akaia epo po tin ku wa talungin kara si ta po tin auluungin e kalwok Yerusalem men.
45015027	Po men mi hi tunusngin, kuru irawin epo naumngin ta po Yuda men pit wo sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen ako. Epon taku endara ta po Yuda tin emiunan men, men po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men pok min to sun, men ku naumngin ta po Yuda pit wo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo po ku nhio wo sun epo endara tin ta pi mulus men maksin kut tumen ako.
45015028	Tumen ma ngo ku suuk sii kumang tin iyi ma nga wa talungin tin iyi li anga tunusngin li epo po kut, khamali nga ira soput tin wom ung epon men ma nga li Spen.
45015029	Ma nga ion i epo minan tin kuli nga ti pol ta wom men, men ku nga ti to emhong tin ta pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men, tin ku klet mi ngo weh men.
45015030	Kut si ehurok, nga suh mi kinga wom epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men, u epo min epongin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men kut tumen, epo wom men ku tohuh to wal to ngo mi kinesngin li epo Got epo ngo,
45015031	epo ngo ku palolongin wet wili po tin kuk Yudia e ku wo hi phep som men, u epo kumang ta ngo tin ku nga ning i ta po tin ung Yerusalem men, men ku po tin auluungin men mi hi saah pit pon kut tumen,
45015032	kumali nga ti hang wom to min kehngin ira mi Got, ma nga ti nhing to wom kara.
45015033	Homani men ku Got tin sinsin epo min wyungin men weh in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
45016001	Mi ngo epo wom ku ning i tunus epo e-Pibi tin elut it men, tin kum ta palu walngin tin ung Senkria men,
45016002	kuma wom wa wut sup ti lup to wom mi yang tin Akono men to wungin tin tunus epo po tin auluungin men ku iran men, ma wom nhio wo wut epo endara tin tuni e ku wut hing wo wom epo wom ku nhio wo wut epon men. Iis, epo wut men tin si nhio wo po munuman kho u tuo ngo kut tumen.
45016003	Wom wa mi ngo si ta e-Prisila ngong Akwila, tin pyuk a kum to al mi Krais Yesus men,
45016004	tin kho ma ngong ning wo lalaingin mut eya ngo men. Wulong men nga sam sam ngong, si ku misa ngo som, si palu walngin mosop tin ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen.
45016005	Kuru wom wa mi ngo si ta palu walngin tin palu wal mi mang ta wulong men. Wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Epainetus tin mi ngo epon weh men, tin won phep pit wo Krais muk epo hi mosop tin hi ung wo mulusngin Akaia men.
45016006	Wom wa mi ngo si ta e-Maria tin wuh kumang hambip kho epon ku kho wo pim men.
45016007	Wom wa mi ngo si ta Andronikus ngong e-Yunia tin pim a khuuk wal then u po kan kan pyuk to al kho men kut tumen, tin ya ngong pos lunga po paengin men, tin ngong maksin si in mi Krais muk kho epo ngo men.
45016008	Wom wa mi ngo si ta Ampliatus tin mi ngo epon weh mi yang tin Akono men.
45016009	Wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Urbanus tin pim a kum then to al mi Krais men, u wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Stakis tin mi ngo epon weh men kut tumen.
45016010	Wom wa mi ngo si ta Apeles, tin yan to wungin tin yang pit nhing mi Krais men. Wom wa mi ngo si ta po tin hi Aristobulus hi khuuk wal men.
45016011	Wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Herodian tin pim a khuuk wal then men. Wom wa mi ngo si ta po tin hi a-Nasisus hi khuuk wal then e hi kuk mi yang tin Akono men.
45016012	Wom wa mi ngo si ta e-Traipina ngong e-Traiposa tin wuh epo kumang mi yang tin Akono men. Wom wa mi ngo si ta e-Pesis tin mi it epon weh men, tin wuh epo kumang hambip mi yang tin Akono men.
45016013	Wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Rupus tin Got won ung won mi yang tin Akono men, u a-Rupus tonin tin inuan men kut tumen.
45016014	Wom wa mi ngo si ta Asinkritus, a-Plegon, a-Hermas, a-Patrobas, a-Hermes, u po tin ehuro it e hi kuk to po men kut tumen.
45016015	Wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Pilologus ngong e-Yulia, u a-Nereus ngong elut, u a-Olimpas, u po tin auluungin mosop e hi kuk to po men kut tumen.
45016016	Wom wa mi wom si ta al epo tumum wongin tin auluungin men ta. Palu walngin tin ta Krais e ung e li li men wa mi hi si ta wom.
45016017	Kut si, ehurok, nga suh mi kinga wom weh epo wom men ku haum tunus epo po tin pho po heek walngin u wungin tin ku sun plong ko epon men kut tumen, tin hik put kotngin tin wom urut sakalngin epon kho men, ma wom men ku lu kuk hin epo po.
45016018	Epo po tin tumen men ku kum ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men akomen. Awu. Po men kum ta endara tin po mi hi sangelek pit pon men engun, ma sakalngin min kawiaingin kara u sakalngin tin po wo sut nuk nuk pon men kut tumen, kha po ek ek mi po tin kuk ailung nginan engun men epon men.
45016019	Epo wom tin hul wet wungin nginangan men, men po mosop hul epon yanga pi. Tumen ma mi ngo keh ken ngo e wa pi ta wom men. Takuma mi ngo epo wom men ku mhi wom ek mi wungin tin tunus men, si wom men ku kuk min ailung nginan engun epo wungin tin lengwal men.
45016020	Ma maran tikayung engun ma Got tin sinsin epo min wyungin men kuli mang ta a-Nolongin me, khi wom paplot i. Ma min sukngin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku in to wom. Men irawin.
45016021	A-Timoti tin tita tuk epo kumang men, u a-Lusius, a-Yeson, u a-Sosopater tumen tin pim a khuuk wal men wa mi ngyuk ti epo wom.
45016022	Ngo a-Tertius tin pan kisang tin iyi men wa mi ngo ti epo wom mi yang tin Akono men.
45016023	A-Gaius tin nga in mi mang ta yang u palu walngin mosop palu wal mi mang tan men kut tumen, men wa min ti epo wom. A-Erastus tin maran pit wo ulu ta pi tin nhum iyi wa min ti epo wom, u a-Kwartus tin wiro it men kut tumen.
45016024	Nanaangin tin ta yang tin Akono ta it e a-Yesus Krais men ku weh in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
45016025	Homani men ku yang tin kakha epon ku wa wom ko pit nhing pit mina pok putngin tunus tin ta ngo men, u sakalngin pok put nginan tin epo a-Yesus Krais men kut tumen, ira sakalngin kaunngin tin lasngin si in pi mlaeng men, tin kho ma yang kasum i kek nuk ewo maran tin mulus pho pongin ma me men,
45016026	si li homani men lasngin si in pi mlaeng men, ma panngin auluungin tin ta po pokngin men kha sakalngin kaunngin tin imen pok putngin si ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men mosop epon men, ira wungin maran ko klat tin ta Got tin sindak in men, kumali po hul wet wungin tin ku po wo hi phep pit won weh men --
45016027	Got tin then e mhin ek men ku yan pos si ta yang epo a-Yesus Krais to elup tin ung e lap e li kut men. Men irawin.
46001001	Ngo a-Pol tin Got yuk ngo epo ngo ku si paengin ta a-Yesus Krais ira wungin tin nuk na mi Got men u a-Sostenes tin wiro it men tumen,
46001002	kha tuk a tirih kisang tin iyi ti epo palu walngin tin ta Got e ung epo pi Korin men, men wom tin si auluungin kut mi Krais Yesus e Got yuk wom epon ku si auluungin men, to po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung e li li yanga pi kut men tin kuk e yuk si wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men yan men, men Akono ta po u Akono ta it kut tumen.
46001003	Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen tin me hang Got tin Wiwoli it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen men ku ti epo wom.
46001004	Nga in e sam sam Got tin ta ngo men epo wom sumsum, epo nanaangin tin ta Got e yang wai si ta wom mi Krais Yesus kho men,
46001005	tin wom wai ma wom si mimiran to endara mosop mi Krais men, men to sakalngin pok put nginan mosop u to maran ekngin mosop tumen,
46001006	wala sakalngin tin pim a pok put epo Krais men ko nuk nhing lunga wom epon men.
46001007	Kut ma wom men ku kalwok epon talungin ta som, si mi wom seh seh ta engin ma wom hoo mi wom epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men tin kuli iso me sungin yang si si in pi mlaeng men,
46001008	men yang tin ku pa nhing wom weh li pol mi elup tin ku li ponsol men, kumali wungin om po wom ungunan tin kuli a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men kyok me in pi mlaeng men.
46001009	Got men in to wungin tan anuh, men yang tin wala yuk wom mu sup mi min thenngin tin wom si klap wal ton mi Wirun a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men.
46001010	Kut si, ehurok, ngo men ku suh mi kinga wom weh epo ya a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, epo wom mosop men ku sakal then, si takonngin kara men ku ko nuk lunga wom asin, si wom men ku si lup to al tunus weh to mi wom then u to mi wom tin ples wungin then men kut tumen.
46001011	Epo, ehurok, po tin hi a-Kloe hi khuuk wal men pok ngo epo heek walngin men kara nuk lunga wom.
46001012	Sakalngin tin nga sakal i iyi men sinsin ti, epo po ta wom then then kara men kuk e wo taku, “Ngo men ta a-Pol,” si po kara maksin men wo taku, “Ngo men ta Apolos,” si po kara maksin men wo taku, “Ngo men ta a-Sipas,” si po kara maksin men wo taku, “Ngo men ta Krais,” ti.
46001013	Iyi! Krais e ku pok pok mingin ewin, wah? Wa a-Pol ani hun put sa wlong put wal mut eya wom men, wah? Wa a-Pol yan ani wom wa baptais epon men, wah?
46001014	Nga sam sam Got epo ngo men ku ning baptais epo wom kara kho akomen, si a-Krispas ngong a-Gaius misa ngong,
46001015	epon akuli po ta sakal epo ngo e ning baptais epo ya ngo tuon.
46001016	Ih, irawin, epo ngo men ning baptais epo po tin hi a-Stepanus hi khuuk wal men kho kut tumen ako. Si taku ngo men ku ning baptais epo po kara kyok kho, men nga pong epon.
46001017	Epo Krais ku tih ngo me epo ngo ku ning baptais akomen. Awu. Yang tih ngo me epo ngo ku pok put pok putngin tin tunus men weh, men ku nga ning i to sakalngin tin ta mhin ekngin men akomen. Awu. Epon akuli sa wlong put wal tin ta Krais men kuli siin iis akomen.
46001018	Epo sakalngin tin epo sa wlong put wal men men si in ulil to mara po tin kuk e huuspit men, si to mara it tin Got in e palolo it men men auwesngin tin ta Got men kha men.
46001019	Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, “Ngo ku mhuk mhin ekngin tin ta po tin mhi hi ek men li, u wungin ples nginan ta po tin ples wungin nginangan men men ku nga wai li nuk worengin engun maksin kut tumen.”
46001020	Iyi, po tin mhi hi ek men ani a? Iyi, po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men ani a? Iyi, po tin kuk e ning sakalngin sup wet wal mi elup tin imen kuk a? Epo Got ning i ma mhin ekngin tin ta pi mulus men men ko ulil kho kut ako, wah?
46001021	Epo mhin ekngin tin ta Got men kha po tin ung wo mulus men ku ion Got epo mhin ekngin tin ta hi weh men akomen, tumen kut khali Got min tunusngin epo wungin tin po wo epon e ulil men tin pok putngin men kha ku yang palolo po tin wo hi phep men epon men.
46001022	Epo po Yuda ning sangelekngin weh epo po ku ion tosukngin maran kiring ta, u po Grik men tohuh epo po ku wa mhin ekngin kut tumen.
46001023	Si pim men pok put Krais tin hun put sa wlong put wal men, men po Yuda tut po khi hi epon, u po Grik wo epon e ulil kut tumen,
46001024	si to mara po tin Got yuk hi men, men taku Yuda wa Grik wa tumen, Krais men auwesngin ta Got u mhin ekngin ta Got kut tumen.
46001025	Epo wungin tin ta Got e po wo epon e taku ulil men men nhum epo mhin ekngin tin ta po tunus men ako, u wungin tin ta Got e po wo epon e taku nhing som men men nhum epo kakhangin tin ta po tunus men kut tumen ako.
46001026	Epo, ehurok, wom ion wom tin kuk tuni ma Got yuk wom men, epo po ta wom kara men ku munuman kuk to mhin ekngin tin ta pi mulus men, u po munuman kara men ku apalukngin u po munuman kara men ku akokono tumen akomen.
46001027	Awu. Got men won ung wo endara tin ulil e ta pi mulus men epon ku wa manngin ko po po tin mhi hi ek men, u Got won ung wo endara tin ku nhing som e ta pi mulus men epon ku wa manngin ko po po tin apalukngin men,
46001028	u endara kara tin yan om men u endara kara tin amutngin men tumen kha Got won ung won men, u endara kara tin kis kis men tumen, epon kuli Got ning i ma endara tin kuk men ku ko amiron nginan engun,
46001029	kumali po ta men ku wangan pon tuon to mara Got kyok akomen.
46001030	Epo Got tuon kha ning i ma wom kuk mi Krais Yesus, tin si ta it ken mhin ekngin tin me hang Got men, kuru men si ken wungin tin siik u auluungin u wo it pias epon men tumen ta it kut tumen --
46001031	kuma wungin si ira sun tin panngin nuk men ti, “Po ta men ku wangan po endara ta akomen. Awu. Men ku wangan po Got tin Akono men misan.”
46002001	Kuru, ehurok, nga me in to wom kho, ma nga pok put sakalngin ta Got si ta wom, men ku nga me to sakalngin u to mhin ekngin tumen tin nutngin si ta wo men akomen. Awu.
46002002	Epo mi ngo wai kho epo ngo ku in lunga wom, men ku marango ek wungin ta maksin som, si a-Yesus Krais kuru yang tin hun put sa wlong put wal men tumen misan.
46002003	Ma nga in lunga wom, men wo ngo wiak, u nga lem, u nga kwat hambip kut tumen.
46002004	Ma sakalngin tin nga sakal i e nga pok put men men ku to wa wa mingin tin ta mhin ekngin tin ta po tunus men akomen. Awu. Men nga suk mara wom epo Emiun Auluungin u emhong tumen kha nga pok put sakalngin epon men,
46002005	kumali wo phepngin tin ta wom men ku si pit nhing wo mhin ekngin tin ta po tunus men akomen, si men ku weh si pit nhing wo emhong tin ta Got men misan.
46002006	Kut si pim a pok put mhin ekngin si in lunga po tin wo phepngin ta hi pon muru mi hi men ako, si men ku tin ta mhin ekngin tin ta elup tin iyi, wa tin ta po tin akokono ta elup tin iyi men akomen, epo po tin imen kuk epon ku huuspit engun.
46002007	Si pim men pok put mhin ekngin tin ta Got e in mi wungin kaunngin ta men, tin wala nuk kaunngin e elup tin nuk e lap me men ku kho si som, si Got hihi i kho epon ku it wa moolngin nhum epon men.
46002008	Mhin ekngin tin imen ku po tin akokono e mara hi pit wo mulus to elup tin iyi ku ta pon tan kho akomen; epon taku po pon tan kho, men ku po poo poo yang tin Akono e to moolngin men si kuk put sa wlong put wal akomen.
46002009	Takuma men ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk men taku, “Endara tin po tunus ku mara hi kon i, wa kinga hi hul i, wa tulu hi hu i som men, timen kha Got hihi i kho nuk epo po tin mi hi pit wo yang men.”
46002010	Si Got men las wungin tin kaunngin imen si in pi mlaeng epo it epo Emiun tin tan men kho kut. Epo Emiun tin imen ion mi wungin mosop, wai, men yang ion mi wungin tin kaunngin weh nuk mi Got tuon men kut tumen ako.
46002011	Epo ara weh men ku ion mi wungin tin nuk ta mi po enginin ta men? Awu. Emiun tin nuk mi po tin imen misan kha ku ion i men. Tumen kut kha po ta ku ion wungin tin nuk na mi Got men akomen, si Got Emiun misan.
46002012	Si it men wa Emiun kho kut, men ku emiun tin ta pi mulus men akomen, si men Emiun tin me hang Got men ako, epon kuma it ion endara tin Got naa it epon hut emul engun men.
46002013	Endara tin imen men pim a pok put wungin epon maksin kut tumen, si sakalngin put kara tin mhin ekngin tin ta po tunus men kot pim epon men ani ku pim a pok put sakalngin epon men akomen. Awu. Men tin Emiun Auluungin tuon kha kot pim epon men, men pim a ples po tin Emiun Auluungin nuk mi hi men epo sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin tuon pok put men.
46002014	Si po ta tin Emiun Auluungin kis min men ku wa endara tin ta Emiun tin ta Got men kara akomen, epon men ulil to maran; kuru men khung nginan epon ku pon tan kut tumen, epon men po tin Emiun Auluungin kasum mi hi men misa hi kha ku ion min men.
46002015	Si po ta tin Emiun Auluungin kasum min men tuon ples sakalngin mosop sinsin, si po tuo hi men ku po enginin ta ples wungin tan akomen.
46002016	Epo “ara weh e ku pon ta wungin tin nuk na mi Got tin Akono men kuma maksin kot yang epo wungin kara?” Si it men wungin tin nuk na mi Krais men kha nuk mi it men ako.
46003001	Ehurok, kho men ku nga sakal ta wom ken wom e Emiun Auluungin kasum mi wom men akomen. Awu. Nga sakal ta wom ken wom e mi wom tin kho men iso kasum mi wom men engun, men ken wom e ken po hoin tin iso tururun engun e kuk mi Krais men ako.
46003002	Nga wa esus pit wo wom engun, si ngo ku pa ken wom epo endara aiingin tin po koklong men akomen; epo wom men ku nhing weh epon ku wai kerek akomen, kut kha homani ma wom iso kuk tumen kut men;
46003003	epo wom men mi wom tin kho men iso kasum mi wom ako. Epo mi wom heh wet po kara, u wom heek wal u takonngin nuk lunga wom tumen kha mi wom tin kho men kasum wom ma wom kuk e muk muk ira wungin ken po tin api mulus engun men ako, wah?
46003004	Epo po ta wom ta men wo taku, “Ngo men ta a-Pol,” u po ta wom ta men wo taku, “Ngo men ta Apolos,” tumen kha mi wom tin kho men kasum wom men ako, wah?
