46003005	Epo a-Pol men are, u Apolos men are tumen ma wom heek wal pit mi tuk? Epo tuk men tin kum engun e wo wom phep epo kumang tin tuk a ning i men ako, men ira kumang tin yang tin Akono men won ung won ta tuk then then weh men ako.
46003006	Epo ngo kha wha i men, li ma Apolos kha yuk eki ko wut men, si Got kha ning i ma plok si men.
46003007	Tumen ma yang tin wha i men u yang tin yuk eki ko wut men tumen ku ya ngong si som, si Got tin ning i ma endara plok men kha ku yan si men.
46003008	Kut ma yang tin wha i men u yang tin yuk eki ko wut men tumen men then ako, takuma wulong then then kuli wa talungin emhut kumang tin ta ngong men weh.
46003009	Epo Got kha pyuk a kum then to al men; si wom tin imen ken mipi ta Got men, u ken mang ta yang men kut tumen ako.
46003010	Ma nanaangin tin ta Got e yang naa ngo epon men kha nga hang enah tin mang ningngin si ung won men ken po ta tin maran ek mang ning nginan tunus weh men, si po enginin kara kuk e ning mang si ung won engun. Si po then then men ku tulu hi hu nuk po engin epo wungin tin tuni e ku po ning mang si ung wo enah tin imen weh.
46003011	Epo enah tin ku po ta hang mang si ung won men ku ta maksin in akandira akomen, si tin then e hangngin ung kut men misan, men a-Yesus Krais ako.
46003012	Si taku po ta wa gol wa silwa wa enah maran kiring kiring tin po ngel epon men wa sa wa enemsi wa wit musut tumen ma ning mang si ung wo enah tin imen epon,
46003013	men kuli kumang ta po then then men ku si in pi mlaeng; epo elup tin kuli wungin ples nginan si ton men kha kuli pok put endara si in pi mlaeng men. Epo yau kha kuli pok put si in pi mlaeng men. Ma yau tuon tin imen kha kuli karong kumang ta po masang to sun wala then then men, taku tunus wa lengwal wa men.
46003014	Ma taku kumang ta po ta tin po ning i si ung wo enah tin imen men ku yau khuk pon ma iso ung, men kuli wa talungin emhut kumang tan epon ako.
46003015	Si taku kumang ta po ta men yau uspon ii nginan, men kuli kalwok, si po tuo hi men kuli palolongin iso ako, takuma men ku palolongin ken po ta tin yau ii mang tan ma sa li yek ta yau ma li pol men.
46003016	Iyi, wom ku pon tan som epo wom kha mang auluungin tin ta Got men ma Got Emiun kha in mi wom men ako, wah?
46003017	Taku po ta ning mang auluungin ta Got ko amiron nginan engun, men ku Got mumhek min maksin kut tumen. Epo mang auluungin tin ta Got men men auluungin weh, ma mang auluungin tin imen men tuo wom ako.
46003018	Wom kuk aku po ta wom ta tuon torok maran asin. Taku po ta wom ta phaeng taku i e mhin ek epo mhin ekngin tin ta elup tin iyi, men ku ko in ken i e ulil men engun, kha kuli sulung ma si mhin ek weh.
46003019	Epo mhin ekngin tin ta pi mulus tin iyi men ulil engun to mara Got ako. Epo sakalngin ta men panngin nuk taku, “Got kha ning i ma po tin mhi hi ek men tuo hi kuh mi esih tin po taku kusamuh sun me kuh epon men,”
46003020	kuru panngin ta maksin men wo taku, “Got tin Akono men ion wungin tin po tin mhi hi ek men mara hi iran men ako, men kuli put mih engun.”
46003021	Tumen ma po ta wom ta men ku wangan po sun tunus ta engun asin. Epo endara mosop men ta wom,
46003022	taku a-Pol wa Apolos wa a-Sipas wa mulus wa tunusngin wa hunngin wa endara tin nuk to elup tin homani men wa endara tin ku iso me sulung men tumen, mosop men ta wom ako,
46003023	ma wom men ta Krais, si Krais men ta Got.
46004001	Kut si wom men ku ion pim ken pim e po tin kum ta Krais men u ken pim e po tin Got wa wungin kaunngin tin tan men si ta pim epon ku lang pit won men kut tumen.
46004002	Tumen ma wungin nuk po tin mara hi pit wo endara ta sun men epo po ku kum ta sun li, men ku po pon ta sun e kuk to wungin anuh weh.
46004003	Si to mara ngo men wungin tun ta engun tin taku wom wa po tunus kara ku ples wungin ta ngo. Iis, epo ngo ku tuo ngo ples wungin ta ngo ewin som.
46004004	Epo ngo ku tulu ngo hu wungin tin pit po ngo men ta akomen, takuma wungin tin imen ani ku wungin om po ngo epon men akomen. Awu. Yang tin Akono men misan kha ku ples wungin ta ngo men.
46004005	Tumen ma wom ples wungin kerek asin, si wom kaeng li pol to elup tin yang tin Akono men ku me men, epo yang kha ku wa wungin tin kaunngin nuk mi pi mi ku men si in pi mlaeng men, men ku yang las las wungin tin nuk e li li mi po tunus sinsin tin po ning wungin epon weh men si in pi mlaeng. Ma minan tin imen wungin tin ku po then then wa sam samngin epon men ku me hang Got weh.
46004006	Ehurok, wungin tin imen men nga wai los po tuk Apolos epon ku nhio wo wom, kuma wom urut wungin epo tuk tin ku wom kuk aku wom phaeng wo engin li wom yek ta wungin sinsin tin panngin nuk men, epon akuli po ta wom ta wangan po wi ta, si wi ta men ton mingin.
46004007	Epo ara weh ion mi wungin tap ma wa ngon si nhum epo po kara? Iyi, ela tin e in ton men ku e wai ta kho som? Si taku irawin epo e wai kho, taku tuni ma e wangan po ngon ken ngon e ku wai kho som men?
46004008	Epo wom men muut muut kho kut! Wom men mimiran kho kut! Wom men si ken po tin sinkhaung men kho kut, si pim men pi engun. Aluuh, taku wom e ku si ken po tin sinkhaung men irawin kut, khama pim a maksin si sinkhaung ma mara pim pit wo po masang to sun wala to wom!
46004009	Epo nga ion i maran ken Got wa pim tin paengin men si nuk pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala ken po tin me sulung weh e po wo los hi epon ku hi huu engun men. Epo pim paengin men si kuk ken po mosop tin ung wo mulus men hang mara hi me ung wo pim men, men tihngin u po tunus tumen mosop.
46004010	Pim men kuk ken po tin wungin ta hi ulil engun men epon ku eya Krais yan, si wom men mhi wom ek wungin mi Krais kho; pim men luk engin engun, si wom men kho si apalukngin kut; wom men ya wom pos, si pim men ya pim om.
46004011	Epo kho nginan ma me pol homani kut imen pim a kuk e huu elip u pim a kuk e huu eki, u pim a kuk e phi phi moolngin tin kakhas men, u po kuk e lek pim pon ewung engun, u mang ta pim om tumen.
46004012	Ma pim a kuk e wuh kumang, men tuo pim ning i epo wili pim weh. Po kuk e ton mi pim, takuma pim a kuk e kines Got epo yang ku wa emhong ko po po; po kuk e mumhek mi pim, takuma pim a wuh i engun,
46004013	u po kuk e kikiong pim, takuma pim a iso sakal amlus ta po tumen. Pim a kuk alok mi nginan weh ken siwulngin tin ta pi mulus men, u ken endara amutngin tin po masang to sun wala mosop whis i tek nuk e li li engun men tumen, men pim a kuk tumen kha me pol homani kut i.
46004014	Ngo ku pan wungin tin imen epon ku ning i ma manngin wa wom akomen. Awu. Nga pan i epon ku nga tus wom ken wom e husanik tin mi ngo epo wom weh men.
46004015	Epon taku po tin paruk wom e wom kuk then mi Krais men ku tausen tausen kuk, takuma po irama wom ku munuman akomen. Epo ngo tin it kuk then mi Krais men kha nga si wirama wom epo pok putngin tin tunus men ako.
46004016	Tumen ma nga sil mi kinga wom weh epo wom men ku kuk pit mina wungin ta ngo.
46004017	Epo wungin sinsin tin imen khali nga tirih a-Timoti ti epo wom men, men yang tin mi ngo epon weh e wirukan to wungin anuh e tuk a in then mi yang tin Akono men kha imen, ma yang kha ku tak tulu wom epo wungin ta ngo tin nga in mi Krais ma nga ning i men, men wungin tin wala e nga mili mili yanga pi ma nga kot po epon mi palu walngin mosop tin ung e li li men.
46004018	Si po ta wom kara men kuk e ning i ma wungin si pawha kho ken ngo e ku iso ti pol ta wom men akomen.
46004019	Takuma ngo ku iso ti pol ta wom kerek engun ako, men taku yang tin Akono men min epon, ma wungin tin ngo ku ion i minan tin imen, men ku wungin tin ku po kuk e ning i ma si pawha kho men akomen, si kakhangin ta po tin tuni men kha ku nga ion i men.
46004020	Epo sakalngin engun ani ku enunu tin ta Got men siin kaek won men som. Awu. Men siin kaek wo emhong weh.
46004021	Mi wom epo ele? Iyi, mi wom epo ngo ku ti pol ta wom to kwatngin ta, wa ngo ku ti to min epongin u to wungin amunu wa tua?
46005001	Auh, po pok wal mili yanga pi epo elwanngin si lunga wom, men wungin lengwal weh tin ku po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ku sikian si in lunga hi ewin som men, men ti, yang ta men wa wut tin ung ta wiraman men!
46005002	Ma wom men wangan po wom weh, si wom ku mi wom urut i kuma yang tin ning wungin tin imen klokngin lunga wom lu akomen.
46005003	Iis, epo ngo emkusin men in hin epo wom ako, si ngo emiun men nga in lunga wom, ma nga ples wungin ta yang tin ning wungin tin imen kho ken ngo e in lunga wom weh men.
46005004	Minan tin wom mu palu wal epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men yan to emiu ngo to emhong tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men,
46005005	men ku wom wa yang tin wungin tan tumen si yanga wili a-Nolongin kuma yang emkusin mhukngin, si kumali yang emiun palolongin kyok ungunan tin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men.
46005006	Wangan pongin tin ta wom men men ku tunus som. Iyi, wom e pong epo yiis sakun kara tin ku ning i ma beret mosop iit men, wah?
46005007	Tumen ma wom men ku tauluk yiis tin akho men mosop lu, kumali wom si ken beret tin po paphae homan ta e yiis om min men. Iis, epo wom men kuk ken beret tin tumen kut ako. Epo irawin epo Krais tin in ken Sipsip Asus ta tin po talu Got epon to pi Paska ewin men, men si talungin tin mut eya it men kho kut ako.
46005008	Tumen ma it men ku ira kakaomngin tin imen weh, takuma it ku ning i to yiis tin akho e los po wungin lengwal tin po mi hi lel sun epon u po ngelek wo wungin lengwal ton men tumen asin, si it men ku kakaom epo beret tin yiis om min e los po wungin tin mi yil u irawin men tumen misan.
46005009	Epo nga pan kisang ti epo wom kho epo wom ku sup me lup to po tin ning elwanngin men asin.
46005010	Si ngo ku sakal los po po tin ta pi mulus e ning elwanngin ewin men, wa po tin mara hi nes endara ta sun nginangan men, wa po tin torok mara sun ma nak nak endara ta sun men, wa po tin uluu got tin tororokngin men tumen ani ku nga sakal tumen som. Epon taku wom ku mang ta po tin imen, kut men ku wom mang ta pi mulus tin iyi lu yek.
46005011	Si homani ma nga pan kisang ti epo wom epon taku po ta tin wom kuh i e worokan men ta ning elwanngin nginangan, wa maran nes endara nginangan, wa won nuk wet got torokngin nginangan, wa ton mi po nginangan, wa um wain nginangan, wa tip tip nginangan wa tumen, men ku wom lup ton asin, kuru wom ii endara to po ta tin wungin tan tumen asin kut tumen.
46005012	Epo ngo tin ku ples wungin ta po tin kuk tak li wetpo palu walngin men maksin men ku kumang ta ngo som, wah? Si wom men ku ples wungin ta po tin kuk mi palu walngin men ako, wah?
46005013	Si po tin kuk tak li wetpo palu walngin men Got kha ku ples wungin ta po men. Si “wom men ku luul to yang tin wungin tan lengwal men lunga wom lu.”
46006001	Iyi, po ta wom ta ku in to wungin epo sun enginin kara ma teng teng mut powi sun kara tin auluungin e ta Got men, si li phuk mi wungin ples nginan si ta po tin wungin ta hi ku siik som men engun, wah?
46006002	Iyi, wom iso pong epo engin epo po tin auluungin men kuli ples wungin ta po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung wo mulus men, wah? Ma taku wom ku ples wungin ta po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung wo mulus men, men wom e tunus epon ku wom ples wungin tin tururun e si lunga wom men engun ako, wah?
46006003	Iyi, wom iso pong epo engin epo it tin kuli ples wungin ta po tihngin maksin men, wah? Ma taku tumen, men ku it ples wungin tin ta pi mulus tin imen maksin weh kut ako, wah?
46006004	Tumen ma taku wungin kara si in lunga wom pit mi wungin tin ta pi mulus men kara, men ku wo wom ung wo po tin ya hi om mi palu walngin men epon ku ples wungin tin imen engun?
46006005	Nga sakal i tin imen epon ku nga wa manngin ko po wom. Iyi, irawin epo po ta wom ta tin mhin ek epon ku ples wungin tin si lunga po tin ehuro hi men ku then ta in lunga wom som, wah?
46006006	Si po ehoro wom ta wa sun ehuro hi ta li epo ples walngin, kuru po ning i timen to mara po tin ku wo hi phep som men epo ele?
46006007	Iis, tin wom wa po tin ta wom men li epo ples walngin men men wom huuspit kho kut ako. Si tuni ma wom ku mang ta po tin ku ning i lengwal epo wom engun? Si tuni ma wom ku mang ta po tin ku nak nak endara ta wom engun?
46006008	Takuma awu. Wom tuo wom wile ning i lengwal epo po u wom nak nak endara ta po tumen engun, ma po ehuro wom kha wom ning wungin tin tumen epo hi men.
46006009	Wa wom iso pong epo engin epo po tin wungin ta hi ku siik som men tin ku wa pakuh po ngin ta hi mi enunu tin ta Got men som men, wah? Wom kuk aku wom ek ek mara wom tuo wom. Epo po tin ning elwanngin men, u po tin wo hi nuk wet got tin torokngin men, u po tin ning wungin sup si khi sun men, u po masang tin ning wungin to manngin maran kiring kiring epo sun masang men,
46006010	u po tin tip tip nginangan men, u po tin mara hi nes endara ta sun men, u po tin um ma mara hihi hi nginangan men, u po tin ton mi mi sun nginangan men, u po tin kusamuh sun ma nak nak endara ta sun men tumen, kuli wa pakuh pongin ta hi ta mi enunu tin ta Got men akomen.
46006011	Ma kho nginan men wom kara kha wungin ta wom nuk tumen. Takuma wom men khis pongin ma si auluungin kho kut ma Got wo epo wom e kuk siik epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men yan, u epo Got tin ta it men Emiun tumen kho kut tumen.
46006012	Epo irawin epo wungin mosop men tunus epo ngo ku ning i ako, takuma wungin mosop men ku nhio wo ngo weh akomen. Wai, wungin mosop men tunus epo ngo ku ning i ako, takuma ngo ku mang ta ngo sup wet kakhangin ta wungin ta akomen.
46006013	Irawin, epo endara aiingin men ta kuma it, u kuma it men ta endara aiingin kut tumen ako, takuma Got kuli iso mhuk min likiong. Kut si it emkusin men epon ku it ning elwanngin epon akomen. Awu. Men ta yang tin Akono men, u yang tin Akono men men ta it emkusin kut tumen ako.
46006014	Epo Got khek yang tin Akono men kyok si tunus kho kut, ma Got ku iso khek it maksin si tunus epo kakhangin tin tan men kut tumen ako.
46006015	Iyi, wom e pong epo engin epo wom emkusin tin Krais emkusin tingit then then men, wah? Tumen ma tunus epo ngo ku wa Krais emkusin ta ma lup i to wut wala elwan ta, wah? Awu, men pi om ako!
46006016	Wa iyi, wom e pong epo engin epo po ta tin lup i to wut wala elwan ta men si ngong emkusi ngong then kha men, wah? Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Wulong tin ponwal imen ku si ngong emkusi ngong then,” ti.
46006017	Si taku po ta si lup to yang tin Akono men, men si emiu ngong then to al kha men.
46006018	Tuon, wom men ku mhup lu kuk hin epo elwanngin weh! Epo wungin lengwal tin kara maksin e po masang to sun wala lasin epon men men si tak me in po po emkusin. Si po ta tin ning lasin epo elwanngin men men ning i ko po emkusin tuon.
46006019	Iyi, wom e pong epo wom emkusin tin mang auluungin ta Emiun Auluungin tin in mi wom e wom wai hang Got men, wah? Tumen ma wom men ku ta wom tuon kyok akomen.
46006020	Epo wom men kulngin epo kulngin nhum ta kho kut, tumen ma wom men ku ning wungin tin ku Got yan si epon men epo wom emkusin, kuru epo emiu wom kut tumen, epon likiong men ta Got ako.
46007001	Kut si wungin tin wom pan kisang mu epo ngo epon kho men, epon taku po masang ta ku kah wut wala ta som, men tunus ako.
46007002	Takuma elwanngin si si, tumen ma tunus epo po masang then then ku kuk to titien hi weh, u po wala then then ku kuk to titien hi weh kut tumen.
46007003	Ma yang tin masang men ku pyu po wungin tin pit po yang e titien min epo men, kuru wut tin wala men ku ning i tumen epo titien tin masang men maksin kut tumen.
46007004	Epo wut tin wala men ani ku maran pit won emkusin men som. Awu. Men titien kha maran pit won men, kuru yang tin masang men ani ku maran pit won emkusin men som, si titien kha maran pit won men kut tumen.
46007005	Si mom in aku wi ta min ko won epo sun ta asin, si tin e taku then taku mi mom then epo mom ku mang ta mom sup wet wungin tin ku mom suh mi mom men u epo kinesngin tumen elup maran hut sok ta misan. Li klet anima mom lup to wal kyok, epon akuli a-Nolongin karong mom epon tin mom ku karut mom tunus som men.
46007006	Epo wungin tin imen mi ngo suk wom kha nga wo tumen, si ngo ku wo maran ko klat epon akomen.
46007007	Epo mi ngo epon taku po masang to sun wala mosop ku kuk kai ngo men ako. Takuma po then then wa talungin ta hi weh hang Got, ma po ta wai tan enginin ta, u po ta wai enginin ta tumen.
46007008	Si nga wo ta po tin kuk po moran men, u po tin wamuh men tumen taku, men tunus epo po ku iso kuk ken ngo men weh.
46007009	Si taku po ku mara hi pit wo hi tunus weh som, men ku po enangin engun. Epo po tin mi hi sil sil men, men tunus epo hi ku enangin.
46007010	Kut si po tin enangin kut men, men nga wo maran ko klat epo po, si ngo ani ku wo tumen som, si yang tin Akono men kha wo maran ko klat epo po men, epo wut tin wala men ku saa silang titien asin.
46007011	Si taku wut saa silang yang kut, men ku wut li in wamuh engun, wa wut kyok me ngong titien mi ngong then kyok tumen. Kuru po masang ta men ku tere titien li asin kut tumen.
46007012	Si nga in to sakalngin epo wom tin kara men, men ku sakalngin ta yang tin Akono men som, epon taku po tin ehuro it men ta titien ku won phep som ma wut min tunusngin epon ku ngong in, men ku yang tere wut li asin.
46007013	Si taku wut wala ta titien ku won phep som ma yang min tunusngin epon ku ngong in, kut men ku wut tere yang li asin kut tumen.
46007014	Epo po masang ta tin ku won phep som men men si auluungin epo titien tin won phep men, u po wala ta tin ku won phep som men, men si auluungin epo titien tin won phep men kut tumen. Epon taku pi engun, kut men husani wom men ku kuk lengwal to mara Got, takuma homani ma po men kuk auluungin kut ako.
46007015	Si taku po ta tin ku won phep som men, taku wala wa masang tumen, ta saa silang titien, men ku titien mang tan ma li engun. Epon taku wungin tin imen si, men ku po tin ehuro it wa po tin ehulut it wa tumen ta men ku wungin ta kan kan i kyok akomen. Epo Got yuk it epo it ku ung aminis to al engun.
46007016	Epo ngon tin wala men, yanda ngon e ku palolo titiem, men timen e pong epon. Wa ngon tin masang men, yanda ngon e ku palolo titiem, men timen e pong epon kut tumen.
46007017	Kut si it then then men ku kuk tunia weh ken sun tin it kuk ma Got hihi wungin epo it then then ma yang yuk it men, ma it kuk e ira wungin timen li kut. Ma men wungin tin nga hihi i nuk mi palu walngin mosop tin ung e li li men kha nuk tumen.
46007018	Iyi, po ta mutngin kho kut minan tin Got yuk i men? Taku tumen, men ku in tumen kut, si ku kyok ko in to sun elit asin. Wa taku po ta ku mutngin kho som minan tin Got yuk i men, men ku in tumen kut, si ku mutngin kyok asin kut tumen.
46007019	Epo wungin tin po mut wal ewin men men won engun, u wungin tin ku po mut wal ewin som men men won engun kut tumen, si tin ku po ira wungin sinsin tin mosop e Got wo maran ko klat epon men kha nhum men.
46007020	Epo wom then then ku ung tuni minan tin Got yuk wom men, men ku wom iso kuk tumen li kut.
46007021	Iyi, ngon e in e kum wet wili po engun minan tin Got yuk ngon men? Men ku silap khing asin. Si taku soput tap nuk tin ku wop pias epon men, aku, men tunus epon ku e iran engun.
46007022	Epo po ta tin in e kum engun wet wili sun ta minan tin yang tin Akono men yuk i men men tin won pias ta yang tin Akono men ta ako. Tumen kut kha po ta tin won pias minan tin yang tin Akono men yuk i men kha tin kum ta Krais men ta kha men.
46007023	Epo wom men kulngin epo kulngin nhum ta kho kut, tumen ma wom men ku kum engun wet wili po tunus ta asin.
46007024	Ehurok, wom then then ku kuk tuni minan tin Got yuk wom men men ku wom klap Got weh ma wom iso kuk tumen li kut.
46007025	Kut sini po wala tin wawahin men men ku nga in to wungin maran ko klat ta yang tin Akono men ta epo hi akomen; takuma ngo tin yang tin Akono men min suk ngo kha ku wo wom nuk wet ngo men kha nga pok put wungin tin nga phaeng taku i e siik men.
46007026	Epo nga phaeng taku miun tuungngin tin si homani men kha ku tunus epo po then then ku kuk ken sun tin po kuk tumen kut men.
46007027	Iyi, ngon e kan kanngin to wut wala ta kho kut, kut men ku e langun epo soput ta tin ku e plosngin epon men asin. Wa ngon e ku kan kanngin to wut wala ta kho som, kut men ku e langun epo po wala ta tin ku ung tap men asin kut tumen.
46007028	Si taku ngon ku enangin, men ku e lasin som. U taku po wala wahin ta ku enangin, men ku lasin som kut tumen. Takuma po tin enangin men kuli pon ta won maikngin munuman wo mulus tin iyi, ma wo ngo ii epon akuli wungin tin imen si ta wom.
46007029	Takuma, ehurok, nga wo ti, epo elup ung e me maran hut sok kut, tumen ma elup tin misikin e iso ung e li men men ku po tin kuk to titien hi men ku kuk ken po tin titien hi om men,
46007030	u po tin kuk e tirinis men ku kuk ken po e ku tirinis som men, u po tin kuk e mi hi keh keh men ku kuk ken po e ku mi hi keh keh som men, u po tin kuk e kul kul endara men ku kuk ken po e ku kuk to endara tin imen som men,
46007031	u po tin kuk e hing wo endara tin ta pi mulus men ku kuk ken po e ku hing won weh som men kut tumen. Epo mulus tin wungin tan nuk to mara it homani men ung e maran woh woh epon ku li om.
46007032	Wo ngo ii epo wom ku sila wom khing epo wungin ta pi mulus ta akomen. Epo po tin ku enangin som men kuk e sila hi khing pit po wungin ta yang tin Akono men, tin ku po ning i tuni kuma yang tin Akono men min saah pit po po epon men.
46007033	Si po tin enangin men kuk e sila hi khing epo wungin ta pi mulus, tin ku po ning i tuni kuma titien hi mi hi saah pit po po epon men.
46007034	Po wala ta tin enangin men men in maran kiring epo sun tin ku enangin som men. Po wala ta tin ku enangin som men in e silan khing pit po wungin tin ta yang tin Akono men epon ku in auluungin to emkusin u emiun tumen likiong. Si po wala ta tin enangin men in e silan khing epo wungin tin ta pi mulus men, tin ku ning i tuni kuma titien min saah pit pon epon men.
46007035	Ma nga sakal wungin tin imen epon ku kho wo wom ako, si ku epon ku klet eya wom akomen. Awu. Men epon ku wom ira wungin tin siik men ma wom kum ta yang tin Akono men, si ku wungin ta maksin nak nak mi wom akomen.
46007036	Si taku po masang ta phaeng taku i e ning wungin ma manngin wa wut tin wala e po wo hi ung won epon ku ung ta yang men, u taku wut si awiung kho kut, u taku wungin nuk epo wulong kho tumen, men ku yang ning i ta min engun, men ku lasin som, nan men ku po mang, si wulong enangin wal engun.
46007037	Si taku po masang ta min pit nhing weh ma ku wungin ta kan kan i som, si kasum min tin tan weh men tunus, ma ples wungin tin imen ta min kho epon ku iso mang ta wut tin wahin imen ku iso in tumen engun wet, timen men ning i tunus ako.
46007038	Tumen ma po ta ku wa erun tin wahin men si enangin, men ning i tunus ako, si po ta ku wa erun ku si enangin som, men po ning i tunus weh.
46007039	Kut si po wala ta tin enangin kut men taku titien iso tunus in, men wungin kan kan i epon ku iso ung ta titien, si taku titien hun, men won pias epon ku enangin epo min ako, si men ku enangin mi yang tin Akono men misan weh.
46007040	Takuma wungin tin marango ples i men, men taku wut ku in tumen kut, men ku wut min keh weh -- ma nga wo taku ngo e in to Got Emiun kut kha nga wo tumen.
46008001	Kut sini li ken nginan tin po talu got tororokngin enun epon men, men it ion i epo it mosop men mara it ek wungin epon ako. Takuma maran ekngin ning i ma mi it wai si pit, si min epongin ning i ma it kek si pit nhing.
46008002	Taku po ta phaeng taku i e maran ek epo wungin ta, takuma ku maran ek wungin kai maran ekngin tin tunus epon ku po mara hi ek wungin epon men akomen.
46008003	Si taku po ta min pit wo Got, men po tin imen kha Got hop i weh men.
46008004	Tumen ma li ken nginan tin po talu got tororokngin enun epon men, men it ion i ako epo endara ken sun tin imen ku ta in wo mulus weh akomen, u Got ta maksin ku in som, si Got tin then e in tumen misan.
46008005	Aku, taku endara tin po wo epon e gotan men kara kuk, taku ku kuk wet pi wa mulus wa tumen, epo endara tin po wo epon e gotan men u endara tin po sikian ya hi akokono men tumen munuman kara kuk ako,
46008006	si it men Got ta it then ta misan, men Wirama it tin sinsin epo endara mosop e wungin sinsin tin it kuk epon men li ponsol epon men; u yang tin Akono men then ta in, men a-Yesus Krais tin endara mosop si nuk epon u it si kuk tunus yanga wilin men kut tumen.
46008007	Takuma maran ekngin tin imen ku nuk mi po masang to sun wala mosop akomen. Epo po kara tulun hungin ta hi iso ut pi nuk mi hi to got torokngin kha me pol homani kut i, men ii li ken nginan tin imen ken i e talungin ta got tin torokngin men irawin weh men, ma tulun hungin ta po put mih ma ko lengwal ken po e ning wungin lengwal ta men.
46008008	Takuma endara aiingin ani ku ning i ma it ung tunus to mara Got men som. Epon taku it ku ii endara, men ku homani ma it ung tunus weh to mara Got ken sun tin kho men som, wa taku it ku ii endara som, men ku homani ma it ko ung lengwal weh to mara Got ken sun tin kho men som kut tumen.
46008009	Takuma wom men ku haum tunus, epon akuli won piasngin tin ta wom imen ning i tun tira ma po tin wo phepngin ta hi wiak wiak men tut po khi hi ma po plong ko mi lasin.
46008010	Epon taku po ta tin wo phepngin tan wiak wiak men ion ngon tin in to maran ekngin men tin in e ii endara mi mang auluungin ta got torokngin ta men, men ku timen ning i ma po wo hi ek epo po ku ii li ken nginan tin po talu got torokngin epon men ako, wah?
46008011	Ma maran ekngin tin tap imen kha wirom tin wiak wiak e Krais hun mut eyan men huuspit epon men ako.
46008012	Ma taku wom ning lasin tin tumen epo po ehuro wom, ma wom sisnieh mi po tin ples wungin nginangan men tin ku nuk nhing som men, men wom ning lasin epo Krais kha men.
46008013	Tumen ma taku li ken nginan ani ning i ma worok tut po khin ma yang plong ko mi lasin men, men ku ngo ku ii li ken nginan tin imen kyok angan akomen, epon akuli nga ning i ma worok tut po khin ma yang plong ko mi lasin kyok.
46009001	Iyi, ngo e ku paengin som? Ngo e ku wo ngo pias som? Ngo e ku ion a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men kho som? Wom e ku kumang ta ngo tin nga ning i mi yang tin Akono men som, wah?
46009002	Epon taku po kara wo epo ngo e ku paengin ta hi som, takuma ngo men paengin ta wom weh ako. Epo wom kha tosukngin tin kakaek kumang tin nga kum ta po paengin mi yang tin Akono men ako.
46009003	Sakalngin tin nga sakal i mut eya ngo si ta po tin taku ion mi wungin tin ta ngo men men nuk ti:
46009004	Iyi, Got wa emhong ko po pim paengin epo pim ku ii endara u um tumen emhut kumang tin pim a ning i men wa pi engun?
46009005	Iyi, Got wa emhong ko po pim paengin epo pim ku espo titie pim tin wo hi phep men me to pim ken po paengin tin kara men, u yang tin Akono men ehuron, u a-Sipas tumen wa pi engun?
46009006	Wa tuk a-Barnabas misa tuk in engun epo emhong tin ku tuk a kum som men, wa pi engun?
46009007	Epo ara li epo lek walngin ma tuon ku kul enda aiingin tan? Wa ara wha mipi wain ta ma tuon ku iini enun som? Wa ara maran pit wo sipsip wa ilio angan ta ma tuon ku um esus ta sipsip tin imen kara som, tumen?
46009008	Iyi, nga ira wungin ta po tunus engun ani nga sakal tumen, wah? Wa wungin sinsin sakal tumen maksin ako, wah?
46009009	Epo sakalngin men panngin ta nuk mi Wungin Sinsin tin ta a Moses men taku, “Wom men ku paim wo bulmakau minan tin li paplot wit men asin.” Iyi, bulmakau ani Got silan khing epon weh men,
46009010	wa yang taku nhio wo it misan ani yang sakal tumen, wah? Wai, epon ku nhio wo it ako, kuma po tin kil kil mulus epon ku wha wit ihun men ku wha i to hoo mingin, u po tin paplot wit men ku ning i to hoo mingin tin ku po iso wa wit enun ta hi kara men kut tumen.
46009011	Epon taku pim a tep tep endara ihun tin emiunan men lunga wom, iyi, taku pim a lok lok endara aiingin tin ta pi mulus e ta wom men si emhut sun, men ku tin imen ku pim a dus wom epon hambip, wah?
46009012	Taku po enginin kara pok mi emhong to po kara tin tunus epo po ku wa endara kara hang wom men, si pim, epo pim men pok min weh kut ako, wah? Takuma emhong tin imen men ku pim a ning wungin ta epon som, si pim a wuh wungin mosop engun, epon akuli pim a ning i ma wungin ta pim ta ten ten epo pok putngin tunus tin ta Krais men.
46009013	Iyi, wom e pong epo engin epo po tin ning kumang mi mang auluungin men wa endara aiingin ta hi mi endara tin ta mang auluungin men, u po tin kum wo suyung men wa li ken nginan tin talu nginan wo suyung men ta hi kara kut tumen, wah?
46009014	Tumen kut kha yang tin Akono men wo maran ko klat ti, epo po tin pok put pok putngin tin tunus men ku wa endara tin ku elit hi tunus kuk epon men sup wet kumang tin po pok put pok putngin tin tunus men ako.
46009015	Takuma wungin tin nuk wom epo wom ku nhio wo ngo men men ku nga heek epo wom ku nhio wo ngo epo endara ta wa nga pan wungin ta tumen epon akomen; epon men tunus epo ngo ku hun wet, epon akuli po ta ning i ma wungin tin nga wangan po ngo ton iyi ko hut liit nuk engun.
46009016	Epon taku nga pok put pok putngin tin tunus men, men wungin tin ku nga wangan po ngo ton men men ku pi angun ako, epo Got wa kumang timen ko nuk ngo epo ngo ku ning i weh. Auh, won maikngin nhum takut ku los ngo, tin taku ngo ku pok put pok putngin tin tunus men som men!
46009017	Epon taku mi ngo nawaehngin ma nga ning kumang tin imen, men ku nga wa talungin epon ako; si taku ngo ku mi ngo nawaehngin som, men ku kumang tin Got wai si ta ngo epo ngo ku marango pit won men iso nuk yanga wili ngo ako.
46009018	Tumen ma talungin tin ku emhut kumang tin ta ngo men ani tua? Men ti, minan tin nga pok put pok putngin tin tunus men, men ku nga talu po epon hut emul engun, kumali emhong tin nga in ton mi pok putngin tin tunus men, men ku nga heek eyan weh akomen.
46009019	Epo ngo men wo ngo pias epo po masang to sun wala mosop ako, takuma nga wa ngo me sup wet wili po mosop ken po tin kum wo sun engun men ta, kumali nga espo po munuman si po sun me sup wet wili Krais;
46009020	ma to mara po Yuda men nga ko in ken po Yuda men ta, kumali nga espo po Yuda kara; to mara po tin kuk wet wungin sinsin men, men nga ko in ken po tin kuk wet wungin sinsin men ta, kumali nga espo po tin kuk wet wungin sinsin men kara;
46009021	to mara po tin kuk wetpo wungin sinsin men, men nga ko in ken po tin kuk wetpo wungin sinsin men ta, aku, ngo ku in wetpo wungin sinsin to mara Got som, si nga in wet wungin sinsin to mara Krais weh, takuma nga ko in wetpo wungin sinsin kumali nga espo po tin kuk wetpo wungin sinsin men kara;
46009022	si to mara po tin wo hi wiak men, men nga ko in ken po tin wo hi wiak men, kumali nga espo po tin wo hi wiak men kara kut tumen. Ngo men si in to wungin mosop to mara po masang to sun wala mosop, kumali nga ira soput mosop tin ku nga palolo po kara epon men.
46009023	Nga ning wungin tin imen sinsin men epo pok putngin tin tunus men, kumali nga pok mi moolngin tin ta pok putngin tin tunus men to wom.
46009024	Iyi, wom e pong epo engin epo po tin urut mara al epo saangin men mosop men whal ako, takuma po then ta kha kuli wa talungin men, wah? Tumen ma wom men ku whal ira wungin tin ti, epon ku wom wa talungin epon.
46009025	Ma po then then mosop tin urut mara al epon ku wa talungin men men karut hi tuo hi mi wungin mosop ako. Ma po men ning i tumen epon ku po wa talungin tin ku whuk kerek engun men ko ung mhi hi, si it men ning i epon ku it wa talungin tin ku whuk ewin som men ko ung mhi it ako.
46009026	Tumen ma nga saa, men ku nga saa asong pongin engun akomen. Ngo ku pim a lek wal, men ku nga peh wili ngo ken po tin peh wili hi amen engun men som kut tumen.
46009027	Awu. Tuo ngo wi ngo emkusin kuma nga wai me sup wet ngo, epon akuli nga pok put sakalngin si ta po enginin kara, si tuo ngo huuspit.
46010001	Apo ehurok, mi ngo epo wom ku kuk aku wom pong epo engin epo kho ma po tin inana it men kuk wet hingis ma po mosop li hik put wiu,
46010002	ma po mosop lup to a-Moses ma po wa baptais mi hingis u mi wiu kut tumen,
46010003	ma po mosop ii enda aiingin then tin emiunan men,
46010004	u po mosop um um then tin emiunan men kut tumen, epo po um um tin pol mi umat tin emiunan e ira po li men, ma umat tin imen men Krais ako.
46010005	Takuma po ta hi munuman kara men ku Got min saah pit po hi weh som, epo po emkusin a hi kara men nuk e plak pi tin tahunggu men engun.
46010006	Epo wungin tin si imen men tosukngin epo it kut tumen ako, men taku suk mara it epo it ku ngelek wo wungin lengwal ken po tin lap e ngelek won men asin.
46010007	Ma wom ning i aku wo wom nuk wet got tin tororokngin men enun ken po ta hi kara tin ning i men asin. Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Po masang to sun wala ko nuk e ii enda u po nuk e um um tumen, li klet ma po kekhek si ma po ula wal amen engun.”
46010008	Kuru it men ku kuk aku it ning elwanngin ken po ta hi kara tin ning i men asin, epo po ning i ma po khaut tausen khum ponwal u tausen myuk tumen (23,000) ko huu mi ungunan then ta engun.
46010009	Kuru it kuk aku it karong Krais ken po ta hi kara tin ning i men asin, men po ning i ma isaling mhuk po.
46010010	Kuru it kuk aku it sangengngeng ken po ta hi kara tin kuk e sangengngeng men asin, men po ning i ma tihngin tin wa kumang epon ku mhuk po men mhuk po kyok.
46010011	Epo wungin tin mosop imen si ta po epon men ku tosukngin engun, ma panngin nuk epon ku tak tulu it tin ung to elup tin ung e wiewi al me e me pyu pongin ko po it homani men.
46010012	Tumen ma taku po ta phaeng taku i e pit nhing, men ku haum tunus, epon akuli plong ko.
46010013	Karongngin enginin ta ani ku si ta wom men kho som, si men tin si ta po tunus kho ewin me kut men, takuma Got men to wungin anuh, ma yang men ku mang ta karongngin ta si ta wom tin ku los wom weh men akomen, si karongngin tin imen men ku yang hihi soput tin ku wom meleng karongngin epon men, kuma wom kakha hut ma wom lat i engun.
46010014	Tumen ma ehurok, wom tin mi it pit wo al men, wom men ku mhup lu kuk hin epo wungin tin ku wo wom nuk wet got torokngin men.
46010015	Nga sakal ta wom ken wom e po tin mhi hi ek men, ma tuo wom men ku ion mi wungin tin nga sakal i men weh.
46010016	Iyi, karu tin epo sam samngin men tin it sam sam Got epon men, men it pok mi Krais kalolwan epon kha men ako, wah? Kuru beret tin it tik tik i men, men it pok mi Krais emkusin epon kha men kut tumen ako, wah?
46010017	Epo it men munuman, takuma it men beret then u emkusin then kut tumen ako; epo it mosop men pok mi beret tin then imen ii nginan ewin.
46010018	Tulu wom hu pit po po Israel tin ung e khuuk wal wo mulus men, epo po tin ii talungin tin po talu Got epon men men mosop si klap to Got tin suyung tan men ako, wah?
46010019	Iyi, wungin tin nga sakal i imen ani sinsin tua? Men wom wo taku nga wo epo endara aiingin tin po talu got torokngin epon men men endara irawin ta, wa got tin torokngin men e endara irawin ta ani men, wah?
46010020	Awu. Epo nga wo epo talungin tin po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ning talungin epon men, men po talu emiun lengwal tin kuk e li li po pi pomua men kha men, si ku ta Got akomen, tumen ma marango luun epo wom tin ku si klap to emiun tin lengwal imen.
46010021	Wom men ku um ko mi karu tin ta yang tin Akono men u karu tin ta emiun lengwal tin kuk po pi pomua men tumen to al asin; wom men ku pok mi endara tin pit wo suyung ta yang tin Akono men u mi endara tin pit wo suyung ta emiun tin lengwal men to al asin kut tumen.
46010022	Wa it taku ning i kuma yang tin Akono men min luk ma yan sal pit wo it, wah? Iyi, ma it e taku kakha weh epo yang, wah?
46010023	Wungin mosop men tunus epo ngo ku ning i ako. Takuma wungin mosop ani ku nhio wo ngo weh men akomen. Wungin mosop men tunus epo ngo ku ning i ako. Takuma wungin mosop ani ku pa nhing ngo weh men akomen.
46010024	Po ta men ku tohuh epon ku tuon ung tunus asin, si men ku tohuh epon ku po tin hi ung then men ku hi weh ung tunus to al weh.
46010025	Endara tin emalin tunus e po tirih i mi nal walngin men men ku wom iini engun, si wom kines munuman epon asin, akuli mi wom tin ples wungin nginangan men wa wungin kyok ko pit po wom;
46010026	epo “mulus men ta yang tin Akono men, to endara mosop tin nuk won men.”
46010027	Ma taku po tin ku wo hi phep som men ta yuk wom lu ii endara to hi, ma mi wom epo wom ku lu, men ku wom ii endara tin tuni e po hihi i nuk maran min wom men engun, men ku wom kines munuman epon asin, akuli mi wom tin ples wungin nginangan men wa wungin kyok ko pit po wom.
46010028	Si taku po ta pok wom taku, “Li ken nginan tin imen men po talu got torokngin epon kha men,” men ku wom iini asin, sinsin epo po tin pok wom epon men, u epo mi po tin ples wungin nginangan men tumen, epo “mulus men ta yang tin Akono men, to endara mosop tin nuk won men.”
46010029	Epo nga wo epo mi po tin ples wungin nginangan men men ku nga sakal los po mi wom som. Awu. Men mi po tin enginin men kha men ako. Epo tua ma po tunus enginin ta min tin ples wungin nginangan men ku ples wungin epo ngo tin nga in e wo ngo pias engun men?
46010030	Epon taku nga sam sam Got ma nga ii endara to po, tuni ma po mimi ngo pit mi endara tin nga sam sam Got epon men?
46010031	Tumen ma taku wom ii endara wa wom um wa wom ning wungin ta tun tira wa tumen, men ku wom ning i mosop epon ku wom wa Got yan weh si epon misan.
46010032	Si wom kuk aku wom ning wungin ta tin ning i ma po Yuda, wa po Grik, wa po tin palu walngin ta Got men ku plong ko epon men asin,
46010033	men ken ngo maksin e taku ning wungin mosop tin ku po masang to sun wala mosop mi hi saah pit po ngo ton men, men ku nga tohuh epo wungin tin ku nhio wo ngo tuon men akomen. Awu. Nga tohuh epo wungin tin ku nga nhio wo po munuman epon men, kumali po palolongin epon weh.
46011001	Wom men ku ning wungin pit mina ngo weh ken ngo tin ning wungin pit mina Krais men.
46011002	Kut si ehurok, nga wangan po wom epon tin tulu wom hu ngo epo wungin mosop, ma wom kasum wungin pip tin ku wom ung e pat wal i lu ira wungin tin nga wai sup yanga wili wom weh kho kut men.
46011003	Takuma mi ngo epo wom ku ion i ti, epo Krais kha mhin epo po masang mosop men, u po masang kha mhin epo po wala men, u Got kha mhin epo Krais men kut tumen.
46011004	Taku po masang ta kines Got wa pok put wungin kaunngin, ma suk mhin, men wa manngin ko po mhin kha men.
46011005	Si taku wut wala ta ku kines Got wa pok put wungin kaunngin to mhin tin ku wut suk pon som men, men wut wa manngin ko po mhin kha men, epo wungin tin imen men ken wut e yeng pon mhin kha men ako.
46011006	Epon taku po wala ta ku suk mhin som, men ku klat yut li weh. Takuma it ion i epon taku wut wala ta ku klat pon yut li wa yeng pon tumen, men ku manngin ko pon ako, tumen men ku suk mhin engun.
46011007	Iis, epo po masang ta men tunus epon ku suk mhin akomen, epon men in kai Got enun u moolngin ta yang tumen ako, si po wala kha moolngin ta po masang men.
46011008	Epo po masang ani ku ningngin epo po wala men som, si po wala kha ningngin epo po masang men ako.
46011009	Kuru po masang ani ku ningngin epon ku nhio wo po wala men som, si po wala kha ningngin epon ku nhio wo po masang men ako.
46011010	Sinsin tin imen kha ku tunus epo po wala men ku suk mhi hi epo tosukngin ta tin ku pok put hi tin kuk wet wili sun men, men sinsin epo tihngin tin kuk e li li ma ion po men.
46011011	Takuma mi yang tin Akono men men ku po masang kuk engini hi weh epo po wala, wa po wala ku kuk engini hi weh epo po masang tumen akomen.
46011012	Epo po wala men ningngin epo po masang, tumen kut kha po masang maksin ko khuukngin epo po wala men, si epo wungin tin mosop imen men me hang Got ako.
46011013	Tuo wom ion mi wungin tin ti, men tunus epo po wala ta ku kines Got to mhin tin ku suk pongin som men wa tua?
46011014	Iyi, epo endara mosop tin khuuk wal pit minal to wungin ta hi weh men kha it ion i epon taku po masang ta yut nomalak, men ku manngin ko pon ako, wah?
46011015	Si taku po wala ta yut nomalak, men moolngin tan ako. Epo Got wa po wala yut hi si epon ku hi suk po hi epon.
46011016	Si taku po ta ku ngelek wo heek walngin pit mi wungin tin imen, men ku pim a ira wungin enginin ta wa palu walngin tin ta Got e ung e li li men ku ira wungin enginin ta tumen akomen.
46011017	Kut sini wungin tin ku nga panen wom epon homani men men ku nga wangan po wom epon akomen, epo minan tin wom mu palu wal men, men ku wungin tunus si hut akomen. Awu. Men wungin lengwal kha si hut men.
46011018	Epo wungin tin nuk epo sun tin imen tin li muk epo sun men men ti, minan tin wom mu palu wal then to palu walngin mosop men, nga hul epo takonngin kara si lunga wom, ma wungin tin imen put kara men wo ngo nuk wet ako.
46011019	Epo takonngin kara kuli iso weh si lunga wom ako, kuma po tin akani e Got min saah pit po hi men ku si nuk pi mlaeng lunga wom kuma wom hop i.
46011020	Tumen ma minan tin wom mu palu wal pi then ta men, men kakaomngin ta yang tin Akono men ani ku wom mu palu wal epon ku wom iini men akomen.
46011021	Epo minan tin wom ku ii endara men, men wom then then soh soh epon ku ii endara muk epo po kara engun, ma po kara kuk e huu elip si po kara um hambip ma mara hi hihi.
46011022	Who, wom e mang ta wom tin ku wom ii endara u wom um min men pi om, wah? Wa wom ku ion palu walngin ta Got ken i e amiron nginan engun men ani wom wa manngin ko po po tin endara ta hi om men, wah? Ngo ku sakal tua epo wom? Iyi, ngo ku wangan po wom, wah? Awu. Ngo ku wangan po wom epo wungin tin tumen akomen.
46011023	Epo wungin tin nga wai hang yang tin Akono men kha nga wai sup yanga wili wom kho men, men ti, epo pi luk tin a-Yesus tin Akono men wangin li sup yanga wili po tin nolo yang men, men yang wa beret ta si,
46011024	yang sam sam Got epon kut, anima yang tik tik i, ma yang wo taku, “Wom wai, si wom iini; men emali ngo tin ku hik putngin epon ku mut eya wom men kha men; wom ning i timen kuma tulu wom hu ngo epon.”
46011025	Kuru po ii endara li klet, anima yang ira wungin tin pit mina sun timen kyok ma yang wa karu ta si, yang wo taku, “Karu tin iyi men wungin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got u po tunus tumen tin homan e si epo ngo kalolwan men. Wom men ku ning i tumen kokyok kokyok minan tin ku li pol akani e ku wom um ko min men, kuma tulu wom hu ngo epon.”
46011026	Epo minan tin akani e ku wom ii beret tin imen u wom um ko mi karu tumen, men wom pok put hunngin tin ta yang tin Akono men li pol minan tin ku yang kyok me men kha men.
46011027	Tumen ma taku po ta ii beret tin imen u um ko mi karu tin ta yang tin Akono men tumen to wungin tin ku tunus som men, men wa lasin si pon epo yang tin Akono men emkusin u kalolwan tumen kha men.
46011028	Si po ta men ku ion mi wungin tan wet, ma wungin tin tumen khama tunus epon ku ii beret u um ko mi karu kut tumen.
46011029	Epon taku po ta ku ii beret u um ko mi karu to wungin tin ku tunus som men, men ii beret u um ko mi karu tin kuli Got wo los pon men kha men, epon men ku hop yang tin Akono men emkusin weh akomen.
46011030	Epo sinsin tin imen kha po munuman kuk e wiak wiak u sasaih tumen lunga wom men, kuru po munuman huu kho kut tumen.
46011031	Epon taku it tuo it men ku ples wungin ta it tunus, men ku wungin nuk epo po enginin kara ku ples wungin ta it akomen.
46011032	Si taku it sup mi ples walngin, men yang tin Akono men tus it kha men, epon akuli Got wo los po it to po tin ira wungin ta pi mulus men.
46011033	Tumen ma, ehurok, minan tin wom ku mu palu wal epon ku ii endara men, men ku wom kaeng wal wet.
46011034	Si taku po ta hun elip, men ku ii endara mang tan wet, epon akuli wom mu palu wal li Got wo los po wom. Si wungin tin kara e iso nuk men kuli minan tin nga me men khama nga nemeh i iso.
46012001	Kut si, ehurok, talungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, mi ngo epo wom men ku pong epon asin.
46012002	Wom ion i epon kho ma wom kuk ken po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, men got tororokngin enun kara ek ek mi wom epo wom ku ira endara tin imen li, men wom ira wungin enginin kara e endara tin imen wa wom li iran men engun.
46012003	Tumen ma nga pok wom ti, epo po ta tin sakal epo Emiun Auluungin men ku sakal taku, “A-Yesus men ku huuspit,” ti, akomen, wa po ta ku sakal taku, “A-Yesus men Akono,” ti, engun akomen kut tumen. Awu. Men epo Emiun Auluungin misan.
46012004	Epo talungin men kikyungin maran kiring kiring, si Emiun men then.
46012005	Kumang tin po kum ta sun men men maran kiring kiring, si yang tin Akono men men then.
46012006	Ma emhong tin siin iis men men maran kiring kiring, si Got then ta misan kha emhong tan siin iis mi po mosop epo kumang mosop men.
46012007	Kut ma Emiun Auluungin tin si in pi mlaeng men men ko ta po then then epon ku nhio wo po mosop.
46012008	Epo po ta wa talungin tin ku pok put sakalngin to mhin ekngin men epo Emiun Auluungin, u po enginin ta wa talungin tin ku pok put sakalngin to maran ekngin men epo Emiun tin then imen,
46012009	u po ta wa talungin tin epo wo phepngin men epo Emiun tin then imen, u po ta wa talungin epon ku ning i ma saihngin mimlis epo Emiun tin then imen,
46012010	u po ta wa talungin epon ku ning wungin maran kiring kiring men, u po ta wa talungin epon ku pok put wungin kaunngin men, u po ta wa talungin epon ku ion mi emiun tin kuk e li li men taku e tunus wa taku e lengwal, u po ta wa talungin epon ku pok put sakalngin ira sakalngin enginin enginin, u po ta wa talungin epon ku ples wungin tin sun ta pok put sakalngin ira sakalngin enginin enginin men sinsin kut tumen.
46012011	Takuma talungin tin mosop imen men Emiun tin then e tuon imen emhong tan siin iis min men, ma yang kikyu po then then epon ira mi yang tuon weh.
46012012	Epo emkusin men then ma tingit munuman, takuma emkusin tin then imen tingit mosop, aku, men munuman, takuma men emkusin then, tumen kut kha ken Krais emkusin men.
46012013	Epo Emiun then ta kha it mosop wa baptais ma it sup mi emkusin then ta epon men, aku, taku it Yuda, wa Grik, wa po tin kum wo sun engun men, wa po tin wo hi pias men, ma men ningngin ma it mosop um ko mi Emiun tin then imen.
46012014	Iis, epo emkusin men ku tingit then ta akomen, si men tingit munuman ako.
46012015	Taku khin sakal taku, “Ngo men ku wilin som, tumen ma ngo ku emkusin tingit ta akomen,” ti, iyi sakalngin tin imen ani ku ning i ma khin ku tingit ta emkusin ta som men, wah?
46012016	U taku kingan sakal taku, “Ngo men ku maran som, tumen ma ngo ku emkusin tingit ta akomen,” ti, iyi, sakalngin tin imen ani ku ning i ma kingan ku tingit ta emkusin ta som men, wah?
46012017	Taku emkusin palamisim mosop maran, si tingit tin ku hul sakalngin epon men ani a? Wa taku emkusin palamisim kingan, si tingit tin ku ipek endara epon men ani a?
46012018	Si homani ma Got hihi emkusin tingit mosop, men yang hihi i then then sup li pit e li li mi emkusin ira mi yang weh.
46012019	Si taku emkusin mosop tingit then ta engun, si kuli emkusin timen kara maksin kuli in a?
46012020	Si homani ma emkusin tingit munuman, takuma tingit mosop men si emkusin then irawin weh ako.
46012021	Si maran men khuk po sakalngin tin ku maran ko wo ta wilin taku, “Ngo men ku hing wo ngon akomen,” ti; u mhin men khuk po sakalngin tin ku mhin ko wo ta khin taku, “Ngo men ku hing wo ngon akomen,” ti kut tumen.
46012022	Si irawin weh epo emkusin tingit tin maran ken i e wiak wiak engun men, timen taku kis, men ku emkusin kalwok weh.
46012023	Kuru it emkusin tingit kara tin it wo taku i e taku yan om epo sun kara men, timen kha it pa mool i weh epo sun kara men; si it emkusin tin it ku wai si in pi mlaeng akomen, timen kha it khek i weh epo sun kara men,
46012024	si it emkusin tingit kara tin it mang tan si nuk pi mlaeng engun men ku in epo it ku phae pon akomen. Epo Got hihi it emkusin sup me klap then, men yang wa yan si ta emkusin tingit tin yan om engun men men si nhum epo sun kara,
46012025	tumen kumali emkusin ku pal pal mingin kyok akomen, si emkusin tingit mosop ku mara hi pit wo al to min sukngin then weh.
46012026	Ma taku emkusin tingit ta wuh won maikngin, men ku emkusin mosop wuh won maikngin to al ako; u taku emkusin tingit ta yan pos, men ku emkusin mosop mi hi keh keh to al kut tumen.
46012027	Epo wom mosop kha Krais emkusin men ako, ma wom then then men Krais emkusin tingit ta kha men.
46012028	Ma Got hihi po kara kuk mi palu walngin men ti, men yang hihi po paengin kha muk men, u tin me ponwal angan men men po pokngin, u tin me miuk angan men men po tin kot sun men, anima talungin tin epo wungin maran kiring kiring ning nginan men, anima talungin tin epo saihngin mimlis nginan men, u kho wongin, u tin maran pit wo po men, u tin sakal ira sakalngin enginin enginin men tumen.
46012029	Iyi, po mosop e ku si paengin, wah? Po mosop e ku si pokngin, wah? Po mosop e ku si tin kot sun men, wah? Po mosop e ku kuk e ning wungin maran kiring kiring, wah?
46012030	Iyi, po mosop e ku wa talungin epo saihngin mimlis nginan, wah? Po mosop e ku sakal ira sakalngin enginin enginin, wah? Wa po mosop e ku pok put wungin tin imen sinsin, wah?
46012031	Si wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku mara wom nes talungin tin nunhum epo sun kara men weh. Si homani ma ngo ku suk mara wom epo soput tin iso tunus weh men.
46013001	Aku, taku nga sakal ira sakalngin enginin enginin tin ta po tunus men wa tin ta po tihngin men tumen, si nga kalwok epo min epongin, men nga si ken enda brasan ta tin sokngin ma ingut engun men u ken lawosang tin ingut whung whung engun men kut tumen.
46013002	U taku nga wa talungin tin ku nga pok put wungin kaunngin epon men, ma nga hop mi wungin kaunngin sinsin mosop u nga wa maran ekngin mosop, u nga wa wo phepngin mosop kuma nga wo ma pi emian osong li pit pi ta tumen, si taku nga kalwok epo min epongin, men nga in amiron nginan engun ako.
46013003	U taku nga wa endara mosop tin ta ngo men si ta po tin kes men, u taku mi ngo alang si ngo emkusin si po kara sut i, si nga kalwok epo min epongin, men ku nhio wo ngo kara som.
46013004	Min epongin men wuh wungin li maran nomalak, u ning i tunus epo po tumen; min epongin men ku min heh wet po ewin som; min epongin men ku sasayih ewin som, men ku wai si pit ewin som,
46013005	men ku ning wungin tin to manngin men ewin som, men ku tohuh epo wungin tan tuon weh ewin som, men ku min teng si kerek ewin som, men ku tulun hu wungin tin po ning i lengwal epon men ewin som,
46013006	men ku min keh keh pit po wungin tin po ples i lengwal men ewin som, si min keh pit po wungin tin po ples i to wungin tin irawin weh men misan;
46013007	men lat won maikngin mosop tin si pon men, men won nuk wet wungin mosop, men hoo min pit po wungin mosop, u men pit nhing wet won maikngin mosop kut tumen.
46013008	Min epongin men ku put ko nuk angan akomen. Si taku po pok put wungin kaunngin kara, men kuli put mih ko; taku po sakal ira sakalngin enginin enginin kara, men kuli put mut; taku po pok put maran ekngin ta hi, men kuli li kis ako.
46013009	Epon homani ma it ion wungin, men kiak kiak engun u it pok put wungin kaunngin, men kiak kiak engun kut tumen.
46013010	Si takuli sulung ma tin tunus weh men si, men ku tin kiak kiak men ku mlisngin li ako.
46013011	Minan tin nga iso hoin men nga sakal ken po hoin men, nga ples wungin sinsin ken po hoin men, marango ira sakalngin ken po hoin men, taku li klet ma nga si nomuru kut, men nga mang ta wungin tin ta po hoin men li ako.
46013012	Epo homani ma mara it hilo po endara ken i e it ion i mi tupngin men engun, takuli sulung men ku mara it sak wal weh. Homani ma nga ion wungin, men kiak kiak engun, si kuli sulung men ku nga ion wungin, men ku nga ion i ken sun tin Got hop ngo ton weh men.
46013013	Si homani ma wo phepngin, hoo mingin, u min epongin tumen, tin khaut miuk imen kha iso nuk men, si wungin tin khaut miuk imen ta tin nhum weh epo sun men men min epongin.
46014001	Wom men ku ira wungin tin epo min epongin men weh, kuru wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku wa talungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men weh kut tumen, si wom men ku tohuh weh epo wom ku pok put sakalngin tin kaunngin men.
46014002	Epo po ta tin sakal ira sakalngin enginin ta men, men ku sakal ta po tunus akomen. Awu. Men sakal ta Got ako, epo po ta ku hul wungin tin po tin imen sakal i men som, si men pok put wungin kaunngin epo Emiun Auluungin.
46014003	Si taku po ta pok put wungin kaunngin, men sakal ta po tunus epon ku khek po si pit nhing, u wo nut po, u pa nhing po kut tumen.
46014004	Si taku po ta sakal ira sakalngin enginin ta, men khek i tuon si pit nhing, si taku po ta pok put wungin kaunngin, men khek palu walngin si pit nhing kha men.
46014005	Mi ngo epo wom mosop ku sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin enginin men, si mi ngo weh epo wom ku pok put wungin kaunngin; epo po ta tin pok put wungin kaunngin men men nhum epo sun tin sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin men, si taku irawin epo po ta tin imen tuon kha ku ples sakalngin tin imen sinsin, kuma palu walngin wa pa nhingngin epon, men timen nhum weh kut tumen ako.
46014006	Si, ehurok, taku homani ma nga me epo wom ma nga sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin men, men kuli nga nhio wo wom tua? Si taku nga sakal ta wom ira wungin tin Got las i si in epo ngo men, wa nga ira maran ekngin kara, wa nga ira pok put wungin kaunngin kara, wa nga ira kotngin kara tumen, men timen kha ku nhio wo wom weh men, wah?
46014007	Iis, epo endara kara tin ku to maran tunusngin som men, tin ken lapulwi wa gita wa tumen, taku ingut si ingutngin tan ku ieh wal som, men ku it hop lutngin tin po so so lapulwi wa po sok gita iran men tua?
46014008	Epon taku kiyak ku hau sup mi al, men are ku hihi epo lek walngin?
46014009	Tumen kha wom maksin taku mamai wom ku pok put sakalngin, men ku pok put sakalngin put kara tin awo mlus nginan epon ku po hul i sinsin men, wah? Wa taku pi engun, men kuli po kara hul sakalngin tin wom sakal i men sinsin tua? Epo wom men sakal i lu yang ken eip men engun.
46014010	Irawin, epo sakalngin tin po sakal i ta hi weh men maran kiring kiring kuk wo mulus ako, ma men ta ku sinsin om akomen.
46014011	Tumen ma taku nga pong epo sakalngin tin po sakal i ta hi men sinsin, men ku po ion ngo men enginin epo po, u nga ion po men enginin epo ngo kut tumen.
46014012	Tumen kha wom maksin tin tohuh epo wom ku wa talungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, sinsin epo wom ku khek palu walngin si pit nhing kha ku wom tohuh weh epon men.
46014013	Tumen ma taku po ta sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin men ta, men ku kines Got, kuma pok put sakalngin sinsin timen weh.
46014014	Epon taku nga kines ira sakalngin enginin ta, men emiu ngo kha kines men, si mi ngo tin ples wungin sinsin men ku wa endara aiingin kara akomen.
46014015	Tumen ma kuli tua? Men ku nga kines epo emiu ngo, kuru epo mi ngo tin ples wungin sinsin men kut tumen. Ngo ku lut lutngin epo emiu ngo, kuru epo mi ngo tin ples wungin sinsin men kut tumen.
46014016	Wa taku tumen som, taku e sam sam Got epo emiun misan, men ku po ta tin in pi ta po tin pong epo engin men sakal, “Irawin,” ti, wet sakalngin tin e sam sam Got epon men tua, epon men ku hul wungin tin e sakal i imen sinsin akomen?
46014017	Iis, epo ngon men sam sam Got irawin ako, takuma men ku khek po ta tin enginin men si pit nhing akomen.
46014018	Nga sam sam Got epo ngo men sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin enginin men hambip epo wom mosop ako.
46014019	Si lunga palu walngin men mi ngo epo ngo ku pok put sakalngin put eip epo mi ngo tin ples wungin sinsin men weh, kuma nga kot po kara epon maksin, si taku nga pok put sakalngin put tausen kum ta (10,000) ira sakalngin enginin ta, men ku mi ngo epon weh akomen.
46014020	Ehurok, wom men ku kuk to mi wom tin ples wungin sinsin men ken po hoin men asin, si wungin tin lengwal men, men ku wom weh kuk ken po hoin tin po hi mumlek men engun, si mi wom tin ples wungin sinsin men men ku wom kuk ken po tin nonomuru men weh.
46014021	Sakalngin men panngin nuk mi wungin sinsin taku, ‘’’Po tin sakal ira sakalngin enginin kara tin ta hi weh men u mi wo po enginin kara tumen kha ku nga sakal i si ta po masang to sun wala tin imen epon men, ma nga in e sakal wungin tin imen kokyok kokyok, takuma po ku hul wet wungin ta ngo akomen.’ Yang tin Akono men kha wo tumen.”
46014022	Tumen ma wungin tin po sakal ira sakalngin enginin enginin men men tosukngin ta, si men ku tosukngin ta po tin wo hi phep kho men som, si men ta po tin ku wo hi phep som men; si wungin tin po pok put wungin kaunngin epon men ku ta po tin ku wo hi phep kho som men akomen. Awu. Men ta po tin wo hi phep kho men ako.
46014023	Tumen ma taku palu walngin mosop me palu wal pi then ta, ma po mosop sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin enginin men, ma po kara tin pong epo engin wa ku wo hi phep som men kara me sup, men ku po wo epo wom e ulil engun kha men wah, iyi?
46014024	Si taku po mosop pok put wungin tin kaunngin men, ma po ta tin ku won phep som men wa po ta tin pong epo engin engun men me sup mi wom, men wungin tin wom mosop pok put men ku tak si wungin tin ta po men ako, ma po mosop ples wungin ta sun tin imen.
46014025	Ma wungin tin imen men ku wungin tin kaunngin nuk mi po tin imen lasngin si in pi mlaeng epon, tumen ma po plong ko mara hi ko mi mulus, men ku po wa Got yan si ma po pok epo Got men in lunga wom irawin weh ako.
46014026	Tumen ma ehurok, minan tin ia e wom mu palu wal then epon men, tua ma po ta wom ta lut lutngin ta, u po ta wom ta ira kotngin ta, u po ta wom ta sakal ira sakalngin enginin ta, u po ta wom ta pok put wungin tin Got suk maran epon men ta, u po ta wom ta ples wungin tin po sakal ira sakalngin enginin ta men tumen? Wom men ku ning wungin mosop tin ku wom khek wal si nuk nhing epon men weh.
46014027	Taku po ta sakal ira sakalngin enginin ta, men ku wulong ponwal wa wuluk miuk, si ku po kara sup me lup to sun asin, men ku ngyuk pit e wiewi al to sakalngin, ma po ta pok put sakalngin sinsin.
46014028	Si taku po ta tin ku pok put sakalngin sinsin men pi om, men ku yang tin imen homong mi palu walngin, si sakal si tan tuon u ta Got tumen misan.
46014029	Si pokngin men ku wulong ponwal wa wuluk miuk tumen sakal, si po tin kara men ion mi wungin ta wuluk.
46014030	Si taku wungin kaunngin ta lasngin si ta po enginin ta tin ung porili sun men, men ku yang tin sakal li muk men homong engun.
46014031	Epo wom mosop men ku pit e wiewi al ma wom pok put wungin kaunngin then then ako, kuma po mosop urut sakalngin kuma po mosop wa nhingngin epon.
46014032	Epo po pokngin emiu hi men po tuo hi kasum i tunus ako.
46014033	Epo Got men ku sinsin epo wungin tin hik sup mi al men ewin akomen, si men epo min wyungin misan, wala wungin si tumen mi palu walngin mosop tin ta po masang to sun wala tin hi auluungin men.
46014034	Si po wala tin ta wom men men ku hi homong mi palu walngin tin ung e li li men, epon men auluungin epo po tin ku sakal men; si po men ku wa hi me sup wet wili sun ken wungin sinsin tin sakal epon men.
46014035	Si taku po mi hi epo po ku urut wungin ta, men ku po kines titien hi mi mang tin ta hi men wet; epon taku po wala sakal mi palu walngin, men to manngin ako.
46014036	Iyi, wom ani sakalngin ta Got si epo wom muk men, wah? Wa misa wom ani sakalngin ta Got me pol ta wom men, wah?
46014037	Taku po ta phaeng epon e ku pokngin ta wa ku in e ira Emiun Auluungin, men ku sam wet sakalngin tin nga pan i ti epo wom men men wungin tin yang tin Akono men wo maran ko klat epon kha men.
46014038	Si taku po ta pong epo engin, men ku pong epo engin kut.
46014039	Tumen ma, ehurok, wom men ku tohuh weh epo wom ku pok put wungin kaunngin, si wom uluu po tin taku sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin enginin men asin.
46014040	Si wom men ku ning wungin mosop, men ku wom ning i tin manngin om epon men u tin ira hihingin tunus men kut tumen weh.
46015001	Kut si, ehurok, ngo ku pok wom kyok epo pok putngin tin tunus e nga pok put si ta wom kho men, tin wom wai kho ma wom nuk nhing epon men,
46015002	tin wom palolongin epon maksin men, tin taku wom kasum wungin tin nga pok put si ta wom kho men pip, epon akuli wo wom nuk wet ma hut li nuk engun.
46015003	Epo kho ma nga wa wungin si nuk yanga wili wom kho muk, tin nga wai maksin yanga wili po kara men, men ti: epo Krais hun mut eya it to lasin ta it ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk men,
46015004	ma po kil yang, ma ungunan miuk mili, anima yang khekngin kyok si tunus ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk men,
46015005	ma yang si put plo nginan ta a-Sipas, anima wuluk tin paengin e eip ponwal u ponwal tumen maksin.
46015006	Li klet anima po ehuro it tin khum khum eip (500) u iso ung e li si tumen ion yang maksin mi elup then, men po tin imen munuman kara iso kuk, si kara huu kho.
46015007	Li klet anima a-Yemis ion yang, anima po paengin mosop ion yang kut tumen.
46015008	Li klet ma sulung epo po mosop men nga ion yang maksin kut tumen, men ken ngo e po ta tin ko khuukngin mi elup tin ku siik som men.
46015009	Epo ngo men tun engun weh mi po paengin, ma ngo men e ku tunus epon ku po sikia ngo paengin akomen, epon tin nga mumhek mi palu walngin tin ta Got men.
46015010	Takuma nanaangin tin ta Got men kha nga si in ken nga in ti kut i, ma nanaangin ta yang tin me epo ngo men ku hut li nuk akomen, si men nga tohuh epo kumang hambip weh epo po paengin kara ako, si ku tuo ngo som, si men nanaangin ta Got tin in to ngo men ako.
46015011	Tumen ma, aku, taku ngo wa po paengin enginin kara pok put wungin, men wungin tin tumen kha pim a pok put men u wungin tin tumen kha wo wom nuk wet men tumen ako.
46015012	Kut si homani ma taku pim a pok put Krais tin khek si mi hunngin kyok si tunus men, taku tuni ma po kara tin kuk lunga wom men wo epo khekngin mi hunngin si men men e pi engun?
46015013	Si taku khekngin mi hunngin si pi om, men ku Krais maksin ku khekngin kyok si som.
46015014	Ma taku Krais ku khekngin kyok si som, men kuli wungin tin pim a pok put men sinsin om, u wo phepngin ta wom sinsin om kut tumen.
46015015	Kuru po men ku ion pim ken pim e po tin pok put sakalngin ta Got e torokngin men kara, sinsin epon tin pim a pok put wungin epo Got tin taku yang khek Krais si men, si taku irawin epo po tin huu kho men ku khek kyok si tunus som, men ku Got ku khek Krais si tunus som maksin kut tumen ako.
46015016	Epon taku po tin huu kho men ku khek kyok si som, men ku Krais ku khekngin kyok si som kut tumen.
46015017	Ma taku Krais ku khekngin kyok si som, men ku wo phepngin ta wom sinsin om, men ku wom iso kuk to lasin ta wom!
46015018	Kuru taku tumen, men po tin huu mi Krais kho men huuspit kyok kut tumen.
46015019	Epon taku wo mulusngin tin iyi misan ani it hoo mi it pit wo Krais men, men it ko kuk to mara po masang to sun wala ken po tin kuk amusukngin weh mi po tunus tin kara e it ung wo mulus men.
46015020	Si homani ma Krais khekngin kyok si mi po tin hi huu kho men kho kut ako, ma yang li muk po tin huu kho kut men ken endara tin enun muru muk men.
46015021	Epo po tunus ta kha hunngin me epon men, tumen kut kha po tunus ta kyok kha wungin tin po khek kyok si tunus men me epon kut tumen ako.
46015022	Epo po mosop tin huu mi Adam men, tumen kut kha po mosop tin kuk mi Krais men kuli hi khekngin kyok si tunus kut tumen ako.
46015023	Takuma po then then men ku khekngin kyok si ira hihingin ta hi weh; Krais men khekngin kyok si muk ken endara tin enun muru muk men, anima po tin ta Krais men kuli kekhekngin kyok si minan tin kuli yang kyok me men ako.
46015024	Li klet anima elup tin ku li ponsol men si, men ku yang suuk sii po mosop tin mara hi pit wo sun men u po mosop tin emhong nuk si wut hi men u kakhangin mosop tumen, anima yang wa enunu kyok li sup yang wili Got tin Wiraman men.
46015025	Epo yang men ku weh si sinkhaung ta ma yang maran pit wo endara mosop weh li pol minan tin kuli yang khin los po po mosop tin nolo yang men me sup wet khi yang men.
46015026	Po nolo tin kuli yang mhuk i sulung weh men men hunngin ako.
46015027	Epo “Got wa endara mosop me sup wet khi yang kho kut.” Si Got tin sakal taku, “Endara mosop men wangin me sup wet khi yang kho kut,” men it ion i in pi mlaeng ako epo yang tin wa endara mosop me sup wet khi yang men ku wungin tin imen los yang akomen.
46015028	Ma minan tin kuli endara mosop ku me sup wet khi yang men, anima Wirun tuon maksin ku me sup wet yang tin wa endara mosop me sup wet khi Wirun men kut tumen, kumali Got in ken endara mosop mi po mosop.
46015029	Wa taku po tin huu kho men ku khekngin kyok si som, men ku po tin wa baptais mut eya sun tin huu kho men ku ning i tua? Epon taku po tin huu kho men ku kekhekngin kyok si tunus som, men tuni ma po tin imen wa baptais mut eya po tin huu kho men?
46015030	Kuru tuni ma pim a kuk e ning wo lalaingin kokyok kokyok epo ele?
46015031	Ungunan then then men ngo taku hun angan. Nga tung tung nuk wo ngo tin wangan po wom mi Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men epo wungin timen men irawin weh.
46015032	Taku nga ira wungin ta po tunus engun ma nga sewut li ken nginan enih epo pi Epesus, men timen kuli nhio wo ngo tua? Taku po tin hu hu kho men ku kekhek kyok si som, “men ku it ii endara u it um um tumen engun, epo pi king kauk men ku it huu!”
46015033	Wom mang ta po kara me ek ek mara wom asin. “Taku it klap po tin wungin ta hi lengwal men, men ku timen ning i ma wungin ta it tin tunus men ko hies.”
46015034	Tuon, wom piphip si ira wungin tin siik men, si wom ning lasin kyok asin; epo po ta wom kara iso pong epo Got. Nga wo tumen, men nga wa manngin ko po wom kha men.
46015035	Kut si po ta ku kines taku, “Po tin huu kho men kuli kekhek kyok si tua? Kuru po ku kekhekngin kyok si to hi emkusi hi tua tumen?”
46015036	Ngon tin wungin tap ulil men, endara tin e wha i men ku plok si, men ku hun wet, khali iso plok kyok si tunus.
46015037	Ma endara tin e wha i men men ku e wha i tin ku iso plok si men akomen, si men e wha i ihun engun, tin taku wit ihun wa endara kara maksin wa tumen.
46015038	Si Got wa endara tin plok si men pon tan weh ira mi yang weh, men yang wa endara tin plok si men si ta enda ihun then then weh.
46015039	Endara mosop men ku emalin kai wal som. Awu. Po tunus men emali hi tawe, u li ken nginan men emalin tawe, u ili men emalin tawe, u emon men emalin tawe kut tumen.
46015040	Kuru endara tin kuk ili wet pi men men pon tawe, u endara tin kuk mulus men men pon tawe kut tumen; takuma moolngin ta endara tin kuk ili wet pi men men pon ta weh, u moolngin ta endara tin kuk mulus men men pon ta weh kut tumen.
46015041	Moolngin ta sinang men tawe, u moolngin ta namih men tawe, u moolngin ta awheng men tawe kut tumen ako; epo awheng ta men moolngin tan men maran kiring epo sun tin then then kara men.
46015042	Tumen kut kha kuli khekngin mi po tin huu kho men si in tumen. Epo emkusin tin kilngin men men whuk ewin, si men ku khekngin si, men ku emkusin tin ku whuk ewin som men.
46015043	Emkusin kilngin, men ken i e amiron nginan engun, si emkusin khekngin si, men to moolngin. Emkusin kilngin, men wiak wiak, si emkusin khekngin si, men to kakhangin ako.
46015044	Emkusin tin kilngin men men ta pi mulus, si emkusin tin khekngin si men men emiunan. Epo emkusin tin ta pi mulus men men in, u emkusin tin emiunan men men in kut tumen.
46015045	Tumen ma sakalngin panngin ta nuk ti, “Po tunus tin muk e Adam men men si enun tunusan ta,” ti, si Adam tin me sulung men men si emiun ta tin pho po tunusngin men.
46015046	Takuma emkusin tin emiunan men ani ku si muk men som, si emkusin tin ta pi mulus men kha si muk men, anima emkusin tin emiunan men si.
46015047	Po tunus tin in muk men men ta pi mulus, ma men mulusan; si po tunus tin me ponwal men men yang tin Akono e me ko wet pi men.
46015048	Yang tin tunus e mulusan men in ti, kut kha po mosop tin mulusan men kuk ti kut tumen; ma yang tin ta pi wet pi men in ti, kut kha po tin ta pi wet pi men kuk timen kut tumen.
46015049	Ma it tin wa yang tin mulusan men enun kai po it kho men, tumen kut kha kuli it wa yang tin ta pi wet pi men enun kai po it kut tumen.
46015050	Ehurok, nga pok wom ti, epo emalin u enghik ani ku wa pakuh pongin epo enunu tin ta Got men akomen; kuru endara tin whuk ewin men ani ku wa pakuh pongin epo endara tin ku whuk ewin som men akomen kut tumen.
46015051	Wom hul, epo ngo ku pok wom epo wungin kaunngin ta ti, epo it mosop men ku huu som, si it mosop kuli phae si enginin ta ako,
46015052	timen men ku si kerek engun ken it tin mara it khim men, minan tin kiyak tin ingut sulung men ingut men. Epo kiyak tin imen ku ingut, men ku po tin huu kho men ku khekngin kyok si to emkusi hi tin ku whuk ewin som men, ma it ku si phae si mara it enginin.
46015053	Epo emkusin tin whuk ewin iyi ku sup mi emkusin tin ku whuk ewin som men weh, u emkusin tin hun ewin iyi ku sup mi emkusin tin ku hun ewin som men weh kut tumen.
46015054	Tumen ma minan tin emkusin tin whuk ewin iyi ku sup mi emkusin tin ku whuk ewin som men, u emkusin tin hun ewin iyi ku sup mi emkusin tin ku hun ewin som men tumen, men ku sakalngin si pyu pongin tin panngin nuk taku, “Hunngin men huuspit ma kuumngin li kut.”
46015055	“Tuon, Hunngin, kut ngon tin e wel po epon men ani a? Ngon tin pi ta hunngin men, nomkangin tin tap men ani a?”
46015056	Kut tin hunngin wel po epon men men lasin, ma kakhangin ta lasin men wungin tin sinsin men.
46015057	Takuma it men ku sam sam Got tin ning i ma it nomka hut hunngin yanga wili a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men.
46015058	Tumen ma, ehurok, wom tin mi it pit wo al men, wom nuk nhing si wom ning i aku wom hoko si wom kyok lu asin, men ku wom tohuh epo kumang tin ta yang tin Akono men ning nginan kokyok kokyok weh, epo wom ion i epo kumang tin wom wuh i ta yang tin Akono men ku li hut emul engun ewin akomen.
46016001	Kut si ngo ku sakal epo wom tin ku palu ulu ta po masang to sun wala tin auluungin men, tin nga panen palu walngin tin ung e li li Galesia men epon kho men, kut kha ku wom iran weh kut tumen.
46016002	Ungunan tin si muk sun mi elup ponwal me sup tin ung e wiewi al li men, men ku wom then then pok pok mi ulu ta wom kara li ung e li li enginin ma wom halung pon ira miranngin ta wom then then weh, kumali minan tin ku nga kyok me pon ta wom men, men ku wom palu talungin kara kyok akomen.
46016003	Ma minan tin nga kyok me pol men men ku nga tirih po tin akani e ku wo wom ung wo hi men to kisang ma po espo talungin ta wom li Yerusalem.
46016004	Si taku tunus epo ngo ku li maksin, men po ku pim a li.
46016005	Epo ngo ku iso me pol ta wom minan tin ku nga li Masedonia li men, epo ngo ku li Masedonia ma li ako.
46016006	Ma ngo ku ti in hang wom kara wa men, wa taku nga in hang wom kaeng elup tin ta pi huk hukan men wet, kumali wom nhio wo ngo epo muk mukngin ta ngo epo pi tin kuli nga li tuni epon men.
46016007	Epo mi ngo epo ngo ku ion wom homani engun men ku ngo ku iso kerek li akomen, epo nga hoo mi ngo epo ngo ku iso in hang wom put monlo long, tin taku yang tin Akono men mang ta ngo men.
46016008	Si ngo ku iso in epo pi Epesus li pol Pentikos.
46016009	Epo sowon tin ku nga ning kumang tunus epon men nhum pit epo ngo kho kut, takuma po tin nolo ngo men munuman kuk.
46016010	Kut si taku a-Timoti me pon ta wom, men ku wom ning i kuma yang in lunga wom to min tin lemngin om epon men, epo yang men ning kumang ta sun tin Akono men, ken ngo tin ning i men kut tumen ako.
46016011	Tumen ma wom mang si po ta wom ta men ku mimi yang asin, si wom tih yang lu to min wyungin, kuma yang kyok me epo ngo, epo nga in e kaeng yang tin ku me to po ehuro it kara men.
46016012	Kut si wiro it Apolos men nga hau nuk sii khin hambip epon ku ti pol ta wom to po ehuro it kara, takuma yang maran luun takut epo yang tin ku ti pol ta wom minan tin iyi men, si yang kuli me minan tin yang ku ion soput tunus ta tin ku nuk men.
46016013	Wom haum tunus, ma wom pit nhing wo wo phepngin tin wo wom nuk wet kut men, men ku mi wom puplet weh ma wom kakha ton.
46016014	Ma wungin mosop tin wom ning i men, men ku to min epongin weh.
46016015	Kut si, ehurok, wom ion a-Stepanus hi po tin hi khuuk wal men, tin po si wo hi phep muk epo po mosop tin ung wo mulusngin Akaia men, kuru po hihi mi hi epo po ku kum ta po tin auluungin men kut tumen, tumen ma nga suh mi kinga wom,
46016016	epo wom ku wa wom sup wet wili po tin wungin ta hi tumen, u wet wili po mosop tin pim a wuh kumang to wal men kut tumen.
46016017	Epo mi ngo keh keh epo a-Stepanus u a-Portunatus u Akaikus tumen tin ngyuk me pol ta ngo men, epo endara tin wom kalwok epo wom ku wai si men, men wuluk wa pi ta wom ma wuluk wai si kut.
46016018	Epo wuluk ning i ma emiu ngo ko li wyu ung u emiu wom ko li wyu ung maksin kut tumen. Tumen ma wom men ku wa ya po tin tumen ya hi si.
46016019	Kut si palu walngin tin ung e li li wo mulusngin Esia men wa mi hi ti epo wom, kuru Akwila ngong e-Prisila wa mi ngong ti epo wom mi yang tin Akono men to mi ngong weh kut tumen, to palu walngin tin palu wal mi mang tin ta wulong men.
46016020	Po ehuro it tin mosop ung iyi men wa mi hi ti epo wom. Kuru wom men ku wa mi wom si ta al then then to tumum wongin tin auluungin men tumen weh.
46016021	Ngo a-Pol wa mi ngo ti epo wom epo wungin tin wili ngo tuon pan i men wala iyi.
46016022	Ma taku po ta ku min pit wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men som, men ku huuspit. Aluuh, mi ngo epo yang tin Akono ta it men ku me kerek!
46016023	Min sukngin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men men ku in to wom.
46016024	Min epongin tin ta ngo men men ku in to wom mosop mi Krais Yesus kut tumen. Men irawin.
47001001	A-Pol tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais epo wungin tin nuk ta mi Got men u a-Timoti tin wiro it men tumen kha tuk a tirih kisang tin i ti epo palu walngin tin ta Got e ung Korin men, to po mosop tin auluungin e ung e li li wo mulusngin Akaia sup e klet men:
47001002	Nanaangin ku ko ta wom kuru min wyungin kut tumen hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen.
47001003	It men ku sam sam Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin sinsin epo min sukngin maran kiring kiring men, kuru Got tin sinsin epo pa nhingngin mosop men kut tumen,
47001004	tin pa nhing pim wet wili wo maikngin mosop tin ta pim men, kumali pim men ku pit nhing epo pim tin ku pa nhing po tin sup wet wili wo maikngin kara tin tun tara men to pa nhingngin tin Got pa nhing pim tuon epon men.
47001005	Epo wo maikngin tin maran kiring kiring e Krais wuh i men ko tenge ma los po pim maksin, tumen kut kha pa nhingngin tin Got pa nhing pim epon men ko tenge mi pim epo Krais ma los po wom maksin kut tumen.
47001006	Si taku won maikngin lek pim, men epon ku pim a pa nhing mi wom epon maksin ma wom si palolongin epon. Pa nhingngin tin imen men ku siin iis mi wom kumali wom nuk nhing wet won maikngin ken sun tin pim a nuk nhing wet won maikngin men. Wa taku pim a wa pa nhingngin, men epon ku wom wa pa nhingngin maksin ma wom si palolongin epon maksin kut tumen.
47001007	Ma hoo mingin tin ta pim e pit wo wom men men pit nhing, epo pim a ion i epo wom tin pok mi won maikngin to pim men, tumen kut kha kuli wom pok mi pa nhingngin to pim maksin kut tumen ako.
47001008	Epo, ehurok, mi pim epo wom ku pong epo engin asin, epo won maikngin tin si ta pim wo mulusngin Esia men, men iso maik pim weh ma ku po ta kai maikngin tan akomen, men nhum weh epo kakhangin ta pim, khali hoo mingin tin ta pim men om men ku pim a huu engun.
47001009	Wai, pim a ples wungin mi pim kho ken po e wo los po pim epo pim ku huu engun, kumali pim men ku wo pim nuk wet kakhangin ta pim weh asin, si pim men ku wo pim phep pit wo Got misan tin khek po tin huu kho men kyok si tunus men weh,
47001010	men Got tin palolo pim kho epo wo lalaingin tin nhum e taku lek pim ko huu men, kuru Got tin in e palolo pim homani kut tumen; kuru wo pim phep pit wo Got epo yang ku iso palolo pim sulung kut tumen ako,
47001011	kuru wom kut men ku si lup ma wom kines Got nhio wo pim, epon kumali po munuman sam sam Got mut eya pim epo min sukngin tin Got palolo pim epon emhut kinesngin tin ta po tin munuman men.
47001012	Epo pim a wangan po pim, kuru mi pim tin ples wungin men pok put wungin kut tumen, epo tuo pim men karut wungin ta pim wo mulus to mi pim tin si in pi mlaeng weh men, kuru mi pim tin mi yil men kut tumen, si ku to mhin ekngin tin ta pi mulus men akomen. Awu. Men epo nanaangin tin ta Got men, wala pim a ning i tumen epo wom weh men.
47001013	Epo pim men ku pan wungin enginin kara ti epo wom som. Awu. Wungin tin ku wom tiik i wa ion min tumen misan. Ma nga hoo mi ngo epo wom ku iso ion mi pim tunus weh,
47001014	ken sun tin kho ma wom ion mi pim tunus long men, epo pim men kha ku wom wangan po pim ken sun tin pim ku wangan po wom mi elup tin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men.
47001015	Ma wo phepngin tin imen men ngo taku ti pol ta wom ton kho, kuma angan tin me ponwal angan men ku wom wa kho wongin kara epon,
47001016	epo ngo taku ti pol ta wom khama nga li yek Masedonia, anima nga kyok me pol ta wom, ma wom nhio wo ngo epo soput tin ku nga li Yudia epon men.
47001017	Iyi, nga hihi wungin timen ta mi ngo, men wom wo taku mi ngo ta si ta mi ngo engun, wah? Wa wom wo taku wungin tin nga hihi i ta mi ngo men men nga hihi i ira wungin ta pi mulus engun, tin taku nga in to wungin tin ku nga wo epo “Wai” u “Awu” ti to al, wah?
47001018	Epo Got tin in to wungin tan anuh men kut kha wungin ta pim tin ti epo wom men ku “Wai” u “Awu” to al tumen engun akomen.
47001019	Epo Got Wirun tin a-Yesus Krais men, tin kho ma pok putngin lunga wom mi wo pyuk tin ngo u a-Silwanus u a-Timoti tumen, ku in to wungin tin yang wo “Wai” u “Awu” tumen to al ewin akomen, si mi wo yang men “Wai” weh misan kut.
47001020	Epo wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men mosop si enun ung hut epo yang ma men “Irawin” misan, kumali Got yan si epo pim.
47001021	Ma yang tin wa pim ko nuk nhing to wom mi Krais ma won ung wo pim men men Got ako,
47001022	tin wa tosukngin tan tuon ko po it, men yang wa Emiun Auluungin ko in mi it ken tosukngin ta tin paii po it epo yang ku iso wa endara tin kara men kyok si ta it sulung men.
47001023	Kut si nga yuk Got tin taku nga torok, men ku pok put wungin tin ku khung nginan epo ngo men, epo ngo taku mi ngo suk wom kha ngo ku kyok me Korin kerek som men.
47001024	Si pim men ku ning i ken pim e mara pim pit wo wo phepngin ta wom men akomen. Awu. Pim men tin kum to wom epon ku mi wom keh keh weh men; epo wo phepngin kha ku wom pit nhing epon men.
47002001	Takuma nga hihi wungin ta mi ngo ta nuk ti, epo ngo ku ti pol ta wom to min urut i timen kyok asin.
47002002	Epon taku nga ning i tumen ma mi wom urut i, men kuli ara ku ning i ma mi ngo keh keh, men po tin nga ning i ma mi hi urut i imen ako, wah?
47002003	Ma nga pan wungin tin wala imen ti epo wom, epon akuli nga ti pol ta wom, men ku mi ngo urut i epo po tin tunus epo po ku ning i ma mi ngo keh men, epo wo ngo phep pit wo wom mosop epo min kehngin tin ta ngo men men ku ning i ma mi wom keh keh to ngo ako.
47002004	Epo won maikngin u miun tuungngin tumen men hambip los ngo kha nga pan kisang ti epo wom to tinisngin tin ko ko marango men, ngo ku pan i epon ku mi wom urut i akomen, si nga pan i epon ku wom ion min epongin tin nga in ton hambip weh pit po wom men.
47002005	Si taku po ta ning i ma min urut i si in lunga wom, men ku ning i ma mi ngo urut i weh akomen, si men ning i ma wom mosop mi wom urut i sakun kara, epon akuli nga phuk mi sakalngin pit mi wom ma li si nhum lunga wom.
47002006	Won maikngin tin wom tin munuman kara men ning i emhut sun ta yang men men kai po ta tin wungin tan tumen,
47002007	si kuma tunus epo wom ku mang ta lasin ta yang si wom pa nhing yang, epon akuli yang tin tumen min urut i weh, ma min urut i timen kuum yang engun.
47002008	Tumen ma nga sil si kinga wom epo wom men ku suk mara yang epo min epongin ta wom tin pit wo yang men si in pi mlaeng weh.
47002009	Epo sinsin tin imen kha nga pan kisang tin kho men ti epon men, epon ku nga karong wom, kuma nga ion i epo wom ku ira wungin tin ta ngo men mosop wa men.
47002010	Ma po tin wom mang ta lasin tan men, men nga mang tan maksin kut tumen. Iis, epon taku nga mang ta lasin ta po ta, men nga mang tan mut eya wom to mara Krais ako,
47002011	epon akuli a-Nolongin ku ut mara it epo kusamuhngin tan; epo it men ku pong epo kusamuhngin tin ta yang men weh akomen.
47002012	Kut ma nga me pol Troas epon ku nga pok put pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men ma yang tin Akono men klas epo ngo ma sowon pit,
47002013	men emiu ngo ku ung nhing kara som, epo ngo ku pon ta worok a-Taitus akomen. Tumen ma nga wa mi ngo si ta po ma nga yok pi tin imen li Masedonia.
47002014	Auweh, homani ma it men ku sam sam Got weh, tin kokyok kokyok ma muk it mi Krais ken po nolo tin paplung ilio mili to mara po masang to sun wala men, ma epo it kha yang ning i ma ipekngin tin tan e ku po ion yang epon men mili mili li yanga pi mosop epo it.
47002015	Epo pim men kuk to mara Got ken ilukngin tunus tin pok put Krais men lunga po tin kuk e palolongin men u lunga po tin kuk e huuspit men kut tumen.
