47002016	Ta po tin kuk put soput tin ku po huuspit epon men men pim a kuk ken ilukngin tin pok put hunngin men tin ku wa po li epo hunngin men, si po tin kuk put soput tin ku po palolongin epon men, men pim a kuk ken ilukngin tin pok put tunusngin tin ku wa po li epo tunusngin men. Ara tunus weh epon ku ning kumang tin tumen?
47002017	Epo pim men ku ken po munuman kara tin li yanga pi ma wa ulu sup wet sakalngin ta Got ken po tin kum anaum men akomen. Awu. Mi pim tin yil u Got tin tirih pim men tumen kha pim a pok put sakalngin to mara Got mi Krais men.
47003001	Iyi, tua, pim taku hosi sakalngin kyok epo pim ku wangan po pim, wah? Wa pim ku hing wo kisang panngin kara tin ku pakuh po pim ti epo wom wa pakuh po pim me epo wom tumen ken po kara tin ning i ewin men, wah?
47003002	Awu. Tuo wom kha kisang tin pakuh po pim men ako, tin panngin nuk po ewhat pim men, tin po masang to sun wala mosop kuk e ion i u tiik i tumen;
47003003	wungin nuk pi mlaeng epo wom kha kisang tin panngin me epo Krais men, tin yang tirih i me yanga wili pim men, men ku panngin epo mara sut akomen, si men panngin epo Emiun Auluungin tin ta Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men; men ku panngin nuk yanga enah tin yanga wang men tingit kara som, si men panngin nuk yanga eplang elit tin emalinan men, men po tunus ewhat hi ako.
47003004	Ma wo phepngin tin tumen kha pim a kuk ton yanga wili a-Yesus Krais to mara Got men.
47003005	Si ku ken pim tuo pim e ku kakha weh kuma pim a phaeng taku pim tuo pim kha ku kumang ta si epo tuo pim akomen. Awu. Kakhangin ta pim men me hang Got misan,
47003006	tin wa kakhangin tan ko ta pim tin wa kumang epo wungin siin tin homan e nuk lunga Got u po tunus tumen, men ku si wo sakalngin tin panngin nuk men som, si men si wo Emiun Auluungin weh; epo sakalngin tin panngin nuk men men lek po ko huu ewin, si Emiun Auluungin men wa tunusngin si ta po.
47003007	Si kumang tin po ning i ma hunngin si epon men, tin panngin u kikhimngin tumen ko nuk yanga enah men, men to moolngin ako, tin ma po tin khuuknginin ta a-Israel men ku supa mara a-Moses akomen, epon tin moolngin tin nuk mara yang men mha hambip men, takuma moolngin timen ung e mlis li pi om engun.
47003008	Si tua, taku moolngin tin ta kumang tin imen nhum, men ku moolngin tin ta kumang tin ta Emiun Auluungin men men ku iso nhum weh ako, wah?
47003009	Epo kumang tin wa lasin ko po po men men to moolngin, tumen ma kumang tin wa wungin siik ko po po men men ku to moolngin tin nhum weh epo sun men ako.
47003010	Iis, epo endara tin Got wa moolngin ko tan kho men taku it kaini to endara tin homan men, men e ken moolngin tan pi om engun, epon tin moolngin tin homan men men nhum weh epo sun ako.
47003011	Epo endara tin nuk li ma pi om men men to moolngin, tumen ma endara tin iso nuk men men ku to moolngin tin nhum weh epo sun men ako!
47003012	Tumen ma pim tin kuk to hoo mingin tin tumen kha pim a pok put sakalngin to wo phepngin tin nhum men --
47003013	si pim men ku ning i ken a-Moses men akomen, tin pang maran epo mulu ta kuma po tin a-Israel khuuknginin men ku supa moolngin tin ku ung e yat ko weh li om engun men akomen.
47003014	Takuma mi po tin po ples wungin epon men, men maran ko klat weh. Epo hosingin minan timen kha me pol homani kut imen mulu tin tuon imen iso klet mara po, ma ku siin lapngin si mara po minan tin po tiik Kisang Auluungin tin kho men akomen, epo mulu tin imen men ku klokngin li mi Krais misan.
47003015	Takuma iso me pol homani ma minan tin po tiik sakalngin tin a-Moses pan i men, men mulu tin imen iso pang po ewhat po ako.
47003016	Si taku po ta phae kyok li epo yang tin Akono men, men ku mulu timen klokngin li.
47003017	Epo yang tin Akono men kha Emiun tin imen ako; ma pi tin akani e ku Emiun tin ta yang tin Akono men in epon men, men pi tin imen men won piasngin in epon ako.
47003018	Ma it mosop men mulu tin pang mara it men klokngin kho li, ma it ion moolngin tin ta yang tin Akono men ken po ta tin ion maran mi tupngin men, ma it kuk e phae si ken yang tin Akono men enun ma moolngin ung e ko po sun li si, men me epo Emiu yang tin Akono men ako.
47004001	Pim a wa kumang tin iyi, men pim a wa min sukngin kho khali pim a wai men, tumen ma pim ku ning lamang po kumang tin i akomen.
47004002	Si pim men wetpo pim wa wungin tin kaunngin e to manngin men kho kut, ma pim ku ira wungin tin epo kusamuhngin men wa pim ku wa sakalngin torokngin kara me nau mi sun tin ta Got weh men tumen kyok akomen. Awu. Pim men pok put wungin tin irawin men si in pi mlaeng weh, ma wungin timen kha pim a pakuh po pim ko ta po tunus mi hi tin ples wungin men then then to mara Got men.
47004003	Si taku pok putngin tin tunus e pim a pok put men ku mulu pang mara po kara, men pang mara po tin kuk e huuspit men ako,
47004004	tin got tin ta pi mulus men ning i ma po tin ku wo hi phep som men mara hi mhi pit po mi hi tin po ples wungin epon men, epon akuli esul tin ta pok putngin tin tunus e pok put moolngin tin ta Krais tin Got enun men ku pal ko nuk po po asin.
47004005	Epo pim men ku pok put wungin los po pim tuo pim akomen. Awu. Pim a pok put wungin los po Krais Yesus tin Akono men, u epo pim tin kum ta wom epo mi pim weh epon ku pim a nhio wo a-Yesus men kut tumen ako.
47004006	Epo Got tin wo maran ko klat kho epo pi mi mlaeng men ku mha mi pi tin mi ku men kha mha nuk mi ewhat pim kuma yang wa pi mi mlaeng tin ta maran ekngin tin ta moolngin tin ta Got men tin ngin ngin nuk mara Krais men si ta pim men.
47004007	Takuma pim a kuk to moolngin tin nhum imen men nuk mi pim emkusin tin mulusan engun men, epon kumali kakhangin tin tunus weh men ku me hang Got siik, si ku me hang pim akomen.
47004008	Epo pim men klang pit lunga wo maikngin, takuma wo maikngin ku hum pim weh som; miu pim tuung, takuma men ku hawus pim weh som;
47004009	po kuk e ning pim lengwal, takuma Got ku mang put pim som; po whis pim li poplong ko, takuma pim men ku huuspit akomen --
47004010	ma hunngin tin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men los pim emkusin kokyok kokyok ma pim a kuk e mili mili ton, kuma tunusngin tin ta a-Yesus men ku si in pi mlaeng po pim emkusin maksin kut tumen.
47004011	Epo pim tin tunus kuk men men po wa pim sup yanga wili hunngin kokyok kokyok epon tin a-Yesus yan los po pim men, kumali tunusngin tin ta a-Yesus men ku si in pi mlaeng epo pim emkusin tin huu ewin men.
47004012	Tumen ma hunngin kha ning kumang mi pim tin paengin men, si tunusngin men kum mi wom.
47004013	Ma emiu pim in to wo phepngin then tin ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk kho men taku, “Wo ngo phep, tumen kha nga sakal men,” ti, iis, wala wo pim phep maksin, kha pim a sakal maksin kut tumen,
47004014	epo pim a ion i epo yang tin khek a-Yesus tin Akono men kyok si men kha kuli khek pim maksin to a-Yesus ma yang wa pim si nuk to wom enu mara yang ako.
47004015	Epo wungin tin mosop e si epo pim men men si epon ku nhio wo wom ako, timen kuma nanaangin tin yang tongin li yanga wili po tin munuman men kha ku ning i ma sam samngin men ku si kol pak pit kumali Got yan si epon men.
47004016	Tumen ma pim a kuk si pim ku ning lamang akomen. Aku, elit pim tin tunus e nuk mara so men kuk e malukluk ko, takuma mi pim tin tunus e nuk emin men men kuk e si si homan to ungunan then then li.
47004017	Epo won maikngin tin ta pim e malil engun men, tin si ta pim mi elup tin maran hut sok engun men, men in e ning ning moolngin ta pim tin nhum weh u maik weh tumen tin kuli sindak in men.
47004018	Epo it men ku mara it nuk po endara tin ku mara it ion i men akomen, si mara it nuk po endara tin ku mara it kon i som men misan. Epo endara tin ku mara it kon i men men to elup tin i engun, si endara tin ku mara it kon i som men men sindak in.
47005001	Epo it ion i epon taku mang ausel tin ta it e ung wo mulus men mhukngin, men ku mang ta it tin me hang Got men, tin po tunus ku ning i epo wili hi ewin som men, ta it ta men sindak ung ili wet pi ako.
47005002	Epo it kuk mi mang tin iyi men it kuk e sasas to won maikngin, epo mi it weh epo mang tin ta it e api wet pi men ku me pae po it ken moolngin ta men.
47005003	Irawin weh, taku it phi moolngin timen kho, men ku po pon ta it tin wiwil men akomen.
47005004	Epo it tin kuk mi mang ausel tin iyi men kuk e sasas, ku ken it taku wiwil akomen, si epon ku it wa moolngin ko po sun, kumali endara tin hun ewin men kuli tunusngin kuum i.
47005005	Epo yang tin hihi it epo wungin tin wala nuk tumen men Got ako, tin naa it epo Emiun Auluungin ken tosukngin ta tin me paii wo it epo yang ku iso wa endara tin kara men kyok si ta it sulung men.
47005006	Tumen ma it men kuk to mi it tin pit nhing men kokyok kokyok, epo it ion i epo minan tin it iso kuk mi emkusin ta it tin mang ta it tin i, it men kuk hin epo yang tin Akono men ako.
47005007	Epo it muk muk wo mulus epo wo phepngin, si ku epo maran konngin akomen.
47005008	Ma mi it men pit nhing, wai, mi it men tunusngin, epon men tunus weh epo it ku kis mi emkusin tin i, si kuma it li kuk hang yang tin Akono men.
47005009	Tumen ma wungin tin it tohuh epon ku si men men nuk ti, tin taku it li kuk hang yang wa it kis hang yang, men ku yang min tunusngin pit po it.
47005010	Epo it mosop men ku iso weh si nuk mara ehus tin ta Krais e ku yang ples wungin won men, kumali it then then wa talungin tin ku emhut wungin tin it kuk mi emkusin ma it ning i men, men ku ira wungin ta po then then weh, aku, taku tunus wa taku lengwal wa tumen.
47005011	Pim a ion yang tin Akono men tin ku iso ples wungin ta pim men kha pim a uk yang weh ma pim a tohuh epo pim ku phae mi po masang to sun wala kuma po wo hi phep pit wo yang men; wungin tin nuk mi pim men men nuk pi mlaeng to mara Got weh, ma nga hoo mi ngo epon men nuk pi mlaeng to mi wom tin ples wungin ewin men maksin kut tumen ako.
47005012	Epo pim men ku pakuh po pim kyok si ta wom akomen. Awu. Pim taku ning i kuma sinsin si ung tin ku wom wangan po pim epon men, kuma wom kuk to wungin tin ku wom phae wungin wet po tin wangan po elit hi tin nuk mara so men engun, si ku wangan po wungin tin nuk mi hi men weh akomen.
47005013	Epon taku pim a kuk to tulun hungin tin kis ewin men, men epon ku Got yan si, wa taku pim a kuk to tulun hungin tunus, men epon ku kho wo wom ako.
47005014	Epo min epongin tin ta Krais men kha kasum mi pim men, epo mara pim ples wungin ti, taku po then ta hun mut eya po mosop, men e ken po mosop huu kho kut ako,
47005015	ma yang hun mut eya po mosop, epon ku po tin iso tunus kuk men ku kuk epon ku ira mi hi tuo hi kyok akomen, si men ku kuk epon ku ira yang tin hun mut eya po ma khek kyok si tunus men min weh.
47005016	Tumen ma homani ma li men ku it ion mi wungin ta po ta ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men kyok akomen, aku, kho ma it ira wungin ta pi mulus ma it ion mi wungin ta Krais, takuma homani men ku it ion mi wungin ta yang tumen kyok akomen.
47005017	Tumen ma taku po ta in mi Krais, men si pho pongin homan ta, ma endara tin kho men kho li, imen, endara mosop men si homan kut.
47005018	Ma wungin tin mosop imen men me hang Got, tin ning i ma it si mi it then to yang kyok yanga wili a-Yesus Krais ma wa kumang si ta pim epo pim ku pok put min thenngin tin imen,
47005019	wungin timen men sinsin ti, epo Got men in mi Krais ma Got si min then to po masang to sun wala mosop, epo yang ku wa lasin epo wungin tin po yek ta sun tin siik men ko po po tuo hi akomen, ma yang wa kumang si nuk yanga wili pim paengin epo pim paengin ku pok put sakalngin epo min thenngin tin imen.
47005020	Kut ma pim men kuk ken po tin wa sakalngin mi wo Krais weh ma Krais tirih pim li li to sakalngin tin tan men, men e ken Got tuon yuk me pol mi wo pim kha pim a wa pi ta Krais ma pim a hau si wo wom epo wom men ku si mi wom then to Got men.
47005021	Epo yang tin pong epo lasin men kha Got ning i ma yang si lasin ta it men, kumali it men ku si wungin siik tin ta Got men mi yang.
47006001	Kut ma pim tin lup to kumang to Krais men ku suh mi kinga wom epo wom men ku wa nanaangin tin ta Got men awhat engun asin.
47006002	Epo Got men sakal taku, “Mi elup tin epo nanaangin men kha nga hul wet wom men, u ungunan tin epo palolongin men kha nga nhio wo wom min men kut tumen.” Iis, homani kha elup tin epo nanaangin men si in men, iis, kuru homani men elup tin epo palolongin men si in kut tumen.
47006003	Epo pim men ku wa endara ta ko nuk soput wom tin ku wom tut po khi wom epon men akomen, epon akuli kumang ta pim men kuli po kuh alelngin si po pim ton.
47006004	Si wungin mosop tin pim a sup min men men pim a pakuh po pim ken pim tin kum ta Got men: kokyok kokyok men pim a nuk nhing wet won maikngin maran kiring kiring, u endara tin pim a kalwok epon men maran kiring kiring, u miun tuungngin maran kiring kiring,
47006005	u wet wungin tin po wawlauk pim men, u wet wungin tin po kan kan pim men, u wet po tin me tumulung amen engun ewut pim men, u wet kumang tin pim a wuh i men, u epo pim tin mara pim wang si ku nhaung akomen, u epo pim tin kuk e huu elwip men,
47006006	u to wungin tin mi yil men, u to maran ekngin tunus, u to wungin tin pim a wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak epon men, u to wungin amunu, u epo Emiun Auluungin, u to min epongin tin irawin weh men,
47006007	u epo sakalngin tin anuh weh men, u epo kakhangin tin ta Got men, u to moolngin tin epo lek walngin e ta wungin tin siik men tin nuk ewo wili pim tin api psik men epon ku pim a sewut po epon men u tin nuk ewo wili pim tin ato ilio men epon ku pim a pulum po pim epon men tumen,
47006008	u wet wungin tin po wa ya pim si u po wa ya pim ko men, u wet wungin tin po sakal lengwal epo pim u po sakal tunus epo pim men tumen. Po ning wungin epo pim ken pim e torok nginangan, takuma pim men kuk to wungin anuh ako;
47006009	po ning i epo pim ken po e pong epo pim, takuma po munuman pon ta pim ako; pim taku huu, ih, pim a iso tunus kuk; po kwat pim ken po taku kot pim, takuma po ku lek pim ko huu yek akomen;
47006010	pim a kuk ken po tin mi hi urut hi men, takuma mi pim keh keh kokyok kokyok; pim a kuk ken po tin kalwok weh men, takuma pim a ning i ma po munuman si mimiran; pim a kuk ken po tin endara ta hi om weh men, takuma pim a kasum endara mosop ako.
47006011	Auweh, wom tin api Korin men, pim a sakal awo pias nginan weh ko ta wom, pim a klas weh ma wungin tin nuk mi pim men nuk pi mlaeng weh to mara wom ako.
47006012	Epo pim men ku pau mi pim epo wom som, si tuo wom kha pau mi wom epo pim men.
47006013	Homani ma ngo ku sakal ta wom ken wom tin husanik weh men, epo wom men ku ning wungin emhut sun tin ta pim men siik weh, ma wom klas ma wungin tin nuk mi wom men ku weh si nuk pi mlaeng to mara pim weh.
47006014	Wom kuk aku wom klap to po tin ku wo hi phep som e wungin ta hi enginin men asin. Epo wungin tin ia e ku wungin tin siik men u wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men ngong klap wal then? U wungin tin ia e ku pi tin mi mlaeng men u pi tin mi ku men mi ngong then epon kut tumen?
47006015	U ela weh ku Krais u a-Nolongin ngong sakal then epon? U ela weh ku po tin wo hi phep men u po tin ku wo hi phep som men si ngong then?
47006016	U ela weh ku mang auluungin tin ta Got men u got tin tororokngin men enu hi si mi hi then? Epo wom kha mang auluungin tin ta Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men ako, wala Got wo kho taku, “Ngo men ku in mi po ma nga muk muk lunga po, ma nga si Got ta po, si po men ku si masang to sun wala tin ta ngo men weh.”
47006017	Tumen ma “Yang tin Akono men wo taku, ‘Wom mu pol lunga po ma wom lu kuk engini wom weh, si wom kah po endara pon lengwal ta asin, kuma nga wa wom to min nawaehngin,
47006018	men ku nga si Wirama wom si wom si husanik masang u wala tumen.’ Yang tin Akono e Apalukngin weh men kha sakal tumen.”
47007001	Wom tin mi ngo pit wo wom weh men, it kuk to wo kuk marangin tin mosop imen, tumen ma it men ku mahek po it epo siwulngin mosop tin nuk po it u to mi it tin emiunan men kut tumen, ma it tohuh epo it ku si auluungin weh epo lemngin tin pit wo Got men.
47007002	Wom hihi pi ta pim kara tin nuk ta mi wom men, epo pim ku ning i lengwal epo po ta som, wa pim ku mhuk mi po ta som, wa pim ku laluk endara ta po ta som.
47007003	Nga sakal tumen epon ku nga wo tumuyup ewut wom akomen. Awu. Epo nga wo kho epo wom men kuk epo mi pim weh kuma it huu then wa it tunus kuk then kut tumen.
47007004	Nga sakal si in pi mlaeng epo wom weh. Nga wangan po wom weh. Mi ngo ko li wyu ung epo wom weh. Mi ngo keh weh wet wo maikngin tin mosop e los pim men.
47007005	Iis, epo pim a li sup Masedonia, men pim emkusin ku nhing kara akomen. Awu. Won maikngin iso nghen eya pim weh lik kut, epo mara so men hek walngin si si, u mi pim men lemngin kara si mi pim kut tumen.
47007006	Takuma Got tin pa nhing po tin mi hi urut hi men ewin men men pa nhing mi pim epo a-Taitus tin me men,
47007007	ma ku epo yang tin me men misan som, men epo pa nhingngin tin yang wai in lunga wom men maksin kut tumen. Epo yang me pok pim epo wom tin kuk e hiim ngo men, u wom tin kuk e mi wom urut i men, u wom tin tohuh epon ku haum eya ngo men kut tumen, tumen ma mi ngo keh keh hambip weh.
47007008	Epo kisang tin nga pan i ti epo wom kho men ning i ma mi wom luk, aku, ngo ku mi ngo muul i epon som; irawin, muk kha mi ngo muul i men. Epo nga ion i epo kisang tin wala imen kha ning i ma mi wom luk men, takuma men ku in put monlo engun.
47007009	Kut si homani ma mi ngo keh, epo wom tin ku mi wom luk kyok akomen, men epo wom tin mi wom luk li wom phae mi wom men. Epo min lukngin tin si mi wom men men ira wungin tin nuk na mi Got men kut, tumen ma wungin ta pim ta ani ku wom wuh i men som.
47007010	Epo wungin tin mi it luk ira wungin tin nuk na mi Got men men pong si wungin tin it phae mi it epon men kha kuli it palolongin epon men, min lukngin tin imen men ku mi it muul epon asin. Si min lukngin tin ta pi mulus men men li enun ung hut epo hunngin ewin.
47007011	Iis, wom ion i, epo wungin tin wala imen, tin mi wom luk ira wungin tin nuk na mi Got men, kha pong si wom ma mi wom seh seh ta engin u wom sakal mut eya wom, u ya wom sal pit po yang tin ning lasin men, u wom lem pit wo Got, u wom hiim pim weh, u wom tohuh mut eya pim, u wom ning wungin emhut sun tin po ning i lengwal men kut tumen. Wungin tin mosop e wom iran imen men suk mara pim epo wom men lasin om po wom pit mi wungin tin imen.
47007012	Tumen ma kisang tin nga pan i ti epo wom kho men, men ku nga pan i epon ku nga nhio wo yang tin ning lasin men weh akomen, wa epon ku nga nhio wo yang tin wuh lasin wet sun men akomen. Awu. Men epon ku to mara Got men ku silan khingngin tin ta pim e epo wom men ku si in pi mlaeng to mara wom weh.
47007013	Tumen ma pim a wa pa nhingngin maksin epo pa nhingngin tin wom wai men. Ma mi pim keh keh hambip weh si po pa nhingngin tin imen epo min kehngin tin ta a-Taitus men, epo wom mosop ning i ma yang emiun ko li wyu ung.
47007014	Epo kho ma nga wangan po wom si ta a-Taitus epo wungin tin ta wom men, ma homani men ku manngin ko po ngo epo wungin tin imen ta akomen. Awu. Pim tin sakal sakalngin mosop si ta wom kho to wungin tin irawin men, tumen kut kha sakalngin tin pim a wangan po wom si ta a-Taitus men men yang pon tan men irawin kut tumen.
47007015	Ma a-Taitus iso min pit pit wom hambip kara kut minan tin yang tulun hu wom mosop tin hul wet yang men, tin wom lem u wom kwat tumen ma wom wa sakalngin me in lunga wom.
47007016	Tumen ma homani ma mi ngo keh, epo wo ngo phep pit wo wom weh.
47008001	Kut si, ehurok, pim a pok wom epo nanaangin tin ta Got men tin yang wai ko mi palu walngin tin ung e li li wo mulusngin Masedonia men.
47008002	Epo po kuk wet won maikngin nhum ta tin karong po men, aku, min kehngin tin ta po e weh si kol mi po men u po tin kalwok weh men tumen kha po wa miranngin hambip weh epon men, ma po naa sun epon amen engun, men ken eki tin tup si ma yuk yuk ko men.
47008003	Epo nga pok wom ti, epo endara tin po kuk ton men kha po naa sun epon men, wai, kuru kara ko po sun kut tumen, men po ning i tumen epo mi hi weh,
47008004	ma po hau nuk sii khi pim kokyok kokyok epo pim ku wa talungin ta po kuma po nhio wo sun tin wo hi phep e auluungin men to po kara.
47008005	Si po ku ning wungin timen ira wungin tin pim a hoo mi pim epon men akomen. Awu. Muk ma po wa hi tuo hi si ta yang tin Akono men, li klet ma po ira wungin tin nuk na mi Got men ma po wa hi si ta pim maksin kut tumen.
47008006	Tumen ma pim a suh mi kinga a-Taitus epo yang tin hosi kumang tin epo nanaangin men kho men kha ku yang suuk siin weh lunga wom men.
47008007	Kut si homani ma wom tin si pu wal to wungin tin mosop e turunus men -- to wo phepngin, u to sakalngin pok put nginan, u to maran ekngin, u to tohuhngin tin wom tohuh epon weh men, u to min epongin tin ta wom e pit wo pim men tumen -- kha mi pim epo wom men ku si pu wal to nanaangin tin ku wom talu po tin kalwok epon men maksin kut tumen.
47008008	Ngo ku wo maran ko klat ma nga sakal tumen akomen, si tohuhngin tin ta po enginin kara men kha nga taku karong min epongin tin ta wom men taku irawin weh epon wa men.
47008009	Epo wom pon ta nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men kho kut, tin yang miran, takuma yang ko lungunan engun epon ku yang ut eya wom men, kumali lungunanngin tin ta yang men kha ku wom si mimiran epon men.
47008010	Ma talungin tin imen nga wo taku tunus epo wom ku ning i ti, epon men ku nhio wo wom ako, tin taku wom ning wungin tin wom hosin to posan tin kho li men kuru mi wom tunusngin epo wom ku ning i kut tumen,
47008011	si homani wom men ku suuk siin ning nginan weh kut tumen. Tumen kuma mi wom tin lup si kho epo wom ku ning kumang tin imen, kha ku homani ma wom suuk siin ning nginan weh kut tumen, men ku wom pok mi endara tin wom kuk ton men ma wom wai si si ta po.
47008012	Epon taku min nawaehngin in kho, men ku Got maran ira endara tin esini e po ta in ton men khali yang min tunusngin pit po talungin tin ta po men, si yang ku maran ira endara tin po ku in ton som men ewin akomen.
47008013	Epo wungin ta ngo sinsin ku epo po kara tin enginin men wo hi pias, si wo wom maik wom akomen. Awu.
47008014	Men epon ku los wom mosop ken wal, epon ku homani ma endara ta wom ku nuk a salok, men ku wom nhio wo po epo endara tin po kalwok epon men, kumali taku endara ta po nuk a salok khama po nhio wo wom epo endara tin wom kalwok epon men maksin, kuma wungin sinsin then los wom mosop.
47008015	Wala sakalngin ta panngin nuk ti, “Po tin tamuk i hambip men, men ku misikin ta hi kara pit akomen, u po tin tamuk i sakun men, men ku kalwok akomen kut tumen.”
47008016	Nga sam sam Got tin wa wungin ko mi a-Taitus ma yang silan khing pit po wom weh ken ngo men.
47008017	Epo yang men hul wet pim tin suh mi kinga yang men ako, takuma yang tuon tohuh weh, ma yang ti epo wom ira min tuon weh.
47008018	Ma pim a tih a-Taitus ngong wiro it tin po wangan pon to pok putngin tin tunus men mi palu walngin tin mosop e ung li li yanga pi men,
47008019	si ku misa pim som. Awu. Palu walngin tin ung e li li yanga pi men men wo hi ung wo yang maksin epon ku muk muk to pim to talungin tin iyi, tin tihngin si yanga wili pim epon ku yang tin Akono men tuon yan si, kuru epon ku suk mara po epo mi wom tin nawaehngin men kut tumen.
47008020	Epo pim men ku lem u pim a karuk weh kut tumen, epon akuli po ta wa lasin ko po pim pit mi talungin tin nhum e in yanga wili pim men.
47008021	Epo tulu pim hu wungin kho tin ku in amunu to mara yang tin Akono men, kuru to mara po masang to sun wala maksin kut tumen.
47008022	Kuru pim a tih wiro it ta maksin ti to wulong, tin pim a ion kumang tan angan munuman kho ma pim a pon ta wungin tan tin tohuh epo kumang maran kiring kiring men, takuma homani ma yang tohuh weh, epon tin yang won phep hambip pit wo wom men.
47008023	Si taku po ta kines epo a-Taitus, yang men tin tuk a klap wal to kumang then tin in lunga wom men. Wa taku po kara kines epo wulong tin ehoro it men, men ku po ion i epo wulong men tin wa wungin mi wo palu walngin tin ung e li li men, tin Krais wa yan pos epo ngong men.
47008024	Tumen ma wom men ku suk mara wuluk, kuru wom ning tosukngin to mara palu walngin tin ung e li li men kut tumen, tin pok put min epongin tin ta wom men si in pi mlaeng weh men u tin suk mara po epo wungin tin pim a wangan po wom epon men men irawin weh kut tumen.
47009001	Kut si kumang tin nuk yanga wili pim epo po tin wo hi phep e auluungin men, men ku tus nginan epo ngo tin ku pan kisang epo wom men akomen.
47009002	Epo nga pon ta min nawaehngin tin ta wom men, tin nga wangan po wom epon si ta po Masedonia men taku, “Po Akaia hihi talungin ta hi mi posan then ta tin kho li men,” ti. Ma wungin tin wom tohuh epon imen seh po ewhat po Masedonia munuman epo po ku hihi talungin tin ta hi men kyok.
47009003	Takuma nga tih po ehoro it tin imen, epon akuli wungin tin pim a wangan po wom epon men ku ko min pit, si kuma wom kuk e hihi talungin ira wungin tin nga wo ta wom epon kho men.
47009004	Epon akuli yanda po Masedonia kara me to ngo ma ku ion wom tin ku hihi kho som men, men ku manngin ko po pim, kuru wom kut tumen, epo pim tin wangan po wom men.
47009005	Tumen ma nga wo taku tunus epo ngo ku wo nut po ehuro it epo po ku kho ti epo wom, ma po hihi wom to talungin tin ta wom e asikia po ngin men, tin wom wo kuk mara po epon kho men, kuma talungin tin imen ku hihingin kho ma maran ken talungin tin ira nanaangin men, si ku suuhngin kaun i mi wom akomen.
47009006	Si nga wo ta wom ti, epon taku po ta wha enda sakun kara, men ku lok lok i sakun, si taku po ta wha enda hambip, men ku lok lok i hambip tumen.
47009007	Tumen ma po then then men ku wa talungin si ira wungin tin nuk na mi po weh men, si ku to mi po tin kamus men wa ku epo po kara tin me soh ung sin engun men akomen; epo Got min tunusngin pit wo po ta tin wa talungin si to min kehngin men.
47009008	Ma Got men kakha epon ku ning i ma nanaangin maran kiring kiring ko po wom hambip takut ako, kuma kokyok kokyok men ku wom kuk to endara mosop tin ku kai wom men ma endara tin ta wom men nuk a salok tin ku wom ning kumang turunus mosop epon men.
47009009	Wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Yang naa po amen engun, yang wa talungin si ta po tin kalwok weh men. Wungin siik tin ta yang men men sindak nuk e li kut.”
47009010	Yang tin hihi endara ihun si ta po tin ku tep tep i men u beret tin ku po iini men tumen, men ku hihi endara ihun ta wom ma yang wai kara kyok si to sun tin wom tep tep i kho men, ma yang ning i ma wungin tin ta wom e siik men ku enun tin ung e li li hut sun men si hambip weh.
47009011	Men ku wom si mimiran to endara mosop epon ku wom nanaa po kara maksin epon hambip, ma wungin tin imen ku ning i ma sam samngin li epo Got epo talungin tin wom wai si yanga wili pim men.
47009012	Epo kumang tin auluungin e nuk yanga wili wom imen tin wom ku nhio wo po epon men men ku kai po tin wo hi phep e auluungin men epo endara tin po kalwok epon men, kuru men ku tup si kol ma yuk yuk ko epo sam samngin munuman tin ku li epo Got men kut tumen.
47009013	Wom tin nes wungin to mara po epo kumang tin imen kha ku po wa Got yan si epo wom tin ira pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men tin wom pok put men weh men, kuru epo wom tin naa po u po enginin kara tumen hambip men.
47009014	Ma mi kinesngin ta po epo wom men ku po hiim wom weh, epon tin Got wa nanaangin hambip ko po wom men.
47009015	It men ku sam sam Got weh epo talungin tin ta yang e ku it talok mi sakalngin tin ku it pok put sinsin epon men.
47010001	Kut si ngo a-Pol tuo ngo kha ku suh mi kinga wom epo wungin amunu u amlus tumen tin ta Krais men -- ngo tin wom kara wo epo ngo e taku nga in enu mara wom, men nga pauuk ngini ngo engun, si taku nga kis wom men nga sakal amdal ewut wom men.
47010002	Takuma nga hau nuk sii khi wom epo minan tin kuli nga kyok me in enu mara wom kyok men, men ku nga in aku nga sakal amdal to mi ngo tin puplet e nga hoo mi ngo epo ngo ku sakal amdal ewut po kara epon men, tin e hi phaeng taku pim e ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men engun.
47010003	Epo irawin epo pim men kuk wo mulus to emkusin a pim ako, takuma pim men ku lek wal ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men ewin akomen.
47010004	Epo moolngin tin ta pim e pim a lek wal ton men, men ku api mulus akomen, awu, men me hang Got weh ma apalukngin takut epon ku uus enda tin po hang pul pul i ung po sa men me ko.
47010005	Pim a wa wungin tin po mara hi iran men maran kiring kiring u endara mosop tin po wai si ili awon men tumen tin po taku klet put soput tin ku po mara hi pon ta Got epon men uusngin me ko, ma pim a kan kan wungin mosop tin nuk mi po men epon ku kyok me ira wungin ta Krais.
47010006	Ma pim a hihi pim kho epon taku wungin tin wom ku hul wet wungin ta pim men klet kut, khama pim a ning wungin emhut sun mosop tin po kara ku hul wet pim som men.
47010007	Epo wom men kuk e ion endara tin nuk mara so men engun. Si taku po ta won phep ken i e tuon ta Krais men, men ku tulun hu epo wungin ta min tuon kyok taku, yang tin ta Krais weh men, tumen kut kha pim a ta Krais weh men maksin kut tumen ako.
47010008	Aku, epon taku nga iso wangan po pim epo emhong tin yang tin Akono men wai ko ta pim epon ku pim a khek wom si nuk nhing, si epon ku pim a mhuk wom epon kyok akomen, takuma ngo men ku manngin wa ngo epon akomen.
47010009	Epon akuli wom ion ngo ken ngo e taku uluu mi wom epo kisang tin nga pan i ti epo wom men.
47010010	Epo po kara sakal taku, “Kisang tin a-Pol pan i men men to wungin mamaik u apalukngin kut tumen, si yang tuon in mi it to yang emkusin, men yang in e malungan engun u sakalngin tin ta yang men men amiron nginan engun kut tumen,” ti.
47010011	Po tin wo tumen ku tulu hi hu wungin tin ti, epo wungin tin pim a kuk ton ma pim a pan kisang ti epo wom minan tin pim a kis kis lunga wom men kha kuli pim a kuk ton ma pim a iran weh minan tin kuli pim a kuk lunga wom men.
47010012	Epo pim men ku phuk mi wungin engun ma pim a wo epo pim e khuuk wal pit mina po tin wangan po hi tuo hi men wa pim a kai pim to po tin imen akomen. Si po men kuk e kai wungin ta hi tuo hi epo hi tuo hi, u po kuk e ion mi wungin ta al lunga hi tuo hi kut tumen, epo po men mhin ekngin ta hi om kha men.
47010013	Si pim men ku wangan po pim li yek ta kaingin tin ut eya pim men akomen. Awu. Mi enunu tin Got won ung won ku ut pim men kha pim a wangan po pim epon men, epo enunu tin imen wom Korin weh men kuk min kho kut ako.
47010014	Epo pim men ku yek ta kaingin tin ut eya pim ken emhong tin ta pim e ku li ut po wom men akomen, epo wom kha pim a me epo wom to pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men ako.
47010015	Si pim men ku yek ta kaingin tin ut eya pim ma pim a wangan po pim to kumang tin po enginin kara wuh i ning nginan men akomen. Si pim a hoo mi pim ti, epo wo phepngin tin ta wom e ku iso ung e si po sun li men kha kuli kalungin tin ta pim e pim a kum min men ku ung e huu li nhum epo wom,
47010016	kumali pim a pok put pok putngin tin tunus men wo mulusngin tin ung wetpo wom men, epon akuli pim a wangan po kumang tin po enginin ta suuk siin ning nginan mi kalungin tin tan weh men.
47010017	Si “taku po ta ku wangan po wungin ta, men ku wangan po yang tin Akono men weh.”
47010018	Epo po ta tin tuon pakuh pon men ani ku Got wo epon e tunus men akomen, si po ta tin yang tin Akono men tuon pakuh pon men kha yang wo epon e tunus men.
47011001	Auweh, nga hoo mi ngo epo wom men ku mara wom ain ma wom hul wet ngo tin ku pok wungin tin ulil men kara, ken sun tin wala wom kuk e ning i homani men.
47011002	Epo nga kos kos eya wom to kos kosngin tin me hang Got men. Epo nga sop wom to yang masang ta kho, men Krais, kuma nga pau wom li ung ta yang ken wut wala tin po lolo i nuk mang men ta.
47011003	Takuma nga lem, epon akuli yanda tamha tin kusamuh Ewa kho epo kusamuhngin tin tan men, tumen kut kha kuli po ta pses mi wom ma wetpo wom wa wungin tin ku mi wom pit wo Krais then ta misan men.
47011004	Epon taku po ta me pok put a-Yesus yan enginin ta epo sun tin pim a pok put wungin epon kho men, wa taku wom wa emiun enginin ta epo sun tin wom wai kho men, wa taku wom hul wet pok putngin tunus enginin ta epo sun tin wom hul wet kho men tumen, men ku wom mang ta po tin imen si po ning i tumen awo mlus nginan engun!
47011005	Epo nga phaeng taku tuo ngo men ku in ti ko kara wet po paengin tin po sikia hi e ya hi pos weh e kuk kho men akomen.
47011006	Aku, taku ngo ku wo ngo po elel to sakalngin pok put nginan som, takuma nga iso marango ek wungin ako. Iis, epo wungin mosop tin pim a ning i lunga wom kho men men pim a suk mara wom epo wungin tin imen si nuk pi mlaeng to mara wom weh.
47011007	Iyi, nga ning lasin tin nga wa ya ngo in ti ko si kuma ya wom si, epo ngo tin pok put pok putngin tin tunus e ta Got men si ta wom hut emul engun men, wah?
47011008	Nga tip endara mi palu walngin enginin kara epo ngo tin wa nhio wongin hang po kuma nga kum ta wom engun men.
47011009	Kuru minan tin kho li ma nga in to wom ma nga kalwok men, men ku nga wa won maikngin ko po po ta som. Epo endara tin nga kalwok epon men men po tin ehuro it e me Masedonia men kha kaini si ta ngo men. Ma wungin mosop men nga karut ngo ton weh, epon akuli nga wa won maikngin ta ko po wom, ma ngo ku iso in e ira wungin tin tumen weh.
47011010	Wungin anuh tin ta Krais e in mi ngo men kha nga tung tung eya ngo weh epo po ta ku klet epo ngo epo wangan pongin tin imen pi tin ung e li li mili wo mulusngin Akaia men akomen.
47011011	Epo ele? Epo ngo ku mi ngo pit wo wom som, wah? Awu. Got ion i epo ngo men mi ngo epo wom ako.
47011012	Kut si wungin tin nga in e ning i men kha ku nga iso in e ning i kut men, kuma nga nghen soput ta po tin taku pon soput ta tin ku po wangan po hi ken po e kuk pit mina wungin tin ta pim men.
47011013	Epo po tin tumen men paengin torokngin, tin kusamuh nginangan men, ma po si sing hi e taku paengin ta Krais irawin.
47011014	Ma it men ku teret wo wungin timen asin, epo a-Nolongin tuon men si sing i ken tihngin tin ta pi mi mlaeng men ta ewin.
47011015	Tumen ma ku wungin enginin ta som tin taku po tin kum ta a-Nolongin men si sing hi ken po e tin kum ta wungin tin siik men. Epon sulung men kuli po wa wungin emhut sun tin ira wungin ta hi weh men kyok ako.
47011016	Nga sakal kyok ti, epo po ta wom ta men ku phaeng wo engin taku ngo e to wungin ulil asin. Wa taku wom phaeng wo wungin timen, aku, men ku wom wa ngo ken ngo e po tin in to wungin ulil men ta, kuma nga wangan po ngo sakun kara engun.
47011017	Wungin tin wo ngo phep ma nga wangan po ngo epon imen, men ku nga sakal i ira wungin tin ta yang tin Akono men som, si men nga sakal i men ken i e ulil men engun.
47011018	Epo po munuman wangan po hi ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men, tumen ma ngo maksin kut.
47011019	Epo wom men wuh wungin ta po tin wungin ta hi ulil men to min kehngin engun, epo wom men wo taku wom e mara wom ek!
47011020	Epo wom men wuh wungin tin taku po ta wa wom li wuh kumang tan, wa taku po ta me kusamuh wom ma tauluk endara ta wom mosop li, wa taku po ta me tip endara ta wom, wa taku po ta wai si pit, wa taku po ta me wilin hik hik suu wom tumen.
47011021	Manngin ko po pim ma nga sakal nuk ti, epo pim men elit pim huu ma ku pim a ning i tumen akomen. Si wungin tin tun tira e po ta ku phuk mi sakalngin engun ma wangan pon ton men, men nga phuk mi sakalngin ma nga wangan po ngo epon maksin kut tumen (auh, wungin tin tumen men nga sakal ulil kha men).
47011022	Iyi, ma po e api Hibru, wah? Epo ngo kut. Wa po e Israel, wah? Men ngo kut. Wa po e Abraham khuuknginin, wah? Wai, men ngo kut.
47011023	Iyi, po e kum ta Krais, wah? Auh, homani ma nga sakal ulil ta ti, epo ngo men kum ta Krais hambip weh epo po ako. Epo kumang tin nga wuh i men men nhum weh epo po, u po paplai ngo angan munuman ma ku nga tiik i akomen, u po kan kan ngo li wo ngo maik ngo angan munuman kara kut, u hunngin topo mi ngo angan munuman weh kut tumen.
47011024	Po Yuda wawlauk ngo tin angan khum miuk u mnal me sup tumen (39) men angan eip weh.
47011025	Angan miuk men po paplai ngo epo niak niakngin; angan ta men po tup ewut ngo epo enah; angan miuk men imut tin nga saa won men in e muu to ngo; to pi luk ta u to pi mhangin ta men nga in e muu tak li malang;
47011026	nga muk muk li pi tin ung hin men angan munuman. Nga ning wo lalaingin put eki angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin epo po tin kaun nuk ira so ma ku talak ngo men angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin yanga wili po Yuda tin pim a khuuk wal then men angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin yanga wili po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin mi enunu tin nunhum e ung e li li men angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin pi tin tahunggu men angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin yanga wiu angan munuman, u nga ning wo lalaingin lunga po tin wo epo hi e pim a irit won mi Krais takuma hi torok men angan munuman kut tumen.
47011027	Nga wuh kumang weh li elit ngo hun angan munuman, angan munuman men ku nga nhaung som, nga in e hun elip u hun eki, nga kalwok epo endara aiingin angan munuman, u nga kot kot ku nga kalwok epo endara tin ku nga pang po ngo epon men tumen.
47011028	Won maikngin tin si po ngo u los ngo timen, kuru wungin tin hukut mi ngo ungunan then then kokyok kokyok men, men silan khingngin nhum tin ta ngo e pit wo palu walngin tin mosop e ung e li li men men los ngo maksin kut tumen.
47011029	Iyi, ara won wiak, men ku wo ngo wiak ton som? Iyi, ara po ta taku ning i ma plong ko mi lasin, men ku mi ngo kakhat sun pit won akomen?
47011030	Si taku tunus epo ngo ku wangan po ngo, men ku nga wangan po wungin tin pok put ngo tin wo ngo wiak men engun.
47011031	Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin ku po sam sam i kokyok kokyok li kut men, men ion i epo wungin tin nga pok put imen, men ku nga torok epon akomen.
47011032	Epo pi Damaskus tin nhum men phua tin kum wet wili Aretas tin sinkhaung ta hi men wo ma po kuk e haum mara enunu to po nolo maran min ta, epo po mi hi epo po ku kasum ngo.
47011033	Takuma nga ko li ung mi eyel ta ma po yuh ngo plek put pi won tin ta enunu men ta li ko, ma nga meleng hut wili yang tin sinkhaung e taku kasum ngo men.
47012001	Wungin men ku weh nuk ti epo ngo tin ku wangan po ngo men, takuma men ku nhio wo po ta weh akomen, aku, ngo ku kyok me sakal kara epo enun yolngin tin marango plal ma nga ion i men u wungin kaunngin kara tin yang tin Akono men pok put si ta ngo men kut tumen.
47012002	Ngo men pon ta yang ta tin in mi Krais men men posan khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen kho li (taku yang e ku in mi emkusin, men ku nga pon tan som, wa taku yang ku in wetpo emkusin, men ku nga pon tan som kut tumen, si Got misan kha pon tan men) yang tin in tumen kha uusngin si ma weh li pol wet pi tin me miuk angan men.
47012003	Ma nga pon ta yang tin in tumen (taku yang e ku in mi emkusin, wa taku yang ku in mi emkusin som, men ku nga pon tan kut tumen som, si Got misan kha pon tan men)
47012004	epon men uusngin li si epo pi Paradais tin pon lungin weh men ma yang hul sakalngin tin auluungin weh e po talok min epon ku po pok put men, tin uluungin epo po tunus ta tin ku pok put men.
47012005	Po ta tin in tumen kha ku nga wangan pon men, si ngo ku wangan po ngo tuon akomen. Awu. Ngo tin wo ngo wiak to wungin maran kiring kiring men misan kha ku nga wangan po ngo epon men.
47012006	Epon taku mi ngo epo ngo ku wangan po ngo, takuma ngo men ku si ken po tin wungin ta hi ulil men ta asin. Epo ngo men ku sakal irawin misan engun. Takuma ngo men ku mang si nga wangan po ngo asin, epon akuli po ta ku ion ngo ken ngo e nhum epo wungin tin po ion ngo tin in ton men u po hul ngo tin sakal i men tumen asin.
47012007	Kuru epon akuli nga yek ta kaingin tin siik men ma nga pakuh po ngo si nhum weh to wungin kaunngin tin munuman weh e si si ta ngo men, tumen ma endara tin ngin si si put sun men ta wangin ko ta ngo, men tihngin ta a-Nolongin ta tin ku me songhu pit wo ngo men, epon akuli nga yek ta kaingin tin siik men ma ngo men ku pakuh po ngo si nhum weh asin.
47012008	Epo endara tin imen nga hau li nuk sii khi yang tin Akono men angan miuk epon men ku klokngin hang ngo li.
47012009	Takuma yang ko wo ta ngo taku, “Nanaangin tin ta ngo men men kai ngon ako, epo kakhangin tin ta ngo men men si pyu pongin weh mi po tin wo hi wiak wiak men.” Tumen ma wungin tin mi ngo nawaehngin epon weh men men ti, epo ngo ku mi ngo keh keh weh ma nga wangan po ngo to ngo tin wo ngo wiak wiak epo wungin maran kiring kiring men, epon kumali emhong tin ta Krais men ku weh me ung po ngo.
47012010	Tumen ma mi ngo nawaehngin epo ngo tin wo ngo wiak wiak to wungin maran kiring kiring men, u wet po tin mimi ngo men, u epo ngo tin kalwok kokyok kokyok men, u wet won maikngin tin maran kiring kiring men, u epo wungin tin miu ngo tuung wet e maran kiring kiring men kut tumen, tin nga wuh i mut eya Krais men. Epo minan tin wo ngo wiak wiak men, kha nga si apalukngin weh men.
47012011	Auh, ngo men si ulil kut khae epo wungin tin nga wangan po ngo epon men. Epo wom tuo wom kha pae wo ngo ma nga ning wungin timen. Epon men tunus epo wom kha ku wangan po ngo men. Epo wungin ta men ku nga me sulung epo po tin sun sikia hi e paengin tin ya hi pos weh men akomen, aku, ngo men ku in amiron nginan engun.
47012012	Iis, epo tosukngin tin pok put ngo epo ngo e paengin irawin ta men men ningngin me lunga wom to wungin tin nga pit nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak men, men me to tosukngin maran kiring kiring u wungin tin ateret wo nginan men maran kiring u wungin tin apalukngin men maran kiring kiring kut tumen.
47012013	Epo wungin tin ia weh e ku wom ko kuk amiron nginan epo palu walngin tin kara men? Awu. Si wungin tin then imen men ti, epo tuo ngo men ku wa maikngin ko po wom weh akomen? Auh, po som men ku mang ta lasin ta ngo tin i engun!
47012014	Homani men angan tin me miuk angan e nga hihi epo ngo ku ti epo wom men kut khae. Ma ngo ku wa maikngin ko po wom som. Epo ngo ku me epo ngo ku wa endara tin ta wom men ta som, si nga me epo ngo ku wa wom weh. Epo po hoin ani ku halung po pakuh pongin ta wiraman ngong tonin men som. Awu. Epo wiraman ngong tonin kha ku halung po pakuh po ngin ta husani ngong men ako.
47012015	Ma ngo men ku mi ngo keh keh weh epo ngo tin ku uspo endara mosop tin ta ngo men kuru ngo men ku mi ngo alang si ngo tuon kut tumen epon ku nga nhio wo enu wom epon weh. Aku, mi ngo tin pit wo wom men ung e li si weh kut, si mi wom tin pit po ngo men ku ung e me ko wet sun tin ta ngo men engun.
47012016	Irawin, epo ngo men ku wa maikngin ko po wom akomen. Si po ta wom kara wo epo ngo e kikik si wungin, ma nga torok mara wom kha nga kasum endara ta wom men!
47012017	Iyi, po tin nga tih hi ti epo wom to wungin amui men ani ku nga kasum endara ta wom kara me yanga wili hi ta men, wah?
47012018	Epo nga wo nut a-Taitus, ma nga tih wiro it ta si to yang ma ngong ti. Iyi, a-Taitus men wo amui nuk mara wom ma tip endara ta wom kara, wah? Iyi, pim tin muk muk lunga wom men men to emiun then ako, wah? Iyi, pim men muk muk ira ewi al tunus weh ako, wah?
47012019	Iyi, kyok ma wom phaeng taku pim e taku sakal mut eya pim nuk mara wom, wah? Awu. Pim men sakal to mara Got mi Krais weh. Si wom tin mi pim pit pit wo wom men, wungin mosop tin pim a ning i men, men pim a ning i epon ku khek wom si nuk nhing ako.
47012020	Epo ngo men lem, epon akuli nga ti pon ta wom, men ku nga pon ta wom tin kuk to wungin tin ku mi ngo epon som men, kuru ngo men ku in to wungin tin ku wom ku mi wom epon som men kut tumen. Epon akuli heek walngin, u wungin tin mi wom heh wet po kara men, u mi wom tin lup si to min kakhat sun men, u wom tin tohuh epo wungin ta wom tuo wom men, u wom tin wa sakalngin pit wo po engun men, u wom tin anin sakalngin pit wetpo po ewin men, u wom tin ning nenenngin men, u wom tin kuk e tumulung sup mi al engun men tumen ku kara nuk lunga wom.
47012021	Epon akuli nga kyok ti, men ku Got tin ta ngo men wa ya ngo ko lunga wom, ma mi ngo urut i epo po munuman tin ning lasin kho si ku hi phae mi hi som epo wungin tin min lengwal men, u elwanngin, u wungin tin po mi hi teng si epon ku po ning wungin lengwal epon men tumen tin po kuk e ning i kho men.
47013001	Angan tin me miuk angan men wala ngo ku ti epo wom homani men. “Mi wo wulong ponwal wa wuluk khaut miuk tin ku pok put wungin men kha ku sakalngin put then then mosop kha ku kaek singin epon men.”
47013002	Nga wo ta wom kho, kuru nga wo ti kuk mara wom kho angan tin ponwal iyi ken ngo e si in enu mara wom weh men. Ma homani ma ngo ku in lunga wom som men nga pan sakalngin kha ti epo po tin ning lasin kho men, kuru epo wom tin kara maksin men kut tumen, epon taku nga kyok ti, men ku ngo ku sakal amang ta wom kyok akomen.
47013003	Epo wom kuk e tohuh epo wom ku ion tosukngin ta tin kakaek wungin sinsin epo Krais tin sakal me pol mi wo ngo men. Epo Krais ku tus wom, men ku yang won wiak akomen, si yang men apalukngin ma in lunga wom ako.
47013004	Irawin, epo kho ma Krais won wiak ma po poo poo yang si kuk put sa wlong put wal, si li homani men yang tunus in epo emhong tin ta Got men. Epo pim kut men kuk mi yang ma wo pim wiak wiak kut tumen, si pim men ku iso tunus kuk to yang epo emhong tin ta Got e ku pim a tus wom epon men ako.
47013005	Wom karong wom tuo wom wet epo wom e taku kuk to wo phepngin wa pi om. Wom ion mi wungin ta wom weh. Iyi, wom iso pong epo wom tuo wom tin a-Yesus Krais in mi wom men, wah? Si taku wom karong wom tuo wom ma wom huuspit, men ku yang in mi wom som.
47013006	Takuma ngo men tuo ngo hoo mi ngo epo wom ku ion i epo pim tin tuo pim karong pim men, men ku pim a huuspit akomen.
47013007	Kut si homani ma nga kines Got epo wom ku ning wungin lengwal ta kyok asin. Takuma sinsin epo tuo pim tin ku kuk ken pim e ku nut wungin ion mi nginan men som, si epon ku wom ning wungin tin amunu men weh. Aku, taku wom ion pim taku pim e ku nut wungin ion mi nginan ta pim som, aku, men tunus ako.
47013008	Epo pim men ku kakha kuma pim a ning wungin ta ewut sakalngin tin irawin men akomen, si epon ku pim a nhio wo sakalngin tin irawin men misan.
47013009	Epo mi pim keh keh minan tin wo pim wiak, si wom si nuk nhing men. Ma wungin tin pim a kines Got epon men wala ti, epo Got ku ning wom si kuk tunus weh.
47013010	Tumen ma ngo ku in lunga wom som ma nga pan wungin tin i nuk ti, epon akuli nga in lunga wom ma nga sakal si ta wom to sakalngin tin ngeng ngeng men, tin ku nga sakal to emhong tin yang tin Akono men wai si ta ngo epon ku nga khek wom si pit nhing, si men epon ku ngo ku mhuk mi wom epon akomen.
47013011	Ha kut, ehurok, ngo ku suuk sii sakalngin kut khae, ma ngo ku yuk tunus ti epo wom. Wom men ku si kuk tunus weh, u wom men ku pa nhing wal weh, u wom si nuk to mi wom tin then men, u wom si kuk to wungin aminis weh kut tumen. Ma Got tin sinsin epo min epongin u min wyungin men tumen ku in to wom weh.
47013012	Ma wom men ku wa mi wom si ta al epo tumum wongin tin auluungin men ta.
47013013	Po masang to sun wala mosop tin auluungin e ta Got men wa mi hi ti epo wom.
47013014	Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men, u min epongin tin ta Got men, u min thenngin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men tumen ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
48001001	Ngo a-Pol tin paengin men ta, (si ngo ku tihngin me hang po masang to sun wala kara wa epo po tunus ta akomen. Awu. Epo a-Yesus Krais u Got tin Wiraman men tumen tin khek yang mi po tin huu kho men kha tirih ngo me men).
48001002	Kuru po ehuro it mosop tin pim a kuk then men kha tirih kisang tin iyi men ti epo palu walngin tin ung e li li yanga pi Galesia men kut tumen.
48001003	Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen men ku weh me ko po wom hang Got tin Wirama it men, u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men kut tumen,
48001004	tin min alang siin tuon mut eya lasin ta it epon kumali yang ira mi Got tin Wirama it men ma yang klok it mi elup tin i e wungin lengwal kuk epon homani men.
48001005	Got tin imen kha ku po wai yan si in kokyok kokyok li kut men. Men irawin.
48001006	Nga teret wo wom tin kerek e wetpo wom wa yang tin yuk wom epo wom ku kuk mi nanaangin tin ta Krais men, si wom lu ira pok putngin tunus enginin ta.
48001007	Si ku ken pok putngin tunus ta maksin ta in som, takuma po kara kuk e ning i ma wom kamus, ma po taku phae pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men li ulil.
48001008	Si taku pim wa tihngin api wet pi ta wa tumen, ku pok put pok putngin tunus ta si ta wom ma me ie sun tin pim a pok put si ta wom kho men, mi ngo epo Got ku ngil ngil i engun.
48001009	Epon men kho ma pim a pok wom epon kho kut men, khali nga wo i kyok iyi, taku po ta in e pok put pok putngin tunus ta si ta wom ma me ie sun tin wom wai kho kut men, mi ngo epo po tin imen ku Got ngil ngil i engun.
48001010	Epo ngo taku tohuh homani kuma po tunus ani ku mi hi saah pit po ngo, wa Got, wah? Wa nga taku wa wa mi po tunus, wah? Epon taku ngo ku iso in e wa wa mi po tunus engun, men ngo e ku kum wo Krais akomen.
48001011	Kut si ehurok, mi ngo epo wom ku ion wungin tin nuk ti, epo pok putngin tunus tin nga pok put kho men men ku sinsin in epo wungin tin po tunus mara hi iran tunus weh men akomen.
48001012	Epo ngo ku wai hang po tunus kara, wa po ta ku kot ngo epon akomen. Awu. A-Yesus Krais tuon kha pok put si in pi mlaeng epo ngo men.
48001013	Epo wom hul kho epo wungin tin nga in e ning i kho men, tin nga ira wungin tin pim Yuda wo pim nuk wet men, men nga in e mumhek mi palu walngin tin ta Got men kara kut ma nga taku mhuk min engun.
48001014	Ma wungin tin pim Yuda wo pim nuk wet men nga in e li muk epo po munuman lunga pim tin pim a khuukngin mi elup then men pit min, tin nga iso tohuh kara kut epo ngo tin ku ira wungin tin po tin yau a pim siin men tin pim a ung e khuuk wal ton me men.
48001015	Taku li klet ma Got tin nga iso in yek mi kuma inu ma yang won ung wo ngo kho ma yang yuk ngo epo min sukngin tin tan men, minan tin yang tuon min nawaehngin
48001016	epo yang tin ku pok put Wirun si in pi mlaeng in mi ngo weh kumali nga li pok put yang lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, men ngo ku kerek e sakal to po tunus kara wet kuma po pok ngo tun tira men akomen.
48001017	Kuru ngo ku li ili Yerusalem hang po tin si paengin muk kho epo ngo men akomen. Si ngo men siik li Arabia muk wet, anima nga kyok mili pol Damaskus.
48001018	Li klet ma posan miuk kho li, anima nga li si Yerusalem epon ku nga li pon ta a-Pita, ma nga li tuk a in ungunan khaut eip miuk misan.
48001019	Takuma ngo ku pon ta po paengin tin kara men akomen, si a-Yemis tin wiro sun tin Akono men misan kha nga li pon tan men.
48001020	Wom hul, epo sakalngin tin nga pan i ti epo wom iyi, men nga sakal to mara Got weh epo ngo ku torok akomen.
48001021	Li klet ma nga li pol wo mulusngin Siria to sun Silisia.
48001022	Takuma po tin palu walngin ta Krais e ung e li li wo mulusngin Yudia men men ku hi me ion marango kara kho akomen.
48001023	Si po kuk e hul wungin misan engun tin nuk ti, “Yang tin mumhek mi it kho men kha homani ma in e pok put wo phepngin tin kho ma yang taku mhuk min men,” ti.
48001024	Ma po wa Got yan si epo ngo.
48002001	Kut ma posan khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun, tumen, kho li, anima tuk a-Barnabas a kyok li si Yerusalem, kuru a-Taitus men pyuk a li to al kut tumen.
48002002	Ma Got tuon kha suk marango ma nga li si Yerusalem men, ma nga suk mara po epo pok putngin tunus tin nga in e pok put lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men weh ko nuk pi mlaeng to mara po, men nga ning wungin timen to mara po tin hi e akokono men tin pim a kuk ta tuo pim weh men, kuma nga ion i weh taku kumang tin nga saa ton homani wa kho men tumen, men kuli sinsin om asin.
48002003	Kuru a-Taitus tin tuk a me in men men api Grik, takuma po ku soh ung si yang tin ku mutngin men akomen.
48002004	Si wungin tin imen si epon tin po wa sun ehuro it tin kuk to torokngin men kara me sup men, men me sup kaunngin engun epon ku me waheking it kha men, epo wungin tin wo it pias epon mi Krais Yesus men, kumali po wa it kyok li sup ma po wa maikngin kyok ko los it ako.
48002005	Takuma pim men ku hul wet wungin tin ta po men sakun kara kho akomen. Awu. Men pi angun weh, si kumali wungin tin irawin e ta pok putngin tin tunus men men ku iso in to wom weh li kut.
48002006	Si po tin mara hi ken hi e akokono men, (aku, taku po e tuni, men ngo ku sila ngo khing epon som, epo Got men ku ples wungin maran enginin epo po kara ewin som), si po tin mara hi ken hi e akokono men ku hi sakal sakalngin homan ta ko pit hut sun tin ta ngo men minan tin pim a palu wal men akomen.
48002007	Awu. Po men ion i epo Got wa pok putngin tunus tin ta po tin ku mut wal ewin som men ko ta ngo kuma marango pit won ta yang, wala kai sun tin Got wa pok putngin tin tunus e ta po tin mut wal ewin men ko ta a-Pita kuma yang maran pit won ta sun kut tumen.
48002008	Epo Got tin emhong tan siin iis mi a-Pita epon ku yang wa kumang tin ta po paengin men ma yang li epo po tin mut wal ewin men, wala emhong tan siin iis mi ngo epon ku nga wa kumang tin ta po paengin men ma nga li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen ako.
48002009	Ma a-Yemis u a-Sipas u a-Yon tumen, tin ya ngyuk ken ngyuk e lapalakan men, ngyuk ion nanaangin tin Got naa ngo epon men, ma wuluk wa wili ngyuk tin ato sa men, tin pok put wuluk tin mi ngyuk then to tuk men, si ta tuk sun a-Barnabus, men pok put wuluk tin mi ngyuk then to tuk epo tuk men ku li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, si wuluk men ku li epo po tin mut wal ewin men.
48002010	Si wungin then ta kha wuluk kines tuk epon ku tulu tuk hu pit po po tin kalwok weh men. Iis, wungin tin wala imen kha mi ngo seh seh ta engin epon ku nga ning i men maksin kut tumen ako.
48002011	Taku li klet ma a-Pita me pol Antiok, ma nga wo si mara yang, epo yang men in epon ku po wo los po yang.
48002012	Epo po kara ku kho me hang a-Yemis men som, si a-Pita in e ii endara to po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men. Si po kho me pol hang a-Yemis kut, men yang osong li in hin epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, epo yang lem pit wo po tin kuk mi sun tin me hang a-Yemis men tin tita hi e hi mut wal ewin men.
48002013	Kuru po Yuda tin kara men men ira yang to wungin amo tin imen kut tumen, li ma wungin timen ek mi a-Barnabas kut, ma yang li ira po ton.
48002014	Si nga ion po tin ku muk muk ira wungin tin irawin e ta pok putngin tin tunus men siik som men, khama nga sakal si ta a-Pita to mara po mosop taku, “Ngon men api Yuda ako, ma taku e ira wungin tin ken sun ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, si ku ken sun tin ta po Yuda men som, taku tuni ma e puh si po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo po ku me ira wungin tin siin e ta po Yuda men epo ele?”
48002015	Epo it men khuuk wal pit minal Yuda weh, si it ku khuuk wal pit mina po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e ning lasin nginangan men akomen.
48002016	Ma it ion i epo po ta ku si in siik to mara Got epo wungin sinsin tin ku iran siik men akomen. Awu. Men epo wo phepngin tin pit wo a-Yesus Krais men misan. Tumen ma it kut men wo it phep pit wo Krais Yesus kho, kumali it men ku si kuk siik weh epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Krais men, si ku epo wungin sinsin tin ku it iran siik men akomen. Epo wungin sinsin tin ku po iran siik men men ku po ta si in siik epon akomen.
48002017	Si taku it taku si kuk siik to mara Got epo Krais, ma minan timen it pon ta it tin kuk to lasin men, men ku it wo tua? Iyi, epo Krais ani lasin si epo kumang tin tan men, wah? Awu. Men pi angun weh!
48002018	Epon taku nga ning endara tin nga ninhien i kho men kyok si, men nga ning ngo si ken po tin hik put wungin sinsin men ta kha men.
48002019	Epo wungin sinsin tuon kha nga hun tan kho kut men kumali nga tunus in ta Got misan.
48002020	Ngo men hun to Krais put sa tin wlong put wal men kho, si nga iso tunus in ako, si tunusngin ta ngo tuon ani ku nga tunus in ton kyok men akomen, si Krais kha tunus in mi ngo men. Ma tunusngin tin nga in ton wo mulus homani men, men nga tunus in ton epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Got Wirun men, tin min epo ngo weh ma min alang siin tuon mut eya ngo men.
48002021	Ngo ku wa nanaangin tin ta Got men li nuk engun akomen. Epon taku wungin tin siik men me epo wungin sinsin, men Krais tin hun men men sinsin om ako.
48003001	Auh, wom Galesia tin wungin ta wom ulil men, ara ngil ngil mi wom ma wom ku ira wungin tin irawin men kyok som? Epo nga pok put sakalngin epo a-Yesus Krais si in pi mlaeng to mara wom kho kut, men kai wom e mara wom kon yang tin poo poongin si kuk put sa wlong put wal lunga wom weh men.
48003002	Wungin then ta misan tin mi ngo epo ngo ku hul i mi wo wom men wala ti, iyi, wom wa Emiun Auluungin epo wungin sinsin tin wom iran siik men wa epo wom tin hul sakalngin to wo phepngin men, wa tua?
48003003	Iyi, wom e leleke weh ani wom hosi wungin epo Emiun Auluungin, si homani ma wom taku suuk sii wungin epo kakhangin tin ta wom tuo wom men, wah?
48003004	Iyi, wungin munuman tin wom wuh i kho men men wom wuh i engun, wah? Epo nga hoo mi ngo epo wom ku wuh i engun akomen.
48003005	Tumen ma yang tin naa wom amen engun epo Emiun Auluungin u emhong ta yang siin iis mi wom men, men yang ning i epo wom tin ira wungin sinsin siik men, wa epo wom tin hul to wo phepngin men, ie?
48003006	Tumen wala Abraham won nuk wet sakalngin ta Got ma Got maran iran ta yang ken i e wungin siik men.
48003007	Tumen ma wom men ku ion i epo po tin kuk mi wo phepngin men misa hi kha husani Abraham men.
48003008	Ma Panngin Auluungin ion wungin kho tin Got kuli iso kuh wungin siik ko po po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo wo phepngin men, kha Panngin Auluungin pok put pok putngin tin tunus men ko ta Abraham kho taku, “Ngon kha kuli po mosop tin ung e li li e hi khuuk wal ta hi weh men ku wa emhong tunus mi wo ngon men.”
48003009	Tumen ma po tin kuk mi wo phepngin men kha wa emhong tunus to Abraham tin won phep nginangan men.
48003010	Epo po mosop tin hing wo wungin sinsin epo hi e taku si kuk siik epon men, men hi kuk wet ngil ngilngin tin ta wungin sinsin men ako. Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Ngil ngilngin men ko po po mosop tin ku som e ira wungin mosop tin panngin nuk mi kisang tin to wungin sinsin men kuma po ning i.”
48003011	Si po ta tin ku weh si in siik to mara Got epo wungin sinsin akomen, men si in pi mlaeng ako, epo “po tin wungin ta hi siik men men ku tunus in epo wo phepngin misan.”
48003012	Si wungin sinsin men ku ta wo phepngin akomen. Awu. Epo “po ta tin ira wungin sinsin mosop weh men misan kha ku tunus in epo wungin tin imen.”
48003013	Krais men kiis li mut eya it epo ngil ngilngin tin ta wungin sinsin men epo yang tin si ngil ngilngin mut eya it ta men. Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, “Ngil ngilngin men ko po po mosop tin si kuk put sa men.”
48003014	Got ning i tumen kuma emhong tunus tin ta Abraham men men ku ko klet po po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men mi Krais Yesus, kumali it mosop men ku wa wungin tin Got wo kuk mara it epo it ku wa Emiun Auluungin epo wo phepngin men.
48003015	Ehurok, ngo ku sakal ira wungin tin po tunus iran wo mulus men: taku wungin siin ta kaekngin nuk lunga wulong ponwal, aku, men ta po tunus engun, si taku si kaekngin kut, men ku po ta hik put wa sum sum sakalngin enginin ta me pit hut sun kyok akomen.
48003016	Epo Abraham u po tin khuuknginin ta yang men ta kha Got wa wungin tin yang wo kuk mara wulong epon men ko ta ngong men. Got ku sakal ta Abraham taku, “u men ku ta po khuuknginin tap” ti som, e taku maran ken i e ku munuman men som, si Got wo taku, “u ta khuuknginin tap ta,” e maran ken i e po then ta misan, epon men Krais kha men.
48003017	Nga wo ti, epo wungin siin tin Got kaek i to Abraham kho epon ku pit li pol Krais tin ku me men, men ku wungin sinsin tin si in mi posan khum khum mnal u khum myuk tumen (430) sulung epo sun men hik put emhong tan akomen, ken i e taku ning i ma wo kuk marangin tan kuli siin iis akomen.
48003018	Epon taku moolngin tin ku Got pakuh po it epon men ku me epo wungin sinsin, men ku me epo wungin tin Got wo kuk mara Abraham epon men kyok akomen. Takuma Got wa moolngin tin imen ko ta Abraham epo wungin tin yang wo kuk mara sun epon kho men ako.
48003019	Tumen ma ela sinsin tin wungin sinsin ku pit epon men? Wungin sinsin tin imen men sum sumngin me pit hut sun tin Got kaek i to Abraham men pit mi wungin sinsin hik put nginan, epon ku in tumen weh li pol minan tin kuli khuuknginin tin then ta e Got wa wo kuk marangin tan si ta yang men tin kuli me men. Ma wungin sinsin tin imen Got won ung wo po tihngin kara tin ku hi wai ko ta po tunus yanga wili yang then ta tin in emin men.
48003020	Si po ta tin in emin men men ku in emin po then ta ewin akomen, si Got tin wa wungin tan ko ta Abraham men men then.
48003021	Ma taku tumen, men nga wo taku wungin sinsin men nolo wungin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men, wah? Awu. Men pi angun weh! Epon taku Got ku wa wungin sinsin ta ko nuk tin ku wa tunusngin si ta it epon men, men wungin tin siik men men ku me epo wungin sinsin tin imen weh ako.
48003022	Takuma Panngin Auluungin men nghen po po mosop me sup wet lasin, kumali sakalngin tin Got wo kuk marangin epon mi a-Yesus Krais men men ku ko ta po tin wo hi phep men weh.
48003023	Si wo phepngin men ku kho si som, si wungin sinsin in e haum eya it, men nghen epo it weh li pol minan tin kuli wo phepngin ku iso me lasngin si in pi mlaeng sulung men.
48003024	Tumen ma wungin sinsin men ken po tin kum wo sun e mara hi pit wo sun hoin men ta it ta, men in kuma pau it li epo Krais, kumali it si kuk siik epo wo phepngin.
48003025	Kut si wo phepngin men kho me kut, men ku it kuk wet po tin kum wo sun e mara hi pit wo sun hoin men ta kyok akomen.
48003026	Epo wom mosop men si wiru Got epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Krais Yesus men.
48003027	Epo wom mosop tin wom wa baptais ko mi Krais men men phi Krais ken moolngin ta men kha men.
48003028	Mi Krais men takonngin tin ku nuk lunga po Yuda to sun Grik, u lunga po tin kum wo sun men to sun tin wo hi pias men, u lunga po masang to sun wala tumen men om. Epo wom moyong men kuk then mi Krais Yesus ako.
48003029	Ma taku wom men ta Krais weh, men wom men khuuknginin tin ta Abraham men kha men, ma wom men tin ku wa pakuh pongin ira wungin tin Got wo kuk marangin epon men.
48004001	Si nga wo ti, epo po ta tin ku wa pakuh pongin men, aku, po men ku iso si phuan ma maran pit wo endara mosop, takuma men iso hoin, ma men ku iso in ken po tin kum wo sun men engun.
48004002	Yang men ku in wet wili po tin haum eyan u po tin mara hi pit wo endara ta sun men tumen weh li pol minan tin kuli wiraman won ung won men.
48004003	It kut men kuk tumen, minan tin kho ma it kuk ken po hoin men, men wo it maik it wet wungin sinsin tin ta pi mulus men kara engun.
48004004	Si pi ung e lap me pyu pongin kut, men Got tih Wirun me pol, men wut wala ta kha khuuk yang men, men me khuukngin wet wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men,
48004005	epon kuli kiis i mut eya po masang to sun wala tin kuk wet wungin sinsin men, kumali it men ku wa emhong tin ta po tin Got kuh husanin masang ko po hi men.
48004006	Ma wom tin si husani Got tin masang men kha Got tih Emiun tin ta Wirun men me ko ma in e li li mi wom men, men me yuk mi wom taku, “Aba, Yok,” ti.
48004007	Tumen ma ngon men ku in ken po tin kum wo sun engun men ta kyok akomen, si ngon men in ken Got wirun men ta, ma taku ngon e Got wirun ta, men ku e wa pakuh pongin tin ta Got men epo Krais weh.
48004008	Si irawin, epo minan tin kho e wom iso pong epo Got men, ma wom kum wet got kara tin hi ku kuk pit mina Got tin irawin men weh akomen.
48004009	Si homani ma wom pon ta Got kho kut, si tunus epo ngo men ku wo taku Got kha pon ta wom kho kut men. Si tua ma wom phae kyok lu epo wungin sinsin tin ta pi mulus e luk engin u lengwal engun tumen? Iyi, wom taku wo wom maik wom wet wungin tin imen kyok engun, wah?
48004010	Wom men kuk e wuh epo wom ku ira ungunan kara, u namih kara, u elup kara, u posan kara, tumen, weh kha men.
48004011	Nga lem epo wom, epon akuli nga wuh kumang tin ku mut eya wom men engun asin.
48004012	Ehurok, nga hau nuk sii khi wom epo wom men ku si ken ngo men, epo nga si in ken wom men. Kho men ku wom men ning lasin ta epo ngo som.
48004013	Wom ion i epo kho minan tin elit ngo ku nhing weh som men kha nga pok put pok putngin tin tunus men si epo wom ewo maran men.
48004014	Ma karongngin tin si ta ngo e nuk po elit ngo kho men men ku wom mimi ngo wa mut ngo ton akomen, si wom wa ngo ken ngo e tihngin ta Got men ta, u ken ngo e Krais Yesus tuon men tumen.
48004015	Tumen ma min tunusngin tin wom kuk ton kho men ani a? Epo nga pok put wungin si in pi mlaeng epo wom, epon taku tumen, men ku tuo wom soslok mara wom kho, ma wom wai mu si ta ngo.
48004016	Tumen ma ngo e ku si nolongin ta wom kho epo ngo tin pok put wungin tin irawin men si ta wom men, wah?
48004017	Po tin imen kuk e tohuh epo po ku wa wa mi wom, si ku epo wungin tunus ta akomen. Wai, po taku klet eya wom epo pim, si kuma wom tohuh epo wom ku ira po misan.
48004018	Si men tunus epo wom tin ku tohuh epo wom tin ku ira wungin tin tunus men sumsum ako, si ku minan tin nga in enu mara wom men misan akomen.
48004019	Husanik tin hohoin men, tin wo ngo maan to wom ken wut wala ta tin ku wanhung men, ngo men ku wo ngo maan to wom weh li pol minan tin ku Krais ung e hoh mi wom si men.
48004020	Mi ngo epo ngo ku in to wom homani ma nga phae mi haungin ta wut ngo, epo ngo men mi ngo ponwal to wom.
48004021	Wom pok ngo wet, wom tin taku kuk wet wungin sinsin men, iyi, wom e ku hul wungin sinsin som, wah?
48004022	Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk epo Abraham men husanin masang ponwal, wi ta men wut wala ta tin kum wo sun men khuuk i, u wi ta men wut wala ta tin won pias men khuuk i kut tumen.
48004023	Yang tin ta wut tin kum wo sun men men ko khuukngin pit mina po tunus elit hi, si yang tin ta wut tin won pias men men ko khuukngin pit mina wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men.
48004024	Wungin tin mosop imen men wungin emol ta, epo wulong tin wala men los po wungin siin tin ponwal e nuk lunga Got to po tunus men, wungin siin tin ponwal imen ta me ko put pi Sainai, men ken wut wala tin khuuk sun ko mi won maikngin men, men e-Hagat ako --
48004025	epo e-Hagat tin imen men los po put pi Sainai tin ung wo mulusngin Arebia men, men kai Yerusalem tin ung homani ma ung e won maik i to husanin men --
48004026	si Yerusalem tin ung ili awon men men won pias, ma men toni it mosop.
48004027	Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Ngon tin wala e wop ek ngon epo ngon tin ku khuuk sun hoin men, tin homani ma ku wop maan epo sun khuuk nginan kara akomen, ngon men ku mang ta mip ma e yuk hambip to min kehngin! Epo wut tin wala e in engun men men husanin ko munuman epo sun tin wala e titien in men.”
48004028	Si ehurok, it men ku kuk ken husani wungin tin Got wo kuk mara Abraham epon men wala ku ken Aisak men.
48004029	Si minan tin imen yang tin ko khuukngin ira wungin tin po tunus khuuk wal pit mina elit hi men men ning i lengwal epo sun tin khuukngin pit mina emhong tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, kha homani kut men wungin tin imen men iso in.
48004030	Takuma Panngin Auluungin men wo tua? Men wo taku, “Ngon men ku luul to wut tin wala e kum wo sun engun men to wirun lu, epo yang tin wiru wut tin kum wo sun engun men men ku wa pakuh pongin to sun tin wut tin wala e won pias men khuuk i men kara akomen.”
48004031	Tumen ma, ehurok, it men ku husani wut tin kum wo sun engun men akomen. Awu. It men husani wut tin won pias men ako.
48005001	Tumen ma wom men ku nuk nhing mi won piasngin tin Krais ning i ma wo it pias epon kho men, si wom kuk aku wom kyok lu kan kanngin wet epus tin wo wom maik wom wet kho men.
48005002	Wom hul, epo ngo a-Pol kha wo ta wom men, epon taku wom mang si po mut wom, men ku kumang tin ku Krais nhio wo wom epon kyok men men pi om.
48005003	Nga pok put wungin kyok si ta po mosop then then tin mang si po mut sun men, epo naumngin ta wungin sinsin men pit pon epon ku iran mosop iso.
48005004	Ngon tin taku si in siik epo wungin sinsin men, ngon men kho lu in hin epo Krais kut. Ngon men plong ko kho ma e lu in hin epo nanaangin tin ta Got men.
48005005	Epo emhong tin ta Emiun Auluungin men kha wo it phep ma it kuk e hoo mi it epo it tin kuli iso si kuk siik weh men ako.
48005006	Epo mi Krais Yesus men ku wungin tin po mut wal ewin men wa wungin tin po ku mut wal ewin som men tumen, men ku nhio wo it kiak kara akomen, si wo phepngin tin ning kumang tan epo min epongin men misan kha ku nhio wo it men.
48005007	Kho ma wom whal tunus, si homani ma ara klet put soput ta wom kyok ma wom ku ira wungin tin irawin men kyok akomen?
48005008	Wungin tin po kara taku wa wa mi wom epon imen men ku me epo yang tin yuk wom men akomen.
48005009	Yiis sakun kara engun men ning i ma beret mosop iit si nhum takut.
48005010	Wo ngo phep pit wo wom mi yang tin Akono men epo wom men wungin enginin ta ku nuk mi wom som. Si yang tin wungin tan mhuk mi wom men ku iso lat wungin tin ku Got ples i emhut sun tin tan men iso ako, yang tin imen ku ara weh men ku nga pon tan som.
48005011	Si, ehurok, taku irawin epo ngo men iso in e pok put wungin epo po tin ku mut wal weh men, si tuni ma po iso ning i lengwal epo ngo? Epon taku nga pok put sakalngin tumen, men ku sa wlong put wal tin mhuk mi po men put mut kho kut ako.
48005012	Mi ngo epo po tin mhuk mi wom ewin men men ku mhuk hi elit hi tuo hi weh!
48005013	Epo, ehurok, Got men yuk wom epo wom ku lu sup mi wungin tin ku wo wom pias epon men kho kut ako. Takuma wom kuk aku wom phaeng wo won piasngin tin imen ken i e ku sinsin epo wom tin ku ira mi wom tin kho men kyok asin, si wom men ku mi wom epo al ma wom ning kumang ta al tunus weh.
48005014	Epo wungin sinsin mosop men kaingin epo sakalngin then ta, wala nuk ti, “Ngon men ku mip epo po tin ung porili ngon men ken ngon tin mip epo ngon tuop men.”
48005015	Si taku wom kuk e koh koh wal u kuum kuum wal tumen, men ku wom haum, epon akuli wom kuum kuum wom mosop li om to al engun!
48005016	Si nga sakal ti, epo wom men ku muk muk mi wungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, men ku wom kai wungin tin mi wom tin kho men sangelek epon men kyok akomen.
48005017	Epo mi it tin kho men sangelek wo wungin tin nolo Emiun Auluungin men, kuru Emiun Auluungin men sangelek wo wungin tin nolo mi it tin kho men, ma wulong men pakik khung wal, wala wom ku ning wungin tin mi wom epo wom ku ning i men som men.
48005018	Si taku Emiun Auluungin li muk wom, men ku wom kuk wet wungin sinsin kyok akomen.
48005019	Si kumang tin mi it tin kho men tohuh epon men men wala ti: wungin tin ku po sup si khi al epon men, wungin elwanngin, wungin tin min lengwal men, wungin tin po ning sasayihngin tin to manngin men,
48005020	wungin tin po uluu got tin tororokngin enun men, u wamngin, u min lengwal pit wo po, u heek walngin, u tohuhngin lengwal tin nuk mi po men, u wungin tin po mi hi teng si men, u wungin tin po mi hi pakuh po hi engun epon men, u wungin plit pit wo al, u takonngin nuk lunga po,
48005021	u min heh wet po, u po lek sun ko huu, u wungin tin po um ma po mara hi hi nginangan men, u sasayihngin maran kiring kiring, u wungin kai sun tin imen kara kyok kut tumen. Wungin tin mosop imen nga anin wungin si ta wom epon homani ken sun tin nga anin si ta wom kho men, epo po tin ning wungin tin tumen men kuli wa pakuh pongin mi enunu tin ta Got men akomen.
48005022	Si wungin tin si enun ung hut emhong tin ta Emiun Auluungin men wala ti, min epongin, min kehngin, mi wyungin, pit nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak engun, wungin amunu, wungin tin po ning i tunus epo sun men, wungin anuh,
48005023	maran ii, u karut i to wungin tunus kut tumen. Wungin tin mosop imen ku wungin sinsin ta uluu it epon ta akomen.
48005024	Ma po tin ta Krais men men poo poo mi hi tin kho men pit put sa wlong put wal to min pit pit po wungin u min sangelekngin maran kiring kiring tumen tin tan men kho kut.
48005025	Taku it tunus kuk mi Emiun Auluungin, men ku it muk muk ira Emiun Auluungin khin maksin kut tumen.
48005026	It men ku wa ya it si pit to wungin tin it seh po ewhat po wa mi it heh wet sun epo al men engun asin kut tumen.
48006001	Ehurok, taku po ta men wom pon tan in e ning wungin yek ta sun tin siik men ta, men ku wom tin Emiun Auluungin kasum mi wom men mara wom ii ma wom nemeh i kyok si in tunus, si ngon men ku marap pit wo ngon tuop tunus, epon akuli karongngin si tap maksin kut tumen.
48006002	Wom men ku lul won maikngin ta po ta wom kara, ma wungin tin tumen kha kuli wom kai wungin sinsin tin ta Krais men epon men.
48006003	Epon taku po ta phaeng taku i e yan pos, takuma men yan kis, men torok maran tuon kha men.
48006004	Si po mosop then then men ku ion mi kumang tin tan tuon weh men, men kuli tuon ku min keh pit po kumang tan tuon, si ku min keh pit po kumang tin tan e ku kaini to po kara men akomen.
48006005	Epo it mosop then then men ku lat endara ta it maran kiring kiring then then ta it weh.
48006006	Po ta tin hul wet kotngin epo sakalngin tin ta Got men men ku pok mi endara tan mosop tin turunus men ma naa sun tin kot i men epon kara.
48006007	Wom kuk aku wom torok mara wom tuo wom, epo po ta men ku kakha epon ku hut nuu Got akomen. Epo endara tin tuni e po ta ku wha i men, tin imen kha kuli lok lok i pit mina sun men ako.
48006008	Epo po ta tin in e wha wha endara ira min tin tan e kho men men kuli lok lok i elit tin pon whuk men pit mina sun tin kho men ako, si po ta tin in e wha wha endara tan ira Emiun Auluungin men men kuli lok lok tunusngin tin sindak men pit mina sun tin ta Emiun Auluungin men ako.
48006009	Ma it men ku mi it mokongin minan tin it ning wungin tin tunus men asin, epo minan tin po hung namih ton men ku si, khama it lok lok endara ako, tin taku mi it ku ning lamang som po endara tin ku it ning i men.
48006010	Tumen ma taku pi min ek tunus ta pit, men ku it ning i tunus epo po masang to sun wala mosop, si it men ku ning i tumen epo po tin it khuuk wal mi wo phepngin then men weh.
48006011	Wom ion panngin tin tingit nunhum e nga pan sakalngin ti epo wom epon men, men to po wili ngo weh kha imen!
48006012	Po mosop tin taku ning tosukngin tunus kara pit po elit sun men po tin imen taku soh wom epo wom tin ku mut wal men, takuma po ning i tumen epon akuli sun ning i lengwal epo po pit mi sa wlong put wal tin ta Krais men.
48006013	Epo po tin mut mutngin kho men men ku tuo hi ira wungin sinsin weh akomen, si po taku mut mut wom epon kumali po wangan po hi epo elit wom engun kha men.
48006014	Si mi ngo epo Got tuon men ku uluu ngo weh epo ngo tin ku wangan po endara enginin ta men asin. Awu. Sa wlong put wal tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men misan, epo yang kha wungin tin ta pi mulus men hun to yang put sa wlong put wal epo ngo men, u nga hun to yang pit put sa wlong put wal epo wungin tin ta pi mulus men kut tumen.
48006015	Epo mi Krais Yesus men ku wungin tin po mut wal ewin men wa wungin tin po ku mut wal ewin som men tumen men ku nhio wo it kara akomen, si pho pongin tin homan men misan kha ku nhio wo it men.
48006016	Ma po mosop tin hi muk muk ira wungin siin tin imen, men ku min wyungin u min sukngin tumen ko po po, kuru men ku ko po po Israel tin ta Got weh men kut tumen.
48006017	Homani ma li kut men ku po ta dus ngo kyok asin, epo tosukngin tin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men los po elit ngo.
48006018	Ehurok, nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men men ku weh in to emiu wom. Men irawin.
49001001	Ngo a-Pol tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais epo Got min men kha ti kisang tin iyi ti epo wom tin auluungin e ung Epesus men, tin kuk to wo phepngin ta wom anuh mi Krais Yesus men:
49001002	Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen men ku ko po wom.
49001003	Sam samngin men ku si epo Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin wa emhong tin emiunan mosop kuk ili wet pi mi Krais men ko po it men,
49001004	wala yang won ung wo it mi Krais muk kho epo yang tin pho po endara mosop tin hihingin nuk kut men, kumali it men ku kuk auluungin weh u wungin om po it to mara yang to min epongin,
49001005	epo yang min wai kho epo yang ku kuuh husanin ung po it epo a-Yesus Krais kuma it men ku ta yang siik weh, men yang ira min tunusngin tin nuk ta min weh men kha yang ning i tumen,
49001006	kumali sam samngin men ku si epo moolngin tin ta nanaangin tin ta yang men, tin yang naa it epon ma yang min nawaehngin pit po it mi Wirun tin yang min epon weh men.
49001007	Mi yang kha wo it pias epo yang enghikan tin yang kiis li mut eya it epon men, men wungin yek ta sun tin siik men klokngin kha men, men si ira nanaangin tin ta yang e pu wal weh men,
49001008	tin yang yuk yuk i ko po it hambip weh to mhin ekngin u wungin ples nginan tunus tumen mosop.
49001009	Epo yang pok put wungin kaunngin tin nuk ta min men si ta it kho ira wungin tin yang tuon min tunusngin epon men, tin yang hihi i kho mi yang tuon men,
49001010	epon kumali hihingin tin ta elup tin ku sun mosop ung e wiewi al li ponsol epon men ku si, men ku Got palu endara mosop ta yang me kuk then mi Mesaia, men endara tin kuk e li li ili wet pi men kuru endara tin kuk e li li wo mulus men kut tumen, men ku me kuk then mi yang.
49001011	Kuru mi yang kha it wa moolngin tin Got pakuh po it epon kho men maksin kut tumen, epo yang min wawai kho ira hihingin tin nuk ta mi Got tin ning wungin mosop ira wungin tin Got min tuon maran iran men,
49001012	epo it tin wo it phep pit wo Krais muk epo po kara men men ku kuk epon ku Got wa sam samngin mi wo it epo moolngin tin tan men.
49001013	Wom kut men wo wom phep pit wo yang sulung epo wom tin hul sakalngin tin irawin men, men pok putngin tunus tin wom palolongin epon men; kuru wo wom phep pit wo yang kho kut, anima wom wa tosukngin tin Emiun Auluungin tin yang wo kuk mara wom epon kho men, men tosuk to wom epo wom men ta yang siik weh,
49001014	men Emiun tin kho me paii po it epo Got tin ku iso pakuh po it epo moolngin tan tin kara e kuli iso me men, tin ku it kuk e kaeng epon weh li pol minan tin kuli po mosop tin Got kul i tan men ku wo hi pias weh men.
49001015	Tumen ma ngo kut men nga hul epo wo phepngin tin ta wom e pit wo a-Yesus tin Akono men u epo min epongin tin ta wom e pit po po tin auluungin mosop men kut tumen,
49001016	men ngo ku nhing epo ngo tin ku sam sam Got epo wom men akomen, si nga in e sikia ya wom mi kinesngin tin ta ngo men,
49001017	epo Got tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin Wirama it e sinsin epo moolngin men, ku wa emiun tin epo mhin ekngin u epo pok put wungin kaunngin men tumen si ta wom mi maran ekngin tin ta wom e epo yang men,
49001018	men ku mara wom tin nuk ta mi wom men pi mha nuk pon kho kuma wom ion enda tin yang yuk wom epo wom ku hoo mi wom pit pon men u wom ion moolngin tin nhum weh e yang ku pakuh pongin ton mi po tin auluungin men,
49001019	u wom ion emhong tin ta yang men tin nhum weh tua ma me epo it tin wo it phep men, men ira tohuhngin tin ta kakhangin tin ta yang e apalukngin weh men,
49001020	tin sin iis mi Krais minan tin yang khek sun mi po tin huu kho men kyok si tunus ma yang wa sun li ung ewo wili yang tin ato sa men ili wet pi,
49001021	ili awon weh epo emiun tin mara hi pit wo sun men mosop, u emiun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men mosop, u emiun tin auwesngin men mosop, u emiun tin akokono men mosop tumen, kuru epo ya po mosop tin po sikia hi men, tin po sikia hi mi elup tin iyi, kuru po ku sikia hi mi elup tin ku iso me men kut tumen.
49001022	Ma yang wa endara mosop me sup wet khi sun, ma yang wa sun tin ku si maran pit wo endara mosop men si ta palu walngin,
49001023	tin Krais emkusin men, tin yang tin in mi endara mosop ma kol min men kha kol weh mi palu walngin men.
49002001	Ma wom men kho ma wom huu mi wungin yek ta sun tin siik men u lasin kut tumen,
49002002	tin kho ma wom muk muk iran ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men u ira yang tin maran pit wo hi tin emhong nuk si wut hi e hi kuk e li li put pi tin alilil men, men emiun tin homani ma emhong tan siin iis in mi po tin khuuk wal pit mina wungin tin po pang po hi nginangan men,
49002003	tin angan kara kho li men it mosop kuk lunga hi ma it karut it to wungin maran kiring kiring tin mi it tin kho men sangelek epon men, ma it pyu po wungin tin mi it u tulu it sangelek epon men, ma it khuuk wal pit minal epo yan salngin tin ta Got men ku me epo it, ken po tin kara maksin men kut tumen.
49002004	Taku li klet ma Got tin min sukngin tan hambip men, sinsin epo min epongin tin ta yang e nhum weh e yang min pit wo it epon men,
49002005	aku, minan tin it huu mi lasin kho kut men, takuma yang ning it si tunus then to Krais kyok (epo nanaangin kha wom palolongin epon men),
