49002006	ma yang khek it si to al, ma yang wa it si ko ung e li li to al ili wet pi mi Krais Yesus,
49002007	kumali mi elup tin ku iso nuk e me men men ku yang wa wungin tan si in pi mlaeng tin yang naa it epon hambip weh epo wungin tin yang ning i tunus epo it mi Krais men.
49002008	Epo min sukngin kha wom palolongin epon epo wo phepngin men, men ku epo tuo wom akomen. Awu. Men talungin ta Got ako,
49002009	men ku me epo kumang kara akomen, epon takuli po ta wangan pon.
49002010	Epo it men kuk ken kumang tin Got nut i ning nginan men, tin yang pho po it mi Krais Yesus epo it ku ning wungin turunus kara, tin Got hihi i kho ma nuk kuma it muk muk min men.
49002011	Tumen ma wom men ku tulu wom hu i epo wom men angan ta kho ma po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kha wom kuk tumen ta elit wom tin tumen -- tin po tin hi sikia hi tin mutngin epo mutngin tin po tunus wili hi ning i ewin men men hi sikia wom po tin ku mut wal ewin som men --
49002012	tulu wom hu epo minan tin imen wom plit pit wo Krais, u wom kuk wetpo emhong tin po Israel pakuh pongin epon wet wili po phuan tin ta hi men, u wom pong epo wungin siin tin kara e Got kakaek i to wo kuk marangin lungan to po men tumen, ma wungin tin ku wom hoo mi wom epon men om u wom kuk hin epo Got tumen wo mulus tin i.
49002013	Si li homani mi Krais Yesus kha wom tin minan ta kho ma wom kuk hin men kha Got wa wom kho me kuk tikayung kyok epo Krais kalolwan men.
49002014	Epo Krais tuon kha it ung aminis to al epon men, epo yang kha ning i ma wulong likiong si then kyok men, ma yang ninhien enunu tin nuk emin ma pok mi wulong men ko kut,
49002015	ma yang emkusin tin hun men kha yang mlis ekwha tin nuk lunga wulong men epon men; ekwha tin imen men sinsin in epo wungin tin maran ko klat e nuk e li li mi sun tin Got hihi i ma ko nuk men, kumali wulong tin ponwal imen kha ku yang pho po po tunus homan ta mi yang tuon epo wulong tin si klap wal men, ma wungin tin tumen kha yang ning i ma wulong ung aminis to wal epon men,
49002016	kuru yang ning i maksin ma wulong likiong si mi ngong then to Got mi emkusin then ta epo sa wlong put wal tin ta yang men, ma wungin tin imen kha yang ning i ma ekwha hun epon men.
49002017	Ma yang me ma yang pok put wungin aminis si ta wom tin kho ma kuk hin men u si ta po tin kho ma po kuk tikayung men kut tumen.
49002018	Epo yang kha tong likiong soput ta tong tip nuk epo Emiun then ta tin li epo Wirama it men.
49002019	Tumen ma homani men ku wom kuk ken po tin kilangin men wa ken po tin api enginin men kyok akomen, si wom men kuk ken po tin nopuan to po tin auluungin men u ken po tin kuk mi sun e wom khuuk wal mi mang tin ta Got men kut tumen,
49002020	tin ningngin kho si ung wo mang sinsin tin po paengin u po pokngin tuo hi tumen, ma a-Yesus Krais tuon men enah tin nhum e ung mang siin emol men.
49002021	Mi yang kha mang mosop me pit hut wal tunus ma mang ung e si ken mang auluungin ta mi yang tin Akono men.
49002022	Mi yang kha wom kut men ung e ningngin si to al kuma wom ung ken mang ta tin ku Got ung min epo Emiun tin tan men.
49003001	Sinsin tin imen kha ngo a-Pol tin po kan kan ngo pit mi ngo tin kum ta Krais Yesus epon ku nga nhio wo wom tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men
49003002	ih, epo nga wo taku wom e hul kho epo kumang tin Got wai ko ta ngo kho epo ngo ku marango pit wo nanaangin tin ta Got men, tin yang wai ko ta ngo epo wom men,
49003003	tin yang tuon las wungin tin kaunngin nuk men si ta ngo, ken sun tin nga pan wungin put kiak kara engun epon kho men.
49003004	Wungin tin imen taku wom tiik i, men ku wom ion ngo tin marango ek wungin kaunngin tin epo Krais men sinsin tunus ako.
49003005	Wungin kaunngin tin imen men elup kara tin kho li men men ku pok putngin si ta po tunus tin khuuk wal wo mulus men ken homani ma pok putngin epo Emiun Auluungin si ta po paengin u po pokngin tumen tin auluungin e ta Got men akomen.
49003006	Wungin kaunngin tin imen wala ti, epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men men ku si ken po tin wa pakuh pongin to sun men, men ku kuk mi emkusin then ta, ma po pok mi endara tin Got wo kuk mara po epon mi Krais epo pok putngin tin tunus men.
49003007	Pok putngin tin tunus imen kha nga si po ta tin nga kum tan men epo talungin tin epo nanaangin tin ta Got men, tin yang wai ko ta ngo epo kakhangin tin ta yang e emhong tan siin iis in mi ngo men.
49003008	Ngo tin in wet po tin auluungin e hi kuk wet sun tin kara men kha Got wa nanaangin tin imen ko ta ngo men, kumali nga pok put sakalngin lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo miranngin tin ta Krais e ku it pon tan sinsin weh akomen,
49003009	ma nga wa wungin si in pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala mosop ma po ion endara tin ela weh e po pok pok min then mi wungin kaunngin tin imen. Wungin kaunngin tin imen men to elup mosop tin hosingin ma ung e lap me men men kaunngin nuk na mi Got tin pho po endara mosop yanga wili a-Yesus Krais men,
49003010	kumali homani men ku mhin ekngin tin maran kiring kiring e ta Got men men ku si in pi mlaeng epo palu walngin to mara emiun tin mara hi pit wo sun men to sun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men pi tin nuk e li li ili wet pi men.
49003011	Wungin tin mosop imen si ira wungin tin sindak nuk na mi Got men, tin yang pyu pon ning nginan mi Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men.
49003012	Mi Krais kha soput ta it tip nuk tin ku mi it puplet ma it li pol ta Got awo phepngin engun epo wo phepngin tin pit po yang men.
49003013	Tumen ma nga kines wom epo wom men ku kuk aku mi wom hunngin epo won maikngin tin nga lat i mut eya wom men, epo won maikngin tin imen kha wom wa moolngin epon men ako.
49003014	Wungin sinsin tin imen kha powut ngo ko suul mara Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men,
49003015	tin po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi e hi khuuk e li li wet pi u wo mulus men kut tumen men yang yan ung e li li wo po mosop.
49003016	Nga kines yang epo yang ku naa wom ira moolngin tin ta yang e hambip weh men, kuma wom wa emhong ma wom nuk nhing epo yang Emiun mi wom tin emin weh men,
49003017	kumali Krais bing in e li li mi wom epo wo phepngin. Tumen kuma wom tin ku nuk nhing mi min epongin ken sa tin imut ko kasum mulus ma pit nhing men u ken mang ta tin ung wo mang sinsin tin ung nhing men tumen,
49003018	kha ku mara wom pe mi min epo ngin tin ta Krais men to po mosop tin auluungin men, men min epo ngin tin min nhum weh u nomalak weh u ewum weh u nomalak li si weh tumen,
49003019	kuma wom ion min epongin tin ta Krais men, tin ku it hik e mara it pem sin weh men akomen, kumali Got ku kol mi wom ma yang tenge mi wom weh.
49003020	Homani men ku yang tin kakha epon ku ning wungin hambip weh tin si nhum epo sun mosop tin it kines epon u mara it iran men tumen, ira emhong tin tan e siin iis ung mi it men,
49003021	yang tin imen kha ku po wa yang yan si mi palu walngin mi Krais Yesus weh li pol mi elup tin ku po iso ung e khuuk wal min men, tin ku ung e lap li men. Men irawin.
49004001	Tumen ma wungin tin mosop imen kha ngo a-Pol, tin in mi yang tin Akono men kha po kan kan ngo epon men, wo nut wom epo wom men ku muk muk mi wungin tin kai sun tin Got yuk wom epo wom ku iran men tunus weh men.
49004002	Wom men ku ning i tumen to wungin tin klet po wom mosop e wom pauuk ngini wom epon weh u wom ning wungin amlus men tumen, to wungin tin wom wuh wungin epo al li maran nomalak epon men, u mi wom epo al ma wom ning i amang epo al kut tumen,
49004003	men ku wom tohuh epo wom tin ku kasum min thenngin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men mi wungin tin nuk aminis e kan kan wom to al weh men.
49004004	Krais emkusin men then ta u Emiun Auluungin men then ta, wala Got yuk wom kuma wom lu sup mi hoo mingin then ta tin yang yuk wom epo wom ku hoo mi wom pit won men;
49004005	kuru yang tin Akono men men then ta, u wo phepngin men then ta, u baptais men then ta kut tumen;
49004006	kuru Got tin Wirama it mosop men, tin in ili awon epo it mosop, u klet in lunga it mosop, u in e li li mi it mosop kut tumen, men then ta misan kut tumen.
49004007	Si nanaangin men ko ko ta it mosop then then ira kaingin tin ta talungin tin ta Krais men kho kut,
49004008	wala sakalngin put ta men panngin nuk taku, “Minan tin yang li si ili awon men yang kan kan po munuman tin hi lek wal men ma yang muk po li si, ma yang wa talungin kara si ta po masang to sun wala.”
49004009	(Si wungin tin “Yang li si” men, men sinsin ku suk mara it epo wungin enginin ta som. Awu. Men suk mara it epo muk men yang li ko weh ko li wet mulus kho wet ako.
49004010	Yang tin li ko men wala maksin li si wet pi tin nuk ili awon weh epo sun mosop men, kuma yang klet in mi endara mosop.)
49004011	Ma yang tuon kha wa po kara e ku si paengin, u po kara e ku si pokngin, u po kara e ku si pok put pok putngin tin tunus men, u po kara e ku si mara hi pit wo sipsip ma kot sun nginangan men tumen.
49004012	Yang ning i tumen kumali po tin auluungin men ku wa endara mosop tin ku po ning kumang ta Got epon men, kumali Krais emkusin ku hi khek wal si kuma si pit nhing weh,
49004013	men ku pit nhing tumen weh li pol minan tin kuli it mosop sup mi min thenngin tin wo it nuk wet sakalngin then u mara it ek Got Wirun weh men kut tumen, li ma it si ken po tunus ta tin si nomuru kut men, weh li it si kai Krais tin si nomuru weh men, ma Krais si kol weh mi it.
49004014	Tumen kuma homani ma li kut men ku it kuk ken po hoin men kyok akomen, tin esap psik wal i to po li u me tumen, u kotngin maran kiring kiring wa po mili mili ken eip tin hik sup wet wal men tumen, sinsin men in epo kusamuhngin tin ta po tunus men, tin po mhi hi ek sakalngin ma po sakal lang po ngi al epo wungin kara tin po taku ek ek mi sun epon ma sun mang ta soput ta hi nuk epon men.
49004015	Si it tin ku kuk e pok put sakalngin tin irawin men to min epongin men kha wungin mosop tin it ning i men kha ku it si nomuru mi yang tin emkusin mhin men epon men, men Krais ako.
49004016	Krais tin mhin men kha emkusin tingit tin kara men sum sum pit hut wal tunus epo yang u kan kanngin to al epo elik mosop tin kasum sun men ira emkusin tingit then then tin nut kumang tan weh ning nginan men, ma yang ning i ma emkusin ung e plok si nhum li ma emkusin khek i tuon si pit nhing epo min epongin.
49004017	Tumen ma ngo tin in mi yang tin Akono men kha nga sakal u nga pok put wungin epon ti, epo homani ma li men ku wom muk muk kyok ken po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, tin muk muk mi tulun hungin ta po tin wungin irawin om min men asin.
49004018	Epo mi po tin ples wungin sinsin men men pi mi ku awhus i, epon tin po kuk awetpo nginan epo tunusngin tin ta Got men, epo wungin tin po pong epon nginangan e nuk mi po men, epon tin po mara hi tin ung mi hi men tin mara hi mhi men.
49004019	Po men elit hi ku maeng po sun tin po ning lasin epon men akomen, tumen ma po mang ta hi sup mi wungin tin po wile ning manngin epo mi hi engun men, kuma po tohuh epo wungin tin min lengwal e maran kiring kiring men to min wawai tin klet mi po men.
49004020	Si wom men ku hul kotngin epo Krais kho ira wungin tin tumen akomen,
49004021	tin taku irawin weh epo wom e hul wet yang kho ma wom wa kotngin mi yang ira ewi sun tin irawin e in mi a-Yesus weh men.
49004022	Kotngin tin imen wala ti, epo wungin tin wom iran kho ewin men, tin ta po tunus min tin kho men, tin ung e whuk ira min wai wai tin ek ek min men, men ku wom kuul i ma mang tan lu.
49004023	Si wom men ku mang, si wom ung e si homan mi emiu wom tin kasum tulun hungin ta wom weh men,
49004024	ma wom wa po tunus tin homan men, tin pho pongin to wungin siik u auluungin tumen ira ewi Got enun weh men, ko po wom ken moolngin ta men.
49004025	Tumen ma wom men ku mang ta wungin tin epo torokngin men li, si “Wom mosop then then men ku sakal irawin to po tin e ung porili wom men,” epo it then then men ta emkusin then ako.
49004026	“Taku mi wom kakat sun, men ku wom haum, epon akuli wom ning lasin.” Wom kuk aku wom mang ta sinang li ko, si wom iso kasum mi wom tin kakat sun men asin,
49004027	epon akuli wom wa pi tin min ek men kara nuk epo emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men.
49004028	Taku po ta tip tip endara nginangan kho, men ku homani ma li men ku tip endara kyok asin, si men ku wuh kumang ning nginan tin tunus men epo wilin likiong, kumali in to endara kara tin ku nhio wo sun tin kalwok men.
49004029	Wom men ku mang ta wungin tin hies men ta me pol wo wom asin, si wungin tin tunus e ku khek po si pit nhing men misan kha ku me pol wo wom men, kumali men ku nhio wo po tin huli men.
49004030	Ma wom men ku wa min urut i si po Emiun Auluungin tin ta Got men asin, epo Emiun tin imen kha Got tosuk to wom epo wom e ta yang weh li pol to elup tin kuli wo wom pias weh kut epo lasin tin ta wom men.
49004031	Wungin tin mi wom makasian pit pon men, u min kakhat sun, u yan salngin, u wungin il mi nginan, u wungin tin ton mi nginan men tumen, men ku wom mang tan mosop lu hin epo wom, to wungin mosop tin mi wom lengwal pit wo al epon men.
49004032	Si wom men ku ning i tunus epo al, men ku mi wom ami sukngin pit po al, ma wom mang mang ta lasin ta al, ken sun tin wom kuk mi Krais ma Got mang ta lasin tin ta wom men kho men.
49005001	Tumen ma wom men ku ira wungin tin Got suk mara wom epon men siik weh ken wom tih husani Got tin yang min pit wo wom weh men.
49005002	Ma wom men ku muk muk mi min epongin weh, ken Krais tin min epo it ma yang min alang siin tuon mut eya it ken talungin ta Got ta tin ku ipek tunus li ko hut yang ma yang min tunusngin pit pon men.
49005003	Si elwanngin u wungin mosop tin min lengwal men wa maran nesngin tumen, men ku wom ning i aku po sikian yan si in lunga wom asin, epon men ku siik epon ku si in lunga po tin auluungin men akomen.
49005004	Kuru kiongngin u sakalngin ulil, wa sakalngin tin min lesngin e lengwal men tumen, men ku siik to wom som kut tumen, si tunus epo sam samngin men ku wiewin.
49005005	Epo wom ion i kho epo po tin ning elwanngin nginangan men, wa po tin wungin ta hi min lengwal men, wa po tin mara hi nes endara nginangan e kuk ken hi e won nuk wet got torokngin enun men kuli ta wa pakuh pongin ta mi enunu tin ta Krais ngong Got men akomen.
49005006	Wom kuk aku wom mang ta po ta tin ku me torok mara wom epo sakalngin put kara tin wungin irawin om min men asin, epo wungin tin mosop imen kha kuli min kakhat sun tin ta Got men iso yukngin ko po po tin khuuk wal pit mina wungin tin pang po hi nginangan men ako.
49005007	Tumen ma wom men ku pok mi wungin tin imen to po asin.
49005008	Epo angan ta kho men wom kuk ta pi tin mi ku men, si li homani men wom kuk ta pi tin mha mi yang tin Akono men. Wom men ku muk muk ken wom e husani pi tin mha men weh.
49005009	(Epo enun tin ta Emiun Auluungin men men si to wungin mosop tin tunus u siik u irawin weh men tumen.)
49005010	Ma wom ion mi wungin kuma wom pon ta wungin tin yang tin Akono men min nawaehngin pit pon men.
49005011	Si wom men ku klap to po to wungin tin ta pi mi ku e enun tan pi om men asin, si men tunus epo wom men ku tak si wungin tin imen weh si in pi mlaeng weh.
49005012	Epon men in to manngin epo it tin ku sakal epo wungin tin po ning i pi tin kaunngin men.
49005013	Si endara mosop tin tak singin si in pi mlaeng men men pi tin mha men kha ning i si nuk pi mlaeng men, epon taku endara ta ning i ma endara ta si in pi mlaeng kho, timen men ta pi tin mha men ako.
49005014	Sinsin tin imen wala sakalngin nuk ti, “Ngon tin nhaung men, e phip si ma e khek si mi po tin huu kho men, men ku Krais pon mha ko nuk po ngon.”
49005015	Tumen ma wom men ku mara wom pit tunus epo wungin tin wom muk muk min men, si men ku ken po tin wungin ta hi ulil men asin, si men ku ken po tin mhi hi ek men weh,
49005016	ma wom tohuh epo wom ku kasum pi min ek tunus mosop, epo elup tin it kuk min homani men men ta wungin lengwal.
49005017	Tumen ma wom men ku kuk ken po tin wungin ta hi ulil men kyok asin, si wom men ku mara wom ples wungin tin nuk ta mi yang tin Akono men ani ku nuk tua.
49005018	Ma wom kuk aku wom um wain hambip ma mara wom hih hih, epo wungin tin po ku mara hi pit wo hi tunus epon som men men in mi wungin tin imen ako; si wom men ku mang, si Emiun Auluungin kha ku si kol mi wom weh men.
49005019	Ma wom sakal ta al epo lutngin tin nuk mi Kisang tin to lutngin men, u epo lutngin tin ku wom nut Got sam sam nginan epon men, u epo lutngin tin to min kehngin e Emiun Auluungin pong siin si in mi wom men kut tumen, ma wom lulut ma wom ning sam samngin ta mi wom li epo yang tin Akono men.
49005020	Wom men ku ning sam samngin kokyok kokyok emhut wungin mosop tin si ta wom men li epo Got tin Wirama it men epo ya yang tin Akono ta it e a-Yesus Krais men,
49005021	ma wom lem pit wo Got ma wom wa wom ko kuk wet po ta wom kara tin kuk lunga wom men.
49005022	Wom tin wala enanangin men, wom men ku wa wom ko kuk wet po masang tin wom pit ta hi men weh, ken wom e wa wom ko kuk wet yang tin Akono men weh men.
49005023	Epo po masang ta tin enangin men kha mhin epo titien tin wala men, ken Krais tin mhin epo palu walngin men, ma yang men Palolongin tin ta emkusin tin tan men.
49005024	Tumen ma Krais tin palu walngin tan in wet men, tumen kut kha kuli po wala tin enanangin men ku ko kuk wet titien hi tin mamasang ta hi weh men epo wungin mosop.
49005025	Wom tin mamasang enanangin men, wom men ku mi wom epo titie wom tin wawala men ken sun tin Krais maksin min epo palu walngin ma yang min alang siin tuon mut eya wut,
49005026	kumali yang ning wut si auluungin ma yang khis po wut epo eki tin ku yang khis po wut epo sakalngin men.
49005027	Yang ning i tumen kumali yang wa wut me in to mara yang tuon, men ku palu walngin to moolngin ta, tin ku endara ta memlel pon wa pon mol mol ta wa endara kara tumen nuk pon akomen, si wut men ku in auluungin ma wungin om po wut weh.
49005028	Wungin tin tumen kha ku po masang tin enanangin men ku mi hi epo titien hi tuo hi ken po mi hi epo emkusi hi tuo hi men. Epo po masang ta tin min epo titien men men min epon tuon kha men.
49005029	Epo po ta men ku in akandira kho ma min lel i emkusin tuon akomen. Awu. Men in e maran pit won epo enda aiingin u men ning i ma elit kah po sun tumen, ken yang tin Akono men ning i epo palu walngin men.
49005030	Epo it men kuk ken yang wilin, khin, maran u tumen tin ta yang emkusin men, men ta yang emalin u ta yang pokoin kut tumen.
49005031	“Sinsin tin imen kha ku po masang ta mang ta wiraman ngong tonin in, si li lup to titien, ma ngong si emkusi ngong then men.”
49005032	Wungin kaunngin tin imen men nhum takut, men nga sakal los po Krais u palu walngin tumen ako.
49005033	Kut sini wungin tin imen men nga sakal ta po masang then then lunga hi kut tumen, men ku po ta min epo titien ken i e tuon min epon men, u titien tuon men ku maran weh pit epon ku won nuk wet titien weh kut tumen.
49006001	Apo hoin, wom tin kuk mi yang tin Akono men kha ku wom hul wet po irama wom to eleni wom weh men, epo wungin tin imen men siik ako.
49006002	“Ngon men ku wa wiramap ngong tonim ya ngong si,” men wungin maran ko klat tin si muk to wo kuk marangin men,
49006003	wala sakal ti, “kumali e ung tunus ma e in maran nomalak wo mulus tin iyi li.”
49006004	Si wom masang tin khuuk po hoin men, wom men ku mhuk mi po hoin tin wom khuuk i men asin, aku po ya hi sal pit wo wom. Si wom men ku mara wom pit wo po ma wom kot po u wo wom nut po tumen, epo sakalngin tin ta yang tin Akono men misan.
49006005	Wom tin kum wet wili po phuan men, wom men ku hul wet po tin phuan ta wom wo mulus men, men ku wom hul wet po to lemngin u iikngin tumen, u to mi wom tin then epon ku hul wet sakalngin men kut tumen, ken wom e ning wungin timen e ta Krais weh men.
49006006	Si wom men ku ning kumang minan tin po phuan mara hi nuk po wom men misan ken wom e taku torok mi po tunus engun men asin. Si wom men ku ning kumang ken wom e po tin kum wet wili Krais weh men, tin ira wungin tin nuk ta mi Got e yang min epon weh men epo mi wom weh.
49006007	Wom men ku mi wom tunusngin ma wom ning kumang tin imen, ken wom e ning i ta yang tin Akono men, si ken i e ta po tunus men akomen.
49006008	Epo wom ion i epo wungin tin tuni e ku po ta ning i tunus men, men yang tin Akono men ku wai emhut sun si ta po siik, aku, taku po kum wet wili sun wa po wo hi pias engun wa tumen.
49006009	Si wom tin phuan men, wom men ku ning wungin kai sun tin imen epo po kut tumen, men ku wom mang ta wungin tin wom uluu mi po epon men, epo Phua tin ta wom tuon men maksin in ili wet pi ako, ma wungin tin po ples wungin enginin enginin epo po kara men men ku yang in ton akomen.
49006010	Ehurok, ngo ku suuk sii sakalngin kut khae, ma nga wo nut wom ti, epo wom men ku nuk nhing mi yang tin Akono men u mi kakhangin tin ta emhong tin ta yang men weh kut tumen.
49006011	Wom men ku nghen po wom epo moolngin tin ta Got e epo lek walngin men, kumali elup tin lengwal men ku si, men ku wom nuk nhing ma wom ten ten epo wungin tin emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men hihi i ta min ma yang taku kusamuh wom epon men.
49006012	Epo it men ku wuh lek walngin ewut po tunus tin to emali hi u enghik a hi tumen akomen, si men ewut emiun tin mara hi pit wo sun men u ewut emiun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men u ewut emiun tin hihingin kuk e li li ma mara hi pit wo pi mi ku tin kuk mi elup tin iyi, u ewut po nolo tin emiunan e wungin ta hi lengwal e hi nomoyong kara kuk e li li ili wet pi men kut tumen.
49006013	Tumen ma wom men ku wa moolngin tin ta Got e epo lek walngin men mosop si, kumali wom nuk nhing ma wom ten ten tunus weh mi elup tin lengwal men, ma wom ten ten epo wungin mosop kho li kut, men ku wom iso nuk nhing.
49006014	Tumen ma wom men ku nuk nhing, men ku wom wat put wom kho epo wungin tin irawin men, u wom klet po engai wom kho epo wungin tin siik men,
49006015	u wom kan kan moolngin kho tin nghen po khi wom e wom hihi i to pok putngin tin tunus e pok put wungin aminis men kut tumen;
49006016	si moolngin tin nhum epo sun mosop men, men ku wom wa ilio tin epo wo phepngin men, tin ku wom wai si wom whus yau ngin tin ung hut emon enun tin mosop e emiun tin wungin tan lengwal men whis i me epo wom men.
49006017	Kuru wom men ku wa moolngin tin ku klet mhi wom men, tin tulu wom hu Got tin palolo wom men, u bainat tin ta Emiun Auluungin men kut tumen, men sakalngin ta Got ako;
49006018	epo kinesngin mosop men ku wom hau si wo Got sumsum epo wo phepngin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, ma sinsin tin imen kha ku wom haum tunus ma wom wuh kokyok kokyok epo wom tin ku hau si wo Got tin ku nhio wo po mosop tin auluungin men.
49006019	Kuru wom men ku kines Got epo yang ku nhio wo ngo kut tumen, kuma Got wa sakalngin ko ta ngo tin ku wo ngo ngam to mi ngo tin puplet men ma nga pok put wungin kaunngin tin ta pok putngin tin tunus men si in pi mlaeng.
49006020	Pok putngin tin tunus imen kha Got tih ngo me ton ma nga me pok put ma po kan kan ngo epo esih tin po koklong men kha iyi. Wom men ku kines Got epo pok putngin tin tunus imen kuma mi ngo puplet weh ma nga pok put ira sakalngin tin tunus epo ngo ku sakal i men.
49006021	Si kuma wom maksin ku pon ta wungin tin si si epo ngo men u ele tin nga in e ning i men tumen, kha ku a-Tikikus tin mi ngo epon e wiro it weh e kum to wungin anuh mi yang tin Akono men kha ku ti pok put wungin mosop si in pi mlaeng to mara wom men.
49006022	Yang men nga tih i ti epo wom epo sinsin tin wala ti, kuma wom pon ta wungin tin si si epo pim men u yang men ku pa nhing mi wom kut tumen.
49006023	Min wyungin men ku weh in to wom tin it irit won mi Krais men, u min epongin to wo phepngin tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u yang tin Akono e a-Yesus Krais men tumen, ku weh in to wom kut tumen.
49006024	Nanaangin tin ta Got men men ku in to po mosop tin mi hi epo yang tin Akono ta it e a-Yesus Krais men to min epongin tin ku torokngin ta in min som men. Men irawin.
50001001	Ngo a-Pol u a-Timoti tumen tin tuk a kum wet wili a-Yesus Krais epo mi tuk weh men, kha tuk a tih kisang tin iyi ti epo wom mosop tin auluungin e kuk mi Krais Yesus e ung Pilipai men, to po tin mara hi pit wo palu walngin men u po tin kum ta palu walngin men kut tumen.
50001002	Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen ku in to wom.
50001003	Nga sam sam Got tin ta ngo men kokyok kokyok minan tin tulu ngo hu pit po wom men,
50001004	ma mi kinesngin mosop tin ta ngo men nga kines Got epo wom kokyok kokyok to min kehngin weh.
50001005	Nga sam sam Got epo wom tin it klap wal to pok putngin tin tunus men pok put nginan tin to ungunan tin muk men kha me pol homani kut i.
50001006	Epo sakalngin tin wo ngo phep pit won men wala ti, epo Got tin kho ma hosi kumang tunus ta mi wom men kha ku iso ning i timen li pyu pongin weh li pol mi elup tin ta a-Yesus Krais men.
50001007	Epo wungin tin imen men siik epo ngo ku tulu ngo hu wom mosop to wungin tin tunus imen, epo wom men kuk mi ewhat ngo weh. Epo esih tin po koklong e po kan kan ngo epon men u ngo tin haum eya pok putngin tin tunus men u nga kaek siin tumen kha wom pok mi nanaangin tin ta Got men to ngo ton men.
50001008	Epo Got kha maran nuk po ngo to sakalngin men, epo nga hiim wom hambip kara kut to min epongin tin ta Krais Yesus weh men.
50001009	Ma nga kines epo wungin tin nuk ti, epo min epongin tin ta wom men ku iso pu wal weh ma ung e si po al weh li, to maran ekngin u wungin sinsin ples nginan mosop kut tumen,
50001010	kuma wom ion mi wungin tin tunus weh men kuma mi wom yil u wungin om po wom tumen weh li pol to elup tin ta Krais men,
50001011	ma endara tin wungin siik li enun ung hut men tin me epo a-Yesus Krais men ku pu wal mi wom weh, kuma Got yan si nhum u sam samngin ta yang si nhum epon kut tumen.
50001012	Kut si, ehurok, mi ngo epo wom ku ion i epo wungin tin si ta ngo kho men men ku klet soput ta pok putngin tin tunus men akomen. Awu. Men me si plo nginan ma si enun ung hut epon tin ku li huuh li yanga pi mili men,
50001013	wala homani ma wungin si in pi mlaeng to mara po nolo maran min then ta tin haum eya mang ta Sisa men, kuru po mosop tin kara men kut tumen, epo esih tin po koklong e po kan kan ngo epon men men nga in mi Krais kha nga wuh i men.
50001014	Ma po ehuro it tin munuman kara maksin men tin it irit won then mi yang tin Akono men si mi hi pit nhing epo ngo tin po kan kan ngo epo esih tin po koklong men, ma po si mi hi puplet weh epo po ku pok put sakalngin to hiukngin ta hi tin om men.
50001015	Irawin, epo po kara pok put Krais to mi hi tin heh wet sun men u to mi hi tin taku puh puh mara al men tumen, si po kara pok put Krais to mi hi tin tunus men.
50001016	Po tin wo ngo ung wo hi e li muk men men pok put Krais to mi hi tin po sila hi khing pit po hi tuo hi tin ku si nhum men, si ku to mi hi tin yil men som, ma po wo taku po ku wa won maikngin ko what ngo to sun tin po kan kan ngo epo esih tin po koklong men.
50001017	Si po kara tin wo ngo ung wo hi e me sulung men men pok put Krais to min epo ngin tin nuk mi hi men, epo po ion i epo Got won ung wo ngo epo ngo kha ku haum eya pok putngin tin tunus men.
50001018	Tumen ma kuli? Aku, taku po kara kaun wungin enginin kara mi hi ma po put wungin wa taku po kara pok put wungin to wungin irawin kara tin nuk mi hi men, Krais men pok putngin ako, taku in ti wa nuk tumen wa men. Ma wungin tin imen kha nga in e mi ngo keh keh epon men, wai, ma ngo men ku iso in e mi ngo keh keh weh li kut.
50001019	Epo nga ion i epo wungin tin siin si pit po sun tin imen ku si plo nginan epo ngo tin ku palolongin epo kinesngin tin ta wom men u epo Emiun tin ta a-Yesus Krais men tin ku nhio wo ngo men kut tumen.
50001020	Epon wala li nga hulum epo sakalngin epo hoo mingin ta ngo weh epo wungin ta men ku nga wa manngin epon som. Si epo mi ngo tin puplet weh men ken sun tin kho kut u homani kut tumen kha ku Krais si yan nhum epo ngo emkusin men, aku, taku epo ngo tin ku iso tunus in men wa epo ngo tin ku hun men wa tumen.
50001021	Epo ngo men nga ion wungin tin nuk ti, taku nga tunus in, men epo Krais misan, wa taku nga hun, men ku nga wa endara tunus weh kara si po sun tin i ako.
50001022	Si taku nga iso tunus in wo mulus to ngo emkusin, timen kha ku kumang ta ngo si enun ung hut men ako. Si ela ku nga pias pon, men ku nga pon tan akomen.
50001023	Epo mi ngo tin ponwal men nghen epo ngo weh, epo mi ngo epo ngo ku li silang wom ma nga li in hang Krais, epo wungin tin imen kha tunus weh men.
50001024	Si taku nga iso in wo mulus to ngo emkusin, men ku tunus weh epo wom ako.
50001025	Ma tuo ngo ion mi wo phepngin tin ta ngo men kha nga ion i epo ngo ku iso in wo mulus ma nga iso in to wom mosop kumali wo phepngin tin ta wom men ku osong weh li kara kut u mi wom keh keh epon kut tumen,
50001026	epon kumali min kehngin tin ta wom e wom wangan po ngo ton men ku si nhum weh mi a-Yesus Krais epo ngo tin ku iso kyok ti epo wom angan ta kyok men.
50001027	Si wungin then ta misan, epo wom men ku kuk e ira wungin ken wom e po tin me epo pi wet pi men kara, tin ku nuk tunus to al to pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men. Tumen kuma taku nga ti ion wom wa taku nga kis epo wom, men ku nga hul epo wom tin nuk nhing to emiun then ta men, ma to mi wom then ta kha wom tohuh to al epo wo phepngin tin ku weh pit wo pok putngin tin tunus men,
50001028	si wom ku lem epo wungin maran kiring kiring tin po tin nolo wom men taku ning i lengwal epo wom men akomen. Men tosukngin ta po ta si in pi mlaeng epo po men kuli iso huuspit, si men tosukngin ta wom ta epo wom men kuli iso palolongin. Palolongin tin imen men ku me hang Got ako.
50001029	Epon wala li Got min suk wom ma yang mang ta wom tin wo wom phep pit wo Krais men, kuru wom tin ku wuh won maikngin mut eya yang maksin kut tumen ako,
50001030	si wala li homani ma wom tohuh epo lek walngin tin kho ma wom ion ngo tin wuh i ken sun tin imen, kuru wom hul epo nga iso in e wuh i homani kyok kut tumen.
50002001	Iyi, pa nhingngin kara in mi Krais, wah? Iyi, sakalngin tin ku it wa mi it ko li wyu ung men kara in, wah? Iyi, min thenngin tin ku it klap wal ton mi Emiun Auluungin men kara in, wah? Iyi, min epongin to min sukngin kara in, wah?
50002002	Iis, taku tumen, men ku wom pyu po min kehngin tin ta ngo men si kol weh epo wom tin ku kuk to mi wom tin then men, ma wom kuk to mi wom tin pit wo al men then, u enu wom then, u wungin tin wom taku ning i men then kut tumen.
50002003	Si wom kuk aku wom tohuh epo wungin tin nuk ta mi wom e wom tuo wom taku si nhum epon men u epo wungin tin wom taku wa wom si pit engun men tumen asin, si wom men ku kuk to wungin tin nuk ta mi wom e ku wom wa ya wom ko epon men, ma wom ion mi al e kai po enginin e ku tunus epo wom weh men.
50002004	Wom kuk aku mara wom pit wo silan khingngin tin ta wom tuo wom men misan asin, si wom men ku mara wom pit wo silan khingngin tin ta po enginin men maksin kut tumen.
50002005	Wom men ku kuk to wungin tin nuk ta mi wom men ken sun tin kho ma nuk mi Krais Yesus men kut tumen,
50002006	tin in ewo maran kho ma moolngin ta Got ko pon men, takuma yang ion i tin ku yang ngong Got in kai wal weh men ken i e endara ta tin ku yang kasum i pip men akomen.
50002007	Awu. Men yang wa yan ko engun, ma yang wa moolngin tin ta po tin kum wo sun engun men ko pon, ma yang men ko khuukngin ken po tunus enu hi men engun.
50002008	Ma po ion yang tin maran ken po tunus ta men, khali yang tuon wai ko, ma yang iso ira wungin tin ta Wiraman men weh li ponsol ma yang hun, wai, men hunngin tin po huu lengwal put sa wlong put wal ewin men.
50002009	Sinsin tin imen kha Got wa yang si ung ili awon weh, ma yang pen ya sun yan homan ta, men yan pesek epo ya po mosop,
50002010	kumali po sikia a-Yesus yan, men ku po mosop powut hi ko suul, men po tin kuk ili wet pi men, u po tin kuk wo mulus men, u po tin kuk wet mulus men kut tumen,
50002011	ma po mosop mamai hi pok put a-Yesus Krais men Akono, kumali Got tin Wiraman men yan si nhum epon.
50002012	Tumen ma wom tin mi ngo pit wo wom weh men, wom tin kho ma ira sakalngin ta ngo kokyok kokyok men khali homani ma wom men ning i tumen kut. Ma ku ken wom e kuk enu mara ngo ani wom ning wungin timen som. Awu. Men ken ngo e kis lunga wom kha kuli wom tohuh epo wom tin ku pyu po kumang tin ku wom tuo wom palolongin epon men to lemngin u iikngin tumen.
50002013	Epo Got kha in e kum mi wom kuma mi wom kuru wungin tin wom ning i ira mi wom men kut tumen ku yang ira wungin tin yang min tunusngin epon men ako.
50002014	Wungin mosop tin wom ning i men men ku mara wom ain ma wom ning i engun, si wom sakal munuman wa wom sakal phae sun asin,
50002015	kumali wom si kai po tin wungin om po hi e mulu hi put yil weh men, tin husani Got e lasin om po hi e kuk lunga po tin khuuk wal to wungin ta hi tin ku siik som u ulil tumen. Kut men ku wom si ken esul ta ma pal nuk lunga po ken awheng tin nuk e li li ili wet pi ma ngin ngin me ko mulus men.
50002016	Ma wom kasum sakalngin tin epo tunusngin men pip weh, kumali nga wangan po wom mi elup tin ta Krais men epo ngo tin saa to kumang u wuh kumang kho men men ku nga saa li hut liit nuk engun akomen.
50002017	Si taku homani ma mi ngo alang si ngo ma nga yuk yuk ngo kalolwan ken talungin wainan ta ko po talungin ta wom tin wo phepngin ta wom pong si wom ma wom ning kumang auluungin epon men, aku, men mi ngo keh ako, kuru mi ngo keh to wom mosop kut tumen.
50002018	Wungin sinsin tin then imen kha mi wom keh keh kuru mi wom keh keh to ngo maksin kut tumen.
50002019	Kut si nga hoo mi ngo epo wo phepngin ta ngo tin pit wo a-Yesus tin Akono men epo pi maran tikayung engun ma ngo ku tih a-Timoti ti epo wom, kumali yang kyok me pok ngo epo wom tin kuk tun tira men, men ku enu ngo kyok si pit nhing.
50002020	Epo po ta ku ken a-Timoti men tin ku silan khing pit po wom weh tin ku kuk tun tira men ku ta in to ngo som.
50002021	Epo po mosop men kuk e sila hi khing pit po wungin ta hi tuo hi misan, si po ku sila hi khing pit po wungin tin ta Krais Yesus men weh akomen.
50002022	Si wom ion mi wungin ta yang ma wom men pon ta yang kho, epon ken yang ta tin kum to wiraman men kha kho ma yang kum to ngo mi pok putngin tin tunus men pok put nginan men.
50002023	Tumen ma nga hoo mi ngo epo ngo ku tih yang kerek ti, takuma men ku nga ion wungin tin ku si ta ngo tun tira men iso wet.
50002024	Kuru wo ngo phep epon taku yang tin Akono men min epon, men ku pi put monlo long anima tuo ngo ku ti epo wom maksin kut tumen.
50002025	Takuma nga wo taku tunus epo ngo ku tih wiro it a-Epaproditus ti epo wom, tin me tuk a klap wal to kumang u lek walngin tumen then men. Kuru yang men tin in to sakalngin ta wom, kuru yang men tin me nhio wo ngo epo endara tin nga kalwok epon men kut tumen.
50002026	Epo yang in e lun epo wom mosop ma yang miun tuung pit po wom tin hul epo yang tin saih men.
50002027	Irawin, epo kho ma yang saih ma yang taku hun angan, takuma Got min suk yang, kuru Got iso min suk ngo kut tumen, epon akuli min urut i tin ta ngo e homan men kyok ko los po sun tin kho men.
50002028	Tumen ma sosohngin wa ngo epo ngo ku tih yang ti epo wom kuma wom ion yang kyok ma mi wom keh keh, kuru min urut i tin ta ngo men ku mlisngin kara ko kut tumen.
50002029	Tumen ma wom men ku wa yang mi yang tin Akono men to min kehngin tin klet mi wom men, ma wom men ku wa po tin kuk tumen men ku ya hi si weh.
50002030	Epo kumang tin ta Krais men kho ma yang taku hun angan mut eyan, ma yang ku min ko wo tunusngin tin tan weh men som, si kuma yang ning i kai kumang tin wom kalwok epon ku wom ning i nhio wo ngo epon men.
50003001	Ehurok, ngo ku suuk sii sakalngin angan ma nga wo ta wom ti, epo wom men ku mi wom keh keh mi yang tin Akono men weh. Epon taku nga pan wungin ira sun kyok ti epo wom, men ku mi ngo mokongin epon akomen, kuru men epon ku wom kuk anga tunusngin kut tumen ako.
50003002	Wom haum epo elwa, men po tin ning kumang ta hi to wungin lengwal nginangan men, tin mhuk sun elit hi ewin men!
50003003	Epo it kha po tin mut wal ewin e irawin weh men, tin kum auluungin epo Emiun Auluungin, u it wangan po Krais Yesus, si ku wo it phep pit wo wungin tin ta po tunus men ta akomen.
50003004	Aku, tuo ngo kha ku wo ngo phep pit po wungin tin ta po tunus men ako. Epon taku po enginin ta phaeng taku i e ku won phep pit po wungin tin ta po tunus men ta, men kuli nga iso li ut maran ako.
50003005	Epo po mut ngo to ungunan tin miuk me sup men, u ngo men po Israel khuuknginin, u ngo men a-Bensamin phonginin, u ngo men khuukngin Hibru ma ngo men api Hibru weh kut tumen; kuru wungin tin nuk porili sun tin epo wungin sinsin men men nga iran to po Parisi ewin kut tumen;
50003006	u wungin tin nuk porili sun tin epo tohuhngin men, men nga lek po tin palu walngin ta Krais men; u wungin tin nuk porili sun tin nuk tua e siik e ira sun tin epo wungin sinsin men, men wungin om po ngo epon kut tumen.
50003007	Takuma wungin tin kho ma nga phaeng taku e ku nhio wo ngo men, men li homani ma nga ion i ken i e taku amiron nginan engun men.
50003008	Wai, kuru nga ion wungin mosop tin kara maksin men ken i e amiron nginan engun kut tumen, men taku nga kaini kara to maran ekngin tin pit po Krais Yesus tin Akono ta ngo men tin akauwo nginan weh men. Ma nga wuh wungin tin ku endara mosop ko amiron nginan engun epo ngo kho men, kuma nga wuh i mut eya yang, ma nga ion i ken i e asiluk nginan engun, si kuma nga si emhong tin ta Krais men salum po ngo weh,
50003009	kuma po pon ta ngo tin weh in mi Krais men, men ku to wungin siik tin ta ngo weh e me epo wungin sinsin men akomen. Awu. Men me epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Krais men weh, men wungin siik tin me hang Got epo wo phepngin men ako.
50003010	Mi ngo epo ngo ku ion mi wungin ta yang, u emhong tin ta yang e yang khek kyok si tunus epon men kut tumen, kuru ngo men ku klap yang to wungin maran kiring kiring tin yang wuh i men weh kut tumen, kumali nga si kai yang to hunngin tin ta yang men weh,
50003011	epon taku tumen men ku wungin tin nuk ti wa nuk tumen kha kuli nga kyok me sup mi khekngin kyok si mi po tin huu kho men.
50003012	Si ngo ku kasum i kho wa ngo ku si tunus weh kho akomen, takuma nga tohuh epo ngo ku iso kasum i, kumali nga weh li kasum i tin Krais Yesus kasum ngo weh epon ku nga wai men.
50003013	Ehurok, nga phaeng taku ngo ku kasum wungin timen kho akomen; takuma wungin then ta nga in e ning i, men tulu ngo som ta wungin tin kho li wetpo ngo men, si nga tus wili ngo li pol epo ngo ku wa endara tin nuk maran min ngo men muk wet.
50003014	Nga tohuh epo ngo ku saa weh li wa talungin tin Got yuk ngo mi wo Krais Yesus epo ngo ku weh li wai ili wet pi men.
50003015	Tumen ma it mosop tin si nonomuru kut men men wungin timen men ku iis mi it weh. Ma taku wungin enginin kara nuk mi wom, men ku Got tuon iso suk mara wom epo wungin timen maksin kut tumen ako.
50003016	Takuma wungin tin it kasum i kho men, men ku it muk muk iran ira wungin sinsin then, kuru it men ku wungin then ta misan nuk mi it kut tumen.
50003017	Ehurok, wom men ku sup me lup to ngo kuma wom ira tosukngin tin nga suk mara wom epon men, men ku mara wom ion mi po tin muk muk ira wungin tin tumen, ma wom kai wungin ta po to wungin tin pim a suk mara wom epon kho men.
50003018	Epo po munuman kara tin nga pok wom epo hi kho kokyok kokyok, kuru homani ma nga pok wom mi tinisngin men kut tumen, men muk muk kai po tin nolo sa wlong put wal tin ta Krais men.
50003019	Pi tin ku po li pol epon hut men men mhukngin, u got ta po men kuma po, u wungin tin po wa hi si pit ton men men po wa manngin epon kut tumen. Po men wa mi hi ko ung wo wungin tin ta pi mulus men misan engun.
50003020	Si it men pi ta it sinsin ung ili wet pi, men pi tin it hoo mi it ma it kuk e haum epo Palolongin tin kuli iso me ko epon men, men a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men,
50003021	tin ku me phae it emkusin tin amiron nginan engun men kuma si kai yang emkusin tin to moolngin men, men ku si epo emhong tin ku yang kakha epo yang ku wa endara mosop me sup wet yang tuon men.
50004001	Tumen ma, ehurok, wom tin mi ngo pit pit wo wom u nga in e hiim wom weh men kut tumen, wom men min kehngin ta ngo u talungin tin ku emhut kumang ta ngo e ung mhi ngo men tumen kha imen. Wom tin mi ngo pit pit wo wom men, wom men ku nuk nhing tumen mi yang tin Akono men.
50004002	Si nga suh mi kinga e-Yuodia u nga suh mi kinga e-Sintike tumen epo wulong ku in to mi ngong then mi yang tin Akono men weh.
50004003	Kuru nga kines ngon tin tita tong weh men epo ngon ku nhio wo wulong tin wala imen tin klap ngo to kumang tin nga wuh i mut eya pok putngin tin tunus men, kuru e nhio wo a-Klemen hi po tin kara e klap ngo to kumang men maksin kut tumen, tin ya hi panngin nuk mi kisang tin epo tunusngin men.
50004004	Wom men ku mi wom keh keh mi yang tin Akono men sumsum. Nga sakal kyok ti, wom men ku mi wom keh keh weh!
50004005	Wom men ku mang ta wungin amunu tin ta wom men ku si in pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala mosop. Yang tin Akono men ku me angan kut khae.
50004006	Wom men ku sila wom khing pit po wungin ta asin, si epo kinesngin u wom tin ku hau si wo Got to sam samngin men tumen kha ku wom pok put kinesngin tin ta wom men si ta Got epon men,
50004007	men ku min wyungin tin ta Got men, tin nhum epo wungin mosop tin kara maksin e ku po tunus mara hi ples i sinsin men ku haum eya mi wom u tulun hungin tin ta wom men kut tumen epo Krais Yesus.
50004008	Ehurok, ngo ku suuk sii sakalngin angan kut khae ma nga wo ta wom ti, epo wungin tin akani e irawin, u wungin tin akani e yan pos, u wungin tin akani e siik, u wungin tin akani e min yil, u wungin tin akani e pon lungin, u wungin tin akani e yan tunus u tumen, taku wungin tunus ta weh wa wangan pongin tunus ta tumen, men ku tulu wom hu pit po wungin tin nuk tumen misan.
50004009	Wungin tin nga kot wom ma wom wai u wom hul i u wom ion ngo tin ning i men tumen, tin imen kha ku wom iran men, ma Got tin sinsin epo min wyungin men ku weh in to wom.
50004010	Kut si mi ngo keh keh hambip mi yang tin Akono men epo homani kut men silan khingngin tin ta wom e pit po ngo men men enun paas si homan kyok. Iis, epo silan khingngin tin ta wom e pit po ngo men men nuk kho ako, takuma pi ku put kara ko pit akomen.
50004011	Si taku nga kalwok ani nga sakal tumen som, epo nga urut wungin kho epo nga in tuni, men ku marango ain ma nga in tumen kut.
50004012	Nga urut wungin tin ku nga in amusukngin engun, u nga urut wungin tin ku endara ta ngo nuk a salok engun men kut tumen likiong. Pi tin akani e nga li epon u wungin tin tuni e si ta ngo men tumen, tin taku nga mut wa nga hun elip, wa taku endara ta ngo pu wal wa nga kalwok wa tumen, men nga urut i mosop kho kut.
50004013	Ngo men kakha epo ngo ku ning wungin mosop epo Krais tin pa nhing ngo weh men ako.
50004014	Takuma wom tin klap ngo to won maikngin ma wom nhio wo ngo men men wom ning i tunus ako.
50004015	Kuru wom tin api Pilipai men, tuo wom ion i kut epo ewo maran men tin wom hul pok putngin tin tunus men ma nga yok Masedonia ma nga li, men ku palu walngin ta ku klap ngo epo wungin epo nanaangin tin li u me tumen akomen, awu, men misa wom.
50004016	Epo pi Tesalonaika kut kha nga li in epon men ma wom tih nhio wongin me epo ngo angan tin li muk men u tin me ponwal angan men tumen epo endara tin nga kalwok epon men.
50004017	Si ngo ku hoo mi ngo pit po wom epo talungin ani nga wo tumen som. Awu. Ngo taku wa talungin kumali enun muluk ung hut ma naumngin ta wom ung e me ko po sun li si hambip tin kuli Got wai emhut sun men.
50004018	Takuma naumngin mosop men nga wai kut, kuru kara kyok hambip ko po sun kut tumen. Ma nga mut kut, epo nga wa endara hang a-Epaproditus tin wom tih i mu men, men ken talungin ipek tunus ta tin wom wai si ta Got ma yang min saah pit pon men.
50004019	Ma Got tin ta ngo men ku kaini mosop tin wom kalwok epon men ira miranngin tin tan e in mi moolngin ili wet pi mi Krais Yesus men.
50004020	Homani men ku it wa Got tin Wirama it men yan si ili awon kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin.
50004021	Wom men ku wa mi wom si ta po mosop tin auluungin e kuk mi Krais Yesus men. Si po ehuro it tin kuk hang ngo men kha ku wa mi hi ti epo wom men.
50004022	Kuru po mosop tin auluungin men maksin wa mi hi ti epo wom kut tumen, si po tin kuk mang tin ta Sisa men wo kanut ngo weh epo hi kha ku wa mi hi ti epo wom men.
50004023	Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
51001001	Ngo a-Pol tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais ira wungin tin nuk epo mi Got men, u wiro it a-Timoti tumen,
51001002	kha tuk a pan kisang tin iyi ti epo wom tin auluungin e it irit won mi Krais e nuk nhing to wo phepngin epo pi Kolosi men. Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen, tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen, ku in to wom.
51001003	Tuk a sam sam Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ma tuk a kines yang epo wom sumsum.
51001004	Epo pim a hul epo wo phepngin tin ta wom e pit wo Krais Yesus men u min epongin tin ta wom e pit wo po tin auluungin mosop men kut tumen,
51001005	sinsin men in epo hoo mingin tin wom hoo mi wom epo endara tin halung pongin ta wom pit ili wet pi men, tin wom hul epon kho mi sakalngin tin irawin men, tin pok putngin tunus men.
51001006	Pok putngin tunus tin imen men me pol ta wom kho ken sun tin ung e li li wo mulus mosop maksin kut tumen, ma ung e huuh li, ken sun tin ung e huuh mi wom maksin ewo maran tin wom hul i ma mara wom ples nanaangin tin ta Got men to wungin tin irawin men.
51001007	Kuru ken sun tin wom urut i mi wo a-Epapras tin mi pim pit won e pim a klap wal to kumang then men. Yang men pit nhing epo kumang ta Krais mut eya wom.
51001008	Yang pok pim maksin epo min epongin tin ta wom e wom kuk ton mi Emiun Auluungin men.
51001009	Kuru wungin sinsin tin imen kha ewo maran tin tuk a hul wungin epon men, men ku tuk a mang put epo kinesngin epo wom som. Men tuk a kines Got epo yang ku wa maran ekngin epo wungin tin nuk ta mi yang men ko kol mi wom to mhin ekngin u wungin sinsin ples nginan tin me epo Emiun Auluungin men tin ku klet mi wom weh men,
51001010	kumali wom muk muk ira wungin tin nuk tunus to wungin tin ta yang tin Akono men, ma yang min keh pit po wom to min kehngin tin klet mi yang weh men. Ma wungin tin ta wom men kumang maran kiring kiring tin turunus men ku enunun ung e li li hut sun weh, kuru maran ekngin tin ta wom e pit wo Got men ku ung e ko po sun li si kut tumen.
51001011	Kuru Got men ku pa nhing wom epo emhong mosop tin ta yang men, pit mina kakhangin tin ta yang e to moolngin men, kumali wom nuk nhing wet won maikngin ma wom wuh i lu maran nomalak to min kehngin engun.
51001012	Kuru wom men ku sam sam Got tin Wirama it men tin ning i ma it si tunus epon ku it pok pok mi moolngin ta al tin po tin auluungin men ku pakuh pongin epon mi pi tin mi mlaeng men.
51001013	Yang men palolo it wet wili emhong tin ta pi mi ku men, si li homani ma yang al po it li kuk mi enunu tin ta Wirun tin yang min pit won weh men,
51001014	tin kiis li mut eya it epo yang kalolwan, tin lasin ta it klokngin epon men.
51001015	Yang men tin Got tin ku mara it kon i som men men yang enun tuon, tin li muk epo endara mosop ma ku maran pit wo endara mosop tin Got pho pon men.
51001016	Epo yang kha Got pho po endara mosop yanga wilin men, men endara mosop tin kuk ili wet pi u wo mulus u tin mara it kon i u mara it ku kon i som men kut tumen, tin taku emiun tin kuk e li li e sinkhaung men, wa emiun tin akokono men, wa emiun tin kuk e li li e mara hi pit wo pi ta hi then then men, wa emiun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men wa tumen. Endara tin mosop imen Got pho pon epo yang u ta yang kut tumen.
51001017	Ma yang men in muk kho epo endara mosop, ma yang kha kasum endara mosop nuk bing to wal kumali endara mosop men ku yang wal li yanga pi akomen.
51001018	Ma yang men mhin epo emkusin, tin palu walngin ta yang men, tin yang tuon hosin men. Kuru yang men khek kyok si tunus muk kho epo po tin kara e huu kho li men, kumali yang kha ku si sinkhaung epo endara mosop men.
51001019	Epo Got tin Wiraman men min tunusngin epo moolngin mosop tin ta yang men ku iis in mi yang weh,
51001020	ma yang kha Got ning endara mosop kyok si min then ton epo yang, tin taku kuk wo mulus wa kuk ili wet pi wa tumen, wala Got ning i ma endara tin mosop imen nuk aminis epo yang kalolwan tin yuk yuk ko put sa wlong put wal men.
51001021	Ma wom men kho ma wom plit pit wo Got ma wom nolo yang to wungin tin nuk ta mi wom men epo wungin lengwal tin maran kiring kiring e wom kuk e ning i men, si li homani ma Got pulum po wom si mi wom then to yang kyok
51001022	epo Krais emkusin to sun emalin tin hun men, kumali Got wa wom me kuk to maran to wungin tin auluungin men, ma po wom yil weh ma wungin tin ku yang wa lasin ta ko po wom men om po wom to mara yang.
51001023	Wom men ku kuk tumen, tin taku irawin epo wom ku iso ira wo phepngin tin ta wom men ma wom nuk nhing won u nuk nhing ton tumen, si wom si yang wal epo hoo mingin tin ta pok putngin tin tunus e wom hul i kho men akomen. Pok putngin tin tunus imen wala pok putngin kho si ta po masang to sun wala mosop tin Got pho po hi e hi ko ko kuk wet pi men, tin wala ngo a-Pol si po ta tin nga kum ta pok putngin tin tunus imen.
51001024	Ma homani ma mi ngo keh mi won maikngin tin nga wuh i mut eya wom men, ma nga taku suuk sii won maikngin tin ta Krais men tin iso pit men epo elit ngo, kuma nga wuh wungin timen mut eya yang emkusin, tin palu walngin ta yang men.
51001025	Palu walngin tin imen men nga kho si po tin kum tan men ta, ira hihingin tin ta Got e yang wa kumang tin imen ko nuk yanga wili ngo epon kuma nga nhio wo wom epon men, kumali nga suuk sii sakalngin tin ta Got men weh.
51001026	Men sakalngin tin kho ma kaunngin nuk eking po tin ko ung e khuuk wal to elup tin ku iso ung e me men, si homani men lasngin si in pi mlaeng to mara po tin auluungin e ta Got men kho kut.
51001027	Po tin imen Got min epo yang ku pok put miranngin tin hambip e ta moolngin tin ta wungin kaunngin tin imen si in lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, ma wungin tin imen wala ti, Krais men in mi wom, men hoo mingin ta wom epo moolngin kha men.
51001028	Yang kha pim a pok put sakalngin epon men, ma pim a wo nut po masang to sun wala then then mosop epo po ku haum tunus, kuru pim a kot po mosop then then kut tumen epo mhin ekngin tin klet mi pim men, kumali pim a wa po masang to sun wala then then mosop me nuk to mi hi tin po muru weh men to mara Got mi Krais Yesus.
51001029	Sinsin tin imen kha nga wuh kumang epon men maksin kut tumen, ma nga tohuh epon to emhong tin ta Got men tin siin iis in mi ngo weh men.
51002001	Epo mi ngo epo wom ku ion i epo ngo tin wuh wungin nhum takut mut eya wom u po tin ung Laodisia men, u po kara tin esini e ku mara pim nuk po al kho som men kut tumen,
51002002	kumali po mi hi pit nhing weh wo po mi hi tin sum sumngin to al kho mi min epongin men, ma po wa miranngin tin mosop e si pu wal weh wo po mi hi tin pit nhing wo po mara hi tin pe wungin sinsin tunus men, weh li po mara hi ek wungin kaunngin tin ta Got men, men ta Got tin Wiraman men u ta Krais kut tumen to al.
51002003	Mi Krais kha miranngin tin ta mhin ekngin u maran ekngin men tumen mosop halung pongin ma kaunngin nuk mi yang men.
51002004	Nga wo tumen, epon akuli po ta me kusamuh wom epo sakalngin kara tin po nut i ma ku wa wa mi wom epon men.
51002005	Aku, epo ngo tunus men in hin epo wom, takuma emiu ngo men it kuk ako, ma mi ngo keh epon ku ion hihingin tunus tin ta wom men u wo phepngin tin ta wom e pit nhing wo Krais men kut tumen.
51002006	Tumen ma wungin tin wom wa Krais Yesus tin Akono men ton kho men, kha ku wom muk muk mi yang ton homani kut tumen,
51002007	men ku imut wom ko nhing wo yang u wom khek wal si wo yang kut tumen, ma wom ko nuk nhing wo wo phepngin tin wo wom nuk wet men, ken sun tin wom hul wet kotngin epon kho men, ma wo phepngin tin ta wom men ku tenge to sam samngin weh.
51002008	Mara wom si kuk, epon akuli po ta me kan kan wom epo mhin ekngin tin ta po tunus e po mi hi pit pit i men engun, u epo kusamuhngin tin kuli enun ung hut akomen kut tumen, pit mina wungin tin po tunus ung e pa mara al epon men, u pit mina emiun tin pu si po nginangan e kuk wo mulus men kut tumen, si ku pit mina Krais akomen.
51002009	Epo yang kut kha Got tin Gotan men iis min weh mi yang emkusin tin tunusan men,
51002010	ma wom men si klet weh mi yang, tin sinkhaung epo emiun tin kuk e li li e mara hi pit wo pi ta hi then then mosop men, u emiun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men kut tumen.
51002011	Mi yang kha wom mutngin epo mut walngin tin ku po tunus wili hi ning i ewin som men, si men tin klok elit tin imen tin los po mi wom tin kho men li men, epo mutngin tin Krais tuon kha ku ning i men,
51002012	ma wom men kilngin to yang mi baptais, kuru wom khekngin kyok si tunus to yang min kut tumen epo wo phepngin tin pit wo emhong tin ta Got e siin iis in mi yang men, men Got tin khek yang mi po tin huu kho men kyok si tunus men.
51002013	Ma wom men kho ma wom huu mi wungin tin yek ta sun tin siik men u to elit wom tin ku mut wal som e nuk ta mi wom tin kho men kut tumen, taku li klet ma Got ning i ma wom kyok si tunus kuk to yang, epon tin Got klok lasin tin ta wom men mosop kho li men.
51002014	Epo Got mlus wungin tin panngin nuk yanga kisang to naumngin tin ta yang e pit wo it e nolo it men kho kut, ma yang klok i kho mili nuk worengin kho kut, wala yang wai si yang poo poo i pit put sa wlong put wal kho kut men.
51002015	Ma Got tep emhong hang emiun tin kuk e li li e mara hi pit wo sun men u emiun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men tumen mosop li, ma yang wa emiun tin mosop imen si kuk pi mlaeng to mara po mosop, epo yang ning i ma emiun tin mosop imen huuspit epo sa tin wlong put wal men.
51002016	Tumen ma wom kuk aku wom mang ta po ta tin ku ples wungin ta wom pit mi endara aiingin wa pit mi endara ta tin ku wom um i men, wa pit mi kakaomngin ta wa namih homan ta wa pi Sabat tin auluungin men kara wa tumen asin.
51002017	Epon men endara enun tin tosukngin epo wungin tin ku iso me men engun, si endara tin irawin weh men men Krais ako.
51002018	Wom kuk aku wom mang ta po ta tin ku me sup ma torok mara wom ma tip talungin tin ta wom men asin, tin taku po mi hi pit po wungin tin po torok ma po wa ya hi ko engun men, u po uluu tihngin kara engun kut tumen, ma po phuk mi hi engun li sup epo endara tin ku po ion i kho som men, ma po sasayih to wungin tin nuk ta mi hi tin kho men engun,
51002019	si po ku kasum yang tin mhin epo po men pip som, men yang tin emkusin mosop wa kakhangin epon u pokoin nhung pit hut wal u lilwi kan kan i pit hut wal kut tumen, ma emkusin ung e plok si epo emhong tin me hang Got men kha men.
51002020	Tumen ma taku wom huu to Krais epo emiun tin pu si wom e ta pi mulus men kho, taku tuni ma wom tuo wom wa wom sup wet wungin sinsin kara ken i e wom iso ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men?
51002021	Epo po wo taku, “Wom men ku kah pon asin, wom men ku tong i sut tan asin, wom men ku wai si nuk yanga wili wom asin” ti.
51002022	Epo wungin sinsin tin mosop imen los po endara tin ku po ning kumang epon li klet khama pi om engun men, epo wungin sinsin tin imen po iran pit mina wungin sinsin u kotngin tumen tin ta po tunus engun men kha men.
51002023	Irawin, epo wungin sinsin tin mosop imen maran ken to mhin ekngin ako, tin po uluun e si mi wo po tuo hi engun, u tin po torok ma po wa ya hi ko epon engun men, u tin po songhu pit wo hi emkusin engun men kut tumen, takuma wungin tin mosop imen ani ku tunus epon ku nhio wo po ma po mang ta wungin tin po wa mi hi sup wet wungin tin po mi hi tin kho men kling si epon men akomen.
51003001	Tumen ma taku irawin weh epo wom tin khekngin kyok si tunus to Krais kho kut men, men ku homani ma wom tohuh epo wom ku wa endara tin nuk ili wet pi men misan weh, men pi tin Krais li in epon men, tin yang li ko ung ewo wili Got tin eronin men epon men.
51003002	Tulun hungin tin ta wom men men ku pit po wungin tin nuk ili wet pi men weh, si ku pit po wungin tin nuk wo mulus men asin.
51003003	Epo wom men huu kho, ma tunusngin tin ta wom men men kaunngin nuk to Krais mi Got.
51003004	Ma minan tin kuli Krais tin tunusngin ta it men si put plo nginan in pi mlaeng men, men ku wom si put plo nginan kuk pi mlaeng to yang mi moolngin maksin kut tumen.
51003005	Tumen ma wom men ku mang ta wom emkusin tingit kara tin pit pit hut lasin wo mulus ewin men men ku sup wet hunngin weh: men elwanngin, u wungin tin ku mi yil som men, u min lup si, u min pit pit wo wungin lengwal, u maran nesngin u tumen, epo maran nesngin men ken wungin tin po wo hi nuk wet got tin tororokngin men enun men kha men.
51003006	Epo wungin tin mosop imen kha kuli mumhek mingin tin ta Got men ko po po tin khuuk wal pit mina wungin tin po pang po hi nginangan men ako,
51003007	men wungin tin kho ma wom muk muk iran ewin men, minan tin wom kuk min kho men.
51003008	Si li homani men ku wom mang ta wungin tin tumen maksin li: yansalngin, u min lup si, u min lengwal pit po po, u ton mingin, u kiongngin tin me pol wo wom men u tumen.
51003009	Wom men ku torok mara po ta it kara asin, epo wom mang ta mi po tunus tin kho men to wungin lengwal tin tan men kho li kut,
51003010	si wom pang po wom epo mi po tunus tin homan men kho kut ako, tin ung e si homan to maran ekngin pit mina enu yang tin pho pon men.
51003011	Epo lunga po tunus tin homan imen men ku takonngin nuk lunga po Grik u po Yuda, wa nuk lunga po tin mut wal ewin men u po tin ku mut wal ewin som men, wa nuk lunga po tin kara e sakalngin ta hi enginin men wa po tin wungin ta hi enih men, wa po tin kum wet wili sun engun men, wa po tin wo pias men tumen kyok akomen, si Krais misan in u Krais tuon kha in mi po mosop men kut tumen.
51003012	Tumen ma wom tin Got won ung e li li wo wom men, tin auluungin u yang min pit wo wom weh men kut tumen, men ku pang po wom epo min sukngin, u wungin amunu tin wom ning i tunus epo po men, u wungin tin ku wom wa ya wom ko engun men, u wungin amlus, u wungin tin wom ku pit nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak epon men kut tumen.
51003013	Ma wom men ku wuh wungin tin po ta wom ta ning i lengwal epo wom men engun, kuru wom mang ta lasin tin ta wom men epo wal kut tumen, tin taku po ta in to wungin epo sun ta men. Ken Krais tin mang ta lasin ta wom men, men ku wom ning i tumen maksin kut tumen.
51003014	Ma wungin tin ku wom ning i ma ko po sun tin mosop imen men ku wom pang po wom epo min epongin weh, men wungin tin ku kasum sun to al ma mosop si then tunus weh men.
51003015	Kuru wom men ku mang ta min wyungin tin ta Got men ku siin iis mi wom weh kut tumen, epo wungin tin wala imen kha Got yuk wom epo wom ku kuk aminis ton mi emkusin then ta men. Kuru wom men ku kuk to wungin tin ku wom sam sam Got epon men weh kut tumen.
51003016	Wom men ku mang ta sakalngin tin ta Krais men weh ko in ma kasum mi wom to mhin ekngin mosop, ma wom ung e kot wal u wom wo nut wal tumen ira lutngin kara tin panngin nuk mi Kisang tin to lutngin men, u lutngin kara tin ku wom sam sam Got epon men, u lutngin kara tin ku Emiun Auluungin pong siin si mi wom men kut tumen, ma wom men ku lut lutngin to sam samngin tin nuk mi wom men li epo yang tin Akono men weh.
51003017	Ma wungin tin tuni e ku wom sakal i u wom ning i tumen, men ku wom ning i mosop epo ya a-Yesus tin Akono men, men ku wom wa sam samngin si ta Got tin Wiraman men weh li yanga wili yang.
51003018	Wom tin wala enangin men, wom men ku wa mi wom sup wet titie wom, men wungin tin siik to po tin kuk mi yang tin Akono men ako.
51003019	Wom tin masang enangin men, wom men ku mi wom epo titie wom weh, ma wom men ku mi wom nuk lengwal epo po asin.
51003020	Apo hoin, wom men ku hul wet wungin tin ta po irama wom to eleni wom men epo wungin mosop tin po sakal ta wom epon men weh, epo wungin tin imen men yang tin Akono men min tunusngin pit po wom epon ako.
51003021	Wom masang tin khuuk po hoin men, wom ning i aku po hoin tin wom khuuk i men mi hi teng si, epon akuli po mi hi luk.
51003022	Wom tin kum wet wili po phuan men, wom men ku hul wet po phuan tin mara hi pit wo wom wo mulus men epo wungin mosop tin po wo ta wom epon men, men ku wom ning i tumen minan tin po kuk tili wom men misan asin, ken wom e taku wa wa mi po kuma po mi hi tunusngin pit po wom kha men, si wom men ku kuk to mi wom tin then men, ma wom lem pit wo Got misan weh.
51003023	Ma wungin tin mosop e wom taku ning i men, men ku wom ning i to mi wom weh, ken wom taku ning i epo yang tin Akono men weh, si ku epo po tunus ta akomen,
51003024	epo wom ion i epo wom ku iso wa talungin hang yang tin Akono men, tin ku yang pakuh po wom epon men ako. Epo wom men kum ta Krais tin Akono men ako.
51003025	Si taku po ta ning wungin tin ku siik som men men ku wa wungin emhut sun tin ning i lengwal men ako, si wungin tin po ples wungin enginin epo po kara men men ku pi om.
51004001	Wom tin phuan men, wom men ku naa po tin kum wo wom men epo endara tin siik epo po ku wai men, kuru wom ning i kai wal epo po mosop kut tumen, epo wom ion i epo phua ta wom ta men in ili wet pi ako.
51004002	Wom men ku nuk nhing weh epo kinesngin kokyok kokyok, ma wom kines, men ku mara wom si kuk ma wom haum tunus to sam samngin.
51004003	Kuru wom kines, men ku wom kines epo pim maksin kut tumen. Wom kines epo Got ku klas epo pim to sakalngin tin tan men, kumali pim a pok put wungin kaunngin tin pok put Krais men, tin wala homani ma po kan kan ngo maksin pit min men.
51004004	Wom men ku kines epo ngo ku pok put wungin kaunngin tin imen si in pi mlaeng weh, epo wungin tin tunus weh e ngo ku sakal i men wala tumen.
51004005	Wom men ku karut wungin tin ta wom men weh to mhin ekngin epo po tin kuk mara so men, ma taku pi min ek kara nuk, men ku wom tohuh min epo kumang timen.
51004006	Sakalngin tin ta wom men men ku wom sakal i, men ku sut nuk pon weh kokyok kokyok, men ku phiit weh ken endara tin po hyum pon men, kuma wom pon ta wungin tin tuni e ku wom sakal wet po then then tunus epon men.
51004007	Kut si wungin tin si epo ngo men, men ku wiro suk a-Tikikus, tin mi it pit won weh men, tin kum to wungin anuh e pim a klap wal to kumang wet yang tin Akono men, ku iso ti pok wom epo ngo.
51004008	Ngo ku tih yang ti epo wom epo wungin sinsin tin wala ti, epon ku yang ti ion wom tin ung tuni men, kuru yang ti pa nhing mi wom kut tumen.
51004009	Ngo ku tih yang to a-Onesimus tin wiro suk e in to wungin anuh epo kumang men, tin mi it epon weh men, men yang ta wom ta. Wulong men ku ti pok wom epo wungin mosop tin si ko pit iyi men.
51004010	Epo Aristarkus tin tuk a kan kanngin then men wa min ti epo wom, kuru a-Mak tin a-Barnabas wiehun men wa min ti epo wom maksin kut tumen (men yang tin nga panen wom epon kho men: taku yang ti epo wom, men ku wom wa yang epo mi wom tin nawaehngin men weh).
51004011	Kuru a-Yesus tin po sikian ta maksin a-Yastus men wa min ti epo wom maksin kut tumen. Wuluk tin imen kha misa ngyuk api mi po tin mut wal ewin e kum to ngo mut eya enunu tin ta Got men. Nga ion wungin ta wuluk kho, men wuluk ning i ma mi ngo ko li wyu ung.
51004012	A-Epapras tin ta wom men ta, tin kum wet Krais men, men wa min ti epo wom maksin kut tumen. Yang men wuh mut eya wom epo kinesngin kokyok kokyok, kuma wom nuk nhing mi wungin tin nuk epo mi Got men to mi wom tin po muru u wo phepngin klet min men kut tumen.
51004013	Epo nga ion wungin ta yang ma nga pok put wungin epo yang ti, epo yang men tohuh weh epon ku ut eya wom, u po tin ung Laodisia men, u po tin ung Hierapolis men kut tumen.
51004014	A-Luk tin mi pim pit won weh e wa kumang epo po tin sasaih men, u a-Dimas tumen, wulong men wa mi ngong ti epo wom maksin kut tumen.
51004015	Wom men ku wa mi wom lu epo po tin ehuro it e ung Laodisia men, kuru a-Nimpas hi palu walngin tin palu wal mi mang tin tan men kut tumen.
51004016	Ma taku wom tiik kisang tin iyi lunga wom kho kut, men ku mara wom pit epon ku tiikngin mi palu walngin tin ung Laodisia men maksin kut tumen. Kuru wom men ku tiik kisang tin ku me Laodisia men maksin weh kut tumen.
51004017	Kuru wom men ku wo ta Arkipus taku, “Ngon men ku marap pit wo kumang tin e wai kho mi yang tin Akono men, kumali e suuk siin ning nginan weh.”
51004018	Ngo a-Pol wa mi ngo ti epo wom epo wungin tin wili ngo tuon pan i men wala iyi. Wom men ku tulu wom hu pit po esih tin kan kan ngo men. Nanaangin men ku in to wom. Men irawin.
52001001	A-Pol u a-Silwanus u a-Timoti tumen kha pyuk a tirih kisang tin iyi ti epo palu walngin tin ung Tesalonaika e wom kuk mi Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen: Nanaangin ku tih epo wom kuru min wyungin kut tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen.
52001002	Pim a sam sam Got epo wom mosop kokyok kokyok, ma pim a sikia wom in mi kinesngin ta pim,
52001003	men pim a kuk to mara Got tin ta it e Wirama it men ma tulu pim hu kumang tin ta wom e wo phepngin pong siin men, u kumang tin wom wuh i weh e min epongin pong siin men, u wom tin nuk nhing wet won maikngin to hoo mingin tin pit wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men kut tumen, si pim ku nhing akomen.
52001004	Epo, ehurok, wom tin Got min epo wom weh men, epo pim a ion wom tin Got won ung wo wom mi po kara epon ku ta yang weh men.
52001005	Epo pok putngin tin tunus e pim a pok put men ku me epo wom to sakalngin engun akomen. Awu. Men me to emhong maksin, kuru to Emiun Auluungin u to mi wom tin pit nhing wo wo phepngin tin klet min men kut tumen, wala tuo wom ion wungin tin pim a kuk lunga wom ton epon ku pim a nhio wo wom epon men.
52001006	Ma wom si ken po tin ira wungin pit mina pim u yang tin Akono men kut tumen, epo wom wa sakalngin ta Got wet won maikngin munuman to min kehngin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men,
52001007	tin tumen kha wom si ken tosukngin kara epo po mosop tin wo hi phep e hi ung e li li wo mulusngin Masedonia to sun Akaia men.
52001008	Epo hang wom men sakalngin tin ta yang tin Akono men ingutngin kho li pol, men ku li wo mulusngin Masedonia to sun Akaia misan som. Awu. Wo phepngin tin ta wom e pit wo Got men men pok putngin li li yanga pi mosop, tumen ma pim ku khung sakalngin pok put nginan ta kyok akomen.
52001009	Epo po mosop tin ung yanga pi mosop men tuo hi kha pok put pim tin pim a ti sup mi wom to wungin tuni men, tin wetpo wom wa got tin tororokngin men enu hi, si wom phae mulu epo Got epon ku wom kum ta Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok e irawin weh men,
52001010	kumali wom haum soput Got Wirun tin ku me ko wet pi men, tin Got khek yang mi po tin huu kho men kyok si tunus kho men, men a-Yesus ako, tin palolo it wet min kakhat sun tin ta Got e ku iso me men.
52002001	Epo, ehurok, tuo wom ion i epo pim tin ti sup mi wom kho men men ku sinsin om akomen.
52002002	Awu. Pim a wuh wungin u po ning pim lengwal tumen li li Pilipai kho kut, men wom ion i kho ako, taku li klet anima mi pim puplet to Got tin ta it men epo pim ku pok put pok putngin tin tunus men si ta wom, aku, men po munuman nolo pim.
52002003	Epo sakalngin tin pim a wo nut wom epon kho men ku wungin torokngin ek ek mi pim wa wungin min lengwal wa wungin amo wa tumen pong siin si akomen.
52002004	Awu. Got tin ion pim ken pim e tunus epon ku yang wa pok putngin tin tunus men sup yanga wili pim men kha pim a pok put sakalngin men, men pim a ning i tumen epon ku po tunus mi hi tunusngin epo pim akomen, si epon ku Got tin karong mi pim men min tunusngin epo pim kha pim a pok put tin imen.
52002005	Epo minan ta men ku pim a ira sakalngin kara tin ku pim a wa wa mi wom epon men akomen, timen ma tuo wom men ku ion i ako, wa pim ku ira sakalngin kara tin ku pim a kaun maran nesngin ta pim nuk wet men akomen kut tumen, timen Got tuon kha ku pok put sakalngin nhio wo pim epon men.
52002006	Wa pim ku tohuh epon ku po tunus wa ya pim si som, taku wom wa po enginin kara akomen, aku, pim a kuk to emhong tin taku mi pim epon, men ku pim a tus wom epo kumang engun, epo pim men paengin ta Krais kha iyi.
52002007	Takuma awu. Pim a kuk lunga wom to wungin amlus engun, ken wut wala ta tin pa sus sun hoin men maran pit wo husanin tin tan weh men to silan khingngin tan.
52002008	Ma pim tin sila pim khing pit po wom to min epongin tin tumen kha mi pim tunusngin epo pim ku naa wom epo pok putngin tin tunus e ta Got men, si ku timen misan som. Awu. Mi pim alang si pim tuo pim epo wom maksin kut tumen, epo mi pim si to min epongin pit wo wom kho kut.
52002009	Epo, ehurok, tulu wom hu pit po pim tin tohuh men u kumang tin pim a wuh i men tumen; epo pim a kum to pi luk u to pi mhangin tumen kokyok kokyok, si kuma pim ku wa maikngin si ta po ta wom ta akomen, ma pim a pok put pok putngin tin tunus e ta Got men si ta wom.
52002010	Tuo wom ion wungin ta pim kho, kuru Got ion mi pim kut tumen, tin pim a kuk lunga wom ma pim a ning wungin epo wom tin wo wom phep men to wungin tin mi yil u siik u wungin om po pim men tumen,
52002011	wala wom ion wungin tin pim a wo nut wom u pa nhing wom u wo maran ko klat epo wom then then men tumen ken yang ta ning i epo husanin weh men,
52002012	epo wom men ku ira wungin tin tunus epo wom tin Got tin yuk wom epon ku lu sup mi enunu u moolngin tin tan weh men kha ku iran weh men.
52002013	Sinsin tin imen kha pim a sam sam Got sumsum epon men, epo minan tin wom wa sakalngin tin ta Got e wom hul i mi wo pim men, men ku wom wai ken i e ta po tunus engun men som. Awu. Wom wai ken i e sakalngin ta Got tin irawin e tuon kut men, tin kumang tan siin iis nginangan mi wom tin wo wom phep men.
52002014	Epo, ehurok, wom men kho si ira wungin pit mina sun tin ta palu walngin tin ta Got e ung e li li wo mulusngin Yudia e hi kuk mi Krais Yesus men. Epo wom wuh won maikngin kai wal yanga wili po tin wom khuuk wal ta wom weh men, ken sun tin po wai yanga wili po tin ung wo mulusngin Yudia men,
52002015	tin wi a-Yesus tin Akono men u po pokngin tin ta hi weh men kut tumen ko huu kho kut, anima po luul to pim maksin kut tumen; ma Got ku min saah pit wo po som, kuru po nolo po masang to sun wala mosop kut tumen,
52002016	men po uluu pim epo pim tin ku pok put sakalngin si ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men si kumali po palolongin, tin tumen kha po kuk e ning lasin ta hi ko po wal si nhum weh sumsum men; takuma min kakhat sun tin ta Got men kho ko po po ma nhum weh kut.
52002017	Kut si, ehurok, pim a klokngin lunga wom put monlo long, ma pim ku ion mara wom kyok som, si mi pim iso in to wom ako, tumen ma pim a tohuh kara kut epo pim ku ion mara wom to mi pim weh.
52002018	Tumen ma mi pim epo pim ku ti hang wom men, men ngo tin a-Pol men taku ning i tumen kokyok kokyok, takuma a-Nolongin klet put soput ta pim.
52002019	Epo ela weh tin pim a hoo mi pim u mi pim keh keh u moolngin tin ku ung mhi pim e ku pim a wangan po pim ton men tumen? Iyi, men wom tuo wom tin ku nuk to mara a-Yesus Krais minan tin ku yang me men ako, wah?
52002020	Epo wom kha moolngin u min kehngin tumen tin ta pim men.
52003001	Tumen ma pim a kuk li pim ku wuh i kyok som, men pim a wo taku tunus epo tuk ku misa tuk in Atens,
52003002	si tuk a tih a-Timoti tin wiro it e kum ta Got men, tin pim a kum then epo pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men, ku ti wa wom ko nhing u pa nhing wom tumen epo sakalngin tin wo wom nuk wet men,
52003003	epon akuli po ta wom ta papham wet wungin tin wo wom maik i wet wili po men; epo tuo wom ion i epo Got won ung wo it epo it ku lat won maikngin tin imen.
52003004	Iis, epo pim a pok wom kho minan tin pim a iso kuk to wom men epo it ku wuh won maikngin, ken sun tin si ta it kho kut men, men wom ion i kho ako.
52003005	Epo sinsin tin imen men nga wuh li ngo ku kaeng kyok som, kha nga tih a-Timoti ku ti ion wo phepngin tin ta wom men, epon akuli soput kara nuk tin emiun tin karong po nginangan men kuli karong wom epon men, men ku kumang tin pim a wuh i men ku li hut liit nuk engun.
52003006	Takuma homani ma a-Timoti yok hang wom ma yang kho me pol ta pim, men yang me to pok putngin tunus tin epo wo phepngin u min epongin tumen tin ta wom men, kuru yang pok epo wom tin tulu wom hu pim kokyok kokyok to mi wom tin tunus men, ma mi wom weh epo wom ku ion pim ken sun tin mi pim epo pim ku ion wom kut tumen --
52003007	tumen ma, ehurok, wungin mosop tin wo pim maik i u miu pim tuung epon men tumen, men pim a wa pa nhingngin min wo wom epo wo phepngin tin ta wom men.
52003008	Epon homani men pim a iso tunus kuk, tin taku wom pit nhing mi yang tin Akono men.
52003009	Epo pim ku sam sam Got tua emhut min kehngin mosop tin mi pim keh keh ton to mara Got tin ta it men pit mi wungin tin ta wom men?
52003010	Epo pim a kuk e tohuh epo kinesngin to pi luk u to pi mhangin, tumen, sumsum epo pim ku ion mara wom kuma pim a sum put wo phepngin ta wom li tunus weh.
52003011	Ma homani men ku Got tin Wirama it men tuon, u a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men tumen, ku nemeh soput ta pim tin ku pim a siik ti epo wom epon men.
52003012	Ma yang tin Akono men ku ning i ma min epongin tin ta wom men tin mi wom pit wo al u tin pit wo po masang to sun wala mosop men kut tumen, ku ung e ko po sun ma si kol weh, ken sun tin wala mi pim pit wo wom men,
52003013	kumali Got pa nhing mi wom to wungin tin sakalngin om min men ma wom kuk auluungin to mara Got tin Wirama it men minan tin kuli a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku me to po mosop tin tan e auluungin men.
52004001	Kut ma, ehurok, pim taku uspo sakalngin ma pim a suh mi kinga wom u wo nut wom weh kut tumen mi a-Yesus tin Akono men, epo wungin tin wala kho ma wom wai mi wo pim men tin wom ku kuk e ira wungin tua kuma Got min saah pit po wom men, kha ku wom iso ning i tumen hambip ko po sun ung e li si kut men.
52004002	Epo tuo wom ion wungin tin pim a wo maran ko klat si ta wom kho to emhong tin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men kho kut.
52004003	Epo wungin tin Got min epon men wala ti, epo wom men ku si auluungin weh, kuma put wom kilil wungin elwanngin,
52004004	kumali wom mosop then then men ku ion wungin tin ku kasum wom emkusin tuon to wungin tin mi yil u ya wom pos ton men kut tumen,
52004005	si ku to mi wom tin siwil si epo elwanngin men ken po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e pong epo Got men akomen,
52004006	epon akuli po ta yek ta wungin tin siik men ma nak nak endara tin ta wiron e ken i e tan tuon men pit mi wungin tin imen asin, epo yang tin Akono men tuon kha kuli ning wungin emhut sun tin mosop imen ako, ken sun tin pim a wo ta wom kho ma pim a uluu wom to mara pim tin ten ten e wo pim ung wo wom men.
52004007	Epo Got ku yuk it epo it ku sup mi wungin tin min lengwal men akomen, si men epon ku it kuk mi wungin tin auluungin men misan weh.
52004008	Tumen ma taku po ta wetpon wa wungin tin imen, men ku wetpon wa po tunus ta akomen, si men wetpon wa Got tin naa it epo Emiun Auluungin tin tan men kha men.
52004009	Kut si min epongin tin mi it pit wo po tin ehuro it men, men ku nga khung i epo ngo ku pan sakalngin epon ti epo wom akomen, epo wom tuo wom urut wungin mi wo Got weh epo wom tin ku mi wom pit wo al weh men.
52004010	Ma irawin epo wom ira min epongin tin tumen epo po ehuro it tin mosop e ung yanga pi Masedonia men kho kut. Takuma, ehurok, pim a suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku iso ning i tumen kuru hambip ko po sun ung e li si weh kut tumen;
52004011	kuru wom tohuh epo wom ku ira wungin tin ku wom ung mara ii engun men, kuma tulu wom hu pit wo kumang anaum tin ta wom weh men, ma wom ning kumang epo wili wom ta tuon tin ta wom weh men, ken sun tin pim a wo nut wom epon kho men,
52004012	kumali wom kuk e ira wungin tin siik men epo po tin kuk tak li wetpo so men, kuma wom ku kalwok epo endara ta akomen.
52004013	Kut si, ehurok, mi ngo epo wom ku pong epo engin epo po tin ko nuk e nhaung mi hunngin kho men akomen, epon akuli mi wom urut i ken po tin kara e hoo mingin ta hi om men.
52004014	Epon taku wo it phep pit wo a-Yesus tin hun ma khek kyok si tunus men, men wo it phep epo Got tin ku iso wa po tin ko nhaung mi a-Yesus men kyok me to yang men maksin kut tumen ako.
52004015	Epo wungin tin pim a wai mi wo yang tin Akono men weh men kha pim a sakal ta wom ti, epo it tin iso mara it to tunusngin kuk weh li pol minan tin kuli yang tin Akono men ku kyok me men, men ku kho li si muk kho epo po tin huu mi Krais kho men akomen.
52004016	Awu. Epo yang tin Akono men tuon ku me ko wet pi to wut tin pit pit hambip ta men, u to ingutngin tin ta tihngin tin maran pit wo sun kara men, u to kiyak tin ta Got e ku hau men tumen, khama po tin huu mi Krais kho men ku khek kho si muk kho.
52004017	Li klet anima it tin iso mara it to tunusngin kuk men ku uus pongin si lup to po mi hingis kuma it si tut yang tin Akono men put pi alilil. Ma wungin tin tumen kha kuli it kuk to yang tin Akono men kokyok kokyok li kut men.
52004018	Tumen ma wom men ku kuk e pa nhing wal epo wungin tin mosop imen.
52005001	Kut si, ehurok, wungin tin epo ungunan u elup tumen, men ku wom pong epo engin kuma pim a khung i epo pim ku pan wungin ti epo wom epon akomen.
52005002	Epo tuo wom ion i tunus kho kut epo ungunan tin ta yang tin Akono men ku me e ken po tin tipngin tin me to pi luk men engun.
52005003	Epo minan tin kuli po kuk e sakal taku, “It ung aminis u it ung anga tunusngin kut khae,” ti, kut men mhukngin mi ngin men ku si epo po kerek engun ken po wala tin kuman ma won maan maan epon ku wanhung men, ma soput tin ku po mhup li iran men pi om.
52005004	Si, ehurok, wom men ku kuk mi pi mi ku kuma ungunan tin imen salum po wom ken po tipngin ta men akomen.
52005005	Epo wom mosop men husani pi mi mlaeng u husani pi mhangin kut tumen. Si it men ku ta pi luk wa ta pi mi ku wa tumen akomen.
52005006	Tumen ma it men ku nhaung asol pongin ken po kara men asin, si it men ku mara it plal ma it haum tunus weh to tulun hungin.
52005007	Epo po tin nhaung men men nuk e nhaung to pi luk ako, u po tin um ma mara hihi men kuk e um to pi luk kut tumen.
52005008	Si it tin ta pi mhangin men ku haum tunus to tulun hungin kokyok kokyok, men ku it phi moolngin tin brasan e nghen po engai it men tin los po wo phepngin to min epongin men, kuru it men ku wa moolngin tin epo lek walngin e los po hoo mingin tin ku it iso palolongin epon men ko ung mhi it kut tumen.
52005009	Epo Got ku won ung wo it epon ku it sup mi min kakhat sun tin ta Got men akomen, si epon ku it wa palolongin yanga wili a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men,
52005010	tin hun mut eya it kuma taku mara it to tunusngin kuk wa it huu wa tumen, men kuli it iso tunus kuk to yang ako.
52005011	Tumen ma wom kuk e pa nhing wal ma wom khek wal si, e ken sun tin wom ung e ning i kut men.
52005012	Kuru, ehurok, pim a suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku hop po tin tohuh epo kumang lunga wom men ma wo wom nuk wet po tin mara hi pit wo wom mi yang tin Akono men tin wo nut wom men,
52005013	ma wom ion po ken po e akono weh men to min epongin, sinsin men in epo kumang tin po ning i men. Kuru wom men ku ung to wungin aminis tin ku nuk lunga wom men weh kut tumen.
52005014	Kut si, ehurok, pim a suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku wo nut po tin kuk wet wili sun engun men, u wom pa nhing mi po tin mi hi kauan men, u wom khek po tin wo hi wiak men si, kuru wom men ku wuh i li koho epo po mosop kut tumen.
52005015	Mara wom si kuk, epon akuli po ta ning wungin lengwal emhut sun ta po ta asin, si wom tohuh sumsum epo wom ku ira wungin tin tunus epo wom tuo wom men, kuru men tunus epo po masang to sun wala mosop kut tumen.
52005016	Mi wom keh keh sumsum;
52005017	wom kines Got, men ku wom nhing akomen;
52005018	wungin mosop tin si ta wom men, men ku wom sam sam Got min, epo wungin tin imen kha Got hihi i ta min mi Krais Yesus epo wom men;
52005019	wom kuk aku wom whus yau tin ta Emiun Auluungin men;
52005020	wom ning i aku wom ion wungin tin po pokngin pok put men ken i e lengwal engun men asin,
52005021	si wom ion mi wungin mosop tunus, ma wom kasum i tin tunus men pip weh.
52005022	Si wom men ku put wom kilil wungin tin lengwal e maran kiring kiring men mosop weh.
52005023	Homani ma Got tin sinsin epo min wyungin men ku tuon ning wom si auluungin mosop; ma emiu wom, u enu wom, u wom emkusin tumen, ku kasumngin mosop to al to wungin tin lasin om min men weh li pol minan tin kuli a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku me men.
52005024	Yang tin yuk wom men men in to wungin tan anuh, men kuli iso suuk siin ning nginan weh ako.
52005025	Ehurok, wom kines Got epo pim weh.
52005026	Wom wa mi wom si ta po ehuro it mosop epo tumum wongin tin auluungin men ta.
52005027	Nga wa wom sup wet tung tungngin ta to mara yang tin Akono men epo wom men ku tiik kisang tin iyi to mara po ehuro it tin auluungin men mosop weh.
52005028	Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku in to wom. Men irawin.
