53001001	A-Pol, u a-Silwanus, u a-Timoti, tumen kha pyuk a tirih kisang tin iyi ti epo palu walngin tin ta po Tesalonaika e hi kuk mi Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen.
53001002	Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen ku ko ta wom hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen.
53001003	Ehurok, tunus epo pim ku sam sam Got epo wom kokyok kokyok, ma men siik ako, epo wo phepngin tin ta wom men men ung e plok si nhum weh, kuru min epongin tin wom mosop then then mi wom pit wo al epon men ung e si po sun li si kut tumen.
53001004	Tumen ma tuo pim wangan po wom lunga palu walngin tin ta Got e ung e li li men epo wom tin nuk nhing u wo wom phep tumen wet wungin tin po ning i lengwal epo wom u wom sup mi maikngin men kut tumen, tin wom kuk e wuh i men.
53001005	Wungin tin imen men tosukngin ta tin nuk pi mlaeng men epo Got tin ples wungin siik men, kumali Got wo epo wom e tunus epon ku lu sup mi enunu tin tan men, tin wala wom wuh wungin epon homani men.
53001006	Epon men wungin siik ako epon tin taku Got ning i lengwal emhut sun tin po ning i lengwal epo wom men,
53001007	si yang wa nhingngin si ta wom tin po ning wom lengwal homani men to pim minan tin kuli a-Yesus tin Akono men ku si put plo nginan pi mlaeng ma me ko wet pi to po tihngin tin tan e apalukngin men
53001008	to yau tin ngiseng men ma yang ning wungin emhut sun ta po tin pong epo Got men u ta po tin ku hul wet pok putngin tin tunus e ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men akomen kut tumen.
53001009	Po tin imen ku wuh mumhek mingin tin emhut lasin ta hi men, men mhuk mingin tin sindak e ku po li kuk hin epo yang tin Akono men maran u epo moolngin tin ta kakhangin tin ta yang men kut tumen,
53001010	minan tin kuli yang me to Ungunan tin imen kuma yang wa moolngin lunga po tin auluungin e ta yang men u po mosop tin wo hi phep kho men ku whik wo yang ton kut tumen, epon tin kho ma wungin tin pim a pok put si ta wom men men wo wom nuk wet.
53001011	Tumen ma pim a kuk e ning kinesngin epo wom sumsum epo Got tin ta it men ku wo epo wom e tunus epo yukngin tin imen, ma yang kai wungin mosop tin mi wom epo wom ku ning i tunus men u kumang tin wo phepngin pong siin men tumen epo kakhangin tan tuon,
53001012	kumali a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men ku yan si nhum epo wom, u ya wom si nhum epo yang kut tumen, ira nanaangin tin ta Got tin ta it men u ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen.
53002001	Kut si, ehurok, a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men tin ku kyok me men u it tin ku me palu wal then hang yang men tumen, kha pim a suh mi kinga wom epon ti,
53002002	epo wom kuk aku wom kerek e kamus epo mi wom wa miu wom tuung taku emiun ta, wa sakalngin tin pok putngin men ta, wa sakalngin tin nuk yanga kisang men ta wa tumen, taku i e ken i e me hang pim men, ken ungunan tin ta Krais men e ku kho me kho kut men asin.
53002003	Wom kuk aku po ta me ek ek mara wom ira wungin maran ta wa sakalngin ta wa tumen asin, epo ungunan tin imen ku kho si som, si wungin tin po wetpo hi wa Got men tin nhum epo sun kara men ku kho si muk wet, ma yang tin ning lasin nginangan men si pol pi mlaeng, men yang tin ku iso ko khuukngin epon ku huuspit engun men.
53002004	Yang men nolo endara mosop tin po sikian e Got ta hi men u po uluu i tumen, wala yang si ung wo ehus ken yang e Got tuon men mi mang auluungin tin ta Got men, ma yang ning sasayihngin to mara po epo yang tuon ken yang e Got tuon men.
53002005	Iyi, tulu wom som epo kho ma nga iso in lunga wom men nga pok wom epo wungin tin imen ako, wah?
53002006	Ma homani ma wom ion enda tin klet soput ta yang men, kumali yang si put plo nginan mi elup tin tan weh men.
53002007	Epo wungin kaunngin tin epo wungin sinsin hik put nginan men men kho in e kum kut, takuma yang tin in e klet soput ta sun homani men ku iso klet soput li pol minan tin kuli yang klokngin lunga po li men, kumali soput si nuk.
53002008	Ma minan timen men ku yang tin hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men si pol pi mlaeng, tin a-Yesus tin Akono men ku kakiom i epo emiun tin pol won men, ma yang mhuk mi sun epo moolngin tin ku yang me ton e mara it lip lip i weh men.
53002009	Yang tin imen tin ku me epo emhong tin ta a-Nolongin men tin ku siin iis in min men to wungin maran kiring kiring u tosukngin u wungin a whik wo nginan tin tororokngin men tumen mosop,
53002010	u men ku me to wungin maran kiring kiring tin ku ek ek mi po men tin wungin tin ku siik som men sinsin pit epon men, tin ku si lunga po tin kuk epon ku huuspit men, epon tin min epongin tin pit wo wungin tin irawin men men ku po wai kho kuma po palolongin epon akomen.
53002011	Sinsin tin imen kha ku Got tih ek marangin po koklong ta tin ku siin iis mi po men kumali po wo hi nuk wet torokngin tin nhum men,
53002012	kumali po mosop kuli Got wo los po hi epo po ku huuspit, men po tin ku wo hi nuk wet wungin tin irawin men som, si po mi hi tunusngin pit wo wungin tin lengwal men.
53002013	Kut si, ehurok, wom tin yang tin Akono men min pit pit wo wom men, men tunus epo pim ku sam sam Got epo wom sumsum, epon tin ewo maran ma Got won ung wo wom epo wom ku palolongin epo Emiun Auluungin tin ku ning wom si auluungin men u wo phepngin ta wom tin ku pit wo wungin tin irawin men kut tumen.
53002014	Palolongin tin imen kha Got yuk wom epo wom ku sup min epo pok putngin tin tunus e pim a pok put men, kumali wom wa moolngin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men.
53002015	Tumen ma, ehurok, wom men ku pit nhing ma wom kasum wungin tin pat walngin me epo wom men, tin pim a kot wom epon kho men, taku epo sakalngin wa kisang ta pim wa tumen.
53002016	Homani men ku a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men tuon, u Got tin Wirama it men kut tumen, tin min pit wo it ma naa it epo pa nhingngin tin sindak men u hoo mingin tin tunus men kut tumen, epo min sukngin tin ta yang men,
53002017	ku pa nhing mi wom ma wa wom ko pit nhing mi kumang mosop u sakalngin tin turunus men mosop kut tumen.
53003001	Kut si, ehurok, pim taku uspo sakalngin ti, epo wom men ku kines Got epo pim epon ku sakalngin tin ta yang tin Akono men ku saa li yanga pi u po wa sakalngin yan si tumen, wala si tumen epo wom kho men,
53003002	u epon ku Got palolo pim yanga wili po tunus tin wungin ta hi ulil u lengwal men tumen, epo po mosop men ku kuk to wo phepngin akomen.
53003003	Si yang tin Akono men men in to wungin tan anuh, men ku iso wa wom ko pit nhing u haum eya wom epo emiun tin wungin tan lengwal men ako.
53003004	Ma wo pim phep pit wo yang tin Akono men epo wom, tin wom ira sakalngin tunus kut, kuru wom ku iso ira sakalngin tin pim a wo maran ko klat ta wom epon men maksin kut tumen ako.
53003005	Homani men ku yang tin Akono men muk wom li sup mi min epongin tin ta Got men u mi wungin tin ku wom pit nhing wet won maikngin ken Krais men kut tumen.
53003006	Kut si, ehurok, pim a wo maran ko klat ta wom epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men yan, epo wom men ku osong lu kuk hin epo po ehuro wom tin mosop e kuk e ira wungin tin po kuk wet wili sun engun men, si ku ira wungin tin pim a pat wal i me ko epo po men akomen.
53003007	Epo wom tuo wom ion i epon men tunus epo wom tin ku ira wungin pit mina sun tin ta pim weh men, epo pim tin kuk lunga wom kho men men ku pim a ira wungin tin pim a kuk wet wili po engun men ewin akomen,
53003008	u pim ku ii beret ta po ta hut emul engun ewin akomen kut tumen. Awu. Pim men wuh kumang u khung i tumen to pi luk u to pi mhangin kokyok kokyok, kuma pim a wa won maikngin ko ta po ta wom ta asin;
53003009	si ku ken pim ku kuk to emhong som kha pim a ning i tumen akomen. Awu. Men epon kumali pim a ning tosukngin ta to mara wom kuma wom ira wungin pit mina sun tin ta pim weh men.
53003010	Iis, epo kho ma pim a iso kuk to wom men pim a wo maran ko klat ta wom ti, “Epon taku po ta ku kum som, men ku ii endara akomen kut tumen.”
53003011	Epo pim a hul epo po kara kuk lunga wom men kuk wet wili po engun, si ku kum kara akomen. Awu. Men ku me sakal si kuk mi wungin tin ta po enginin kara men engul ako.
53003012	Epo po tin wungin ta hi nuk tumen men pim a wo maran ko klat epo po u suh mi kinga po kut tumen epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men epo po men ku mara hi ain ma po kum engun kuma po ii beret tin ta hi weh men.
53003013	Si, ehurok, wom tin kara maksin men, wom kuk aku mi wom mokongin epo wungin tin tunus men ning nginan asin.
53003014	Si taku po ta ku hul wet sakalngin tin nuk mi kisang tin iyi som, men ku wom suk pit won tin imen weh, ma wom men ku klap i asin, kumali manngin wan.
53003015	Si wom ion yang ken yang e wom nolo i men asin, si wo wom nut yang ken i e wiro wom weh men.
53003016	Homani men ku yang tin Akono tin sinsin epo min wyungin men tuon wa min wyungin ko ta wom epo wungin mosop kokyok kokyok. Yang tin Akono men ku in to wom mosop.
53003017	Sakalngin tin nga wa mi ngo ti epon men, tin ngo a-Pol pan i epo wili ngo weh men, tin tosukngin nuk mi kisang mosop tin nga pan i men, kha nga pan i tumen epo wom iyi.
53003018	Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
54001001	Ngo a-Pol tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais epo wungin tin maran ko klat e ta Got tin Palolongin ta it men, u ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono e hoo mingin ta it pit won men kut tumen,
54001002	kha nga pan kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon a-Timoti tin wirukan weh mi wo phepngin tin ta tong then men. Nanaangin, u min sukngin, u min wyungin tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men tumen ku in to ngon.
54001003	Ken nga wo nut ngon kho minan tin ngo ku yok li Masedonia men kha nga wo tap kyok homani epo ngon men ku iso ting in Epesus, kuma e wo nut po kara epo po men ku kot sun epo wungin tin maran kiring enginin enginin men asin.
54001004	Kuru po men ku wo hi nuk wet wungin tin lawinan engun men u pasikngin tin po pasik li hut li liit nuk engun men tumen asin, epon men pong si hek walngin kara si nuk lunga po kha men, si men ku khek po si nuk nhing pit mina wungin tin Got in ton men tin si epo wo phepngin men akomen.
54001005	Epo wungin tin nuk maran min pim ma pim a wo nut po epon men men min epongin tin me pol mi kuma po tin mi hi yil men, u men me pol mi kuma po tin ples wungin men tin ku wa wungin ta ko po po tuo hi men akomen, u men me pol mi wo phepngin tin irawin weh men kut tumen.
54001006	Wo phepngin tin imen po kara yek tan kho, ma po phae phae hi mili ira sakalngin tin ku enun ung hut ewin som men engun.
54001007	Po men taku si hi kara tin kot sun epo wungin sinsin men, takuma po ku mara hi ples wungin tin po sakal i u po heek epon men tumen sinsin ku ung tunus akomen.
54001008	Si it ion i epo wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men men tunus ako, tin taku po ta ning kumang epon to wungin tin ira wungin sinsin weh men.
54001009	Epo it ion i ti, epo wungin sinsin men ku hihingin nuk epo po ta tin ku wungin tan siik men akomen, si men hihingin nuk epo po tin wetpo hi wa wungin sinsin men to po tin ku wa hi me sup wet wungin sinsin ewin som men, u epo po tin ku ira wungin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men ewin som men to po tin ning lasin nginangan men, u epo po tin ku wo hi nuk wet endara auluungin ta ewin som men to po tin wo hi nuk wet wungin tin ta pi mulus men misan men, u epo po tin lek po irama hi to eleni hi ko huu ewin men, u epo po tin lek sun tunus ko huu nginangan men,
54001010	u epo po tin ning elwanngin nginangan men, u epo po masang tin ning elwanngin epo sun masang ken po Sodom ning i ewin men, u epo po tin li tip sun me kum wo hi nginangan men, u epo po tin torok nginangan men, u epo po tin tung tung takuma hik put sakalngin pit po sun engun men, kuru epo wungin tin kara maksin e nuk akani e nolo kotngin tin ning i ma it ku pit nhing epon men,
54001011	tin nuk siik to pok putngin tin tunus e to moolngin tin ta Got tin ung tunus weh mi emhong tin tan weh men, tin yang wai ko nuk yanga wili ngo kuma marango pit won ta yang men.
54001012	Ma nga sam sam Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men, tin wa kakhangin si ta ngo kho men, epon tin yang ion ngo ken ngo e in to wungin tin anuh men, wala yang won ung wo ngo ku me sup mi kumang tin tan men.
54001013	Aku, kho ma nga in ken po ta tin ton mi a-Yesus nginangan men, u ken po tin ning i lengwal epo po tin wo hi phep pit wo yang men, u ken po tin songhu pit wo sun nginangan men kut tumen. Taku li klet ma nga wa min sukngin epo nga ning wungin tin imen men nga pong epo engin ma ngo ku wo ngo phep som men kha nga ning i men.
54001014	Ma min sukngin tin yang tin Akono ta it men naa ngo epon men ko pu wal po ngo weh, to wo phepngin u min epongin tin in mi Krais Yesus men.
54001015	Sakalngin anuh ta tin tunus epo po mosop ku hul wet men wala ti, epo Krais Yesus me in wo mulus epon ku yang palolo po tin kuk to lasin men, wala ngo tin li muk epo po men.
54001016	Takuma sinsin tin nga wa min sukngin epon men wala ti, epon ku epo ngo kha ku a-Yesus Krais wa wungin tan tin yang wuh wungin li maran nomalak weh epon men si in pi mlaeng epo ngo muk, ken tosukngin ta epo po tin ku iso wo hi phep pit po yang epon ku po wa tunusngin tin sindak men.
54001017	Homani men ku yang tin Sinkhaung e sindak in e ku hun ewin som u ku mara it kon i ewin som men kut tumen, men Got tin then e mhin ek weh men, ku yang yan pos u po sam sam yang tumen kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin.
54001018	Wiruk, Timoti, wungin tin maran ko klat iyi kha nga wai ti in yanga wilip kuma marap pit won tunus weh, men ti nuk pit mina sakalngin tin po pokngin pok put kho epo ngon men, kumali wungin tin imen kha ku e wuh weh epo lek walngin tin tunus men,
54001019	to wo phepngin u mip tin ples wungin e wungin om po ngon tuon min men. Po kara wetpo hi wa wungin tin imen, ma wo phepngin ta po men mhukngin ken imut ta tin li pal po enah men.
54001020	Wala a-Himeneus ngong Aleksanda in mi po tin imen, wala nga wa wulong si nuk yanga wili a-Nolongin kuma po urut sakalngin tin ku wulong ning ton mingin epon som men.
54002001	Tumen ma nga wo nut ngon muk kho epo wungin kara epo wungin tin po hau si wo Got men, u kinesngin, u wungin tin po kines Got mut eya sun ewin men, u sam samngin tin ku si men kut tumen men ku kara ningngin epo po tunus mosop.
54002002	Men ku ningngin epo po tin sinkhaung men u epo po mosop tin sun wa nowio ko wut hi epo po tin ku mara hi pit wo sun men kut tumen, kumali mara it ii ma it ung aminis wo mulus to wungin tin mosop e pit mina sun tin Got in ton men u to wungin tin mara it arre to sakalngin men kut tumen.
54002003	Epo wungin tin imen men tunus kuru to min nawaehngin kut tumen to mara Got tin Palolongin ta it men,
54002004	tin min epo po tunus mosop ku palolongin ma po kyok me sup mi maran ekngin tin po ion wungin tin irawin men epon men.
54002005	Epo Got then ta misan in, kuru po ta tin in emin Got u po tunus kut tumen men then ta misan in kut tumen, men Krais Yesus tin tunusan men,
54002006	tin min alang siin tuon ken talungin ta tin ku kiis i mut eya po mosop men, men wungin tin pok putngin si to elup tin tan weh kut men.
54002007	Wungin tin imen kha Got won ung wo ngo epo ngo ku in ken po ta tin pok put wungin epon u ken po paengin ta kut tumen (nga sakal irawin mi Krais si ngo ku torok akomen) ngo tin in ken po ta tin ku kot sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men to wo phepngin u wungin tin irawin men kut tumen.
54002008	Tumen ma mi ngo epo po masang tin ung e li li yanga pi kut men men ku hi wa wili hi tin auluungin men si ma po kines Got to mi hi tin yan salngin u min tin ku ponwal men om min men.
54002009	Kuru wungin tin tumen kha ku po wala mool epo moolngin tin po wa ya hi tunus epon men kut tumen, men ku to wungin tin ku manngin wa po epon som men u to wungin tin po karut hi tunus epon men kut tumen, si ku epo po yut hi tin ku po mol mol i men wa gol wa erel wa moolngin tin kulngin epo ulu hambip men wa tumen asin.
54002010	Si moolngin tin siik epo po wala tin wo taku hi e kuk to wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men kha ku po mool epon men, men wungin tin tunus men ning nginan ako.
54002011	Po wala ta men ku urut sakalngin to won tin kup men to wungin tin klet min e hul wet sakalngin mosop epon men.
54002012	Kuru ngo men ku mang ta po wala ta tin ku kot sun masang ta wa in to emhong tin ku maran pit wo yang masang ta men ewin akomen. Awu. Si men ku maran ain ma won kup engun.
54002013	Epo Adam kha Got pang i muk men, anima Ewa.
54002014	Kuru Adam ani ku torokngin ek ek min men som. Awu. Ewa kha torokngin ek ek min ma wut plong ko mi wungin tin wut hik put sakalngin ta Got men.
54002015	Takuma wut men kuli palolongin epo po hoin khuuk nginan, tin taku po iso ira wo phepngin u min epongin, u wungin tin ku po kuk auluungin ton men kut tumen, to wungin tin ku po karut hi tunus epon men.
54003001	Wungin anuh ta wala nuk ti, taku po ta min epon ku si wa kumang tin ta po tin mara hi pit wo palu walngin men, men min epo kumang tunus ta ako.
54003002	Tumen ma po ta tin ku maran pit wo palu walngin men men ku wungin om pon weh, men ku titien wala then ta misan, men ku min nuk weh to wungin tin amunu men, men ku tuon karut i tunus, men ku wungin tan hihingin tunus, men ku to wungin tin naa po tin me sup mi mang tin tan men, men ku won ek i epon ku kot po tunus weh;
54003003	kuru men ku in to wungin tin min epon ku um wain hambip men asin, men ku in to wungin amhees asin, men ku min pit pit wo ulu tin ku torok mara sun ma wai men asin, si men ku in to wungin tin amang maran men engun, men ku maran ii, si men ku in to maran nesngin asin;
54003004	kuru men ku maran pit wo po tin hi khuuk wal e hi ung mi mang then men tunus weh, ma in to husanin tin kuk wet wilin to uluungin tin pit won e klet mi hi men
54003005	(epon taku po ta ku ion wungin tin ku maran pit wo mang tan tuon tunus som men, men ku tua ma ku maran pit wo palu walngin tin ta Got men?);
54003006	kuru men ku po ta tin ku won phep homan men asin, epon akuli wai si pit, men ku plong ko mi mumhek mingin tin kai sun tin ta emiun tin hik put wungin pit po po nginangan men.
54003007	Kuru men ku yan tunus to mara po tin kuk mara so epo palu walngin men, epon akuli plong ko mi wungin tin to manngin men ma kuh mi esih tin ta emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men.
54003008	Kuru ira wungin tin tumen kha ku po dikon tin kum ta palu walngin men men ku kuk to wungin tin po ya hi tunus epon men kut tumen, po men ku kuk to mamai hi ponwal ma pok put sakalngin ta u ta tumen asin, po men ku kuk to wungin tin ku po um wain hambip men asin, po men ku mi hi pit pit wo ulu tin ku po torok mara sun ma po wai ta sun men asin,
54003009	si po men ku kasum wungin kaunngin tin wo it nuk wet men to mi hi tin ples wungin e min yil weh men misan.
54003010	Ma ngon men ku karong po tin imen muk wet, ma taku lasin om po po, khama e mang ta po si dikon ma po ning kumang ta palu walngin.
54003011	Kuru ira wungin tin tumen kha ku po wala tin pit ta sun men men ku kuk to wungin tin po ya hi tunus epon men kut tumen, si po men ku kuk to wungin tin ku po hik put wungin pit po sun nginangan men asin, u po men ku mi hi pit pit epo wungin tin amunu men, u po men ku kuk to wungin tin anuh men epo wungin mosop tin ku po ning i men kut tumen.
54003012	Si po dikon tin kum ta palu walngin men men ku titien hi then ta misan, ma ku mara hi pit wo husani hi to po tin kara e hi kuk mi mang tin ta hi weh men tunus weh.
54003013	Epo po tin kuk dikon ma kum tunus ta palu walngin men men ku wa ya hi tunus weh ma ku kuk to mi hi tin to wo phepngin ta hi tin maran ko klat weh e pit wo Krais Yesus men.
54003014	Sakalngin tin iyi men nga pan i ti epo ngon, takuma nga hoo mi ngo epo put monlo long kha nga ti epo ngon.
54003015	Si taku nga iak kara long, men nga pan wungin tin iyi kho ti kut kuma e ion wungin tin tunus epo ngon ku karut ngon weh mi mang tin ta Got men, men palu walngin tin ta Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men, tin lapalak u sinsin tumen epo wungin tin irawin men.
54003016	Ma wungin kaunngin tin ta wo phepngin tin ta it e pit wo Got men men nhum takut, ma men maran ko klat weh wala nuk ti: Got men si in pi mlaeng mi emkusin then ta kho kut, men si in siik to mara po epo Emiun Auluungin, men po tihngin kara ion i, men pok putngin si lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, men po tin ung wo mulus men wo hi nuk wet, u men wangin li si to moolngin kut tumen.
54004001	Kut si Emiun Auluungin pok put wungin si in pi mlaeng weh epo elup kara tin kuli iso me sulung epo sun tin i, men ku po kara wetpo hi wa wungin tin wo it nuk wet men, si po hul wet emiun enginin kara tin ku ek ek mi po men u kotngin kara tin ta emiun tin lengwal men kara kut tumen,
54004002	ma po sakal ira wungin torokngin kara to wungin amui tin kaun nuk mi hi men, epo mi po tuo hi tin ples wungin men men ku sakalngin yo yo po engun ken ain ngeng ngeng ta tin moom mi po men.
54004003	Po men ku uluu sun epo enanginngin, u po uluu sun epo endara aiingin kara kut tumen, tin Got pho pon epon ku po tin wo hi phep ma ion wungin tin irawin men ku wai to sam samngin men.
54004004	Epo endara mosop tin Got pho pon men men tunus ako, ma ku it mut i ta akomen, tin taku it wai to sam samngin men,
54004005	epon men si auluungin epo sakalngin ta Got u kinesngin tumen.
54004006	Wungin timen taku e kot po ehuro it epon, men ku e in ken po tin kum tunus ta a-Yesus Krais men ta, ken ngon e plok si tunus mi sakalngin tin ta wo phepngin men u ta kotngin tin tunus e e klap i kuma e iran men.
54004007	Si wungin tin lawinan e amiron nginan engun e po wala tin hyangan men pok put men men ku put ngon kilil i li, si e hihi ngon epo ngon ku si in to wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men weh.
54004008	Epo tohuhngin tin it hihi emkus a it epon ku it pit nhing epon men men ku nhio wo it kara ako, si wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men men ku nhio wo it epo wungin mosop, epon men wo kuk mara it epo tunusngin tin in homani men, kuru tunusngin tin ku iso si sulung men kut tumen.
54004009	Wungin anuh ta tin tunus epo po mosop ku wo hi nuk wet men wala timen.
54004010	Epo sinsin tin pim a wuh kumang u po wa mimingin los pim epon men tumen wala ti, epon men pim a hoo mi pim pit wo Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men, tin Palolongin ta po tunus mosop men, si men Palolongin ta po tin wo hi phep men weh.
54004011	Wungin tin mosop imen men ku e wo maran ko klat epon weh ma e kot po epon.
54004012	E ning i aku e mang ta po ta tin ku ion ngon tin hoin men e ken ngon e lengwal men asin. Si ngon men ku in ken tosukngin ta epo po tin wo hi phep men to wungin tin ku e sakal i men, u to wungin tin e karut ngon ton men, u to min epongin, u to emiu ngon, u to wo phepngin tap, u to wungin tin min yil men kut tumen.
54004013	Marap pit mi Kisang Auluungin tiik nginan to mara po masang to sun wala, u wo nutngin, u kotngin tumen li pol minan tin ku nga ti men.
54004014	Si e ning i aku wetpop wa talungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin e in mi ngon men, tin wangin ko po ngon si mi wungin tin po pokngin pok put men to wungin tin po tin akokono ta palu walngin men wili hi si nuk po ngon men.
54004015	Marap pit mi wungin tin mosop imen kokyok kokyok. E wa ngon sup wet wungin timen weh, kuma wungin tap tin ung e si tunus men ku si in pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala mosop.
54004016	E haum tunus weh epo tuop u epo kotngin tin ku e kot po epon men kut tumen, ma e tohuh weh epo ngon ku iso iran, epon taku e ning i tumen, men ku e palolo ngon tuop u po tin kuk e hul wet ngon men kut tumen.
54005001	E in aku e pio po masang tin hyangan men ta asin, si e suh mi kinga yang ken yang e wiramap ta men, kuru e ning i tumen epo po masang tin nenerengin men ken po e wom irit won weh men kut tumen.
54005002	Kuru e ning i tumen maksin epo po wala tin hyangan men ken po e eleni ngon weh men, kuru e ning i tumen epo po wala tin nenerengin men ken po e ehulut ngon weh men kut tumen, men ku e ning i to wungin tin min yil men misan.
54005003	E nhio wo po wala wamuh tin kalwok weh men.
54005004	Si taku wut wala wamuh ta men husanin wa ehuron tumen kara kuk, men ku po tin imen kha ku urut wungin muk tin ku po wo hi nuk wet Got ton mi po tin hi khuuk wal weh men ma po emhut naumngin tin ta wirama hi ngong toni hi tin pit wo po men. Epo wungin tin imen men tunus to mara Got, ma yang min nawaehngin pit pon ako.
54005005	Si wut wala ta tin in wamuh weh ma misan in men, men wa hoo mingin tan si pit wo Got weh, ma men in e wilayuk epo haungin u kinesngin tumen to pi luk u to pi mhangin tumen kokyok kokyok.
54005006	Si taku po wala wamuh ta in epon ku ira wungin tin emkusin ngelek won men engun, aku, men iso tunus in, takuma men ken i e hun kut.
54005007	Ma wungin tin imen men ku e wo maran ko klat epon, kuma wungin men ku om po po weh.
54005008	Si taku po ta ku hihi endara epo po tin ta hi men som, men ku epo po tin hi ung mi mang then ta men weh, men po tin imen wetpo hi wa sakalngin tin wo it nuk wet men kha men, ma ko nuk lengwal weh epo po tin ku wo hi phep som men kara kha men.
54005009	Wut wala wamuh ta tin posan tan khum ta me sup (60) u li si tumen kho li men, men ku e wai mu sup to sun tin tiikngin kho men, kuru men ku in to min tin kho ma pit wo po masang then ta misan men,
54005010	u men ku po ta tin po sikian e ning wungin tunus ewin men, tin taku wut ut husanin li hi si nomuru men, u taku wut wa po nomisang me sup mi mang tan ma maran pit wo po tunus, u taku wut khis po khi po tin auluungin men, u taku wut nhio wo po tin miu hi tuung wet maikngin men, u taku wut tohuh epo wut ku ira wungin tin mosop e turunus men kut tumen.
54005011	Si po wala wamuh tin iso nenerengin men men ku e hul wet hi ma e pan ya hi ko nuk yanga kisang asin. Epon taku po mi hi kling si, men ku po mi hi tin pit wo Krais men put mih, ma po mi hi epo po ku enangin kyok,
54005012	men ku po wo los po hi tuo hi epon tin po wetpo hi wa wungin tin po tung tung epon muk men.
54005013	Kuru wungin kara maksin men si po sun ti, po men ku urut wungin tin ku po mayongngin epon ma po mut mara sun li mang ta u mang ta tumen engun. Si ku mayongngin misan som, si men ku po sakal pit wetpo sun u po kinga hi si kuk wet wungin ta sun tin enginin men kut tumen, ma po sakal ira sakalngin tin tunus epon ku po sakal iran som men.
54005014	Tumen ma mi ngo epo po wala wamuh tin nenerengin men men ku enangin ma khuuk sun, ma lang pit wo mang ta hi tunus, epon akuli po wa soput ta si nuk epo po nolo tin ku mimi it epon men kha men.
54005015	Epo po kara yek ta soput kho ma hi phae hi li ira a-Nolongin kho kut.
54005016	Taku po masang won phep ta wa po wala won phep ta kuk to po wala tin wamuh men kara, men ku po tuo hi nhio wo sun kuma sun men ku wo hi pias. Si po men ku mang ta maikngin timen ko los palu walngin asin, si kuma palu walngin nhio wo po wala tin wamuh e kalwok weh men kuma po wo hi pias engun.
54005017	Po akono tin mara hi pit wo palu walngin tunus weh men men ku e wo ta palu walngin ma po ion sun ken po e tunus epon ku ya hi lupngin si then, men ku wom ning i tumen weh epo po tin wuh kumang epo sakalngin u kotngin tumen pok put nginan men.
54005018	Epo Panngin Auluungin men wo taku, “Wom men ku paim wo bulmakau minan tin li khin sak sak po wit men asin.” Kuru men wo kyok taku, “Po tin kum anaum men men tunus epon ku hi kulngin weh kut ako.”
54005019	E ning i aku e hul wet wungin tin hik putngin pit wo po akono ta men asin, si taku wulong ponwal wa wuluk myuk wa tumen tin mara hi nuk po wungin tin imen weh men kha ku e hul wet hi men.
54005020	Ma taku po kara iso kuk e ning lasin, men ku e tak si lasin ta hi si in pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala tin munuman men, kuma po tin imen men ku lem.
54005021	Nga sakal siik si tap to mara Got u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men u tihngin tin Got won ung wo hi mi sun kara men kut tumen, epo ngon men ku kasum wungin tin mosop imen ma e iran tin imen weh, si ngon men ku ples wungin wo wungin tin e phaeng won men asin wa takonngin ani ku tak tulu ngon ma e ples wungin ta po ta enginin epo sun ta akomen kut tumen.
54005022	Ngon men ku pus wilip si nuk po po ta tin ku si akono men kerek asin, epon akuli lasin ta po kara kyok me ung po ngon. Si ngon men ku marap pit wo ngon kuma lasin om po ngon weh.
54005023	Si ngon men ku um eki misan kokyok asin, si e um wain sakun kara kuma nhio wo kumap ma luul to saihngin tin si tap nang nang men.
54005024	Lasin ta po kara men nuk pi mlaeng kho, ma muk po li epo ples walngin, si lasin ta po kara men ku iso si pol pi mlaeng mi khi hi tin kho li men ako.
54005025	Tumen kut kha wungin tin po kara ning wungin ta hi tunus men ku si in pi mlaeng men, ma taku kara ku in pi mlaeng som, men ku tin imen kaunngin nuk kokyok kokyok akomen.
54006001	Po mosop tin epus si nuk uwa hi to kumang tin po kum wet wili sun engun men men ku ion po phua tin ta hi weh men ken hi e tunus epon ku po uluu sun weh, kuma Got yan u kotngin tin tan men tumen ku ton mingin akomen.
54006002	Ma taku po phua tin sun kum wo hi men kara wo hi phep, men ku po tin kum wo sun men ku kuk aku po phaeng taku po ehuro hi ma po ku wo hi nuk wet sun akomen. Si men tunus epo po men ku kum wo sun epo po tin sun kum wo hi e wa nhio wongin men men wo hi phep ma po mi hi pit wo al. Ma wungin tin imen ku e kot po epon u e wo nut po epon kut tumen.
54006003	Si taku po ta kot sun epo wungin enginin ta ma ku min then to sakalngin tin ning i ma po pit nhing ton men, tin wala ken sun tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, u kotngin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men kut tumen,
54006004	men po tin imen wai si pit engun kha men, ma ku maran ek wungin sinsin ta akomen. Si men in to saihngin tin po ngelek wo kinesngin u heek walngin tin si epo sakalngin put kara u put kara tumen, tin pong si min heh wet po u heek walngin u ton mingin u hoo mingin lengwal tin pit wo al men
54006005	u heek walngin tin po tin tulun hungin ta hi whuk ma wungin irawin om mi hi men kuk e ning i kokyok kokyok men kut tumen. Epo po tin imen phaeng taku wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men kha ku po si wa miranngin epon men. Po tin wungin ta hi nuk tumen men ku put ngon kilil po engun.
54006006	Si wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men taku mi it nawaehngin ton, men timen it wa miranngin hambip epon ako.
54006007	Epo it ko khuukngin wo mulus, men ku it wa endara ta me to it som, kuru wungin nuk pi mlaeng kho epo it ku kyok li pol to endara ta akomen kut tumen.
54006008	Si taku it kuk to enda aiingin u moolngin kut tumen, men ku mi it nawaehngin to endara tin imen engun.
54006009	Si po tin mi hi epon ku si mimiran men men plong ko mi karongngin u hi plong ko mi esih tin po kuh i men, u po plong ko mi min wawai tin ulil u tin mhuk po men kut tumen munuman, tin pamut po ko mi mumhek mingin u wungin tin po huuspit min men kut tumen.
54006010	Epo po tin mi hi pit pit wo ulu men men sinsin epo wungin lengwal maran kiring kiring. Ma wungin tin imen kha po kara yek ta wungin tin wo it nuk wet men kho to mi hi tin ngelek epo ulu men, ma po tuo hi nii hi epo wungin munuman tin po mi hi urut hi ton men.
54006011	Si ngon tin kum ta Got men, auweh, ngon men ku saa lu in hin epo wungin tin mosop imen weh, si e sau wungin tin siik men misan, u wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men, u wo phepngin, u min epo ngin, u wungin tin ku e pit nhing wet won maikngin men, u wungin tin amunu men kut tumen misan.
54006012	E tohuh epo lek walngin tin tunus e mut eya wo phepngin tin irawin men weh, e isum tunusngin tin sindak men, tin Got yuk ngon epon ku e wai ma e nut sakalngin tin e pok put epon tunus to mara po munuman tin nuk e hul wet ngon men.
54006013	Nga wo tap siik to mara Got tin wa tunusngin si ta endara mosop men u to mara Krais Yesus tin nut sakalngin pok put nginan tin tunus men to mara a-Pontius Pailat men kut tumen,
54006014	epo ngon men ku kasum sakalngin tin nga wo tap siik epon men ma e iran to lasin tin om po ngon men. Ngon men ku kasum sakalngin tin imen weh li pol minan tin kuli a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku si put plo nginan in pi mlaeng men.
54006015	Yang kha ku Got wai si in pi mlaeng mi elup tin tan weh men, men Got tin ung tunus weh mi emhong tin tan weh men, tin then maran pit wo endara mosop men, tin Sinkhaung epo po sinkhaung mosop u Akono epo po akono mosop kut tumen,
54006016	tin then e ku hun ewin som ma ung mi esul tin ngiseng weh e ku it li tikayung i akomen. Men yang tin ku po ta maran kon i kho som men, kuru po talok mi engin epo po tin ku mara hi kon i men kut tumen. Got tin imen men ku yan pos u in apalukngin kokyok kokyok tumen kokyok kokyok li kut.
54006017	Kut si e wo maran ko klat epo po tin kuk to miranngin hambip mi elup tin in homani men epo po men ku wai si pit asin. Kuru po men ku hoo mi hi pit wo miranngin tin ku siin kaek weh som men asin kut tumen, si hoo mingin ta hi men ku pit wo Got tin in kokyok kokyok men, tin naa it hambip epo endara mosop kuma mi it keh keh epon men.
54006018	Kuru po men ku ning wungin tunus, kuma po si miran epo wungin tin po ning i tunus epo sun men, ma po hihi epo po ku wa endara si ta sun, men ku po pok mi endara ta hi ma po naa sun tin kalwok men epon engun.
54006019	Epo wungin tin imen kha ku po halung po miranngin ta hi tin ku sinsin in tunus epo elup tin ku iso si men, kumali po isum tunusngin tin sindak e in men.
54006020	Auweh, Timoti, e haum eya wungin tin Got wai si tap epon ku marap pit won men, si put ngon kilil sakalngin kara pok put sakalngin ken po e kuk ton men, ma wungin timen kha po yek ta wungin tin irawin e wo it nuk wet men epon men. Nanaangin tin ta Got men ku weh in to ngon. Men irawin. tin ta po tunus e po phuk min si po sakal i engun men, u sakalngin tin po torok ma po sikian e maran ekngin men tin po taku sakal hik put wungin tap epon men kut tumen.
54006021	Maran ekngin tin imen po
55001001	Ngo a-Pol tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais epo wungin tin nuk ta mi Got men, tin ira wungin tin wo kuk mara ngin tin epo tunusngin tin in mi Krais Yesus men,
55001002	kha nga tih kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon a-Timoti tin wirukan e mi ngo epo ngon weh men. Nanaangin u min sukngin u min wyungin tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men tumen men ku weh in to ngon.
55001003	Nga sam sam Got tin nga kum tan epo mi ngo tin ples wungin e mi yil weh men, ken sun tin po tin khuuk wal me khuuk ngo men ning i men, epo tulu ngo hu ngon mi kinesngin tin ta ngo men to pi luk u to pi mhangin tumen, si ngo ku nhing som.
55001004	Epo tulu ngo hu tinisngin tin ko marap men kha nga in e hiim ngon epo ngo taku ion ngon weh men, kuma min kehngin ku kol mi ngo weh.
55001005	Nga sam sam Got epo ngon minan tin tulu ngo hu pit po wo phepngin tin nuk mi ngon e irawin weh men, tin muk ma in mi etiyim e-Lois u tonim e-Yunis kut tumen, khali homani ma wo ngo phep epon men in mi ngon maksin kut tumen ako.
55001006	Sinsin tin imen kha nga tak tulu ngon epo ngon ku pong yau kyok, tin talungin ta Got e in mi ngon epo ngo tin wa wili ngo si nuk mhi ngon men.
55001007	Epo Got ku wa emiun tin epo lemngin men ta si ta it kho akomen, si yang wa emiun tin epo kakhangin, u min epo ngin, u wungin tin it karut it tunus epon men tumen misan kha si ta it men.
55001008	Tumen ma ngon men ku manngin wap epo ngon tin ku pok put wungin epo yang tin Akono ta it men u epo ngo tin kan kanngin pit mi yang men kut tumen asin. Si ngon men ku pok mi won maikngin to ngo tin nga wuh i pit mi pok putngin tin tunus men ira kakhangin tin ta Got men.
55001009	Yang wala palolo it kho ma yang yuk it epo it ku ira wungin tin auluungin weh men, men ku ira kumang ta it ta som, si men ira wungin tin yang tuon hihi i nuk ta min u min sukngin tin yang naa it epon mi Krais Yesus kho men kut tumen, si pi tin ku iso si ma ung e li men men ku iso si ma ung e li.
55001010	Taku li homani ma sakalngin tin imen pok putngin si in pi mlaeng epo a-Yesus Krais tin Palolongin ta it men tin si put plo nginan kho men, tin hik put emhong tin ta hunngin men kho kut, ma wa tunusngin u wungin tin po ku huu ewin kyok som men tumen si nuk pi mlaeng epo pok putngin tin tunus men.
55001011	Men pok putngin tin tunus e Got won ung wo ngo epo ngo ku si po ta tin ku pok put sakalngin epon men, u si po paengin ta, u si po ta tin ku kot sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kut tumen.
55001012	Sinsin tin imen kha nga wuh won maikngin tin mosop imen epon men. Takuma ngo ku manngin wa ngo akomen, epo nga ion yang tin wo ngo phep pit won men, kha mi ngo puplet weh epo yang men kakha epon ku haum eya endara tin wo ngo phep pit wo yang ma nga wai si nuk yanga wili yang epon ku yang maran pit won ta ngo men weh li pol to ungunan tin imen.
55001013	Ngon men ku kasum sakalngin tin ku po nuk nhing epon e e hul i mi wo ngo kho men, tin marap kon i ken tosukngin ta men, men ku e kasum i to wo phepngin u min epongin kut tumen tin in mi Krais Yesus men.
55001014	Sakalngin tin tunus e wangin ko tap kho men men ku e haum eyan tunus epo Emiun Auluungin tin ung mi it men.
55001015	Kut si ngon men ion wungin tin iyi kho, epo po mosop tin ung wo mulusngin Esia men wetpo hi wa ngo kho kut, men a-Pigelus u a-Hermogenes tumen men ngong in mi hi ako.
55001016	Yang tin Akono men ku min suk po tin khuuk wal mi mang tin ta a-Onesiporus men, epo yang men angan munuman kho ma yang ning i ma mi ngo kyok si tunusngin, si yang ku manngin wan epo ngo tin esih tin po koklong men kan kan ngo men akomen.
55001017	Awu. Minan tin yang me pol Rom men, ma yang tohuh weh ma yang in e langun epo ngo, li yang pon ta ngo kho kut.
55001018	Yang tin Akono men ku mang, si yang pon ta min sukngin tin me hang sun men to elup tin epo ples walngin men. Epo e ion i tunus epo wungin tin tuni tuni e kho ma yang nhio wo ngo Epesus epon men.
55002001	Tumen ma, ngon tin wirukan men, e pit nhing to nanaangin tin in mi Krais Yesus weh men.
55002002	Ma wungin tin e hul i e me pol mi wo ngo mi po tin munuman e mara hi nuk pon men, men ku e wai si nuk yanga wili po tin kuk to wungin anuh men, tin wo hi ek hi epon ku kot sun tin enginin kara men maksin kut tumen.
55002003	Tumen ma ngon men ku wuh won maikngin ken po nolo tunus ta tin ta a-Yesus Krais weh men.
55002004	Yang nolo ta tin ung epon ku li hi lek wal men ku kan kan i tuon to wungin tin ta pi mulus men ewin akomen, epon kumali yang ning i ma phua tin won ung wo yang epo yang ku me sup to po tin nolo men ku min tunusngin pit pon.
55002005	Kuru taku yang ta ku li hi ku urut mara al, men ku wa moolngin tin po wai ko ung mhi sun men engun akomen. Awu. Men ku ira wungin sinsin epo wungin tin imen weh, anima wa moolngin tin imen.
55002006	Kuru yang ta tin lip nginangan epo mipi men, kuli endara aiingin muru, men kuli wai muk epo po kara men ako.
55002007	Tulup hu pit po wungin tin nga sakal i men, men yang tin Akono men ku naa ngon epo maran ekngin tin ku e ples wungin sinsin mosop epon men weh.
55002008	Tulup hu pit po a-Yesus Krais tin khekngin kyok si lunga po tin huu kho men, tin pol hut mulu tin ta a-Dewit men, men ira pok putngin tin tunus e nga pok put kho men.
55002009	Pok putngin tin tunus imen kha nga wuh won maikngin epon ken ngo e po ta tin ning wungin lengwal ewin men kha men, men nga wuh i weh li po kan kan ngo epo esih tin po koklong weh men. Takuma sakalngin tin ta Got men ku kan kanngin ewin akomen.
55002010	Tumen ma nga wuh won maikngin mosop, sinsin men epo po tin Got won ung wo hi men, kumali po wa palolongin tin in mi Krais Yesus men to moolngin tin sindak in men.
55002011	Wungin anuh ta tin ku wo it nuk wet weh men men nuk ti: epon taku it huu to yang, men kuli it kyok si tunus kuk to yang maksin kut tumen ako.
55002012	Taku it pit nhing wet won maikngin weh li pol, men kuli it si kai po tin sinkhaung men kara ma mara it pit wo endara to yang. Si taku it sup sup put yang, men kuli yang sup sup put it maksin kut tumen ako.
55002013	Taku it hik put wo kuk marangin tin ta it men, men ku yang iso ira wungin tin yang wo kuk mara it epon men ako, epon men khung nginan weh epo yang tin ku wetpon wa wungin tin tan tuon men.
55002014	Ngon men ku in e tak tulu po epo wungin tin mosop imen weh, ma marap arre to sakalngin weh ma e wo nut po to mara Got epo po ku heek wal pit mi sakalngin put kara tin ku nhio wo po som men asin, men sakalngin tin mhuk mi po tin hul i men kha men ako.
55002015	Ngon men ku tohuh weh epo ngon ku si in to mara Got ken po ta tin Got ion mi wungin tan kho ma yang wo epon e tunus men, tin kum ta yang ewin ma ku in to wungin ta tin ku manngin wan epon men akomen, epon men maran tak si sakalngin tin irawin men si sisiik ewin.
55002016	Si ngon men ku put ngon kilil sakalngin tin ta pi mulus e lemngin tin pit wo Got men om min men. Epo wungin tin imen kha ku wa wungin tin po wetpo hi wa wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men ung e ko po sun li si men.
55002017	Ma sakalngin tin ta po men ku ung e pawha li yanga pi ken elak tin ung e samlal po ta men. A-Himeneus ngong a-Piletus kha ngong in mi po tin wungin ta hi tumen.
55002018	Wulong men in e kikin engun, si wungin tin irawin men nuk, epo wulong wo epo khekngin kyok si men kho si kut, men wulong mhuk mi wo phepngin ta po kara kha men.
55002019	Takuma enah tin Got ning mang tan si ung won men men iso ung nhing ako, ma tosukngin tin kaek sii sakalngin men men kikhimngin nuk pon taku, “Yang tin Akono men ion po tin ta yang men kho ako,” u “Po mosop tin sikia yang tin Akono men yan men ku wetpo hi wa wungin tin lengwal men weh,” tumen.
55002020	Si mi mang nhum ta men ku timro golan u silwa an u tumen misan pit min akomen, men tin sa an u mulusan tumen men pit min kut tumen ako, men kara epo kumang tin yan pos men, u kara men epo kumang tin ku yan pos som men kut tumen.
55002021	Tumen ma taku po ta whek min epo endara tin ku yan pos som men li, men ku si timroan tin epo kumang tin yan pos men, men ku si min auluungin ma tunus epo phua ku ning kumang tan epon, epon men hihingin kho epo kumang mosop tin turunus men misan.
55002022	Tumen ma ngon men ku saa lu in hin weh epo wungin tin po tin nenerengin men mi hi kling epon men, si e ira wungin tin siik men, u wo phepngin, u min epongin, u min wyungin, tumen, to po mosop tin yuk li si ta yang tin Akono men to mi hi tin yil men.
55002023	Si heek walngin tin ulil e po pong epo engin ma po ung e heek wal engun men men ku put ngon kilil i, epo e ion i epo wungin tin imen men pong si heek walngin si ta po ako.
55002024	Ma po ta tin kum wet wili yang tin Akono men men ku min teng si epo heek walngin ewin asin, si men ku ning wungin amlus epo po mosop, men ku won ek i epon ku kot sun, men ku wuh wungin tin po ning i lengwal epon men li kho engun,
55002025	men ku tus po tin nolo sakalngin men to wungin tin ku wa min ko men, epon taku yanda Got naa po epo phae mingin, kumali po pon ta wungin tin irawin weh men,
55002026	ma tulun hunngin tin ta po men kyok si ma po meleng esih tin ta emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men, epo kho ma yang kan kan po epon ku po ira wungin tin nuk ta mi yang men engun.
55003001	Si ngon men ku ion i ti, epo ungunan kara tin kuli iso si sulung men, men ku elup tin ku po kuk wo lalaingin min men ku iso pit e si si.
55003002	Epo po tunus men ku kuk to wungin tin po mi hi pit wo hi tuo hi weh men, u po mi hi pit wo ulu nginangan, u po wangan po hi, u po wa hi si pit, u po ton mi sun nginangan, u po wetpo hi wa wungin ta po irama hi to eleni hi, u po ku sam sam sun ewin som, u po ku wo hi nuk wet endara auluungin ta ewin som,
55003003	u min epongin ta po men ku om, u men khung po engin epo po kara tin ku pa ho ho mi sun men, u po men ku hik put sakalngin pit po sun engun, u po ku karuk hi weh ewin som, u po kuk to wungin amhees, u po mut wungin tin tunus men,
55003004	u po mi hi alang si sun tin tira hi men sup mi won maikngin, u po phuk mi wungin kerek engun, u po sosoom to mi hi tin wai si pit men, u po mi hi pit pit wo wungin tin ku po mi hi keh keh epo wungin maran kiring kiring tin pit wo mulus men, si po ku mi hi pit wo Got weh akomen.
55003005	Epo po men kuk to wungin ken po e lem pit wo Got, takuma emhong tin in mi wungin tin po lem pit wo Got epon men men ku po wo hi nuk wet akomen. Ngon men ku in hin weh epo po tin wungin ta hi tumen.
55003006	Epo po tin yem yem li sup mi mok ma po wa wa mi sun wala tin hul wet sun engun e lasin ta hi los hi nginangan men, tin wungin kling si mi hi ma wungin ek ek mi hi nginangan men, kha kuk mi sun tin wungin ta hi tumen.
55003007	Po wala tin imen taku hul wet kotngin mi wo sun sumsum, takuma men khung po engin weh epo po tin ku pon ta maran ekngin tin epo wungin tin irawin men angan som.
55003008	Kho ma a-Yanes ngong a-Yambres nolo a-Moses, tumen kut kha po tin imen nolo wungin tin irawin men maksin kut tumen. Po men wungin lengwal ses mi tulun hungin tin ta hi men. Got ion mi wungin ta po kho, men wungin tin po wo hi phep pit won men men ku siik to wo phepngin tin irawin weh men akomen.
55003009	Takuma wungin tin ta po men ku huuh li nomalak som, epo wungin ulil tin ta po men ku si in pi mlaeng to mara po mosop ako, ken sun tin kho ma wungin tin ta wulong men si in pi mlaeng men.
55003010	Si ngon men pet kira ngo ma e ion kotngin tin nga kot po epon ewin men, u wungin tin nga ning i ewin men, u wungin tin nga hihi nuk maran min ngo epo ngo ku ning i wo mulus men, u wo phepngin tin ta ngo men, u wuh wungin li maran nomalak, u min epongin, u ngo tin pit nhing wet won maikngin nginangan men mosop kho kut ako,
55003011	kuru e ion mumhek mingin u won maikngin tumen tin si si ta ngo Antiok u Aikoniam u Listra maksin kut tumen. Mumhek mingin tin imen men nga lat i engun, takuma yang tin Akono men palolo ngo mi mumhek mingin tin imen mosop.
55003012	Wai, epo po mosop tin mi hi epo po ku ira wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men mi Krais Yesus men, men ku wuh wungin tin sun ning i lengwal epo po men ako.
55003013	Si po tin wungin ta hi lengwal men u po tin ek ek mara sun nginangan men kut tumen ku kuk e wuh ma wuh wungin lengwal si kokyok kokyok li kut, men ku po kuk e wa wa mi sun, u sun kuk e wa wa mi po kut tumen.
55003014	Si ngon men ku iso ira wungin tin e in e urut i kho men tin wop nuk wet weh e tin maran ko klat men, epo e ion po tin e urut sakalngin mi wo hi kho men ako,
55003015	kuru e ion i epo e iso hoin men e ion Panngin tin Auluungin men, tin ku ning i ma mhip ek wungin tin ku e palolongin epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Krais Yesus men.
55003016	Panngin Auluungin mosop men si epo Got tin emiunan e in e nges nges si mi Panngin Auluungin tin imen, ma men tunus epon ku nhio wo it epo wungin tin ku it kot po epon men, u it tak si wungin lengwal si in pi mlaeng epon, u it tus po epon, u it urut sakalngin epo wungin tin siik men epon kut tumen,
55003017	kumali po ta tin ning kumang ta Got men men ku moolngin tin ku po ning kumang turunus mosop epon men klet po hi weh.
55004001	Tumen ma nga pok put sakalngin tin maran ko klat men si tap to mara Got, u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen, tin kuli ples wungin ta po tin iso tunus kuk men u ta po tin huu kho men kut tumen, minan tin kuli yang si put plo nginan ma yang wa enunu tin tan men ko ung nhing men.
55004002	Ngon men ku in e pok put wungin tin ta Got men weh. Aku, taku pi put ta pit wa taku pi om, men ku e hihingin in kut. Ngon men ku in epo ngon ku tak si wungin lengwal tin ta po men si in pi mlaeng, u e pio po epo wungin lengwal tin ku po ning i men, u e wo nut po kut tumen, ma e wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak kokyok kokyok men ku e kot po engun.
55004003	Epo elup ta kuli iso si tin ku po mi hi mokongin epo po tin ku hul kotngin tin tunus men, si po ku ira wungin tin po tuo hi mi hi epon men. Ma po kinga hi sangelek weh epo po ku hul wungin maran kiring enginin kara, kha kuli po pulum po sun tin ta hi e ku kot sun men munuman me,
55004004	men ku po phae mi kinga hi epo wungin tin irawin men li, si po kikin engun wala po ira pasikngin tin ulil men.
55004005	Si ngon men ku haum tunus epo wungin mosop, men ku e lat won maikngin engun, u men ku e ning kumang tin ta po tin pok put pok putngin tin tunus men, kuru ngon men ku pyu po kumang tin tap weh men kut tumen.
55004006	Epo ngo men wungin hihingin kho nuk epo kalolwa ngo tin ku yuk yukngin ko ken talungin tin ekian men ta, ma elup tin ku nga yok ma nga li epon men men me in tikayung kut khae.
55004007	Ngo men wuh epo lek walngin tin tunus men kho kut, ngo men suuk sii saangin kho kut, u ngo men kasum wo phepngin kho kut tumen.
55004008	Ma homani ma moolngin tin ku ko ung mhi ngo epo wungin tin siik men men hihingin nuk epo ngo kho, tin yang tin Akono e ples wungin siik ewin men ku wai si ta ngo to elup tin imen, si ku ta ngo misan som, men ku ta po mosop tin kho nginan ma me men tin mi hi pit wo yang tin ku si put plo nginan men maksin kut tumen ako.
55004009	Si ngon men ku tohuh epo ngon ku pus engin mu pon ta ngo kerek engun.
55004010	Epo a-Dimas men wetpon wa ngo kho kut, epo yang min pit pit wo wungin tin ta pi mulus tin to elup tin iyi, ma yang yok li Tesalonaika kho kut. Kuru a-Kresens yok li Galesia, u a-Taitus yok li Dalmatia maksin kut tumen.
55004011	Si a-Luk misan kha in tili ngo men. Si e wa a-Mak ma mom mu, epo yang men wungin tan tunus epon ku nhio wo ngo epo kumang.
55004012	Si a-Tikikus men nga tih i kho li Epesus.
55004013	Ma minan tin ku e mu men, men ku e wa moolngin tin nomalak e nga mang tan ung Troas hang a-Karpus men, kuru e wa kisang tin wlo nginan men to sun tin po ning i epo li ken nginan elit e mi ngo epon weh men mu kut tumen.
55004014	Si Aleksanda tin nenen endara epo bras ning nginan nginangan men ning i lengwal epo ngo hambip. Mi ngo epo yang tin Akono men ku ning wungin ta emhut sun tin yang ning i men.
55004015	Ngon kut men ku haum eya ngon epo yang tin imen weh, epo yang men nolo sakalngin ta pim hambip weh kut tumen.
55004016	Epo ewo maran tin po ples wungin ta ngo ma nga pok put wungin mut eya ngo men, men ku po ta pit to ngo som. Awu. Po mosop mhup sila ngo. Mi ngo epo Got ku wa lasin ko po po asin.
55004017	Si yang tin Akono men men in to ngo ako, ma yang pa nhing ngo, kuma sakalngin men ku pok putngin li pyu pongin weh epo ngo, kumali po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men mosop men ku hul. Ma Got pakol ngo me pol wo laion.
55004018	Ma yang tin Akono men ku iso palolo ngo mi wungin tin mosop e po taku ning i lengwal epo ngo men ako, ma yang ku wa ngo li anga tunusngin mi enunu tin ta yang e epo pi wet pi men. Yang kha ku it wai yan si kokyok kokyok li kut men. Men Irawin.
55004019	Si e wa mi ngo si ta e-Prisila ngong Akwila, u ta po tin hi khuuk wal e ung mi mang tin a-Onesiporus men kut tumen.
55004020	Si a-Erastus men iso in Korin, si a-Tropimus men nga mang tan iso saih in Miletus.
55004021	E pus engin epo ngon ku mu pol muk kho epo elup tin to huk hukngin men. Si a-Eubulus wa min si tap, kuru a-Pudens u a-Linus u e-Klaudia u po tin ehuro it men mosop wa mi hi si tap kut tumen.
55004022	A-Yesus Krais tin Akono men ku in to emiu ngon. Nanaangin men ku weh in to ngon kut tumen. Men irawin.
56001001	Ngo a-Pol tin kum wet wili Got epo mi ngo weh e paengin ta a-Yesus Krais men, men ira wo phepngin ta po tin Got won ung wo hi men u maran ekngin epo wungin irawin tin ira sun tin pit mina Got tuon men kut tumen,
56001002	tin si mi hoo mingin tin pit wo tunusngin tin sindak men, tin Got tin ku torok ewin som men wo kuk marangin epon kho epo elup tin ku iso si ma ung e li men,
56001003	si enal tin tan weh men si ma yang wa wungin tin tan men si in pi mlaeng epo sakalngin pok put nginan, tin yang won nuk wet ngo ma yang mang tan sup yanga wili ngo ira wungin tin Got tin Palolongin ta it men wo maran ko klat epon men.
56001004	Kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon a-Taitus tin wiruk irawin weh mi wo phepngin ta tong then men: Nanaangin, min sukngin, u min wyungin kut tumen, tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono e Palolongin ta it men kut tumen ku ko po ngon.
56001005	Sinsin tin nga mang ta ngon in Krit epon men men wala ti, epon ku e hihi endara tin ku suuk siingin kho som men ko nuk sisiik ma wop ung wo po akokono kara mi palu walngin mosop tin ung e li li mili yanga pi then then men, ira wungin tin nga panen ngon epon kho men --
56001006	tin taku po ta wungin om pon weh, tin titien then ta misan men, u to husanin tin wo hi phep e sakalngin om po hi tin po siwul mi endara tin ta po irama hi to eleni hi epo sasayihngin maran kiring kiring ma po wetpo hi wa sakalngin tin ta wulong men.
56001007	Epo po ta tin maran pit wo palu walngin men ku wungin om pon weh, epon men in ken po ta tin Got won nuk wet ma yang wa kumang tan ko nuk yanga wilin men, men ku ira min tan tuon weh ewin akomen, men ku yan sal kerek ewin akomen, men ku um wain nginangan akomen, men ku to wungin amhees ewin akomen, u men ku min pit pit wo ulu hambip weh asin kut tumen,
56001008	si men ku in to wungin tin maran pit wo po tin me mang tin tan men tunus men, u min pit wo wungin tin tunus men, u karuk i to tulun hungin tunus, u ples wungin nuk emin weh, u wungin tan min yil weh, u kasum min tuon tunus weh kut tumen,
56001009	kuru men ku kasum sakalngin tin anuh men pip ken sun tin hul wet kotngin epon kho men, kuma kakha to kotngin tin tunus men epon ku wo nut po u tak si wungin tin ta po tin taku sakal hik put kotngin men si in pi mlaeng kut tumen.
56001010	Epo po munuman kuk tin ku wa hi sup wet sun kara ewin akomen, men sakalngin ta hi tin sinsin om u ek ek mara po men tumen, men po tin hi mut wal ewin men kha hi kuk to wungin tin imen weh men.
56001011	Po tin imen ku e ning i kuma po ping wo hi, epo po siluk mi wo phepngin ta po kara to po tin hi khuuk wal ta hi mi mang ta hi weh men, men po kot sun epo wungin tin tunus epo po ku kot sun epon men akomen, sinsin in epo po ku torok mara sun ma po nak nak endara ta sun engun.
56001012	Po tin ta hi men ta, tin pokngin ta hi weh men, men wo taku, “Po Krit men torok nginangan sumsum weh, u po men ken li ken nginan enih tin lases kuk tan men, u po men mayongngin ma kuk e ii endara lak engun kut tumen.”
56001013	Wungin tin pok putngin imen men irawin ako. Tumen ma e pio po epo sakalngin tin to min nenenngin men weh kuma po phae mi hi, kuma po nuk nhing to wo phepngin ta hi.
56001014	Si po men ku kinga hi kuk epon ku hul pasikngin engun tin ta po Yuda men u wungin sinsin tin ta po tin wetpo hi wa wungin tin irawin men tumen asin.
56001015	Epo po tin mi hi yil men, men ion endara mosop ken i e mi yil men, si po tin ku mi hi yil som ma wo phepngin ta hi om men, men ku ion endara ta ken i e mi yil men akomen, epo tulun hungin ta po tin in mi po men u mi po tin ples wungin nginangan e taku tunus wa lengwal wa tumen, likiong men ko min lengwal maksin kut tumen.
56001016	Po men pok put wungin ken po e pol ta Got men, si wungin tin po ning i men men maran ken po e pong epo Got men, epo wungin ta po men iso hies lengwal weh, men po pang po hi epon ku hul wet wungin, ma wungin tunus men po e ku tunus epo po ku ning i ta akomen.
56002001	Si ngon men ku sakal sakalngin tin pit mina kotngin tin ku po nuk nhing epon men weh:
56002002	men ku e wo ta po masang tin hyangan men epo po ku karuk hi epo wain tin um nginan hambip men asin, u kuk to wungin ta hi tin amunu men, u mara hi pit wo hi tuo hi tunus, u nuk nhing to wo phepngin ta hi, to min epongin, u wungin tin po nuk nhing wet won maikngin men kut tumen;
56002003	kuru po wala tin hyangan men men ku e ning i kai sun epo po kut tumen, ma e wo ta po epo po ku ira wungin tin tunus e ken po tin auluungin men ku ning i men, si po men ku kuk aku po hik put wungin pit po sun lilil asin, u po ku mang ta mi hi sup wet wain um nginan hambip asin kut tumen, si po men ku kuk ken po tin kot sun epo wungin tin tunus men,
56002004	kumali po kot sun wala tin nenerengin men epo po men ku kuk to wungin tin po mi hi pit pit wo titien hi men u to wungin tin po mi hi pit pit wo husani hi men kut tumen,
56002005	kuru po kuk to wungin tin po karuk hi tunus ma po ira wungin tin mi yil epo po masang men, u po ku wilayuk epo kumang mi mang ta hi weh, u po ning i tunus epo sun, u po hul wet titien hi tin ta hi weh men kut tumen, kumali sakalngin tin ta Got men ku ton mingin akomen.
56002006	Kuru e ira wungin then ma e wo nut po masang tin nenerengin men epo po ku karuk hi tunus to tulun hungin tin ta hi men maksin kut tumen,
56002007	ma mi wungin mosop tin tap men men ku e suk mara po epo ngon tuop men tosukngin ta epo wungin tunus ning nginan; mi kotngin men ku e suk mara po epo ngon e in to mip then, u wungin tap mamaik kut tumen, si ku wungin enginin ta ek ek mi ngon ewin akomen,
56002008	u ngon men to sakalngin tin tunus e ku po wo los po ngon ewin akomen kut tumen, kumali po ta tin nolo ngon men ku manngin wan, epon tin wungin om tin ku po sakal lengwal epo ngon men.
56002009	Kuru e wo nut po tin kum wet wili po phuan men epo po ku hul wet po phuan tin ta hi weh men, ma wungin mosop tin po ning i men men ku po phuan mi hi tunusngin pit wo sun ton, si po men ku wo phae sun asin,
56002010	kuru po men ku meme endara ta sun asin, si po men ku suk mara sun epo wungin tin turunus e ku sun wo hi nuk wet sun ton men misan, kumali po pa mool kotngin tin ta Got tin Palolongin ta it men epo wungin mosop tin po ning i men.
56002011	Epo nanaangin tin ta Got e it wa palolongin epon men men si in pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala mosop kho kut,
56002012	men kot it epo it men ku wetpo it wa wungin tin ku pit mina Got som men u wungin tin po tin ta pi mulus men ngelek won men kut tumen, si it men ku karuk tunus epo it ma it ira wungin tin siik men u wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men kut tumen in mi elup tin iyi kut khae,
56002013	ma it kuk e mara it pit epo hoo mingin tin epo min kehngin tin nhum men, tin ku a-Yesus Krais tin Got ta it u Palolongin ta it kut tumen si pol pi mlaeng to moolngin men,
56002014	men yang tin min alang siin tuon mut eya it kuma yang kiis i mut eya it epo wungin mosop tin it hik put wungin sinsin men, kuma yang khis mi it ma it si po masang to sun wala tin mi it yil e ta yang weh men, tin ku tohuh epo wungin tin tunus men ning nginan men.
56002015	Ngon men ku sakal sakalngin tin imen kokyok kokyok, ma e wo nut po u e pio po to emhong mosop. Si e in aku e mang ta po ta tin ku ion ngon ken ngon e lengwal engun men asin.
56003001	E tak tulu po epo po ku wa hi sup wet wili po phuan tin mara hi pit wo mulus men to sun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men, men ku po hul wet wungin ta sun, ma po hihi epo po ku ning wungin tin turunus men maran kiring mosop,
56003002	si po ku sakal lengwal epo po ta akomen, si po ku kuk to wungin tin po mara hi ii u po ning i amang epo sun men kut tumen, men ku po suk mara po masang to sun wala mosop epo wungin tin po wa ya hi ko men in kokyok kokyok li kut.
56003003	Epo it tuo it men kho ma it kuk to wungin ulil maksin kut tumen ako, ma it pang po it epo it tin ku hul wet sakalngin men, u wungin torokngin ek ek mi it ma it kuk e mang ta mi it sup wet ngelek wongin u min pit wongin kut tumen tin maran kiring kiring men, ma it kuk e wilayuk to tunusngin ta it sup wet it tin mi it lengwal pit wo po kara u mara it nes po to endara ta hi kut tumen, men po kara mi hi lel it u mi it lel po kara kut tumen.
56003004	Taku li klet ma wungin tin Got tin Palolongin ta it men ning i tunus u min epo po tunus men kut tumen si in pi mlaeng kho,
56003005	sinsin ani ku wungin tin siik men ning nginan tin it tuo it ning i men akomen. Awu. Min sukngin tin ta yang men kha yang palolo it epon men, men epo kiis pongin tin it ko khuukngin homan e it si homan epo Emiun tin Auluungin men,
56003006	tin wala Got yuk yuk i ko po it hambip weh yanga wili a-Yesus Krais tin Palolongin ta it men,
56003007	kumali Got wo epo it e kuk to wungin siik epo min sukngin tin tan men kho, anima it si ken po tin ku wa pakuh pongin pit mina hoo mingin tin pit wo tunusngin tin sindak men.
56003008	Wungin anuh tin ku wo it nuk wet men ta u sakalngin kara tin mi ngo epo ngon ku pa nhing siin kokyok kokyok men kut tumen wala nuk tumen, kumali po tin wo hi phep pit wo Got kho men ku sila hi khing epo po ku wilayuk epo wungin tin tunus men ning nginan misan. Sakalngin tin imen men tunus u men ku nhio wo po masang to sun wala kut tumen ako.
56003009	Si e in hin epo heek walngin tin ulil men u wungin tin po ples wal i pit mi pasikngin engun men, u wungin tin po pok pok mi al ma po heek wal pit mi wungin tin sinsin men kut tumen, epo wungin tin imen ku nhio wo po ta som u sinsin men om kut tumen.
56003010	Po ta tin in to wungin tin taku hik put palu walngin nginangan men, men ku e wo si kuk maran angan ta wa ponwal tumen, ma ku hul som, men ku e mang tan lu in apoi.
56003011	Epo it ion i epo po ta tin wungin tan tumen men phae sakalngin tin tunus men si lengwal ma ning lasin kokyok kokyok, men wa lasin si pon tuon kha men.
56003012	Minan tin kuli nga tih Artimas wa a-Tikikus ti pol tap men, men ku e tohuh epo soput ta tin ku e mu pon ta ngo pi Nikopolis men, epo mi ngo wawai kho epo ngo ku in mi elup tin to huk hukngin men mi pi tin imen.
56003013	A-Senas tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u Apolos kut tumen, men ku e tohuh epo ngon ku tirih wulong li ira soput ta ngong to endara ta ngong kara, kuma wulong kalwok epo endara ta akomen.
56003014	Ma po masang to sun wala tin ta it men men ku urut wungin tin ku po wilayuk epo wungin tin tunus men ning nginan weh, kuma po nhio wo sun tin kalwok men, kumali po men ku kuk ken sa tin aii men akomen.
56003015	Po mosop tin pim a kuk men wa mi hi ti epo ngon. E wa mi pim si ta po tin mi hi pit wo pim mi wo phepngin tin ta it men. Nanaangin tin ta Got men ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
57001001	Ngo a-Pol tin po kan kan ngo pit mi ngo tin kum ta Krais Yesus men, u wiro it a-Timoti kut tumen kha tuk a tirih kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon a-Pilemon tin tita it e it klap wal to kumang men,
57001002	u ti epo e-Apia tin mi pim pit won men, u Arkipus tin pim a klap wal to lek walngin eya Krais men, u ti epo palu walngin tin palu wal mi mang tin tap men kut tumen.
57001003	Nanaangin u min wyungin kut tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen ku in to ngon.
57001004	Nga sam sam Got tin ta ngo men ma nga sikia ngon kokyok kokyok mi kinesngin tin ta ngo men,
57001005	epo nga hul epo min epongin tin tap men, u wo phepngin tin tap e pit wo a-Yesus tin Akono men, u pit wo po mosop tin auluungin men kut tumen.
57001006	Ma nga kines epo ngon tin ku naa po epo wo phepngin tin tap men men ku siin iis mi ngon weh epo ngon tin ku marap ek endara turunus mosop tin in mi wom mi Krais Yesus men.
57001007	Epo, worok, min kehngin u pa nhingngin kut tumen men nhum nuk mi pim epo min epongin tin tap men, epo po tin auluungin men mi hi wa nhingngin tunus epo ngon.
57001008	Tumen ma taku ngo e taku mi ngo puplet weh mi Krais epo ngo ku wo maran ko klat epo ngon ku ning wungin tin tunus epo ngon ku ning i men, men ku nga ning i tumen ako,
57001009	takuma awu, min epongin ta tong kha nga suh mi kingap epon men. Ngo a-Pol tin hyangan e homani ma nga kan kanngin maksin eya a-Yesus Krais men,
57001010	kha suh mi kingap epo wiruk a-Onesimus, tin nga khuuk i to wo phepngin si mi esih tin khang weh e kan kan ngo men,
57001011	men yang tin kho ma ku nhio wo ngon tunus som men, si homani ma yang si tunus epon ku nhio wo ngon kuru ngo kut tumen.
57001012	Ma ngo ku tih yang kyok ti epo ngon. Tumen ma ngon men ku wa yang, epo yang men mi ngo siik.
57001013	Epo kho men mi ngo weh epo ngo ku kan kan yang iso in to ngo, kuma yang wa pi tap ma yang maran pit wo ngo tin esih tin khang weh men kan kan ngo pit mi pok putngin tin tunus men.
57001014	Si taku ngon ku wo tunus epo yang som, mi ngo epo ngo ku ning wungin ta asin, kumali wungin tin tap e tunus men ku e ning i ken ngo e ku pae wo ngon men akomen, si men ku e ning i epo mip weh engun.
57001015	Epo yang men saa sila ngon put monlo long kho, men sinsin epon kumali e wa yang kyok ti in hang ngon weh kut wa men,
57001016	kumali yang in to ngon ken po tin kum wet wili sun engun men angan ta kyok asin, si ken po ta tin nhum epo po tin kum wet wili sun men, men ken wiro it tin mi it pit won men ta. Ma ngo men mi ngo pit wo yang weh, si yang tin kum wo ngon wo mulus men u tin si mom irit won mi yang tin Akono men kut tumen, ngong likiong kha ku mip pit wo yang hambip weh epon men.
57001017	Tumen ma taku e ion ngo ken ngo e tong klap wal to kumang mi Krais, men ku e wa yang ti sup to min nawaehngin ken i e e ning i epo ngo weh men.
57001018	Ma taku yang ning lasin ta tun tira epo ngon wa naumngin tap ta pit wo yang, men ku e alpon mu epo ngo.
57001019	Ngo a-Pol tuo ngo kha pan wungin tin iyi epo wili ngo weh men. Ngo men kuli iso wai emhut sun ako. Ih, naumngin ta ngo tin pit wo ngon epo tunusngin tap tuon men, men ku nga sikian akomen.
57001020	Wai, worok, som ning i kuma mi ngo keh me epo ngon mi yang tin Akono men. Som wa nhingngin si in mi ngo mi yang tin Akono men.
57001021	Epo wo ngo phep epo ngon tin ku hul wet ngo men ako kha nga pan wungin tin iyi ti epo ngon men, ma nga ion i epo ngon men ku iso ning i tunus epo yang weh epo sun tin nga kines ngon epon men.
57001022	Si ngon men ku hihi mang emin ta ngo ta tin ku nga ti in min men ung, epo nga hoo mi ngo epo kinesngin tin ta wom men kha kuli Got min suk ngo ma nga iso ti pol ta wom epon men ako.
57001023	Si a-Epapras tin po kan kan tuk likiong mut eya Krais Yesus men men wa min ti epo ngon.
57001024	Kuru a-Mak, u Aristarkus, u a-Dimas, u a-Luk kut tumen, tin pim a klap wal to kumang then men, hi tih mi hi ti epo ngon kut tumen.
57001025	Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men men ku weh in to emiu wom. Men irawin.
58001001	Got tin kho nginan ma sakal si ta po yau a it sin mi wo po pokngin kara ira soput ta u ta tumen,
58001002	kha li elup tin ku me ponsol iyi ma yang sakal si ta it mi wo Wirun weh. Yang kha Got won ung won epon ku yang pakuh po sun epo endara mosop men, kuru yang ning mulus yanga wili sun maksin kut tumen.
58001003	Yang men moolngin tin ta Got e mha ma pon engil engil weh men, u men tosukngin tin tosuk to Got tuon e ira ewi sun siik weh men kut tumen. Yang men tin kasum endara mosop to sakalngin tin tan e to kakhangin weh men, tin tuon mlis lasin ta it mosop li, anima yang si ung ewo wili Got tin sinkhaung e ung ili awon weh men wilin tin ato sa men.
58001004	Epo yang men kho si nhum weh epo po tihngin mosop, epon tin Got pakuh po yang epo yang yan tin tunus weh epo po tihngin ya hi men.
58001005	Epo po tihngin tin akani e ku Got wo ta hi angan ta kho taku, “Ngon men Wiruk, homani kut ma nga khuuk ngon?” Kuru kyok men yang wo taku, “Ngo kuli in Wiraman ta yang u yang kuli in wiruk ta ngo” ti. Awu. Men pi om.
58001006	Si minan tin yang wa Wirun tin yang won to makngin ung won men me in lunga po tunus wo mulus men men yang wo taku, “Tihngin mosop men ku wa yang yan si.”
58001007	Si po tihngin men Got sakal epo hi taku, “Got men tin ning po tihngin tin tan men men hi si ken eip men, u po tin kum tan men ken yau tin ngin ngin men kut tumen.”
58001008	Si Wirun men yang sakal ta sun taku, “Auweh, Got, ehus tin tap tin sinkhaung men men sindak ung mi elup tin nuk e lap e li kut men. Kamtukngin tin ta po sinkhaung e marap pit wo enunu tin tap men epon men men kamdukngin tin to wungin siik men misan.
58001009	Ngon men mip pit wo wungin tin in siik men kokyok kokyok, si e mut wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men. Sinsin tin imen kha Got tin tap men won ung wo ngon epo nowhong tin pok put yang tin min tunusngin pit po ngon ku si nhum epo po tin tita wom men.”
58001010	Kuru sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ewo maran men e hihi mulusngin sinsin ko ung, u wet pi men kumang tin to po wilip men kut tumen kha men.
58001011	Wet pi to mulus men kuli om ako, si ngon men ku in tumen li kut. Endara tin mosop imen kuli ko lengwal ken moolngin tin po phini nuk po sun men pon kho ta,
58001012	ma ngon ku mol mol i ken endara tin po pang po hi epon men ta, ma men ku phae i si pon enginin tawe. Si ngon men ku iso in tumen li kut, ma posan tap kuli li put mih angan akomen.”
58001013	Si tihngin tin akani e ku Got wo tan angan ta kho taku, “E ko ung ewo wili ngo tin eronin men li pol minan tin kuli nga wa po tin nolo ngon men me sup wet khip ken po e ehus ta khip ta men,” ti? Awu. Men pi engun.
58001014	Iyi, tihngin mosop men emiunan tin Got tirih hi li pol epon ku kum ta po tin kuli iso pakuh pongin epo hi tin ku palolongin men ako, wah?
58002001	Epo wungin sinsin tin imen men tunus epo wungin tin it hul i kho men kha ku it hul i tunus weh homani men, epon akuli it mang mang tan ken naak tin muu li yanga wiu men engun.
58002002	Epo sakalngin tin pok putngin mi wo po tihngin kho men men ko pit nhing, ma wungin mosop tin po ku hul wet som si po hik put engun men men ku po wa wungin emhut sun tin imen siik weh ako.
58002003	Tumen ma taku wetpo it wa sakalngin tin ku it palolongin epon men tin e nhum tumen, tin in ewo maran ma pok putngin si mi wo yang tin Akono men, anima po tin hul yang men kakaek siin si ta it, men kuli it yek ta mumhek mingin tin ta Got men tua?
58002004	Epo sakalngin tin imen Got tuon nhio won epo tosukngin u wungin tin po teret won men, u wungin tin to kakhangin e maran kiring kiring men u talungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men kara kut tumen, men yang ira min weh kha yang ning i tumen.
58002005	Epo Got ku wa elup tin ku iso si wo mulus men, tin pim a sakal epon men, kuli sup wet wili po tihngin akomen. Awu.
58002006	Si po ta pok put wungin mi Kisang Auluungin put ta in taku, “Po tunus men tunia weh ma tulup hu pit po hi men, u wiru po tunus men ara weh ma silap khing pit pon kut tumen?
58002007	E ning po tunus osong ko kuk wet po tihngin kiak kara, ma e pa mool po tunus mhi hi epo moolngin u po tin ya hi pos men kut tumen, ma e wa po si nhum epo endara mosop tin to po wilip men.
58002008	E wa endara mosop me sup wet khi po.” Epo Got tin wa endara mosop me sup wet po men, men ku yang mang ta endara tin ku me sup wet po men ta ku in akomen. Takuma homani men ku it ion endara mosop me sup wet po kho akomen. Awu.
58002009	Si it ion yang tin Got wai ko in wet po tihngin osong ko in kiak kara men, men a-Yesus ako, tin Got pa mool po yang epo moolngin u yan pos kut tumen epon tin yang wuh hunngin kho men, tumen kumali nanaangin tin ta Got men kha ku yang tong hunngin mut eya po tunus mosop men.
58002010	Epo Got men sinsin epo endara mosop u endara mosop men to po wili yang misan kut tumen, ma taku yang taku tet husanin munuman weh li sup mi moolngin, men wungin nuk tunus to yang tin wungin tan in tumen epo yang ku ning sun tin sinsin epo palolongin tin ta hi men ku si pyu pongin weh epo wungin tin yang wuh i men.
58002011	Epo yang tin ning i ma po si auluungin men u po tin yang ning hi si auluungin men kut tumen mosop si sinsin then, tumen ma wungin sinsin tin imen kha ku yang manngin wan som epo yang tin ku wo epo po men ehuro hi men,
58002012	wala yang sakal nuk ti, “Ngo ku pok put yap si ta po tin ehurok men. Mi po tin palu wal men ku nga lut lutngin tin wa yap si men lunga po.”
58002013	Kuru yang sakal kyok taku, “Ngo men ku wa wo phepngin ta ngo pit wo Got,” kuru yang sakal angan ta kyok ti, “Nga in iyi to husanik tin Got wai si ta ngo men.”
58002014	Tumen ma husanin tin klap wal to emali hi u kalolwa hi kut tumen tin then men, tumen kha yang tuon klap po ton maksin kut tumen, kumali hunngin kha ku yang mhuk emiun tin kasum wo phepngin tin ta hunngin men epon men, men emiun tin hik put wungin pit po po nginangan men ako.
58002015	Ma soput tin imen kha ku yang plos po tin kuk wo mulus ma lemngin tin pit wo hunngin men kan kan po kokyok kokyok ken po tin kum wet wili sun engun men li wo hi pias epon men.
58002016	Epon men irawin, epo yang ku nhio wo po tihngin akomen, si yang men nhio wo po tin khuuknginin ta Abraham men weh ako.
58002017	Tumen ma endara mosop men ku yang weh si kai po tin ehuro hi men, kuma yang si po tin kum auluungin ta Got e si nhum epo sun kara men ta tin in to min sukngin u wungin anuh kut tumen epo kumang tin nuk epo Got men, kumali yang ning talungin tin ku yang kiis i mut eya po masang to sun wala to lasin tin ta hi men.
58002018	Epo yang tuon tin karongngin si tan minan tin yang wuh won maikngin men, sinsin tin imen kha li yang kakha epo yang ku nhio wo po tin karongngin si ta hi kokyok kokyok men.
58003001	Tumen ma, ehurok, wom tin auluungin men, wom tin klap wal to yukngin tin me ko ili wet pi men to po kara men, tulu wom hu pit po yang tin Paengin u tin kum auluungin ta Got e nhum epo sun kara men kut tumen, tin it pok put sakalngin epo yang yan men, men Krais Yesus ako.
58003002	Yang men weh pit nhing to wo phepngin tan tin pit wo sun tin won ung wo yang men, ken a-Moses tin pit nhing to wo phepngin tan lunga po mosop tin hi khuuk wal mi mang ta Got men.
58003003	Epo yang tin imen men Got ion i ken i e tunus epon ku wa moolngin nhum epo sun tin ta a-Moses men, men ira moolngin tin po tin ning mang men ya hi pos weh epo mang tuon ewin men siik.
58003004	Epo mang mosop men po ta kha ning i men ako, si po ta tin ning endara mosop men men Got.
58003005	Ma men irawin epo a-Moses men in to wungin tin yang ira sakalngin ta Got nginangan men ma yang ning kumang mi mang tin ta Got men ken po tin kum ta sun men ta, epon men ku tosukngin epo sakalngin tin ku iso pok putngin si silung men.
58003006	Si Krais men maran pit wo mang tin tan tuon men epon tin Got Wirun weh men. Epo it kha po tin khuuk wal mi mang tin ta yang men, men tin taku it kasum wo phepngin u hoo mingin tin it wangan po it ton men kut tumen pip weh li pol mi elup tin weh li ponsol men.
58003007	Sinsin tin imen wala Emiun Auluungin wo taku, “Homani kut, men taku wom ku hul wut Got,
58003008	men ku mi wom khang ken po tin wetpo hi wa wungin tin ta Got men mi elup tin po karong Got pi tin tahunggu men asin.
58003009	Men pi tin po tin yau a wom siin men karong ngo epon men, men po taku ion mi wungin ta ngo, aku, po mara hi kon kumang tin nga ning ning i men to posan khum mnal kho li kut.
58003010	Tumen ma mi ngo mokongin pit wo po tin ung e khuuk wal mi elup tin imen, ma nga wo ti, ‘Po tin imen ek ek mi sakalngin epo mi hi kokyok kokyok weh ma po ku ion soput tin ta ngo men kara kho akomen.’
58003011	Tumen ma ya ngo sal ma nga tung tung taku, ‘Po men ku li sup mi pi tin epo nhingngin tin ta ngo men angan akomen.’”
58003012	Ehurok, wom men ku haum tunus, epon akuli po ta wom ta wungin lengwal si min ma ku won nuk wet sakalngin ta Got som, si wetpon wa Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men.
58003013	Si wom men ku wo nut wal weh to ungunan then then minan tin to elup tin po iso wo epon ‘Homani’ men, epon akuli po ta wom ta lasin ek ek min ma timen ning i ma min khang.
58003014	Epo it men klap to Krais to po kara kho, men taku irawin epo it iso kasum wo phepngin tin wo it phep ton ewo maran men pip weh li pol minan tin kuli elup li ponsol epon men.
58003015	Wala po ta sakal ti, “Homani kut, men taku wom ku hul wut Got, men ku mi wom khang ken wom tin mi wom khang kho minan tin wetpo wom wa sakalngin ta Got pi tin tahunggu men asin.”
58003016	Epo araling e hul ma wetpo hi wa wungin? Men po tin mosop e yok Isip me pol ma a-Moses muk hi me men ako, wah?
58003017	Kuru araling e Got min mokongin pit wo hi to posan tin khum mnal men? Men po tin ning lasin ma emkusi hi poplong ko pi tin tahunggu men ako, wah?
58003018	Kuru araling e Got tung tung epo hi ku li sup pi tin epo nhingngin e ta yang men akomen? Epon men po tin ku ira sakalngin tin ta yang men som men ako, wah?
58003019	Tumen ma it ion i epo po men khuk po engin epon takuli sup, sinsin epon tin po ku wo hi phep som men.
58004001	Sakalngin ta Got tin yang wo kuk mara po epo po tin ku li sup mi nhingngin tin ta yang men ta it ta men iso nuk ako, tumen ma it men ku lem, epon akuli po ta wom ta in ken i e yek ta wungin tin Got wo kuk mara it epon men.
58004002	Epon men irawin epo pok putngin tin tunus men men pok putngin si ta it maksin kut tumen ken po men ako. Takuma sakalngin tin po hul i men men ku nhio wo po som, epo po tin hul sakalngin men ku po hul i epo wo phepngin tin nau wal to sakalngin tin imen akomen.
58004003	Epo it tin wo it phep kho men kha li homani ma it li sup mi nhingngin tin imen ako, wala Got wo taku, “Ya ngo sal ma nga tung tung taku, ‘Po men ku li sup mi nhingngin tin ta ngo men akomen,’” aku, yang suuk sii kumang tin tan men kho nginan minan tin yang pho po mulus kho men ako.
58004004	Epo yang sakal mi Panngin Auluungin put ta epo ungunan tin me ponwal me sup angan men, men yang sakal ira wungin ti, “Ma Got nhing to ungunan tin me ponwal me sup angan men epo kumang mosop tin yang ning i men.”
58004005	Kuru panngin put tin iyi, men yang sakal kyok min ti, “Po men ku li sup mi nhingngin tin ta ngo men angan akomen.”
58004006	Wungin iso nuk epo po kara ku li sup, ma po tin sun pok put wungin si ta hi muk men ku li sup akomen, sinsin epon tin po wetpo hi wa sakalngin tin ta yang men kha men.
58004007	Tumen ma yang won ung wo ungunan ta kyok, men yang sakal mi wo a-Dewit taku, “Homani,” ti, si elup munuman mili kho, men ira sakalngin tin kho si muk tin wo taku, “Homani kut taku wom ku hul wut Got, men ku mi wom khang weh asin.”
58004008	Epon taku a-Yosua ani ku wa nhingngin si ta po kho men, men ku silung ma Got sakal kyok epo ungunan ta maksin akomen.
58004009	Tumen ma ungunan tin ku po nhing ton men ta iso nuk epo po masang to sun wala tin ta Got men ako.
58004010	Epo po ta tin kho li sup mi nhingngin tin ta yang men men tuon li nhing epo kumang tin tan men maksin kut tumen, ken Got tin kho ma yang nhing epo kumang tin yang ning i men.
58004011	Tumen ma it men ku tohuh weh kuma it li sup mi nhingngin tin imen weh, epon akuli po ta plong ko ira tosukngin tin kai wal to po tin wetpo hi wa sakalngin kho men.
58004012	Epo sakalngin tin ta Got men men to tunusngin u kakhangin kut tumen, ma men tongin weh epo bainat tin ngin nuk ponwal men, men tenek it weh li sup hang enu it u emiu it tumen tin lup wal men, u pokoi it tin sum sum wal men, u enghus sin kut tumen, men maran ples wungin tin nuk mi it men u wungin tin it nana i ta mi it epo it taku ning i men kut tumen weh.
58004013	Ma endara tin Got pho pon men ku ta kaun to mara yang angan akomen. Awu. Endara mosop men wiwil ma kuk pi mlaeng weh to mara yang tin ku it pok put sinsin tin it ning wungin mosop epon men si ta yang men.
58004014	Kut ma yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men tin kho li plek wet pi tin ung po al li si men men ta it ta in, men a-Yesus tin Got Wirun men. Tumen ma it men ku kasum wo phepngin tin it pok put men pip weh.
58004015	Epo yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun ta hi men tin ku min suk it tin wo it wiak epo wungin kara men som men ku ta it ta in tumen akomen, epo yang men karongngin maran kiring kiring si tan ken it men kho, takuma yang men in engun epo lasin.
58004016	Tumen ma it men ku li tikayung ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men tin ku it wa nanaangin epon men to mi it tin puplet men weh, kuma it wa min sukngin ma it pon ta nanaangin tin ku nhio wo it minan tin it kalwok men.
58005001	Epo po mosop then then tin nhum epo sun ta hi kara e hi kum auluungin men tin Got espo hi kara lunga sun tin tunus men, men Got won ung wo hi epon ku hi wa pi ta po tunus ma hi si ning kumang ta po tunus pit epo kumang tin nuk epo Got men, kumali po ning talungin kara kut u po lek li ken nginan kara ko huu tin ku mut eya lasin men kut tumen.
58005002	Po men ku ning i amang epo sun tin pong epo engin ma li kikin epo soput men engun, epo po tuo hi men in wet wili wungin tin po wo hi wiak epon men maksin kut tumen ako.
58005003	Epo wungin sinsin tin imen kha Got wo epo po men ku ning talungin tin ku hun mut eya lasin men, ma talungin tin po ning i mut eya po masang to sun wala men, tumen kut kha kuli po ning i epo po tuo hi maksin kut tumen.
58005004	Ma po tunus ta men ku wa kumang tin po ya hi pos ton men epo min engun akomen. Awu. Men po tin Got yuk hi men misa hi, ken sun tin kho ma Got yuk Aron men.
58005005	Tumen kut kha Krais ku wai tuon si pit kuma yang si po tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun ta hi kara men ta epo min engun akomen. Awu. Yang tin wo ta sun taku, “Ngon men Wiruk, homani kut ma nga khuuk ngon” ti, kha wa kumang si ta sun men.
58005006	Wala Got wo maksin mi kisang put enginin ta men taku, “Ngon men tin kum auluungin e ku in kokyok kokyok li kut pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek men ta ako,” ti.
