58005007	A-Yesus iso in wo mulus ma yang pok put kinesngin kara u yang hau si wo Got to haungin kara pit ili awon weh u to tinisngin kara kut tumen li epo Got tin apalukngin epon ku palolo yang epo hunngin men, ma Got hul wet yang epon tin yang uluu sun men ako.
58005008	Aku, yang men Got Wirun weh ako, takuma yang urut wungin tin ku yang hul wet wungin nginangan men epo won maikngin tin yang wuh i men.
58005009	Ma yang urut wungin tin ku yang hul wet wungin nginangan men li pyu pongin weh kut, anima yang si sinsin epo palolongin tin sindak men epo po mosop tin hul wet wungin ta yang men.
58005010	Epo kho men Got yuk yang epo yang ku si ken po tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun ta hi kara men “pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek e yang kum auluungin min men” ta.
58005011	A-Melkisedek tin imen men pim a kuk to wungin munuman epon, takuma khung nginan epo pim tin ku ples wom epon sinsin men, sinsin epon tin kinga wom si pere men.
58005012	Epo wom men si wo wom phep kho, tumen ma tunus epo homani men ku wom si ken po tin kot sun nginangan men kho ako. Takuma awu, wom men ku iso kuk e kaeng po ta tin ku me kot wom epo wungin sinsin tin me pol mi wo Got e li muk epo sun kara men. Ma wom men kho si ken po hoin tin hing wo esus men ako, si wom ku ii enda aiingin tin po koklong men kho akomen.
58005013	Epo po mosop tin ku iso susus misan men, men ku wo hi po elel to sakalngin tin siik men pok put nginan akomen, epon men hi iso hoin engun.
58005014	Si endara aiingin tin po koklong men men ta po tin si nonomuru kut men, men po tin urut wungin kho epo po ku mara hi ples wungin tin tunus men weh u tin lengwal men weh kut tumen.
58006001	Tumen ma it men ku mang ta kotngin sinsin tin epo Krais men tin li muk epo sun men, ma it tohuh epo it men ku si nomuru weh. Si it kuk aku it hihi enah tin ku kotngin si po sun men kara kyok epo it tin ku phae mi it epo kumang ning nginan tin li epo hunngin men u epo wungin tin ku wo it phep pit wo Got men,
58006002	u epo kotngin tin pit epo baptais maran kiring kiring men, u epo po wili hi tin si nuk po sun men, u epo po tin huhu kho e ku kekhek kyok si men, u epo ples walngin tin sindak men kut tumen asin.
58006003	Ma wungin tin imen men ku pim a ning i ako, tin taku Got mang ta pim men ku pim a ning i tumen.
58006004	Epon men khung nginan weh epo po tin ungunan ta kho ma pi mha ko po hi, u tong talungin tin api wet pi men, u klap to po tin hi wa Emiun Auluungin men,
58006005	u tong sakalngin tin tunusan e ta Got men u tong kakhangin tin ta elup tin ku iso si men kut tumen,
58006006	li ma taku po wetpo hi wa wungin, men wungin maran ko klat weh epo po tin ku kyok me phae mi hi kyok men. Epo po men poo poo Got Wirun si kuk put sa wlong putwal to hut hi kyok kha men, ma po ning i ma manngin ko po yang pi mlaeng.
58006007	Epo mulusngin tin pi yung me ko yangan ma um i kokyok kokyok men li ma endara poplok si turunus won tin ku nhio wo po tin khung po engin epon ku wha endara epon men, kha mulusngin timen wa emhong tin me hang Got men epon men ako.
58006008	Si taku mulusngin pho po elik tin ngin si si put sun men u wongin kara kut tumen, men mulusngin timen men ku tunus epo po ku wha endara won akomen, men tikayung epo po ku wa ngilngin ko pon, men nuk won li klet, anima po sut i.
58006009	Si wom tin mi pim pit wo wom weh men, aku, pim a sakal tin tumen, takuma wo pim phep epo wungin tunus epo sun tin iyi ku iso si epo wom ako, men tin klap to wungin tin po palolongin epon men.
58006010	Epo Got men ku ples wungin lengwal ewin som kuma yang tulun som epo kumang tin ta wom men, tin wom wuh i pi mlaeng to min epongin tin pit wo yang yan men, tin wom nhio wo po tin auluungin men kho u wom iso kuk e nhio wo po iso men kut tumen akomen.
58006011	Ma mi pim weh epo wom mosop then then ku tohuhngin ta wom men ku si in pi mlaeng, kumali mi wom tin ku pit nhing wo hoo mingin men ku klet mi wom weh li pol to elup tin ku li ponsol men.
58006012	Epon akuli wom mayongngin, si wom men ku ira wungin pit mina po tin sup mi wo phepngin ma wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak kha kuli po wa pakuh pongin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men.
58006013	Epo minan tin Got wo kuk mara Abraham kho men, men ku po ta in akandira ku si nhum epo yang kuma yang tung tung i som, tumen ma yang tung tung i yan tuon,
58006014	ma yang sakal taku, “Ngo ku wa emhong ko po ngon, men ku nga ning wungin tin imen weh, u nga ning i ma po tin khuuknginin tap men ku si munuman kara kut, men ku nga ning i weh kut tumen ako.”
58006015	Ma wungin tin tumen kha Abraham in e wuh i li koho, anima yang wa endara tin Got wo kuk mara yang epon koho men.
58006016	Epo po masang to sun wala ku tung tung, men ku po tung tung endara ta tin nhum epo po men ewin ako. Ma tung tungngin ta tin ku po kaek wungin epon men, kha heek walngin mosop tin si lunga po men hik putngin epon men.
58006017	Tumen kut kha Got taku suk mara po tin ku wa pakuh pongin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men si in pi mlaeng weh epo wungin tin yang nana i ta min tin ku yang phae kyok som men, men yang kakaek i epo tung tungngin ta,
58006018	kumali wungin ponwal tin yang ku phae ewin som men, tin maran ko klat weh epo Got tin ku torok epon men, kha ku wo phepngin ta it weh pit nhing epon men, men it tin mhup li kakaun kumali it kasum hoo mingin tin Got wai ko nuk maran min it men.
58006019	Hoo mingin tin imen it kuk ton ken anka tin kasum imut ung men ta, tin enu it kasum i ma weh pit nhing ton men, men hoo mingin ta tin wungin tan maran ko klat weh u pit nhing weh kut tumen, men wa it weh li sup mi mang emin tin ung wetpo mulu tin ut mang auluungin men.
58006020	Men pi tin yang tin li muk it men kho li sup epon ku yang nhio wo it men, men a-Yesus, tin kho ma si wa kumang tin ku yang si nhum epo po kara ma yang kum auluungin epon pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek e yang kum auluungin min men.
58007001	Epo a-Melkisedek tin imen men sinkhaung epo pi Salem u tin kum auluungin ta Got tin Sinkhaung Weh men kut tumen, tin me tut Abraham tin li lek po tin sinkhaung men, yang kyok me ma a-Melkisedek wa emhong ko po Abraham.
58007002	Li klet ma Abraham ko pok pok mi endara mosop tin yang espon mi lek walngin men ko maran min eip ponwal, ma yang wai maran min ta si ta sun maksin kut tumen, men yang tin ewo maran ma yan sinsin men si in taku, “Sinkhaung epo wungin tin siik men,” ti, anima yang yan ta maksin men sinkhaung epo pi Salem, men sinsin taku, “Sinkhaung epo wungin aminis,” ti.
58007003	Yang tin imen men wiraman pi om, u tonin pi om, u po tin ung e khuuk wal me kuk yang men pi om, u ungunan tin yang ko in ton men pi om u elup tin ku yang tunus in ton men ku li ponsol som men kut tumen, si men in ken yang tin Got Wirun men kha yang in ken po tin kum auluungin men ta kokyok kokyok li kut men.
58007004	Homani ma tulu wom hu yang tin yan pos weh imen, men tin wala Abraham tin yau a it sin men, aku, yang men nhum, takuma yang kut men pok pok mi endara tin yang espon men ko maran min eip ponwal ma yang wai maran min ta si ta sun a-Melkisedek men!
58007005	Ma irawin epo po tin khuuknginin ta a-Liwai men tin wa kumang tin ku po kum auluungin epon men, kha wungin sinsin ta nuk epo hi ku wa endara maran min mi sun tin eip ponwal men ta yanga wili po masang to sun wala ira wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men, men po tin ehuro hi men kha men, aku, po tin imen khuuknginin ta Abraham maksin kut tumen ako.
58007006	Si a-Melkisedek tin ku hi khuuk wal som men, men wa endara maran min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men hang Abraham men ma yang wa emhong ko po sun tin in to wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men ako.
58007007	Iis, ma ku it ion i epo po ta tin wa emhong ko po sun ta men kha nhum epo po tin wa emhong hang sun men ako, men po tin ku sakal ewut sakalngin tin imen ku ta in akomen. Awu. Men pi engun.
58007008	Po Liwai tin wa endara maran min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men hang sun tin iyi men hi huu ewin. Si a-Melkisedek tin wa endara maran min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men hang Abraham men, men yang ta tin wungin pok putngin epon kha ku weh iso in li kut men.
58007009	Men maran ken a-Liwai tin wa endara maran min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men men yang tuon kul a-Melkisedek epo endara maran min ta yanga wili Abraham.
58007010	Epo a-Liwai men ku khuukngin kho som, si yang iso in mi mulu tin ta yauan sin Abraham men minan tin a-Melkisedek me tut Abraham men ako.
58007011	Tumen ma taku po tin kum auluungin e a-Liwai khuuknginin men ani taku po masang to sun wala si tunus weh epo kumang ta hi men (epo wet wili po tin imen kha po masang to sun wala wa wungin sinsin epo hi men ako), taku tuni ma po iso kaeng po tin kum auluungin enginin ta tin ku iso si pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek men, si ku po sikian yan pit mina hihingin tin ta Aron men ta akomen?
58007012	Epon taku po tin kum auluungin e hi khuuk wal men wiewi al, men wungin nuk epo wungin sinsin men ku wiewi al maksin kut tumen ako.
58007013	Epo a-Yesus tin sakalngin timen los pon men men me mi khuuknginin enginin ta, ma mi khuuknginin tin imen ku ta kum wo suyung tin ta Got men kho ewin akomen.
58007014	Epo wungin in pi mlaeng epo yang tin Akono ta it men men si mi po tin a-Yuda khuuknginin men ako. Epo po Yuda tin imen ku a-Moses sakal epo hi ta men ku si po ta tin ku kum auluungin men akomen.
58007015	Kuru wungin in pi mlaeng weh tin taku po homan ta ken a-Melkisedek men si kum auluungin men, tin kho me,
58007016	men ku me ira hihingin ta wungin sinsin tin wo epo po ku ko khuukngin mi khuuknginin ta men akomen, si men me epo kakhangin tin ta tunusngin tin kuli pi om ewin som men.
58007017	Epo Got pok put wungin ta nuk taku, “Ngon men tin kum auluungin e ku in kokyok kokyok li kut pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek men ta ako.”
58007018	Epo wungin tin imen wala nuk ti, epo wungin sinsin tin kho men men mili nuk woringin, epon men wiak wiak u men ku nhio wo po ta som kut tumen.
58007019	Epo wungin sinsin ani ku ning i ma endara ta si tunus weh men akomen. Si wungin tin iyi men in ti, epo hoo mingin tin tunus epo sun men homan ta me sup tin ku it li tikayung Got epon men.
58007020	Ma Got wo kho epo a-Yesus ku si kum auluungin, men ku yang wo engun som. Awu. Got men tung tung weh.
58007021	Epo po tin Aron hi tin si po tin kum auluungin men, men tung tungngin om epo hi. Si yang men si kum auluungin, men epo tung tungngin ta yang tin sakal ta sun men taku, “Yang tin Akono men tung tung kho ma men kuli yang ku phae sakalngin tan kyok akomen, ‘Ngon men tin kum auluungin e ku in kokyok kokyok li kut pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek men ta ako,’” ti.
58007022	Ma tung tungngin tin imen tin nhum weh epo sun men kha a-Yesus men si tosukngin ta tin kaek si tung tungngin tin tunus weh epo sun tin kho men kha men.
58007023	Kuru kho ma po tin kum auluungin men munuman kuk e wiewi al, epon tin hunngin klet epo hi tin ku si kuk e kum li kut men.
58007024	Si yang men sindak in kokyok kokyok li kut kha yang wa kumang tin yang kum auluungin tin ku po ta wiewi yang epon ewin akomen.
58007025	Tumen ma yang men kakha weh epo yang ku palolo po tin taku me tikayung Got epo yang men weh li po li palolongin weh, epo yang men sindak in kokyok kokyok epo yang ku in emin kuma yang kines Got nhio wo po weh.
58007026	Epo po ta tin kum auluungin tin in tumen kha tunus weh epon ku nhio wo it men, tin ku auluungin, u lasin om pon, u min yil weh, u in enginin weh epo po tin ning lasin nginangan men kut tumen, tin kho si in ili awon weh li ut po wet pi men.
58007027	Yang men ku wungin in epo yang ku ning talungin ungunan then then ken po tin kum auluungin kho men akomen, tin taku yang ning talungin mut eya yang tuon wet, anima yang ning talungin tin ku mut eya lasin ta po masang to sun wala men. Epo yang ning talungin tin imen angan then ta los po sun mosop kho kut minan tin yang tuon talu i tuon men.
58007028	Epo wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men men won ung wo po tin ku si kum auluungin tin nhum epo sun kara men tin wo hi wiak engun men. Si wungin tin Got tung tung epon weh men, tin me silung epo wungin sinsin men, men yang won ung wo Wirun tuon tin kho si in tunus weh in kokyok kokyok li kut men.
58008001	Kut ma sakalngin tin pim a sakal epon iyi men sakalngin mhin wala ti, po ta tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men tin in tumen men ta it ta in, men kho li ung ewo wili ehus tin ta yang tin Sinkhaung weh e in ili wet pi men wilin tin ato sa men,
58008002	men po ta tin kum auluungin mi mang emin tin auluungin weh men, men mang ausel tin irawin weh e yang tin Akono men tuon ning i si men, si ku po tunus ta ning i akomen.
58008003	Epo po mosop tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men men Got won ung wo hi epo po ku tet talungin kara u lek li ken nginan kara ko huu wo suyung kut tumen. Tumen ma wungin men ku weh nuk epo yang tin imen ku in to talungin ta tin ku yang wai si men maksin kut tumen ako.
58008004	Epon taku yang in wo mulus, men ku yang si ken po tin kum auluungin men ta akomen, epo po tin kum auluungin e hi ning talungin ira wungin sinsin men kara men kho kuk kut ako.
58008005	Po tin imen tin kum mi mang tin tosuk to sun e enun kai sun tin ung ili wet pi men, tin wala Got panen a-Moses epon minan tin yang taku hosi mang ausel ning nginan men. Epo yang wo ta sun taku, “Ngon men ku marap pit tunus weh epo ngon tin ku ning endara mosop ira sun enun tin nga suk marap epon kho po pi emian men.”
58008006	Kut si homani men yang wa kumang tin tunus weh epo sun tin po wa kumang epon kho men, sinsin epon tin yang e po ta tin kum auluungin e tunus weh epo sun tin kho men, epon men kaekngin ko ung wo wungin kara tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men tin tunus weh epo sun tin kho men.
58008007	Epon taku wungin siin tin kakaekngin nuk lunga Got to po tunus muk men ku wungin om epon, men ku sinsin om epo po tin ku langun epo wungin siin tin kakaekngin nuk lunga Got to po tunus men ta tin taku me ponwal angan men ako.
58008008	Epo Got wa lasin ko po po masang to sun wala wala yang wo ti, “Yang tin Akono men pok put wungin taku, ‘Wom hul, epo elup ta ku iso me, men ku nga kakaek wungin siin homan ta ko nuk lunga ngo to po tin hi khuuk wal Israel men u to po tin hi khuuk wal Yuda men kut tumen iso,
58008009	men ku ken sun tin nga kaek i ko nuk lunga ngo to po tin yau a hi siin men minan tin nga yak yak po wili po ma nga muk po me pol wo mulusngin Isip men akomen; epo po men ku iso ira wungin siin ta ngo tin kaekngin nuk lunga pim men som, tumen kha wetpo ngo wa po men.’ Yang tin Akono men wala sakal tumen.
58008010	‘Epo wungin siin tin kuli nga kaek i ko nuk lunga pim po Israel tin ung e khuuk wal men to elup tin ku si silung epo sun tin imen wala ti: ngo ku wa wungin ta ngo sinsin ko nuk mi tulun hungin ta po, u nga pan i ko nuk ewhat po kut tumen; ma nga si Got ta po u po si masang to sun wala tin ta ngo weh men kut tumen.’ Yang tin Akono men wala sakal tumen.
58008011	‘Ma po ta hi ta ku kot sun tin hi ung then men wa hi khuuk wal men wa tumen ma po wo taku, “Ngon men ku hop yang tin Akono men weh,” ti akomen, epo po mosop men ku hop ngo weh, hosingin epo po tin ya hi om weh men ma weh li pol epo po tin ya hi pos weh men.
58008012	Epo ngo ku mi ngo suk po epo wungin tin po wetpo hi wa wungin tin siik men, ma lasin ta po u wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men kut tumen men ku tulu ngo hu i kyok akomen.’”
58008013	Sakalngin tin Got wo taku, “Wungin tin kaekngin nuk lunga pim e homan men,” ti, men yang ning i ma wungin tin kaekngin nuk lunga po muk men ko kumang tan om kut ako. Ma endara tin ko kumang tan om ma si kho kut men men sakalngin hihingin nuk epon men ku om kut ako.
58009001	Si men irawin epo wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to po masang to sun wala Israel muk men men wungin sinsin tan kara nuk tin ku po ning kumang auluungin epon men, kuru men nuk epo mang tin auluungin e ung wo mulus men kut tumen ako.
58009002	Epo kho men mang ausel ta men hihingin si ung, men emin tin nuk muk men esul khin to suyung tin beret tin yasngin nuk pi mlaeng to mara Got nuk won men mosop men pit min, men mang emin tin po sikian auluungin men;
58009003	kuru wetpo mulu tin ut eya mang e me ponwal angan men men mang ausel emin ta maksin ung, tin po sikian Mang Emin tin Auluungin weh epo sun kara men,
58009004	tin suyung golan tin to endara tin kuin nginan e ipek tunus men u wunwun tin to wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to po masang to sun wala e gol lalapatngin nuk porilin mosop men kut tumen, tin timro golan tin mana ko min men u kamdukngin tin ta Aron e enun plok si si put sun men, u enah tin ponwal e yangan pias e wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to po masang to sun wala men panngin nuk yangan men kut tumen pit min men;
58009005	kuru ili mara wunwun tin imen men tihngin serabim enun ponwal tin haum eya moolngin ta Got men enu ngong ko hawus wunwun maran kut tumen. Endara tin mosop imen ku homani ma pim a tak tak sanga sakalngin munuman weh epon akomen.
58009006	Kut ma endara tin mosop imen hihingin nuk tumen kho, men po tin kum auluungin men li sup sumsum mi mang emin tin ung maran min men, ma po ning kumang auluungin tin ta hi men.
58009007	Si mang emin tin me ponwal angan men men yang tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men misan kha li sup min angan then ta mi posan then then men, men ku yang li sup engun som, si yang men ku wa li ken nginan kalolwan weh, tin ku yang ning talungin epo yang tuon u epo lasin ta po masang to sun wala kut tumen tin po pong epo engin ma po ning i men;
58009008	Emiun Auluungin taku suk mara it epo wungin tin ti, epo soput tin li sup mi mang emin tin auluungin weh men men ku pok putngin si in pi mlaeng kho minan tin mang emin tin ung ewo maran men iso ung men akomen.
58009009	Wungin tin imen men tosukngin ta, men los po elup tin po kuk kho ma po pok epon homani men, men elup tin endara tin po talu Got epon men u li ken nginan tin po talu Got epon men kut tumen po talu Got epon mi elup tin imen; mi talungin tin imen men khuk po engin weh epon ku ning po ta tin ning kumang auluungin tin imen wungin om min weh tin ples wungin tan tuon weh men;
58009010	talungin tin imen men silan khingngin pit epo endara aiingin kara u endara aumngin kara, u khis pongin maran kiring kiring kara, u wungin sinsin kara tin los po emkusin men kut tumen engun, men ko los po li pol minan tin kuli endara mosop tusngin kyok si nuk siik epon men.
58009011	Si Krais men me ken yang e po tin nhum epo sun kara e hi kum auluungin ta Got epo endara tin turunus e ku iso si silung men ta, men yang li sup mi mang ausel tin nhum u tunus weh epo sun tin kho men, tin ku ningngin epo po tunus wili hi som men, tin imen men sinsin ti, men ku ningngin epo endara tin Got pho pon wo mulus tin iyi men akomen.
58009012	Si meme kalolwan wa bulmakau asus kalolwan ani ku yang li sup ton men akomen. Awu. Yang kalolwan tuon kha yang li sup ton mi mang emin tin auluungin weh men angan then ta los po sun mosop, men yang tuon suuk sii kumang tin epo lasin kiis nginan men tin ku sindak nuk tumen kokyok kokyok li kut.
58009013	Epo bulmakau kalolwan u meme kalolwan u bulmakau asus ekasan tin pla ma pit men tin po tep tep i ko po sun tin po hi lengwal men men ning i ma po si po hi yil to mara Got,
58009014	ma taku wungin tumen, men wungin tin imen maran ko klat weh epo kalolwa Krais tin min alang siin tuon si ta Got epo Emiun tin sindak men to pon tin muuk muuk men kha ku khis mi wom tin ples wungin taku i e tunus wa lengwal wa tumen epo tohuhngin maran kiring kiring tin li epo hunngin men, kumali wom kum ta Got tin in kokyok kokyok men weh.
58009015	Ma wungin sinsin tin imen kha yang si po tin in emin Got to po tunus to wungin homan tin kaekngin nuk lunga hi men, men si epo hunngin ta yang, epon ku wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin wet wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to po muk men ku kiisngin, kumali po tin Got yuk hi men ku wa pakuh pongin tin sindak e Got wo kuk mara po kho epon men.
58009016	Epon taku po ta pok put min ko nuk yanga kisang epon ku pakuh po sun ta epo endara kara, men wungin weh nuk epon ku hun kho wet khama sun wai kha men.
58009017	Epo wungin siin tin po tunus kaek i nuk lunga hi kara men ta, ku po tin imen hun weh, anima sinsin iis kha men, epon taku po tin hihi wungin men iso tunus in, men ku sinsin iis akomen. Awu. Men pi engun.
58009018	Wala wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to po muk men men ku siin iis engun akomen. Awu. Li ken nginan kalolwan yukngin ko kho wet, anima wungin timen siin iis kha men.
58009019	Epo a-Moses suuk sii wungin sinsin mosop pok put nginan si ta po masang to sun wala mosop ira wungin sinsin li klet, anima yang wa bulmakau asus u meme kut tumen kalolwan to eki kara, u sipsip yut tin po mhee men, u sa hisop kut tumen, ma yang tep tep i ko po kisang tuon u ko po po masang to sun wala mosop kut tumen,
58009020	ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Kalol tin kakaek wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to wom men tin Got wo maran ko klat ta wom kho epon men wala iyi.”
58009021	Li klet ma yang ira wungin tin imen kyok ma yang tep tep kalol ko po mang ausel u endara mosop tin pit mi mang e po kum ta Got epon men maksin kut tumen.
58009022	Iis, epo wungin tin ira wungin sinsin men men tikayung epo endara mosop kha kalol ning i ma si pon yil to mara Got men, ma taku kalol ku yukngin ko som, men ku lasin klokngin akomen.
58009023	Tumen ma wungin weh nuk kho epo endara tin nuk ili wet pi men enun tin ko nuk mulus men ku li ken nginan kalolwan ning i si pon yil to mara Got weh, si endara tuon tin nuk ili wet pi men men ku talungin tunus ta weh epo sun tin imen kha ku enda tin mosop imen weh si pon yil to mara Got epon men.
58009024	Epo Krais men ku kho li sup mang emin tin auluungin e po tunus ning i epo wili hi men, tin enun engun epo sun tin irawin weh men akomen. Awu. Yang men siik li si wet pi, kuma homani ma yang si pol to mara Got epon ku nhio wo it.
58009025	Epo yang ku li sup wet pi epon ku yang talu i tuon in kokyok kokyok ken po tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men ning i ewin ma po li sup mang emin tin Auluungin Weh men to posan then then to kalol tin enginin enginin men akomen --
58009026	epon taku wungin nuk tumen, men ku wungin weh nuk epo Krais men ku wuh wungin kokyok kokyok ewo maran tin mulus pho pongin ma ung e me men; takuma awu, angan then ta to elup tin ku me ponsol iyi kut i kha yang si put plo nginan epon ku yang klok lasin epo talungin tin yang tuon min alang siin tuon men.
58009027	Ma wungin men hihingin nuk epo po mosop men ku huu angan then ta, anima ples walngin si,
58009028	tumen kut kha Krais si talu i angan then ta epon ku lat lasin ta po munuman epon men. Ma po tin kuk e hoo mi hi epo yang tin ku kerek e me men kha kuli yang si plo nginan ta hi angan ta kyok men, men ku yang lat lasin kyok akomen, si epon ku yang palolo po.
58010001	Epo wungin sinsin men tosukngin enun engun epo endara tin turunus e ku iso me men, si ku endara tin tuon imen enun weh akomen, tumen ma men khuk po engin weh epon ku talungin tin tuon imen, tin po talu i kokyok kokyok to posan then then men ani ku ning i ma po tin taku me kuk enu mara Got men si tunus weh to mara Got epon men angan akomen.
58010002	Epon taku talungin tin imen ku ning po si tunus weh tumen, men ku po talu i kokyok kokyok akomen ako, wah? Epo po tin ku me talu Got men, taku angan then ta misan ma po si mi hi yil weh kut, timen ku po tulu hi hu lasin ta hi kyok akomen.
58010003	Takuma awu. Talungin tin imen tak tulu po epo lasin tin ta hi men to posan then then ako.
58010004	Epo wungin maran ko klat weh epo bulmakau to meme kalolwan tin ku klok lasin men.
58010005	Tumen ma minan tin Krais me in wo mulus men yang wo taku, “Li ken nginan tin lekngin ko huu mut eya lasin u talungin kut tumen men ku mip epon weh akomen, si e hihi ngo emkusin ta ngo ta kho.
58010006	Epon kho men talungin tin yau suuk siin ii nginan men u tin epo lasin klok nginan men tumen men ku mip tunusngin epon akomen.
58010007	Li klet ma nga sakal taku, ‘Aluuh, Got, e ion i, epo nga kho me kut (epon men sakalngin panngin nuk epo ngo mi kisang tin molngin men) epon ku nga ning wungin tin nuk na mi ngon men.’”
58010008	Si muk ma yang wo taku, “Li ken nginan tin lekngin ko hu mut eya lasin men u talungin maran kiring kiring u talungin tin yau suuk siin ii nginan men u talungin tin epo lasin klok nginan men kut tumen men ku mip epon weh som, kuru ngon ku mip saah pit pon som kut tumen,” ti, epon tin imen ningngin ira wungin sinsin ako,
58010009	li klet anima yang wo taku, “Imen, epo nga kho me kut epon ku nga ning wungin tin nuk ta mi ngon men kut khae,” ti. Iis, yang klok wungin tin me in muk men li, si kuma yang wai tin me ponwal angan men si nuk nhing kha men.
58010010	Wungin tin nuk ta mi Got imen kha it si auluungin epon epo a-Yesus Krais emkusin tin talungin angan then ta los po sun mosop men.
58010011	Si po mosop tin kum auluungin men kuk e ning kumang ta hi ungunan then then kokyok kokyok ma po ning talungin tin maran ken wal imen sumsum, takuma talungin tin imen ku klok lasin angan akomen.
58010012	Si yang tin tunus men men ning talungin then ta misan epon ku mut eya lasin in kokyok kokyok li kut, anima yang si ung ewo wili Got wilin tin ato sa men,
58010013	si elup tin mut eya sun men yang ung e kaeng li pol minan tin kuli po tin nolo yang men iso me sup wet khi yang men.
58010014	Epo talungin then ta misan kha yang ning po masang to sun wala tin hi si auluungin men tunus weh epon men men ku po kuk tumen kokyok kokyok li kut.
58010015	Kuru Emiun Auluungin men nhio wo sun ma yang pok put wungin epo it maksin kut tumen. Epo kho ma yang wo taku,
58010016	“Wungin siin tin ngo ku wai ko nuk lunga ngo to po mi elup tin si silung epo sun tin imen wala ti: ngo ku wa wungin sinsin tin ta ngo men ko nuk mi po mi hi, u nga pan i ko nuk mi tulun hungin ta po kut tumen.” Yang tin Akono men wala wo tumen.
58010017	Li klet anima yang wo ta maksin kyok taku, “Ngo ku tulu ngo hu pit po lasin ta po u wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men kut tumen angan ta kyok akomen.”
58010018	Ma taku Got klok lasin tin imen kho li, men ku po khung i epo po ku ning talungin tin ku klok lasin men ta kyok akomen.
58010019	Ehurok, it men ku mi it puplet epon ku it li sup Mang Emin tin Auluungin Weh men epo a-Yesus kalolwan,
58010020	epo soput homan ta tin li epo tunusngin e yang tak i ta it men, men it li yek ta mulu tin ut mi mang men ma it li sup, mulu tin imen, men los po yang emkusin kha men.
58010021	Kuru po ta tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men tin maran pit wo mang ta Got men men ta it ta in,
58010022	tumen ma it men ku me kuk enu mara Got to mi it tin wungin anuh misan nuk mi it men u to mi it tin nuk nhing wo wo phepngin tin klet mi it men tumen, men ku it me to mi it tin wa lasin ko po it ewin men tin Krais kalolwan tep tepngin ko pon kho ma ko min yil kut men u to po it tin khis pongin epo eki tin mi yil men kut tumen.
58010023	It men ku kasum hoo mingin ta it tin it pok put men pip weh, si it men ku mi it king king asin, epo yang tin wo kuk mara it men men in to wungin tan anuh misan.
58010024	Ma it men ku tulu it hu pit po al epo it tin ku seh po ewhat wal epo min epongin u wungin tin tunus men ning nginan men kut tumen,
58010025	si it kuk aku wetpo it wa wungin tin ku it me palu wal then epon men, ken po kara tin ning i ewin men, si it men ku kuk e pa nhing wal kokyok kokyok, ma it ion Ungunan tin imen tin ung e me enu mara it men, men ku it tohuh epo wungin tin imen weh.
58010026	Epon taku it kuk e ning lasin epo mi it weh mi khi it tin wa maran ekngin epo wungin tin irawin men, men ku talungin ta tin ku klok lasin ta maksin in akomen.
58010027	Awu. Hoo mingin to lemngin epo ples walngin tin ku iso si men, u yau tin tohuh epon ku ii endara men tin ku suuk sii po tin nolo Got men tumen.
58010028	Po ta tin wetpon wa wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men, ma taku wulong ponwal wa wuluk miuk tin mara ngyuk nuk pon men pok put, men ku po wini ko hun engun, si po ku mi hi suk i kyok akomen.
58010029	Si taku po ta sak po Got Wirun epo khin, ma wo epo yang kalolwan tin kaek wungin siin tin nuk lungan yang to Got e yang si auluungin epon men ken i e amironnginan engun men, ma mimi Emiun tin min sukngin ko tan epon men, men wom phaeng taku yang tin imen kuli wa mumhek mingin tua, epon men ku iso wai nhum weh epo sun tin po tin wetpo hi wa wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men wai men ako, wah?
58010030	Epo it pon ta yang tin wo taku, “Wungin emhut sun men kumang ta ngo weh, ma ngo ku ning i emhut sun ako,” kuru yang wo angan ta maksin taku, “Yang tin Akono men kha ku ples wungin ta po masang to sun wala tin tan men ako,” ti, kut tumen.
58010031	Lemngin wini epon tin taku po ta plong ko nuk yanga wili Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men.
58010032	Si tulu wom hu epo ungunan kara tin kho li men, tin esul ngin ngin ko po wom kho, anima wom khung wet maikngin nunhum kara ma wom nuk nhing wet weh,
58010033	tin minan kara ma po wa wom si po mimi wom u po ning wom lengwal to mara po masang to sun wala pi mlaeng, u minan kara kyok men wom si tita wom po tin sun ning hi lengwal tumen epo hi men kut tumen.
58010034	Epo mi wom suk ngo to esih tin po koklong e po kan kan ngo epon men, ma po me sisne mi wom ma po kot endara ta wom li, men mi wom keh ma wom mang ta po ma po me ning i tumen engun, epo wom ion i epo moolngin tin tunus epo sun e ko pit hut wal ung e li kut men ta wom men pit ili wet pi kut.
58010035	Tumen ma wom men ku tep mi wo phepngin ta wom lu asin, epo wo phepngin tin imen kuli wom iso wa talungin nhum emhut i ako.
58010036	Epo wom men iso kalwok epo wom tin ku kuk to wungin tin ku wom nuk nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak epon men, kumali wom ning wungin tin nuk ta mi Got men kho kut, anima wom wa endara tin yang wo kuk mara wom epon kho men.
58010037	“Epo put monlo long anima yang tin ku iso me men me, si yang ku iak kyok akomen.
58010038	Si po ta tin wungin tan siik men men ku tunus in kokyok kokyok epo wo phepngin misan weh. Si taku po ta mikih kyok li, men ku mi ngo tunusngin pit pon akomen.”
58010039	Takuma it men ku pit mina po tin mikih kyok li ma huuspit men akomen. Awu. It men pit mina po tin wo hi phep li po enu hi palolongin men ako.
58011001	Epo wo phepngin men sinsin ti, epo wo it phep epo endara tin it hoo mi it epon men men ku weh si, u wo it phep epo endara tin ku mara it kon i som men men weh kuk kut tumen.
58011002	Epo wo phepngin kha po tin yau a it sin men wa ya hi tunus epon men.
58011003	Wo phepngin kha mara it ples sakalngin epo endara mosop tin nuk yanga pi sup e klet men men hihingin ut pi nuk epo sakalngin tin ta Got men, tumen ma endara tin mara it nuk pon men ani ku ningngin epo endara tin ku mara it kon i men akomen.
58011004	Wo phepngin kha Abel ning talungin ta li epo Got men, men talungin tunus ta epo sun tin ta a-Kain men, ma wo phepngin tin imen kha wungin pok putngin epo yang e wungin tan siik men, men Got pok put epo yang min tunusngin pit po talungin tin ta sun men; ma wo phepngin kha li yang hun kho, takuma yang iso pok put wungin epon men.
58011005	Wo phepngin kha a-Inok uusngin si kuma yang ion hunngin som men, “ma po ku pon ta yang kyok som, epo Got uus yang kho si kut; epo muk tin yang ku uusngin kho li si som men, men po pok put yang e Got min tunusngin pit pon weh.
58011006	Si taku wo phepngin pi om, men ku wungin maran ko klat weh epo po ta tin ku ning wungin ta tin ku Got min tunusngin pit pon men. Epo po ta ku me in enu mara Got, men ku won phep epo yang tin in men weh, ma yang men po ta tin in e emhut wungin tunus ta po tin tohuh epon ku pon ta yang men.
58011007	Wo phepngin kha Got anin wungin ko ta a-Noa epo wungin tin yang ku ion i kho som men, ma lemngin tin pit wo Got men pong si yang, ma yang hihi imut ta epon ku po tin hi khuuk wal men palolongin epon men; ma wo phepngin tin ta yang men kha yang wo los po po tin ung wo mulus men ma yang si po ta tin ku pakuh pongin epo wungin tin siik e me epo wo phepngin men.
58011008	Wo phepngin kha Abraham hul wet sakalngin tin Got yuk yang epo yang ku yok li pol pi tin kuli yang iso wai ken pi ta tin kuli Got pakuh po yang epon men. Ma yang li pol, men ku yang pon ta pi tin yang ku li epon men kho akomen.
58011009	Wo phepngin kha yang li ung wo mulusngin tin Got wo kuk mara yang epon men ken i e mulusngin ta po enginin ta engun men, ma yang ung mi mang ausel to Aisak ngong a-Yakop, tin ngyuk wa pakuh pongin to yang epo wo kuk marangin then ta men;
58011010	Epo yang in e kaeng epo enunu tin sinsin ung e Got maran iran ma yang ning i men.
58011011	Wo phepngin kha e-Sara tuon wa kakhangin epon ku kuman men, ma wut khuuk sun hoin ta minan tin wut hyangan weh men, epo wut maran ples wungin epo Got tin wo kuk mara wut men men to wungin anuh ako.
58011012	Tumen ma yang then ta tin in epon ku hun angan men, kha po munuman ko khuukngin mi won ken awheng tin nomoyong nuk ili wet pi men, u ken namak tin nuk suu wiu e ku it tiik i angan som men kut tumen.
58011013	Po tin mosop imen huu to wo phepngin ta hi, si po ku wa endara tin Got wo kuk mara po kho epon men akomen, si po nuk hin epon ma po mara hi li kon i nuk wo neringting ta, ma po wo hi nuk wet weh epon ku iso si enun ung hut, ma po wai to mi hi tin nawaehngin men, ma po pok put hi epo po men kuk ken po tin api enginin e nomisang e me kuk wo mulus engun men.
58011014	Epo po tin sakal tumen men pok put wungin pi mlaeng epo po kuk e langun epo mulusngin ta hi sinsin ta ako.
58011015	Ma taku irawin epo po tulu hi hu pit po mulusngin tin po yok won ma po me men, men ku pi put ek kara nuk tin ku po kyok li epon men ako.
58011016	Takuma awu. Homani ma po mi hi epo mulusngin tunus ta epo sun tin iyi, men tin api wet pi men ako. Tumen ma Got men ku manngin wan epo po tin ku sikia Got e ta po men akomen, epo yang men hihi enunu ta po ta kho kut.
58011017	Wo phepngin kha Got karong Abraham, minan tin yang wa Aisak si yang taku talu Got epo sun men, ma yang tin wa wo kuk marangin men men wa wirun tin maran then men si ken talungin ta,
58011018	wirun tin imen wala Got wo ta Abraham epon kho taku, “Aisak kha ku po sikia khuukngin tap ung pon men,” ti,
58011019	epo yang maran iran ta min epo Got men kakha epon ku khek yang kyok si tunus ako, aku yang li in mi po tin huu kho men, ma taku it sakal emol epon, men ken yang e wa wirun kyok me mi hunngin men ako.
58011020	Wo phepngin kha Aisak wa emhong ko po a-Yakop ngong a-Isau epo wungin tin ku iso si ta wulong silung men.
58011021	Wo phepngin kha a-Yakop ku hun angan, men yang wa emhong ko po a-Yosep husanin likiong, ma yang powut ko suul hut kamtukngin tin tan men ma yang wa Got yan si.
58011022	Wo phepngin kha a-Yosep ku hun angan, men yang tulun hu pit po po Israel tin kuli yok Isip li men, ma yang panen po epo yang pokoin.
58011023	Wo phepngin kha a-Moses ko khuukngin, men wulong tin khuuk yang men kaun yang to namih khaut miuk, epo wulong ion yang men pon kes epo po hoin kara, si wulong ku lem epo wungin tin yang tin sinkhaung men wai maran ko klat ma nuk men akomen.
58011024	Wo phepngin kha a-Moses si nomuru kut, men yang maran luun epo yang tin ku po sikia Parau erun wirun men,
58011025	epo yang min wawai epon men tunus epo yang ku wuh won maikngin to po masang to sun wala tin ta Got men, si taku yang in e min keh to min kehngin tin ta lasin e to elup tin maran orot engun men, men ku yang ion i ken i e tunus weh akomen,
58011026	epo yang ion mimingin tin ku yang wai to Krais men ken i e miranngin nhum ta epo sun tin po halung pon si po wal Isip men; epo yang ion wungin emhut sun tin tunus e ta yang men ung e hoh si kut.
58011027	Wo phepngin kha a-Moses wetpon wa pi Isip men, si yang ku lem pit wo yan salngin tin ta yang tin sinkhaung men akomen; epo yang men pit nhing li maran nomalak ken yang e maran nuk po yang tin ku mara it kon i ewin som men.
58011028	Wo phepngin kha a-Moses ira wungin tin epo Paska men u li ken nginan kalolwan tin tep tepngin men kut tumen, epon akuli tihngin tin ku me songhu pit wo po tin sun khuuk i muk men ku me ning wungin ta epo po akomen.
58011029	Wo phepngin kha po masang to sun wala hik put wiu tin mi mhee men ken po e li wo mulusngin tin maran ewin nuk men, si po Isip taku ning i ken sun tin imen, men po li um kawot ma po huu.
58011030	Wo phepngin kha enunu tin baul pi Yeriko men kukyumngin ko epon men mi khi po tin muk muk baul pi to ungunan ponwal me sup kho men.
58011031	Wo phepngin kha e-Rehap tin api put soput men ku huuspit to po tin ku wo hi phep som men akomen, epon tin wut wa wulong tin ku me waheking men to min wyungin men.
58011032	Si ngo ku sakal si nuk po sun tin imen tua? Epon taku nga iso pasik epo a-Gideon, u a-Barak u a-Samson u a-Yepta, kuru a-Dewit u a-Samuel u po pokngin kara maksin kut tumen, men kuli elup kara put li pit akomen.
58011033	Epo wo phepngin kha po tin imen wa enunu ta sun kara me sup wet po epon men, u po ning wungin tin sisiik men, u po wa wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men, u po ning i ma laion mosop won po maik epo li tin ku koh po men,
58011034	u po whus yau tin bing si men ko, u po meleng bainat tin tongin men, u po tin wiak wiak men si apalukngin, u po si nomnga mi lek walngin, u po ning i ma po nolo tin api enginin men mhup li yanga pi kut tumen.
58011035	Kuru po wala kara wa po tin ta hi e huu kho men, tin khekngin kyok si turunus men kyok me kuk to hi. Si po kara maksin men sun wa won manngin hambip si po hi kyok, epo po men ku mi hi nawaehngin epo hi tin ku li wo hi ek men akomen, kumali po kekhek kyok si wa tunusngin tin tunus weh epo sun men.
58011036	Si po kara men karongngin si ta hi tin sun ton mi hi u paplai hi men kut tumen, wai, men po kara men kan kanngin epo esih tin po koklong men ma po wa hi li wo hi maik hi mi mang kut tumen.
58011037	Kuru po kara men sun tup ewut hi epo enah, u po kara men sun wa aso ma po hik hik put hi ko put ponwal epon, u po kara men karongngin si ta hi, u po kara men lekngin ko huu epo bainat kut tumen. U po kara men kalwok weh u sun ning hi lengwal u wa won manngin ko po hi tumen, ma po phi phi sipsip to meme elit ma po mili mili engun.
58011038	Po tin wo hi phep imen tunus epo po ku kuk lunga sun tin api wo mulus men akomen. Po men kuk e mili mili yanga pi tin tahunggu men u po pi emian, u po kuk mi uwin u po kuk mi nahu tin nuk e li li mi mulus men kut tumen.
58011039	Ma po tin mosop imen wa ya hi tunus epo wo phepngin tin ta hi men, takuma po ku wa wungin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men kho akomen.
58011040	Epo Got hihi wungin tin tunus epo sun tin imen ta it kara kho kut, tumen kuma po tin imen ku sup me then to it khama it mosop si tunus weh to al.
58012001	Po masang to sun wala tin mosop imen nuk baul it ken hingis nhum ta men, ma po suk mara it epo wungin tin epo wo phepngin men. Tumen ma it kut men ku mang mang ta wungin mosop tin los it men li nuk worengin, u ta lasin tin kan kan it awo mlus nginan engun men li kut tumen, ma it whal ma it urut mara al to emiu it tin tang nuk men epo urut marangin tin hihingin nuk maran min it men,
58012002	men ku mara it weldung pit wo a-Yesus weh, tin sinsin epo wo phepngin ta it u tin pyu pon men kut tumen, tin tulun hu min kehngin tin hihingin nuk maran min yang men kha yang wuh won manngin put sa wlong put wal men, ma yang ion manngin tin imen ken i e amiron nginan engun men, ma homani ma yang kho si ung ewo wili ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men wilin eronin kho kut.
58012003	Epo wom men ku tulu wom hu pit po yang tin wuh wungin tin po tin kuk to lasin men ning i ewut yang li maran nomalak takuma yang pit nhing wet men, epon akuli wom mos ma mi wom hunngin.
58012004	Epo kho me pol homani men ku wom wuh lek walngin to lasin weh li kalolwa wom ku ko akomen. Awu. Men iso pi engun.
58012005	Iyi, tulu wom som ta wungin tin Got wo nut wom epon ken wom e Got husanin men wah, tin yang maran pit mi sakalngin to wom taku, “Wiruk, mip ton wungin tin yang tin Akono men wo nut ngon epon men ken i e lengwal engun men asin, kuru mip hunngin minan tin yang taku tus ngon men asin kut tumen.
58012006	Epo po tin ani yang tin Akono men min epo hi men kha yang wo nut hi men, ma yang paplai husanin masang tin mosop e yang wa hi to min tin nawaehngin pit po hi men.”
58012007	Got tin taku kot wom men kha wom men ku pit nhing wet won maikngin epon men. Got ning wungin epo wom ken wom e husanin tin masang men kha men; epo wirun ta tin ku wiraman tus i ewin som men ta in, wah? Awu. Men pi engun ako.
58012008	Si taku yang ku tus wom som epo wungin tin po tin husani yang mosop men pok min men, men ku wom kuk ken po tin apuluso men engun, si wom men ku husani Got irawin ani men akomen.
58012009	Kuru it men po irama it tin api mulus men kuk ma po kot it kho, ma it uluu po. Iyi, men tunus epo it men ku wa it sup wet Wirama it tin ta emiu it men weh kumali it wa tunusngin epon, wah?
58012010	Epo irawin epo po irama it tin imen men kot it to pi ungunan kara engun ira wungin tin po ion i ken i e tunus epo hi men, si Got men kot it epon ku nhio wo it weh, kumali it pok mi wungin tin ta yang e auluungin men to po kara.
58012011	Epo wungin tin po paplai sun hoin epon men men ku it ion i ta homani ken i e epo min kehngin men akomen, si men epo won manngin ako; takuli klet men enun ung hut tin to min wyungin e wungin tin siik men pong sin si in men epo po tin hoh wo hi epo kotngin tin imen kho ma po si wo hi nhing epon men.
58012012	Tumen ma wom men ku wa wili wom tin ko hun kuk men si pit nhing, kuru wom ning powut wom tin kikien men men ku si pit nhing kut tumen,
58012013	ma wom nemeh soput po ewi khi wom, kuma wom tin nes tongong tongong men ku khi wom soslok kyok akomen, si kuma men ku si tunus engun.
58012014	Wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku kuk aminis to po masang to sun wala mosop, kuru epo wom tin ku si auluunginan men kut tumen, epon taku po ta ku si auluungin som, men ku maran kon yang tin Akono men akomen.
58012015	Wom men ku haum tunus weh epon akuli po ta wom ta yek ta nanaangin tin ta Got men; epon akuli sa imut tin sut makalek men ta si lunga wom ma ning maikngin, men ku tin imen ma po munuman si lengwal to mara Got epon;
58012016	epon akuli po ta wom ta si in to wungin tin epo elwanngin men wa to wungin tin po wo hi nuk wet wungin tin ta pi mulus men ken a-Isau men, tin tih miranngin tin tan men sup wet enda aiingin tin misikin ta engun men.
58012017	Epo wom ion i epo yang in li klet, anima yang min epo yang ku pakuh pongin epo emhong tin imen, takuma yang men amutngin, epo pi tin ku yang phae min epon men ku yang pon tan ta ung akomen, aku, yang tohuh ma yang tinis weh epo yang ku wai.
58012018	Epo wom ku kho mu pol po pi emian tin ku po kah pon men, u tin yau ngin ngin pon men u pi mi ku tin min ko klet weh men u pi tin pus men,
58012019	u kiyak tin ingut men u wut po ta tin pok put sakalngin men, tin po hul i ma po hau wal epo wungin ku pok putngin ko ta po angan ta kyok asin men akomen. Awu.
58012020	Epo wungin sinsin tin Got wai maran ko klat epo po men men maik po weh, ma po ku kuk wet akomen, tin Got wo taku, “Aku, taku li ken nginan ta kah po pi emian, men ku po wini ko hun epo enah wa niin epo taplimngin tin nhum men ko hun weh.”
58012021	Ma wungin tin imen men po ion i ma po lem epon nhum takut, wala a-Moses maksin men wo taku, “Ngo men lem takut u nga kwat kut tumen.”
58012022	Si wom men kho mu pol po pi emian Saion u mi enunu tin ta Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men, men Yerusalem tin api wet pi men kha men, u wom mu pol ta tihngin tin wa ilio angan e ku po tiik i angan som men,
58012023	u wom mu epo palu walngin tin nhum men u palu walngin tin ta po tin sun wo hi to makngin ung wo hi e ya hi panngin nuk kut ili wet pi men, u wom mu epo Got tin ku ples wungin ta po mosop men, u epo emiu po tin wungin ta hi siik e kho si tunus weh men,
58012024	u epo a-Yesus tin in emin Got to po tunus to wungin siin tin kaekngin homan nuk lunga Got to po tunus men, u epo a-Yesus kalolwan tin tep tepngin ko e pok put sakalngin tin tunus epo sun kalolwan tin ta Abel men kut tumen.
58012025	Wom men ku haum tunus weh, epon akuli mara wom luluun epo wom tin ku hul sakalngin tin ta yang e yang sakal i men. Epo po tin kho ma mara hi luluun epon ku hul sakalngin tin ta yang e yang sakal ta po wo mulus men men ku yek ta wungin tin imen ma saa akomen, tumen kut kha wungin maran ko klat weh epo it tin ku yek ta sakalngin men akomen kut tumen, tin taku wetpo it wa yang tin sakal me ko ili wet pi men,
58012026	men yang tin kho ma wut ning i ma mulus kin men; si homani men yang wo kuk mara it taku, “Angan ta kyok men ku nga ning i ma mulus misan kin som, men ku wet pi kin kut tumen.”
58012027	Epo wungin tin yang wo taku, “Angan ta kyok,” ti, men suk mara it epo endara mosop tin kin homani men ku klokngin li, men endara tin pho pongin men, si kumali endara tin ku kin ewin som men ku bing nuk tumen li kut.
58012028	Epo it men wa enunu tin ku kin ewin som men, tumen ma it men ku kuk to nanaangin weh, tin ku it ning kumang auluungin to wungin tin yang min nawaehngin epon men to wungin tin it uluu Got men u to wungin tin it lem pit wo yang men kut tumen.
58012029	Epo Got tin ta it men men ken yau tin suuk sii endara mosop ii nginan men.
58013001	Wom men ku iso ira wungin tin ku mi wom pit wo po tin ehuro wom men li kut.
58013002	Wom kuk aku tulu wom som epo wom tin ku mara wom pit wo po tin nomisang men, epo kho ma po kara tin ning wungin tin tumen men hi pong epo engin si hi yuk tihngin kara me kuk hang i.
58013003	Tulu wom hu pit po po tin kan kanngin men, ken wom e kan kanngin to po men, u tulu wom hu pit po po tin sun songhu pit wo hi men kut tumen, epo wom tuo wom men iso kuk mi emkusi wom wo mulus kuma po ning i tumen epo wom maksin kut tumen ako.
58013004	Enanginngin men ku wom mosop mara wom ion i epon men tunus, ma ehus tin ta po tin enangin men men ku mara wom pit won tunus kuma won yil weh; epo po tin ning elwanngin men to sun tin sup si khi al men kuli Got iso wo los po hi ako.
58013005	Wungin tin ku wom karut wom epon men men ku to maran nesngin asin; si wom men ku mi wom ko lu wyu ung to endara tin wom kasum i kut men. Epo Got tuon wo taku, “Ngo men ku mang put wom wa wetpo ngo wa wom tumen angan akomen.”
58013006	Tumen ma it ku mi it puplet ma it pok put sakalngin taku, “Yang tin Akono men kha nhio wongin tin ta ngo men, tumen ma ngo ku lem akomen. Epo po tin tunus men kuli ning wungin tunia weh epo ngo?”
58013007	Tulu wom hu po tin mara hi pit wo wom men, tin pok put sakalngin ta Got si ta wom kho men, ma tulu wom hu pit po wungin ta hi tin si enun ung hut sun men, ma wom ira po to wo phepngin tin ta hi men weh.
58013008	A-Yesus Krais men wungin tan in kai wal to pi toisap, u homani, u to elup tin nuk e li kut men kut tumen.
58013009	Wom kuk aku kotngin tin maran kiring kiring men u tin enginin enginin men tumen ning i ma mi wom lu pit lu pit. Epon men tunus epo mi it tin ku pa nhingngin epo nanaangin tin ta Got men, si ku epo enda aiingin tin ku nhio wo po tin wo hi nuk wet men akomen.
58013010	It men suyung tin po ning talungin won men ta it ta ung, timen men ku po tin kum auluungin mi mang ausel tin ta Got men ku Got wa emhong ko po po epo po ku me ii endara tin nuk wo suyung tin imen akomen.
58013011	Epo li ken nginan emkusin tin imen tin yang tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men wai kalolwan li sup mang emin tin auluungin weh men epon ku mut eya lasin men, men sutngin woringi pi tin po wim mi maulu epon men ako.
58013012	Tumen kut kha a-Yesus ku ning po masang to sun wala tin tan men si auluungin epo yang enghikan tuon, men yang wuh wungin tak li wetpo enunu mara sowon tin baul pi men maksin kut tumen.
58013013	Tumen ma it men ku li pol ta yang tak li mi maulu, kuma it men ku wa manngin tin ta yang men maksin ko po it kut tumen.
58013014	Epo pi tin ko pit iyi men ku enunu tin ung kokyok kokyok li men ku ta it ta ung akomen, si it kuk e hoo mi it epo enunu tin imen tin kuli iso me silung men.
58013015	Tumen ma a-Yesus kha ku it kuk e wilayuk epo it ku ning talungin tin ku it sam sam Got epon men, men talungin tin me pol mi wo it men, tin it sam sam yang yan epon men.
58013016	Si wom kuk aku tulu wom som ta wungin tin ku wom ning i tunus epo wal u tin ku wom nhio wo al epon men tumen asin. Epo talungin tin imen men Got min saah pit pon ako.
58013017	Wom men ku hul wet po tin mara hi pit wo wom men ma wom wa wom weh lu sup wet wili po weh, epo po kha kuk e haum eya enu wom weh ken po e ku pok put sakalngin si ta Got epo kumang tin po ning i men. Wom mang si po mara hi pit wo wom to min kehngin, si ku to min urut i asin, epon taku to min urut i, men ku timen nhio wo wom weh akomen.
58013018	Wom men ku kines Got epo pim, epo wo pim phep epo mi pim tin ku ples wungin men men ku to lasin ta akomen, ma mi pim epo pim ku kuk e ning wungin mosop to wungin tin ku ya pim tunus epon men misan.
58013019	Si nga suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku iso kuk e kines tumen weh, kumali nga kyok ti epo wom kerek engun.
58013020	Homani men ku Got tin sinsin epo min wyungin men, tin khek a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men mi po tin huu kho men kyok si men, men yang tin akono e maran pit wo sipsip men, kalolwan tin wungin siin tin nuk lunga Got to it e sindak in kokyok kokyok men,
58013021	kha ku yang ning wom si klet weh epo wungin turunus ning nginan mosop kuma wom ira wungin tin yang min epon men, ma yang ning kumang mi wom epo wungin tin ku yang min saah pit po wom ton to mara yang men, yanga wili a-Yesus Krais, yang tin imen kha ku it wai yan si kokyok kokyok li kut men. Men irawin.
58013022	Kut si ehurok, nga suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku mara wom ain ma wom hul wet wungin tin nga wo nut wom epon tin i, epo nga pan wungin tin iyi ti epo wom men wungin hut sok engun.
58013023	Nga pok wom epo wiro suk a-Timoti men plosngin li won pias kho kut, tin taku yang kerek me men, men ku tuk a ti ion wom.
58013024	Wom men ku wa mi wom si ta po mosop tin mara hi pit wo wom men u ta po masang to sun wala tin mosop e auluungin men kut tumen. Po tin api Itali men wa mi hi ti epo wom.
58013025	Nanaangin tin ta Got men ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
59001001	Ngo a-Yemis tin kum wet wili Got u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen kha tih kisang tin iyi ti epo wom tin khuuknginin siin khaut khum ta u ponwal me sup tumen, tin plak mingin li ung e li li yanga pi men. Pi mhangin tunus ti epo wom.
59001002	Ehurok, taku wom pon ta karongngin maran kiring kiring kara, men ku wom ion i ken i e epo min kehngin engun,
59001003	epo wom ion i epo wo phepngin ta wom tin ku karongngin men men pho po wungin mi wom tin ku wom pit nhing wet won maikngin epon men.
59001004	Ma wom men ku mang, si wungin tin wom pit nhing wet won maikngin epon men ku iso si pyu po kumang tan weh, kumali wom si nonomuru ma wom kuk to endara mosop, si wom ku kalwok epo endara ta akomen.
59001005	Si taku po ta wom ta kalwok epo mhin ekngin, men ku kines Got tin naa po mosop epo mhin ekngin hambip engun, si ku pio ewin som men, men ku yang wai si ta sun ako.
59001006	Takuma po tin imen ku kines to wo phepngin weh, si ku min ponwal asin, epo po tin mi hi ponwal men men ken esap tin eip tep i ma hik sup mi al yanga sun engun men.
59001007	Epo po tin imen ku hoo mi hi epo po ku wa endara ta hang yang tin Akono men asin,
59001008	epon men in to min tin ponwal men engun, ma wungin mosop tin po ning i men ku siin pit nhing som.
59001009	Si wiro it ta tin lungunan engun men ku wangan pon epon men yan pos ako,
59001010	si yang ta tin miran men ku wangan pon epon men lungunan engun, epon men kuli mli ko ken monkini tin epililan men engun.
59001011	Epo sinang me si ma sinang moom pi, ma epilil mlus kerek engun, ma plaua tan mlus ma hih ko, ma pon tin tunus men ko lengwal kut. Tumen kut kha ku po tin miran men mi pit ko mi kumang tin po tohuh epon men.
59001012	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po yang ta tin pit nhing wet karongngin men. Epo minan tin kuli Got ion mi wungin ta yang ma Got wo epon e tunus men, men ku yang wa moolngin tin epo tunusngin men ko ung mhi yang, tin yang tin Akono men wo kuk mara po tin mi hi pit wo yang men epo yang ku espon si ta po men.
59001013	Si taku karongngin lengwal ta si ta po ta, men ku wo taku, “Got kha karong ngo men,” ti asin, epo Got men ku wungin lengwal ta karong i ewin akomen, kuru yang men ku karong po ta epo wungin lengwal ta ewin akomen kut tumen.
59001014	Si karongngin si, men si ta it then then, ma sangelekngin ta it tuo it men pa mulu it ma us it li sup mi esih.
59001015	Li klet ma sangelekngin tin imen kuman kut ken po wala ta tin kuman men, men ku khuuk lasin, li ma lasin si nomuru kut, kut ma lasin kha pho po hunngin men.
59001016	Ehurok, wom tin mi ngo pit pit wo wom weh men, wom kuk akuli sakalngin ta ek ek mi wom.
59001017	Epo nanaangin mosop tin turunus men u talungin mosop tin turunus weh men kut tumen, men api ili awon misan ako, ma me ko hang Wirama it tin sinsin epo esul mosop men, tin ku wungin tan phae ko ken endara enun tin sinang pal ma li nomalak li klet ma ko me hut yis men ewin akomen.
59001018	Epo yang min tuon kha yang khuuk it epo sakalngin tin irawin men, kumali it si kuk ken it e endara aiingin tin enun po ewun lunga sun tin yang pho pon men.
59001019	Tumen ma, ehurok, wom tin mi ngo pit pit wo wom weh men, wom mosop then then men ku kinga wom pus engin si kuk epon ku hul, takuma wom ku pus engin epon ku sakal asin, kuru wom men ku mi wom teng si kerek asin kut tumen.
59001020	Epo min teng si tin ta po tunus men ku pho po wungin siik tin ta Got men ewin akomen.
59001021	Tumen ma wungin maran kiring kiring tin min lengwal men u wungin lengwal tin ku iso ung e si mi wom ewin men kut tumen, men ku wom whis i mosop lu nuk worengin, si wom wa sakalngin tin whangin mi wom kho men to wungin amunu tin wom wa wom ko epon men. Sakalngin tin imen kha apalukngin epon ku palolo enu wom men.
59001022	Si wom men ku kuk ken po tin ira wungin nginangan men weh, si wom men ku kuk ken po tin hul wungin engun men asin, epon taku wom kuk ken po tin hul wungin engun men, men tuo wom torok mara wom kha men.
59001023	Epon taku po ta hul wungin engun, si ku iran weh som, men ken po ta tin ion i enun maran mi tupngin ta men engun kha men,
59001024	epo yang ion maran tuon kut ma li, li klet ma kerek engun ma yang tulun som tan maran tin tun tira men.
59001025	Si taku po ta maran ko pit mi wungin sinsin tin tunus weh e epo wungin tin epo won piasngin men ma iran sumsum, si ku in ken po ta tin hul i ma tulun som epon engun men akomen, si men in ken po ta tin ira sakalngin weh men, po tin imen kha ku Got wa emhong ko pon epo wungin tin po ning i men.
59001026	Taku po ta in lunga wom ma phaeng won taku i e won nuk wet Got ma ira sakalngin ta yang siik, takuma men ku maran pit mi won tunus som, si torok min tuon engun, men wo phepngin tan men ku tunus epon ku ning kumang ta epon som.
59001027	Wo phepngin tin mi yil e yomngin ku kara pit min som men tin nuk tumen to mara Got tin Wirama it men men wala nuk ti, men ku po li tuh wo sun tin wiwol men u po tin wamuh men kut tumen tin miu hi tuung wet won maikngin ta hi men, kuru epon ku po ta karuk i tunus weh, si ku mang ta wungin tin ta pi mulus men ku siluk pon ewin som kut tumen.
59002001	Ehurok, wom men ku kasum wo phepngin tin pit wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin Akono e to moolngin men, to wungin tin ku wom ning wungin ieh sun epo po kara tin ya hi pos u ya hi amiron nginan tumen asin.
59002002	Epon taku yang ta ku me sup mi palu walngin tin ta wom men to moolngin tin sup sup hut wilin e golan men kara u to moolngin tin pon tunus men kut tumen, kuru yang lungunan ta me sup maksin to moolngin tin pon lengwal men,
59002003	ma sila wom khing pit po yang tin mool tunus men ma wom wo ta yang taku, “E mu ung pi tin tunus iyi,” ti, si wom wo ta yang tin lungunan men taku, “E mu lu pit imen” wa “E mu ko ung sii khi ngo hang enda tin khi ngo si klung won men,” ti,
59002004	iyi, wom ning wungin ieh wal lunga wom, ma wom si ken po tin ples wungin to mi hi tin wungin lengwal pong siin men kha men ako, wah?
59002005	Ehurok, wom tin mi ngo pit pit wo wom weh men, wom hul, iyi, epo po tin lungunan wo mulus tin iyi kha Got won ung wo hi epon ku miran to wo phepngin ta hi ma pakuh pongin epo enunu tin yang wo kuk mara po tin mi hi pit wo yang men epon men ako, wah?
59002006	Takuma wom men wa manngin ko po po tin lungunan men engun. Iyi, po tin mimiran men wala wa won maikngin ko po wom ma nak nak wom lu epo ples walngin men ako, wah?
59002007	Iyi, po tin imen wala ton mi yang yan tin tunus e po sikia wom ton men, ako wah?
59002008	Epon taku wom ira wungin sinsin tin ta yang tin Sinkhaung men weh, tin ira Panngin Auluungin tin wo taku, “Ngon men ku mip pit wo po tin wom ung then men ken ngon tin mip pit wo ngon tuop weh men,” ti, men wom ning i tunus weh kha men ako.
59002009	Si taku wom ning wungin ieh wal, men wom lasin kha men, ma wungin sinsin men ku tak si wom ma wom si kuk ken po tin hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men kha men.
59002010	Epon taku po ta ira wungin sinsin siik mosop, si plong ko epon then ta, men maran ken i e hik put wungin sinsin mosop ma lasin ung pon kha men.
59002011	Epo yang tin wo taku, “Ngon men ku sup si khi po ta asin,” men sakal maksin taku, “Ngon men ku wi po ta ko hun asin,” ti, kut tumen. Si taku ngon ku ning wungin tin e sup si khi po ta akomen, si e wi po ta ko hun, men e kho si in ken po ta tin hik put wungin sinsin men kha men.
59002012	Wom men ku sakal u wom ning wungin tunus kut tumen, ken wom e po tin wungin ta hi ku plesngin epo wungin sinsin tin epo won piasngin men.
59002013	Epo wungin ples nginan men ku min sukngin om min epo po ta tin ku ning min sukngin ewin som men. Si min sukngin men ku nomka weh hut wungin ples nginan ako.
59002014	Ehurok, taku po ta wo epon e won phep takuma wo phepngin tan ku ning kumang kara som, iyi, wo phepngin tin tumen men ku nhio wo are? Iyi, wo phepngin tin tumen ani ku po tin imen palolongin epon men, wah?
59002015	Epon taku ehuro it ta wa ilep a it ta wiwil ma kalwok epo endara aiingin tin ku iini to ungunan then then men,
59002016	ma po ta wom ta wo ta sun taku, “E yok to min wyungin ma e lu pama po ngon u e ii enda aiingin ma e mut tumen,” si ngon ku wa endara tin po elit hi hing won men si ta po ta som, men ku wungin timen kuli nhio wo are?
59002017	Tumen kut kha wo phepngin tin in ta tuon engun men, taku ku ning kumang kara som, men ken i e hun kut ako.
59002018	Si nga wo taku po ta ku wo taku, “Ngon men in to wo phepngin, si ngo men in to kumang tin nga ning i men kara.” Yo, e suk marango epo wo phepngin tin tap men to kumang tap tin kis kis men wet, si ngo men ku suk marap epo wo phepngin tin ta ngo men epo kumang tin ta ngo e si in pi mlaeng men weh ako.
59002019	Ngon men wop nuk wet wungin tin epo Got then ta in men, men e ning i tunus ako. Epo emiun tin lengwal men wo hi nuk wet wungin timen kut tumen ako, ma emiun kwat kwat to lemngin ta hi!
59002020	Auh, ngon tin wungin tap ulil men, mip epo ngon ku pon tan epo wo phepngin tin kumang tan om men men hun kut ako, wah?
59002021	Iyi, Abraham tin yau a it sin men men si in siik to mara Got epo kumang tin yang ning i minan tin yang taku ning talungin epo wirun Aisak wo suyung men ako, wah?
59002022	Iyi, ngon e ku ion i, epo wo phepngin tin ta yang men men klap to kumang tin tan men ma wulong ning kumang then to al, ma kumang tin yang ning i men men wo phepngin ta yang si suuk siingin epon men wala nuk ti, wah?
59002023	Ma Panngin Auluungin men si put plo nginan tin wo taku, “Abraham won nuk wet Got, ma Got maran ira wungin ta yang tin imen ken yang e in siik men.” Ma Got sikia yang men tita ngong weh.
59002024	Tumen ma wom ion i, epo po ta ku si in siik to mara Got epo kumang tin po ning i men weh, si ku epo wo phepngin misan akomen.
59002025	Kuru soput tin nuk timen maksin kha e-Rehap tin api put soput men si in siik to mara Got epo kumang tin wut ning i minan tin wut wa wulong tin ponwal e me to sakalngin men li ma wut ko tih wulong li ira soput enginin ta men ako, wah?
59002026	Epo po ta emkusin tin emiun om min men men hun kho kut ako, tumen kut kha wo phepngin tin kumang tan om min men men hun kho kut tumen ako.
59003001	Ehurok, po munuman ta wom men ku si wa kumang epo po kot nginan asin, epo wom ion i epo pim tin kot po men men kuli Got maran pit mi kumang ta pim weh epo po kara.
59003002	Epo it mosop men ko plong ko epo lasin maran kiring kiring ako. Ma taku po ta ku plong ko to sakalngin tin me pol won men som, men timen wungin tan siik weh, kuru men tuon ku maran pit won emkusin mosop weh kut tumen.
59003003	Iis, wom hul, epo it wa endara ta men ku si klet nuk wo hos kuma hos hul wet it engun, ma endara tin imen kha it phae hos emkusin mosop epon men.
59003004	Iis, wom ion imut kut, aku, men endara nhum ta ma eip nhum ta si men peh imut li, takuma endara tun ta misan kha phae imut ma imut saa ira yang tin luul to imut men min men.
59003005	Tumen kut kha mamai it men it emkusin tun ta engun, takuma men wangan pon to wungin nunhum kara. Auh, yau tun ta men ku pih ko ung mi wolopon ta, men ku wangan wut kuwing ma uspo pi misuk nhum ta ako.
59003006	Wai, mamai it men ken yau ta men, men ken pi mulus ta tin wungin tin ku siik som men maran kiring kiring in epon men. Mamai it men hihingin nuk lunga it emkusin ken endara ta tin ku ses mi it emkusin mosop men, ma men tun yau ung mi wungin mosop tin it ning i minan tin hosingin e it ko khuukngin wo mulus men ma weh li pol minan tin ku it huu men, men yau tin sindak men kha tuon tun i men.
59003007	Epo li ken nginan enih u emon u erhu u endara tin maran to tunusngin e kuk mi wiu men kut tumen, tin maran kiring kiring men, men homani ma po tunus wai me po mara hi pit won engun, kuru kho men po wai me sup wet wili po ma mal ewin kut tumen.
59003008	Si mamai it men ku po ta maran pit won tunus kuma mal ewin akomen. Awu. Mamai it men endara ta tin to wungin lengwal e ku po ta maran pit won tunus ewin akomen, men isel tin ku po huu epon men men klet pon.
59003009	Epo mamai it men it sam sam Got tin Wirama it men epon, kuru it ngil ngil po tunus tin Got ning hi kai yang enun tuon men epon ewin kut tumen.
59003010	Wo it tin then imen men sam samngin u ngil ngilngin tumen likiong me pol epon. Ehurok, wungin tin imen ku tunus epon ku nuk tumen akomen.
59003011	Iyi, eki maran ta men ku eki tin phiit men to sun tin makalek men ku ngong lup lup si mi pi won then ta ewin, wah?
59003012	Ehurok, sa pik ta ku sa olip enun si pon, wa elik tin enun wainan men ku enun si po sa pik ta tumen ewin, wah? Awu. Wala ken eki tin wiuan men ku lup to eki tin tunus men ewin som kut tumen.
59003013	Ara weh in lunga wom men mhin ek u ku maran ples wungin sinsin tunus weh tumen? Men ku po tin imen suk mara sun epo wungin tin ku po karut hi tunus epon men, men ningngin epo wungin amunu tin mhin ekngin pong siin si in min men weh.
59003014	Si taku wungin tin mi wom heh wet sun epo po kara ewin men u wungin tin wom tohuh epo soput tin ku wom tuo wom si nhum epon men tumen kuk e li li mi wom, men ku tuo wom wangan po wom ma wom nolo wungin tin irawin men epo torokngin tin tumen asin.
59003015	Mhin ekngin tin tumen ku me ko ili wet pi som. Awu. Men ta pi mulus engun, u mi it tin kho men kha pong siin si men, u emiun tin lengwal men, men kha sinsin epon men kut tumen.
59003016	Epo pi tin min heh wet sun u wungin tin po tohuh epo po tuo hi ku si nhum epon men tumen kuk epon men, men wungin tin po kuk e ning i sup mi al men u wungin lengwal mosop tin maran kiring kiring men kut tumen kha kuk epo pi tin imen maksin kut tumen ako.
59003017	Si mhin ekngin tin me ko ili awon men, men wungin tan tin li muk epo sun men men ti, men min yil weh, u men to wungin aminis, u to wungin amlus, u men to wungin tin hul wetngin men, u min sukngin kol min ma wungin tunus si enun ung hut ewin kut tumen. Si wungin tin po ning i enginin epo po tin akokono men u po tin lungunan men tumen u wungin tin amo men tumen ku kara in min akomen.
59003018	Ma wungin tin si enun ung hut sun tin siik men men whangin to wungin tin po ung aminis epon men epo po tin ning i ma sun ung aminis men.
59004001	Ekwha u heek walngin tin si nuk lunga wom men men sinsin epo ele? Iyi, mi wom tin kling si lek wal mi wom emkusin tingit then then men kha sinsin epon men ako, wah?
59004002	Mara wom nes endara, takuma wom ku wai akomen. Wom lek po ko huu u mara wom nes endara ta po tumen, takuma wom khuk po engin epo wom ku wai. Wom heek wal u lek wal tumen, si wom iso kuk engun ma wom ku wai som, sinsin men epo wom ku kines Got epon akomen.
59004003	Wom kines Got ma wom ku wai som, sinsin men epo wom ku kines to mi wom tin tunus men akomen, si wom kines, men epo wom ku siwul mi endara tin mi wom kling si epon men engun ako.
59004004	Wom masang to sun wala tin sup si khi al ewin men, iyi, wom e pong epo engin epo wungin tin po ta si tita hi wungin tin epo pi mulus men men nolo Got kha men, wah? Tumen ma taku po ta min epon ku tita ngong wungin tin epo pi mulus men, men ku tuon ning i ma si po ta tin nolo Got men kha men.
59004005	Iyi, wom wo taku tua, epo Panngin Auluungin tin wo taku, “Emiun tin in mi it men men kos kos eya it,” timen men Got sakal i engun, wah?
59004006	Takuma Got iso wa nanaangin ko po sun si, wala Panngin Auluungin wo taku, “Got men nolo po tin wai si pit men, si yang wa nanaangin ko ta po tin wa hi ko men.”
59004007	Tumen ma wom men ku wa wom mu sup wet wili Got, si wom men ku si nuk nhing to mara emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men, tin taku me sewut wom men, men ku yang whal li silang wom engun.
59004008	Wom men ku lu tikayung Got, men ku yang me tikayung wom maksin kut tumen ako. Wom tin ning lasin nginangan men, wom men ku khis po wili wom, u wom tin mi wom ponwal men, wom men ku whek mi wom weh kut tumen.
59004009	Wom men ku wo wom maik wom weh u wom men ku mi wom urut i u tinis kut tumen. Wom men ku phae lesngin ta wom ko min urut i, u wom phae min kehngin ta wom ko min luk kut tumen.
59004010	Wom men ku wa wom ko to mara yang tin Akono men, men yang tuon kha kuli wa wom kyok si men.
59004011	Ehurok, wom ning i aku wom sakal lengwal ewut wal. Taku po ta sakal lengwal epo wiron ta ma ples wungin ta sun, men sakal lengwal epo wungin sinsin ma ples wungin epo wungin sinsin kha men. Ma taku e ples wungin epo wungin sinsin, men ku e si in ken po ta tin ira wungin sinsin men kyok som. Awu. Ngon men ku in ken po tin ples wungin epo wungin sinsin nginangan men ta kha men.
59004012	Po then ta misan kha wa wungin sinsin si in men, men yang tin kakha epon ku palolo it wa mhuk it tumen. Si ngon e ara weh ma ngon ku ples wungin ta po kara tin wom ung then men?
59004013	Yo, wom mu, wom tin sakal ti, “Homani wa to pi king kauk men ku it li pi tin i wa pi ta tumen, men ku it kuk pi tin imen to posan then ta, ma it kul endara u it tirih endara, ma it wa ulu ta it hambip ko po sun li si.”
59004014	Takuma wom ku ion i tunus epo wungin tin ku si ta wom to pi king kauk men som. Epo tunusngin tin ta wom men men ken ele? Men ken eki kuin nginan tin kuin si sakun kara li klet ma li pi om engun men.
59004015	Si tunus epo wom men ku wo taku, “Taku yang tin Akono men min epon, men ku it iso tunus kuk ma it ning i tin i wa timen,” ti.
59004016	Takuma awu, homani ma wom wangan po wom to mi wom tin wom wa wom si pit men. Wungin mosop tin nuk tumen men lengwal engun.
59004017	Tumen ma taku po ta ion wungin tin tunus epon ku ning i men si ku ning i som, men lasin tan kha men.
59005001	Yo, wom tin mimiran men, wom men ku tirinis u wom hahau amusukngin kut tumen, epo won maikngin tin ku iso si po wom men.
59005002	Epo nemokong tin ta wom men men whuk kho, kuru moolngin tin ta wom men men lapupup yen yen i kho kut tumen.
59005003	Gol u silwa tin ta wom men men pon horim kut, ma pon horim tin imen kha ku pok put lasin si in pi mlaeng epo wom ma ku ii wom emalin ken yau men ako. Elup tin ku me sulung e wom kuk min iyi kut i kha wom halung po nemokong ta wom min men.
59005004	Wom hul, epo ulu tin emhut kumang ta po tin kaklat wit mipi tin ta wom men, tin wom torok ma wom iso kasum i men, men haungin tan si hambip weh. Haungin ta po tin kaklat wit men weh si hau mi kinga yang tin maran pit wo po nolo tin ta pi wet pi men.
59005005	Wom men ung wo mulus to endara ta wom tin nuk asalok men engun. Wom men ung e ira wungin tin mi wom keh keh pit po wom emkusin men engun. Wom men ii endara hambip epo mi wom weh li ma wom sosoom mi elup tin li ken nginan ku lekngin ko huu min men kha men.
59005006	Wom men ung e wo los po po tin wungin ta hi siik men engun, ma wom lek po ko huu, si po ku ning wungin ta tin ku ut eya hi men akomen.
59005007	Tumen ma, ehurok, wom men ku kuk e wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak weh li pol minan tin ku yang tin Akono men kyok me men. Wom ion i, epo po tin wha wha nginangan men kuk e kaeng endara tin ku mulus pho pon li ma muru men, tin ku po tirih i epo ulu maran nhum epon men. Po kuk e kaeng epon weh li pol minan tin ku enda aiingin tin imen wa pi yung tin ku me muk men u pi yung tin ku iso me sulung men kut tumen.
59005008	Wom kut men ku kuk e wuh lu maran nomalak kut tumen. Wom men ku isum mi wom pit nhing, epo yang tin Akono men, tin ku me men, men ung e me tikayung kut.
59005009	Ehurok, wom men ku sangengngeng pit wo wal asin, epon akuli Got wo los po wom. Imen, yang tin ku ples wungin men kho me pit mara sowon kut.
59005010	Ehurok, wom men ku ion po pokngin tin kho ma pok put sakalngin epo yang tin Akono men yan men ken po e tosukngin ta epo wungin tin po wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak men.
59005011	Iis, epo it ion po tin nuk nhing wet won maikngin men ken po e emhong ko po hi men. Wom hul kho epo a-Yop tin pit nhing wet won maikngin men. Ma wom ion wungin tin yang tin Akono men nana i ta min epon ku iso si sulung men, tin suk mara it epo yang tin Akono men tin in to min sukngin hambip weh ma yang min suk it nginangan men.
59005012	Si, ehurok, wungin tin li muk sun e ku wom ning i men men ti, wom ning i aku wom tung tung pi wet pi wa mulus wa tung tungngin tin kara kyok men tumen asin. Si taku wom wo taku, “Wai,” ti, men wai misan, wa taku wom wo taku, “Awu,” ti, men awu misan kut tumen, epon akuli wom sup mi ples walngin epon.
59005013	Iyi, po ta in lunga wom men wuh won maikngin, wah? Men ku kines. Iyi, po ta wom ta min keh, wah? Men ku lut sam samngin weh.
59005014	Iyi, po ta in lunga wom men ku saih, wah? Men ku yuk po tin akokono e mara hi pit wo palu walngin men me ma po yuk yuk nowhong ko pon epo yang tin Akono men yan, ma po kines Got epon.
59005015	Ma kinesngin tin si to wo phepngin men ku palolo po ta tin saih men ako, ma yang tin Akono men ku khek po si. Ma taku po ning lasin kara, men kuli klokngin li ako.
59005016	Wom men ku pok put lasin ta wom si ta al, u wom kines nhio wo wal kut tumen, kuma saihngin mlis wo wom. Kinesngin tin to emhong tin siin iis e ta po ta tin wungin tan siik men men ku ning kumang hambip weh ako.
59005017	Epo a-Elaiha men yang ta tin it mi it kai wal men ako, takuma yang kines maran li pul pit epo pi ku yung som, tumen ma pi ku yung me ko wo mulus som to posan miuk u namih ta me sup kut tumen.
59005018	Li klet ma yang kines kyok, men wet pi min pok si pi yung me ko, ma mulus nhio wo endara aiingin enun kyok.
59005019	Ehurok, taku po ta in lunga wom kikin ta wungin tin irawin men, ma po ta li wa sun kyok me,
59005020	men ku ion i ti, epon taku po ta phae sun ta tin ning lasin nginangan men kyok me epo wungin ulil tin po iran men, men palolo enu sun ta epo hunngin ako, ma klet eya lasin ta sun tin munuman men kha men.
60001001	Ngo a-Pita tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais men ta kha pan kisang tin iyi ti epo wom tin nomisang e po plak mi wom ma wom mhup lu ung e li li Pontus, Galesia, Kapadosia, Esia, u Bitinia kut tumen,
60001002	tin Got tin Wiraman men ion wom kho ma yang won ung wo wom mi po kara men, u Emiun Auluungin ning wom si auluungin kumali wom hul wet wungin ma a-Yesus Krais kalolwan ku tep tepngin ko po wom. Nanaangin u min wyungin kut tumen me ku si pu wal weh mi wom.
60001003	It men ku sam sam Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin epo min sukngin tin nhum ta yang men kha yang ning it ko khuukngin kyok ma it sup mi hoo mingin tin epo tunusngin men ta epo a-Yesus Krais tin khekngin kyok si lunga po tin huu kho men,
60001004	kumali it wa pakuh pongin tin ku mhukngin ewin som, u min yil weh, u ku mlusngin ewin som men kut tumen, tin yang haum eyan ta wom ma pit ili wet pi men.
60001005	Wom men Got haum eya wom epo emhong tin tan men epo wo phepngin kumali wom wa palolongin tin hihingin nuk e ku lasngin si in pi mlaeng mi elup tin ku li pyu pongin sulung men.
60001006	Wungin tin imen men mi wom keh keh epon hambip, aku, taku homani put monlo long kara engun ma taku wungin weh nuk epon ku nuk ti, men ku miu wom tuung wet won maikngin maran kiring kiring kara kho engun wet,
60001007	kumali wo phepngin ta wom tin maik epo gol tin po ngel epon e mhukngin engun ewin men, aku, men tongngin epo yau, men kuli Got ion min ma yang pon tan epon men tunus epo wom ku wa sam samngin u moolngin u ya wom tin ku pos men kut tumen minan tin kuli a-Yesus Krais si plo nginan pi mlaeng epon men,
60001008	men yang tin ku mara wom nuk pon kho som, si mi wom pit won men. Aku, homani ma wom ku ion yang som, takuma wo wom phep ma mi wom keh keh to min kehngin tin wom talok min pok put nginan u moolngin tunus kol min men kut tumen,
60001009	ma wom wa endara tin ku wo phepngin ta wom li ponsol epon men, men enu wom tin ku palolongin men ako.
60001010	Palolongin tin imen men po pokngin tohuh kho epo po ku ion mi wungin tin imen kuma po pon tan sinsin, men po tin pok put sakalngin kho epo nanaangin tin ku iso me epo wom men,
60001011	men po ion min epon ku po pon ta wungin tin tuni u to pi elini kut tumen, tin Krais Emiun tin in mi po men sakal los pon men, tin yang pok put wungin kho epo won maikngin tin ku Krais wuh i anima moolngin iran men.
60001012	Po pokngin tin imen men Got suk mara po epo po tuo hi ani ku po kum ta hi men som, si it kha po kum ta it epo wungin tin homani ma po pok wom epon kho yanga wili po tin hing wo Emiun Auluungin tin tihngin me ko wet pi kho men ma po pok put pok putngin tin tunus men si ta wom -- men wungin tin po tihngin taku ion min maksin kut tumen.
60001013	Tumen ma wom men ku hihi tulun hungin tin ta wom men tunus kuma wom kum epon tunus weh, ma wom karut wom tunus, ma wom wa hoo mingin ta wom ko pit nhing wo nanaangin tin ku iso wangin ko ta wom minan tin kuli a-Yesus Krais si plo nginan pi mlaeng epon men;
60001014	wom men ku kuk ken po tin hohoin e hul wet wungin ewin men, si wom kuk aku wom mang ta wungin tin kho ma wom pong epo engin ma mi wom sa ngelek wungin epon men men ku klet po enu wom kyok asin.
60001015	Si wom men ku kuk auluungin ken yang tin yuk wom e auluungin weh men epo wungin mosop tin wom ning i men.
60001016	Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, “Wom men ku kuk auluungin, epo ngo men in auluungin weh.”
60001017	Ma taku wom yuk si wo Wirama it tin ion po mosop ken hi e kai wal men ma yang ples wungin ta po ira kumang ta po then then weh men, men ku wom lem pit wo yang ma wom karut wom tunus weh minan tin wom kuk ken po tin nomisang men wo mulus tin i.
60001018	Epo wom ion i epo endara tin whuk ewin ken silwa wa gol wa tumen ani ku kiisngin mut eya wom epo wungin tin wom ning i sup mi al engun e po hie wom pat wal i me pol ta wom men akomen.
60001019	Awu, Krais kalolwan tin Got ngel epon weh men kha kiisngin mut eya wom men, men kalolwa yang tin in ken sipsip asus ta tin po muk muk weh men.
60001020	Yang men Got won ung won kho si mulus men ku yang iso wai siin si ung, si yang wa sun si in pi mlaeng mi elup tin me ponsol angan kut i epon ku ut eya wom,
60001021	tin wo wom phep pit wo Got epo yang men, men Got tin khek yang mi po tin huu kho ma yang naa sun epo moolngin men, wala homani ma wo phepngin u hoo mingin tin ta wom men pit wo Got men.
60001022	Wom tin whek mi enu wom kho epo wungin tin wom hul wet wungin irawin epo Emiun Auluungin to mi wom tin pit wo po ehuro wom to min wom tin yil men, kha homani ma wom men ku mi wom pit wo al hambip to mi wom tin yil men weh,
60001023	epo endara ihun tin whuk ewin men ani ku wom ko khuukngin homan kyok epon men som. Awu. Sakalngin ta Got tin to tunusngin e sindak in li kut men kha wom ko khuukngin homan kyok epon men,
60001024	epo, “Po tunus mosop men ken epilil men, u moolngin mosop tin ta po tunus men men ken epilil tin paas men kut tumen engun. Epilil men mlus ewin, u moolngin tan tin paas men mi pit ko,
60001025	si sakalngin tin ta yang tin Akono men men sindak nuk li kut.” Iis, sakalngin tin po pok put pok putngin tin tunus men si ta wom men wala imen.
60002001	Tumen ma wom men ku mang mang ta wungin tin epo min lelngin, u kusamuhngin, u wungin amo, u min heh wet sun, u wungin tin maran kiring kiring e wom hik put pit po po engun men kut tumen mosop lu nuk worengin,
60002002	si wom kuk ken po hoin tin po mumlek men ma mi wom epo wom ku sus wungin tin mi yil weh men, kumali wom plok si nonomuru epon,
60002003	tin taku irawin epo wom tong i kho ma wom ion i epo yang tin Akono men men in to wungin tin yang nanaa nginangan men.
60002004	Wom men mu epo yang ken wom e mu epo enah tin to tunusngin men ta, tin po tunus mut mut i, si Got won ung won u ken enah ta tin po ngel epon men kut tumen,
60002005	kuru wom kut men kuk ken enah tin to tunusngin men kara, ma wom ung e ningngin si ken mang tin Got in min men ta, u ken po tin kum auluungin wa ilio kara kut tumen, kuma wom ning talungin tin emiunan e ku Got min nawaehngin pit pon men yanga wili a-Yesus Krais.
60002006	Wala sakalngin ta in mi sun tin panngin nuk men wo taku, “Wom hul, nga wa enah ta tin ta mang tin siin emol men ko ung Saion, men enah tin Got won ung won e yang ngel epon men ta, ma taku po ta won phep pit wo yang, men ku manngin ko pon angan akomen.”
60002007	Tumen ma wom tin wo wom phep men ion yang kai enah tin po ngel epon men ta; si po tin ku wo hi phep som men, men sakalngin panngin nuk epo hi taku, “Enah tin po tin ning mang ewin men mut mut i men kha si enah tin nhum epo sun kara e ung mang tin siin emol men,”
60002008	kuru “enah ta tin ung ma po tut po khi hi pon ma po plong ko pon men kut tumen,” ti. Po poplong ko pon, epon tin po ku hul wet wungin som men, men wungin tin Got tuon won ung won ku ko nuk epo hi men.
60002009	Si wom men kuk ken po masang to sun wala tin Got won ung wo wom men kara, u ken po tin kum auluungin e sinkhaung men wa ilio angan kara, u ken po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi auluungin men kara, u ken po masang to sun wala tin ta Got weh men kara kut tumen, kuma wom pok put wungin si in pi mlaeng epo wungin tin tunus weh e ta yang tin yuk wom tin kuk mi pi mi ku men ma yang wa wom me pol mi pi mi mlaeng tin tan e po mara pon tan homan ma po whik won men.
60002010	Epo kho men wom kuk ken po masang to sun wala tin ta Got men kara som, si homani men wom si kuk ken po masang to sun wala tin ta yang men kut, tin kho ma ku wa min sukngin ewin som, si homani men wom wa min sukngin kho kut men.
60002011	Apo, wom tin mi ngo pit wo wom e wom kuk ken po tin nomisang e api enginin e me ung men, nga suh mi kinga wom epo wom men ku mang ta wungin tin mi wom tin kho men sa ngelek epon men, tin kuk e si si ewut enu wom men,
60002012	ma wom karut wom to wungin tin po ya hi tunus epon men lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, kumali minan tin po hik put sakalngin pit po wom ken wom e ning wungin lengwal nginangan men, men ku po ion wungin tin wom ning i tunus men, men ku po wa Got yan si mi elup tin ku yang me tuh wo mulus epon men.
60002013	Tumen ma wom men ku tulu wom hu pit po yang tin Akono men ma wom wa wom lu sup wet wili wungin sinsin mosop tin ta po tunus men, tin taku ta yang tin sinkhaung e nhum weh wo mulus men,
60002014	wa taku ta po phuan tin sun tih hi me epon ku mumhek mi po tin ning wungin lengwal nginangan men u epon ku hi sam sam po tin ira wungin tunus ewin men kut tumen.
60002015	Epo wungin tin Got min epon men wala ti, epo wom tin ku ning wungin tunus men kha ku wom ning i ma po tin pong epo engin e wungin ta hi ulil men wo hi kup nuk.
60002016	Wom men ku kuk ken po tin wo hi pias men, si wom kuk aku wom ning wungin wo won piasngin tin imen tin ku pang po wungin tin wom taku ning i lengwal epo po kara men, si wom ning kumang ken wom e po tin kum wet wili Got men weh.
