60002017	Wo wom men ku uluu po masang to sun wala mosop, u mi wom pit wo po tin ehuro wom men, u wom lem pit wo Got, u wom uluu yang tin sinkhaung e nhum weh wo mulus men kut tumen.
60002018	Wom tin kum wet wili po phuan men, wom men ku wa wom sup wet wili po to lemngin tin klet mi wom men, men ku wom ning i tumen epo po tin wungin ta hi tunus u amlus tumen misan som, men ku wom ning i tumen epo po tin wungin ta hi amhees men kut tumen.
60002019	Epo wungin tin Got min tunusngin pit pon men wala ti, taku po ta tulun hu pit po Got ma lat won maikngin, aku, po men ku ning wungin lengwal ta som, si po wuh i engun.
60002020	Epon taku wom ning lasin kara ma po lek wom pit min ma wom lat i engun, men ku wom wa sam samngin tin tuni epon? Si taku wom ning wungin tunus ma po mumhek mi wom epon, taku wom pit nhing ma wom lat won maikngin timen engun, wungin tin imen kha tunus to mara Got men.
60002021	Epo wungin tin Got yuk wom epon ku si ta wom men wala tumen, epo Krais kut men wuh wungin mut eya it, men yang mang ta tosukngin ta it ta ko nuk ako, kumali wom men ku ira yang khin weh.
60002022	“Yang men ku ning lasin ta som, kuru wungin amo men ku po pon tan ta nuk wo yang akomen kut tumen;
60002023	yang men, aku, po mimi yang, takuma yang ku mimi po emhut wungin ta po akomen; kuru minan tin yang wuh wungin men, yang ku wawhim po epo wungin ta akomen, si yang mang tan sup yanga wili sun tin ples wungin siik nginangan men engun;
60002024	Yang tuon lat lasin ta it epon emkusin tuon put sa, kumali it tin huu ta lasin ning nginan kho men kha ku tunus kuk ta wungin tin siik men ning nginan misan. Yang tin pon wluk wluk men kha saihngin ta it mlisngin epon men.
60002025	Epo kho ma wom kuk ken sipsip tin plak lilil men, si homani ma wom kyok mu epo yang tin haum eya sipsip e maran pit wo enu wom ewin men.
60003001	Wom wala tin enanangin men, wom men ku ira wungin then ta pet kira sun tin imen, ma wom wa wom sup wet wili po masang tin wom enangin hi men, ma taku po kara ku hul wet sakalngin ta Got som, men ku wungin tin wom ku sakal i som men kha ku wom wa po epo wungin tin wom wala tin pit ta po men ku iran men,
60003002	epo po ion wom tin lem ma wom karut wom epo wungin tin mi yil men.
60003003	Wom men ku mool epo moolngin tin ta pi mara so men, tin wom mol mol yut wom men, u wom pa mool wom epo nemokong tin golan men, u wom pa mool wom epo moolngin tin tunus men kut tumen engun asin,
60003004	si men ku moolngin tin ta enu wom e kaunngin nuk mi wom men, men ku to wungin tin pon lungin ta emiu wom tin amlus u epo min wyungin men kut tumen tin ku whuk ewin som men, epo moolngin tin tumen kha tunus to mara Got ma yang ngel epon weh men.
60003005	Epo po wala tin kuk mi elup tin kho li men, tin wo hi phep pit wo Got men, ira wungin tin imen kut ma po pa mool hi epon, ma po wa hi sup wet wili titien hi weh,
60003006	wala e-Sara hul wet Abraham, ma wut sikia yang e akono men. Si wom tin wala men ku si husani e-Sara taku wom ning i tunus ma wom ku lem epo wungin ta som.
60003007	Kuru wom masang tin enanangin men ku ira wungin then ma wom kuk to titie wom ira tulun hungin tin tunus men, ma wom wa ya hi si ken po e emkusi hi ku nhing ken wom men akomen, kuru ken mom e ku Got pakuh po mom to al ma yang naa wom epo tunusngin men, kumali kinesngin tin ta wom men ku endara ta klet soput tan akomen.
60003008	Wungin tin pyu pongin men wala ti, wom mosop men ku kuk to mi wom then, ma mi wom suk wal to won maikngin ta wom; wom men ku mi wom pit wo al ken wom e irit won weh men, u wom kuk to wungin tin epo min sukngin men, u to wungin tin wom ning i tunus epo al men kut tumen;
60003009	ma taku po ta ning i lengwal epo wom wa po ton mi wom tumen, men ku wom ning i emhut sun asin, si wom wa emhong ko po po, epo wom ion i epo wungin tin imen kha Got yuk wom epon ku wom iran men, kumali Got pakuh po wom epo emhong tin tan men maksin kut tumen.
60003010	Epon “taku po ta min epon ku min keh keh pit po tunusngin tan ma ion elup tin tunus men, men ku put kilil wungin lengwal tin ku me pol wo mamain men u won elit tin ku sakal wungin tin epo kusamuhngin men kut tumen.
60003011	Yang men ku wetpon wa wungin tin lengwal men, si yang ira wungin tin tunus men misan; yang men ku tohuh epon ku pon ta min wyungin ma yang pet kiran weh.
60003012	Epo yang tin Akono men maran nuk po po tin wungin ta hi siik men, ma yang kingan kuk epo kinesngin ta po, si yang maran arre ewut po tin ning wungin lengwal men.”
60003013	Ma ara weh ku ning i lengwal epo wom, tin taku wom si ken po tin ira wungin tin tunus men?
60003014	Si taku yanda wom wa won maikngin pit mi wungin tin siik men, men emhong tin ta Got men ko po wom ako. Ma wom kuk aku wom lem pit wo po tin ku hoh wom men, wa wom kamus tumen asin.
60003015	Si wom men ku wa Got then kha ku si nhum mi wom men, ma wom hihi kokyok kokyok epo wom ku sakal mut eya wom si ta po then then tin kines wom epo sinsin tin hoo mingin in mi wom epon men to wungin amlus u lemngin kut tumen;
60003016	ma wom kuk to mi wom tin ku wa lasin ta ko po wom som men, kumali taku po me hik put wungin pit po wom ken wom e ning wungin lengwal nginangan men, men ku po tin mimi wungin tin wom ning i tunus mi Krais men manngin wa hi.
60003017	Epon men tunus, tin taku Got min epon, men ku wom lat won maikngin epo wungin tunus ning nginan, si ku epo wungin lengwal ning nginan akomen.
60003018	Epo Krais kut men wuh won maanngin angan then ta misan epon ku mut eya lasin mosop ako, men yang tin wungin tan siik men wuh wungin mut eya po tin wungin ta hi ku siik som men, kumali yang wa it kyok me epo Got, men yang in mi emkusin ma po wi yang ko hun, si yang khekngin kyok si tunus epo Emiun Auluungin,
60003019	tin kho ma nhio wo yang ma yang li pok put sakalngin si ta emiun tin kan kanngin kuk men,
60003020	men emiun tin kho ma ku hul wet sakalngin som minan tin angan ta kho ma Got in e kaeng li maran nomalak mi elup tin ta a-Noa men, si a-Noa in e hihi imut tin imen, tin wuluk sakun kara engun khaut eip u miuk me sup, tumen, enu hi palolongin mi imut epo eki,
60003021	tin los po baptais tin palolo it homani men maksin kut tumen, men ku baptais tin klok siwulngin tin nuk po it men li men som. Awu. Si men los po it tin hau si wo Got to mi it tin ku wa lasin ta ko po it som men, epo khekngin kyok si tunus tin ta a-Yesus Krais men,
60003022	men yang tin kho li si wet pi ma yang li ung ewo wili Got tin api psik men, ma tihngin u emiun tin emhong si wut hi men, u emiun tin auwesngin men kut tumen mosop kho me sup wet wili yang kho kut.
60004001	Krais wuh won maanngin mut eya it epo yang emkusin kho kut, tumen ma wom kut men ku klet eya mi wom weh to mi wom tin ion mi wungin ken yang men, epo po ta tin wuh won maanngin epon emkusin kho men men mang ta wungin tin ku ning lasin nginangan epon men kho kut,
60004002	kumali elup tin ku yang iso in wo mulus epon men men ku yang in epo yang ku iso ira wungin tin po tunus sa ngelek epon men kyok akomen, si epon ku yang ira Got min misan.
60004003	Epo elup tin it kuk wo mulus min kho men men it siluk min epo it ku ira wungin tin po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men mi hi epon men engun ma men it ning wungin tin imen kho kut, epo minan tin imen men it muk muk ira wungin tin manngin ku wa it som epo it tin wiwil men, u mi it siwil si, u it um ma mara it hihi ewin, u it ning sasayihngin maran kiring kiring, u it kakaom ma it um, u it uluu got tin tororokngin men enun epo wungin tin it ning i sup mi al men engun kut tumen.
60004004	Wungin tin mosop imen men po teret epo wom ku iso whal ira po ton li sup mi wungin tin po ning i epo mi hi amen engun kai eki tin me nak po li men kyok akomen, tumen kha po sakal lengwal epo wom men.
60004005	Po men ku iso pok put wungin sinsin tin po ning wungin tin mosop imen epon men si ta yang tin hihi kho epo yang ku ples wungin ta po tin tunus kuk men u ta po tin huu kho li men kut tumen.
60004006	Wungin sinsin tin imen kha pok putngin tin tunus men men pok putngin epo po tin huu kho men maksin kut tumen, kumali wungin ta po men ku plesngin ma po huu ken po tunus mosop tin huu ewin men, si po khek kyok si tunus epo Emiun Auluungin ma po si tunus kuk ken Got men kyok kut tumen.
60004007	Elup tin kuli endara mosop li ponsol epon men men me tikayung kut, tumen ma wom men ku mi wom ek ma wom karut wom tunus kuma wom nut kinesngin ta wom.
60004008	Si wungin tin ku wom ning i e nhum epo sun kara men wala nuk ti, wom men ku wilayuk epo wom tin ku mi wom epo al weh men, epo min epo ngin men ku klet eya lasin munuman ako.
60004009	Wom men ku kuk to wungin tin ku wom ning i tunus epo al kuma mara wom pit tunus wo po tin me kuk mi mang tin ta wom men, si mi wom nuk epo po asin.
60004010	Wom mosop wa talungin ta wom then then kho kut, tumen ma wom men ku ning kumang epon tin ku wom nhio wo al epon men, kuma wom kuk ken wom e po tin mara hi pit wo endara tin maran kiring kiring e Got naa wom epon men tunus weh men.
60004011	Taku po ta pok put sakalngin, men ku pok put ken i e sakalngin tin me pol mi wo Got weh men. Taku po ta ning kumang tin ku nhio wo sun kara epon men, men ku ning i epo kakhangin tin Got tuon wai si men, kumali wungin mosop men ku Got wa yan pos epon epo a-Yesus Krais, tin moolngin u kakhangin tumen men ta yang in kokyok kokyok li kut men. Men irawin.
60004012	Apo, wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, wom men ku teret epo karongngin tin ku iso me karong wom ken yau men ken i e wungin enginin ta si wo wom men asin;
60004013	si wom men ku mi wom keh keh to min kehngin tin kai won maikngin tin wom pok min to Krais men, kumali moolngin tin ta yang men ku si put plo nginan in pi mlaeng, men ku mi wom keh keh to min kehngin tin nhum weh men.
60004014	Taku po mimi wom pit mi Krais yan, men emhong tin ta Got men ko po wom ako, epo Emiun tin to moolngin e ta Got men men ko nuk nhing po wom kho. Epo wungin ta po men yang wa ton mingin epon, si epo wungin ta wom men yang wa yan pos epon ako.
60004015	Si wom ku kuk aku po ta wom ta wuh won maanngin ken i e lek po ko huu nginangan wa tip tip nginangan, wa ning i lengwal epo sun nginangan, wa ku wlek hut li pit mi wungin ta po enginin kara men wa tumen asin.
60004016	Si taku po ta wuh won maanngin pit mi wungin tin won phep pit wo Krais men, men ku manngin wan asin, si men ku wa Got yan si epo wungin tin imen weh.
60004017	Epo elup tin po tin kuk mi mang tin ta Got men ku wungin ta hi plesngin epon men men kho si kut, ma taku wungin ples nginan tin imen ku hosingin epo it kho wet, men ku po tin ku hul wet pok putngin tin tunus e ta Got men som men kuli wungin li ponsol epo hi tua?
60004018	Ma taku po ta tin wungin tan siik men ku Got khung i takuma yang ku iso palolo i ako, men ku po tin ira wungin tin ku pit mina sun tin ta Got men som men u po tin ning lasin nginangan men kut tumen kuli wungin si epo hi tua?
60004019	Tumen ma po tin wuh won maanngin ira wungin tin nuk ta mi Got men, men ku mang ta enu hi sup yanga wili yang tin pho po endara mosop men ken yang e to wungin anuh men, ma po kuk e ning wungin tunus.
60005001	Po tin akokono e kuk lunga wom e mara hi pit wo palu walngin men, men ku nga wo nut hi, epo ngo men akono ta ken wom men maksin kut tumen ma marango nuk po won maanngin tin Krais wuh i men weh, kuru ngo e tin ku iso pok mi moolngin tin ku iso si in pi mlaeng sulung men to wom men kut tumen ako.
60005002	Ma nga wo nut wom ti, epo wom men ku pa ken sipsip tin ta Got e kuk lunga wom men weh, ma mara wom pit wo li, men ku ken po tin ku pae wo wom men asin, si men ku epo mi wom tin nawaehngin weh men, si wom men ku mara wom nes ulu kha wom taku ning i tumen akomen. Awu. Si wom men ku mi wom seh seh ta engin weh khama wom ning i tumen.
60005003	Kuru po tin Got mang ta hi sup yanga wili wom kuma mara wom pit wo hi men, men ku mara wom pit wo po ken po tin akokono e phaeng wo emhong ta hi men asin kut tumen, si wom men ku kuk ken tosukngin ta tin ku sipsip ion i ma li ira wom men.
60005004	Ma minan tin kuli yang tin maran pit wo sipsip e nhum weh men ku si put plo nginan pi mlaeng men, men ku wom wa moolngin tin pon mha hambip e ku pon mlis ewin som men ko ung e li li mhi wom.
60005005	Tumen kut kha wom tin masang e nenerengin men ku wa wom sup wet wili po tin akokono e mara hi pit wo wom men. Wai, wom mosop men ku wa wom sup wet wili al weh, ma wom pa mool po wom epo wungin tin wom wa wom ko men, epo “Got men nolo po tin wa hi si pit men, si yang naa po tin wa hi ko men epo min sukngin ako.”
60005006	Tumen ma wom men ku wa wom lu sup wet wili Got tin apalukngin weh men, kumali elup tin yang tuon won ung won men kha kuli yang wa ya wom si epon men,
60005007	ma wom men ku whis silan khingngin tin ta wom men mosop si po yang, epo yang men silan khing pit po wom weh ako.
60005008	Wom men ku karut wom ma wom haum tunus; epo emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan e nolo wom men men in e mili mili ken laion ta tin ingut e li in e langun epo po kara tin ku li kuum kuum hi men.
60005009	Wom men ku nuk nhing to wo phepngin ta wom ma wom wa ilio si slip po wom weh to mara yang, epo wom ion i epo won maikngin tin an sun timen kha si ta po ehuro wom tin ung e li li wo mulus men maksin kut tumen.
60005010	Si Got tin sinsin epo nanaangin mosop men, tin yuk it epo it ku li sup mi moolngin tin tan e sindak in li kut men epo Krais Yesus men, men ku wom wuh won maikngin kara put monlo long, anima yang men ku ning wom si tunus weh, u yang wa wom ko nuk nhing, u yang pa nhing wom, u yang wa wom ko ung tunus weh kut tumen.
60005011	Yang tin imen men moolngin u kakhangin tumen ku tan in kokyok kokyok li kut ako. Men irawin.
60005012	Epo a-Silwanus tin wiro it e nga ion wungin tan ken i e to wungin anuh men kha nga pan kisang tin hut sok iyi yanga wilin ti epo wom men, ma nga wo nut wom u nga pok put wungin tin marango nuk pon men kut tumen epo wungin tin iyi men nanaangin tin ta Got e irawin weh men ako, tin wom nuk nhing min kut men.
60005013	Palu walngin tin elut wom e ung Babilon men, tin Got won ung wo wom to al then men, men wa mi hi ti epo wom, kuru a-Mak tin wirukan men wa min ti epo wom maksin kut tumen.
60005014	Wom men ku wa mi wom si ta al to tumum wongin tin epo min epongin men weh. Min wyungin men ku in epo wom mosop tin in mi Krais Yesus men. Men irawin.
61001001	Ngo a-Saimon Pita tin kum wet wili a-Yesus Krais u ngo men paengin ta yang kut tumen, kha tih kisang tin iyi ti epo wom tin wa wo phepngin tin po ngel epon men then to pim epo wungin siik tin ta Got tin ta it men u epo a-Yesus Krais tin Palolongin ta it men kut tumen.
61001002	Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen men ku ko kol po wom ung e li si mi maran ekngin tin ta wom e epo Got u a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men kut tumen,
61001003	men ku ira emhong tin ta yang tin Gotan men tin yang naa it epo endara mosop tin epo tunusngin u wungin tin ku pit mina sun tin ta Got men weh kut tumen, epo maran ekngin tin ta it e epo yang tin yuk it epo moolngin tin tan tuon men u wungin tan tin tunus weh men kut tumen,
61001004	tin yang naa it epo sakalngin tin yang wo kuk mara it epon men tin nhum weh u po ngel epon nginangan men weh kut tumen, kumali sakalngin tin Got wo kuk mara it epon men kha ku wom pok mi wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got tuon in ton men weh, epon tin wom meleng wungin hies tin kuk wo mulus e sangelekngin pong siin si men kho men.
61001005	Kuru wungin sinsin tin wala imen kha ku wom tohuh epo wom ku hihi wungin tin amunu men si lup to wo phepngin, u wom hihi maran ekngin si lup to wungin amunu,
61001006	u wom hihi wungin tin wom karuk wom ton men si lup to maran ekngin, u wom hihi wungin tin ku wom nuk nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak epon men si lup to wungin tin wom karuk wom ton men, u wom hihi wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men si lup to wungin tin wom nuk nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak men,
61001007	u wom hihi wungin tin wom ning i tunus epo ehuro wom men si lup to wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men, u wom hihi min epongin si lup to wungin tin wom ning i tunus epo ehuro men kut tumen.
61001008	Epon taku wungin tin mosop imen nuk mi wom ma ung e si pu wal weh, men ku ning i ma wom kuk anhaung engun li enda enun ta wom om mi maran ekngin tin epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men akomen.
61001009	Epon taku po ta in engun epo wungin tin mosop imen men maran mhi epon men maran hilo pit po endara tin nuk hin men, men tulun som epo lasin tin tan kho men men mlisngin kho li kut.
61001010	Tumen ma, ehurok, wom men ku iso tohuh weh kut epo wom ku kakaek wungin tin Got yuk wom ma yang won ung wo wom epon men, epon taku wom kuk e ning wungin tin mosop men kut, men ku wom plong ko angan akomen;
61001011	epon taku wom ning i tumen, men ku Got hihi soput ta wom tunus ta ma put iing nuk tin ku wom lu sup mi enunu tin sindak ung e ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono u Palolongin ta it kut tumen.
61001012	Tumen ma ngo men ku wetpo ngo wa wungin tin ngo ku tak tulu wom kokyok kokyok epo wungin tin mosop imen akomen, aku, wom ion wungin tin irawin e nuk epo wom homani men, ma wom nuk nhing ton kho kut ako.
61001013	Wai, nga wo taku siik epo nga iso tunus in mi mang ausel tin iyi, men ku nga iso tak tulu wom ma tulun hungin ta wom kyok si,
61001014	epo nga ion i epo tikayung engun ma ngo ku mang ta mang ausel tin ta ngo iyi, ken sun tin a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men suk marango epon kho men.
61001015	Kuru ngo men ku iso tohuh weh epo ngo men ku yok ma kho li pol, men ku tulu wom hu pit wo wungin tin mosop imen kokyok kokyok ewi ngo.
61001016	Epo pasikngin tin awhat engun e po tunus mara hi ek i ma po pok put engun men ani ku pim a iran minan tin pim a pok wom epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men tin ku me to emhong men akomen. Awu. Mara pim weh nuk po yang tin in to moolngin tin nhum men kha pim a pok wom epon men ako.
61001017	Epo yang wa yan pos u moolngin kut tumen hang Got tin Wiraman men minan tin wut po ta sakal me ko ta yang me ko wet pi mi moolngin tin nhum men ma sakal taku, “Yang tin imen men Wiruk tin mi ngo epon weh men, tin mi ngo nawaehngin pit pon weh men kha imen.”
61001018	Ma tuo pim hul wut po tin imen tin me ko wet pi men minan tin pim a kuk to yang po pi emian tin auluungin men.
61001019	Tumen ma homani ma it kuk to wungin tin po pokngin pok put kho men men maran ko klat weh, tin taku wom ku ning i tunus, men ku tulu wom hu pit pon ken i e esul ta tin ngin ngin ma mha nuk pi tin mi ku men weh li pol pi tin ku plas ma awheng tin pok put pi mhangin men si ngin ngin ma mha nuk mi wom weh men;
61001020	epo wom men ku ion wungin tin iyi muk, epo sakalngin tin po pokngin pok put e nuk mi Panngin Auluungin men ku ta sinsin in epo pokngin ta weh tuon akomen,
61001021	epo wungin tin po pokngin pok put men ku me epo po tunus mi hi engun akomen. Awu. Po tin auluungin e ta Got weh men men pok put sakalngin ira Emiun Auluungin tin tet po li men kha men.
61002001	Kut si po pokngin torokngin kara kuk lunga po masang to sun wala Israel kho, tumen kut kha kuli po tin ku kot sun epo wungin torokngin men ku kara si nuk lunga wom maksin kut tumen ako, men ku yem yem me sup ma wa kotngin torokngin kara tin ku po mhuk mi wo phepngin ta sun epon men, men ku po wetpo hi sing yang tin Akono tin kul po men, ma wungin timen kha ku po wa mumhekngin kerek e me epo po tuo hi men.
61002002	Ma po munuman men ku ira wungin ta sun tin ku po mhukngin epon men, ma po tin torokngin imen kha ku soput tin ta wungin irawin men ton mingin sinsin si in epo hi men.
61002003	Maran nesngin ta po kha ku po torok mara wom epo wungin amo kara ma po espo endara ta wom kara men; wungin tin Got wo los po po pit min kho nginan kho men men ku kaeng li nomalak kyok akomen, u po tin ku Got mhuk hi men ku kuk asol po nginan kyok akomen kut tumen.
61002004	Epo Got ku sup wet po tin tihngin kara e ning lasin kho men akomen, si yang kan kan po, ma yang whis po li ko mi nahu tin pi mi ku klet min men, kuma po kasumngin kuk epo ples walngin;
61002005	kuru Got ku sup wet po masang to sun wala tin kuk wo mulus muk kho nginan men akomen, si yang palolo a-Noa tin in mi wuluk khaut eip u miuk me sup tumen, tin pok put wungin epo wungin tin siik men, kha li klet ma Got wa eki tin num men me ko po po tin kuk wo mulus e wungin ta hi ku pit mina sun tin ta Got men akomen;
61002006	kuru Got tin ning i ma pi Sodom to sun Gomora pii ko yau porin engun men, kha yang wo los po po epo po tin ku mumhek mingin men, men wungin timen kha yang ning po si ken tosukngin ta epo po tin kuli si sulung e ku hi ning wungin tin ku pit mina sun tin ta Got men akomen;
61002007	kuru Got palolo a-Lot tin wungin tan siik men, tin miun tuung pit po wungin tin po tin wungin ta hi lengwal men ku karuk hi epo wungin tin po mi hi siwil si epon men ewin som men
61002008	(epo yang tin imen tin wungin tan siik men men in lunga po, ma ungunan ta li ungunan ta men enu yang tin siik men won maik i epon tin yang ion wungin u yang hul wungin tumen tin po hik put sakalngin kokyok kokyok men)
61002009	iis, taku yang tin Akono men ning i tumen, men yang ion wungin tin tuni e ku yang palolo po tin ira wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men epo wungin tin karong po men ako, kuru yang ion wungin tin yang ku kasum po tin wungin ta hi ku siik som men iso kuk wet mumhekngin tin yang mumhek mi po epon men weh li pol minan tin kuli elup tin epo ples walngin men ku si epon men,
61002010	men ku Got ning i tumen weh epo po tin ira mi hi tin kling si epon ku ira wungin tin min lengwal men u po ion sun tin kuk to emhong e ku po mara hi pit wo sun epon men ken po e lengwal engun men kut tumen. Po men kuk to wungin tin po wa hi si pit men, u po men ira wungin tin po tuo hi mi hi epon men engun kut tumen, ma po ku lem epo po tin ku sakal lengwal epo po tin ya hi pos men akomen.
61002011	Si po tihngin men apalukngin u kakhangin ta hi men nhum epo po tin imen ako, takuma po ku wa wungin ta tin ku po hik put wungin ta pit po po tin imen to mara yang tin Akono men engun ewin akomen.
61002012	Si po tin imen kuk ken li ken nginan tin tulun hungin tan om e khuuk wal pit minal tumen, tin ningngin epon ku po tunus li sung won ma po lek i ko huu engun men, ma po sakal lengwal epo wungin tin po ku ion min sinsin tunus akomen, ma li ken nginan tin imen tin ku huu ma whuk men kha ku po tin imen whuk ken li ken nginan tin imen kut ako,
61002013	men ku po wa ulu sup wet wungin tin ku siik som men, ken po tin wo taku wungin tin ku po ii enda u um hambip to pi mhangin men men taku i e epo min kehngin engun. Po men ken ekoh tin ung e li li po wom elit men kara tin wom wa manngin epon men, ma po kuk e ii endara u um hambip tumen to wungin tin po tuo hi ek ek mi hi epon men minan tin po kakaom to wom men.
61002014	Po men wungin tin po sup si khi al nginangan men men nhum weh ma nuk mara hi sinsin, epon men po mara hi ku uspo mi hi weh epon tin ku hi ning lasin men angan akomen, men po wa wa mi sun masang wala tin ku hi hik e nuk nhing som men epo wungin tin imen. Po tuo hi mi hi suk mara hi epo maran nesngin tin maran kiring kiring men, ma po men tin khuuk wal then e ku Got ngil ngil hi men kha men.
61002015	Po men wetpo hi wa soput tin siik men, si po kuk e papiawo put soput amen engun, men po ira wungin tin a-Balam tin sun a-Beor khuuk i men iran ewin men, tin yang min pit pit wo ulu tin ku yang wai sup wet wungin tin ku siik som men engun;
61002016	takuma Got pio a-Balam emhut wungin tin tan tuon e yang hik put wungin tin siik men, men si mi wo donki tin ku sakal ewin som men ta ma donki sakal ken po tunus ta men ma li uluu yang tin pokngin men epo yang ku ira wungin ulil tin tan men asin.
61002017	Po tin imen men ken eki maran kara tin maran soslok men, u ken hingis kara tin pi punu ma pi tep i li men, men pi tin mi ku weh men men hihingin nuk soput po kho tin ku po li kuk epon kokyok kokyok li kut men.
61002018	Epo po men pok put sakalngin tin po wangan po hi epon e nhum weh men, tin wungin irawin om min men, ma po tin ira wungin tin po mi hi sangelek epon e ku po ning elwanngin maran kiring kiring epon men kha po wa wa mi sun tin iso plosngin homan mi sun tin kuk e ira wungin tin ulil men epon men.
61002019	Po men wo kuk mara sun epo wungin tin epo won piasngin men, si po tuo hi men kuh wungin tin hies men kha men; epo po ta tin sun ta huuspit maran men, men po tin imen men ku me kum wo sun tin imen engun.
61002020	Epon taku po yek ta wungin tin min lengwal e ta pi mulus men epo maran ekngin tin ta hi e epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono u Palolongin kut tumen kho kut, anima po kuh i angan ta kyok ma wungin tin imen me los po, men ku sulung ma po kuk lengwal weh epo sun tin po kuk lengwal muk men.
61002021	Epon men tunus epo po tin imen ku ion soput tin epo wungin tin siik men kho akomen, si po tin ion soput tin imen kho men, men kha po wetpo hi wa wungin tin maran ko klat e auluungin men tin wangin si ta po kho men, men ku tunus akomen.
61002022	Wungin tin imen men si epo po ira wungin emol tin irawin men tin wo taku, “Elwa kha mutwuk pit ma li li pae ma li kyok me iini men,” kuru “Kanem kha khis pon li klet anima kyok li pae ma me wisok ewin kyok men,” ti, tumen.
61003001	Apo, wom tin mi ngo pit wo wom weh men, homani ma nga pan kisang tin me ponwal angan iyi ti epo wom; mi kisang tin ponwal imen likiong men nga tak tulu wom kuma tulun hungin tin ta wom e min yil men men ku kyok si ken sun tin kho men,
61003002	kuma tulu wom hu nuk po engin kokyok kokyok epo sakalngin tin pok putngin kho mi wo po tin pokngin e hi auluungin men, u epo sakalngin tin maran ko klat e ta pim tin paengin ta yang tin Akono e Palolongin men kut tumen.
61003003	Ma wungin tin ku wom ion i muk men wala ti, epo mi elup tin ku me sulung men, men ku po tin kuk to ton mingin nginangan men kara me, men ku po muk muk ira sangelekngin tin ta hi tuo hi men,
61003004	ma po sakal taku, “Wungin tin epo wo kuk marangin epo yang tin ku kyok me men men li ani a? Epo hosingin minan tin po tin yau a it sin men huu kho ma me pol homan tin i, men endara mosop iso maran nuk ewin ako ken sun tin pho pongin ewo maran men kha iso nuk ti kut i.”
61003005	Epo po mi hi epo po ku tulu hi som epo wungin ta tin nuk ti, epo sakalngin tin ta Got men kha wet pi si nuk epon kho nginan men, kuru mulus men ningngin si mi eki ma ung emin eki kut tumen.
61003006	Epon tin imen kha mulus tin nuk minan timen eki nhum si won ma mhukngin epon men.
61003007	Sakalngin tin wala imen kha wet pi to mulus tin nuk homani men kasumngin nuk epo yau tin ku iini men, men ku kaeng nuk tumen weh li pol mi elup tin kuli ples walngin si epon ma po tin wetpo hi wa Got men huuspit epon men.
61003008	Si wom tin mi ngo pit wo wom weh men, wom kuk aku tulu wom som ta wungin tin then iyi, epo to mara yang tin Akono men men ungunan ta men maran ken posan khum khum khum then ta men (1,000), kuru posan khum khum khum then ta men ken ungunan then ta engun kut tumen.
61003009	Yang tin Akono men ku iak mi engin epon ku pyu po wo kuk marangin tin tan men ken po kara tin mara hi ira wungin epo iak mi engin ken i e li maran nomalak men akomen, si yang men in e wuh wungin kho epo it, epo yang min epo po ta ku huuspit som, si po mosop men ku phae mi hi weh.
61003010	Takuma elup tin ta yang tin Akono men kuli si ken po tipngin ta tin me to pi luk men ako, ma mi elup tin imen men ku wet pi mosop li om to ingutngin nhum ta, ma endara tin tururun e mulus ningngin epon men men ku kyu ko min ekian epo ngeng ngengngin nhum ta, ma mulus to kumang mosop tin nuk won men ku yau suuk siin ii nginan.
61003011	Apo, endara tin mosop imen kuli kyungin ko om tumen, tumen ma wom men ku kuk tuni, men ku wom kuk to wungin tin wom ira wungin tin min yil men u wungin tin wom lem pit wo Got men kut tumen, wah?
61003012	Wom men ku kuk e haum epo ungunan tin ta Got men tin kuli pusngin me men, epo ungunan tin ta Got men tin kuli si men kha ku wet pi men ku yau iini ma kyungin ko om u endara tin tururun e mulus ningngin epon men ku ko mi ekian epo ngeng ngengngin nhum ta men kut tumen.
61003013	Takuma wungin tin yang wo kuk mara it epon men kha it kuk e haum epo wet pi homan ta u mulus homan ta kut tumen, tin kuli si pi sinsin tin wungin tin siik men ung epon men.
61003014	Tumen ma wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, wom men ku kuk e haum epo wungin tin mosop imen tin kuli si sulung men, men ku wom tohuh kuma yang me pon ta wom tin ung aminis ma salngin om po wom u wungin om po wom men kut tumen.
61003015	Ma wom ion wungin tin yang tin Akono men wuh wungin li maran nomalak epon men men wungin tin ku Got palolo po kara epon men kha men. Tumen wala wiro it a-Pol tin mi it epon weh men men ira mhin ekngin tin Got wai ko ta yang men ma yang pan kisang ta ti epo wom men.
61003016	Tumen kut kha kisang tin mosop e yang pan i men men yang sakal nuk min epo wungin tin mosop imen maksin kut tumen; mi kisang tin imen men sakalngin kara nuk tin khung nginan epon ku mara it ples i sinsin men; sakalngin tin imen po tin pong epo engin men u po tin ku nuk nhing som men kut tumen phae sakalngin sinsin li enginin, men wungin tin kuli sulung ma po huuspit epon men; po ning i tumen epo Panngin Auluungin tin kara maksin men kut tumen.
61003017	Wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, wom ion wungin tin imen tin ku iso si men kho, tumen ma wom men ku haum tunus weh, epon akuli wungin ulil ta po tin wungin ta hi ulil men wa wa mi wom, ma wom lu plong ko epo wom tin kho ma wom nuk nhing men.
61003018	Si wom men ku plok si to nanaangin u min ekngin tumen, tin epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono u Palolongin ta it men kut tumen. Yang kha ku moolngin in epon homani u kokyok kokyok li kut men tumen. Men irawin.
62001001	Sakalngin tin in kho epo endara mosop tin hosingin men, tin pim a hul i kho, tin pim a ion i kho epo mara pim weh, tin pim a tupan kho, kuru wili pim kah pon kho kut men tumen, Sakalngin tin epo tunusngin tin imen kha pim a pok put wungin epon men.
62001002	Tunusngin tin imen si put plo nginan pi mlaeng kho, ma pim a ion i ma pim a pok put sakalngin epon ma pim a suk mara wom epo tunusngin tin imen tin sindak in men, tin kho ma in to Wiraman li klet anima si put plo nginan epo pim men.
62001003	Enda tin imen tin pim a ion i u pim a hul i kho men tumen kha pim a pok put si ta wom, kuma wom kut men ku klap wal to pim to mi it then men. Ma irawin weh epo pim a klap wal to Wirama it u to Wirun tin a-Yesus Krais men tumen to mi pim then maksin kut tumen.
62001004	Ma sakalngin tin mosop iyi men pim a pan i ti epo wom kuma min kehngin tin ta wom men men ku si kol weh.
62001005	Sakalngin tin pim a hul i mi wo yang kho ma pim a pok put si ta wom men wala ti, epo Got kha sinsin epo pi tin mha men ma pi mi ku ku kara in mi yang akomen.
62001006	Taku it wo epo it men mi it then to yang, si it muk muk mi pi mi ku, men it torok kha men ma it ku ira wungin tin irawin men kyok akomen.
62001007	Si taku it muk muk mi pi tin mha men ken yang tin in pi mha men, men it klap wal to min thenngin kha men, ma kalolwa a-Yesus Krais tin Wirun men khis mi it epo lasin mosop.
62001008	Taku it wo epo lasin ta it om, men it torok mara it tuo it kha men, ma wungin tin irawin men ku in mi it akomen.
62001009	Taku it pok put lasin ta it, men yang in to wungin tan anuh u siik kut tumen kuma yang klok lasin tin ta it men li ma yang khis mi it epo wungin mosop tin ku siik som men.
62001010	Taku it wo epo it men ku ning lasin ta kho som, men it ning i ken Got e torok nginangan men kha men, ma sakalngin tin ta yang men ku in mi it akomen.
62002001	Husanik tin hohoin men, nga pan sakalngin tin iyi ti epo wom, kumali wom men ku ning lasin asin. Si taku po ta ning lasin, men yang tin ku kho wo it men ta in hang Wirama it men, men a-Yesus Krais tin wungin tan siik weh men ako.
62002002	Ma yang tuon kha talungin tin yang kiis li mut eya lasin ta it ma Got min ko li wyu ung epon men, men ku yang kiis li mut eya lasin tin ta it men misan som, si men mut eya lasin tin ta po mosop tin hi ung e li li wo mulus men maksin kut tumen ako.
62002003	Ma wungin tin it ion i epo it tin ion yang kho men wala ti, epon taku it ira wungin tin yang wo maran ko klat epon men weh.
62002004	Taku po ta sakal taku, “Ngo men ion yang kho,” takuma ku ira wungin tin yang wo maran ko klat epon men ewin som, men torok kha men, ma wungin tin irawin men ku in min akomen.
62002005	Si taku po ta ira sakalngin tin ta yang men weh, men irawin epo min epongin tin ta Got men si pyu pongin weh in min. Wungin tin imen kha it ion it tin kuk mi yang epon men.
62002006	Taku po ta wo epon e bing in mi yang, men tunus epon tuon men ku muk muk ira wungin ken sun tin yang muk muk iran kho men.
62002007	Ehurok, ngo men ku pan wungin maran ko klat homan ta ti epo wom som, si men wungin tin maran ko klat e nuk kho nginan men ta tin wom kuk ton ewo maran me pol homani kut i ako. Wungin tin maran ko klat e nuk kho nginan men men sakalngin tin wom hul i ewo maran ma me pol homani kut i ako.
62002008	Sini wungin maran ko klat tin nga pan i ti epo wom men men homan ta ako, men irawin in mi yang u irawin in mi wom kut tumen, epo pi mi ku ung e mlis kut, si pi tin mha e irawin weh men men mha ko klet kho kut.
62002009	Taku po ta wo epon e in mi pi tin mha men, takuma iso min lel po ehuro hi ta, men iso in mi pi mi ku kha me pol homani kut i ako.
62002010	Taku po ta min epo wiron ta, men iso in mi pi tin mha men ako, ma wungin tin ku ning i ma po enginin kara tut po khi hi epon men ku ta in min akomen.
62002011	Si taku po ta min lel wiron ta, men iso in mi pi mi ku ma muk muk ira wungin tin ta pi mi ku men ako, ma men ku pon ta pi tin ku li epon men akomen, epo pi tin mi ku men klet maran kho.
62002012	Husanik tin hohoin men, nga pan wungin ti epo wom, epon tin lasin ta wom men klokngin kho kut men sinsin epo yang yan men.
62002013	Wom tin po irama wom men, nga pan sakalngin ti epo wom, epo wom men ion yang tin in kho epo endara mosop tin hosingin men kho. Wom masang tin wawahin men, nga pan wungin ti epo wom epo wom men nomka hut emiun tin wungin tan lengwal men kho kut. Wom tin hohoin men, nga pan wungin ti epo wom, epo wom men ion yang tin Wirama it men kho kut tumen.
62002014	Wom tin po irama wom men, nga pan wungin ti epo wom kho, epo wom men ion yang tin in kho epo endara mosop tin hosingin men kho. Wom masang tin wawahin men, nga pan wungin ti epo wom kho, epo wom men nuk nhing, ma sakalngin tin ta Got men in bing mi wom, ma wom nomka hut emiun tin wungin tan lengwal men kho kut.
62002015	Wom men ku mi wom pit pit wo wungin tin ta pi mulus men wa endara tin nuk won men kut tumen asin. Epon taku po ta min pit wo wungin tin ta pi mulus men, men min epongin tin ta Wirama it men ku in min akomen.
62002016	Epo wungin mosop tin nuk wo mulus men, tin sangelekngin tin ta elit it men, u maran nesngin tin nuk mara it siin men, u wungin tin po wa hi si pit wo mulus men kut tumen, men ku me hang Wirama it men akomen, si men ta pi mulus ako.
62002017	Ma mulus men wungin tan ung e mlis li kut to sangelekngin mosop tin tan men. Si taku po ta ira wungin tin Got min epon men, men ku tunus in kokyok kokyok li kut.
62002018	Husanik tin hohoin men, elup hut sok ta tin ku si sulung men men si in kut khae. Ma wom tin hul kho epo yang tin nolo Krais men ku iso me men kha homani men po tin nolo Krais men munuman kho me kut, wala it ion i epo elup tin hut sok men kho si in kut men.
62002019	Po tin imen yok lunga it ma hi li pol kut, takuma po men ku ta it weh akomen. Epon taku po ku ta it weh, men ku po iso kuk to it ako. Takuma po li pol kut kuma wungin si in pi mlaeng, epo po tin imen ku ta it akomen.
62002020	Si wom men kuk to Emiun Auluungin tin yang tin wungin tan auluungin men yuk i ko po wom kho men, ma wom mosop men mara wom ek kut.
62002021	Wom e ku pong epo wungin tin irawin men ani nga pan wungin ti epo wom kho men som. Awu. Wom tin pon tan men ako kha nga pan wungin ti epo wom men. Kuru wom ion i maksin epo wungin torokngin ta men ku ta wungin tin irawin men akomen kut tumen.
62002022	Ara weh men torok nginangan? Men po ta tin wo epo a-Yesus men ku Krais som men ako, wah? Po ta tin wetpon wa Got ngong Wirun men men nolo Krais kha men.
62002023	Taku po ta wo epo Got Wirun e ku Got Wirun weh som, men ku in to Wiraman akomen. Si taku po ta pok put sakalngin in pi mlaeng epo yang e Got Wirun, men in to Wiraman maksin kut tumen ako.
62002024	Tumen ma wom men ku mang ta wungin tin wom hul i ewo maran ma me men men ku bing nuk mi wom. Taku wungin tin wom hul i ewo maran ma me men men ku bing nuk mi wom, men wom kut men ku bing kuk mi Got Wirun u mi Wiraman maksin kut tumen ako.
62002025	Ma wungin tin yang wo kuk mara it epon men wala ti, men tunusngin tin sindak men.
62002026	Wungin tin iyi men nga pan i ti epo wom epo po tin taku ek ek mi wom men.
62002027	Takuma Emiun Auluungin tin yukngin ko po wom e me hang yang men men bing in mi wom, ma wom men ku hing wo po ta tin ku kot wom men akomen. Awu. Emiun tin wala imen tin yukngin ko po wom men men kot wom epo wungin mosop ako, ma men irawin ako, si ku torokngin ta som. Tumen ma wom men ku bing kuk mi yang ken sun tin Emiun Auluungin kot wom epon men.
62002028	Husanik tin hohoin men, homani men ku wom iso bing kuk mi yang, kumali yang si put plo nginan pi mlaeng, men ku mi it puplet si ku manngin wa it ma it mikih to mara yang minan tin yang ku me men akomen.
62002029	Taku wom ion yang e wungin tan siik, men ku wom ion i maksin epo po mosop tin ning wungin siik nginangan men men ko khuukngin homan epo yang kut tumen ako.
62003001	Auweh, wom ku ion min epongin tin nhum weh e Wirama it naa it epon men, tin yang ku sikia it e husani Got epon men! Tumen po masang to sun wala tin ung wo mulus men ku hop it akomen, epo po men ku hop yang kho akomen.
62003002	Apo, wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, homani men it si husani Got kho kut ako. Ma it kuli iso si kuk tua, men ku pok putngin si in pi mlaeng kho akomen. Takuma it ion i epo yang kuli iso si pol pi mlaeng, men ku it si ken yang weh men, epo mara it ku kon yang men in timen kut.
62003003	Ma po mosop tin hoo mingin tin imen nuk mi hi men men hi kuk e whek mi hi kumali hi si mi hi yil ken yang tin min yil in men.
62003004	Taku po ta ning lasin, men ning wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin men kut ako, epo lasin men wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men kha men.
62003005	Ma wom ion i epo yang si put plong nginan pi mlaeng kho epon ku yang klok lasin tin ta it men li, si yang tuon men ku lasin ta in min akomen.
62003006	Taku po ta bing in mi yang, men ku ning lasin nginangan akomen. Si taku po ta ning lasin nginangan, men ku ion yang wa pon ta yang kho akomen.
62003007	Husanik tin hohoin men, wom kuk akuli wom mang ta po ta ma me ek ek mi wom epo torokngin ta asin. Taku po ta ning wungin tin siik men nginangan, men wungin tan siik ken sun tin ta Krais e siik men ako.
62003008	Si taku po ta in e ning lasin nginangan, men ta emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men ako, epo yang men in e ning lasin li li ewo maran ma me men. Epo wungin sinsin tin Got Wirun si put plong nginan epon men wala ti, men epon kuma yang mhuk kumang mosop tin ta emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men ako.
62003009	Taku po ta ko khuukngin homan epo Got, men ku ning lasin nginangan ewin akomen, epo tunusngin sinsin tin Got khuuk yang epon men men iso in mi yang. Ma yang ku ning lasin akomen, epo yang men ko khuukngin homan kho epo Got kha men.
62003010	Wungin tin po tin husani Got men u po tin husani emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men tumen ku si kuk pi mlaeng tumen epon men men wala ti: taku po ta ku ning wungin tin siik men nginangan som, men ku ta Got akomen. Kuru po ta tin ku min epo wiron som men, men ku ta Got akomen kut tumen.
62003011	Epo wungin tin wom hul i ewo maran ma me pol homani men wala ti, epo it men ku mi it epo al weh.
62003012	Si it men ku kuk ken a-Kain men asin. Epo yang men ta emiun tin wungin tan lengwal men kha yang wi wiron ko hun amhees engun men. Ma sinsin tua ma li yang wi sun ko hun? Epo wungin tin ta yang men men lengwal, si wungin tin ta wiron men men siik.
62003013	Ehurok, taku po tin ung wo mulus men mi hi lel wom, men ku wom teret won asin.
62003014	It ion i epo it men al pongin mi hunngin kho li sup mi tunusngin epo wungin tin wala ti, epo it tin mi it epo po tin ehuro it men. Taku po ta ku min epo wiron som, men iso in mi hunngin ako.
62003015	Taku po ta min lel wiron, men in ken po tin lek sun ko huu nginangan men ta kha men. Ma wom ion i epo po ta tin in e lek po ko huu nginangan men ku tunusngin tin sindak in kokyok kokyok men in min akomen.
62003016	Wungin sinsin tin it hop min epongin epon men wala ti, epo yang tin min alang si tunusngin tin tan men ko mut eya it men. Ma tunus epo it kut men ku mi it alang si tunusngin tin ta it men ko mut eya po tin ehuro it men maksin kut tumen.
62003017	Si taku po ta in to endara tin ta pi mulus men kara, ma ion wiron ta in e kalwok ma suh min epo sun si ku min suk sun som, men ku min epongin tin ta Got men ku in mi po tin imen tua?
62003018	Husanik tin hohoin men, it men ku mi it epo wal epo sakalngin tin me pol mi wo it men engun asin, si it men ku mi it epo wal to wungin tin it ku ning i e irawin weh men.
62003019	Ma wungin tin ku it ion it tin ta wungin irawin ma ku pa nhing wo phepngin tin nuk mi it men epon men wala ku nuk tumen.
62003020	Epon taku mi it wo los po it, aku, Got men nhum epo mi it ako, ma yang men ion wungin mosop.
62003021	Apo, wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, taku mi it ku wo los po it som, men ku it me pol ta Got to mi it tin puplet men ako.
62003022	Ma wungin tin tuni e ku it kines yang epon men, men ku it wai hang yang ako, epo it kasum wungin sinsin tin yang wo maran ko klat epon men ma it ning wungin tin yang min tunusngin epon men.
62003023	Ma wungin tin yang wo maran ko klat epon men wala nuk ti, epo it men ku wo it phep pit wo ya a-Yesus Krais tin Wirun men u mi it epo al kut tumen ken yang wo maran ko klat ta it kho epon men.
62003024	Taku po ta kasum wungin tin yang wo maran ko klat epon men, men bing in mi yang, u yang bing in min kut tumen. Ma wungin tin it ion i epo yang in bing mi it epon men wala nuk ti, men epo Emiun tin yang wai ko ta it men.
62004001	Apo, wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, wom men ku wo wom nuk wet emiun mosop asin, si wom men ku hul pit mi emiun wet, men ku me hang Got wa men. Epo po pokngin torokngin munuman yang wal li pol yanga mulus kho kut.
62004002	Wungin tin it hop Emiun tin ta Got men epon men wala ti: emiun mosop tin pok put a-Yesus Krais tin kho me in wo mulus mi emkusin men men me hang Got men ako.
62004003	Si emiun mosop tin ku pok put a-Yesus Krais tin kho me in wo mulus mi emkusin men som men, men ku me hang Got akomen. Emiun tin imen men emiun tin ku pong si yang tin nolo Krais men kha men, tin wom hul kho epon kuli iso me men, ma homani ma kho me in wo mulus kho kut.
62004004	Husanik tin hohoin men, wom men ta Got ako, ma po pokngin torokngin tin imen huuspit mara wom kho, epo yang tin in mi wom men, men nhum epo sun tin in mi po tin ung wo mulus men ako.
62004005	Po men ta pi mulus ako, wala po sakal ken po tin ta pi mulus men, ma po tin ung wo mulus men hul wet sun engun.
62004006	Si it men ta Got. Taku po ta ion Got, men ku hul wet it ako; si taku po ta ku ta Got som, men ku hul wet it akomen. Wungin tin it hop emiun tin ta wungin tin irawin men u emiun tin ta wungin tin torokngin men tumen wala nuk tumen.
62004007	Apo, wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, it men ku mi it epo al weh, epo min epongin men me mi Got ako. Ma po mosop tin mi hi epo sun men men ko khuukngin homan epo Got ma ion Got ako.
62004008	Taku po ta ku min epo sun ta som, men ku ion Got akomen, epo Got men sinsin epo min epongin ako.
62004009	Wungin tin min epongin tin ta Got men si pol pi mlaeng kho epon men wala ti, epo Got tih Wirun tin enun then men me ko in wo mulus, kumali it si tunus kuk epo yang.
62004010	Wungin sinsin tin epo min epongin men wala ti, it ani ku mi epo Got muk men som, si yang kha min epo it ma yang tih Wirun ku me ken talungin ta tin ku yang kiis i mut eya lasin ta it ma Got min ko li wyu ung epon men.
62004011	Apo, wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, epon taku Got min epo it epo wungin tin nuk tumen, men tunus epo it men ku mi it epo al maksin kut tumen.
62004012	Po ta men ku maran kon Got angan ta kho akomen, si taku mi it epo al weh, men Got bing in mi it ako, ma min epongin tin tan men si pyu pongin weh mi it.
62004013	Wungin tin it ion it tin it bing kuk mi yang men u yang tin bing in mi it men kut tumen wala ti, epo yang tin pok mi Emiun tin tan tuon men ma yang naa it epon kara men.
62004014	Ma pim a ion i kho ma pim a pok put epo Got tin Wiraman men tuon kha tih Wirun me ko ken Palolongin tin ta pi mulus men.
62004015	Taku po ta pok put a-Yesus men e Got Wirun, men Got bing in min, u po tin imen men bing in mi yang kut tumen.
62004016	Ma it ion i kho ma wo it phep pit wo min epongin tin ta Got e yang min pit wo it epon men. Got men kha sinsin epo min epo ngin men, ma taku po ta bing in mi min epongin men bing in mi Got, u Got bing in mi po kut tumen ako.
62004017	Wungin tin min epongin kho si pyu pongin weh mi it epon men men wala ti, epo it tin ku mi it puplet mi ungunan tin ku si epo ples walngin men. Epo yang tin in timen, tumen kut kha it maksin ung tumen wo mulus tin iyi kut tumen.
62004018	Lemngin ta men ku in mi min epongin ewin akomen. Awu. Min epongin tin pyu pongin weh men in e klet epo lemngin tin imen weh li pol mara so. Epo lemngin men sinsin nuk ti, epo it tin kuli iso wa mumhek mingin epon men. Si taku po ta lem weh, men min epo ngin ku si pyu pongin weh min kho akomen.
62004019	It men mi it pit wo Got, sinsin men in epo yang kha min pit wo it muk men.
62004020	Taku po ta wo taku, “Ngo men mi ngo pit wo Got” ti, si men min lel wiron, men in to wungin tin torok nginangan men kha men. Epon taku po ta ku min pit wo wiron tin po ion i kho men som, men ku min pit wo Got tin ku po ion i kho som men tua?
62004021	Ma wungin tin maran ko klat e it wai hang Got men wala ti, epon taku po ta min pit wo Got, men ku min pit wo wiron weh maksin kut tumen ako.
62005001	Taku po ta won phep pit wo a-Yesus tin e Krais men, men ko khuukngin homan epo Got kho kut. Ma po mosop tin mi hi pit wo yang tin khuuk po men, men mi hi pit wo po tin yang khuuk hi men maksin kut tumen ako.
62005002	Wungin tin it ion it tin mi it pit wo Got husanin epon men wala ti, taku mi it pit wo Got ma it kasum wungin mosop tin yang wo maran ko klat epon men weh.
62005003	Epo min epongin tin mi it pit wo Got epon men sinsin wala nuk ti, taku it kasum wungin mosop tin yang wo maran ko klat epon men weh. Ma wungin mosop tin yang wo maran klat epon men men ku hik e maik weh akomen.
62005004	Epo enda tin ko khuukngin homan epo Got men men nomnga hut wungin tin ta pi mulus men weh. Ma wungin tin it nomnga hut wungin tin ta pi mulus men epon men wala nuk ti, men wo phepngin ta it ako.
62005005	Ara weh e ku nomnga hut wungin tin ta pi mulus men? Men po ta tin won phep pit wo a-Yesus tin e Got Wirun men kha men ako, wah?
62005006	Yang tin imen tin wala me epo eki u kalolwan kut tumen -- men a-Yesus Krais ako. Yang men ku me epo eki misan som, si yang men me epo eki u kalolwan kut tumen ako. Ma Got Emiun kha pok put wungin epo yang men, epo Emiun tin ta Got men men sinsin epo wungin tin irawin men.
62005007	Epo wuluk khaut miuk kha pok put wungin ili wet pi men: men Got tin Wiraman men, u Sakalngin, u Emiun Auluungin kut tumen. Ma wuluk tin khaut miuk imen men then.
62005008	Kuru wuluk khaut miuk kha pok put wungin wo mulus men: men Emiun Auluungin, u eki, u kalolwan kut tumen. Ma wuluk tin khaut miuk imen mi ngyuk then ken wuluk e po then ta men kha men.
62005009	Taku it wa sakalngin tin po tunus pok put men, men wungin tin Got pok put men men nhum epo sun ako. Epo wungin tin Got pok put men wala tumen, tin yang pok put epo Wirun weh men.
62005010	Taku po ta won phep pit wo Got Wirun, men sakalngin pok putngin min tuon. Si taku po ta ku won phep pit wo Got Wirun som, men wo ken Got e torok nginangan men, epo yang ku won phep pit wo wungin tin Got pok put si ta it epo yang Wirun men akomen.
62005011	Ma wungin tin pok putngin men wala nuk ti, epo Got men wa tunusngin tin sindak men ko ta it kho, ma tunusngin tin imen men in mi Wirun.
62005012	Taku po ta in to Got Wirun men wa tunusngin kut, si taku po ta ku in to Got Wirun som, men ku wa tunusngin akomen.
62005013	Wungin tin mosop imen men nga pan i ti epo wom tin wo wom phep pit wo ya Got Wirun men, kuma wom ion i epo wom men kuk to tunusngin tin sindak men kho kut, kuru epo wom ku iso wo wom phep pit wo ya Got Wirun kokyok kokyok li kut tumen.
62005014	Ma wungin tin mi it puplet pit wo Got epon men wala nuk ti, epon taku it kines epo endara ta ira yang min weh, men ku yang hul wet it ako.
62005015	Ma taku it ion i epo yang hul wet it epo wungin tin tuni e it kines yang epon men, men ku it ion i epo endara tin it kines yang epon men men it kasum i kho kut ako.
62005016	Taku po ta ion wiron ta tin in e ning lasin ta tin ku wa po li epo hunngin men som, men ku tuon kines Got, men ku yang tuon wa tunusngin si ta po tin ku ning lasin tin ku wa po li epo hunngin som men. Epo lasin ta tin ku wa po li epo hunngin men men weh in ako. Ngo ku sakal epo po ku kines epo wungin tin imen akomen.
62005017	Wungin mosop tin ku siik som men men lasin ako, ma lasin ta tin ku wa po li epo hunngin som men men weh in ako.
62005018	It ion i epon taku po ta ko khuukngin homan epo Got, men ku ning lasin nginangan ewin akomen. Awu. Po ta tin ko khuukngin homan epo Got men men tuon maran pit won weh, ma emiun tin wungin tan lengwal men men ku me kah pon akomen.
62005019	It ion i epo it men ta Got, si po mosop tin ung wo mulus men men nuk wet wili emiun tin wungin tan lengwal men.
62005020	Kuru it ion i epo Got Wirun men kho me kut ma yang wa maran ekngin si ta it, kumali it ion yang tin wungin tan anuh men. Ma it men kuk mi yang tin wungin tan anuh men, epon tin it kuk mi yang Wirun tin a-Yesus Krais men. Got tin irawin men u tunusngin tin sindak men tumen sinsin wala li nuk tumen.
62005021	Husanik tin hohoin men, wom men ku karuk wom lu kuk hin epo got tin tororokngin men enu hi. Men irawin.
63001001	Ngo tin akono men kha pan kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon tin wala lamit e Got won ung wo ngon men to husanim, tin mi ngo pit wo wom mi wungin tin irawin men, men ku misa ngo som, men po mosop tin ion wungin tin irawin men kut tumen.
63001002	Min epongin tin imen sinsin in epo wungin tin irawin men tin bing nuk mi it ma ku iso weh in to it kokyok kokyok li kut men.
63001003	Nanaangin, u min sukngin, u min wyungin tumen, tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono e Wiraman Got men kut tumen, men ku in to wom mi wungin tin irawin men u min epongin kut tumen.
63001004	Mi ngo keh hambip takut epo ngo tin kho ma nga pon ta husanim kara tin muk muk mi wungin tin irawin men ira wungin tin maran ko klat e it wai kho hang Got tin Wirama it men.
63001005	Ma homani men nga suh mi kingap tin wala lamit men ken ngo e pan wungin maran ko klat homan ta som, si men tin it kuk ton ewo maran ma me men tin wala nuk ti, epo it men ku mi it pit wo al weh.
63001006	Min epongin men sinsin wala nuk ti, epo it men ku muk muk mi wungin mosop tin Got wo maran ko klat epon men weh. Wungin tin maran ko klat e wom hul i ewo maran ma me men epo wom ku muk muk min men wala nuk tumen.
63001007	Epo po munuman tin ek ek mara po ewin men kho li pol e li li wo mulus, men ku hi pok put a-Yesus Krais tin e me in wo mulus to sun emkusin ta men akomen. Yang tin in to wungin tin yang ek ek mi po u yang nolo Krais men tumen wungin tan wala nuk tumen.
63001008	Wom men ku haum eya wom tunus, epon akuli it huuspit, si it ku wa talungin tin it khung po engin kho epon taku it wai men akomen, si kuma it wa talungin ta it palamusung tin emhut kumang ta it men.
63001009	Taku po ta hik put sakalngin ma ku weh pit nhing in mi kotngin tin ta Krais men ewin som, men ku in to Got som. Si taku po ta weh pit nhing in mi kotngin tin ta Krais men, men in to Got ngong Wirun likiong.
63001010	Taku po ta me pol ta wom ma ku me to kotngin tin imen som, men ku wom wa po tin imen mu sup mi mang tin ta wom men wa wom wa mi wom si tan asin kut tumen.
63001011	Epon taku po ta wa min si ta sun, men pok mi wungin lengwal tin ta sun men kha men.
63001012	Nga in to wungin munuman tin ngo taku pan i ti epo wom men, takuma mi ngo epo ngo ku pan wungin epo kisang u mara sut tumen akomen. Si nga hoo mi ngo epo tuo ngo men ku weh ti pol ta wom kuma mara it sak wal weh ma it sakal ta al, kumali min kehngin tin ta it men men ku si kol weh.
63001013	Po tin hohoin e erom tin Got won ung won men khuuk i men wa mi hi ti epo wom. Men irawin.
64001001	Ngo tin akono men kha pan kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon a-Gaius tin mi ngo pit wo ngon mi wungin tin irawin men.
64001002	Ngon tin mi ngo pit wo ngon men, nga kines Got epo wungin mosop men ku saa tunus weh ti epo ngon ma elit ngon men ku nuk nhing ken sun tin enu ngon nuk nhing min men.
64001003	Epo mi ngo keh keh hambip takut minan tin po ehuro it kara me pok put wungin tin irawin e in mi ngon men, men po me pok epo ngon tin muk muk mi wungin tin irawin men weh ako.
64001004	Min kehngin ta ngo men ku ta maksin nhum in ken sun tin nga hul epo husanik tin muk muk mi wungin tin irawin men akomen.
64001005	Ngon tin mi ngo pit wo ngon men, ngon men ira wungin tin anuh weh men tin e ning i tuni u tua tumen epo po tin ehuro it men u epo po tin api enginin men kut tumen,
64001006	tin hi me pok put sakalngin epo min epongin tin tap men to mara palu walngin tin hi mosop me palu wal then men. Taku e tih po lu ira soput tin ku po weh li iran men to wungin tin tunus epo po tin ta Got men ku iran men, men e ning i tunus kha men ako.
64001007	Epo po tin imen li pol yanga pi mili mili sinsin in epo yang yan men, men po ku wa endara hang po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e hi ku wo hi phep som men ta akomen.
64001008	Tumen ma it men ku wa po tin wungin ta hi nuk tumen, kuma it si ken po tin it ku kum to al then epo wungin tin irawin men weh.
64001009	Nga pan kisang ta li epo palu walngin kho, takuma a-Diotrepes tin min pit wo wungin tin taku si li muk lunga po men ku wa pim akomen.
64001010	Tumen ma taku nga me, men ku nga me tak si wungin tin yang ning i men si in pi mlaeng, epon tin yang hik put wungin pit wo pim to wungin tin lengwal e me pol mi wo yang men. Ma wungin tin imen ung mi yang ma yang min ku ko li wyu ung akomen. Awu. Yang tuon ku wa po tin ehuro it men me sup lunga hi ewin akomen, kuru yang uluu po tin taku ning i tumen, ma yang luul to po tin imen li kuk wetpo palu walngin.
64001011	Ngon tin mi ngo pit wo ngon weh men, ngon men ku ira wungin tin pit mina sun tin lengwal men asin, si e ira wungin tin pit mina sun tin tunus men weh. Taku po ta ning wungin tin tunus men, men ku ta Got ako, si taku po ta ning wungin tin lengwal men, men ku ion Got kho akomen.
64001012	A-Demitrius men po mosop pok put yan to wungin tin tunus men, u wungin tin irawin men tuon pok put yang yan to wungin tin tunus men, kuru pim kut men pok put yang yan to wungin tin tunus men maksin kut tumen ako. Ma wom ion i epo wungin tin pim a pok put men men irawin weh ako.
64001013	Kho men nga in to sakalngin munuman tin nga taku pan kisang ta ti epo ngon men, takuma mi ngo epo ngo ku pan i ti epo ngon epo mara sut tin to kawene sut men akomen.
64001014	Si nga hoo mi ngo epo sakun kara engun men ku nga ti ion ngon, ma mara tong men ku sak wal weh ma tong sakal ta al. Min wyungin men ku ti epo ngon. Po tin tita it e pim a kuk men wa mi hi ti epo ngon. Si po tin tita it e kuk hang ngon men men ku e sikia ya hi weh ma e wa mi ngo si ta po kut tumen.
65001001	Ngo a-Yut tin kum wet wili a-Yesus Krais e tuk a-Yemis irit won men kha pan kisang tin iyi ti epo wom tin Got tin Wirama it men yuk wom ma yang ning wom si auluungin ma yang haum eya wom epon ku wom kuk anga tunusngin mi a-Yesus Krais men.
65001002	Min sukngin, u nanaangin, u min epongin tumen, men ku ko po wom ma li si po sun hambip weh.
65001003	Apo, wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, kho men nga in e tohuh epo ngo ku pan kisang ta ti epo wom to sakalngin tin pok epo wungin tin it palolongin epon e it mosop pok min then men, takuma nga pon ta wungin tin weh nuk men men ti, epo ngo ku pan kisang ta ti epo wom ma nga wo nut wom epo wom men ku wuh lek walngin to po kara mut eya wungin tin wo it nuk wet men tin Got wai ko nuk yanga wili po tin auluungin men angan then ta e ko los po sun mosop men.
65001004	Epo po kara men wom ku ion hi som si po men yem yem kho me sup lunga wom kho kut ako. Po tin imen kho nginan ma sakalngin panngin nuk epo hi tin kuli Got wo los po hi kha men. Po men wungin ta hi ku pit mina sun tin ta Got men weh akomen, si po phae nanaangin tin ta Got men li ira wungin tin po ning sangelekngin weh epo elwanngin men, ma po wetpo hi wa Got tin then e Phua men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men kut tumen.
65001005	Homani ma ngo ku taku tulu wom kyok, aku, wom men pon ta wungin angan then ta kho kut ako wala ti, epo yang tin Akono men palolo po masang to sun wala tin ta yang men wo mulusngin Isip me pol kho kut, anima yang ning i ma po tin ku wo hi phep som men huuspit.
65001006	Kuru po tihngin tin ku ting kuk mi enunu tin ta hi weh men som, si po wetpo hi wa pi tin ta hi weh e hi kuk e li li epon men, men yang kasum po epo esih tin khang weh e sindak men li ting kuk pi tin mi rulul weh men epon ku hi kaeng ples walngin tin kuli iso si mi ungunan tin nhum weh men ako.
65001007	Tumen kut kha po Sodom to sun Gomora to po mosop tin ung mi enunu tin ung e li li baul sun men ira wungin ken po tihngin tin wungin ta hi lengwal men, ma po wa hi sup mi elwanngin ma po li ira wungin tin li enginin epo sun tin po ung e khuuk wal pit minal ton me men, ma po tin wuh wungin epo yau tin sindak e Got ning i emhut sun tin ta po men kha po si tosukngin tin si in pi mlaeng men ta epon men.
65001008	Tumen kut kha po tin imen wo hi phep pit wo enun yolngin tin ta hi men ma po ning po hi si lengwal epo elwanngin, u po ion sun tin akokono men ken po e kuk lengwal engun men, u po sakal lengwal epo sun tin ya hi pos men kut tumen.
65001009	Si tihngin a-Maikel tin nhum e li muk hi men ngong emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men ngong iso pakik khung wal pit mi a-Moses emkusin, men yang pauuk i epo sakalngin tin ku yang hik put kerek pit wo emiun tin hik put sakalngin nginangan men kerek som, si yang wo ta sun taku, “Yang tin Akono men tuon kha ku pio ngon men!”
65001010	Si po tin ikop wile ton mi wungin tin ku po mara hi ples i sinsin tunus som men engun; ma wungin tin phuk si mi po engun ken li ken nginan tin ku som e maran ira wungin tunus ewin som men, kha po mhuk mi hi tuo hi epon men engun.
65001011	Auh, mumhek mingin men kuli iso si epo po ako! Epo po men li ira soput tin ta a-Kain men kho kut, u po mara hi nes endara ma po saa li ira wungin ulil tin ta a-Balam men tin yang ning i kuma yang wa ulu epon men, u po wo hik put sakalngin ta sun ken a-Kora men ma po huuspit kho kut tumen.
65001012	Po men kuk ken pi tin palamiat engun e nuk wet wiu men mi kakaomngin tin ta wom men tin wom pok put mi wom tin pit wo al men epon men, ma po kuk e kakaom to wom men po ku lem som, si po kuk e kum epo po ku nhio wo hi tuo hi engun. Po men kuk ken hingis tin ku eki kuk min som men, tin eip me tep i li yang yanga pi engun men; kuru po men kuk kai sa tin ku enun to ungunan tan siik men akomen ma po lal i imut mosop si, si wala li po huu angan ponwal epon men.
65001013	Kuru po men kuk kai esap tin hik hik yanga wiu ma sangelekngin ta hi ning manngin ta hi nginangan ken kimusmusngin tin klet yanga wiu men; kuru po men kuk kai awheng tin kikin epo soput tan tin ku iran men, wala pi tin mi rulul weh men hihingin kho nuk epo po ku li kuk epon kokyok kokyok li kut men.
65001014	Po tin imen wala a-Inok tin khuuknginin ta Adam tin ko ponwal me sup angan men men pok put sakalngin ken po pokngin ta epo hi maksin kut tumen men taku, “Wom hul, epo yang tin Akono men kuli me to po tin auluungin ta yang weh e ku po ta ku tiik i angan weh men akomen,
65001015	kumali Got ples wungin ta po mosop, ma yang tak si wungin ta po mosop tin kuk lunga hi e wetpo hi wa Got men epo wungin mosop tin po wetpo hi wa Got ma po ning i men, tin po ning i ira wungin tin ku pit mina sun tin ta Got men som men, kuru Got ku tak si wungin tin po tin wetpo hi wa Got e ning lasin nginangan men sakal i amhees epo yang men kut tumen.”
65001016	Po tin imen men mi hi mokongin pit mi wungin tin si ta po men ma po sangengngeng epon kokyok kokyok, ma po muk muk pet kira mi hi tin sangelek pit po wungin tin lengwal men engun; ma sakalngin tin me pol mi wo po men kha po wangan po hi tuo hi epon men, ma po wa wa mi sun masang to sun wala kuma po wa endara hang sun tin ku si nhio wo po tuo hi epon men.
65001017	Si wom tin mi ngo pit wo wom weh men, wom men ku tulu wom hu sakalngin tin kho ma pok putngin si mi wo po paengin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men,
65001018	tin po pok wom epo elup tin ku si sulung men men ku po tin mimi wungin nginangan men kara si ma muk muk ira wungin tin po wetpo hi wa Got ma po mi hi sangelek pit pon men engun.
65001019	Po tin imen wala ning takonngin si nuk lunga po men, ma tulun hungin tin ta po men men pit wo wungin tin ta pi mulus men misan, epo Emiun Auluungin men om mi po ako.
65001020	Si wom tin mi ngo pit wo wom weh men, tuo wom men ku khek wom si nuk nhing wo wo phepngin tin ta wom e auluungin weh men, ma wom men ku hing wo Emiun Auluungin ma wom kines Got,
65001021	kuma wom karuk wom men ku iso kuk mi min epongin tin ta Got men, ma mara wom pit epo min sukngin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men tin ku iso me wa it li sup mi tunusngin tin sindak men.
65001022	Ma po kara tin mi hi ponwal men, men ku mi wom suk hi weh;
65001023	si po kara men ku mi wom lel moolngin tin po mi hi tin kho men ning i ma pon nungunan nuk e li li pon men ma wom lem ma wom palolo hi ken wom e nak po put ngi yau me pol men.
65001024	Homani men ku yang tin kakha epon ku kasum wom ma wom ku plong ko som, si yang wa wom to wungin tin om po wom men li nuk mara moolngin tin ta yang men to min kehngin nhum takut men,
65001025	Got tin imen tin Palolongin ta it e then e mhin ek men men ku moolngin u yan pos, u kakhangin u emhong kut tumen men ku ta yang homani u in kokyok kokyok li kut tumen. Men irawin.
66001001	Sakalngin kaunngin tin lasngin si in pi mlaeng e me hang a-Yesus Krais men, tin Got wai si ta yang kuma yang suk mara po tin kum wet wili yang men epo wungin tin ku weh si kerek engun men wala iyi. Ma yang pok put, men yang tih i li yanga wili tihngin tin tan men li epo sun a-Yon tin kum wet wili yang men,
66001002	men yang tin pok put sakalngin epo sakalngin ta Got u epo sakalngin tin a-Yesus Krais pok put men kut tumen, men endara mosop tin yang maran kon i men kha men.
66001003	Emhong tin ta Got men ku ko po po ta tin ku tiik kisang u po tin hul sakalngin ta pokngin tin i, kuma ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk min men; epo elup men me in tikayung kut khae.
66001004	Sakalngin me hang a-Yon ma li epo palu walngin tin ponwal me sup e ung e li li wo mulusngin Esia men. Nanaangin men ku ko ta wom u min wyungin kut tumen tin me hang yang tin in homani u in kho u ku iso in mi elup tin iso ung e me men kut tumen, u tin me hang Emiun tin ponwal me sup e kuk maran min ehus tin ta yang men,
66001005	u tin me hang a-Yesus Krais, tin pok put sakalngin to wungin tan anuh u tin li muk epo po mosop tin khekngin si mi po tin huu kho men, u tin maran pit wo po tin sinkhaung e ung e li li wo mulusngin men kut tumen. Yang tin min epo it ma yang khis mi it epo yang kalolwan tuon, ma lasin ta it khisngin li,
66001006	ma yang ning it si po tin sinkhaung men u po tin kum auluungin ta Got tin Wiraman men kut tumen, yang kha ku moolngin u kakhangin tin nhum men tumen li epon kokyok kokyok li kut men. Men irawin.
66001007	Wom hul, yang ku in mi hingis ma yang me, ma mara po then then mosop men ku kon yang, wai, men po tin nii yang men maksin kut tumen ako. Ma po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi then then weh e hi ung e li li wo mulusngin men ku hau amusukngin sinsin men epo yang. Wai, men irawin.
66001008	Ngo men Alpa u ngo men Omega, tin Sakalngin Hosingin u Sakalngin Li Pyu Pongin men kut tumen,” yang tin Akono men kha sakal tumen, “tin in homani u tin in kho u tin ku in mi elup tin ku iso me men kut tumen, men tin Apalukngin weh men kha men.”
66001009	Ngo a-Yon tin wiro wom kuru ngo men tita it mi miun tuungngin u enunu u won maikngin kut tumen tin it kuk mi a-Yesus Krais ma it wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak men, ngo men in po pi po nemut mut tin po sikian Patmos men pit mi sakalngin ta Got u pit mi sakalngin tin nga pok put a-Yesus Krais men kut tumen.
66001010	Kho ma nga in mi Emiun Auluungin to pi auluungin tin ta yang tin Akono men, ma nga hul wut po ta, men ingut hambip si wetpo ngo, ken kiyak ta men,
66001011	ma sakal ti, “Ngo men Alpa u Omega tin li muk u me sulung kut tumen,” u men sakal maksin ti, “Endara tin marap kon i men, men ku e pan i ko mi kisang ta ma e tih i lu epo palu walngin tin khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen tin ung e li li wo mulusngin Esia men: men ku li epo pi Epesus, u epo pi Smerna, u epo pi Pergamos, u epo pi Taiataira, u epo pi Sadis, u epo pi Piladelpia u epo pi Laodisia kut tumen.”
66001012	Ti ma nga phae kuma nga ion po tin wut hi sakal ta ngo men. Ma nga phae kut, men nga ion esul khin golan khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen,
66001013	ma emin esul khin tin eip u ponwal me sup imen men nga ion yang ta maran ken Wiru Po Tunus men, men phi moolngin nomalak li kek pit wut khin u mulu golan ta men patngin nuk po engai yang kut tumen.
66001014	U yang mhin u yang yut kut tumen men pon eun engun ken sipsip yut men, men pon eun weh ken waup men, u yang maran tin ponwal e yang ion endara epon men men ken yau tin ngin ngin men kut tumen;
66001015	u yang khin men ken bras tin tunus weh e ken i e sutngin mi mang tin po sut ain wa tumen min men ma si pon yil weh men, u yang wut men ken eki nhum ta tin nuk e uu men;
66001016	ma po wili yang tin atunus men yang kasum awheng khaut eip u ponwal me sup, tumen, u bainat tongin tin ngin nuk ponwal men me pol mi wo yang, u yang maran men ken sinang tin ngin ngin weh men kut tumen.
66001017	Ma minan tin nga ion yang men men nga plong ko nuk po khi yang ken ngo e hun men. Takuma yang wilin tin ato sa men men ko nuk po ngo, ma yang sakal ta ngo taku, “E lem asin; ngo men tin li Muk men u tin me Silung men kut tumen kha iyi.
66001018	Ngo men yang tin tunus in men, tin kho ma hun men, si mara wom mu, epo ngo men tunus in ma ku in tumen kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin. Ma ngo men in to enda tin ku nga klas epo pi tin ta hunngin men u ta hunngin epon men kut tumen.
66001019	E pan endara mosop tin marap kon i kho men, u endara mosop tin kuk homani men, u endara mosop tin ku iso si sulung epo endara tin imen kut tumen.
66001020	Wungin kaunngin tin epo awheng khaut ponwal me sup tin marap kon i nuk yanga wili ngo tin atunus men u epo esul khin golan tin ponwal me sup men kut tumen sinsin wala ti: awheng tin ponwal me sup men men los po po tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ponwal me sup men, u esul khin tin ponwal me sup men men los po palu walngin tin ponwal me sup men kut tumen.
66002001	”Tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Epesus men men ku e pan sakalngin li epon ti, ‘Sakalngin tin mosop iyi men yang tin kasum awheng ponwal me sup nuk yanga wilin tin ato sa men, tin muk muk lunga esul khin golan tin ponwal me sup men men sakal taku:
66002002	“Nga ion wungin mosop tin e ning i men u ngon tin wuh kumang men u ngon tin pit nhing wet won maikngin men, u e mut po tin wungin ta hi lengwal men kut tumen. U e tong po tin wo epo hi e paengin si ku paengin weh som men, ma e pon tan epo po men tororok nginangan kha men;
66002003	u e tohuh weh ma e pit nhing wet won maikngin, ma e wuh kumang weh mut eya ya ngo si ngon ku mip mokongin ewin akomen.
66002004	Takuma nga in to wungin tin iyi epo ngon, epo ngon men mang ta min epongin tin e in ton muk men kho.
66002005	Tumen ma tulup hu epo pi tin e in epon kho ma e plong ko men; e phae mip ma e ning wungin tin e ning i muk kho men weh, wa taku pi engun, men ku nga me epo ngon kerek engun, ma nga klok esul khin tin tap men pi tin li pit epon men li.
66002006	Si wungin tunus tin e iso kasum i men men ti, epo e mut wungin ta po tin ira wungin ta a-Nikolas men, tin imen ngo kut nga mut i.
66002007	Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i si ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh. Taku po ta apalukngin hut sun, men ku nga mang tan si ii sa tin epo tunusngin men enun, tin pit pi pon lungin tin ta Got e pit emin weh men.”’
66002008	“Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Smerna men men ku e pan sakalngin li epon taku, ‘Sakalngin tin iyi men yang tin li Muk men u tin me Silung men kut tumen, tin kho ma hun li ma si tunus kyok men kha sakal i men:
66002009	“Nga ion wungin mosop tin e ning i men u won maikngin tin po wai ko po ngon men u ngon tin kalwok men kut tumen (aku, ngon men miran ako); u nga ion ton mingin ta po tin wo epo hi e Yuda si hi men ku Yuda ainan akomen. Awu. Po men ta mang akotngin tin ta a-Nolongin men kha men.
66002010	E lem epo wungin tin tikayung ma ngon ku wuh i men asin. Irawin, epo tikayung ma emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men ku whis wom kara lu sup mi mang tin po wo hi maik hi min ewin men, kuma wom karongngin, ma wom ku lat won maikngin to ungunan eip ponwal. E kasum wo phepngin tap weh li e hun, kumali nga wa moolngin tin epo tunusngin men ko ung mhip.
66002011	Po ta kingan ung epon ku hul, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh. Taku po ta apalukngin hut sun, men ku hunngin tin me ponwal angan men mumhek min akomen.”’
66002012	“Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Pergamos men men ku e pan sakalngin li epon taku, ‘Wungin tin iyi men yang tin in to bainat tin tongin e ngin nuk ponwal men kha sakal i men:
66002013	“Nga ion wungin mosop tin e ning i men, u pi tin e ung epon men kut tumen, men pi tin ehus ta a-Nolongin ung epon men kha men. Ma e kasum ya ngo pip, si ngon ku sup sup put wo phepngin tin pit po ngo men minan tin Antipas kasum wo phepngin tan ma pok put sakalngin ta ngo epon men akomen, men yang tin wingin ko hun lunga wom men, men pi tin a-Nolongin ung epon men kha men.
66002014	Si nga in to wungin kara epo ngon, epo pi tin imen men po tin kasum kotngin tin ta a-Balam men kara kuk; a-Balam tin imen kha kot a-Balak epo yang ku wa endara ko nuk soput po tin husani a-Israel men tin ku po plong ko epon men, tin po ku ii endara tin po talu got tin tororokngin men epon men u po ku ning elwanngin kut tumen.
66002015	Tumen kut kha e in to po kara tin kasum kotngin tin ta a-Nikolas men, tin nga mut i men.
66002016	Tumen ma e phae mip, wa taku pi engun, men ku nga me epo ngon kerek engun ma nga hosi lek walngin si ewut po to bainat tin me pol mi wo ngo men.
66002017	Po ta kingan ung epon ku hul, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh. Taku po ta apalukngin hut sun, men ku nga wa mana tin kaunngin men kara si tan kuma iini. U ngo ku wa enah pon kal ta si tan, ma po enah tin imen men yan homan ta panngin nuk pon, men ku po ta pon tan ewin akomen, si po tin wai men misan.”’
66002018	“Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Taiataira men men ku e pan wungin li epon taku, ‘Sakalngin tin iyi yang tin Wiru Got e maran ken yau tin ngin ngin men, u khin pon ken bras tin tunus weh men kut tumen kha sakal i men:
66002019	“Nga ion wungin mosop tin e ning i men, min epongin tap, kumang tap, wo phepngin tap, u ngon tin pit nhing wet won maikngin men kut tumen; ma wungin tap tin me sulung men men nhum epo sun tin muk men.
66002020	Takuma nga in to wungin kara tin ku nga wai ko los ngon men, epo e mang ta wut tin wala e-Yesebel men, tin tuon sikian pokngin ta men, ku kot po tin kum ta ngo men ma karong po epo po ku ning elwanngin u po ku ii endara aiingin tin po talu got tin tororokngin men enu hi epon men tumen.
66002021	Ma nga wa elup kara si ta wut tin ku wut phae min epo elwanngin tin ta wut men, takuma wut ku phae min som.
66002022	E hul, ngo ku psik wut ko nuk wo ehus to saihngin tan, u po tin ning elwanngin to wut men kut tumen, men ku hi sup mi won maikngin nhum ta, tin taku po ku phae mi hi som men.
66002023	Kuli nga lek po tin husani wut men epo hunngin, ma palu walngin mosop men ku ion i epo ngo kha yang tin ion mi wungin tin po tulu hi hu i u nuk mi po men tumen. Ma ngo ku wa wungin si ta wom then then ira wungin tin wom then then ning i weh men.
66002024	Si nga sakal si ta wom kara tin ung Taiataira men, men po tin khaut esini kuk ma ku hul wet kotngin tin imen akomen, tin ku pon ta wungin tin po sikian e wungin kaunngin tin mut weh e ta a-Nolongin men akomen, men ku nga wa won maikngin ta ko what wom kyok akomen.
66002025	Si enda tin wom kuk ton kut men men ku wom kasum i pip weh li pol minan tin kuli nga me men.
66002026	Si taku po ta apalukngin hut sun ma kasum wungin ta ngo weh li pol mi elup tin li ponsol men, po tin imen men ku nga wa emhong ko pon epon ku maran pit wo po tin hi khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men –
66002027	‘yang ku maran pit wo po to elip tin po koklong men ta; po men ku whisngin ko plak ma tingit tururun ken tawil eplukan kara men’ – men ken sun tin nga wa emhong epon mi wo Yok kut tumen;
66002028	ma ngo ku wa awheng tin ngin ngin to pi huus men si tan.
66002029	Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i si ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh.”’
66003001	”Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Sadis men men ku e pan sakalngin li epon taku, ‘Sakalngin tin iyi yang tin in to Got Emiun tin ponwal me sup men u awheng tin ponwal me sup men tumen kha sakal i ti: “Nga pon ta wungin mosop tin e ning i men, tin e in to yap tin e iso tunus in men, takuma ngon men hun kut.
66003002	E haum tunus, ma e pa nhing endara tin iso pit men, tin e taku huu angan men, epo nga pon ta wungin tap kara men ku siik weh to mara Got akomen.
66003003	Tumen ma tulup hu wungin tin kho ma e wai tua u e hul i tua tumen, ma e kasum i pip ma e phae mip. Tumen ma taku ngon ku haum tunus som, men ku nga me epo ngon ken po tipngin ta men, ma ngon ku pon ta sinang maran tin ku nga me epo ngon epon men akomen.
66003004	Si e in to po sakun kara tin kuk epo pi Sadis men, tin ku ning moolngin ta hi ko pon lengwal kho akomen; ma po men ku muk muk to ngo mi moolngin tin pon kal men; epo po men wungin ta hi tunus epon tin ku nga ning wungin tin imen epo hi men.
66003005	Taku po ta apalukngin weh, men kuli phingin epo moolngin tin pon kal men misan, ma ngo ku mlus yan mi kisang tin epo tunusngin men angan akomen; si ngo ku pok put yan si in to mara Yok u to mara tihngin tin ta Yok men kut tumen.
66003006	Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i si ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh.”’”
66003007	“Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Piladelpia men men ku e pan sakalngin li epon taku, ‘Sakalngin tin iyi yang tin auluungin men, yang tin wungin tan anuh men, “Yang tin in to enda tin ta a-Dewit e po klas epon ewin men, tin klas ma po ta ku sambal si akomen, u tin sambal si ma po ta ku klas akomen kut tumen” kha sakal i men:
66003008	“Nga pon ta wungin mosop tin e ning i men. E ion i, epo nga hihi sowon tin won pit men pit to marap, men ku po ta sambal si epon akomen; epo ngon men iso in to kakhangin kiak kara, ma e kasum sakalngin tin ta ngo men, si ngon ku sup put ya ngo akomen.
66003009	E hul, ngo ku ning i ma po tin ta mang akotngin tin ta a-Nolongin men, tin wo epo hi e Yuda si ku Yuda akomen, si po torok, iis, ngo ku ning i ma po me powut hi ko suul sii khi ngon ma po ku ion i tin mi ngo epo ngon kho men.
66003010	Epo e kasum sakalngin ta ngo tin nga wo nut ngon epo ngon ku pit nhing wet won maikngin men kho kut, tumen ma ngo ku kasum ngon maksin epo ngon tin ku lu sup mi elup tin epo karongngin men som kut tumen, men karongngin tin ku iso si epo po mosop tin ung e li li wo mulus men, kuma karong po mosop tin ung wo mulus men.
66003011	E hul, ngo ku me kerek engun! E kasum enda tin e in ton men pip, kumali po ta men ku nak moolngin tap tin ku ung mhip men li asin.
66003012	Taku po ta apalukngin weh, men ku nga ning i ma po si lapalak ta tin pit mi mang auluungin tin ta Got tin ta ngo men, ma po tin imen ku kyok li pol akomen. Ngo ku pan ya Got tin ta ngo men ko nuk pon u ya pi tin ta Got tin ta ngo men kut tumen, men Yerusalem tin homan men, tin ku me ko wet pi hang Got tin ta ngo men. Kuru ngo ku pan ya ngo tin homan men ko nuk pon kut tumen.
66003013	Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i si ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh.”’
66003014	“Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Laodisia men, men ku e pan sakalngin li epon taku, ‘Sakalngin tin iyi yang tin yan Irawin men, tin po sikian tin Pok Put Wungin Anuh u Irawin tumen, tin Sinsin epo endara mosop tin Got pho pon men kha sakal i taku:
66003015	“Nga pon ta wungin mosop tin e ning i men, tin ngon ku mip nglik weh wa mip ngeng ngeng weh akomen. Mi ngo epo ngon ku mip nglik weh wa mip ngeng ngeng weh tumen.
66003016	Epo mip ngeng ngeng amang engun tumen, si ngon ku mip nglik weh wa mip ngeng ngeng weh akomen, tumen ma ngo ku mutwuk ngon pol wo ngo.
66003017	Epo e wo taku, ‘Ngo men miran, ma nga si to miranngin ta ngo hambip, si ngo ku kalwok epo endara ta akomen’ – si ngon ku ion i som epo ngon men in lengwal weh, u e in amusukngin, u e lungunan engun, u marap mhi u e wiwil kut tumen –
66003018	tumen ma ngo ku wa wungin si tap epo ngon ku kul gol hang ngo tin sutngin put ngi yau ma si min yil weh men, kuma e si miran; u e kul moolngin tin po kal men hang ngo, kuma pang po elit ngon, kuma manngin tin epo wiwilngin tap men ku si in pi mlaeng akomen; u e wa sa sut tin epo marap men ko marap, kuma marap kleng kut tumen.
66003019	Po tin mi ngo epo hi weh esini kuk men kha nga pio hi u nga tus hi kut tumen. Tumen ma e tohuh ma e phae mip.
66003020	E hul, nga pit mara sowon ma nga nhong nhong. Taku po ta hul wut ngo ma klas, men ku nga li sup tan ma nga ii endara ton, u men ku ii endara to ngo kut tumen.
66003021	Taku po ta apalukngin hut sun, men ku nga mang tan si me ung to ngo wo ehus tin ta ngo tin sinkhaung men, ken ngo tin apalukngin hut po, ma nga li ung to Yok wo ehus tin ta Yok tin sinkhaung men.
66003022	“Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i si ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh.”’”
66004001	Silung epo wungin tin mosop imen anima marango li tuh, ih, sowon ta men won pit ili wet pi, ma wut po ta tin nga hul i muk kho men men ingut ken kiyak ta ma sakal ta ngo me ko taku, “E mu si iyi, kuma nga suk marap epo wungin kara tin ku iso weh si sulung epo sun tin iyi.”
66004002	Ti ma kerek engun ma Emiun Auluungin kasum ngo, ih, ehus tin ta po sinkhaung men ta hihingin ung ili wet pi, ma po ta ung wo ehus tin imen.
66004003	Ma yang tin ko ung wo ehus tin imen men pon kawhat ken enah yaspa ta u pon mhee ken enah sadius ta men kut tumen; ma li pospi ta men baul ehus tin imen, men pon ken enah emeral ta men.
66004004	Ma ehus tin ta po sinkhaung tin imen ehus ta po tin sinkhaung khum ponwal u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (24) baul i, ma ehus tin mosop imen men marango ion po akokono khaut khum ponwal u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (24) kai wal i ma hi ung e li li won, men piphi moolngin tin nuk po sun men pon eun u moolngin golan ung e li li mhi po kut tumen.
66004005	Ma ehus tin ung emin men men pi memlengin u pi kuklung u wut po kara kut tumen kuk e me pol min, u esul khaut ponwal me sup nuk e ngin ngin maran min ehus, men los po Emiun tin ta Got e khaut ponwal me sup men kha men.
66004006	Kuru maran min ehus men wiu min kleng kleng ken glas men ta nuk, men ken enah tin pon engil engil men ta men. Ma emin ehus u baul ehus kut tumen men endara maran to tunusngin khaut mnal kuk, men mara hi suuk sii hi mara hi u wetpo hi kut tumen.
