66004007	Ma endara tin maran to tunusngin e muk men men ken laion ta men, u endara tin maran to tunusngin e me ponwal angan men men ken bulmakau asus ta men, u endara tin maran to tunusngin e me miuk angan men men maran ken po tunus ta men, u endara tin maran to tunusngin e me mnal angan men men ken eking wisu ta tin in e yap yap men kut tumen.
66004008	Ma endara tin maran to tunusngin e khaut mnal imen men then then mhit ta me sup ma mara hi suuk sii po mhit u wet mhit kut tumen sup e klet. Ma endara tin mosop imen ku nhing to pi mhangin wa to pi luk ewin som, si men kuk e sakal ti, “Auluungin, auluungin, auluungin men Got tin Akono e Apalukngin weh men, tin in kho, u in homani, u in to elup tin ku iso me men kut tumen!”
66004009	Ma minan tin endara tin maran to tunusngin imen wa moolngin u yan pos u sam samngin kut tumen si ta yang tin ung wo ehus men, tin sindak in kokyok kokyok men,
66004010	men po akokono tin khaut khum ponwal u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (24) poplong ko maran min yang tin ung wo ehus men ma po mhi hi yuk ko ko epo yang tin sindak in kokyok kokyok men, ma po whis moolngin tin ta hi e ung e li li mhi hi men ko ko maran min ehus, ma po sakal taku,
66004011	“Auweh, ngon tin Akono men, ngon men wungin tap tunus epon kuma e wa moolngin u yan pos u emhong kut tumen tap weh; epo ngon kha pho po endara mosop men, ma epo mip kha endara tin mosop imen e pho pon ma si kuk men.”
66005001	Li klet ma nga ion kisang ta tin po wlong i men, men nuk yanga wili yang tin ung wo ehus men wilin tin ato sa men, men panngin nuk emin u wetpon kut tumen, ma kawene sut khaut ponwal me sup tin tosukngin ung e li li pon men men pat patngin nuk e li li pon epon ku kakaek i pip.
66005002	Kut ma nga ion tihngin apalukngin ta men wut pit hambip ma pok put sakalngin taku, “Ara weh e ku tunus epon ku las kisang ma pupluus kawene sut tin kan kan i men?”
66005003	Takuma po men ku ta in wet pi wa in wo mulus wa in wet mulus tumen kakha weh epon ku las kisang kuru tupan kara tumen akomen.
66005004	Tumen ma nga in e hau hambip weh, epon tin ku po pon ta sun ta tin ku tunus weh epon ku las kisang ma tiik i kuru tupan men ku ta in akomen.
66005005	Kut si po ta in mi sun tin akokono men ko sakal ta ngo taku, “E hau asin. E hul, Laion tin hi Yuda khuuk wal men, tin plok si po kimut a-Dewit men, kha apalukngin weh epon ku las kisang ma pupluus kawene sut tin ponwal me sup e kakaek i men.”
66005006	Ma nga tuh kyok, ih, emin ehus u endara tin khaut mnal e mara hi to tunusngin men, u emin po tin akokono men kut tumen, men Sipsip Asus ta pit, men maran ken i e po wini kho men, men in to imi khaut ponwal me sup pit e li li mhin u maran khaut ponwal me sup kut tumen, men los po Emiun khaut ponwal me sup tin ta Got e tihngin li li yanga mulusngin mosop men.
66005007	Kut ma yang me wa kisang po wili sun tin ung wo ehus men wilin tin ato sa men.
66005008	Ma yang wa kisang tin imen kho kut, anima endara tin khaut mnal e mara hi to tunusngin men, u po akokono tin khum ponwal u mnal tumen (24) poplong ko nuk mara Sipsip Asus, men hi then then kasum endara sok nginan ta tin ingut tunus ken gita men, u karu golan tin endara tin kuin nginan ipek tunus e los po kinesngin ta po tin auluungin men kol min men kut tumen.
66005009	Ma po lut lutngin homan ta, men sakal taku, “Ngon men tunus epon ku e wa kisang, ma e pupluus kawene sut tin kakaek i men; epo po wi ngon ko hun kho, ma e kiis li mut eya pim si ta Got epo ngon enghikan mi po mosop tin ung e li li yanga pi e lawin ta hi weh u sakalngin ta hi weh u po hi weh u khuuk wal ta hi weh men kut tumen,
66005010	ma e ning pim si po tin sinkhaung men u po tin kum auluungin ta Got tin ta it men kut tumen; ma pim men ku si po tin sinkhaung men ma pim ku kuk wo mulus ma mara pim pit wo po masang to sun wala tin ung wo mulus men.”
66005011	Li klet ma nga tuh kyok, ma nga hul wut tihngin munuman takut men baul ehus u endara tin mara hi to tunusngin men, u po tin akokono men kut tumen; ma po enu hi tiik nginan men khum khum khum khum ta (10,000) angan khum khum khum khum ta u tumen (10,000), u khum khum khum ta (1,000) angan khum khum khum ta (1,000) u tumen kut tumen,
66005012	ma po wut hi pit pit hambip ma po sakal taku, “Sipsip Asus tin po wini ko hun kho men men tunus epon kha ku wa wo phepngin, u miranngin, u mhin ekngin, u kakhangin, u yan pos, u moolngin u emhong kut tumen!”
66005013	Ma endara mosop tin pho pongin e kuk wet pi u wo mulus u wet mulus u tin maran kiring kiring e kuk mi wiu men u endara mosop tin kuk e li li pi tin mosop imen kut tumen nga hul hi sakal taku, “Sam samngin u yan pos u moolngin u wo phepngin kut tumen ta yang tin ung wo ehus men u ta Sipsip Asus kut tumen ku ta ngong in kokyok kokyok li kut!”
66005014	Kut ma endara tin khaut mnal e mara hi to tunusngin men ko sakal taku, “Men Irawin!” Ma po tin akokono e khum ponwal u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (24) poplong ko ma po mhi hi yuk yuk ko kokyok kokyok to mara yang tin in kokyok kokyok li kut men ma po wa yang yan si.
66006001	Ma nga ion Sipsip Asus men pluus kawene sut tin patngin nuk men ta, ma nga hul endara tin mara hi to tunusngin men ta wut pit ken pi tin klung men ma sakal taku, “E mu ion i.”
66006002	Ti ma nga tuh kyok, ih, nga ion hos pon kal ta, ma yang tin ung wo li men kasum taplimngin ta; ma po wa moolngin tin ta po tin sinkhaung men si ung mhi yang, ma yang li pol, men yang in e lek po kumali yang si apalukngin epo po kara.
66006003	Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me ponwal angan men, men nga hul endara tin mara hi to tunusngin men ta tin me ponwal angan men sakal taku, “E mu ion i.”
66006004	Ti ma hos ta maksin li pol, men pon ngheh ngheh ken yau men. Ma emhong ko ta yang tin ung wo hos men epo yang ku klok wungin aminis tin po ung epon wo mulus men li, si kuma po masang to sun wala lek wal ko huu; ma po wa bainat nhum ta si ta yang.
66006005	Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me miuk angan men, men nga hul endara tin mara hi to tunusngin men ta tin me miuk angan men sakal taku, “E mu ion i.” Ti ma nga tuh, ih, hos po ku ta, ma yang tin ung wo li men kasum kaingin ta tin po kai maikngin epon men ung yanga wilin.
66006006	Ma nga hul wut po ta emin endara tin mnal e mara hi to tunusngin men men sakal taku, “Kaingin wit ta sup wet kumang ta ungunan then ta, u kaingin bali miuk sup wet kumang ta ungunan then ta kut tumen, si e in aku e siluk mi sa olip sut u wain tumen asin.”
66006007	Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me mnal angan men, men nga hul endara tin mara hi to tunusngin men ta tin me mnal angan men sakal taku, “E mu ion i.”
66006008	Ti ma nga tuh, ih, hos pon howos ta, ma yang tin ung wo li men yan a-Hunngin, ma pi tin ta hunngin men ung e ira yang me. Ma wulong wa emhong tin ku wulong mara ngong pit wo mulusngin tingit ta mi sun tin mnal men, kuma wulong lek po epo bainat, u epo hun elipngin, u epo hunngin, u epo li ken nginan enih tin kuk wo mulus men kut tumen ko huu.
66006009	Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me eip angan men, men nga ion suyung tin po ning talungin won men, men enu po tin lekngin ko huu pit mi sakalngin ta Got u pit mi wo phepngin tin po kasum i ma po pok put men nuk wet.
66006010	Ma po wut hi pit ili awon taku, “Aluuh, ngon tin Sinkhaung e wungin tap auluungin u anuh kut tumen, to pi elini weh ma ngon ku ples wungin ma e wa wungin emhut kalolwa pim ko po po tin ung wo mulus men?”
66006011	Kut ma po kikyu sun tin imen then then epo moolngin nomalaklak pon eun kara; ma sakalngin ko ta po epo po ku iso nhing sakun kara engun, li pol minan tin kuli po tin hi kum then men u po ehuro hi tin ku lekngin ko huu ken po men tiikngin ta hi si klet po sun wet.
66006012	Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me ta me sup angan men, ih, pi kin nhum ta si; ma sinang phae ko ngi ku ken moolngin po ku tin po nok i epo meme yut men, u namih phae ko ngin ken enghik men,
66006013	u awheng tin nuk e li li wet pi men poplong ko wo mulus, ken sa pik ta tin enun sulung men eip tok i ma enun hi ko.
66006014	Kuru wet pi wlongngin li kis ken kisang ta tin po wlong i men, u put pi mosop u pi po nemut mut mosop tumen wonngin li ung pi enginin ta kut tumen.
66006015	Ma po tin sinkhaung e mara hi pit wo sun wo mulus men, u po tin ya hi pos men, u po tin miranngin ta hi tang pit men, u po phuan tin mara hi pit wo po nolo men, u po tin apalukngin men, u po mosop tin kum wo sun engun men, u po mosop tin wo hi pias men kut tumen li kakaun mi uwin tin ung e li li men u mi enah tin nuk e li li put pi men kut tumen,
66006016	ma po wo ta put pi u enah kut tumen taku, “Wom poplong ko phae po pim kuma wom kaun pim epo yang tin ung wo ehus men maran u epo yan salngin tin ta Sipsip Asus men kut tumen!
66006017	Epo elup tin nhum e to yan salngin tin ta yang men men kho si kut, ma ara weh ku kakha kuma pit nhing wet?”
66007001	Li klet ma mi khi wungin tin imen nga ion tihngin khaut mnal, men nuk e li li hut mulus porilin tin khaut mnal men, ma wuluk kasum eip tin ta mulus porilin tin khaut mnal men, epon akuli eip pit wo mulus, wa yanga wiu, wa po sa ta kut tumen.
66007002	Kut ma nga ion tihngin ta kyok men me si pi tin sinang me si epon men, ma yang kasum tosukngin tin ta Got tin in kokyok kokyok men tin ku yang kikhim lautngin ko nuk mara po kara epon men. Ma tihngin tin imen wut pit ili awon li epo tihngin tin khaut mnal e wa emhong epo wuluk ku mumhek mi mulus u wiu kut tumen,
66007003	ma yang wo taku, “Myuk kuk aku myuk mumhek mi mulus, wa wiu, wa sa tumen li pol minan tin kuli pim a kikhim lautngin ko nuk po po tin kum ta Got tin ta it men nuk e li li mhi po tin awang men wet.”
66007004	Ma nga hul po tin wa tosukngin men tiikngin ta hi tausen khum khum ta u tausen khum mnal u tausen mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (144,000), men hi me mi a-Israel husanin khuuknginin tin mosop men kha hi wa tosukngin men:
66007005	mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Yuda men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen (12,000) kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Ruben men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Gat men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men;
66007006	mi khuuknginin tin ta Aser men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Naptali men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Manasa men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men;
66007007	mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Simeon men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Liwai men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Isakat men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men;
66007008	mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Sebulon men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Yosep men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; u mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Bensamin men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men kut tumen.
66007009	Silung epo wungin tin mosop imen ma nga tuh kyok, ih, nga ion po wa ilio angan kara tin po ta ku tiik i angan akomen, men po me mi sun mosop tin ung e li li e hi khuuk wal ta hi weh, u lawin sin ta hi weh, u po hi weh, u sakalngin ta hi weh kut tumen, men me nuk maran min ehus u to mara Sipsip Asus kut tumen, ma po phi moolngin nomalaklak pon eun u mariri khin pit po wili hi kut tumen,
66007010	ma po nuk e wut hi pit hambip ma po sakal taku, “Wungin tin it palolongin epon men men Got tin ta it e ung wo ehus men u Sipsip Asus kut tumen kha sinsin epon men!”
66007011	Li klet ma tihngin mosop nuk e baul ehus u po tin akokono men u endara tin khaut mnal e mara hi to tunusngin e Got pho po hi men kut tumen, ma po poplong ko mara hi ko ma po wa Got yan si,
66007012	ma po sakal taku, “Irawin! Emhong u moolngin u mhin ekngin u sam samngin u yan pos u wo phepngin u kakhangin kut tumen men ku ta Got tin ta it men in kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin.”
66007013	Kut ma po tin akokono men ta ko sakal ta ngo taku, “Po tin piphi moolngin nomalak pon eun imen men araling weh kuru hi me akani weh tumen?”
66007014	Ti ma nga ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin akono men, tuop kha ion i men.” Tumen ma yang sakal ta ngo taku, “Po tin imen tin kuk mi won maikngin tin nhum men ma me pol, ma po khis po moolngin tin nomalaklak e ta hi men ko kal mi Sipsip Asus kalolwan kha imen.
66007015	Sinsin tin imen kha po me nuk maran min ehus tin ta Got men, ma po kum auluungin ta yang to pi mhangin u to pi luk kut tumen mi mang auluungin tin ta yang men kokyok kokyok. Ma yang tin ung wo ehus men kuli enun klet po po,
66007016	ma po ku huu elip kyok wa huu eki kyok, wa sinang wa endara ngeng ngeng ta tumen ku moom po kyok tumen akomen;
66007017	epo Sipsip Asus tin in emin ehus men kha ku maran pit wo po ken po ta tin maran pit wo sipsip men ma yang ku li muk po li epo eki maran tin epo tunusngin men, ma Got ku luk luk tinisngin mosop mara po li.”
66008001	Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me ponwal me sup angan men, ma minan tin imen pi ili wet pi men sikip sikip ung put monlo long.
66008002	Ma nga ion tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup e nuk maran min Got ewin men, ma kiyak khaut ponwal me sup men wangin si ta hi.
66008003	Kut si tihngin ta kyok me pit mara suyung, men kasum karu golan ta tin enda kuin nginan tin ipek tunus men kuk min men, ma endara kuin nginan tin ipek tunus men wangin hambip ko ta yang, epon ku yang talu i to kinesngin ta po mosop tin auluungin men wo suyung tin golan men tin ung maran min ehus tin ta Got men.
66008004	Ma endara tin ipek tunus men kuin nginan to kinesngin ta po tin auluungin men men nuk yanga wili tihngin ma si epo Got.
66008005	Li klet ma tihngin wa karu golan tin imen, ma yang wa yau tin pit wo suyung men ko kol min ma yang whis i ko mulus. Kut ma ingutngin si si, u pi kuklung, u pi memlengin u pi kin kut tumen.
66008006	Li klet ma tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup e kasum kiyak tin ponwal me sup men hihi hi epo hi ku so so kiyak.
66008007	Kut ma tihngin tin muk men so kiyak tin tan men, ma pi yung tin enahan men u yau kut tumen, tin nau wal to enghik men, si, ma whisngin ko mulus, ma sa maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men yau iini si yau uspon, kuru epilil tin po keng men yau iini mosop si yau uspon kut tumen.
66008008	Li klet ma tihngin tin me ponwal angan men so kiyak tin tan men; ma endara maran ken pi po emian nhum ta ngin ngin ken yau men, men psikngin ko mi wiu ma wiu maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men ko min kalolwan.
66008009	Ma endara tin Got pho pon e maran to tunusngin kuk mi wiu men maran min ta kuk mi sun tin miuk men men huu, u imut maran min ta tin kuk mi sun tin miuk men men mhukngin kut tumen.
66008010	Li klet ma tihngin tin me miuk angan men so kiyak tin tan men, ma awheng nhum ta plong ko wet pi, men ngin ngin ken esul ta men, ma men plong ko mi eki nesiling tin kuk e li li men maran min ta tin kuk mi sun tin miuk men u ko mi eki tin maran buk si e kuk e li li men kut tumen.
66008011	Awheng tin imen yan a-Makalek. Ma eki maran min ta kuk mi sun tin miuk men ko makalek, ma po tunus munuman huu epo eki tin imen, epon tin eki phae ko makalek men.
66008012	Li klet ma tihngin tin me mnal angan men so kiyak tin tan men, ma sinang maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men men wingin, u namih maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men, u awheng tin kuk e li li men maran min ta kuk mi sun tin miuk men kut tumen, timen kuma endara tin imen maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men ko mi ku. Ma pi mhangin maran min ta kuk mi sun tin miuk men ku mha akomen, u pi luk men tumen kut tumen.
66008013	Li klet ma nga tuh kyok, men nga hul tihngin ta men yap mili pi alilil emin, ma yang wut pit ili awon taku, “Auh, auh, auh, wom tin ung wo mulus men, epo ingutngin tin kara e ta kiyak tin ta tihngin tin miuk kara men tin ngyuk ku so so i angan men.”
66009001	Li klet ma tihngin tin me eip angan men so kiyak tin tan men, ma nga ion awheng ta men plong me ko wet pi ko wo mulus kho kut, ma enda tin ku yang klas wo nahu tin sinsin om men wangin ko ta yang.
66009002	Ma yang klas mi nahu tin siin om men, ma yau kuin nginan si mi nahu men ken yau nhum ta tin kuldup si men. Tumen ma sinang maran u pi alilil kut tumen ko mi ku, sinsin epon tin yau kuin nginan si mi nahu tin siin om men.
66009003	Kut ma mi yau kuin nginan tin imen men esis kara me pol min ma ko wo mulus. Ma esis tin imen men emhong kara wangin ko tan, men ken yakawu tin api wo mulus men tin kuk to emhong men.
66009004	Ma wungin ko ta li epo li ku mumhek mi epilil tin nuk yanga mulus men, u endara tin po keng men ta, u sa ta tumen asin, si po tunus tin tosukngin ta Got om mhi hi awang men misa hi.
66009005	Ma emhong tin epo li ku lek po tunus ko huu men men ku wangin ko ta li akomen, si li ku wa won maanngin si ta po misan to namih khaut eip. Ma won maanngin tin ta esis men men ken won maanngin tin taku yakawu wel po tunus ta men.
66009006	Ma minan tin imen men ku po tunus lang lang epo hunngin, takuma po ku pon ta hunngin angan akomen; po ku mi hi epo po ku huu, takuma hunngin men ku saa silang po.
66009007	Si esis tin imen maran ken hos tin hihingin kho epon ku li epo lek walngin men, ma moolngin pon ken gol wa tumen ung e li li mhin, u mara li men ken po tunus mara hi men kut tumen.
66009008	Kuru li yut men ken po wala yut hi men, u li ngin men ken laion ngin men kut tumen.
66009009	U li engain men endara klet pon ken po tunus tin klet po engai hi epo aen men, u ingutngin tin ta li mhit men men ken ingutngin tin ta karis to hos munuman tin mhup li epo lek walngin men,
66009010	u li kut men ken yakawu kut men, u enda tin li wel po epon men nuk kut li kut tumen. Ma emhong ta li men epon ku li wa won maanngin ko ta po tunus to namih khaut eip.
66009011	Ma yang tin sinkhaung e maran pit wo po men ta hi ta in, men tihngin tin ta nahu tin siin om men, tin yan ira sakalngin ta hi Hibru ti, “Abadon,” si yan ira sakalngin Grik men ti, “Apoluon.”
66009012	Won maikngin tin tihngin kamus epon men ta kho li, auh, won maikngin ponwal maksin ku iso me ira sun tin imen.
66009013	Li klet ma tihngin tin me ta me sup angan men so kiyak tin tan men, ma nga hul wut po ta men yuk si mi imi tin khaut mnal e nuk wo suyung tin golan e ung maran min Got men,
66009014	men sakal ta tihngin tin me ta me sup e kasum kiyak men taku, “E poplos tihngin tin khaut mnal e kan kanngin kuk put eki nhum tin Yupretis men li wo hi pias.”
66009015	Tumen ma tihngin tin khaut mnal e hihingin kho epo sinang maran u ungunan u namih u posan tumen tin wala imen, men plosngin epon ku li lek po tunus maran min ta kuk mi sun tin miuk men ko huu.
66009016	Ma po nolo tin ung e li li wo hos men enu hi tiik nginan men milion khum khum ponwal (200,000,000); epo nga hul po enu hi tiik nginan.
66009017	Ma nga ion hos tin nomoyong imen mi enun yolngin tin marango plal ma nga ion i men men ti: po tin ung e li li wo hos men wa endara pon mhee ken yau men, u po ku amim, u po lok ken enah salpa men tumen klet po engai hi; u hos mhin men ken laion mhin men; ma mi wo li men yau, u yau kuin nginan u enah salpa tin ngiseng men tumen me pol.
66009018	Epo saihngin tin khaut miuk imen kha po tunus maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men lekngin ko huu epon men -- epo yau, u yau kuin nginan, u enah salpa tin ngiseng men tumen tin me pol mi wo hos men kha po huu epon men.
66009019	Epo emhong tin li lek po tunus epon men men pit wo li u pit kut li kut tumen; epo li kut men ken tamha men, men mhin ung e li li kut tumen; ma li kut tin li mhin ung e li li hut imen kha li wa won maanngin ko po po epon men.
66009020	Si po tunus tin kara e ku huu epo saihngin tin imen som men, men ku phae mi hi epo endara tin po ning i epo wili hi men som, epo wungin tin po uluu epo emiun tin lengwal men, u got tin tororokngin enu hi e po ning i epo gol u silwa u bras u enah u sa kut tumen tin ku maran iis endara wa kingan hul wa muk muk tumen ewin akomen, ku po mi hi epo po ku mang tan akomen.
66009021	Kuru po ku phae mi hi epo wungin tin po lek sun ko huu men, u wungin maran kiring kiring tin po wam wam sun men, u wungin tin po ning elwanngin men u wungin tin po tip tip endara men tumen akomen.
66010001	Li klet ma nga ion tihngin apalukngin ta kyok men me ko wet pi, men phae pon epo hingis ta, u li pospi ta nuk mhin, kuru maran men ken sinang men, u khin ken lapalak tin yauan men kut tumen.
66010002	Ma kisang tun ta men lapngin ma nuk yanga wilin. Ma yang wa khin tin atunus men ko pit yanga wiu u yang khin tin eronin men ko pit wo mulus tumen,
66010003	ma yang wut pit ili awon takut ken laion ta tin ingut hambip men. Ma yang wut pit, men pi kuklung tin khaut ponwal me sup men wut hi ingut ma sakal.
66010004	Ma minan tin pi kuklung tin khaut ponwal me sup men ingut ma sakal kho men nga taku pan i; takuma nga hul wut po ta me ko wet pi, men wo ta ngo ti, “E sambal si eya sakalngin tin pi tin kuklung men pok put men ta mip, si e pan i ko nuk asin.”
66010005	Li klet ma tihngin tin marango kon i pit yanga wiu u wo mulus tumen men tus wilin li si wet pi,
66010006	ma yang tung tung epo ya sun tin sindak in kokyok kokyok men, tin pho po wet pi to endara mosop tin kuk epon men, u mulus to endara mosop tin kuk won men, u wiu to endara mosop tin kuk min men kut tumen, epo pi men ku ung e lap kyok li ma Got ku kaeng kyok akomen,
66010007	si mi elup tin ku kiyak tin ta tihngin tin me ponwal me sup men ingut men, minan tin yang ku so i angan men, kut men ku wungin khekngin tin ta Got men ku si pyu pongin kut khae, ken sun tin kho ma yang wo ta po pokngin tin kum tan men.
66010008	Li klet ma wut po ta tin nga hul i kho e me ko wet pi men sakal ta ngo kyok taku, “E lu wa kisang tin tun e lapngin nuk yanga wili tihngin tin pit yanga wiu u wo mulus men tumen.”
66010009	Tumen ma nga li hang tihngin ma nga wo ta yang taku, “E wa kisang tin tun imen mu ta ngo.” Ti ma yang ko wo ta ngo taku, “E wai si e iini; men ku ning i ma ekupi ngon min makalek, si men ku phiit ken imep men wo ngon.”
66010010	Kut ma nga wa kisang tin tun imen yanga wili tihngin si nga iini, ma men phiit ken imep men wo ngo; takuli klet ma nga kuum i li ko ma ekupi ngo min makalek.
66010011	Li klet ma yang wo ta ngo taku, “Ngon men ku pok put wungin kyok weh epo po munuman tin masang to sun wala ta hi weh, u khuuk wal ta hi weh, u sakalngin ta hi weh, u epo po tin sinkhaung men kara kut tumen.
66011001	Kut ma kaas khin ta men wangin si ta ngo, men ken kamtukngin ta tin po kai endara epon men. Ma tihngin si pit ma yang wo taku, “E si kuma e kai mang auluungin tin ta Got men, u suyung, u e tiik po tin plong ko mara hi ko ma kuk e wa Got yan si mi mang men kut tumen.
66011002	Si nowhang tin ung wetpo mang auluungin men men ku e mang tan, si e kaini asin, epo nowhang tin imen men wangin sup yanga wili po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kho. Ma po tin imen ku khi hi sak po pi tin auluungin men to namih khum mnal u ponwal tumen (42).
66011003	Ma ngo ku wa emhong ko ta wulong ponwal tin pok put wungin ta ngo men, ma wulong ku piphi moolngin tin epo tirukngin men ma wulong pok put wungin ta ngo to ungunan khum khum khum ta u khum khum ponwal, u khum ta me sup tumen (1,260).
66011004	Wulong tin imen men sa olip ponwal u esul khin tin ponwal men kut tumen tin nuk maran min Got tin maran pit wo mulus men kha men.
66011005	Ma taku po ta taku songhu pit wo wulong, men ku yau me pol wo wulong ma uspo po tin nolo wulong men engun. Ma taku po ta taku songhu pit wo wulong, men ku wingin ko hun weh epo wungin tin imen.
66011006	Wulong timen in to emhong tin ku wulong wa ehii mut eya wet pi men, kumali pi yung ku kara plong ko mi elup tin wulong pok put wungin ton men akomen. Kuru wulong in to emhong tin ku wulong phae eki ko min enghikan, u wulong lek po masang to sun wala tin ung wo mulus men epo saihngin maran kiring kiring epo mi ngong engun kut tumen.
66011007	Li klet ma wulong suuk sii kumang tin wulong pok put wungin ta Got men, anima li ken nginan enih tin me si mi nahu tin siin om men kuli sewut wulong, men ku wulong huuspit mara li, ma li lek wulong ko huu.
66011008	Ma wulong emkusi ngong ku nuk ira so tin nuk pi tin nhum e po sakal emol los po pi Sodom u Isip tumen epon men, men pi tin po poo poo yang tin Akono ta it men si kuk put sa wlong put wal epon men.
66011009	Ma po kara tin me mi po tin ung e li li e masang to sun wala ta hi weh u lawin siin ta hi weh u sakalngin ta hi weh u khuuk wal ta hi weh men tumen men ku me supa wulong emkusi ngong to ungunan miuk u misikin tumen, si po ku mang kuma po kil kil wulong ko pi tin tanuan men akomen.
66011010	Ma po mosop tin ung wo mulus men ku mi hi keh keh epo wulong tin huu kut men, ma po kakaom ma po tirih talungin li epo al, sinsin epon tin kho ma wulong tin pokngin imen wa won maanngin ko po po tin ung wo mulus men.
66011011	Li klet ma ungunan tin miuk u misikin imen kho li, anima emiun tin epo tunusngin e me hang Got men me sup mi wulong kyok, ma wulong kekhek si nuk ewi ngong, ma lemngin nhum takut si ta po tin ion wulong men.
66011012	Li klet ma wulong hul wut po ta me ko hambip wet pi, men sakal ta wulong taku, “Mom mu si iyi.” Ti ma wulong li si wet pi mi hingis ta, si po tin nolo wulong men nuk e supa wulong.
66011013	Kut ma siik to sinang maran timen pi kin nhum ta si, ma pi tin nhum imen maran min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men kyum ko. Pi kin tin imen men po masang to sun wala khum khum khum ponwal me sup (7,000) huu epon, si po tin kara men lem ma po wa Got tin ung ili wet pi men yan si.
66011014	Won maikngin tin me ponwal angan e tihngin kamus epon men kho li. Auh, won maikngin tin me miuk angan men ku si angan kerek kut khae.
66011015	Li klet ma tihngin tin me ponwal me sup angan men so kiyak tin tan men, ma wut po kara pit pit hambip ili wet pi, men sakal taku, “Enunu tin ung e li li wo mulus tin iyi men si enunu ta yang tin Akono ta it men u ta Krais tin ta yang men kut tumen, ma yang men ku sinkhaung in kokyok kokyok li kut!”
66011016	Ma po tin akokono e khum ponwal u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (24), tin ung e li li wo ehus tin ta hi sinkhaung men to mara Got men, men poplong ko mara hi ko ma po wa Got yan si,
66011017	ma po sakal taku, “Auweh, ngon tin Akono e Got Apalukngin Weh men, tin in homani u in kho u ku in mi elup tin ku iso me men kut tumen, pim a sam sam ngon, epo e wa emhong nhum tin tap men ma e si sinkhaung ma marap pit wo mulus weh kut.
66011018	Ma po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men mi hi kakhat sun, u min kakhat sun tin tap men si, u elup ta po tin huu kho men si, tin ku e ples wungin ta po epon men, u tin ku e emhut wungin ta po tin kum tap e hi pokngin u hi auluungin men tumen, u po tin lem pit wo yap e taku ya hi om wa taku ya hi nuk men tumen, kuru e mumhek mi po tin ung e mumhek mi mulus men kut tumen.”
66011019	Li klet ma mang auluungin tin ta Got men won pit ili wet pi, ma wunwun tin to wungin siin tin Got kaek i lungan to po tunus men men si in pi mlaeng to mara po mi mang auluungin tin tan men. Ma pi memlengin u ingutngin kara, u pi kuklung, u pi kin ta, u pi yung tin enahan men nhum ta tumen si si kut tumen.
66012001	Kut si tosukngin nhum ta si ili wet pi: men wut wala ta phi sinang ken moolngin men, kuru namih ung wet khi wut, u moolngin tin po mol i epo awheng khum ta u ponwal tumen ung mhi wut kut tumen.
66012002	Ma wut kuman ma wut hau pit ili awon to won maanngin epo wut taku wanhung angan.
66012003	Kut si tosukngin ta maksin si ili wet pi: ih, tamha nhum po mhee ken yau men ta mhin khaut ponwal me sup ma imi eip ponwal ung e li li mhin, kuru moolngin ta po tin sinkhaung men khaut ponwal me sup ung e li li mhin tin imen kut tumen.
66012004	Ma li kut laluk awheng tin kuk e li li men maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men, ma li kut whis awheng tin imen ko mulus. Ma tamha tin nhum men si pit mara wut tin wala e taku wanhung angan men, epon kuli kuum sun hoin siik minan tin wut taku wanhung men.
66012005	Kut ma wut tin wala men khuuk sun masang ta, men tin ku wa elip aen ta ma maran pit wo po masang to sun wala mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men. Ma yang tin Hoin e wut khuuk i imen uusngin si hang Got u ehus tan tumen.
66012006	Si wut tin wala men saa li in pi tahunggu pi ta wut ta tin Got hihi i ta wut kho men, epon kuli po wa endara aiingin pit wo wut pi tin imen to ungunan khum khum khum ta u khum khum ponwal u khum ta me sup tumen (1,260).
66012007	Kut si lek walngin ta si ili wet pi, men a-Maikel hi tihngin tin tan men sewut tamha tin nhum men; ma tamha hi tihngin tin tan men hi lek wal,
66012008	takuma tamha ku kakha epon ku luul to po akomen, kuru pi ta po ku po pon tan ta kyok ung ili wet pi akomen.
66012009	Tumen ma tamha tin nhum men men psikngin li ko, men tamha tin launekan e po sikian emiun tin ek ek mara po nginangan men u a-Nolongin kut tumen, men tin ek ek mara po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung wo mulus men kha psikngin li ko mulus men, kuru po tihngin tin tan men whisngin ko to yang kut tumen.
66012010	Li klet ma nga hul wut po ta si pit ili wet pi men sakal taku, “Homani men palolongin u kakhangin, u enunu tin ta Got tin ta it men, u emhong tin ta Krais tin yang won ung won men kut tumen kho si kut, epo yang tin hik put wungin pit wo po ehuro it to pi mhangin u to pi luk tumen nginangan men men psikngin kho li ko kut.
66012011	Ma po si apalukngin epo a-Nolongin epo Sipsip Asus enghikan u epo sakalngin tin po pok put men kut tumen, ma po ku mi hi ko wo hi akomen. Awu. Po mi hi alang si tunusngin ta hi ma po huu engun.
66012012	Tumen ma wet pi, ngon u po mosop tin kuk wet pi men kut tumen ku mi wom keh keh! Auh, wom tin kuk wo mulus u mi wiu men tumen, won maikngin nuk epo wom, epo yang tin ek ek mi po nginangan men kho ko in lunga wom, ma yang yan sal weh, epo yang ion i epo ungunan ta yang men me in tikayung kut khae.”
66012013	Kut si minan tin tamha tin nhum men ion i tin li psikngin kho ko in mulus kut men, li ning i lengwal epo wut tin khuuk sun masang ta tin imen.
66012014	Takuma emon wisu mhit ponwal wangin ko ta wut tin wala imen, kuma wut yap li in pi tin tahunggu men li in pi tin hihingin ta wut kho men, pi tin imen kha ku wut li in hin epo tamha tin imen ma ma wut wa endara aiingin to elup ta u elup ponwal u elup misikin ta tumen.
66012015	Kut ma tamha tin imen mutwuk eki tin kuk won men ko saa ken eki put ewun ta men ma sut li ira wut tin wala men kumali eki li ut mara wut tin wala men ma wa wut li.
66012016	Takuma mulus nhio wo wut tin wala men, ma mulus won kaa ma kuum eki tin put ewun e tamha tin nhum men mutwuk i pol won men.
66012017	Tumen ma tamha tin nhum men yan sal pit wo wut tin wala men kara kut, ma li li epo li taku sewut po tin wut husanin e kara maksin men, men tin ira wungin sinsin tin ta Got men u kuk to wungin tin po pok put ta a-Yesus Krais men kut tumen.
66013001	Li klet ma nga pit po namak suu wiu. Ma marango kon li ken nginan enih ta men me si mi wiu, ma mhin tan khaut ponwal me sup u imi tan eip ponwal, u moolngin tin ta po sinkhaung men eip ponwal ung e li li hut imi tin imen kut tumen, ma mhin then then men yan tin ton mi Got men panngin nuk e li li pon.
66013002	Ma li ken nginan enih tin marango kon i imen maran ken pusi enih tin lepat men ta, u khin ken li ken nginan tin po sikian bea men khin, kuru won men ken laion won men kut tumen. Ma tamha tin nhum men wa kakhangin tan tuon, u ehus tan tin ta po sinkhaung men u emhong tan tin nhum men kut tumen si ta li ken nginan enih tin imen.
66013003	Ma nga ion li mhin ta men maran ken po niin ma taku hun angan, li ma won sal tin li taku hun angan epon men ewin nam nam pit si li tunus. Tumen ma po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung wo mulus men whik wo li ma po ira li ken nginan enih tin imen.
66013004	Ma po powut hi ko suul to mara tamha tin nhum e wa emhong si ta li ken nginan enih men; kuru po powut hi ko suul to mara li ken nginan enih maksin kut tumen, ma po sakal taku, “Ara weh e ku ken li ken nginan enih? Ara e ku kakha epon ku sewut li?”
66013005	Ma emhong ko ta li ken nginan enih epo sakalngin tin li tuon wai si pit men u li ton mi Got kut tumen ku si mi won, ma emhong ko ta li epo li ku iso in e ning i tumen to namih khum mnal u ponwal tumen (42).
66013006	Kut ma li won ngam ma li ton mi Got u li ton mi Got yan, u mang ausel tin ta Got men, u po tin ung ili wet pi men kut tumen.
66013007	Ma emhong ko ta li ken nginan enih epon ku sewut po masang to sun wala tin auluungin e ta Got men, ma li men nomnga weh epo po. Ma emhong ko ta li epo li ku maran pit wo po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung e li li e lawin siin ta hi weh, u sakalngin ta hi weh, u khuuk wal ta hi weh men tumen.
66013008	Ma po mosop tin ung wo mulus men ku powut hi ko suul to mara li ken nginan enih, men po tin ya hi ku panngin nuk mi Kisang tin epo Tunusngin e ta Sipsip Asus tin wingin ko hun kho minan tin Got ku iso ning mulusngin sinsin kho som men.
66013009	Taku po ta kingan ung, men ku hul wungin tin ti:
66013010	Taku po ta wa sun ta li sup yanga wili po nolo, men ku weh li sup yanga wili po nolo maksin; taku po ta wi sun ta ko hun epo bainat, men ku weh wingin ko hun epo bainat maksin. Wungin tin po tin auluungin e ta Got men ku lat won maikngin li maran nomalak ma wo phepngin ta hi pit nhing epon men wala tumen.
66013011	Li klet ma marango kon li ken nginan enih ta maksin men me si mi mulus, ma imi ponwal ken imi ta sipsip hoin ta men ung mhin, ma men sakal ken tamha nhum ta men.
66013012	Ma li tohuh epo emhong tin ta li ken nginan enih tin muk men to mara sun. Ma li ning i ma mulus u po mosop tin ung e li li won men tumen powut hi ko suul mara li ken nginan enih tin si in muk e won sal tin li taku hun epon angan men ewin nam nam pit si li si tunus kyok men.
66013013	Ma li in e ning tosukngin maran kiring nunhum kara, tin kuli ning i ma yau me ko wet pi ko wo mulus to mara po masang wala men.
66013014	Ma li ek ek mara po tin ung wo mulus men epo tosukngin tin li wa emhong epo li ku ning i to mara li ken nginan enih tin muk men, ma li wo ta po tin ung wo mulus men epo po ku ning enun ta ta li ken nginan enih tin po niin epo bainat takuma li kyok si tunus in men.
66013015	Ma li wa emhong epo li ku wa emiun si ta li ken nginan enih enun tin imen, kuma li ken nginan enun ku sakal kuru ning i ma po tin esini e ku powut hi ko suul to mara li ken nginan enih enun som men ku lekngin ko huu kut tumen.
66013016	Ma li ning i ma po mosop tin ya hi om u tin ya hi pos, u tin nemokong ta hi tang pit u tin endara ta hi om, u tin wo hi pias u tin kum wo sun engun men tumen, ku wa tosukngin ta nuk po wili hi eronin tin wetpon men wa po mhi hi tin awang men tumen,
66013017	kumali po ta ku kul endara hang sun wa tih endara anaum epo sun tumen akomen. Awu. Po tin wa tosukngin wa ya li ken nginan enih wa tiikngin tin pok put li yan men tumen misa hi kha ku ning i men.
66013018	Mhin ekngin wala ti. Taku po ta maran ek weh, men ku maran ira tiikngin ta li ken nginan tin enih men, epon men tiikngin ta po tunus ta, men khum khum ta me sup u khum ta me sup u ta me sup tumen (666).
66014001	Kut si nga tuh kyok ma nga ion Sipsip Asus men si pit po pi emian Saion, ma po khaut tausen khum khum ta u tausen khum mnal u tausen mnal tumen (144,000) nuk to Sipsip, ma Sipsip Wiraman yan panngin nuk e li li mhi po tin awang men.
66014002	Ma nga hul ingutngin ta me ko wet pi, men ken eki nhum ta tin nuk e uu men, u ken pi tin kuklung hambip men tumen. Kuru nga hul ingutngin ta po kara tin kuk e sok sok gita ta hi kara men kut tumen.
66014003	Ma po lut lutngin ken i e lutngin homan ta men maran min ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men, u mara li ken nginan tin khaut mnal e mara hi to tunusngin men, u mara po tin akokono men kut tumen; ma po ta men ku urut lutngin tin imen akomen. Awu. Po tin tausen khum khum ta u tausen khum mnal u tausen mnal tumen (144,000) e Got kiis li mut eya po mi sun tin ung e li li wo mulus men misa hi kha urut lutngin men.
66014004	Po tin imen tin ku lus to sun wala ewin som men, epo po men mara hi pit wo hi tunus weh. Po tin imen tin ira Sipsip Asus mili mili pi tin akani e Sipsip Asus li epon men. Po men Got kiis li mut eya hi mi po masang to sun wala tin ung e li li wo mulus men, men kuk ken endara aiingin tin enun po ewun e ku ta Got u ta Sipsip Asus weh men.
66014005	Ma torokngin ku po pon tan ta nuk wo po akomen, epo po men lasin ta hi om to maran min ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men.
66014006	Li klet ma nga ion tihngin ta maksin men yap mili wet hingis, men in to pok putngin tunus tin sindak men epon ku yang pok put si ta po tin ung e li li wo mulus men, men ta po mosop tin ung e li li e hi khuuk wal ta hi weh, u lawin siin ta hi weh, u sakalngin ta hi weh, u masang wala ta hi weh men kut tumen,
66014007	ma yang wut pit hambip ma yang sakal taku, “Wom men ku lem pit wo Got ma wom wa yang yan si, epo elup tin ku yang ples wungin epon men si kut; ma wom uluu yang tin ning wet pi u mulus u wiu u eki maran tin nuk e li li men kut tumen.”
66014008	Kut si tihngin ta maksin ira sun me, ma yang sakal taku, “Pi Babilon men plong ko, men plong ko kut, men pi tin yan pos men, epo wut ning i ma po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men um wain tin tan e ning i ma po mi hi lup si epon ku ning elwanngin men.”
66014009	Li klet ma tihngin ta tin me miuk angan men ira sun me ma yang wut pit hambip ma yang sakal taku, “Taku po ta uluu li ken nginan enih u enun tumen, ma wa tosukngin nuk mhin tin awang men wa nuk wetpo wilin tumen,
66014010	men tuon ku um wain tin ta Got e to min kakat sun tin ta yang men maksin, tin ku phaengin to eki som si yuk yukngin to kakhangin tan mosop ko mi karu tin to yan salngin tin ta Got men, ma kuli yau u enah tin ngiseng men tumen koh po ma po wo hi maan maan hambip takut to mara tihngin tin auluungin e ta Got men u Sipsip Asus kut tumen.
66014011	Ma yau tin koh po men men kuin nginan si kokyok kokyok li kut; ma po ku nhing to pi mhangin wa to pi luk kara ewin akomen, men po tin uluu li ken nginan enih u enun, u po tin in akani e wa tosukngin epo li yan men tumen kha men.
66014012	Hoo mingin tin ku po tin auluungin e ta Got men wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak epon men wala tumen; po tin kasum wungin sinsin tin ta Got men u wo phepngin tin pit wo a-Yesus men tumen kha imen.
66014013	Li klet ma nga hul wut po ta si pit ili wet pi men sakal me ko ta ngo taku, “E pan wungin tin i ti, ‘Homani ma li kut men emhong tin ta Got men ko po po tin huu mi yang tin Akono men.’” Kuru Emiun Auluungin sakal ti, “Wai, kuma po nhing epo kumang tin po wuh i men, ma kumang tin po ning i kho kut men men ku pet kira po.”
66014014	Li klet ma nga tuh kyok ma nga ion hingis pon eun ta, ma po ta maran ken Wiru Po Tunus men ung wo hingis tin imen, ma moolngin tin ta po sinkhaung men golan ta ung mhin u po wili yang men yang kasum sarip to ngin hut kuluk ta.
66014015	Li klet ma tihngin ta maksin me pol mi mang auluungin ma yang wut pit hambip ma yang yuk li epo sun tin ung wo hingis men taku, “E psik sarip tap tin hut kuluk men ko e kaklat endara aiingin, epo elup tin ku e kaklat endara aiingin ton men si kut, epo endara aiingin tin nuk mulus men mumuru kut.”
66014016	Tumen ma yang tin ung wo hingis men payuh sarip tin hut kuluk men mili wo mulus, ma endara aiingin tin nuk wo mulus men kaklatngin kut.
66014017	Kut ma tihngin ta kyok me pol mi mang auluungin tin ung wet pi men, men kasum sarip tin hut kuluk e to ngin men ta kyok kut tumen.
66014018	Kuru tihngin ta maksin me pol wet suyung, men wa emhong epon ku maran pit wo yau, ma yang wut pit hambip ma yang yuk li epo sun tin kasum sarip tin to ngin e hut kuluk men taku, “E wa sarip tin to ngin tap men ma e kaklat wain enun tin wa ilio angan e kuk e li li put elik tin los po mulus men, epo wain enun tin tan men memhek koyang kut.”
66014019	Tumen ma tihngin payuh sarip tan tin hut kuluk men mili yanga mulus ma yang palu wain enun tin ta pi mulus men li pit, ma yang whis i ko mi pi won enahan tin nhum men tin epo wain enun paplot nginan e los po min kakhat sun tin ta Got men.
66014020	Ma wain enun men paplotngin mi pi won enahan tin ung wetpo enunu tin baul pi men, ma engik me pol mi pi won tin po paplot wain min men ma num si pol ta watngin tin kasum hos mhin men, ma saa mili mili ma hawus yanga mulus mosop li pol kilomita khum khum khaut miuk (300).
66015001	Li klet ma nga ion tosukngin ta maksin si wet pi, men nhum u awhik wo nginan kut tumen, men tihngin khaut ponwal me sup tin nuk to won maikngin khaut ponwal me sup tin me sulung weh men kha men, epo won maikngin tin imen kha min kakhat sun tin ta Got men pyu pongin epon weh men.
66015002	Ma nga ion endara ta maran ken wiu glasan mi kleng kleng ta men nau wal to yau, ma po tin nomnga hut li ken nginan enih, u hut li enun u epo tosukngin tan u epo tiikngin tin pok put ya li men kut tumen, men nuk yanga wiu tin mi kleng kleng men, ma po then then kasum gita tin ingut tunus e Got wai si ta po men.
66015003	Ma po lut lutngin tin ta a-Moses tin kum ta Got men u lutngin tin ta Sipsip Asus men kut tumen, ma po lut taku, “Aluuh, Got, Ngon tin Akono e Apalukngin weh men, kumang tin e ning i men men nunhum u awhik wo nginan kut tumen! Wungin tap men sisiik u anuh tumen, ngon tin Sinkhaung ta po tin auluungin tap men!
66015004	Aluuh, Ngon tin Akono men, ara weh ku in engun epon tin ku lem pit wo ngon ma wa yap si men? Epo misap kha auluungin men. Epo po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ku me powut hi ko suul marap, epo wungin tap tin e ples i sisiik men men si in pi mlaeng kho kut.”
66015005	Li klet ma mi khi wungin tin imen nga tuh kyok, ih, mang auluungin tin ta Got men tin auselan e Got pok put wungin tan min e ung wet pi tin ta Got men won pit.
66015006	Ma mang auluungin tin imen men tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup e kasum won maikngin tin khaut ponwal me sup men yok min ma me pol, men piphi moolngin pon turunus e po yil u po engil engil kut tumen, kuru po wat po engai hi epo watngin golan kara kut tumen.
66015007	Kut ma li ken nginan tin mara hi to tunusngin e khaut mnal men ta si wa kambuyu golan tin khaut ponwal me sup e min kakhat sun tin ta Got tin sindak in kokyok kokyok men kol min men si ta tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup men.
66015008	Ma mang tin auluungin men yau kuin nginan si kol min, men me epo moolngin ta Got u emhong ta yang kut tumen, ma po ta men ku li sup mi mang auluungin angan akomen li pol minan tin won maikngin tin ponwal me sup e tihngin tin ponwal me sup men kasum i men pyu pongin wet.
66016001	Li klet ma nga hul wut po ta si wut pit hambip, men me pol mi mang auluungin, ma sakal li epo tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup men taku, “Wom lu yuk yuk kambuyu tin golan e khaut ponwal me sup e to min kakhat sun tin ta Got men li ko wo mulus.”
66016002	Tumen ma tihngin tin muk men yok li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko wo mulus, ma elak tin mara wa wa e po wo hi maan maan takut ton men ta si ung e li li po po masang to sun wala tin tosukngin ta li ken nginan enih nuk po hi u po powut hi ko suul to mara enu li men kut tumen.
66016003	Li klet ma tihngin tin me ponwal angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko mi wiu, ma wiu phae ko min enghikan ken po ta tin hun kho men enghikan men; ma endara mosop tin maran to tunusngin e kuk mi wiu men huu.
66016004	Li klet ma tihngin tin me miuk angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko put eki put ewun u maran tumen tin nuk e li li men, ma eki mosop paphae ko min enghikan.
66016005	Kut ma nga hul tihngin tin maran pit wo eki tin nuk e li li men men wo taku, “Aluuh, ngon tin Akono men, tin in homani u kho u ku iso in kut tumen, wungin tap men siik, epo e ples wungin tin imen kho kut.
66016006	Epo po men lek sun tin auluungin u pokngin tumen ma po enghik a hi yuk yuk ko, ma e wa enghik si ta po kuma po um i. Epo wungin tin imen men emhut sun tin po ning i men siik weh ako.”
66016007	Ti ma nga hul wut po ta maksin men sakal hang suyung taku, “Wai, ngon tin Akono e Got tin Apalukngin weh men, wungin tin e ples i men men irawin u siik tumen mosop.”
66016008	Li klet ma tihngin tin me mnal angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko mara sinang, ma sinang wa emhong epon ku koh po tunus ken yau men.
66016009	Ma sinang koh po tunus hambip takut, ma po ton mi Got yan tin in to emhong tin ku yang maran pit wo won maikngin tin mosop imen; si po ku phae mi hi kuma po wa yang yan si akomen.
66016010	Li klet ma tihngin tin me eip angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko wo ehus tin ta li ken nginan enih tin sinkhaung men, ma enunu tin ta li ken nginan enih men men pi mi ku ko awhus i; ma po tunus wo hi maan maan takut ma po kuk e ngi hi kakla po mamai hi.
66016011	Ma po ton mi Got tin in ili wet pi men epon tin po wo hi maan maan u po wo hi sal sal men kut tumen, si po ku phae mi hi epo wungin tin po ning i men akomen.
66016012	Li klet ma tihngin tin me ta me sup angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko put eki put ewun Yupretis tin nhum men, ma eki mlus mosop li kuma soput ta po tin sinkhaung e api sinang me si men ku hihingin nuk.
66016013	Ma nga ion emiun lengwal khaut miuk, men maran ken emko men, men me pol wo tamha, u me pol wo li ken nginan enih, u me pol wo pokngin tin torokngin men kut tumen.
66016014	Epo emiun tin imen men tin lenglengwal e ning ning tosukngin maran kiring kiring men, tin li pol epo po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men u epo po mosop tin ung wo mulus men kut tumen, epon ku palu po tin imen li epo lek walngin tin ta ungunan tin nhum e ta Got tin Apalukngin Weh men.
66016015	Wom hul, epo ngo ku yem engun me ken tipngin ta men. Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po ta tin maran wat ma haum tunus men u iso kapu moolngin tin tan men tunus kut tumen, epon akuli po tin imen wiwil ma muk muk li yanga pi ma po masang to sun wala ion manngin tan.”
66016016	Kut si emiun tin lengwal men palu po me palu wal pi tin po ira sakalngin ta hi Hibru ma po sikian Armagedon men.
66016017	Li klet ma tihngin tin me ponwal me sup angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko put pi alilil, ma po ta wut pit hambip me pol mi mang auluungin tin ung ili wet pi men, men me pol hang ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men, men sakal taku, “Men pyu pongin kut khae.”
66016018	Kut ma ingutngin kara si u pi kuklung u memlengin u papat kut tumen; kuru pi kin nhum ta si, men ku pi kin hambip u nhum ta tumen ta si kho minan tin po tunus ko kuk wo mulus ma me men akomen.
66016019	Ma pi tin nhum men pal mingin ko tingit miuk, u pi nunhum tin ta po tin hi khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men kukyum ko kut tumen. Ma Got tulun hu pit po pi Babilon ma lasin tan si in to mara yang, kuma yang wa karu tin to wain tin los po min kakhat sun tin ngeng ngeng weh e ta yang men si ta wut ma wut um i.
66016020	Kut ma pi po nemut mut mosop mhup ma li kis kis, kuru pi po emian mosop men ku po pon tan kyok akomen kut tumen.
66016021	Ma pi yung enahan nunhum me ko wet pi ma ko lek po tunus, epo pi yung tin imen psit psit then then men maikngin tan ken kilo khum mnal u eip me nuk wo sun (45) wa tumen. Ma po tunus ton mi Got, sinsin epo pi yung tin enahan e lek po men, epo won maikngin tin imen men nhum weh.
66017001	Li klet ma tihngin tin ponwal me sup e kana wal kambuyu tin ponwal me sup men ta me sakal ta ngo taku, “E mu, nga suk marap epo mumhek mingin tin ku si epo wut tin yan nhum to elwanngin men tin ung put eki tin munuman men,
66017002	tin po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ning wungin elwanngin ton, kuru po mosop tin ung wo mulus men um wain tin tan e epo elwanngin men ma po mara hihi hi epon men kut tumen.”
66017003	Tumen ma tihngin wa ngo li mi Emiun Auluungin li pi tin tahunggu men. Ma nga ion wut wala ta men ung wo li ken nginan enih po mhee ta, men wungin tin ton mi Got men tang nuk po li ken nginan, kuru mhin khaut ponwal me sup u imi eip ponwal ung e li li mhi li kut tumen.
66017004	Ma wut tin wala imen phi moolngin po mhee ama u po mhee weh kut tumen, ma wut mool epo gol u enah maran kiring kiring tin pon turunus e po ngel epon men u eyuk enun tin pho mi sun e po ngel epon men kara kut tumen, ma wut kasum karu golan ta, men wungin maran kiring kiring tin hies to mara Got e wungin min lengwal tin wut elwan ton men kol min.
66017005	Ma mara wut tin awang men yan ta panngin nuk ti, “Wungin kaunngin, Babilon tin Yan Pos men, tin toni po wala mosop tin ning elwanngin nginangan men u wungin maran kiring kiring tin hies to mara Got men kut tumen.”
66017006	Ma nga ion wut men um po tin auluungin e ta Got men u po tin pok put wungin ta a-Yesus men kut tumen kalolwa hi hambip ma wut maran hih hih epon. Ma nga ion i, men teretngin nhum ta wa ngo.
66017007	Takuma tihngin ko wo ta ngo ti, “Tua ma e teret won? Ngo ku pok ngon epo wungin kaunngin tin ta wut tin wala imen u epo li ken nginan enih tin lat wut e mhin khaut ponwal me sup u imi eip ponwal tumen sinsin.
66017008	Li ken nginan enih tin e ion i men, men in kho si homani ma kis, si kuli iso si mi nahu tin siin om men ma li epo mumhek mingin tin sindak men. Ma po tin ung wo mulus men, tin ya hi ku panngin nuk som mi kisang tin epo Tunusngin men ewo maran tin mulus iso pho pongin som men, ku ion li ken nginan enih tin in kho si homani ma kis, takuli sulung men kyok si in men, men ku po whik won.
66017009	Po ta tin mhin ekngin nuk min men wala ti: li mhin tin khaut ponwal me sup imen men los po pi emian khaut ponwal me sup tin wut tin wala men ung epon men.
66017010	Kuru po sinkhaung khaut ponwal me sup kuk, men po ta hi khaut eip poplong ko kho kut, ta men iso in, u tin ta maksin men ku kho me som. Ma yang ku me, men ku yang in put monlo long engun.
66017011	Ma li ken nginan enih tin in kho si kis homani men men maksin si sinkhaung tin me miuk me sup men, takuma men then to po sinkhaung tin khaut ponwal me sup men, ma kuli iso li epo mumhek mingin tin sindak men.
66017012	U imi eip ponwal tin e ion i men men los po po sinkhaung eip ponwal tin ku wa enunu ta hi kho som, si kuli po wa emhong to sinang maran then ta engun kuma po si sinkhaung to li ken nginan tin enih men.
66017013	Po tin sinkhaung imen mi hi then, ma po ku wa kakhangin ta hi u emhong ta hi kut tumen si ta li ken nginan tin enih men.
66017014	Po tin sinkhaung imen ku hi sewut Sipsip Asus, ma Sipsip Asus men ku apalukngin hut po, epo yang men Akono ta po akono, u Sinkhaung ta po sinkhaung kut tumen; ma po tin kuk to yang men Got yuk hi, u yang won ung wo hi, u po men pit nhing to wo phepngin ta hi kut tumen.”
66017015	Kuru tihngin iso sakal ta ngo taku, “Si eki munuman tin e ion i men, tin wut tin wala e ning elwanngin nginangan men ung put men, men los po po masang to sun wala tin lawin ta hi siin then, u po wa ilio angan kara, u po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh, u po tin sakal ta hi weh men kut tumen tin hi ung e li li wo mulus men.
66017016	Ma imi tin khaut eip ponwal tin e ion i ung e li li mhi li ken nginan tin enih men ku mi hi lel wut tin elwan men, ma po mumhek mi wut ma po ning i ma wut wiwil, ma po ii wut emalin u po sut wut epo yau kut tumen.
66017017	Epo Got wa wungin ko nuk mi po tin sinkhaung men epon ku po ning wungin tin yang nana i ta min kho men, tin ku po mi hi then ma po wa enunu ta hi si ta li ken nginan tin enih men, li pol minan tin ku sakalngin mosop tin me pol mi wo Got men ku si pyu pongin weh men.
66017018	Kuru wut tin wala e ion i men men los po pi nhum tin yan pos e maran pit wo po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men kut tumen.”
66018001	Kut si mi khi wungin tin imen nga ion tihngin ta kyok, men me ko wet pi to emhong nhum, ma moolngin tin tan men men mha ko nuk wo mulus takut.
66018002	Ma yang wut pit hambip ma yang sakal taku, “Pi Babilon tin yan pos men men plong ko kho kut, men plong ko kho kut, ma men si pi ta tin emiun tin ek ek mara po nginangan men kuk epon men, u emiun lengwal mosop li kan kanngin pit epon, u lahembengin tin emon tin lengwal weh e amutngin men mosop li kan kanngin pit min men kut tumen.
66018003	Epo po mosop tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men um wain tin ta wut e ning i ma po ewhat hi siwil si epon ku ning elwanngin to wut men, u po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ning elwanngin to wut, u po tin kum anaum e hi ung e li li wo mulus men si wa miranngin ta hi hambip epo miranngin tin ta wut e wut sasayih ton e hambip weh men kut tumen.”
66018004	Kut si nga hul wut po ta maksin men me ko wet pi ma sakal taku, “Wom masang to sun wala tin ta ngo men, wom mang ta wut tin imen si wom mu pol, epon akuli lasin ta wut los wom to wut, epon akuli wom wa won maikngin tin ku wut mumhek mingin epon men maksin kut tumen.
66018005	Epo lasin ta wut iso halung pongin weh si pol ili wet pi, ma Got tulun hu wungin lengwal tin ta wut men kho kut.
66018006	Wom men ku ning wungin emhut sun si ta wut ken sun tin wut ning i epo wom men, men ku wom phae wungin kyok si epo wut ira kaingin tin wut ning i epo wom men kuru kaingin ta kyok si po sun kut tumen; karu tin wut tuon phae wain ko min men, men ku wom phae wain ta wut kyok ko min, kuru kaingin ta kyok si po sun kut tumen.
66018007	Kaingin tin wut tuon wai si pit ma sasayih to miranngin tan hambip men, kha ku wom iran kai wal ma wom wa won maanngin to min urut i ko po wut men; epo wut wo ta min taku, ‘Ngo men ung ken po wala tin lamit men ta, si ngo ku wamuh, ma nga pon ta min urut i ta akomen,’ ti.
66018008	Wungin sinsin tin imen kha kuli won maikngin si ta wut mi ungunan then ta engun men, men hunngin u min urut i u elwip kut tumen. Ma kuli wut sutngin epo yau tin ku suuk sii wut weh men, epo Got tin Akono e ku ples wungin ta wut men men apalukngin takut.
66018009	Ma po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men, tin kho ma ning elwanngin to wut ma sasayih to wut to miranngin ta hi tin hambip weh men, men ku tirinis u hahau amusukngin epo wut minan tin po ion yau kuin nginan tin yau ii wut ma kuldup si men,
66018010	men ku po li nuk hin long, epon tin lemngin wa po epo mumhek mingin tin si ta wut men, ma po sakal taku, “Aluuh, aluuh, ngon tin Babilon e yap pos u apalukngin kut tumen, epo sinang maran then ta kha mumhek mingin si tap epon men.”
66018011	Kuru po tin kum anaum e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ku tirinis u mi hi urut hi epo wut kut tumen, epo homani ma po ta ku me kul nomokong tin ta po men kyok akomen,
66018012	men nemokong tin golan u silwa an u enah maran kiring kiring tin po ngel sun epon men u eyuk enun tin pho mi sun e po ngel epon men kut tumen, kuru mulu tin pon eun e wia weh men, u mulu kara maksin tin pon mhee ama men, u mulu tin pon engil engil u tin pon mhee men kut tumen. Kuru sa maran kiring kiring tin ipek tunus men, u endara maran kiring kiring tin po klas i epo yahong tin ta elepen men, u endara maran kiring kiring tin po ning i epo sa tin po ngel sun epon ewin men, u epo bras, u aen, u enah tin po kal e pon urut mi al men kut tumen;
66018013	kuru sinamon u endara tin kuin nginan ipek tunus men, u nowhong tin ipek tunus men u sa sut tin ipek tunus men, u wain u sa olip sut u plaua tin aiingin men, u wit ihun u bulmakau u sipsip u hos u karis tin epo lek walngin men u po tunus emkusi hi u enu hi kut tumen.
66018014	Sa enun tin memhek e marap nes i kho men men kis kis silang ngon kho kut, u endara tin e iini tuleng weh men u tin pon engil engil e mool epon men kut tumen moyong li kuk hin epo ngon kho kut, ma ngon ku pon tan kyok angan akomen.”
66018015	Po tin kum anaum epo endara tin mosop imen, tin wa miranngin ta hi hang wut men, men kuli nuk hin long epon tin lemngin wa po epo won maanngin nhum takut tin si ta wut men, ma po tirinis u po mi hi urut hi kut tumen,
66018016	ma po sakal taku, “Aluuh, aluuh, pi Babilon tin yan pos men, tin kho ma phi moolngin tin tunus e pon eun men u tin pon mhee ama men, u tin po mhee weh men tumen, u men mool epo gol u enah maran kiring kiring tin po ngel sun epon men, u eyuk enun tin pho mi sun e po ngel epon men kut tumen,
66018017	epo sinang maran then ta engun kha nomokong tin ta wut e hambip men mosop ko om epon men.” Kuru po mosop tin mara hi pit wo imut luul to nginan men u po mosop tin kuk e li wo imut men, u po mosop tin kuk e kum wo imut men, u po mosop tin esini e hi tih endara anaum li yanga wiu men kut tumen, li nuk hin long epo pi,
66018018	ma po ion yau tin ii wut men kuin nginan si, ma po yuk hambip ma po sakal taku, “Pi tin akani weh e ku yan pos ken sun tin ikop?”
66018019	Ti ma po ko mot mot nokokwa si po tep i si mhi hi, ma po tirinis u po mi hi urut hi, ma po yuk si taku, “Aluuh, aluuh, pi tin yan pos takut men, tin po mosop tin imut ta hi kuk e mili yanga wiu men si mimiran epo miranngin tin ta wut men, epo sinang maran then ta misan kha wut mumhek mingin epon men!
66018020	Aluuh, ngon tin wet pi men u wom tin paengin u pokngin tumen tin auluungin men, wom men ku mi wom keh keh, epo Got ples wungin ta wut emhut sun tin wut ning i lengwal epo wom men kho kut!”
66018021	Kut ma tihngin apalukngin ta me lat enah ta si, men kai enah tin po tut wit epon men nhum ta, si yang psik i ko mi wiu ma yang sakal taku, “Wungin amhees tin tumen kha ku pi Babilon tin yan pos men psikngin ko epon men, ma kuli po pon tan kyok angan akomen.
66018022	Ma ingutngin ta po tin sok sok gita men u ta po tin lulut nginangan men, u ta po tin so so lawi nginangan men, u ta po tin so so kiyak nginangan men kut tumen, men ku hulngin mi enunu tin tap men angan ta kyok akomen. Kuru po tin nut kumang nginangan e kumang ta hi then then weh men ku po pon tan ta in mi ngon kyok akomen, u ingutngin ta enah tin po tut wit ihun epon men, ku po hul i mi ngon kyok akomen kut tumen.
66018023	Kuru esul tin ngin ngin men ku ta kyok ung pi tap akomen, u po masang tin ku enangin homan men u po wala tin enangin homan men tumen, men ku po hul wut sun mi enunu tin tap men angan ta kyok akomen kut tumen. Epo kho men po tin tap e kum anaum men ya hi pos mi sun kara tin ung wo mulus men, epo wamngin tin tap men kha po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men mara hi ek ek marangin epon men.
66018024	Kuru pi Babilon men enghik tin ta po tin pokngin men u tin ta po tin auluungin men, u tin ta po tin kara maksin e po lek hi ko huu wo mulus men tumen kha po pon tan nuk min men kut tumen.”
66019001	Kut si mi khi wungin tin imen nga hul po wa ilio angan maran min nhum ta wut hi pit pit hambip ili wet pi, ma po sakal taku, “Sam samngin men ku ta yang tin Akono men! Wungin tin po palolongin epon men, u moolngin u yan pos, u kakhangin kut tumen, men ta yang tin Akono e Got ta it men misan!
66019002	Epo wungin ples nginan tin tan men men irawin u siik kut tumen; epo yang men ples wungin ta wut tin wala e yan pos e ning elwanngin men, tin mhuk mi po tin ung wo mulus men epo elwanngin tin tan men, ma yang wa wungin emhut sun tin ta wut men, tin wut ning i ma po tin kum ta yang men kalolwa hi yuk yuk ko men.”
66019003	Kut ma po sakal angan ta kyok taku, “Sam samngin men ku ta yang tin Akono men! Epo yau tin ii wut men kuin nginan pit e tup si kokyok kokyok li kut!”
66019004	Kut ma po tin akokono e khum ponwal u mnal tumen (24) u li ken nginan tin mara hi to tunusngin e khaut mnal men tumen poplong ko mara hi ko ma po uluu Got tin ung wo ehus tin ta yang tin sinkhaung men, ma po yuk taku, “Irawin! Sam samngin men ku ta yang tin Akono men weh!”
66019005	Li klet ma wut po ta me pol hang ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men, men sakal taku, “Wom men ku sam sam Got weh, wom mosop tin kum ta yang u tin uluu yang men kut tumen, aku, taku ya wom om wa ya wom pos!”
66019006	Kut ma nga hul ingutngin ta men ingut ken po tin wa ilio angan maran min nhum ta men u ken eki nhum ta tin sut ma nuk e uu men u ken pi tin kuklung mi maik men tumen, men wut pit taku, “Sam samngin men ku ta yang tin Akono men weh! Epo yang tin Akono e Got tin Apalukngin Weh men si sinkhaung weh kut!
66019007	It men ku mi it keh keh, men ku mi it keh keh weh ma it wa yang yan si, epo elup tin ta Sipsip Asus tin ku yang enangin epon men kho si kut, ma titien tuon men hihi i in kut.”
66019008	Ma po wa moolngin tin tunus e pon yil weh u pon engil engil men tumen si ta wut kuma wut mool epon, epo moolngin tin tunus imen los po wungin tin sisiik e ta po tin auluungin men.
66019009	Li klet ma tihngin ko wo ta ngo taku, “E pan wungin ta taku, ‘Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin yukngin me epo kakaomngin tin epo enanginngin tin ta Sipsip Asus men.’” Kut ma yang ko sakal ko pit po sun si ta ngo kyok taku, “Wungin tin irawin weh e ta Got men kha imen.”
66019010	Ti ma nga plong ko nuk sii khi tihngin ma nga taku uluu yang. Takuma yang ko wo ta ngo taku, “Si e in aku e ning i tumen asin, epo ngo men tin kum ken ngon men u ken ehuro wom tin kasum wungin tin po pok put ta a-Yesus men tumen kha iyi. Si ngon men ku uluu Got weh! Epo wungin tin po pok put ta a-Yesus men kha emiun tin pong si po pokngin ma po pok put sakalngin men.”
66019011	Li klet ma nga ion wet pi min pok pit, ih, hos pon eun ta ma yang tin ung won men po sikian e to wungin tin ira sakalngin tan nginangan u to wungin anuh misan men kut tumen, ma wungin siik kha yang ples wungin ma yang sewut po ma hi lek wal epon men.
66019012	Yang maran ken yau tin ngin ngin men, u moolngin tin ta po tin sinkhaung men munuman ung mhi yang kut tumen. Ma yang yan panngin nuk pon tuon, men ku po ta pon tan akomen, si yang misan.
66019013	Ma yang phi moolngin tin nuk po sun men ta men pamutngin ko mi enghik, ma yang yan men “A-Sakalngin ta Got.”
66019014	Ma po nolo tin kuk wet pi men sup mi moolngin tin tunus e pon pon eun u pon yil yil weh men tumen, ma po ung e li li wo hos tin pon pon eun men ma po ira yang li.
66019015	Ma bainat tongin ta me pol mi wo yang epon kumali yang lek po mosop tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men epon. Ma yang tuon men ku maran pit wo po ken po ta tin maran pit wo sipsip men to kamtukngin aenan ta men. Ma yang tuon khin paplot wain enun tin epo min kakhat sun tin amhees weh e ta Got tin Apalukngin Weh men.
66019016	Ma moolngin tin yang phini nuk po sun men men uu put luu yang kut tumen men yang yan panngin nuk pon taku, “SINKHAUNG TA PO SINKHAUNG MOSOP U AKONO TA PO AKONO MOSOP.”
66019017	Kut ma nga ion tihngin ta men pit mara sinang ma wut pit hambip li epo emon mosop tin yap yap mili wet pi alilil men taku, “Wom mu palu wal epo kakaomngin tin nhum e ta Got men,
66019018	kuma wom mu ii po tin sinkhaung men emali hi, u po phuan tin mara hi pit wo po nolo men emali hi, u po tin apalukngin men emali hi u hos munuman emalin u po tin ung e li li wo hos men emali hi u po tin wo hi pias men u po tin kum wo sun engun men u po tin ya hi om men u po tin ya hi pos men kut tumen mosop emali hi.”
66019019	Li klet ma nga ion li ken nginan enih u po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men u po nolo tin ta hi men kut tumen, men kho me palu wal epon ku sewut yang tin ung wo hos men to po tin ta hi nolo men.
66019020	Kut ma po sung sung wo li ken nginan enih to pokngin torokngin tin ning tosukngin maran kiring kiring to mara li ken nginan enih men. Epo tosukngin tin imen kha pokngin torokngin ek ek mi po mosop tin wa tosukngin tin ta li ken nginan enih men nuk po hi ma po uluu li enun men epon men. Ma po whis wulong mara ngong to tunusngin li ko mi ehung tin yauan e enah ngiseng pit e ngin ngin epon men.
66019021	Si po tin ta hi kara men lekngin ko huu epo bainat tin me pol wo yang tin ung wo hos men. Ma emon mosop me pa ken kuma hi epo po emali hi si hi mut mut weh.
66020001	Li klet ma nga ion tihngin ta men me ko wet pi, men isum endara tin po klas epon e ta nahu tin siin om men u esih po koklong nhum ta pit yanga wilin kut tumen.
66020002	Ma tihngin sung wo tamha tin nhum men, tin in launekan kho men, men emiun tin hik put wungin pit wo po nginangan e yan a-Nolongin men, ma tihngin kan kan sun pit to posan khum khum khum ta (1,000);
66020003	ma yang psik tamha ko mi nahu tin siin om men, si yang sambal kakaek si eya sun, ma yang wa tosukngin ta ko pon, epon akuli a-Nolongin iso ek ek mi po masang to sun wala tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men li pol to elup tin ku posan khum khum khum ta (1,000) tin imen pyu pongin men. Si mi khi wungin tin imen anima yang men ku won pias kara weh put monlo long wet.
66020004	Kut si nga ion ehus tin ta po tin sinkhaung men kara nuk, ma po kara nuk e li li won, ma wungin ples nginan wangin sup yanga wili po. Kuru nga ion po tin kaklat wutngin pit mi hi tin pok put wungin ta a-Yesus men u pit mi wungin tin ta Got men kut tumen enu hi, u po tin ku uluu li ken nginan enih wa enun men som u ku wa tosukngin nuk mhi hi tin awang men wa hut wili hi tin wetpon men som men, men si turunus ma si sinkhaung to Krais to posan khum khum khum ta (1,000).
66020005	Si po tin hu hu e kara maksin men ku si turunus som weh li pol minan tin kuli posan khum khum khum ta (1,000) tin imen pyu pongin men. Ewo maran tin po tin hu hu kho men ku khek kyok si turunus epon men wala imen.
66020006	Taku po ta in mi sun tin hi kekhek kyok si turunus ewo maran men, men emhong tin ta Got men ko pon ma si auluungin kha men. Po tin imen hunngin tin me ponwal angan men ku emhong tan los hi akomen. Awu. Po men ku iso si po tin kum auluungin ta Got u ta Krais men tumen, ma po si sinkhaung to Krais to posan khum khum khum ta (1,000).
66020007	Li klet ma posan khum khum khum ta (1,000) tin imen li kut, anima a-Nolongin ku plosngin pi tin yang kan kanngin pit epon men ma won pias,
66020008	ma yang li pol kumali ek ek mi po tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li hut mulus porilin tin khaut mnal men, men Gok u Magok, kumali yang palu po me kuk then epon ku hi lek wal to po kara, epo po tin imen men tiikngin ta hi ken namak tin nuk suu wiu men.
66020009	Ma po li si pol wo mulusngin tin yangae e nhum men ma po baul pi tin po tin auluungin men tekel i men u pi mi enunu tin Got min pit won weh men kut tumen. Takuma yau me ko wet pi hang Got men ma suuk sii po ii nginan li.
66020010	Ma emiun tin hik put wungin pit wo po nginangan e ek ek mi po nginangan men psikngin ko mi ehung tin yau u enah tin ngiseng men tumen pit epon men, men pi tin li ken nginan enih u pokngin tin torokngin men tumen kuk epon kut men. Ma po ku kuk e wo hi maan maan to pi mhangin u to pi luk tumen to elup tin ku nuk e lap li kut men.
66020011	Li klet ma nga ion ehus ta po tin sinkhaung men pon eun nhum ta, u yang tin ung won men tumen, tin mulus u wet pi tumen mosop mhup li kis kis to maran men, ma pi tin ku mulus u wet pi li nuk epon men ku po pon tan ta ung akomen.
66020012	Ma nga ion po tin huu kho men tin ya hi om u ya hi pos men tumen, men si nuk mara Got, ma kisang tin kara men lapngin. Kuru kisang ta maksin men lapngin kut tumen, men Kisang tin epo Tunusngin men. Ma po tin huu kho men wungin ta hi plesngin epo wungin tin panngin nuk mi kisang tin kara men, men plesngin ira wungin tin po ning i kho men.
66020013	Ma wiu pau po tin huu mi wiu men me, kuru hunngin, u pi tin ta hunngin men tumen men pau po tin hu hu e kuk epon men maksin me kut tumen. Ma wungin ta po mosop men plesngin ira wungin ta po then then siik.
66020014	Li klet ma Hunngin u Pi tin ta hunngin men tumen men whisngin ko mi ehung tin yauan men. Tin imen men hunngin tin me ponwal angan men kha men.
66020015	Ma taku po ta ku po pon tan yan panngin nuk mi kisang tin epo tunusngin men som, men ku po psik i ko mi ehung tin yauan men kut.
66021001	Li klet ma nga ion wet pi homan ta u mulus homan ta tumen, epo wet pi tin muk men u mulus tin muk men men kis kis kut, u wiu ku maksin nuk tumen akomen.
66021002	Ma ngo a-Yon marango kon pi tin auluungin men, men Yerusalem tin homan men, men ung e me ko wet pi hang Got men, men hihingin to moolngin tan ken wut wala ta tin ku enangin titien men.
66021003	Ma nga hul wut po ta pit hambip me ko wet pi, ma sakal taku, “Wom hul, mang ausel tin ta Got men ko ung mi po tunus kut, ma yang ku in lunga po. Ma po ku kuk masang to sun wala tin ta yang weh men, u yang tuon ku in lunga po ma Got ta po weh kut tumen.
66021004	Ma Got ku luk luk tinisngin mara po mosop li; ma hunngin u min urut i u haungin, kuru won manngin kut tumen men ku mak nuk akomen. Epo endara mosop tin nuk muk men men kis kis kho kut.”
66021005	Li klet ma yang tin ung wo ehus men wo taku, “Wom hul, ngo ku ning endara mosop homan khae.” Kuru yang ko wo kyok si ta ngo taku, “E pan wungin tin imen ko, epo sakalngin tin imen men irawin, ma ku wo wom nuk wet weh.”
66021006	Kuru yang wo ta ngo taku, “Men klet kut. Ngo men Alpa u ngo men Omega, tin Sakalngin Hosingin u Sakalngin Pyu Pongin men tumen. Ma po tin huu eki men ku nga naa hi hut emul engun epo eki maran tin epo tunusngin men.
66021007	Taku po ta apalukngin hut sun, men ku nga pakuh pon epo endara mosop, ma ngo ku Got tan u men wirukan kut tumen.
66021008	Si po tin wo hi to hi men u po tin wo phepngin ta hi om men u po tin ning wungin tin amutngin men, u po tin lek sun ko huu men, u po tin ning elwanngin men, u po tin wam nginangan men, u po tin uluu got tin tororokngin enu hi men u po mosop tin torok nginangan men tumen kuli wa pi ta hi mi ehung tin yau u enah ngiseng tumen ngin ngin pit epon men, men hunngin tin me ponwal angan men kha imen.”
66021009	Li klet ma tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup e kana wal kambuyu tin golan e won maikngin tin khaut ponwal me sup e me sulung epo sun men kol min men ta me wo ta ngo taku, “E mu iyi, ngo ku suk marap epo wut tin wala e ku enangin men, men Sipsip Asus titien.”
66021010	Kut ma tihngin wa ngo li mi Emiun li po pi emian nhum nomalak ta, ma tihngin suk marango epo pi tin yan pos men, men Yerusalem tin auluungin men, men kuk e usngin me ko wet pi hang Got men,
66021011	ma pi ngin ngin epo moolngin tin ta Got men; ma pi mha ken enah pon tunus ta tin po ngel sun epon weh men, men ken enah yaspa men, men mi kleng kleng ken enah tin mi kleng kleng weh men.
66021012	Kuru enunu nhum nomalak ta baul i, men sowon khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen pit e li li put, ma tihngin khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen nuk e li li mara sowon, ma po ya hi kara panngin nuk wo sowon then then, men ya po tin khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen tin yau a po siin ta hi then then weh e me mi po tin khuuknginin tin ta a-Israel men:
66021013	sowon khaut miuk nuk li mara naeng angan, u khaut miuk nuk li esaul angan, u khaut miuk nuk li nekip siin angan, u khaut miuk nuk li solong siin angan kut tumen.
66021014	Ma enunu tin baul pi men siin ko po enah khaut eip ponwal u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen, ma po enah then then men po tin paengin ta Sipsip Asus e khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen ya hi panngin nuk e li li pon.
66021015	Ma tihngin tin pit e sakal ta ngo men in to kaingin golan ta tin ku yang kai pi u sowon tin pit e li li men u enunu tumen epon men.
66021016	Ma pi ko ung siin emol mnal, ma hut li pol hut u porilin ta li pol porilin ta kyok tumen men kai wal misan. Ma tihngin kai pi epo kaingin, men kilomita khaut khum khum khum ponwal u khum khum ponwal tumen (2,200), men nomalak tan, u nhum tan u nomalak tan tin in ti si men tumen men kai wal.
66021017	Kuru yang kai enunu tin ta pi men, men kaingin tan khaut khum khum ta u khum mnal u mnal tumen (144), men ira kaingin tin ta po tunus wili hi tin si waut men li pol wili hi pon pon men kha tihngin kai pi epon men.
66021018	Ma enunu men ningngin epo enah yaspa, si pi men ningngin epo gol misan, men pon engil engil weh ken glas men.
66021019	Ma enah tin po ning pi siin si won men po pa mool i epo enah tin po ngel wal pit min e maran kiring kiring men: enah tin ung pi siin emol tin muk men men enah yaspa, si tin me ponwal angan men men enah sapaia, u tin me miuk angan men men enah salsedoni, u tin me mnal angan men men enah emeral,
66021020	u tin me eip angan men men enah sadonikis, u tin me ta me sup angan men men enah konilian, u tin me ponwal me sup angan men men enah krisolait, u tin me miuk me sup angan men men enah beril, u tin me mnal me sup angan men men enah topas, u tin me khum ta men men enah krisopres, u tin me khum ta u ta me nuk wo sun tumen men enah haiasin, u tin me khum ta u ponwal tumen men men enah ametis tumen.
66021021	Ma sowon tin khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen men eyuk enun tin po ngel wal pit min men then then kuk e li li maran, ma sowon then then men ningngin epo eyuk enun tingit ta, u soput tin nhum e nuk emin men men ningngin epo gol misan kut tumen, men pon engil engil weh ken glas men.
66021022	Takuma ngo ku ion mang auluungin ta ku ung epon akomen, epo Got tin Akono e Apalukngin weh men u Sipsip Asus tumen kha mang auluungin tin ta pi men.
66021023	Ma pi ku hing wo sinang wa namih tumen ku pal nuk mara pi akomen, epo moolngin tin ta Got men pal nuk mi pi kut, u Sipsip Asus kut kha esulan ta pi men kut tumen.
66021024	Ma po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men, tin palolongin kut men, ku kuk e muk muk mi esul tin imen, ma po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ku wa moolngin u endara tin po ya hi pos ton men tumen me sup mi pi tin imen.
66021025	Ma ungunan ta men ku po sambal si mara sowon angan akomen, epo pi tin imen ku luk ewin akomen.
66021026	Ma po ku kot moolngin u endara tin po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ya hi ton men tumen me sup mi pi tin imen.
66021027	Si endara tin amiron nginan engun men, u endara tin ning i ma wungin hies to mara Got men, u torokngin tumen ku ta me sup mi pi angan akomen. Awu. Po tin ya hi panngin nuk mi kisang tin epo Tunusngin e ta Sipsip Asus men misa hi kha ku li sup men.
66022001	Li klet ma tihngin suk marango epo eki put ewun ta tin eki tin epo tunusngin men misan nuk epon men, men min kleng kleng weh ken glas tin mi kleng weh men, men me pol hang ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men u ta Sipsip Asus kut tumen.
66022002	Kuru soput tin nhum e nuk emin pi men, eki porilin ta u porilin ta, men sa tin epo tunusngin men nuk iran, men enun maran kiring kiring khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen, men sa then then enun to namih then then tin ung e li men. Ma sa kiin men epon ku mimlis saihngin ta po tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men.
66022003	Si ngil ngilngin tin ta Got men ku maksin in akomen, ma ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men u ta Sipsip Asus tumen ku ung pi tin imen, ma po tin kum ta yang men ku kuk e kum auluungin ta yang epon.
66022004	Ma po ku mara hi whus po yang maran, ma yang yan men ku nuk mhi po tin awang men.
66022005	Ma pi tin imen men ku luk kyok ewin akomen, wa po ku hing wo esul wa sinang wa tumen tin ku pal men kyok akomen. Awu. Epo Got tin Akono men ku mha ko nuk po po. Ma po ku si sinkhaung ma po mara hi pit wo sun to elup tin ku nuk e lap li kut men.
66022006	Kut ma tihngin wo ta ngo taku, “Wungin tin imen ku po wo hi nuk wet weh, epon men irawin weh ako. Epo Got tin Akono ta po tin pokngin tin auluungin men tih tihngin tin tan men epon ku suk mara po tin kum tan men epo wungin tin ku iso si angan men.
66022007	Wom hul, ngo men ku me kerek engun! Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin ira sakalngin tin ta Got e pok putngin nuk mi kisang tin iyi.”
66022008	Ngo a-Yon kha tin marango nuk po wungin tin imen u nga hul i kut tumen. Ma minan tin nga hul u nga ion i tumen, men nga plong ko nuk sii khi tihngin ma nga taku uluu tihngin tin suk marango epo wungin tin imen.
66022009	Takuma tihngin ko wo ta ngo taku, “E in aku e ning i tumen asin. Epo ngo men tin tong kum then men, u po tin ehuro wom e pokngin men, u po mosop tin ira wungin tin nuk mi kisang tin iyi tumen kha it mosop kum then to wal men. Si e uluu Got misan!”
66022010	Kuru tihngin wo ta ngo taku, “E ning i aku e sambal ma e kakaek eya wungin kaunngin tin pok putngin e nuk mi kisang tin iyi asin, epo elup maran men me tikayung kut khae.
66022011	Po ta tin wungin tan ku siik som men, men ku iso in to wungin tan tin ku siik som men li kut; po ta tin wungin tan lengwal men, men ku iso in to wungin tan tin lengwal men li kut; po ta tin wungin tan siik men, men ku iso in to wungin tan tin siik men li kut; u po ta tin wungin tan auluungin men, men ku iso in to wungin tan tin auluungin men li kut tumen.
66022012	Wom hul, ngo men ku me kerek engun, ma talungin tin ta ngo men men ku nga me ton, ma ngo ku wa talungin si ta po then then emhut kumang ta hi weh.
66022013	Ngo men Alpa u Omega tumen, tin Sakalngin Hosingin weh u Sakalngin Li Pyu Pongin weh tumen, tin in Muk weh u in Silung weh men tumen.”
66022014	Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin ira sakalngin tin ta yang men, kumali po wa emhong epon ku po ii sa tin epo tunusngin men enun, u po li sup mara sowon tin li sup epo pi tin nhum men kut tumen.
66022015	Si wetpo enunu men po tin ira wungin lengwal weh men u po tin wam sun men, u po tin ning elwanngin men, u po tin lek sun ko huu men, u po tin wo hi nuk wet got tin tororokngin enu hi men, u po mosop tin mi hi pit pit epon ku ira wungin tin torokngin men tumen kha kuk pi tin imen.
66022016	Ngo a-Yesus kha tih tihngin tin ta ngo men kuma tihngin li pok put sakalngin tin mosop iyi si tap, men ku ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men. Ngo men tin si po tin khuuknginin ta a-Dewit men u ngo men tin awheng tin mha weh to pi tin huus king kauk men kut tumen.”
66022017	Kut ma Emiun u Sipsip Asus titien kut tumen sakal taku, “E muh.” Kuru po ta tin hul wungin tin imen ku wo taku, “E muh,” kut tumen. Kuru po ta tin hun eki men ku me kut tumen. Po ta tin in akani e min epon men, men ku me wa eki tin epo tunusngin men hut emul engun.
66022018	Epo nga pok put wungin si ta po mosop tin hul wungin kaunngin tin pok putngin e nuk mi kisang tin iyi, epon taku po ta wa wungin kara ko po sun tin iyi, men kuli Got wa won maikngin tin pok putngin mi kisang tin iyi ko pon maksin kut tumen.
66022019	U taku po ta klok wungin tin pok putngin e nuk mi kisang tin iyi put ta li, men kuli Got klok talungin tan tin nuk mi Kisang tin epo Tunusngin men, u mi pi tin nhum e auluungin men, u mi endara mosop tin panngin nuk mi kisang tin iyi kut tumen li.
66022020	Yang tin pok put sakalngin epo wungin tin mosop imen wo taku, “Wai, ngo ku me kerek engun ako.” Irawin. Wai, Yesus, Ngon tin Akono men, ngon men ku muh!
66022021	Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men men ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
